GS24jvkasipu:9: atha sabda-anuśāsanam keṣāṃ śabdānām? laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14: a i u ityanena krameṇa varṇān-upadiśyānte ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:15: tasya grahaṇaṃ bhavaty ekenauran rapraḥ (*1,1.51) ityakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:18: teṣāṃ sāvarṇya-prasiddhy-artham akāra iha śāstre vivṛtaḥ pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19: tasya prayoga-artham a a (*8,4.68) iti śāstra-ante pratyāpattiḥ kariṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:21: ṛ ḷ ity etau varṇāv updiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante kakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:26: akāra-ādayo varṇāḥ pracura-prayoga-viṣayāsteṣāṃ sujñānam upadeśe prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:28: kḷpeś ca pūrvatra-asiddham (*8,2.1) iti latvam asiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:29: tasya-asiddhatvād ṛkāra eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti iti kim-artham ḷkāra upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:30: latva-vidhānād yāni parāṇy ackāryāṇi tāni ḷkāre yathā syur iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33: yac ca-aśaktijam asādhu śabda-rupaṃ, tad-anukaraṇasya-api sādhutvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35: ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye śakti-vaikalyāt kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:38: e o ity etau varṇāv upadiśya ante ṅkāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:43: ai au ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante cakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:46: ica ekāco 'm pratyayavac ca (*6,3.68) iti ikāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:51: varṇeṣu ye varṇa-ikadeśā varṇa-antara-samāna-akṛtayasteṣu tat-kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:52: tac-chāyāmukāriṇo hi te na punas ta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:62: ha ya va ra ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṭakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:66: tasya yar-grahaṇena yay-grahaṇena ca grahaṇe sati,
GS24jvkasipu:70: madra-hradaḥ, bhadra-hrada ity atra dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti aco ra-hā-bhyāṃ dve (*8,4.46) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:71: kuṇḍaṃ rathena, vanaṃ rathena ity atra anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇaḥ(*8,4.58)
GS24jvkasipu:74: ākṛtau pada-arthe samudāye sakṛl-lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ pravartate ity etasmin darśane yaro 'nunasike 'nunāsiko vā (*8,4.45)
GS24jvkasipu:75: antaratamo bhavati ity evam etat pravarttate /
GS24jvkasipu:76: tad-anena gakāra-ādīnāṃ ṅakārā-adayo ye yathā-svaṃ sthānato guṇataś ca ataratamāḥ, te sarve vihitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:79: sthāna-mātreṇa guṇa-mātreṇa vā antaratamās te sarve nivartitāḥ iti sthāna-mātra-antaratamo rephasya ṇakāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:80: dvirvacane 'pi rephasya yar-antarbhāve sati yarkāryaṃ prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:81: tat sākṣāc-chiṣṭena nimitta-bhāvena bādhyate iti na dvirucyate rephaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:83: ity etad apy anusvāra-antaratamaṃ sakṛdeva parasavarṇaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:84: na ca rephasya anusvāra-antaratamaḥ savarṇo 'sti iti na bhaviṣyati kuṇḍaṃ rathena,
GS24jvkasipu:86: aṭāṃ madye visarjanīya-jihvāmūlīya-upadhmānīyānām apy upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:89: atra aḍ-vyavāye iti ṇatvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:92: la ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṇakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:98: aṇ-grahaṇāni tu pūrveṇa, aṇ-udit-savarṇasya ca-apratyayaḥ (*1,1.69) ity etad-eva-ikaṃ pareṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:99: atha kim artham ajgrahaṇam eva-itan-na kriyate?
GS24jvkasipu:100: na-ivaṃ śakyam, antaḥ-sthānām api hi savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:111: lokam ity atra anusvārasya anunāsike yayi parasavarṇe kṛte tasya yar-grahaṇena grahaṇād dvirvacanaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:113: lakāre tv-anunāsikaḥ pratijñāyate, tena ur-aṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51)
GS24jvkasipu:114: ity atra ra iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇāl-laparatvam api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:116: ña ma ṅa ṇa na ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante makāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:119: halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti yakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:120: ṅamo hrasvād-aci ṅamuṇ nityam (*8,3.32) iti ṅakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:122: kecit-tu sarvāṇy-etāni pratyāhāra-grahaṇāni ñakāreṇa bhavantu iti makāram anubandhaṃ pratyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:123: tathā ca sati ṅamo hrasva-adaci ṅamuṇ nityam(*8,3.32)
GS24jvkasipu:124: ity atra-āgaminoḥ jhabhor abhāvād-āgamābhāva-pratipattau pratipatti-gauravaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:126: jha bha ity etau varṇāv-upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ñakārāmitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:130: gha ḍha dha ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante ṣakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:132: eka-aco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣ-antasya s-dhvoḥ (*8,2.37) iti bhakāra-jhakārābhyām //
GS24jvkasipu:134: ja ba ga ḍa da ś /
GS24jvkasipu:135: ja ba ga ḍa da ity etān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante śakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:137: bho-bhago-agho-apūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) ity akāreṇa haśi ca (*6,1.114) iti hakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:140: eka-aco vaśo bhaṣ jhaṣ-antasya s-dhv-oḥ (*8,2.37) iti bakāreṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:141: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta v /
GS24jvkasipu:142: kha pha dha ḍha tha ca ṭa ta ity etān varṇān upadiśyānte vakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:147: ka pa ity etau varṇāv upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante yakāramitaṃ karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:150: maya uño vo vā (*8,3.33) iti makāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:154: śa ṣa sa ity enān varṇān upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante rephamitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:162: ha ity ekaṃ varṇam upadiśya pūrvāṃś ca-ante lakāramitam karoti pratyāhāra-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:167: ralo v-y-upadhad-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26) iti repheṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:169: śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45) iti śakāreṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:170: atha kim artham upadiṣṭo 'pi hakāraḥ punar upadiśyate?
GS24jvkasipu:171: kittva vikalpa-kṣa- iḍvidhayo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:172: snihitvā, snehitvā ity atra ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś-ca (*1,2.26) iti kittvaṃ vā yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:173: liheḥ alikṣat iti śala ig-upadhād aniṭaḥ kṣaḥ (*3,1.45) iti kṣo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:175: rudihi, svapihi iti valādi-lakṣaṇa iḍ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:177: jhalgrahaṇeṣu ca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:178: yady evam, ha ya va ra ḍ ity atra tarhi kim artham upadiśyat?
GS24jvkasipu:179: mahāṃ hi saḥ; devā hasanti ity atra aḍ-grahaṇeṣu ca aś-grahaṇeṣuca hakārasya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:180: brāhmaṇo hasati - haśi ca (*6,1.114) ity utvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:181: ekasmān ṅañaṇAvaṭā dvābhāṃ ṣastribhya eva kaṇamāḥ syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:182: jñeyau cayau caturbhyo raḥ pañcabhyaḥ śalau ṣaḍbhyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:191: taparakaraṇam aij-artham tād-api paraḥ taparaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:199: vṛddhi-pradeśāḥ -- sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:213: guṇa-pradeśāḥ -- mider guṇaḥ (*7,3.82) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:219: vṛddhi-guṇau svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇau ikaḥ eva sthāne veditavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:231: guṇa-vṛddhī svasañjñayā vidhīyete, tatra ikaḥ iti etad-upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:232: kiṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati ? dvitīyayā ṣaṣṭhī prādurbhāvyate /
GS24jvkasipu:237: ikaḥ iti kim? ātsandhy-akṣara-vyañjanānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:242: iha mā bhūt -- dyauḥ, panthāḥ, saḥ, imam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:247: tasya lopo yasminn ārdhadhātuke tad-ārdhadhātukaṃ dhātu-lopaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:248: tatra ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:252: lolūya-ādibhyo yaṅantebhyaḥ paca-ādy-aci vihite yaṅo 'ci ca (*2,4.74)
GS24jvkasipu:253: iti yaṅo luki kṛte tam eva acam āśritya ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpte tayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:259: ārdhadhātuke iti kim ? tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:267: kṅin-nimitte ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:286: asunavam ity ādau lakārasya saty api ṅittve yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpakam ṅiti yat-kāryaṃ tal-lakāre ṅiti na bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:291: dīdhī-vevyoḥ iṭaś ca ye guṇa-vṛddhī prāpnutaḥ, te na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:296: vṛddhir iṭo na saṃbhavati iti laghu-upadha-guṇasya-atra pratiṣedhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:300: bhinna-jātīyair ajbhir avyavahitaḥ śliṣṭa-uccāritā halaḥ saṃyoga-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:303: tena dvayor bahūnāṃ ca saṃyogasañjñā siddhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:310: halaḥ iti kim ? titaucchatram - saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ (*8,2.23) iti lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:311: anantarāḥ iti kim ? pacati panasam - skoḥ saṃyoga-ādyor ante ca (*8,2.29) iti lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:312: saṃyoga-pradeśāḥ - samyogāntasya lopaḥ (*8,2.23) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:316: mukha-sahitā nāsikā mukha-nāsikā, tayā ya uccāryate varṇaḥ so 'nunāsika-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:323: anunāsika-pradeśāḥ - āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi (*6,1.26) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:330: tulya āsye prayatno yasya varṇasya yena varṇena saha sa samānajātīyaṃ prati savarṇasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:332: catvāra ābhyantarāḥ prayatnāḥ savarṇasaṃ jñāyām āśrīyante -- spṛṣṭatā,
GS24jvkasipu:335: a a a iti trayo 'kārā udātta-anudātta-svaritāḥ pratyekaṃ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāś ca hrasva-dīrgha-pluta-bhedād aṣṭādaśa dhā bhidyante /
GS24jvkasipu:336: tathā i-varṇaḥ, tathā u-varṇaḥ, tathā ṛ-varṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:337: ḷ-varṇasya dīrghā na santi, taṃ dvādaśa-bhedam ācakśate /
GS24jvkasipu:338: sandhy-akṣarāṇāṃ hrasvā na santi, tāny api dvādaśa-prabhedāni /
GS24jvkasipu:339: antaḥsthā dviprabhedāḥ, rephavarjitā yavalāḥ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāśca /
GS24jvkasipu:344: āsya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kacaṭatapānāṃ bhinna-sthānānāṃ tulya-prayatnānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:345: kiṃ ca syāt ? tarptā, tarptum ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65)
GS24jvkasipu:347: prayatna-grahaṇaṃ kim ? icuyaśānāṃ tulya-sthānānāṃ bhinna-jātīyānāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:348: kiṃ ca syāt ? aruścyotati ity atra jharo jhari savarṇe (*8,4.65) iti śakārasya cakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:352: ubhayoḥ ṛvarṇasya ḷvarṇasya ca āntaratamaḥ savarṇo dīrgho nāsti iti rkāra eva dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:353: savarṇa-pradeśāḥ - akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ (*6,1.101) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:358: tulya-āsya-prayatnāv api aj-jhalau parasparaṃ savarṇasañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:359: avarṇa-hakārau daṇḍahastaḥ, ivarṇa-śakārau-dadhi śītam, savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:360: vaipāśo matsyaḥ, ānaḍuhaṃ carma iti yasya-iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:365: īt ūt et ity evam-antaṃ dvivacanaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ pragrhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:375: pragṛhya-pradeśāḥ - pluta-pragṛhyā aci nityam (*6,1.125) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:384: adasaḥ sambadhī yo makāras-tasmāt pare īd-ūdetaḥ pragrhya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:397: kim-idaṃ śe iti ? supām ādeśaś chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:406: chāndasam etad eva-ikam udāharaṇam - asme indrā-bṛhaspatī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:408: itarat tu laukikam anukaraṇam - yuśme iti, asme iti, tve iti, me iti //
GS24jvkasipu:412: ekaś-ca asāvac-ca ekāc, nipāto ya ekāc āṅ-varjitaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:421: anāṅ iti kim ? ā udakāntāt, odakāntāt /
GS24jvkasipu:430: odanto yo nipātaḥ sa pragṛhya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:437: sambuddhi-nimitto ya okāraḥ sa śākalyasya ācāryasay matena pnagṛhya-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:441: sambuddhau iti kim ? gav ity ayam-āha /
GS24jvkasipu:442: atra anukārya-anukaraṇayoḥ bhedasya avivakṣitatvāt, asaty-arthavattve vibhaktir-na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:445: anārṣe iti kim ? etā gā brahama-bandha ity abravīt //
GS24jvkasipu:450: uñaḥ pragṛhya-sañjñā bhavati itau śākalyasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:457: uñaḥ itāv-anārṣe ūṃ ity ayam-ādeśo bhavati dīrgho 'nunāsikaśca,
GS24jvkasipu:459: śākalyasya grahaṇaṃ vibhāṣā-artham iha apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:460: tena trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti - u iti, viti, ūṃ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:465: īdantam ūdantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ saptamy-arthe vartamānaṃ pragṛhya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:467: māmakyāṃ tanvām iti prāpte, māṃkyām māmakī iti, tanvām tanū iti /
GS24jvkasipu:469: īdūtau iti kim ? priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti /
GS24jvkasipu:471: saptamī-grahaṇaṃ kim ? dhītī, matī, suṣṭutī - dhītyā, matyā, suṣṭutyā iti prāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:478: vacanādy-atra dīrghatvaṃ tatra api sarasī yadi /
GS24jvkasipu:479: jñāpakaṃ syāt tad-antatve mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt //2 //
GS24jvkasipu:483: dā-rūpāś catvāro dhātavaḥ, dhā-rūpau ca dvau dābdaipau varjayitvā ghu-sañjñakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:490: adāp iti kim ? dāp lavane - dātaṃ barhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:496: asahāyasay ādyanta-upadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti iti ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:498: ādāv-iva ante iva ekasminn-api kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:499: yathā kartavyam ity atra pratyaya-ādy-udāttatvaṃ bhavati, evam aupagavam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:500: yathā vṛkṣābhyām ity atra ato 'ṅgasya dīrghatvam evam ābhyām, ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:502: sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhāsannayanaḥ, ākāram āśritya vṛddha-sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:506: tarap tamap ity etau pratyayau gha-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:516: bahu gaṇa vatu ity eta saṅkhyā-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:533: bahu-gaṇa-śabdayor vaipulye saṅghe ca vartamānayor iha grahaṇaṃ nāsti, saṅkhyā-vācinor eva /
GS24jvkasipu:536: ardha-pūrva-padaśca pūraṇa-pratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyā-sañjño bhavati iti vaktavyaṃ samāsakan vidhy-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:538: ardhaṃ pañcamaṃ yeśām iti bahuvrīhau kṛte ardha-pañcamaiḥ śūrpaiḥ krītaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:541: ity anuvṛttes tataḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvasya dvigu-sañjñāyāṃ śūrpād añ anyatarasyām (*5,
GS24jvkasipu:552: ṣa-kārāntā na-kārāntā ca yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:566: ḍatyantā yā saṅkhyā sā ṣaṭ-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:572: ktaś ca ktavatuś ca kta-ktavatū pratyayau niśṭhā-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:583: sarva-śabdaḥ ādir yeṣāṃ tāni-imāni sarva-adīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:599: ubha-śabdasya sarvanāmatve prayojanam-- sarvanāmnas-tṛtīya ca (*2,3.27) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:600: ubhābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ vasati, ubhayoḥ hetvoḥ vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:619: tva tvat iti dvāv api ca anudātāu iti smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:624: kathaṃ yathā-saṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām (*1,3.10), same deśe yajeta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:625: samasya sarva-śabda-paryāyasya sarvanāma-sñjñā iṣyte, na sarvatra /
GS24jvkasipu:630: tyad, tad, yad, etad, idam, adas, eka, dvi, yuṣmad, asmad, bhavatu, kim /
GS24jvkasipu:632: sarvanāma-pradeśāḥ-- sarvanāmnaḥ smai (*7,1.14) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:637: tasmin nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vibhā-ṣeyam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:639: dig-upadiṣṭe samāse bahuvrīhau vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:643: iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati, tatra na jñāyate kva vibhāṣā, kva pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:644: dig-grahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe jñāyate dig-upadiṣṭa-samāse vibhāṣā, anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:645: samāsa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? samāsa eva yo bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra vibhāṣā yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:646: bahuvrīhivad bhāvena yo bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:648: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? dvandve vibhāṣā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:649: dakṣiṇa-uttara-pūrvāṇām iti dvandve ca (*1,1.32) it nityaṃ pratiṣedho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:654: sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ tad-anta-vidher abhyupagamād bahuvrīher api sarva-ādy-antasay sañjñā syāt iti pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:655: bahuvrīhau samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:660: iha ca, tvat-kapitṛkaḥ, mat-kapitṛkaḥ ity-akaj na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:661: bahuvrīhau iti vartamāne punar-bahuvrīhi-grahaṇaṃ bhūta-pūrvamātre 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:671: samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ sammasagrahaṇaṃ tṛtīyā-samāsa-artha-vākye 'pi pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:674: iti tṛtīya-asamāsaṃ pratipadaṃ vakṣyati, tasya-idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:676: kartṛ karaṇe kṛtā bahulam (*2,1.32) iti-tvayakā Kṛtam, mayakā kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:680: dvandve ca samāse sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:686: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte jasi vibhāṣā ārabyate /
GS24jvkasipu:687: dvandve samāse jasi vibhāṣā sarvādīni sarvanāma-sañjñāni na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:689: jasaḥ kāryaṃ prati vibhāṣā, akaj hi na bhavati - katarakatamakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:696: prathama carama taya alpa ardha katipaya nema ity ete jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:706: tatra nema iti sarvādiṣu paṭhyate, tasya prāpte vibhaṣā, anyeṣām aprāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:707: ubhaya-śabdasya tayap-pratyaya-antasya gane pāṭhān nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā iha api jaskāryaṃ prati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:712: pūrva para avara dakṣiṇa uttara apara adhara ity-eṣāṃ gaṇe pāṭhāt pūrveṇa nityāyāṃ sarvanāma-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ jasi vibhāṣā ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:713: pūrvādīni vibhaṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñāni bhavanti vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:722: vyavasthāyām iti kiṃ ? dakṣiṇā ime gāthakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:725: satyām eva vyavasthāyām iyaṃ teṣāṃ sañjñā //
GS24jvkasipu:729: atra api nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:730: svam ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ jasi vibhāṣā sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:735: jñāti-pratiṣedhaḥ iti kim ? dhūmāyanta iva aśliṣṭāḥ prajvalanti iva saṃhatāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:736: ulmukāni iva me 'mī svā jñātayo bharatar ṣabha //
GS24jvkasipu:737: adhanākhyāyām iti kim ? prabhūtāḥ svā na dīyante, prabhūtaḥ svā na bhujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:742: atra api pūrveṇa nityā sarvanāma-sañjñā prāptā sā jasi vibhāṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:743: antaram ity etac-chabda-rūpaṃ vibhāṣā jasi sarvanāma-sañjñaṃ bhavati bahiryoge upasaṃvyāne ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:749: bahiryoga-upasaṃvyānayoḥ iti kim ? anayoḥ grāmayor antare tāpasaḥ prativasati /
GS24jvkasipu:755: vibhāṣā-prakaraṇe tīyasya vā ṅitsu sarvanāma-sañjñā ity upasaṃkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:762: svar, antar, prātar, ete anta-udāttāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:802: san, sanāt, sanat, tiras, ete ādy-udāttāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:844: ca, vā, ha, aha, eva, evam ity-ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:845: avyaya-pradeśāḥ-- avyayād āp-supaḥ (*2,4.82) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:848: sadṛśaṃ triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:849: vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yanna vyeti tad-avyayam //
GS24jvkasipu:855: tataḥ, yataḥ, tatra, yatra, tadā, yadā, sarvadā, sadā /
GS24jvkasipu:856: taddhitaḥ iti kim ? ekaḥ, dvau, bahavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:857: asarva-vibhaktiḥ iti kim ? aupagavaḥ, aupagavau, aupagavāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:861: kṛd yo ma-kāra-antaḥ, ej-antaś ca tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:869: vakṣe iti vaceḥ tum-arthe se-sen-ase (*3,4.9) iti se-pratyaye kutve ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:870: eṣe iti iṇaḥ se-pratyaye guṇe ṣatve ca kṛte rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:871: jīvase iti jīveḥ ase pratyaye rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:872: dṛśe iti dṛśeḥ ken-pratyayo nipātyate - dṛśe vikhye ca (*3,4.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:874: iha mā bhūt - ādhaye, cikīrṣave, kumbha-kārebhyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:878: ktvā, tosun, kasun, ity evam antaṃ śabda-rūpam avyaya-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:883: bhāva-lakṣaṇe sthā-iṇ-kṛñ-vadi (*3,4.16) iti iṇaḥ, kṛñaś ca tosun pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:901: tatra avyayībhāvasya avyayatve ataḥ kṛ-kami-kaṃsa-kumbha-pātra-kuśā-karṇī-ṣv anavyayasya (*8,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:903: sarvam idaṃ kāṇḍaṃ svara-adāv api paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:907: purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin iti na la-u-uka-avyaya-niṣṭhā-khal-artha-tṛnām (*2,3.69)
GS24jvkasipu:913: kim idaṃ śi iti ? jaś-śasoḥ ṣiḥ (*7,1.20) iti śiḥ ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:920: sarvanāma-sthāna-pradeśāḥ-- sarvanāma-sthāne ca asambuddhau (*6,4.8) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:924: suṭ iti pañca vacanāni sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñāni bhavanti napuṃsakād anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:926: tena jasaḥ śeḥ sarvanāma-sthāna-sañjñā pūrveṇa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:934: na iti pratiṣedhaḥ, vā iti vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:935: tayoḥ pratiṣedha-vikalpayoḥ vibhāṣā iti sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:938: tatra pratiṣedhena samīkṛte viṣaye paścād vikalpaḥ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:942: vibhāṣā-pradeśāḥ - vibhāṣā śveḥ (*6,1.30) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:946: ik yo yaṇaḥ sthāne bhūto bhāvī vā tasya saṃprasāraṇam ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:950: kecid ubhayathā sūtram idaṃ vyācakṣate vākya-arthaḥ sañjñī, varṇaś ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:951: ig-yaṇaḥ yo vākya-arthaḥ sthāny-ādeśa-sambandha-lakṣaṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:952: yaṇ-sthānika ig-varṇaḥ sa samprasāraṇa-sañjño bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:953: tatra vidhau vākya-artha upatiṣṭhate ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ putra-patyos tatpuruṣe (*6,1.13)
GS24jvkasipu:957: saṅkhyāta-anudeśād iha na bhavati - adhitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:958: dyubhyām ity atra diva ut (*6,1.131) iti taparakaraṇād dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:959: samprasāraṇa-pradeśāḥ - vasoḥ samprasāraṇam (*6,4.131) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:960: ādyantau ṭa-kitau (*1,1.46) ādiḥ ṭit bhavati, antaḥ kit bhavati ṣasṭhī-nirdiṣṭasya /
GS24jvkasipu:963: ṭitpradeśāḥ - ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ val-ādeḥ (*7,2.35) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:964: kit-pradeśāḥ - bhiyo hetubhaye śuk (*7,3.40) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:968: acāṃ saṃniviṣṭānām antyād acaḥ paro mit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:973: mitpradeśāḥ - rudḥ-ādibhyaḥ śnam (*3,1.78) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:980: eco hrasva-ādeśe kartavye ik eva hrasvo bhavati, na anyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:990: iha śāstre yā ṣaṣṭhī aniyata-yogā śrūyate, sā sthāne-yogā-iva bhavati, na-anya-yogā /
GS24jvkasipu:993: yathā-darbhāṇāṃ sthāne śaraiḥ prastaritavyam iti darbhāṇāṃ prasaṅge iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:994: evam iha api asteḥ sthāne prasaṅge bhūr bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1002: prasaṅge sambandhasya nimitta-bhūte bruva iti ṣasṭhī /
GS24jvkasipu:1005: tatra yāvantaḥ śabde sambhavanti teṣu sarveṣu prapteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate ṣaṣṭhī sthāne-yogā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1007: ata eva nipātanāc ca saptamyā aluk //
GS24jvkasipu:1009: sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratam ādeśo bhavati sadṛśatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1014: dvayor akārayoḥ kaṇṭhya eva dīrgha a-akāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1015: arthataḥ - vataṇḍī ca asau yuvatiś ca vātaṇḍya-yuvatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1020: cajoḥ ku ghiṇyatoḥ (*7,3.52) iti ca-kārasya alpa-prāṇasya aghoṣasya tādṛśa eva ka-kāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1024: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ (*8,2.80) iti hrasvasya hrasvaḥ, dīrghasya dīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1025: sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthāne grahaṇaṃ kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:1026: yatra anekam āntaryaṃ sambhavati tatra sthānata eva āntaryaṃ balīyo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1029: pramāṇato '-kāro guṇaḥ prāptaḥ, tatra sthānata āntaryād ekāraukārau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1033: iti ha-kārasya pūrva-savarṇe kriyamāṇe soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti dvitīyāḥ prasaktāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1035: tamab-grahaṇād ye soṣmāṇo nādavantaś ca te bhavanti caturthāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1037: uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamāna eva raparo veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1046: an-grahaṇaṃ kim ? su-dhātur akaṅ ca (*4,1.97) - saudhātakiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1048: ṣaṣṭhī-nirdiṣṭasya ya ucyate ādeśaḥ, so 'ntyasya alaḥ sthāne veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1053: ṅit ca ya ādeśaḥ so 'neka-al api alo 'ntyasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1056: tātaṅi ṅit-karaṇasya guṇa-vṛddhi-pratiṣedha-arthatvāt sarva-ādeśaḥ tātaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1060: parasya kāryaṃ śiṣyamāṇam āder alaḥ pratyetavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1061: kva ca parasya kāryam śiṣyate ? yatra pañcamī-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1068: aneka-al ya ādeśaḥ śit ca, sa sarvasya ṣaṣṭhī-nirdiṣṭasya sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1072: śit khalv api - jaś-śasoḥ śiḥ (*7,1.20) -kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1075: sthāny-ādeśayoḥ pṛthaktvāt sthāny-āśrayaṃ kāryam ādeśe na prāpnoti ity ayam-atideśa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1084: ārdhadhātuka-viśaye prāg eva-ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu dhātoḥ (*3,1.91) iti tavya-ādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1094: kimaḥ kaḥ (*7,2.103) iti ka-ādeśe kṛte 'ṅga-āśrayā ina-dīrghatva-aisbhāvāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1097: ktvo lyab-ādeśe kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71) iti tug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1113: pada-ādeśaḥ padavad bhavati -- grāmo vaḥ svaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:1116: vat-karanaṃ kim ? sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā mā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1118: āṅo yama-hanaḥ (*1,3.28) - āhata, āvadhiṣṭa iti ātmanepadam ubhayatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1119: ādeśa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? ānumānikasya apy ādeśasya sthānivadbhāvo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1121: anal-vidhau iti kim ? dyupathitad-ādeśā na sthānivad bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1123: hal-ṅy-ābbho dīrghāt su-ti-sy-apṛktaṃ hal (*6,1.68) iti su-lopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1131: aj-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvavidau kartavye sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1135: paṭumācaṣṭe iti ṇiciṭi-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116)
GS24jvkasipu:1137: avadhīt -- ato lopasya sthānivad-bhāvad ato hal-āder laghoḥ (*7,2.7)
GS24jvkasipu:1145: praśnaḥ iti praccheḥ naṅpratyaye c-cḥ-v-oḥ śūḍ-anunāsike ca (*6,4.19)
GS24jvkasipu:1146: iti cha-kārasya śa-kāraḥ paranimittakas tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1148: iti sico lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ kṛṣeḥ ṣa-kārasya ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si (*8,2.41)
GS24jvkasipu:1149: iti ka-kāre kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1151: ity anunāsika-lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ tuki kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1155: yuvajāniḥ iti jāyāyāḥ niṅ (*5,4.134) na paranimittakaḥ, tena ya-lope na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1156: vaiyāghrapadyaḥ iti na paranimittakaḥ pādasya antalopaḥ padbhāvaṃ na pratibadhnāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1157: ādīdhye iti dīdhīṅa uttamapuruṣa-ikavacane ṭeretvasya-aparanimittakatvād yi-i-varṇayor dīdhī-vevyoḥ (*7,4.53)
GS24jvkasipu:1163: he gauḥ iti vṛddhir aj-ādeśaḥ sambuddhi-lope kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1164: bābhravīyāḥ iti bābravyasya amī cchātrāḥ iti vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) iti chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1165: halas taddhitasya (*6,4.150) iti ya-kāral-ope kartavye av-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1168: iti dvy-aj-lakṣaṇe pratyaya-vidhau na sthānivad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1170: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaḥ sthānivad-bhāva eteṣu vidhiṣu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1176: śna-sor al-lopaḥ kṅiti sārvadhātuke iti paranimittakaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1177: sa pūrva-vidhāv āv-ādeśe yaṇ-ādeśe ca kartavye sthānivat syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:1179: dvirvacana-vidhiḥ -- dvirvacana-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1182: yaṇ-ādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt anaci ca (*8,4.47)
GS24jvkasipu:1183: iti dha-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ na syād asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1184: varevidhiḥ -- vare yo 'j-ādeśaḥ sa pūrva-vidhiṃ prati na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1188: para-nimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivattvād ato lopa iṭi ca (*6,4.64)
GS24jvkasipu:1189: ity ā-kāra-lopaḥ syād, asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1190: ya-lopa-vidhiḥ -- ya-lopa-vidhiṃ pratyaj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1192: kaṇḍūyateḥ ktini kṛte, ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, lopo v-yor vali (*6,1.66)
GS24jvkasipu:1193: iti yalope sthānivat syād asmād vacanān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1194: svara-vidhiḥ -- svara-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1196: jihīrṣakaḥ ṇvuli kṛte ato lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, liti (*6,1.193)
GS24jvkasipu:1197: pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam, iti svare kartavye na sthānivad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1198: savarṇa-vidhiḥ -- savarṇa-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1204: anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇe kartavye na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1206: anusvāra-vidhiḥ -- anusvāra-vidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1209: naś ca apadāntasya jhali (*8,3.24) iti anusvāre kartavye śnasorallopaḥ na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1210: dīrgha-vidhiḥ -- dīrgha-vidhiṃ prati ajādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1214: ity adhikṛtya tṛtīya-ikavacane caturthy-ekavacane ca allopo 'naḥ (*6,4.134)
GS24jvkasipu:1215: ity a-kāra-lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ, tasya sthānivadb-hāvād hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:1216: iti dīrghatvaṃ na syāt, na hy ayaṃ va-kāro hal-paraḥ iti, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1217: jaś-vidhiḥ -- jaś-vidhiṃ praty-aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1218: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:1220: adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi (*2,4.39) iti ghas-la-ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1225: iti gha-kārasya jaśtvaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1234: it sa-kāra-lopaḥ, jhaṣas ta-thor dho 'dhaḥ (*8,2.40) iti dhatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:1235: upadha-lopasya sthānivattvāt jhalām jaś jhaśi (*8,4.53) iti jaśtvaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1236: carvidhiḥ -- carvidhiṃ prati aj-ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1244: iti gha-kārasya cartvaṃ na syād, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1246: akṣan iti adeḥ luṅ bahuvacane ghas-la-ādeśaḥ, clerāgatasya mantre ghasa-hvara (*2,4.80) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:1248: ity upadhā-lopaḥ, tasya sthānivattvāt khari ca (*8,4.55)
GS24jvkasipu:1249: iti cartvaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1252: tena bahukhaṭvakah, kiryoḥ, giryoḥ, vāyvoḥ iti sthānivattvāt svara-dīrghaya-lopā na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:1255: dvirvacana-nimitte 'ci aj-ādeśaḥ sthānivad bhavati , dvirvacana eva kartavye /
GS24jvkasipu:1257: tena kṛte dvirvacane punar ādeśa rūpam eva avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:1262: iti ā-kāra-lope kṛte tasya sthānivad-bhāvāt eka-aco dve prathamasya (*6,1.1)
GS24jvkasipu:1267: ity aupadhā-lope kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt, asmād vacanād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1269: aṭateḥ ṇici luṅi caṅi ṇilope kṛte tasya sthānivattvād aj-āder dvitīyasya (*6,1.2)
GS24jvkasipu:1273: karoteḥ atusi usi ca yaṇ-ādeśe kṛte anackatvād dvirvacanaṃ na syāt, sthānivattvād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1276: nayateḥ lunāteś ca uttame ṇali guṇe kṛte vṛddhau ca ay-av-āy-āv-ādeśāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:1277: teṣāṃ sthānivattvān ne nai lo lau iti dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1278: dvirvacane kaṛtavya iti kim ? jagle, mamle /
GS24jvkasipu:1285: iti ī-kāra-ādeśaḥ, tasya sthānivadbhāvād ā-kārasya dvirvacanaṃ syāt, aj-grahaṇān na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1287: adarśanam, aśravaṇam, anuccāranam, anupalabdhiḥ, abhāvo, varṇavināśaḥ ity anartha-antaram /
GS24jvkasipu:1288: etaiḥ śabdairyo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate, tasya lopaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1297: lopa-pradeśāḥ-lopo vyor vali (*6,1.66) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1301: pratyaya. adarśanasya luk, ślu, lup ity etāḥ sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:1317: pratyaya-nimittaṃ kāryam asaty api pratyaye kathaṃ nu nāma syāt it sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1318: pratyaya-lope kṛte pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ pratyaya-hetukaṃ karyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1319: agnicit, somasut, adhok, ity atra sup-tiṅoḥ luptayoḥ sup-tiṅ-antaṃ padam (*1,4.14)
GS24jvkasipu:1321: adhok iti duheḥ laṅi tipi śabluki tilope ghatva-bhaṣbhāva-jaśtva-cartveṣu kṛteṣu rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:1322: pratyaya iti vartamāne punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kṛtsna-pratyaya-lope yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1327: tatra pratyaya-lakṣaṇena jhali ity anunāsikalopo na bhavati (*6,4.37) /
GS24jvkasipu:1328: pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti kim ? rāyaḥ kulaṃ raikulam /
GS24jvkasipu:1332: pūrveṇa atiprasaktaṃ pratyaya-lakṣaṇam iti viśeṣe pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1333: lumatā śabdena lupte pratyaye yad-aṅgaṃ, tasya pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1337: yañ-śapor lumatā luptayor aṅgasya vṛddhi-guṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1346: acāṃ sanniviṣṭāmāṃ, yo 'ntyo 'c tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ ṭi-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1351: ṭi-pradeśāḥ--ṭita ātmanepadānaṃ ṭere (*3,4.79) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1354: dhātv-ādau varṇa-samudāye 'ntyād alaḥ pūrvo yo varṇaḥ so 'l eva upadhā-sañjñao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1363: tasmin iti saptamy-artha-nirdeśe pūrvasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati, na-uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1371: tasmāt iti pañcamy-artha-nirdeśa uttarasya-iva kāryaṃ bhavati, na pūrvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:1373: iha na bhavati -- pacaty odanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1375: śāstre svam eva rūpaṃ śabdasya grāhyaṃ bodhyaṃ pratyāyyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1378: śabdena artha-avagater arthe kāryasya asambhavāt tad-vācinām śabdānām sampratyayo mā bhūt iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1380: agni-śabdo 'gni-śabdasya-iva grāhako bhavati, na jvalanaḥ, pāvakaḥ, dhūma-ketuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1384: takram, ariṣṭaṃ, kālaśeyaṃ, daṇḍāhataṃ, mathitam, iti na ataḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1387: , ghu-grahaṇeṣu gha-grahaneṣu ca sañjñināṃ grahanam, na sañjñāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1390: tato vaktavyam tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1397: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati, ca-kārāt svasya rūpasya tad-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1407: tato vaktavyam paryāya-vacanasya-iva grahanaṃ bhavati iti, na svarūpasya, na api tad-viśeṣāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:1416: tato vaktavyam tasya ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati tad-viśaṣāṇāṃ ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1421: paryāyāṇāṃ na bhavati--ajihmān hanti, animiṣān hanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1425: aṇ gṛhyamāṇa udic ca savarṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati, svasya ca rūpasya, pratyayaṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:1426: ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87), asya cvau (*7,4.32), yasya-īti ca (*6,4.148) /
GS24jvkasipu:1431: apratyayaḥ iti kim ? san-āśaṃsa-bhikṣa uḥ (*3,2.168), a sāmpratike (*4,3.9), dīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1433: taḥ paro yasmāt so 'yaṃ taparaḥ, tād api paraḥ taparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1435: ātmanā tulya-kālasya guṇa-antara-yuktasya savarṇasya grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1439: aṇāmanyeṣāṃ ca taparāṇām idam eva grahaṇaka-śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:1441: ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9) ity evam ādiṣu pūrva-grahaṇaka-śāstraṃ na pravartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1443: kim udāharaṇam ? ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9)-- vṛkṣaiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1449: ādir antyena it-sañjñakena saha gṛhyamāṇas tan-madyapatitānāṃ varṇānāṃ grāhako bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1457: antyena iti kim ? suṭ iti tṛtīya-ikavacanena ṭā ity anena grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:1459: yena viśeṣaṇena vidhir-vidhīyate sa tad-antasya ātmān tasya samudāyasay grāhako bhavati ,
GS24jvkasipu:1464: or āvaśyake (*3,1.125), u-varṇa-antād ṇyad bhavati-- avaśyalāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1468: iha mā bhūt -- kaṣṭaṃ paramaśrita iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1469: pratyaya-vidhau -- naḍa-ādibhyaḥ phak (*4,1.99), naḍasya apatyaṃ nāḍāyanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1470: iha mā bhūt-- sūtra-naḍasya apatyaṃ sautranāḍiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1473: ugitaś ca (*4,1.6) iti ṅīp-pratyayaḥ tad-antād api bhavati -- bhavatī, atibhavatī /
GS24jvkasipu:1477: al-grahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhistad ādau iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:1478: aci śnu-dhātu-bhruvāṃ yvor iyaṅ-uvaṅau (*6,4.77) iti-- śriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1481: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:1483: acāṃ madye yasya vṛddhi-sañjñaka ādi-bhūtaḥ, tac-chabda-rūpaṃ vṛddha-sajñjaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1489: ādiḥ iti kim ? sabhāsannayate bhavaḥ sābhāsannayanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1520: eṅ yasya acām ādiḥ tat prācāṃ deśābhidhāne vṛddha-saṃjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1526: prācām iti kim ? devadatto nāma bāhīkeṣu grāmah, tatra bhavaḥ daivadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1527: deśe iti kim ? gomatyāṃ bhavā matsyāḥ gaumatāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1528: prāg udañcau vibhajate haṃsaḥ kṣīrodake yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:1529: viduṣāṃ śabda-siddhy-arthaṃ sā naḥ pātu śarāvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:1530: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyām vṛttau prathamādhyāyasay prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1536: gāṅ iti iṅ-ādeśo rhyate, na gāṅ gatau iti, ṅa-kārasya ananya-arthatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1537: kuṭādayo 'pi kuṭa kauṭilye ityeta dārabhya yāvat kuṅ śabde iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1538: egyo gāṅ-kuṭādibhyaḥ pare añṇitaḥ pratyayā ṅito bhavanti ṅidvad bhavanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1559: ovijī bhaya-calanayoḥ, asmāt paraḥ iḍ-ādiḥ pratyayo ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1569: ūr-ṇuñ ācchādane, asmāt paraḥ iḍādiḥ pratyayo vibhāṣā ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1577: sārvadhātukaṃ yad apit tan ṅidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1592: asaṃyogāntād dhātoḥ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ apit kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1607: indhi bhavati ity etābhyāṃ paro liṭ pratyayaḥ kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1622: mṛḍa mṛda gudha kuṣa kliśa vada vasa ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā-pratyayaḥ kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1623: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhaṃ vakṣyati tasyāyaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1624: gudha-kuṣa-kliśīnāṃ tu ralo v-y-upadhād-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca (*1,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:1636: ruda vida muṣa grahi svapi praccha ity etebhyaḥ saṃśca ktvā ca kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1649: kiraś ca pañcabhyaḥ (*7,2.75) iti praccher iḍ-āgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1655: igantād dhātoḥ paro jhal-ādiḥ san kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1662: kim artham idam ucyate ? guṇo mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1665: yatha-iva tarhi dīrghatvaṃ guṇaṃ bādhate tathā ṇilopamapi badheta /
GS24jvkasipu:1666: tasmād dīrghatvasya avakāśa-dānāya kittvam idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1667: cicīṣati ity ādiṣu sāvakāśaṃ dīrghatvaṃ partvād ṇilopena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1670: ikaḥ kittvaṃ guṇo mā bhūt dīrgha-ārambhāt kṛte bhatet /
GS24jvkasipu:1671: anarthakam tu hrasva-arthaṃ dīrghāṇāṃ tu prasajyate //1//
GS24jvkasipu:1677: halantād iko jhal kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1691: sṛji-dṛśor jhaly-am-akiti (*6,1.58) ity am-āgamo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:1703: ṛ-varṇa-antād dhātoḥ parau liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeśu jhal-ādī kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1716: gamer-dhātoḥ paru liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeṣu jhal-ādī vā kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1724: hanter dhātoḥ paraḥ sic kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1730: iha tu parasmaipade hanter vadhabhāvasya nityatvāt kittvasya prayojanaṃ na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:1735: yamer dhātor gandhane vartamānāt paraḥ sic pratyayaḥ kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1750: yamer dhātoḥ upayamane vartamānāt paraḥ sic-pratyayao vibhāṣā kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1753: upayamanaṃ svīkaraṇaṃ, vivāhaḥ, dārakarma, pāṇi-grahaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1759: tiṣṭhater dhātoḥ ghu-sañjñakānāṃ ca i-kāraś ca antād eśaḥ sic ca kid bhavati ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1763: icca kasya takārettvaṃ dīrgho mā bhūd ṛte 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1764: anantare pluto mā bhūt plutaś ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1768: ktvā pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1771: seṭ iti kim ? iṛtvā ' gutvā ' ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? nigṛhītiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1783: śīṅ svidi midi kṣvidi dhṛṣ ity etebhyaḥ pro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1790: svid-ādīnam āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti niṣṭhāyāmiṭ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1791: vibhāṣā bhāva-ādikarmaṇoḥ (*7,2.17) iti pakṣe 'bhyanujñāyate sa viṣayaḥ kittva-pratiṣedhasya //
GS24jvkasipu:1795: mṛṣer dhātoḥ titikṣāyām arthe niṣṭhā seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1798: titikṣāyām iti kim ? apamṛṣitaṃ vākyam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:1802: niṣṭhā seṇ na kit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:1803: udupadhād dhātoḥ paro bhāve ādikarmaṇi ca vartamāno niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ seḍ-anyatarasyāṃ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1808: bhāva-ādikarmaṇoḥ iti kim? rucitaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:1813: gudha pariveṣṭane, gudhitam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:1820: pūḍaśca iṭ vihitaḥ kilśaḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ (*7,2.50), pūṅaś ca (*7,2.51) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1821: pūḍaḥ paro niṣṭhā-pratyayaḥ itvā ca seṇ na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1823: ktvā-pratyayasaya na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti seddha eva pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1825: tathā ca-uktaṃ nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ ktvā-niṣṭhayoḥ ktvā-grahaṇam uttara-artham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:1831: nikāra-upadhād dhātoḥ thakārāntāt phakarāntāc ca paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ va na kid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1842: vañci luñci ṛt ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā pratyayaḥ seḍ vā na kid bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:1848: sa yatra pakṣe na asti tatra-idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:1854: na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti pratiṣedhe prāpe kittvaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1855: tṛṣi mṛṣi kṛśi ity etebhyaḥ paraḥ krvā pratyayaḥ seṭ kāśyapasya ācāryasya mate vā na kiḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1864: vā iti vartate seṭ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:1867: ukāra-upadha-adikāra-upadhac ca dhāto ralantād-dhalādeḥ paraḥ saṃś ca ktvā ca seṭau va kitau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1880: ū iti trayāṇām ayaṃ mātrika-dvimātrika-trimātrikāṇāṃ praśliṣṭa-nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1882: u ū ū3 ity evaṃ kālo aj yathā-kramaṃ hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ ity evaṃ sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1890: ālūya, pralūya, hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71) iti tuṅ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1893: pratakṣya, prarakṣya, hrasvāśrayas tuṅ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1894: titaucchātram, dīrghāt (*6,1.75), padāntād vā (*6,1.76) iti vibhāṣā tuṅ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1901: paribhāṣā iyaṃ sthāni-niyama-arthā hrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ svasañjñayā śiṣyamāṇā aca eva sthāne veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1926: udātta-ādi-śabdāḥ svare varṇadharme loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhā eva /
GS24jvkasipu:1928: uccair upalabhyamāno yo 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1929: uccaiḥ iti ca śruti-prakarṣo na gṛhyate, uccair bhāṣate, ucaiḥ paṭhati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1930: kiṃ tarhi ? sthāna-kṛtam uccatvaṃ sañjñino viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:1931: tālv-ādiṣu hi bhāgavatsu sthāneṣu varṇā niṣpadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:1932: tatra yaḥ samāne sthāne ūrdhva-bhaga-niṣpanno 'c sa udātta-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:1946: yasminn uccāryamāṇe gātrāṇām anvavasargo mārdavaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:1951: anudāttapradeśāḥ- anudāttau sup-pitau (*3,1.4) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1958: sāmarthyāc ca atra loka-vedayoḥ prasiddhau guṇāv eva varṇa-dharmāv udātta-anudāttau gṛhyete, nā 'cau /
GS24jvkasipu:1959: tau samāhriyete yasminn aci tasya svaritaḥ ity eṣā saṃjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1964: svarita-pradeśāḥ-- tit svaritam (*6,1.175) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:1969: tatra na jñāyate kasminnaṃśe udāttaḥ kasminn anudāttaḥ, kiyān vā udāttaḥ kiyān vā anudāttaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:1971: tasya svaritasya ādāv ardha-hrasvam udāttam, pariśiṣṭam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:1974: sarveṣām eva hrasva-dīrgha-plutānāṃ svaritānām eṣa svara-vibhāgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1975: śikyam ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udātta, apara-ardha-mātrā anudāttā, eka-śrautir vā /
GS24jvkasipu:1976: kanyā ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udattā adhyardha-mātrā anudāttā /
GS24jvkasipu:1977: māṇavaka3 māṇavaka (*8,2.103) ity atra ardha-mātrā ādita udāttā ardha-tṛtīya-mātrā anudāttā //
GS24jvkasipu:1981: traisvarye padānāṃ prāpte dūrāt sambuddhāv-aikaśrutyaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:1982: ekā śrutir yasya tad idam ekaśruti /
GS24jvkasipu:1984: dūrāt sambodhayati yena vākyena tat sambodhanaṃ sambuddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1986: svarāṇām udāttādīnām avibhāgo bhedati rodhānam ekaśrutiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:1988: dūrāt iti kim ? āgaccha bho māṇavaka devadatta //
GS24jvkasipu:1993: teṣāṃ yajña-kriyāyām api tatha-iva prayoge prāpte eka-śrutir vidhīyate japa-nyūṅkha-sāmāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:1995: agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:1997: yajña-karmaṇi iti kim ? sampāṭhe mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:1998: ajapeṣv-iti kim ? mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu /
GS24jvkasipu:2003: asāmasu iti kim ? viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha /
GS24jvkasipu:2010: yajña-karmaṇi vaṣaṭkāraḥ uccaistarāṃ vā bhavati eka-śrutir vā /
GS24jvkasipu:2013: yady evaṃ vauṣaḍ-grahaṇam eva kasmān na kṛtam ? vaicitrya-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:2022: vā iti prakṛte vibhāṣā-grahanaṃ yajña-karmaṇi ity asya nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:2023: tena ayaṃ svādhyāya-kāle 'pi pākṣika aikaśrutya-vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2033: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.37 ||
GS24jvkasipu:2035: subrahmaṇyā nāma nigadas tatra yajña-karmaṇi iti vibhāṣā chandasi (*1,2.36)
GS24jvkasipu:2038: yas tu lakṣaṇa-prāptaḥ svaritas tasya-udātta ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2040: indrāgaccha, hariva āgaccha, medhātithermeṣa vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene /
GS24jvkasipu:2041: gaurāva-skandinnahalyāyai jāra kauśikabrāhmaṇa gautamabruvāṇa śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan /
GS24jvkasipu:2042: atra subrahmaṇyom ity okāras titsvareṇa svaritas tasya-udātto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2045: udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ prasaktas tasya anena-udāttaḥ triyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2046: tad evam indra āgaccha iti catvāra udāttāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2048: hariva āgaccha ityanayaiva prakriyayā catvāra udāttāḥ dvāv anudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:2049: medhātitheḥ iti ṣaṣṭyantaṃ parama-amantritam anupraviśati subāmantrite parāṅgavatsvare (*2,1.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2050: tataḥ sakalasyā mantritādy-udāttatve iṛte dvitīyam akṣaram anudāttaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:2057: gaurāvaskandin iti tatha-iva dve ādye akṣare udātte, śeṣam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:2058: ahalyāyai jāra iti subantasya amantrita-anupraveśāt t advadeva svaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2060: kauśikabrahmaṇa iti samastamāmantritamādy-udāttaṃ tatra pūrvavad dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:2061: evam gautama-bruvāṇa iti dvāv udāttau śeṣam anudāttām /
GS24jvkasipu:2062: śvaḥ sutyāmāgaccha maghavan iti śvaḥ-śabda udāttaḥ sutyām ity antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2064: iti kyapo vidhāne udāttaḥ iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2071: subrahmaṇyāyām eva devā brahmāṇaḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2075: dvayor api padayor āmantrita-ādy-udāttatve śeṣanighāte ca+udāttād anudāttasya svaritaḥ kṛtas tasya-anudātto bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2080: saṃhitāyaṃ viśaye svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2081: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2083: imam ity anta-udāttaṃ, me iti anudāttaṃ vidhi-kāla eva nighāta-vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2084: tat punaḥ udāttād anudātasya svaritaḥ (*8,4.66) iti svaritaṃ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2085: tasmāt svaritāt pareṣām anudāttānāṃ gaṅgeprabhṛtīnām ekaśrutir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2096: udāttaḥ paro yasmāt sa udāttaparaḥ svaritaḥ paro yasmāt sa svaritaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2097: udāttaparasya svaritaparasya ca anudāttasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2102: tatra anudāttayor ekādeśa okāro 'nudāttaḥ tasya-udātte parabhūte sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2103: imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri /
GS24jvkasipu:2105: śutudri ity etad āmantritaṃ pādādau tasmān na nihanyate, anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau (*8,1.18) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2107: tasya prathamam akṣaram udāttaṃ tasmin parabhūte pūrvasya sarasvati iti ikārasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2109: kva iti svaritas tasmin parabhūte ka iti anudattas tasya sannatara ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2113: apṛktaḥ iti iyaṃ sañjñā bhavati eka-al yaḥ pratyayas tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:2121: apṛkta-pradeśāḥ -- ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2131: akarmadhāraye rājyam (*6,2.130) ity uttarapada-ādy-udāttaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2139: prathamayā vibhāktyā yan nirdiśyate samāsa-śāstre tadupasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2154: upasarjana-pradeśāḥ - upasarjanaṃ pūrvam (*2,2.30) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2158: eka vibhāktir yasya tad idam eka-vibhākti /
GS24jvkasipu:2160: dvitīye sambandhini bahubhir-vibhaktibhir yujyamāne 'py ekayaiva vibhaktyā yujyate tad-upasarjana-sañjñaṃ bhavati apūrva-nipāte,
GS24jvkasipu:2164: pūrva-pade nānāvibhaktike 'py uttarapadaṃ pañcmyantam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2174: apūrva-nipāte iti kim ? na hi bhavati kauśāmbīniḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2184: arthavat iti kim ? vanam, dhanam iti na antasya avadher mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2191: hrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasya (*1,2.47) iti hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2195: prātipadika-pradeśāḥ -- hrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasya (*1,2.47) ity evam ādyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2199: kṛtas taddhitāḥ samāsāś ca prātipadika-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2200: apratyayaḥ iti pūrvatra paryudāsat kṛdantasya taddhitāntasya ca anena prātipadika-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2210: samāsa-grahaṇasya niyama-arthatvād vākyasya arthavataḥ sañjñā na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2214: napuṃsaka-liṅge 'rthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasya hrasvo bhavati ādeśaḥ alo 'nyasya acaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2226: go iti svarūpa-grahaṇaṃ strī iti pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ svaritatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2230: upasarjana-go-śabdāntasya upasarjana-strīpratyaya-antasya ca prātipadikasya hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2250: taddhita-luki sati strī-pratyayasya upasrjanasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2277: lupi iti lup-sanñjñayā luptasya pratyayasya artha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2279: yuktavat iti niṣṭhā-pratyayena ktavatunā prakṛtyartha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2282: atha vā yuktaḥ prakṛty-arthaḥ pratyaya-arthena sambaddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2285: vyaktivacane iti ca liṅga-saṅkhyayoḥ pūrvācarya-nirdeśaḥ, tad-īyam eva+idaṃ sūtram /
GS24jvkasipu:2286: tathā ca asya pratyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyate, tad aśiṣyaṃ sañjñā-pramāṇatvāt (*1,2.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2291: yathā teṣu kṣatriyeṣu vyaktivacane tadvajjanapade bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2300: lupi iti kim ? luki mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2305: vyaktivacane iti kim ? śirīṣāṇām adūrabhavo grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ, tasya vanaṃ śirīṣavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:2310: khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikaṃ vanāni //
GS24jvkasipu:2315: lub-arthasya yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api ca yuktavad vyakti-vacane bhavataḥ jātiṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:2321: tena jāt-idvāreṇa yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣām api yuktavadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2334: pañcālāḥ, varaṇā iti ca, na+ete yoga-śabdāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2336: tatra liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca svabhāva-saṃsiddham eva na yatna-pratipādyam,
GS24jvkasipu:2345: yo 'yaṃ janapade lup (*4,2.81), varaṇā-ādibhyaś ca (*4,2.82) iti lub ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2349: na hi pañcāla varaṇāḥ iti yogaḥ sambadhaḥ prakhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2354: iti taddhito na+eva+utpadyate, kiṃ lupo vidhānena //
GS24jvkasipu:2358: pañcāla-ādayaḥ sañjñā-śabdāḥ, na yoga-nimittāḥ ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:2361: yadi pañcālādi-śabdo yogasya pramāṇaṃ yogasya vācakaḥ syāt tatas tadabhāve 'darśanam aprayogaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2362: dṛśyate ca samprati vanaiva kṣatriya-sambandhena janapadeṣu pañcālādi-śabdāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2364: kiṃ tarhi ? rūḍhirūpeṇaiva tatra pravṛttaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2370: tābhyām artha-vacanam artha-abhidhānam anena prakāreṇa bhavati iti pūrva-ācāryaiḥ paribhāṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:2371: pradhāna-upasarjane ca pradhāna-arthaṃ saha brūtaḥ, prakrti-pratyayau sahārthaṃ brūtaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2372: tat pāṇinir ācaryaḥ pratyācaṣṭe, aśiṣyam etat arthasya anyapramāṇatvāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2374: śabdair artha-abhidhānam svābhāvikaṃ na pāribhaṣākam aśakyatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:2376: yair api vyākaraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ te 'pi rāja-puruṣam ānaya ity ukte rājaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣam ānayanti na rājanam na api puruṣa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:2377: aupagavam ānaya ity ukte upaguviśiṣṭam apatyam ānayanti, na+upaguṃ na apy apatya-mātraṃ, na+ubhau /
GS24jvkasipu:2378: yaś ca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena //
GS24jvkasipu:2388: iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ kāla-upasarjanayoḥ paribhāṣāṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2389: ānyāyyād utthānād ānyāyyāc ca saṃveśanāt, eṣo 'dyatanaḥ kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2394: yairapi vyākaraṇam na śrutaṃ te 'py āhur idam asmābhir adya kartavyam idaṃ śvaḥ kartavyam idam hayaḥ kṛtam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2396: tathā-upasarjanam, vayamatra gṛhe grāme vā upasarjanam apradhānam iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2397: yśca lokato 'rthaḥ siddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
GS24jvkasipu:2398: yady evaṃ pūrvasūtra eva kāla-upasarjana-grahaṇam kasmān na kriyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:2401: tathā ca pūrvācāryāḥ paribhaṣante matvarthe bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:2404: ubhayapadārtha-pradhāno dvandvaḥ ity evam ādi, tad-aśiṣyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2411: tad-abhidhāne ekavacanam eva prāptam ata idam udyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2413: jāty-ākhyāyām ekasminn arthe vahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2415: tena tadviśeṣaṇānām ajāti-śabdānām api sampannādīnāṃ bahuvacanam upapadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2418: pūrvavayā brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ, pūrvavayaso brāhmaṇāḥ pratyuttheyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2422: bhavatyayaṃ jāti-śabdo na tvanena jātir ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2430: asmado yo 'rthas tasya+ekatve dvitve ca bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2438: tvaṃ me guruḥ, yūyaṃ me guravaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2443: phalgunyor dvayoḥ proṣṭhapadayoś ca dvayor nakṣatrayor bahuvacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2444: kadā pūrve phalgunyau, kadā pūrvāḥ phalgunyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2445: kadā pūrve proṣṭhapade, kadā pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2451: dvayor dvivacane prāpte punarvasvoś chandasi viṣaye ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2462: dvivacane prāpte chandasi viṣaye viśākhayor ekavacanam anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2466: tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam || PS_1,2.63 ||
GS24jvkasipu:2469: niṣyaḥ ekaḥ, punarvasū dvau, teṣaṃ dvandvo bahv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2471: niṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatra-viṣaye dvandve bahuvacana-prasaṅgo nityaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2474: nakṣatre iti kim ? tiṣyaś ca māṇavakaḥ, punarvasū māṇavakau, tiṣya-punarvasavo māṇavakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2475: nanu ca prakṛtam eva nakṣatra-grahaṇaṃ kim-arthaṃ punar ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2480: dvandve iti kim ? yastiṣyastau punarvasū yeṣāṃ te ime tiṣya-punarvasavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2481: unmugdhāḥ tiṣyādaya eva viparyayeṇa dṛśyamānā bahuvrīhiṇocyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2483: bahuvacanasya iti kim ? ekavacanasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2485: sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati ity asya+etada eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:2491: sarūpāṇāṃ śabdānaṃ ekavibhaktau parata ekaśeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2494: vṛkṣaś ca vṛkṣaś ca Vrkṣaś ca vṛkṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2502: ekagrahaṇaṃ kim ? dvibahvoḥ śeṣo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2504: ekavibhaktau iti kim ? payaḥ payo jarayati /
GS24jvkasipu:2505: brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇābhyāṃ ca dehi //
GS24jvkasipu:2507: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ || PS_1,2.65 ||
GS24jvkasipu:2511: vṛddho yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate yuvā nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2512: vṛddha-śabdaḥ pūrvācārya-sañjñā gotrasya apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2513: vṛddha-yūnoḥ sahavacane vṛddhaḥ śiṣyate tal-lakṣaṇaś ced eva viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2519: vṛddha-yuva-nimittakam eva yadi vairūpayam bhavati tato vṛddhiḥ śiṣyate, yuvā nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2524: vṛddhaḥ iti kim ? gargaś ca gārgyāyaṇaś ca gargagārgāyaṇau /
GS24jvkasipu:2525: yū nā iti kim ? gārgyaś ca gargaś ca gārgya-gargau /
GS24jvkasipu:2529: kutsā sauvīratvaṃ ca bhāgavittikasya aparo viśeṣo vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2534: vṛddho yūnā iti ca sarvam strī vṛddhā yūnā sahavacane śiṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:2546: striyā sahavacane pumān śiṣyate strī nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:2552: pumān iti kim ? prāk ca prāci ca prākprācyau /
GS24jvkasipu:2557: yathā saṅkhyaṃ bhrātṛ-putra-śabdau śiṣyete sahavacane svasṛ-duhitṛbhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2567: ekavac ca asya kāryaṃ bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:2568: śuklaś ca kambalaḥ, śuklā ca bṛhatikā, śuklam ca vastraṃ, tadidaṃ śuklam /
GS24jvkasipu:2570: anapuṃsakena iti kim ? śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca śuklaṃ ca suklāni /
GS24jvkasipu:2575: anyatarasyām iti vartate, na ekavat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2577: mātā ca pitā ca pitarau, matā-pitarau iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2584: śvaśuraś ca śvaśrūś ca śvaśurau, śvasrū-śvaśurau iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2588: tayd-ādīni śabda-rūpāṇi sarvaiḥ sahavacane nityaṃ śiṣyante tyad-ādibhir anyaiś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2593: tyad-ādīnāṃ mitho yadyat paraṃ tattac chisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2601: pumān striyā (*1,2.67) iti puṃsaḥ śeṣe prāpte strī-śeṣo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2609: saṅgheṣu iti kim ? etau gavau carataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2615: iti srījayādityaviracitāyaṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2620: bhū ity evam ādayaḥ śabdāḥ kriyāvacanā dhātusañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2626: tad iha api pūrvācarya-sañjñāśrayaṇāt kriyāvācinām eva bhūvādīnāṃ dhātusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2628: bhūvo vārthaṃ vadanti iti bhv-arthā vā vādayaḥ smaṛtāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2633: upadiśyate 'nena ity upadeśaḥ śāstravākyāni, sūtrapāṭhaḥ, khilapāṭhaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:2634: tatra yo 'c anunāsikaḥ sa itsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2638: upadeśe iti kim ? abhra āṃ apaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2639: ac iti kim ? ato manin-kvanib-vanipaś ca (*3,2.74) /
GS24jvkasipu:2640: anunāsikaḥ iti kim ? sarvasya aco mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:2641: it-pradeśāḥ - ād-itaś ca (*7,2.16) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2647: dhātvādeḥ samudāyasya yad-antyam hal, tad itsañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2655: hasya l hal iti dvitīyam atra hal-grahaṇaṃ tantreṇa+upāttaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:2656: tena pratyāhāra-pāṭhe hal ity atra lakārasya itsañjñā kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2657: tathā ca sati halantyam ity atra pratyāhāre na+itaretarāśraya-doṣo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2661: pūrveṇa prāptāyamitsañjñāyāṃ vibhāktau vartamānānāṃ tavarga-sakāra-makaraṇāṃ pratiṣedha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2668: bibhaktau iti kim ? aco yat (*3,1.97), ūrṇāyā yus (*5,2.123), rudhādibhyaḥ śnam (*3,1.78) /
GS24jvkasipu:2671: ity atra pratiṣedho na bhvati , anityatva-ādasya pratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:2672: idamas thamuḥ (*5,3.24) ity ukāra-anubandha-nirdeśād anityatvam upalakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2678: ñi-ṭu-ḍu ity eteṣāṃ samudayānām ādito vartamānānām ity sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2696: pratyayasya iti kim ? ṣoḍaḥ, ṣaṇḍaḥ, ṣaḍikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2697: ādiḥ ity eva - avimahyoṣṭiṣac - aviṣaḥ, mahiṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2714: avāt kuṭārac ca (*5,2.30), nate nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ ṭiṭañ-nāṭj-bhraṭacaḥ (*5,2.31) - avaṭītaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2720: taddhita-varjitasya pratyayasy ādito vartamānā lakāra-śakāra-kavargā itsañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:2725: glā-ji-sthaś ca gsnuḥ (*3,2.139) - glāsnuḥ, jiṣṇuḥ, bhūṣṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2736: tasya grahaṇaṃ sarvalopa-artham, alo 'ntyasay (*1,1.52) mā bhūt ādir ñiṭuḍavaḥ (*1,3.5) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2744: samānāṃ samasaṅkhyānaṃ samaparipahitānām uddeśinām anudeśināṃ ca yathā-kramamauddeśibhir anudeśinaḥ sambadhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2746: prathamāt prathamaḥ, dvitīyād dvitīyaḥ ity ādi /
GS24jvkasipu:2751: samānām iti kim ? lakṣaṇa-ittham-bhūta-ākhyāna-bhāga. vīpsāsu prati-pary-anavaḥ (*1,4.90) /
GS24jvkasipu:2752: lakṣaṇādayaś catvāro 'rthāḥ, pratyādayas trayaḥ, sarveṣaṃ sarvatra karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2753: iha kasmān na bhavati veśo-yaśa-āder bhagād yal (*4,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:2756: yatra eṣyate, tatra svaritatvaṃ na pratijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2757: svaritena adhikāraḥ (*1,3.11) iti svarita-grhaṇaṃ pūrveṇa api sambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:2777: aviśeṣeṇa dhātor ātmanepadaṃ parsmaipadaṃ ca vidhāsyate, tatra ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2778: anudātta-ito ye dhatavo ṅitaś ca, tebhya eva ātmanepadaṃ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2786: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ (*3,4.69)
GS24jvkasipu:2787: iti bhāva-karmaṇor vihitasya lasya tib-ādayaḥ sāmānyena vakṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:2788: tatra-idam ucyate, bhāve karmaṇi ca ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2789: bhāve - glāyte bhavatā, supyate bhavatā, āsyate bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:2791: karmakartari, lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva iti, parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2793: tena kartiva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:2799: yatra-anya-sambandhinīṃ kriyāmanyaḥ karoti, itara-sambandhinīṃ cetaraḥ, sa karma-vyatihāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2804: kartṛ-grahaṇam uttara-arthaṃ śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2809: gaty-arthebhyo hiṃsā-arthebhyaś ca dhātughyaḥ karma-vyatihare ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2823: itaretaraḥ, anyonyaḥ ity evam upapadād dhātoḥ karma-vyatihāre ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2832: śaṣāt kartari parsmaipadam (*1,3.78) iti prasmaipade prāpte ni-pūrvād viśa ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:2837: ya-dāgamās tad-grahaṇena gṛhyante tena aṭā na asti vyavadhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:2839: ner upasargasya grahaṇam, arthavad-grahane na anarthakasya grahaṇam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2840: tasmād iha na bhavati, madhuni viśānti bhramarāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:2851: paryādaya upasargā gṛhyante tena+iha na bhavati, vahuvi krīṇāti vanam //
GS24jvkasipu:2855: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam (*1,3.78) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2856: viparā pūrvāj jayater dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2860: tena+iha na bhavati, bahuvi jayati vanam, parā jayati senā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:2865: āṅ-pūrvād dadāter anāsya-viharaṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2872: iha mā bhūt, vyādadate pipīlikāḥ pataṅgasya mukham //
GS24jvkasipu:2877: krīḍṛ vihāre, etasmād anu sam pari ity evaṃ pūrvād āṅ-pūrvāc ca-ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2917: sam ava pra vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2932: prakāśane stheya-ākhyāyāṃ ca tiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2942: utpūrvāt tiṣṭhater anūrdhva-karmaṇi vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2949: iha mā bhūt, asmād grāmāt śatam uttiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:2951: īhagrahaṇam anūrdhva-karmaṇa eva viśeṣanaṃ, na apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2956: upapūrvāt tiṣthater mantrakaraṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2959: mantrakaraṇe iti kim ? bhartāram upatiṣṭhati yauvanena /
GS24jvkasipu:2966: mitrakaraṇaṃ tu vināpy upaśleṣeṇa maitrīsam Bandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:2970: bhikṣuko brāhmaṇa-kulam upatiṣthate, upatiṣṭhati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:2975: upapūrvāt tiṣṭhater akarmakāt akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2985: ut vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt tapater akarmaka-triyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:2995: svāṅgaṃ ca+iha na pāribhāṣikaṃ gṛhyate adravaṃ mūrtimat svāṅgam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:2997: tena+iha na bhavati, devadatto yajñadattasya pṛṣṭham uttapati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3003: yama uparame, hana hiṃsāgatyoḥ iti parasmaipadinau /
GS24jvkasipu:3006: hanaḥ khalv api -- āhate, āghnāte, āghnate /
GS24jvkasipu:3015: tena+iha na bhavati , āhanti śiraḥ parakīyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3021: iti prāpte sampūrvebhyo gami ṛcchi pracchi svarati arti śru vidi ity etebhyo 'karmakebhyo dhātubhya ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3031: bahulaṃ chandasy amāṅyoge 'pi (*6,4.75) ity āṭ pratiṣadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3036: arty-ādeśasya tv arti ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3037: artirubhayatra paṭhyate, ṛ gati-prāpaṇayoḥ iti bhvādau, ṛ sṛ gatau iti juhoty-ādau /
GS24jvkasipu:3051: ni sam upa vi ity evaṃ pūrvāt hvayater dhātor ātnamepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3064: spardhāyāṃ viṣaye āṅ-pūrvād hvayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3065: spardhā saṅgharṣaḥ, parābhibhavechā, sa viṣayo dhātv-arthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:3070: spardhāyām iti kim ? gām āhvayati gopālaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3076: gandhana-ādiṣv artheṣu vartamānat karoter ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3078: tathā hi, basta gandha ardane, arda hiṃsāyām iti cur-ādau pathyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3097: tasya sato guṇantarādhānaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3110: adhipūrvāt karoteḥ prasahane vartamānāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3113: tam abhivabhūva, na tena prājitaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3120: vipūrvat karoter akartrabhiprāye kriyāphale śabdakarmaṇa ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3129: vipūrvāt karoter akarmakād akarmaka-kriyāvacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3131: sādhu dāntāḥ śobhanaṃ valganti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3140: ṇīñ prāpṇe ity etasmāt dhātor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati sammānana-ādiṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu /
GS24jvkasipu:3143: sa lokāyate śāstre pada-arthān nayate, upapattibhiḥ sthirīkṛtya śiṣyebhyaḥ prāpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3144: te yuktibhiḥ sthāpyamānāḥ sammānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:3147: ācārya-karaṇam ācāryakriyā -- māṇavakam īdṛśena vidhinā ātma-samīpaṃ prāpyati yathā sa upanetā svayam ācāryaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3149: ātmānam ācāryīkurvan māṇavakam ātma-samīpaṃ prāpayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3154: vigaṇanam ṛṇāder niryātanam -- madrāḥ karam vinayante /
GS24jvkasipu:3160: eteṣu iti kim ? ajāṃ nayati grāmam //
GS24jvkasipu:3166: kartṛsthe karmaṇy aśarīre sati nayater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3170: kartṛsthe iti kim ? devadatto yajñadattasya krodhaṃ vinayatei /
GS24jvkasipu:3178: śeṣat kartari parasmaipade prāpte vṛtty-ādiśv artheśu karmer dhator ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3194: upaparāpūrvāt kramater vṛtty-ādiśv artheṣu vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3196: sopasargād upa-parā-pūrvād eva, na anya-pūrvāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3206: āṅ-pūrvāt kramater udgamane vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3210: udganame iti kim ? ākrāmati māṇavakaḥ kutupam /
GS24jvkasipu:3212: iha mā bhūt, ākramati dhūmo harmyatalāt //
GS24jvkasipu:3216: vi-pūrvāt kramateḥ pada-viharaṇe 'rthe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3221: yady api kramiḥ pāda-viharaṇa eva paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3229: pra up ity etābhyāṃ parasmāt kramater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3230: tau cet propau samarthau tulya-arthau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3239: ity anena ātmanepadam atra karmān na bhāti ? vṛttyādi-grahaṇam tatra anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3253: śeṣāt kartari prasmaipade prāpte jānater apahnavi vartamanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3255: sopasargaś ca ayam-apahnave vartate, na kevalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3259: apahnave iti kim ? na tvaṃ kiñcad api jānāsi //
GS24jvkasipu:3264: kartr-abhiprāye hi anupasargāj jñaḥ (*1,3.76) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:3268: kathaṃ ca ayam akarmakaḥ ? na atra sarpir-ādi jñeyatvena vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3270: tathā ca jño 'vid-arthasya karaṇe (*2,3.51) iti ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate -- sarpiṣo jānīte, madhuno jānīte /
GS24jvkasipu:3272: akarmakāt iti kim ? svareṇa putraṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:3278: sam prati ity evaṃ pūrvāj jānāter anādhyāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3290: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte bhāsana-ādiśu viśeṣaṇeṣu satsu vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3292: bhāsamāno dīpyamānas tatra padārthān vyaktīkaroti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3307: eteṣu iti kim ? yat kiñcid vadati //
GS24jvkasipu:3314: nanu vada vyaktāyāṃ vāci ity eva paṭhyate, tatra kiṃ vyaktavācām iti viśeṣaṇena ?
GS24jvkasipu:3326: vadaḥ iti, vyaktavācām iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3327: anupūrvād vadater akarmakād vyaktavāgviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3331: yathā kalāpo 'dhīyāno vadati tathā kaṭhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3332: akarmakāt iti kim ? pūrvam eva yajuruditam anuvadati /
GS24jvkasipu:3338: vadaḥ iti vartate, vyaktavācāṃ samuccāraṇe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3339: vipralāpātmake vyaktavācāṃ samuccārane vartamānād vadater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3343: yugapat paraspara-pratiṣedhena viruddhaṃ vadanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3353: gṝ nigaraṇe iti tudādau paṭhyate, tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:3354: na tu gṝ śabde iti kryādipaṭhitasya /
GS24jvkasipu:3355: tasya hy avapūrvasya prayoga eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3356: śeṣāt kartari parsmaipade prāpte avapūrvād girater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3363: saṃpūrvāt girateḥ pratijñāne vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3371: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte utpūrvāc carateḥ sakarmaka-kriyāavacanād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3381: tṛtīyā iti tṛtīyā-vibhaktir gṛhyate, tayā carater arthadvārako yogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3383: tṛtīyā-yuktāt iti kim ? ubhau lokau sañcarasi imaṃ ca amuṃ ca devala /
GS24jvkasipu:3385: yady apy atra tad-artha-yogaḥ sambhavati, tṛtīyā tu na śrūyate, iti pratyudāharaṇaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3387: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe || PS_1,3.55 ||
GS24jvkasipu:3390: tataḥ sampūrvāt tṛtīyā-yuktāt ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, sā cet tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3392: vaktavyam eva+etat -- aśiṣṭavyavahāre tṛtīyā caturthy-arthe bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3395: kāmukaḥ san dāsyai dadāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3397: samaḥ praśabdena vyavadhāne katham ātmanepadaṃ bhavati ? samaḥ iti viśeṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhī, na pañcamī //
GS24jvkasipu:3402: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prāpte upapūrvāt yamaḥ svakaraṇe vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3403: pāṇi-grahaṇa-viśiṣṭam iha svakaranam gṛhyate, na svakaraṇa-mātram /
GS24jvkasipu:3405: svakaraṇe iti kim ? devadatto yajñadattasya bhāryām upayacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:3409: jñā śru samṛ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ sannantānām ātmanepdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3411: iti tribhiḥ sūtrair ātmanepadaṃ vihitam, śru-dṛśor api samo gamyṛcchi (*1,3.29) ity atra vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3412: tasmin viṣaye pūrvavat sanaḥ (*1,3.62) ity eva siddham ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3419: sanaḥ iti kim ? jānāti, śṛṇoti, smarati, paṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:3424: anupūrvāj jānāteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3425: tathā ca sati sakarmakasya+eva ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3431: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvāc-chṛṇoteḥ sannantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3434: upasarga-grahaṇaṃ cedaṃ, tasmād iha pratiṣedho na bhavati , devadattaṃ prati śuśrūṣate //
GS24jvkasipu:3438: śadlṛ śātane parasmaipadī, tasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3439: śadiryaḥ śit, śidbhāvī, śito vā sambandhī tasmād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3451: mriyater luṅ-liṅoḥ śitaś ca-ātmanepadaṃ bhavati, anyatra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3454: śitaḥ khalv api - mriyate, mriyete, mriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3460: sanaḥ pūrvo yo dhātuḥ ātmanepadī, tadvat sannantād ātmanepadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3461: yena nimittena pūrvasmād ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate tena+eva sannantādapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3463: sannantād api tad eva nimittam - āsisiṣate, śiśayiṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:3468: kiṃ tarhi ? śidādy api, tac ca+iha na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:3469: yasya ca pūrvatra+eva nimitta-bhāvaḥ pratiśidhyate, tat sannanteśv apy animittam -- anucikīrṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:3471: iha jugupsate, mīmāṃsate iti ? anudātta-ṅita ity eva siddham ātmanepdam /
GS24jvkasipu:3472: avayave kṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ samudāyasya viśeṣakaṃ bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:3483: udumbhāñcakāra iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale atmanepadaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:3485: ubhayam anena kriyate, vidhiḥ niyamaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3490: kathaṃ punar asya anuprayogaḥ yāvatā kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liti (*3,1.40)
GS24jvkasipu:3491: ity ucyate ? kṛñ iti pratyāhāra-grahaṇaṃ tatra vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3492: kva saṃniviṣṭānāṃ pratyāhāraḥ ? abhūtatadbhāve kṛ-bhv-astiyoge sampadyakartari cviḥ (*5,4.50)
GS24jvkasipu:3493: iti kṛ-śabdād ārabhya yāvat kṛño dvitīya-tṛtīya-śamba-bījāt kṛṣau (*5,4.58) iti ñakaram //
GS24jvkasipu:3498: tasya kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3500: pra upa ity evaṃ pūrvāt yujer ayajña-pātra-prayogaviṣayād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3503: ayajñapātreṣu iti kim ? dvandvaṃ nyañca pātrāṇi prayunakti {devasaṃyuktāni} /
GS24jvkasipu:3514: samo gamy-ṛcchi (*1,3.29) ity atra+eva kasmān na paṭhitaḥ ? akarmakāt iti tatra vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:3523: anavane iti kim ? bhunakty enam agnir āhitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3524: anavana iti pratiṣedhena raudhādikasya-eva grahanaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3525: na taudādikasya bhujo kauṭilye ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:3528: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne || PS_1,3.67 ||
GS24jvkasipu:3530: ṇicś ca (*1,3.74) iti kartr-abhiprāye kriyā-phale siddham eva ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3533: katham ? aṇau yat karma ṇau cet tad eva karma, sa eva kartā bhavati, anādhyāne ādhyānaṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:3534: ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, arohayate hastī svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3535: upasiñcanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, upasecayate hastī svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3536: paśyanti bhṛtyā rājānam, darśayate rājā svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3537: ṇeḥ iti kim ? ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, ārohayamāṇo hastī sādhvārohati /
GS24jvkasipu:3538: aṇau iti kim ? ganayati ganaṃ gopālakaḥ, ganayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3539: karma-grahaṇaṃ kim ? lunāti dātrena, lāvyati dātram svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3540: ṇau ced-grahanaṃ samāna-kriya-artham -- ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3543: ārohanti hastinaṃ hastipakāḥ, ārohayamāṇo hastī sthalamārohayati manuṣyān /
GS24jvkasipu:3544: kartā iti kim ? ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ, tānarohayati mahāmātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3545: anādhyāne iti kim ? smarati vaṅgulmasya kokilaḥ, samarayatyenaṃ vaṅgulmaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:3548: kim artham idam ucyate ? karmasthabhāvakānāṃ karmasthakriyāṇāṃ ca karmavadatideśo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3550: tathā ca ruhiḥ kartṛstha-kriyaḥ, dṛśiḥ kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ udāhṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3557: vibheteḥ smayateś ca ṇy-antād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati hetubhaye /
GS24jvkasipu:3558: hetuḥ prayojakaḥ kartā lakāra-vācyaḥ, tataś ced bhayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3559: bhaya-grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa-artham, vismayo 'pi tata eva ? jaṭilo bhīṣayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3565: atra kuñcikā bhayasya karaṇam, na hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3572: vañcu gatau ity etayor ṇy-anatayoḥ pralambhane vartamānāyor ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3577: gardhanam asya-utpādayati ity arthaḥ ahiṃ vañcayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3584: līṅ śleṣaṇe iti divādau paṭhyate lī śleṣaṇe iti ca kryādau /
GS24jvkasipu:3586: liyo ṇy-antāt saṃmānane śālīnīkaraṇe ca vartamānād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3594: vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti vā ātvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3603: ṇyantāt karoter mithyopapadād ātmanepadaṃ bhavati abhyāse /
GS24jvkasipu:3606: sāpacāraṃ svarādiduṣṭam asakṛd uccārayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3607: mithyopapadat iti kim ? padaṃ suṣṭhu kārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3608: kṛñaḥ iti kim ? padaṃ mithyā vācayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3609: abhyāse iti kim ? padaṃ mithyā kārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:3616: śeṣāt kartari parasmaipade prapte svariteto ye dhātavo ñitaś ca tebhyaḥ ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3619: yad-artham asau kriyā ārabhyate tac cet kartur lakāra-vācyasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3628: yady api dakṣiṇā bhṛtiś ca kartuḥ phalmihāsti tathā api na tad-arthaḥ kriyārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3633: apapūrvad vadateḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3644: kartr-abhiprāye ity eva, kaṭaṃ kārayati parasya //
GS24jvkasipu:3649: sam ud āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvād yameḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3654: āṅ-pūrvād akarmakāt āṅo yamahanaḥ (*1,3.28) iti siddham eva-ātmanepadam /
GS24jvkasipu:3656: agranthe iti kim ? udhyacchati cikitsāṃ vaidyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3664: anupasargāj jānāteḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3667: anupasargāt iti kim ? svargaṃ lokaṃ na prajānāti mūḍhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3668: kartr-abhiprāye ity eva, devadattasya gaṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:3674: iti pañcabhiḥ sutrair ātmanepadaṃ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale dyotite vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3675: tad-upapadena dyotite na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3677: tena pratīyamāne kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale vibhāśā ātmanepadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3678: svaṃ jajñaṃ yajate, savaṃ yajñaṃ yajati /
GS24jvkasipu:3679: savaṃ kaṭhaṃ kurute, svaṃ kathaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:3680: svaṃ putram apavadate, svaṃ putram apavadati /
GS24jvkasipu:3685: pūrveṇa prakaraṇena ātmanepada-niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ, na prasmaipada-niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3686: tat sarvataḥ prāpnoti, tad-artham idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3687: yebhyo dhātubhyo yena viśeṣaṇena ātmanepadam uktaṃ tato yad-anyat sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3699: karmakartari kasmāt parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati, pacyate odanaḥ svayam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:3702: tena kartā-eva yaḥ kartā tatra prasmaipadam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:3707: kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale gandhanādiṣu ca karoter ātmanepadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3709: anu parā ity evaṃ pūrvāt karoteḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3716: tataḥ kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3717: abhi prati ati ity evaṃ pūrvāt kṣipaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3722: dvitīyam api kartṛ-grahaṇam anuvartate, tena+iha na bhavati, abhikṣipyate svayam eva //
GS24jvkasipu:3728: tatra kartr-abhiprāya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3736: tataḥ tathā+eva ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3740: vahatim api kecid atra anuvartayanti - parivahati //
GS24jvkasipu:3746: viāṅ pari ity evaṃ pūrvāt ramateḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3761: akarmakād vibhāṣāṃ vakṣyati, sā upapūrvād eva yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:3766: pūrveṇa nitye parasmaipade prāpte vikalpa ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3767: upapūrvad ramater akarmakād vibhāṣā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3768: yāvad bhuktam auparamati, yāvad bhuktam uparamate /
GS24jvkasipu:3774: iti kartr-abhiprāya-triyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepade prāpte parasmaipadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3775: budha yudha naśa jana iṅ pru dru sru ity etebhyo ṇyantemyaḥ parasmaipadam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3786: ity evaṃ siddhe vacanam idam acittavat-kartṛka-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:3791: ye 'tra calana-artha api teṣām nigaraṇa-calana-arthebhyaś ca (*1,3.87)
GS24jvkasipu:3792: iti siddhe yadā na calana-arthās tad-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:3808: nigaraṇa-arthebhyaś calana-arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3815: ayam api yogaḥ sakarmaka-arthaḥ, acittavat-kartṛkārthaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3823: aṇyanto yo dhatur akarmakaś cittavat-kartṛkaś ca tasmād ṇyantāt parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3826: aṇau iti kim ? cetayamānaṃ prayojayati cetayate, iti kecit pratyudāharanti tad-yuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:3829: tasmād iha cetayati iti parasmaipadena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3830: idaṃ tu pratyudaharaṇam -- ārohayamāṇaṃ prayuḍkte ārohayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3831: akarmakāt iti kim ? kaṭhaṃ kurvāṇaṃ prayuṅkte kārayate /
GS24jvkasipu:3832: citavatkartṛkāt iti kim ? śuṣyanti vrīhayaḥ, śoṣayate vrīhīnātapaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3836: pūrveṇa yogadvayena kartrabhipraya-kriyāphala-vivakṣāyām ātmanepada-apavādaḥ parasmaipadaṃ vihitam /
GS24jvkasipu:3838: yat kartrabhiprāya-viṣayam ātmanepadaṃ tad-avasthitam eva, na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3839: pā dami aṅyama āṅyasa parimuha ruci nṛti vada vasa ity etebhyo ṇy-antebhyaḥ parasmaipadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3865: atha atra prasmaipadena mukte katham ātmanepadaṃ labhyate, yāvatā anudāttaṅita ātmanepadam (*1,3.12)
GS24jvkasipu:3866: ity evam ādinā prakarṇena tan niyatam ?
GS24jvkasipu:3867: evaṃ tarhi ātmanepadam eva atra vikalpitaṃ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:3868: tac ca anantaraṃ parasmaipada-pratiṣedhena sanidhāpitam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3869: tena mukte, śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3875: tats-āhacaryād luṭhādayo 'pi kṛpū paryantās tathā+eva vyapadiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:3877: anudāttettvān nityam eva ātmanepade prāpte dyutādibhyo luṅi vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3889: etebhyo dhatubhyaḥ sye sani ca parato vā parasmaipadaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3907: vṛtāditvād eva syasanor vikalpaḥ siddho luṭi vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3908: cakāras tarhi syasanor anukarṣaṇa-artho na vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3909: evaṃ tarhi iyaṃ prāptiḥ pūrvāṃ prāptiṃ bādheta,
GS24jvkasipu:3911: luṭi ca syasanoś ca klṛpeḥ parasmaipadaṃ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3920: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:3926: ā etasmāt sūtrāvadheryadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra ekā sañjñā bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:3927: kā punar asau ? yā parā anavakāśā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3928: anyatra sañjāsamāveśān niyama-arthaṃ vacanam ekaiva sañjñā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:3929: vakṣyati - hrasvaṃ laghu (*1,4.10), bhidi, chidi - bhettā, chettā /
GS24jvkasipu:3930: saṃyoge guru (*1,4.11), śikṣi, bhikṣi - śikṣā, bhikṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:3931: saṃyoga-parasya hrasvasya laghusañjñā prāpnoti, gurusañjñā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:3932: ekā sañjñā iti vacanād gurusañjñā eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3933: atatakṣat, ararakṣat, sanvallaghuni caṅpare 'naglope (*7,4.93) ity eṣa vidhir na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:3938: yatra dvau prasaṅgāv anyārthav ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ, sa tulyabala-virodho vipratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3940: utsarga-apavāda-nitya-anitya-antaraṅga-vahiraṅgeṣu tulyabalatā na asti iti na ayam asya yogasya viṣayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3942: apravṛttau, paryāyeṇa vā pravṛttau prāptāyāṃ vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:3943: ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101), supi ca (*7,3.102) ity asya avakāśaḥ - vṛkṣābhyām, plakṣābhyām /
GS24jvkasipu:3944: vahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103) ity asya avakāśaḥ - vṛkṣeṣu, plakṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:3955: īkāra-antam ūkara-antaṃ ca stryākhyaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ nadīsañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:3968: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ kim ? śabda-arthe strītva eva yathā syāt, padāntarākhye mā bhūt, grāmanye striyai /
GS24jvkasipu:3977: iyaṅ-uvaṅoḥ iti iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau, tau yū nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ, strī-śabdam varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:3984: pūrveṇa nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte āmi vikalpaḥ kriyte /
GS24jvkasipu:3985: iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau yū āmi parato vā nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:3992: dīrghasya nadīsañjñā vihitā, hrasvasya na prāpnoti, iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānayoś ca pratiṣiddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:3994: ṅiti parato hrasvaś ca yvoḥ sambandhī yaḥ stryākhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:3995: stryākhyau iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānau ca yū vā nadī sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4010: hrasvam ivarṇa-uvarṇa-antaṃ yan na stryākhyam, stryākhyaṃ ca yan na nadīsañjñakaṃ, sa śeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4019: ghi-pradeśāḥ -- dvandve ghi (*2,2.32) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4023: pati-śabdasya ghisañjñāyāṃ siddhāyām ayaṃ niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4037: pūrveṇa niyamena asamāse na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4038: ṣaṣṭhyantena yuktaḥ pati-śabdaḥ chandasi vaṣaye vā ghisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4039: kuluñcānāṃ pataye namaḥ, kuluñcānāṃ patye namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4045: mātrikasya hrasvasañjñā kṛtā tasya anena laghusañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4051: laghu-pradeśāḥ - puganta-laghu-upadhasya ca ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4057: saṃyoge prato hrasvam akṣaraṃ gurusañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4061: guru-pradeśāḥ - guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4073: yasmāt pratyayo vidhīyate dhātor vā prātipadikād vā tad-ādi śabda-rūpaṃ pratyaye parato 'ṅgasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4080: yasmāt iti sañjñi-nirdeśa-artham, tad-ādi iti sambandhāt /
