GS24jvkasipu:4083: ner biśaḥ (*1,3.17) ity upasargād vidhir asti, tad-āder aṅgasañjñā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4084: vidhi-grahaṇaṃ kim ? pratyaya-paratvam ātre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:4091: punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim artham ? lupta-pratyaye mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:4099: subantaṃ tiṅantaṃ ca śabda-rūpaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4101: padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñā-vidhau pratyaya-grahaṇe tad-anta-vidheḥ pratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:4103: pada-pradeśāḥ - padasya (*8,1.13), padāt (*8,1.17) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4107: kye iti kyac - kyaṅ - kyaśāṃ sāmānya-grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4108: na-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ kye parataḥ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4113: na-antam eva kye parataḥ padasamñjñam bhavati, na anyat /
GS24jvkasipu:4121: siti pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ padasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4132: pūrveṇa padasañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tad-apavādo bhasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4133: yakārādāv ajādau ca svādau sarvanāmasthāna-varjite pratyaye parataḥ pūrvaṃ bhasñjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4144: vṛṣan ity etat vasvaśvayoḥ prato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati chandasi viśaye /
GS24jvkasipu:4152: takāra-antaṃ sakāra-antaṃ śabda-rūpaṃ matv-arthe pratyaye parato bhasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4161: ayasmaya-ādīni śabdarūpāṇi chandasi viśaye sādhūni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4162: bhapada-sañjña-adhikāre vidhanāt tena sukhena sadhutvam ayasmaya-ādīnāṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4167: padatvāt kutvaṃ, bhatvāj jaśtvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4174: lasya tibādayaḥ iti sāmānyena bahuvacanaṃ vihitaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:4177: bahutvam asya vācyaṃ bhavati iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:4182: yatra ca saṅkhyā sambhavati tatra ayam upadeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4183: avyayebhyas tu niḥ-saṅkhyebhyaḥ sāmānya-vihitāḥ svādayo vidyanta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:4199: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kārake ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4205: kārake iti kim ? vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patati /
GS24jvkasipu:4207: akathitaṃ ca (*1,3.51), akathitaṃ ca kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati - māṇavakaṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:4208: karake iti kim ? māṇavakasya pitaraṃ panthānaṃ pṛcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:4209: kārakasaṃśabdaneṣu ca anena eva viśeṣaṇena vyavahāro vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:4213: dhruvaṃ yad apāyayuktam apāye sādhye yad avadhibhūtaṃ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4222: apādānapradeśāḥ - apādāne pañcamī (*2,3.28) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4226: bibhety-arthānāṃ trāyaty-arthānāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ prayoge bhaya-hetur yaḥ stat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4244: vāraṇa-arthānām dhātūnām prayoge ya īpsito 'rthaḥ tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4248: īpsitaḥ iti kim ? yavebhyo gā vārayati kṣetre //
GS24jvkasipu:4254: antardhi-nimittaṃ yena adarśanam ātmana icchati tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4258: antardhau iti kim ? caurān na didṛkṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:4259: icchati-grahaṇaṃ kim ? adarśanecchāyāṃ satyāṃ saty api darśane yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:4265: upayoge sādhye ya ākhyātā tat kārakam apādānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4285: bhū-kartuḥ prabhavo yaḥ, tat kārakam apādānasaṃjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4290: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam || PS_1,4.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:4292: karmaṇā karaṇa-bhūtena kartā yam abhipraiti tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4301: sampradānapradeśāḥ - caturthī sampradāne (*2,3.13) ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4302: karmaṇaḥ karaṇasañjñā vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:4310: rucy-arthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ prayoge prīyamāṇo yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānā-sañjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4314: prīyamāṇaḥ iti kim ? devadattāya rocate modakaḥ pathi //
GS24jvkasipu:4318: ślāgha hnuṅ sthā śapa ity eteṣām jñīpsyamāno yo 'rthah, tat kārakaṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4321: devadattaṃ ślāghamānastām ślāghāṃ tam eva jñapayitum icchati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4328: jñīpsyamānaḥ iti kim ? deadattāya ślāghate pathi //
GS24jvkasipu:4332: dhārayateḥ prayoge uttamarṇo yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4335: dhanasvāmī prayoktā uttamarṇaḥ, sa sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4338: uttārṇaḥ iti kim ? devadattāya śatam dharayati grāme //
GS24jvkasipu:4343: tasya īpsito yo 'rthaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradāna-sañjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4347: īpsitaḥ iti kim ? puśpebhyo vane spṛhayati //
GS24jvkasipu:4355: krudhādy-arthānām prayoge yaṃ prati kopaḥ, tat kārakaṃ sampradānasañjñam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4358: tasmāt sāmānyena viśesaṇam yaṃ prati kopaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4363: yam prati kopaḥ iti kim ? bhāryām īrṣyati, mā enām anyo drākṣīt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:4370: krudha-druhor upasṛṣṭayor upasarga-sambaddhayoḥ yaṃ prati kopaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4379: rādher īkṣeś ca kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4382: sa kasya bhavati ? yasya śubhāśubhaṃ pṛcchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4385: naimittikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ san devadattasya daivaṃ paryālocayati ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4389: prati āṅ ity evaṃ pūrvasya śṛṇoteḥ kārakam sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4391: pratipūrva āṅpūrvaś ca śṛṇoti rabhyupagame pratijñāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4392: sa ca abhyupagamaḥ parena prayuktasya sato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4393: tatra prayoktā pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyā kartā sampradānasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4401: anupūrvasya pratipūrvasya ca gṛṇāteḥ kārakam pūrvasyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartṛ-bhūtaṃ saṃpradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4403: hotā prathamaṃ śaṃsati, tam anyaḥ protsāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:4404: anugaraḥ, pratigaraḥ iti hi saṃsituḥ protsāhane vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4409: kriyā-siddhau yat prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ vivakṣitam tat sādhakatamaṃ kārakam karaṇasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4414: karaṇapradeśāḥ -- kartṛ-karaṇayos tṛtīyā (*2,3.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4419: pūrveṇa karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ karana-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyām karmasañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4420: divaḥ sādhakatamaṃ yat kārakam tat karmasañjñam bhavati, cakārāt karaṇasañjñam ca /
GS24jvkasipu:4426: pūrvena karaṇa-sañjñāyāṃ prāptāyā sampradāna-sajñā pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4427: parikrayaṇe sādhakatamaṃ kārakam anyatarasyāṃ sampradāna-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4428: parikrayaṇam niyatakālaṃ vetanādinā svīkaraṇam, natyantikaḥ kraya eva /
GS24jvkasipu:4435: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayabhūtayoḥ dhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārah,
GS24jvkasipu:4440: adhikarana-pradeśāḥ -- saptamy-adhikaraṇe ca (*2,3.36) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4445: adhipūrvāṇāṃ śīṅ sthā ās ity eteṣām ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karma-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4452: abhinipūrvasya viśater ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakam karma-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4454: kathaṃ kalyāṇe 'bhiniveśaḥ, pāpe 'bhiniveśaḥ, yā yā sañjñā yasmin yasmin sañjñiny abhiniviśate iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:4455: anyatarasyām iti vartate, parikrayaṇe sampradānam anyatarasyām (*1,4.44) ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4461: upa anu adhi ā ity evaṃ pūrvasya vasater ādhāro yaḥ, tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4473: kartuḥ kriyayā yad āptum iṣṭatamaṃ tat kārakaṃ karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4478: tam abgrahaṇaṃ kim ? payasā odanaṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:4480: itarathā ādhārasya+eva hi syāt gehaṃ praviśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4481: odanaṃ pacati, saktūn pibati ity ādiṣu na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:4483: karma-pradeśāḥ -- karmaṇi dvitīyā (*2,3.2) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4487: yena prakāreṇa kartur īpsitatamaṃ kriyayā yujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:4488: tena+eva cet prakārena yad anīpsitaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:4490: īpsitād anyat sarvam anīpsitam, dveṣyama, itarac ca /
GS24jvkasipu:4497: akathitaṃ ca yat kārakaṃ tat karmasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4500: bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate tad akīrtitam ācaritaṃ kavinā //
GS24jvkasipu:4505: pāṇyādikam apy upayoga-nimittaṃ, tasya 86 kasmān na bhavati ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:4530: tatha śabda-karmakāṇām akarmakanām ca aṇy-antānām yaḥ kartā,
GS24jvkasipu:4532: gacchati māṇavako grāmam, gamayati māṇavakaṃ grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4533: yāti māṇavako grāmam, yāpayati māṇavakaṃ grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4535: nayati bhāram devadattaḥ, nāyayati bhāram devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:4536: vahati bhāram devadattaḥ, vāhyati bhāraṃ devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:4538: iha praitṣedho mā bhūt, vahanti yavān balīvardāḥ, vāhayati yavān balīvardān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4539: buddhiḥ - budhyate māṇavako dharmam, bodhayati māṇavakaṃ dahrmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4540: vetti māṇavako dharmam, vedayati māṇavakaṃ dharmam /
GS24jvkasipu:4542: bhuṅkte māṇavaka odanam, bhojayati māṇavakam odanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4545: atti māṇavaka odanam, ādayate māṇavakena odanam /
GS24jvkasipu:4548: bhakṣayati piṇḍīṃ devadattaḥ, bhakṣayati piṇḍīṃ devadattena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4549: ahiṃsa-arthasya iti kim ? bhakṣayanti balīvardāḥ sasyam, bhakṣayanti balīvardān sasyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4550: śabda-karmaṇām -- adhīte mānavako vedam, adhyāpayati māṇavakaṃ vedam /
GS24jvkasipu:4555: eteṣām iti kim ? pacaty odanaṃ devadattaḥ, pācayaty odanaṃ devadattena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4564: ani karta sa ṇau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:4565: harateḥ karoteś ca aṇyantayor yaḥ kartā sa ṇyantayor anyatarasyāṃ karmasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4566: harati bhāraṃ mānavakaḥ, harayati bhāraṃ mānavakaṃ, mānavakena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4567: karoti kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ, kārayati kaṭaṃ devadattaṃ, devadattena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4569: abhivadati guruṃ devadattaḥ, abhivādayate guruṃ devadattaṃ, devadattena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4570: paśyanti bhṛtyā rājānam, darśayate bhṛtyān rājānam, bhṛtyaiḥ iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:4571: ātmanepade iti kim ? darśayati caitraṃ maitramaparaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4579: aguṇī-bhūto, yaḥ kriyā-siddhau svatantryeṇa vivakṣyate, tat kārakṃ kartṛsañjñaṃ bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:4582: kartṛ-pradeśāḥ - kartṛ-karaṇayos tṛtīyā (*2,3.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4589: svatantrasya prayojako yo 'rthaḥ, tat-kārakaṃ hetu-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4594: hetutvad ṇico nimittaṃ kartṛtvāc ca kartṛ-pratyayena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4595: hetu-pradeśāḥ - hetumati ca (*3,1.26) ity evam adayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4600: prāg etasmād avadheryānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, nipāta-sañjñāste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4601: vakṣyati - ca-adayo 'sattve (*1,4.57), ca, vā, ha, aha /
GS24jvkasipu:4604: rephoccāraṇam iśvare tosun-kasunau (*3,4.13) ity ayam avadhirmā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4605: rīśvarādvīśvarān mā bhūt kṛnmejantaḥ paro 'pi saḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4611: ca-ādayo nipāta-sañjñā bhavanti, na cet sattve vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:4636: māṅo ṅakāro viśeṣaṇārthaḥ, māṅi luṅ (*3,3.175) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:4637: iha na bhavati, mā bhavatu, ma bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:4755: upasarga-pratirūpakāḥ -- avadattam vidattaṃ ca pradataṃ ca adikarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:4756: sudattam anudattaṃ ca nidattam iti ceṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:4757: aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti tatvam na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4762: asattve iti kim ? paśur vai puruṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4763: paśuḥ puroḍaśaḥ nipāta-pradeśāḥ -- svara-ādi-nipatam avyayam (*1,1.37) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4790: upasargāḥ kriyā-yoge (*1,4.59) iti ca-ādīnām upasarga-sañjñā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:4791: asattve ity eva, parā jayati senā //
GS24jvkasipu:4801: kriyā-yoge iti kim ? pragato nāyako 'smād deśāt, pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4804: sañjñāvidhānasāmarthyādanajantatve 'pi aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti tattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4807: upasarga. pradeśāḥ -- upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ (*3,3.93) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4818: ūrīsyāt ity atra upasarga-prādurbhyām astir y-ac-paraḥ (*8,3.87) iti ṣatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:4822: gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) iti svaraḥ, upasargāt (*8,4.14) (*8,3.65) iti ṇatvaṣatve ca bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4827: punaścanasau chandasi gatisañjñau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:4836: ūry-ādayaḥ śabdāḥ cvy-antā ḍaj-antāś ca kriyā-yoge gati-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:4838: tat-sāhacaryād ūry-ādīnām api tair eva yoge gati-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4863: phalū, phalī, viklī, āklī iti vikāre - phalū kṛtya /
GS24jvkasipu:4897: anitiparam iti kim ? khāḍiti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat //
GS24jvkasipu:4910: ādara-anādarayoḥ iti kim ? satkṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4915: alam iti pratiṣedhe, sāmarthye, paryāptau, bhūṣaṇe ca iti viśeṣanam upādīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:4920: bhūṣaṇe iti kim ? alaṃ bhuktvā odanaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:4930: aparigrahe iti kim ? antarhatvā bhūṣikām śyeno gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4940: kaṇe-śabdo manas-śabdaś ca śraddhā-pratīghāte gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4943: tāvat pibati yāvad asya abhilāśo nivṛttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4945: śraddhā-pratīghāte iti kim ? kaṇe hatvā gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4972: sa gaty-artheṣu dhātuṣu vadatau ca gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:4979: avyayam ity eva, udakam acchaṃ gacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:4985: svayam eva tu yadā buddhyā parām ṛśati tadā na asty upadeśaḥ iti so 'sya viśayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:4989: anupadeśe iti kim ? adaḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ iti parasya kathayati //
GS24jvkasipu:4998: antardhau iti kim ? tiro bhūtvā sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5006: tiraḥ-śabdaḥ karotau parato vibhāṣā gati-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5011: antardhau ity eva, tiraḥ-kṛtvā kāṣṭhaṃ tiṣṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:5016: upāje 'nvāje-śabdau vibhakti-pratirūpakau nipātau durbalasya sāmarthyādhāne vartete /
GS24jvkasipu:5024: sākṣāt-prabhṛtīni śabdarūpāṇi kṛñi vibhāṣā gati-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5064: tad-abhāve 'natyādhāne urasi-manasī śabdau vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5067: anatyāvāne iti kim ? urasi kṛtvā pāṇiṃ śete //
GS24jvkasipu:5073: madye pade nivacane ity ete śabdā anatyādhāne vibhāṣā kṛñi gati-sajñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5078: vācam niyamya ity arthaḥ anatyādhāne ity eva, hastitaḥ pade kṛtvā śiraḥ śete //
GS24jvkasipu:5084: haste pāṇau ity etau śabdau kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjñau bhavataḥ upayamane /
GS24jvkasipu:5089: upayamane iti kim ? haste kṛtvā kārṣāpanaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5095: tad-ānukūlyaṃ vandhana-hetukaṃ yadā bhavati tadā prādhvaṃśabdaḥ kṛñi nityaṃ gatisañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5097: bandhne iti kim ? prādhvaṃ kṛtvā śakaṭaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5102: jīvikā upaniṣad ity etau śabdau aupamye viṣahe kṛñi gatisañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5105: aupamye iti kim ? jīvikām kṛtvā gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5116: prāk prayoge prapte chandasi pare 'pi abhyanujñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:5117: chandasi viṣaye gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ pre 'pi pūrve 'pi prayoktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5118: na ca preṣāṃ prayujyamānānāṃ sañjñā-kāryaṃ kiñcid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:5119: kevalaṃ praprayoge 'pi kriyāyoge eṣām asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5125: vyavahitāś ca gatyupasarga-sañjñakāḥ chandasi dṛśyante ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5131: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ karmapravacanīya. sañjñāste veditavyāḥ adhir īśvare (*1,3.97)
GS24jvkasipu:5133: karmapravacanīya-pradeśāḥ -- karmapravacanīya-yukte dvitīyā (*2,3.8) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5142: kim artham idam ucyate, yāvatā lakṣana-ittham bhūta-ākhyāna (*1,4.90)
GS24jvkasipu:5143: iti siddhaivānoḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjñā ? hetv-arthaṃ tu vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:5155: hīnaḥ iti nyūnaḥ ucyate, sa ca+utkṛṣṭāpekṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5157: hīne dyotye ayam anuḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5163: upa-śabdaḥ adhike hīne ca dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5170: apa-parī śabdau varjane dyotye karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5179: āṅ ity eṣā śabdo maryādā-vacane karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5186: maryādā-vacane iti kim ? īṣad-arthe kriyāyoge ca mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:5193: vīpsāyāṃ ca viśāya-bhūtāyāṃ prati pari anu ity ete karmapravacanīya-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5194: lakṣaṇe tāvat - vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5200: bhāge - yad atra māṃ prati syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5207: atha pariśabda-yoge pañcamī kasmān na bhavati pañcamy-apa-aṅ-paribhiḥ (*2,3.10)
GS24jvkasipu:5212: lakṣana-ādiṣu eva bhāga-varjiteṣu abhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5217: yad atra mama abhiṣyat tad dīyatām /
GS24jvkasipu:5218: yadatra mama bhavati tad dīyatām ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5224: pratinidhiviṣaye pratidānaviṣaye ca pratiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5230: adhiparī śabdau anarthakau anartha-antaravācinau karmapravacanīya-sañjñau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5243: pūjāyām iti kim ? suṣiktaṃ kiṃ tavātra //
GS24jvkasipu:5247: ati-śabdaḥ atikramaṇe, ca-kārāt pūjayaṃ ca karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5261: samuccaye ca vartamānaḥ apiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5262: padāntarasya aprayujyamānasya arthaḥ padārthaḥ - sarpiṣo 'pi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5264: mātrā, binduḥ, stokam ity asya arthe 'pi śabdo vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5265: sambhāvanam adhikārtha-vacanena śakter apratighātāviṣkaranam - api siñcen mūlaka-sahasram /
GS24jvkasipu:5269: garhā nindā - dhig jālmaṃ devadattam, api siñcet palāṇḍum /
GS24jvkasipu:5278: īśvaraḥ svāmī, sa ca svam apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:5279: tad ayam svasvāmi-sambandhe adhiḥ karmapravacanīya-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5280: tatra kadācit svāminaḥ karmapravacanīya-vibhaktiḥ saptamī bhavati, kadācit svāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5299: śatṛkvasū ca parasmaipada-pradeśāḥ - sici vṛddhiḥ prasmaipadeṣu (*7,2.1) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5305: pūrveṇa parasmaipadas-añjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ taṅ-ānayor ātmanepada-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5311: ātmanepada-pradeśāḥ - anudatta-ṅita ātmanepadam (*1,3.12) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5317: tatra parasmaipradeṣu trayastrikāḥ yathākramaṃ prathama-madhyama-uttama-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5321: ātmanepadeṣu - ta, ātām, jha iti prathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5324: prathama-madhyama-uttama-pradeśāḥ - śeṣe prathamaḥ (*1,4.108) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5333: supaś ca trīṇi trīṇi padāni ekaśa ekavacana-dvivacana-bahuvacana-sañjñāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:5342: trīṇi trīṇi vibhakti-sañjñāś ca bhavanti supas tiṅaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:5343: vibhakti-pradeśāḥ - aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5346: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ || PS_1,4.105 ||
GS24jvkasipu:5348: lasya (*3,4.77) ity adhikṛtya sāmānyena tib-ādayo vihitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5350: yuṣmady-upapade sati vyavahite cāvyavahite sati samānādhikaraṇe samāna-abhidheye tulya-kārake sthānini prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi madhyama-puruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5358: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca || PS_1,4.106 ||
GS24jvkasipu:5361: prahāse gamyamāne manya-upapade dhātor madhyama-puruṣo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:5364: ehi manye odanam bhokṣyase iti, na hi bhokṣyase, bhuktaḥ so 'tithibhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5365: ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, na hi yāsyasi, yātstena te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:5367: prahāse iti kim ? ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5374: asmady-upapade samānābhidheye prayujyamāne 'py aprayujyamāne 'pi uttamapuruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5385: yatra yuṣmad-asmadī samanādhikaraṇe upapade na staḥ, tatra śeṣe prathamapuruṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5394: paro yaḥ sannikarṣaḥ, varṇānām ardhamātrākālavyavadhānaṃ, sa saṃhitāsañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5408: avasāna-pradeśāḥ - khar-avasānayor visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.15) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5409: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5416: yaḥ kaścidiha śāstre padavidhiḥ śrūyate sa samartho viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5421: vigrahavākyārthabhidhāne yaḥ śaktaḥ sa samartho vidhitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5426: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? paśya devadatta kaṣṭaṃ, śrito viṣṇumitro gurukulam /
GS24jvkasipu:5427: tṛtīyā tatkṛta-arthena guṇavacanena (*2,1.30) - śaṅkulayā khaṇḍaḥ śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5428: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kiṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi śaṅkulayā, khaṇḍo devadatta upalena /
GS24jvkasipu:5430: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? gaccha tvaṃ yūpāya, dāru devadattasya grehe /
GS24jvkasipu:5432: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? gaccha tvaṃ mā vṛkebhyo, bhayaṃ devadattasya yajñadattāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5434: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? bhāryā rājñaḥ, puruṣo devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:5436: samartha-grahaṇaṃ kim ? śaktastvaṃ akṣeṣu, śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre /
GS24jvkasipu:5437: pada-grahaṇaṃ kim ? varṇavidhau samarthaparibhāśā mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:5444: subantam āmantrite parataḥ parasya aṅgavad bhavati, svare svara-lakṣaṇe kartavye /
GS24jvkasipu:5458: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ kim ? yathā mṛtpiṇḍībhūtaḥ svaraṃ labheta /
GS24jvkasipu:5460: vatkaraṇaṃ kim ? svāśrayam api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5463: āma eka-antaram āmantritam anantike (*8,1.55) ity ekāntaratā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5476: kaḍāra-saṃśabdanāt prāg yānita urdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, te samāsasañjñā veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5485: sup iti saha iti supā iti ca trayam api adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:5486: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tatra+idam upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:5488: dvitīya-antaṃ śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate, kaṣṭaṃ śritaḥ kaṣṭaśritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5489: saha-grahaṇaṃ yogavibhāga-artham, tiṅāpi saha yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:5496: yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, avyayībhāva-sañjñā aste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5499: anvartha-sañjñā ceyaṃ mahatī pūrvapadārtha-prādhānyam avyayībhāvasya darśayati /
GS24jvkasipu:5500: avyayībhāva-pradeśāḥ - avyayībhāvaś ca (*2,4.18) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5506: vibhaktyādiśv artheṣu yadavyayaṃ vartate tat samarthena sub-antena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5509: vibhaktivacane tāvat -- strīṣvadhikṛtya kathā pravartate adhistri /
GS24jvkasipu:5514: samṛddhir ṛddher ādhikyam -- samṛddhir madrāṇāṃ sumadram /
GS24jvkasipu:5516: vyṛddhir ṛddher abhāvaḥ -- gavadikānām ṛddher abhāvaḥ durgavadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:5520: atyayaḥ abhūtatvam, atikramaḥ -- atītāni himāni atihimam /
GS24jvkasipu:5524: taisṛkamācchādanam, tasya ayam upabhogakālo na bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5531: yathā-arthe yad avyayaṃ vartate tat samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5532: yogyatā vipsā padārthānativṛttiḥ sādṛśyaṃ ca iti yathārthāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5543: kim-artham idam ucyate, yathārtha ity eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:5544: guṇabhūte 'pi sādṛśye yathā syāt, sadṛśaḥ kikhyā rākikhi /
GS24jvkasipu:5545: sampattiḥ anurūpa ātmabhāvaḥ samṛddheranyaḥ -- sabrahma bābhravāṇām /
GS24jvkasipu:5549: na kiṃcid abhyāvahāryaṃ parityajati ity ayamartho 'dhikārthavacanena pratipādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5554: iyaṃ samāptirasakale 'py adhyayane bhavati iti sākalyāt pṛthag ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:5558: yathā ity etad avyayam asādṛśye vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5562: asādṛśye iti kim ? yathā devadattaḥ tathā yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5563: yathārthe yadavyayam iti pūrveṇa+eva siddhe samāse vacanam idaṃ sādṛśya-pratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:5567: yāvat ity etad avyayam avadhāraṇe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5570: yāvantyamatrāṇi sambhavanti pañca ṣaṭ vā tāvata āmantrayasva /
GS24jvkasipu:5571: avadhāraṇe iti kim ? yāvad ṛttaṃ tāvad bhuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:5572: na avadhārayāmi kiyan mayā bhuktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:5576: mātrā binduḥ, stokam, alpam iti paryāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5577: mātrā-arthe vartamānena pratinā saha subantaṃ samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5580: mātrā-arthe iti kim ? vṛkṣaṃ prati vidhotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5581: sup iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam avyayanivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:5591: pañcikā nāma dyūtaṃ pañcabhir akṣaiḥ śalākābhir vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5592: tatra yadā sarve uttānāḥ patanti avāñco vā,
GS24jvkasipu:5594: tasya+eva asya vipāto 'nyathā pāte sati jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5595: akṣeṇa+idaṃ na tathā vṛttaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ jaye akṣapari /
GS24jvkasipu:5602: akṣādayas tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:5608: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, tad vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5615: apa pari bahis añcu ity ete subantāḥ pañcamyantena saha vibhāṣā samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:5625: āṅ ity etan maryādāyām abhividhau ca vartamānam pajcamyantena saha vibhāṣā saṃsyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5628: abhividhau - ākumāraṃ yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ, ā kumārebhyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5633: tad-vācinā subantena saha abhipratī śabda-avābhimukhye vartamānau vibhāṣā samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:5637: agniṃ lakṣyīkṛtya abhimukhaṃ patanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5640: abhipratī iti kim ? yena agnis tena gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5649: anuryasya samīpa-vācī tena lakṣaṇa-bhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5652: yatsamayā iti kim ? vṛkṣamanu vidyotate vidyut /
GS24jvkasipu:5653: avyayaṃ vibhakti-samīpa (*2,1.6) ity eva siddhe punarvacanam vibhāṣa-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:5659: anuryasyāyāmavācī tena lakṣaṇabhūtena saha vibhāṣā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5663: āyāmaḥ iti kim ? vṛkṣamanu vidhyotate vidyut //
GS24jvkasipu:5670: tiṣṭhanti gāvo yasmin kāle dohanāya sa tiṣṭhadgu kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5671: khaleyavādīni prathamānatāni vibhaktyanatarenṇa na+eva sambadhyante 'nyapadārthe ca kāle vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:5673: aparaḥ samāso na bhavati, paramatiṣṭhadgu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5712: pāra-ṃdhya-śabdau ṣaṣṭhyantena saha vibhāṣā samasyete, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5723: vidyayā janmanā vā prāṇinām ekalakṣaṇasantāno vaṃśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5725: tad-vācinā subantena saha saṅkhyā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5726: dvau munī vyākaraṇasya vaṃśyau dvimuni vyākaranasya /
GS24jvkasipu:5728: yadā tu vidyaya tadvatām abhedavivakṣā tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5736: nadīvacanaiḥ śabdaiḥ saha saṅkhyā samasyate, avyayībhāvaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5747: nadībhiḥ saha subantam anyapadārthe vartamānaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣye samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5787: dvitīyāntaṃ subantam śrita-adibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5805: svayam etad avyayam ātmanā ity asyārthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:5806: tasya dvitīyayā sambandho 'nupapannaḥ iti dvitīyā-grahaṇam uttarārtham anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:5807: svayam ity etat subantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:5814: khaṭvā-śabdo dvitīyāntaḥ ktāntena saha kṣepe gamyamāne samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5815: kṣepo nindā, sa ca samāsa-artha eva, tena vibhāṣā 'dhikāre 'pi nityasamāsa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:5818: sarva eva avinītaḥ khaṭvārūḍhaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5826: sāmi ity etad avyayam ardhaśabda-paryāyaḥ, tasya asattvavācitvād dvitīyayā na asti sambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5827: tat subantaṃ ktantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5837: kālavācinaḥ śabdāḥ dvitīyāntāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante vibhāṣa, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5840: ṣaṇmuhūrtāścarācarāḥ, te kadācit ahargacchanti kadācit rātrim /
GS24jvkasipu:5850: atyantasaṃyogaḥ kṛtsna-saṃyogaḥ, kālasya svena sambandhinā vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:5851: kālavācinaḥ śabdā dvitīyāntā atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne supā saha samasyante vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:5861: tṛtīyāntam guṇavacanena arthaśabdena ca saha saṃsyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5862: kīdṛśena guṇavacanena ? tatkṛtena tadartha-kṛtena, tṛtīyānta-artha-kṛtena iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:5871: pūrva sadṛśa sama ūnārtha kalaha nipuṇa miśra ślakṣṇa ity etaiḥ saha tṛtīyāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5873: asmād eva vacanāt pūrvādibhir yoge tṛtīyā bhavati, hetau vā draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:5898: kartari karaṇe ca yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ kṛdantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5905: bahula-grahanam kim ? dātreṇa lūnavān, paraśunā chinnavān, iha samāso na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5906: pādahārakaḥ, gale copakaḥ iti ca bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:5911: kartṛkaraṇayo yā tṛtīyā tadantaṃ subantaṃ kṛtaiḥ saha samasyate 'dhikārthavacane gamyamāne vibhāṣā,
GS24jvkasipu:5919: iha mā bhūt, kākaiḥ pātavyā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:5924: vyañjñavāci tṛtīyāntam anavācinā subantena sahā samasyate, vibhāśā tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5932: miśrīkarana-vāci tṛtīyāntam bhakṣya-vācinā subantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5943: tat iti sarvanāmnā caturthyantasya arthaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:5945: tadartha artha bali hita sukha rakṣita ity etaiḥ saha caturthyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5950: iha na bhavati, randhanāya sthalī, avahananāya ulūkhalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:5951: tādarthye caturthī ca asmād eva jñāpakād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5969: subantena saha samasyate vibhāṣā, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5978: tathā ca grāmanirgataḥ, adharmajugupsuḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:5982: apeta apoḍha mukta patita apatrasta ity etaiḥ saha pajcamyantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:5991: prāsādāt patitaḥ, bhojanād apatrastaḥ ity evam adau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:5992: kartṛkarane kṛtā bahulam (*2,1.32) ity asya+eva ayam prapañcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:5997: stoka antika dūra ity evam arthāḥ śabdāḥ kṛcchra-śabdaś ca pañcamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6015: saptamyantaṃ śauṇḍa-ādibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣāś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6037: siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity etaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6050: dhavāgkṣavācinā subantena saha saptamyantaṃ subantaṃ subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6051: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6062: kṛtya-pratyayāntaiḥ saha saptamyantaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati ṛṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6067: ṛṇagrahaṇaṃ niyogopalakṣaṇa-arthaṃ, tena+iha api samāso bhavati, pūrvāhṇe geyaṃ sāma pūrvāhṇageyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6069: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:6073: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye saptayantaṃ supā saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6075: tena nityasamāsa eva ayam, na hi vākyena sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6085: aharavayavāḥ rātryavayavāś ca saptamyantāḥ ktāntena saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6090: avayava-grahanam kim ? etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttaṃ ca drakṣyasi /
GS24jvkasipu:6098: tatra ity etat saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6107: kṣepe gamyamāne saptamyantaṃ ktāntena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6109: cāpalam etat, anavasthitatvaṃ tavaitat ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6113: niṣphalaṃ yat kriyate tad evam uchyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6120: pātresamita-ādayaḥ śabdas tatpuruṣa-sañjñā bhavanti kṣepe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:6121: ye ca atra ktāntena saha samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6122: teṣāṃ pūrvena+eva siddhe punaḥ pāṭho yuktārohyādi-parigraha-arthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:6124: yuktarohyādiṣu hi pātresamitādayaś ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6127: avadhāraṇena kṣepo gamyate, pātre eva samitā na punaḥ kvacit kārye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6167: cakāro 'vadhāraṇa-arthaḥ, tena samāsāntaraṃ na bhavati, paramapātresamitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:6173: pūrvakāla eka sarva jarat purāṇa nava kevala ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6199: digvācinaḥ śabdāḥ saṅkhyā ca samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6200: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati sañjñayāṃ vaṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:6211: taddhita-arthe viṣaye uttarapade ca parataḥ samāhāre ca abhidheye dik-saṅkhye samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6234: ity atra yaḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvaḥ samāsaḥ sa dvigu-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6235: taddhita-arthe tāvat - pañcasu kapāleśu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6237: saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ (*4,2.16) iti iha aṇ, tasya dvigor lug-anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:6246: kutsita-vācīni subantāni kutsana-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6248: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57) iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6265: pāpa aṇaka ity ete subante kutsita-vacanaiḥ saha samasyete, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6274: upamāna-vācīni subantāni sāmānya-vacanaiḥ subantaiḥ saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6275: upamāna-upameyayoḥ sādhāraṇe dharmaḥ sāmānyaṃ, tadviśiṣṭa-upameya-vacanair ayaṃ samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6281: sāmānya-vacanaiḥ iti kim ? phālā iva taṇḍulāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6287: tadvāci subantaṃ vyāghra-ādibhiḥ sāmarthyād upamāna-vacanaiḥ saha sāmasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6290: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57) iti paranipāte prāpte viśeṣyasya pūrvanipāta-artha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6293: sāmānya-aprayoge iti im ? puruṣo 'yaṃ vyāghra iva śūraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6317: viśeṣaṇa-vāci subantaṃ viśeṣya-vācinā samānādhikaraṇena subantena saha bahulaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6323: kvacin na bhavaty eva, rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ, arjunaḥ kārtavīryaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6331: pūrva apara prathama carama jaghanya samāna madhya madhyama vīra ity ete subantāḥ samānādhikaraṇena supā saha samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6346: śreṇya-ādayaḥ subantāḥ kṛta-ādibhiḥ samānadhikaraṇaiḥ sahaḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6354: cvyantānāṃ tu ku-gati-pra-ādayaḥ (*2,2.18) ity anena nityasamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6402: tena nañviśiṣṭena ktāntena samānādhikaraṇena saha anañ ktāntaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6429: sat mahat parama uttama utkṛṣṭa ity ete pūjyamānaiḥ saha samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6430: pūjyamānaiḥ iti vacanāt pūjāvacanāḥ sadādayo vijñāyante /
GS24jvkasipu:6436: pūjyamānaiḥ iti kim ? utkṛṣṭo gauḥ kadarmāt //
GS24jvkasipu:6440: vṛndāraka nāga kuñjara ity etaiḥ saha pūjyamāna-vāci subantaṃ samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:6442: pūjyamānam iti vacanāt pūjāvacanā vṛndāraka-ādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:6453: katara-katamau jātiparipraśne vṛtamānau samarthena supā saha samasyete,
GS24jvkasipu:6462: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati katama-śabdo 'nyatra api vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6463: tathā ca pratyudāharanam - kataro bhavator devadattaḥ, katamo bhavatāṃ devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6467: kim ity etat kṣepe gamyamāne supā saha samasyate taturuṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6471: kimaḥ kṣepe (*5,4.70) iti samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6472: kṣepe iti kim ? ko rājā pāṭaliputre //
GS24jvkasipu:6482: poṭādibhiḥ saha jātivāci subantaṃ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6503: jātivāci subantaṃ praśaṃsā-vacanaiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6505: te ca āviṣṭaliṅgatvād anyaliṅge 'pi jāti-śabde svaliṅgopādānā eva samānāhikaranā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:6517: samānādhikaraṇaiḥ saha yuva-śabdaḥ samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6519: prātipādika-grahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahanam iti jñāpaka-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:6531: kṛtyapratyaya-antās tulyaparyāyāś ca subantā ajāti-vacanena samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6544: varṇaviśeṣavāci subantaṃ varṇaviśeṣavācinā subantena samānādhikaraṇena saha samasyte,
GS24jvkasipu:6550: avayavadvārena kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ samudāye vartamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:6554: kumāra-śabdaḥ śramaṇā-ādibhiḥ saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6559: taiḥ saha strīliṅgaḥ eva kumāra-śabdaḥ samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6586: catuṣpād-vācinaḥ subantā garbhiṇī-śabdena samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6590: iha mā bhūt - kālākṣī garbhaṇī, svastimatī garbhiṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:6597: cakāro 'vadhāraṇa-arthaḥ , paramamayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti samāsāntaraṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6663: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6671: tadvācinā subantena saha pūrva apara adhara uttara ity ete śabdāḥ sāmarthyād ekadeśabacanāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6674: ekaṃ ced adhikaraṇam ekadravyam ekadeśi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6680: ekadeśinā iti kim ? pūrvaṃ na abheḥ kāyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6681: ekādhikaraṇe iti kim ? pūrvaṃ chātrāṇām āmantraya /
GS24jvkasipu:6682: kathaṃ madhyāhnaḥ, sāyāhnaḥ iti ? saṅkhyā-vi-sāy-apūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau (*6,3.110)
GS24jvkasipu:6683: iti jñāpakāt sarvaṇaikadeśa-śabdena ahnaḥ samāso bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:6689: ardham ity etad napuṃsakam ekadeśinā-ekādhikaraṇena samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6695: ekadeśinā ity eva, ardhaṃ pasor devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6704: pūraṇa-guṇa (*2,2.11) iti pratiṣedhaś ca ata eva anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇa-sāmarthyān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:6709: ekadeśinā ity eva, dvitīyaṃ bhikṣāyā bhikṣukasya /
GS24jvkasipu:6718: prāpta āpanna ity etau dvitīyāntena saha samasyete, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6719: prāpto jīvikām prāptajīvikaḥ, jīvikāprāptaḥ iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:6720: āpanno jīvikam āpannajīvikaḥ, jīvikāpannaḥ iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:6725: tadbācinā subantena saha sāmarthyāt parimāṇavacanāḥ kāla-śabdāḥ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6735: nañ samarthena subantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6741: īṣat ity ayaṃ śabdo 'kṛdantena supā saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6749: guṇavacanena iti kim ? iha na bhavati, īṣad gārgyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6753: ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ subantaṃ samarthena subantena saha samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6756: kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6760: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vakṣyati, tasyāyaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:6765: pūrveṇa samāsaḥ siddha eva, tasya kartari ca (*2,2.16)
GS24jvkasipu:6766: iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam ārabhyate pratiprasavārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:6767: yājakādibhiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6783: tatsthaiś ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6789: na nirdhāraṇe (*2,2.10) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:6795: nirdhārane yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6800: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6806: pūraṇa guna suhitārtha sat avyaya tavya samānādhikaraṇa ity etaiḥ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6807: artha-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate, tena svarūpa-vidhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6819: tavyatā sānubandhakena samāso bhavaty eva, brāhmaṇa-kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6823: kiṃ ca syāt ? pūrvanipātasya aniyamaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6824: anantarāyāṃ tu prāptau pratiṣiddhāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam (*2,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:6831: mati-buddhi-pūjā-arthebhyaś ca (*3,2.188) iti vakṣyati, tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:6833: kto yaḥ pūjāyāṃ vihitastena ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6837: pūjāyām iti kim ? chātrasya hasitam chātrahasitam //
GS24jvkasipu:6851: karmaṇi ca yā ṣaṣṭhī sā na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6852: ubhaya-prāptau karmaṇi (*2,3.66) iti ṣaṣṭhyā idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:6861: kartari yā ṣaṣṭhī sā tṛcā akena ca saha na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6865: tṛc cartaryeva vidhīyate, tatprayoge kartari ṣaṣṭhī na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:6867: kartari iti kim ? ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi //
GS24jvkasipu:6871: kartari ca yau tṛj-akau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6872: sāmarthyād akasya viśeṣaṇa-arthaṃ kartṛ-grahaṇam, itaratra vyabhicārābhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:6876: nanu ca bhartṛ-śabdo hy ayaṃ yājakādiṣu paṭhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:6886: kriḍāyāṃ jīvikāyāṃ ca nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6887: tṛc kriḍā-jīvikayor na asti ity aka eva+udāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6898: ku-gati-prādayaḥ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha nityaṃ samasyante, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6928: ivena saha samāso vibhaktya-lopaḥ pūrvapada-prakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:6939: upapadam atiṅantaṃ samarthena śabdāntareṇa saha samasyate nityam, tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6943: nanu ca sup supā iti vartate, tatra kutas tiṅantena samāsa-prasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:6944: evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati etayor yogayoḥ sup supeti na sambadhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6945: tena gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ ity etad upapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:6953: avyayena-upapadasya yaḥ samāsaḥ so 'mā+eva bhavati, na anyena /
GS24jvkasipu:6957: amā+eva iti kim ? kāla-samaya-velāsu tumun (*3,3.167) - kāle bhoktum /
GS24jvkasipu:6959: amā+eva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tasya samāso yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:6960: amā ca anyena ca yat tulya-vihdhānaṃ tasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:6967: ity ataḥ prabhṛti yāny upapadāni tāni amā+eva avyayena saha-anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:6970: yad amā+eva tulyavidhānam upapadaṃ tasya prāpte, yathā upadaṃśas tṛtīyāyām (*3,4.47) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:6971: yat punar amā ca anyena ca tulyavidhānaṃ tasya prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:6975: amā+eva ity eva, paryaptivacaneṣv alamartheṣu (*3,4.66), paryāpto bhoktum /
GS24jvkasipu:6981: tena anyatra na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:6982: ktvāpratyayena saha tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīni upapadāny anyatarasyāṃ samasyante,
GS24jvkasipu:7002: bahuvrīhi-pradeśāḥ - na bahuvrīhau (*1,1.29) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7006: anekaṃ subantamanyapdārthe vartamānaṃ supā saha samasyate, bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7007: prathamārtham ekaṃ varjayitvā sarveṣu vibhakty-artheṣu bahuvrīhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7008: prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7016: aneka-grahanaṃ kim ? bahūnām api yathā syāt, susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sugajājinavāsasā /
GS24jvkasipu:7017: samantaśitir andhreṇa dvayor vṛttau na sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:7026: uṣṭrasya mukham iva mukhaṃ yasya sa uṣṭramukhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7028: samudāya-vikāraṣaṣṭhyāś ca bahuvrīhir uttarapada-lopaś ca+iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7029: keśānāṃ saṅghātaḥ keśasaṅghātaḥ, keśasaṅghātaḥ cūḍā 'sya keśacūḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7032: prādibhyo dhatujasya+uttarapadasya lopaś ca vā bahuvrīhir vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7044: saṅkhyeye yā saṅkhyā vartate tayā saha avyaya-āsanna-adūra-adhika-saṅkhyāḥ samasyante bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7058: saṅkhyeye iti kim ? adhikā viṃśatir gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:7063: diṅnāmāni subantāni antarāle vācye samasyante, bahuvrīhiś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7064: dakṣiṇasyāś ca pūrvasyāś ca diśor yad-antarālaṃ dakṣiṇa-pūrvā dik /
GS24jvkasipu:7070: iha ma bhūt, aindryāś ca kauberyāś ca ciśor yad-antarālam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7077: tatra iti saptamyante sarūpe pade teneti ca tṛtīyānte idam ity etasminn arthe saṃsyete,
GS24jvkasipu:7079: itikaranaś ca+iha vivakṣārtho laukikam artham anusārayati /
GS24jvkasipu:7080: tato grahaṇaṃ, praharanaṃ karmavyatīhāro, yuddhaṃ ca samāsa-arthaḥ iti sarvam itikaranāllabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7082: yat tatra iti nirdiṣṭaṃ grahaṇam cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7083: yat tena iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharanaṃ cet tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7084: yat idam iti nirdiṣṭaṃ yuddhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7085: keśeṣu keśeṣu ca gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:7087: daṇḍaiś ca daṇḍaiś ca pragṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍi /
GS24jvkasipu:7089: ic karmavyatīhāre (*5,4.127) iti ic samāsāntaḥ, sa ca avyayam /
GS24jvkasipu:7090: anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.137) iti pūrvapadasya dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:7091: sarūpa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? halaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:7095: saha ity etac chābdarūpaṃ tulyayoge vartamānaṃ tena iti tṛtīyāntena saha samasyate,
GS24jvkasipu:7100: tulyayoge iti kim ? sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ bahati gardabhī /
GS24jvkasipu:7101: vidyamātair eva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7102: kathaṃ sakarmakaḥ, salomakaḥ, sapakṣakaḥ iti ? na hy atra tulyayogo gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7110: anekaṃ subantaṃ ca-arthe vartamānam samasyate, dvandva-sañjñaś ca samāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7112: tatra samuccayānvācayayor asāmarthyāt na asti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7115: dhavaś ca khadiraś ca palāśaś ca dhava-khadira-palāśāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7118: dvandva-pradeśāḥ - dvandve ca (*1,1.31) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7139: anyasya api yathā lakṣaṇaṃ vihitasya pūrvanipātasya ayam apavādaḥ paranipāto vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7204: anekaprāptāv ekasya niyamaḥ, śeṣe tv aniyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7212: aj-ādy-ad-antaṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7221: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? aśvāvṛṣau, vṛṣāśve iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:7227: alpāctaraṃ śabdarūpaṃ dvandve samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7239: abhyarhitaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nipatati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7255: sarvopasarjanatvād bahuvrīher aniyame prāpte niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:7256: saptamyantaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuvrīhi-samāse pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7266: anayor eva mithaḥ saṃpradhāraṇāyāṃ pratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7272: saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte prapte gaḍvādibhyaḥ saptamyantaṃ param /
GS24jvkasipu:7284: nanu ca viśeṣaṇam eva atra niṣṭhā ?
GS24jvkasipu:7286: kathe kṛtam anena iti vā vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7294: kathaṃ kṛtakaṭaḥ, bhuktaudanaḥ ? prāptasya cābādhā vyākhyeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:7295: praharaṇārthebhyaś ca pare niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7298: katham udyatagadaḥ, udyatāsiḥ ? prāptasya cābādhā vyākhyeyā //
GS24jvkasipu:7302: niṣṭhā iti pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7313: ākṛtiganaś ca ayam, tena gaḍukaṇṭhaprabhṛtaya iha+eva draṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7317: guna-śabdānāṃ viśeṣanatvāt pūrvanipāte prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7336: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīya pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7343: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, anabhihite ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7344: anabhihite anukte, anirdiṣṭe karmādau vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7348: anabhihite iti kim ? tiṅ - kriyate kaṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7352: samāsaḥ - prāptam udakaṃ yaṃ grāmaṃ prāptodako grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7353: parisaṅkhyānaṃ kim ? kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāraṃ darśanīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7354: vahuṣu bahuvacanam ity evam ādinā saṅkhyā vacyatvena vibhaktīnām upadiṣṭāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:7355: tatra viśeṣaṇa-artham idam ārabhyate - anabhihitakarmādyāśrayeṣvekatvādiṣu dvitīyādayo veditavyāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:7359: dvitīyādayaḥ śabdāḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ supāṃ trikeṣu samaryante, tair eva atra vyavahāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7360: karmaṇi kārake yā saṅkhyā tatra dvitīyā vibhaktirbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7384: chandasi viṣaye juhoteḥ karmaṇi kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, dvitīyā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7387: chandasi iti kim ? yavāgūm agnihotraṃ juhoti //
GS24jvkasipu:7397: antareṇa śabdas tu tac ca vinārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7398: antarā tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7399: antareṇa tvāṃ ca māṃ ca kamaṇḍaluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7401: yukta-grahaṇaṃ kim ? antarā takṣaśilāṃ ca pāṭaliputraṃ srughnasya prākāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7405: kāla-śabdebhyo 'dhva-śabdebhyaś ca dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati atyantasaṃyoge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7426: apavarge gamyamāne kāla-adhvanor atyantasaṃyoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7433: kartavyādṛttau phala-siddher abhāvāt tṛtīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7434: māsam adhīto 'nuvākaḥ, na ca anena gṛhītaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7439: kārakayor madhye yau kāla-adhvānau tābhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7440: adya bhuktavā devadatto dvyahe bhoktā dvyahād vā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:7443: iha stho 'yam iṣvāsaḥ krośe lakṣyaṃ vidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:7445: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kārakayoḥ karma-apādānayoḥ karma-adhikaraṇayor vā madhye krośaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7455: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī || PS_2,3.9 ||
GS24jvkasipu:7458: yasamā dadhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvaravacanaṃ karmapravacanīyair yukte tatra saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7461: yasya ca+īśvaravacanam iti svasvāminordvayor api paryāyeṇa saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7462: adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ, adhi pañcāleṣu brahmadattaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7467: apa āṅ pari ity etaiḥ karmapravacanīyair yoge pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7479: yasmāt pratinidhiryataś ca pratidānaṃ tatra karmapravacanīya-yukte pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7483: nanu ca pratinidhi-pratidāne karmapravacanīya-yukte, na tu yataḥ pratinidhi-pratidāne ?
GS24jvkasipu:7484: na+eṣa doṣaḥ, sambandha-sambandhāt tasya api yogo 'sty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:7488: gatyarthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ ceṣtākriyāṇāṃ parispandakriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake 'dhvavarjite dvitīyā-caturthyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7493: deṣṭāyam iti kim ? manasā pāṭaliputraṃ gacchati /
GS24jvkasipu:7500: yatra tu utpathena panthānaṃ gacchati, tatra bhavitavyam eva caturthyā, pathe gacchati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7501: dvitīyā-grahanaṃ kim ? na catrthy eva viklpyeta, apavāda-viṣaye 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7526: pītā varṣāya vijñeyā durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:7533: kriyārthā kriyā upapadaṃ yasya so 'yaṃ kriyārthopapāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7534: tumun-ṇvulau kriyāyāṃ kriyārthāyām (*3,3.10) ity eṣa viṣayo lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7535: kriyārthopapadasya ca sthānino 'prayujyamānasya dhātoḥ karmaṇi kārake caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7538: puṣpebhyo vrajati kriyārthopapadasya iti kim ? praviśa piṇḍīm /
GS24jvkasipu:7540: bhakṣir atra sthānī, na tu kriyārthopapadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7541: karmaṇi iti kim ? edhebhyo vrajati śakaṭena /
GS24jvkasipu:7548: bhāvavacanāś ca (*3,3.11) iti vakṣyati, tasya+idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:7561: namaḥ svasti svāhā svadhā alam vaṣaṭ ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhvati /
GS24jvkasipu:7573: tena āśīrvivakṣāyām api ṣaṣṭhīṃ vādhitvā caturthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7580: manyakarmaṇi prāṇivarjite vibhāṣā caturthī vibhaktir bhavati anādare gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:7582: na tvā tṛṇaṃ manye, na tvā tṛṇāya manye /
GS24jvkasipu:7583: na tvā busaṃ manye, na tvā busāya manye /
GS24jvkasipu:7584: manyati-grahaṇaṃ kim ? na tvā tṛṇaṃ cintayāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:7585: vikaraṇa-nirdeśaḥ kim arthaḥ ? na tvā tṛṇaṃ manve /
GS24jvkasipu:7586: anādare iti kim ? aśmānaṃ dṛṣadaṃ manye manye kaṣṭhamulūkhalam /
GS24jvkasipu:7587: andhāyāstaṃ sutaṃ manye yasya mātā na paśyati //
GS24jvkasipu:7588: aprāniṣu iti kim ? na tvā śṛgālaṃ manye /
GS24jvkasipu:7589: yad etad aprāṇiṣviti tad anāvādiṣviti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7591: na tvā nāvaṃ manye yāvad uttīrṇaṃ na nāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7592: na tvā 'nnaṃ manye yāvan na bhuktaṃ śrāddham /
GS24jvkasipu:7596: iha caturthī dvitīyā ca bhavataḥ - na tvā śvānaṃ manye, na tvā śune manye /
GS24jvkasipu:7597: yuṣmadaḥ kasmān na bhavati caturthī, etad api hi manyateḥ karma ?
GS24jvkasipu:7603: kartari karaṇe ca kārake tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7622: saha-arthena yukte apradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7625: pitur atra kriyādi-sambandhaḥ śabdena+ucyate, putrasya tu pratīyamāna iti tasyāprādhānyam /
GS24jvkasipu:7626: sahārthena ca yoge tṛtīyā-vidhānāt paryāya-prayoge 'pi bhavati, putreṇa sārdham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7627: vinā 'pi saha-śabdena bhavati, vṛddho yūnā (*1,2.65) iti nidarśanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7628: apradhāne iti kim ? śiṣyeṇa sahopādyāyasya gauḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7632: aṅga-śabdo 'tra aṅga-samudāye śarīre vartate, yena iti ca tadavayavo hetutvena nirdiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7633: yena aṅgena vikṛtena aṅgino vikāro lakṣyate, tatas tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7647: iha na bhavati, kamaṇḍlupāniśchātraḥ iti, lakṣaṇasya samāse 'ntarbhūtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7648: itthambhūtaḥ iti kim ? vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotanam //
GS24jvkasipu:7653: sampūrvasya jānāteḥ karmaṇi karake dvitīyāyāṃ prāptāyām anyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyāvibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7668: kartṛ-varjitaṃ yadṛṇaṃ hetuḥ, tataḥ pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati tṛtīyā+apavādo yogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7672: śatamṛṇaṃ ca bhavati, prayojakatvāc ca kartṛsañjñakam //
GS24jvkasipu:7677: guṇe hetāv astrīliṅge vibhāṣā pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7687: hetu-śabdasya prayoge hetau dyotye ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7692: sarvanāmno hetu-śabda-prayoge hetau dyotye tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, ṣaṣṭhī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7693: pūrveṇa ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptāyām idam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7694: kena hetunā vasati, kasya hetor vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:7695: yena hetunā vasati, yasya hetor vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:7707: tena+iha api bhavati - kiṃ prpayojanaṃ vasati,
GS24jvkasipu:7734: gavīdhumataḥ sāṅkāśyaṃ catvāri yojanāni, caturṣu yojaneṣu vā //
GS24jvkasipu:7738: anya ārāt itara ṛte dik-śabda añcu-uttarapada āc āhi ity etair yoge pañcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7760: dvik-śabda ity atra śabda-grahanaṃ deśakālavṛttinā 'pi dik-śabdena yoge yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:7763: iha tu na syāt, ayam asmāt pūrvaḥ kālaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:7767: ṣaṣṭhy-atasartha-prayayena (*2,3.30) iti vakṣyati, tasya ayaṃ purastādapakarṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7775: dakṣiṇa-uttarābhyām atasuc (*5,3.28) iti vakṣyati, tasya+idaṃ grahanam /
GS24jvkasipu:7776: atas-arthena pratyayena yukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7798: pṛthak vinā nānā ity etair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, anyatarasyāṃ pañcamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7803: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GS24jvkasipu:7804: vinā hastikṛtān doṣān kenemau pātitau drumau //
GS24jvkasipu:7809: stoka alpa kṛcchra katipaya ity etebhyo 'sattva-vacanebhyaḥ karaṇe kārake 'nyatarasyāṃ tṛtīyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7810: pañcamy atra pakṣe vidhīyate, tṛtīyā tu karaṇe ity eva siddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:7811: yadā tu dharma-mātraṃ karaṇāyā vivakṣyate na dravyam, tadā stoka-ādīnām asattva-vacanatā /
GS24jvkasipu:7816: asattva-vacanasya iti kim ? stokena viṣeṇa hataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7818: karaṇe iti kim ? kriyāviśeṣaṇe karmaṇi mā bhūt, stokaṃ muñcati //
GS24jvkasipu:7823: dūra-antika-arthaiḥ śabdair yoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, anyatarasyāṃ pañcamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7836: dūraṃ grāmasya, dūrād grāmasya, dūreṇ grāmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:7837: antikaṃ grāmasya, antikād grāmasya, antikena grāmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:7841: dūraḥ panthāḥ, dūrāya pathe dehi, dūrasya pathaḥ svam //
GS24jvkasipu:7845: saptamī vibhaktir bhavaty adhikaraṇe kārake, cakārād dūra-antika-arthebhyaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7871: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti dantayor hanti kuñjaram /
GS24jvkasipu:7872: keśeṣu camarīṃ hanti sīmni puṣkalako hataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7878: yasya ca bhāvena yasya ca kriyayā kriyāntaraṃ lakṣyate, tato bhāvavataḥ saptamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7882: bhāvena iti kim ? yo jaṭābhiḥ sa bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:7883: punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ kim ? yo bhuṅkte sa devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:7887: pūrveṇa saptamyāṃ prāptāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate, cakārāt sā 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7888: anādara-adhike bhāva-lakṣane bhāvavataḥ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7889: rudataḥ prāvrājīt, rudati prāvrājīt krośataḥ prāvrājīt, krośati prāvrājīt /
GS24jvkasipu:7896: svāmin īśvara adhipati dāyāda sākṣin pratibhū prasūta ity etair yoge ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7904: ṣaṣṭhyām eva prāptayāṃ pakṣe saptamīvidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:7911: tābhyāṃ yoge āsevāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī-saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7913: āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇasya, āyuktaḥ kaṭakaraṇe kuśalaḥ kaṭakaranasya, kuślaḥ kaṭakaraṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:7914: āsevāyām iti kim ? āyukto gauḥ śakaṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:7920: jāti-guṇa-kriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karanaṃ nirdhāranam /
GS24jvkasipu:7921: yato nirdhāranaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭhī saptamyau vibhaktī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7922: manuṣyāṇām kṣatriyaḥ śūratamaḥ, manuṣyeṣu kṣatriyaḥ śūratamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:7924: goṣu kṛṣṇā sampanna-kṣīratamā adhvagānāṃ dhavantaḥ śīghratamā,
GS24jvkasipu:7932: yasmin nirdhāraṇa-āśraye vibhaktam asya asti tataḥ pajcamī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7937: sādhu nipuṇa ity etābhyām yoge 'rcāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ saptamī vibhaktir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:7945: aprateḥ iti kim ? sādhur devadatto mātaraṃ prati /
GS24jvkasipu:7953: prasita utsuka ity etābhyāṃ yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati, cakārāt saptamī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:7954: prasitaḥ prasaktaḥ, yas tatra nityam eva avabaddhaḥ sa prasita-śabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7966: iha kasmān na bhavati, adya pusyaḥ, adya kṛttikā ? adhikaraṇe iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:7976: prātipadikārtha-mātre, liṅga-mātre, primāṇa-mātre, vacana-mātre prathamā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7979: liṅga-grahaṇaṃ kim ? kumārī, vṛkṣaḥ, kuṇḍam ity atra api yathā syat /
GS24jvkasipu:7980: parimāṇa-grahaṇaṃ kim ? droṇaḥ, khārī, āḍhakam ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7981: vacana-grahanaṃ kim ? ekatva-ādiṣu ukteṣv api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7983: prātipadika-grahanaṃ kim ? nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam uktaṃ, tato 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:7989: ābhimukhya-karaṇaṃ, tad-adhike prātipadika-arthe prathamā na prāpnoti iti vacanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:7997: sambodhane yā prathamā tad-antaṃ śabda-rūpam āmantritasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:7999: āmantrita-pradeśāḥ -- āmantritaṃ pūrvam avidyamānavat (*8,1.72) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8004: āmantrita-prathamāyā yad ekavānaṃ, tat sambuddhi-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8007: sambuddhi-pradeśāḥ - eṅ-hrasvāt sambuddheḥ (*6,1.69) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8019: jānāter avidarthasya ajñāna-arthasya karaṇe kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8026: cittabhrāntyā tadātmanā sarvam eva grāhyaṃ pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8028: avid-arthasya iti kim ? svareṇa putraṃ jānāti //
GS24jvkasipu:8036: eteṣaṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8042: karmaṇi ity eva, mātur guṇaiḥ smarati /
GS24jvkasipu:8048: karoteḥ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite pratiyatne gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8050: śastrapatrasyopaskurute pratiyatne iti kim ? kaṭaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:8057: rujārthānāṃ dhātūnāṃ bhāva-vacanānāṃ bhāva-kartṛkāṇāṃ jvari-varjitānāṃ karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8060: rujārthānām iti kim ? eti jīvantamānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api /
GS24jvkasipu:8061: jīva putraka mā maivaṃ tapaḥ sāhasamācara //
GS24jvkasipu:8062: bhāvavacanānām iti kim ? nadī kūlāni rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:8063: ajvareḥ iti kim ? cauraṃ jvarayati jvaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8066: śeṣe ity eva, cauraṃ rujati rogaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8071: tasyāśīḥkriyasya karmaṇi kārake śeṣatvena vivakṣite ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8074: āśiṣi iti kim ? mānavakam upanāthati aṅga putrakādhīṣva //
GS24jvkasipu:8078: jāsi niprahaṇa nāṭa krātha piṣ ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hiṃsā-kriyāṇāṃ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8080: jasu tāḍane iti ca curādau paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8082: na daivādikasya jasu mokṣaṇe ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:8095: ayaṃ hi ghaṭādau paṭhyate, śratha knatha kratha klatha hiṃsa-arthāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8096: tatra ghaṭādayo mitaḥ iti mitsañjñāyāṃ mitāṃ hrasvaḥ (*6,4.92) iti hrasvatvaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8107: vyavahṛ paṇa ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ samānārthayoḥ karmaṇi kārake ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8113: āya-pratyayaḥ kasmān na bhavati ? stuty-arthasya panaterāya-pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8121: vyavahṛpaṇisamāna-arthasya dīvyateḥ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8129: divas tadarthasya (*2,3.58) iti nityaṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ prāptāyāṃ sopasargasya vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8130: upasarge sati divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8140: brāhmaṇaviṣaye prayoge divas tadarthasya karmaṇi kārake dvitīyā vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8148: tatsāhacaryād bruvir api tadviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8149: preṣyabruvorhaviṣaḥ karmaṇaḥ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati devatāsampradāne sati /
GS24jvkasipu:8150: agnaye chāgasya haviṣo vapāyā medasaḥ pre3ṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:8152: preṣyabruvoḥ iti kim ? agnaye chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medo juhudhi /
GS24jvkasipu:8153: haviṣaḥ iti kim ? agnaye gomayāni preṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:8154: devatāsampradāne iti kim ? māṇavakāya puroḍāśaṃ preṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:8156: indrāgnibhyāṃ chāgaṃ havirvapāṃ medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣya3 //
GS24jvkasipu:8161: chandasi viṣaye caturthy-arthe ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:8169: yā kharveṇa pivati tasyai kharvo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8179: yajer dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake chandasi bahulaṃ ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8186: kṛtvo 'rthānāṃ prayoge kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8192: gamyate hi dvis traś catur veti, na tv aprayujyamāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8194: adhikaraṇe iti kim ? dvir ahno bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:8195: śeṣe ity eva, dvir ahany adhīte //
GS24jvkasipu:8199: kṛt-prayoge kartari karmaṇi ca ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8206: kṛti iti kim ? taddhita-prayoge mā bhūt, kṛtapūrvī kaṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:8209: itarathā hi kartari ca kṛti ity evaṃ brūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:8216: ubhayoḥ prāptir yasmin kṛti, so 'yam ubhayaprāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8217: tatra karmaṇy eva ṣaṣthī vibhaktir bhavati, na kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:8222: āścaryam idam odanasya nāma pāko brāhmaṇānaṃ ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8227: akākārayoḥ strīpratyayayorgrahanāt tadapekṣayā śeṣaḥ strīpratyaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8228: śobhanā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ pāṇininā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:8229: kecid aviśeṣeṇaiva vibhāṣām icchanti, śabdānām anuśāsanam ācāryaṇa ācāryasya iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:8233: na la-u-uka-avyaya. niṣṭhākhalartha-tṛnām (*2,3.69) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punaḥ ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8234: ktasya vartamāna-kāla-vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8245: tathā ca kartṛvivakṣāyāṃ tṛtīyā 'pi bhavati, chāatreṇa hasitam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8259: dvikarmakāṇāṃ prayoge kartari kṛti dvayor api ṣaṣṭhī dvitīyāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:8266: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛti (*2,3.65) iti prāptā ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8267: la u uka avyaya niṣṭhā khalartha tṛn ity eteṣāṃ prayoge ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8268: la iti śatṛśānacau, kānac-kvasū, kikinau ca gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8291: laṭaḥ śatṛ-śānacāv aprathamā. samānādhikaraṇe (*3,2.124) ity ārabhya ā tṛno nakārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8305: inas tu bhaviṣyati cādhamarṇye ca vihitasya prayoge ṣaṣthī vibhaktir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8315: iha kasmān na bhavati, varṣaśatasya pūrakaḥ, putrapautrāṇāṃ darśakaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:8320: kartṛ-karmaṇoḥ kṛti (*2,3.65) iti nityaṃ ṣaṣthī prāptā kartari vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8321: kṛtyānāṃ prayoge kartari vā ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati, na karmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:8322: bhavatā kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ, bhavataḥ kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8323: kartari iti kim ? geyo māṇavakaḥ sāmnām /
GS24jvkasipu:8330: tulyārthaiḥ śabdair yoge tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavaty anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:8333: śeṣe viṣaye tṛtīyā-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣthy eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8336: atulopamābhyām iti kim ? tulā devadattasya na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:8338: vā iti vartamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahanam uttarasūtre tasya cakārena anukarṣaṇa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:8343: āśiṣi gayamānāyām āyuṣya madra bhadra kuśala sukha artha hita ity etair yoge caturthī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8345: śeṣe caturthī-vidhānāt tayā mukte ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8347: āyuṣyaṃ devadattāya bhūyāt, āyuṣyaṃ devadattasya bhūyāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8348: ciraṃ jīvitaṃ devadattāya devadattasya vā bhuyāt /
GS24jvkasipu:8360: āśiṣi iti kim ? āyuṣyaṃ devadattasya tapaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8361: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8369: ekasya arthasya vācako bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8370: tadanena prakāreṇa dvigv-arthasya+ekavad bhāvo vidhīyate, dvigv-artha ekavad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8374: dvigv-arthasy)a e)katvād anuprayoge 'py ekavacanaṃ bhavati, pañca-pūlīyaṃ śobhanā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8379: aṅga-śabdasya pratyekaṃ vākya-parisamāptyā trīṇi vākyāni sampadyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8380: prāṇy-aṅgānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati, tathā tūrya-aṅgānāṃ senā-aṅgānāṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8387: hasty-aśva-ādiṣu paratvāt paśud-vandve vibhāṣayā eakvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8398: caraṇānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati anuvāde gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8402: kaṭhakālāpa-ādīnām udaya-pratiṣṭhe pramāṇa-antaravagate yadā punaḥ śabdena anūdyete tadā+evam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:8413: adhvaryukratu-vācināṃ śabdānām anapuṃsaka-liṅgānāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8414: adhvaryukratur anapuṃsakaṃ dvandvaḥ iti gauṇo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8420: iha kasmān na bhavati, darśapaurṇamāsau ? kratu-śabdaḥ somayāgeṣu rūḍhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8425: adhyayanena nimittena yeṣām aviprakṛṣṭā pratyāsannā ākhyā, teṣāṃ dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8434: jāti-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati prāṇino varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:8439: nañiva-yuktanyāyena dravya-jātīnām ayam ekavadbhāvaḥ, na guṇa-kriyājātīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:8442: jāti paratve ca jāti-śabdānām ayam ekavadbhāvo vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:8443: na niyata-dravya-vivakṣāyām - iha kuṇḍe badarāmalakāni tiṣṭhanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8447: viśiṣta-liṅgānāṃ bhinna-liṅgānāṃ nadī-vācināṃ śabdānāṃ deśavacināṃ ca grāma-varjitānaṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8450: nadī deśaḥ ity asamāsa-nirdeśa eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:8451: uddhyaś ca irāvatī ca uddhyer āvati /
GS24jvkasipu:8453: deśaḥ khalv api - kuravaś ca kurukṣetraṃ ca kurukurukṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:8458: agrāmāḥ iti kim ? jāmbavaś ca śālūkinī ca jāmbava-śālūkinyau /
GS24jvkasipu:8461: tathā ca parvatānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati, kailāsaś ca gandhamādanaṃ ca kailāsa-gandhamādane /
GS24jvkasipu:8462: agrāmā ity atra nagarānāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8463: iha mā bhūt, mathurā ca pāṭaliputraṃ ca mathurā-pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:8465: sauryaṃ ca nagaraṃ, ketavataṃ ca grāmaḥ saurya-ketavate //
GS24jvkasipu:8475: kṣudra-janturanasthiḥ syād atha vā kṣudra eva yaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8476: śataṃ vā prasuṛtau yeṣāṃ kecidā nakulād api //
GS24jvkasipu:8477: ā nakulād api iti iyam eva smṛtiḥ pramāṇam, itarāsāṃ tadvirodhāt //
GS24jvkasipu:8483: yeṣāṃ śāśvatiko virodhaḥ tadvācināṃ śabdānāṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8488: tena paśuśakuni-dvandve virodhinām anena nityam ekavad bhāvo bhavati - aśvamahiṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:8496: yair bhukte pātraṃ saṃskāreṇa api na śudhyati te niravasitāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8505: gavāśva-prabhṛtīni ca kṛta-ekavad-bhāvani dvandva-rūpāṇi sādhūni bhavnti /
GS24jvkasipu:8532: rūpāntare tu na ayaṃ vidhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8539: vṛkṣa mṛga tṛṇa dhanya vyañjana paśu śakuni aśvavaḍava pūrvāpara adharottara ity eteṣām dvandvo vibhāṣā ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8551: eṣāṃ bahuprakṛtir eva dvandva ekavad bhavati, na dviprakṛtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8563: vipratiṣiddha-arthānāṃ śabdānām anadhikaraṇa-vācinām adravya-vācināṃ dvandva ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8573: yathāyatham ekavad bhāve prāpte pratiṣedha ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8600: tasya+etāvattve parimāṇe gamyamāne dvandvo na+ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8608: adhikaraṇa-etāvattvasya samīpe vibhāṣā dvandvaḥ ekavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8616: yasya ayam ekavad bhāvo vihitaḥ sa napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati dvigur dvandvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8627: ano nalopaś ca vā ca dviguḥ striyām /
GS24jvkasipu:8660: nañ-samāsaṃ karmadhārayaṃ ca varjayitvā 'nyas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ viditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:8664: tatpuruṣaḥ iti kim ? dṛḍhaseno rājā anañ iti kim ? asenā /
GS24jvkasipu:8669: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kanthā-anatas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati, sā cet kanthā uśīnaresu bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8684: yady upajñeyasya+upakramyasya ca arthasya ādir ākhyātum iṣyate tata etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8686: pāṇiner upajñānena pratham ataḥ praṇītam akālakaṃ vyākaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:8701: chāyā-antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati bāhulye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:8710: sabhāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati, sā cet sabhā rājapūrvā, amanusya-pūrvā ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8713: iha kasmān na bhavati, rājasabhā ? paryāya-vacanasya+eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8717: iha kasmān na bhavati, kāṣṭhasabhā ? amanuṣya-śabdo rūḍhirūpeṇ rakṣaḥpiśācādiṣv eva vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:8722: aśālā ca yā sabhā tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8732: senā surā chāyā śālā niśā ity evam antas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka-liṅgo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:8743: parasya yal liṅgaṃ tat bhavati dvandvasya tatpuruṣasya ca /
GS24jvkasipu:8751: dviguḥ - pañcasu kapālesu saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ pañcakapālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:8761: tatra+ekavad-bhāvād anyatra paravilliṅgatāyāṃ prāptāyām idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:8766: vacana-antare 'pi pūrvavalliṅgatā bhavati, aśva-vaḍavān, aśva-vaḍavaiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:8771: hemanta-śiśirau ahorātre ity etayoś chandasi viṣaye pūrvavalliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:8775: artha-atideśaś ca ayaṃ na nipātanaṃ, tena dvivacanamatantram /
GS24jvkasipu:8781: chandasi liṅgavyatyaya uktaḥ, tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:8786: rātra ahna aha ity ete puṃsi bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8806: iha kasmān na bhavati, apatho deśaḥ, apathā nagarī ? tatpuruṣaḥ iti vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:8810: ardharcādayaḥ śabdāḥ puṃsi napuṃsake ca bhāṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:8816: śabda-rūpa-āśrayā ca+iyaṃ dvi-liṅgatā kvacid arthabhedena api vyavatiṣṭhate,
GS24jvkasipu:8821: sāra-śabda utkarṣe puṃliṅgaḥ, nyāyādanapete napuṃsakam, naitat sāram iti /
GS24jvkasipu:8822: dharmaḥ ity apūrve puṃliṅgaḥ, tatsādhane napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:9037: idamo 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aś-ādeśo bhavaty anudāttaḥ, tṛtīya-adau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9039: asmai chātrāya kambalaṃ dehi, atho 'smai śāṭakam api dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:9040: asya chātrasya śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho 'sya prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:9044: kiṃ tarhi ? ekasya+eva abhidheyasya pūrvaṃ śabdena pratipāditasya dvitīyaṃ pratipādanam anvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9045: tena+iha na bhavati, devadattaṃ bhojaya, imaṃ ca yajñadattam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:9048: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau || PS_2,4.33 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9051: etado 'nvādeśa-viṣayasya aśādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ tra-tasoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9052: tau ca api tra-tasāv anudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9053: etasmin grāme sukhaṃ vasāmaḥ, atho atra yuktā adhīmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:9054: etasmāc chātrācchanto 'dhīṣva, atho ato vyākaraṇam apy adhīṣva /
GS24jvkasipu:9056: etado 'ś ity ādeśe labhe punar vacanam anudātta-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:9061: dvitīyā ṭā os ity eteṣu parata idam etador anvādeśa-viṣayayoḥ ena-śabda ādeśo ādeśo bhavati anudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9063: imaṃ chātraṃ chando 'dhyāpaya, atho enaṃ vyākaraṇamadhyāpaya /
GS24jvkasipu:9065: anayośchātrayoḥ śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho enayoḥ prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:9066: etadaḥ khalv api -- etaṃ chātraṃ chanto 'dhyāpaya, atho enaṃ vyākaraṇamapyadhyāpaya /
GS24jvkasipu:9068: etayoś chātrayoḥ śobhanaṃ śīlam, atho enayoḥ prabhūtaṃ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:9072: iha kasmān na bhavati, ayaṃ daṇḍo harānena, etamātaṃ ṅitaṃ vidyāt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:9073: yatra kiñcid vidhāya vākyāntareṇa punar anyadupadiśyate so 'nvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9074: iha tu vastu-nirdeśamātraṃ kṛtvā ekam eva vidhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:9078: ārdhadhātuke ity adhikāro 'yam, ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni lug-aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:9079: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamast ad ārdhadhātuke veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:9083: tena ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām ādeśeṣu kṛteṣu paścād yathā-prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9088: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti || PS_2,4.36 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9090: ado jagdhiḥ ādeśo bhavati lyapi parataḥ, takārādau ca kiti pratyaye /
GS24jvkasipu:9098: iha kasmān na bhavati, annam ? annāṇṇaḥ (*4,4.85) iti nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9107: luṅi sani ca parato 'do ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9116: ghañi api ca parataḥ ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9123: chandasi viṣaye bahulam ado ghasḷ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9128: anyatarasya aṃgrahaṇam eva kasmān na kriyate tad eva+uttara-artham api bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:9141: veño vayiḥ ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyāṃ liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9145: liṭi vayo yaḥ (*6,1.38) iti yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9146: vaś ca anyatarasyāṃ kiti (*6,1.39) iti va-kāro vidhīyate -- vavau, vavatuḥ, vavuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9152: hanter dhātoḥ vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati liṅi parata ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:9156: tasya sthānivadbhāvād avadhīt iti halanta-lakṣanā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:9160: luṅi ca parataḥ hano vadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9163: ātmanepadeṣu luṅi vikalpo yathā syāl liṅi mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:9168: ātmanepadeṣu parato hano luṅy anyatarasyāṃ vadha ity ayamādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9175: iṇaḥ gā ity ayam āveśo bhavati luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9177: luṅi iti vartamāne punar luṅ-grahaṇam ātmanepadeṣv anyatarasyām (*2,4.44) ity etan mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:9194: sani parataḥ iṇo 'bodhana-arthasya gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9203: iṅaś ca sani parato gamir ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9209: gāṅ adeśo bhavati iṅo liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9212: ity atra asya grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9213: na hi sthānivadbhāvena gāṅ iti rūpaṃ labhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:9217: lugi ḷṅi ca parata iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9219: iti ṅittvam, ghu-mā-sthā-gā-pā-jahāti-sāṃ hali (*6,4.66) iti ītvam /
GS24jvkasipu:9223: ḷṅi khalv api - adhyagīṣyata, adhyagīṣyetām, adhyagīṣyanta /
GS24jvkasipu:9230: ṇau iti iṅ-apekṣayā parasaptamī, saṃś-caṅoḥ iti ca ṇy-apekṣayā /
GS24jvkasipu:9231: ṇau sanpare caṅpare ca parataḥ iṅo vibhāṣā gāṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9241: aster dhātor bhūḥ it ayam ādeśo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:9245: iha kasmān na bhavati, īhāmāsa, īhāmāsatuḥ, īhāmāsuḥ ? kṛñ ca anuprayujyate liṭi (*3,1.40)
GS24jvkasipu:9247: tathā cocyate - anupratoge tu bhuvā 'styabādhanam smaranti kartur vacanān manīṣiṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9268: sthānivadbhāvena nityam ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati, ñakāra-anubandhak-araṇa-sāmarthyāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9287: liṭi parataścakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ ādeśaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9294: ajer dhātoḥ vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ārdhadhātuke parato ghañapau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:9314: yau prabhūte aje rvā vī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9321: ṇyāntāt kṣatriyagotrād ārṣād ñitaś ca prayoḥ aṇḍañoryūni lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9322: ṇyāntāt tāvat -- kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) , tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9325: nanu ca kauravya-śabdaḥ tikādiṣu paṭhyate, tataḥ phiñā bhavitavyam, kauravyāyaṇiḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:9327: ity anena vihitasya, idaṃ tu brāhmaṇagotram, kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9328: kṣatriya -- ṛṣy-andhaka-vṛṣṇi-kurubhyaś ca (*4,1.114) it yaṇ, tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9331: ārṣa -- ṛṣyaṇ (*4,1.114), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9334: ñit - anṛṣy-ānantarye vida-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104), tasmād yūni iñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9337: aṇaḥ khalv api -- tika-ādibhyaḥ phiñ (*4,1.154), tasmād yūni prāg dīvyato 'ṇ (*4,1.83), tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9340: etebhyaḥ iti kim ? śiva-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*4,1.112), tasmād yūni ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9343: yūni iti kim ? vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9344: kurv-ādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) iti ṇyaḥ, tasmāt kaṇva-ādibhyo gotre (*4,2.111) iti śaiṣiko 'ṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:9346: aṇiñoḥ iti kim ? dākṣerapatyaṃ yuvā dākṣāyaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9356: śālva-avayava-lakṣana iñ, tasmāt phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9361: paila ity evam ādibhyaś ca yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9362: pīlāyā vā (*4,1.118) ityaṇ, tasmad aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156) iti phiñ, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9365: anye paila-ādayaḥ iñantāḥ tebhyaḥ iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60) iti luki siddhe 'prāg-arthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9388: gotre ya iñ tadantād yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9391: yañ-iñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, tasya luk /
GS24jvkasipu:9402: taulvaly-ādibhyaḥ parasya yuvapratyayasya na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9438: tasya tadrāja-sañjñasya pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9439: tena+eva cet tadrājena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9449: tena+eva grahaṇaṃ kim ? priyo vāṅgo yeṣāṃ te ime priyavāṅgāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9454: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:9455: yaska ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotra-pratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9456: tena+eva ced gotra-pratyayena kṛtaṃ bahutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9457: pratyaya-vidheś ca anyatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam ity anantarāpatye 'pi lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9478: tataḥ parebhyaś caturbhyaḥ gṛṣṭy-ādibhyaś ca (*4,1.136) iti ḍhañ /
GS24jvkasipu:9509: bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām, gotre iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:9510: yaño 'jś ca gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu vartamānasya astrīliṅgasya luṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9513: añaḥ khalv api, anṛṣy-ānantarye bida-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104) -- bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9521: gotre ity eva, dvīpādanusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) -- dvaipyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9523: yañādīnām ekadvayor vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyā upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:9526: evaṃ baidasya kulaṃ baidakulaṃ bidakulaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:9529: ekadvayoḥ iti kim ? gārgāṇāṃ kulaṃ gargakulam /
GS24jvkasipu:9530: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? gārgasya samīpam upagārgyam /
GS24jvkasipu:9535: atry-ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9536: atri-śabdāt itaś ca aniñaḥ (*4,1.122) iti ḍhak /
GS24jvkasipu:9552: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt ya iñ vihitaḥ prācya-gotre bharatagotre ca vartate, tasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9562: teṣāṃ punar grahaṇaṃ jñāpana-artham anyatra prāg grahaṇe bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9563: tena iñaḥ prācām (*2,4.60) iti bharatānāṃ yuvapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9569: gopavana-ādibhyaḥ prasya gotrapratyayasya lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9571: tato 'ño gotrapratyayasya yañ-añoś ca (*2,4.64) iti luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:9585: tebhyaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavaty eva, haritaḥ, kiṃdāsāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:9589: tika-ādibhyaḥ kitava-ādibhyaś ca dvandve gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9590: taikāyanayaś ca kaitavāyanayaś ca, tika-ādibhyaḥ phiñ (*4,1.158), tasya luk, tika-kitavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9591: vāṅkharayaś ca bhānḍīrathayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, vaṅkharabhaṇḍīrathāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9592: aupakāyanāś ca lāmakāyanāś ca, naḍādibhyaḥ phak (*4,1.99), tasya luk, upakalamakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9593: pāphakayaś ca nārakayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, paphakanarakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9594: bākanakhayaś ca śvāgudapariṇaddhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, bakanakhaśvagudapariṇaddhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9597: tayor luk, aubjayaś ca kākubhāś ca ubjakakubhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9598: lāṅkayaś ca śāntamukhayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95) tasya luk, laṅkaśāntamukhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9604: bhrāṣṭakayaś ca kāpiṣṭhalayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, bhraṣṭakakpiṣṭhalāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9605: kārṣṇājinayaś ca kārṣṇasundarayaś ca, ata iñ (*4,1.95), tasya luk, kṛṣṇājinakṛṣṇasunadarāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9606: āgniveśyaś ca dāserakayaś ca, agniveśaśabdāt gargādibhyo yañ (*4,1.105)
GS24jvkasipu:9613: upaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ parasya gotrapratyayasya bahuṣu lug bhavati anyatarasyāṃ dvandve ca advandve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:9615: eteṣaṃ ca madye trayo dvandvāstikakitav ādiṣu paṭhyante - upakalamakāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:9618: teṣāṃ pūrveṇa+eva nityam eva lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9619: advandve tv anena vikalpaḥ - upakāḥ, aupakāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9625: pariśiṣṭānāṃ ca dvandve 'dvandve ca vikalpaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9655: āgastya-kauṇḍinyayor gotrapratyayayoḥ aṇo yañaś ca bahuṣu lug bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9661: madyodātto hi kuṇḍinī-śabdas tadādeśo 'pi tathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:9664: iti luki pratiṣiddhe āgastīyāḥ chatrāḥ iti vṛddha-lakṣaṇaścho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9665: kauṇḍinye tvaṇaiva bhavitavyam, kaṇvādibhyo gotre (*4,2.111) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9671: supo vibhakter dhātu-sañjñāyāḥ prātipadika-sañjñāyāś ca lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9690: chandasi viṣaye śapo bhaulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9691: adiprabhṛtibhya uktas tato na bhavaty api - vṛtraṃ hanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9693: anyebhyaś ca bhavati - trādhvaṃ no devāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9697: yaṅo lug bhavati aci pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9698: cakārena bahula-grahanam anukṛṣyate, na tu chandasi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:9699: tena chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca yaṅo lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9719: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ śapaḥ ślur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9720: yatroktaṃ tatraṃ na bhavati, anyatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9721: juhoty-ādibhyast āvan na bhavati - dāti priyāṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:9729: gāti sthā ghu pā bhū ity etebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9730: parasya sico lug bhavati, parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9741: parasmaipadeṣu iti kim ? agāsātāṃ grāmau devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:9746: ghrā gheṭ śā chā sā ity etebhya uttarasya sicaḥ prasmaipadeṣu vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9747: dheṭaḥ pūrveṇa prāpte vibhāṣa-arthaṃ vacanam, pariśiṣṭānām aprāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:9753: parasmaipadeṣu ity eva, aghrāsātāṃ sumanasau devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:9757: tan-ādibhya uttarasya sicaḥ ta-thāsoḥ parato vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9768: mantra-viṣaye ghasa hvara naśa vṛ daha āt vṛca kṛ gami jani ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya leḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9770: hvara iti hvṛ kauṭilye - mā hvārmitrasya tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:9772: vṛ iti vṛṅvṛñoḥ sāmānyena grahanam -- suruco vena āvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9776: vṛc -- mā no asmin mahādhane parā vṛg bhārabhṛdyathā /
GS24jvkasipu:9792: avyayād uttarasya āpaḥ supaś ca lug bhavati /
