GS24jvkasipu:9799: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ || PS_2,4.83 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9802: dantād avyayībhāvād uttarasya supo na lug bhavati, amādeśas tu tasya supo bhavaty apañcamyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9803: etasmin pratiṣiddhe pañcamyāḥ śravanam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9814: pūrveṇa nityam ambhāve prāpte vacanam idam /
GS24jvkasipu:9815: tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ vibhaktyor bahulam ambhāvo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:9827: luḍ-ādeśasya prathamapuruṣasya prasmaipadasya ātmanepadasya ca yathākramam ḍā rau ras ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9832: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9847: pratyayapradeśāḥ - pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam (*1,1.62) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:9851: ayam apy adhikāro yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate, paribhāṣā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:9852: paraś ca sa bhavati dhātor vā prātipadikād vā yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9862: ādy-udāttaś ca sa bhavati yaḥ pratyaya-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9863: aniyatasvara-pratyaya-prasaṅge 'nekākṣu ca pratyayeṣu deśasya aniyame sati vacanam idam āder udātta-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:9870: supaḥ pitaś ca pratyayā anudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9878: gupa gopane, tija niśāne, kita nivāse etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9883: nindākṣamāvyādhipratīkāreṣu sanniṣate 'nyatra yathā prāptaṃ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:9896: ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ san pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:9902: uttarasūtre vāgrahaṇaṃ sarvasya śeṣo vijñāyate, tena kvacin na bhavaty api /
GS24jvkasipu:9908: māner jijñāsāyām, badher vairūpye, dāner ārjave, śāner niśāne //
GS24jvkasipu:9910: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā || PS_3,1.7 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9912: iṣikarma yo dhatur iṣiṇaiva samānakartṛkaḥ, tasmād icchāyām arthe vā san pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9917: dhātu-grahanaṃ kim ? sopasargād utpattir mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:9919: karmaṇaḥ iti kim ? karaṇān mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:9921: samānakartṛkat iti kim ? devadattasya bhojanam icchati yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9924: dhātoḥ iti vidhānād atra sanaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjñā bhavati, na pūrvatra /
GS24jvkasipu:9933: sarūpaḥ pratyayo neṣṭaḥ sanantān na saniṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:9938: iṣikarmaṇaḥ eṣituḥ eva ātmasambandhinaḥ subantād icchāyām arthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9942: ātmanaḥ iti kim ? rājñaḥ putram icchati /
GS24jvkasipu:9955: subantāt karmaṇaḥ ātmecchāyāṃ kāmyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9959: kakārasya it-sajñā prayojana-abhāvān na bhavati, cakārāditvād va kāmyacaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:9965: upamanāt karmaṇaḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9976: upamānāt kartuḥ subantād ācāre 'rthe vā kyaṅ-prattyayo bhavati, sakārasya ca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9977: anvācayaśiṣtaḥ salopaḥ, tadabhāve 'pi kyaṅ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:9980: salopa-vidhāv api vā-grahaṇaṃ sambadhyate, sā ca vyavasthita-vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:9982: {sakārasyeṣyate lopaḥ śabdaśāstravicakṣanaiḥ} ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna /
GS24jvkasipu:9985: salopa-vidhau ca kartuḥ iti sthāna-ṣaṣṭhī sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:9997: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ || PS_3,1.12 ||
GS24jvkasipu:9999: bhṛśa ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'cvyantebhyo bhuvi bhavaty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10034: lohitādibhyo ḍājantebhyaś ca bhavaty arthe kyaṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10038: yāni lohitādiṣu paṭhyante tebhyaḥ kyaṅ eva, aparipaṭhitebhyas tu kyaṣ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10044: yathā ca kakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārtho 'nubadhyate naḥ kye (*1,4.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10045: na hi paṭhitānāṃ madhye nakārāntaḥ śabdo 'sti /
GS24jvkasipu:10046: kṛbhvastibhir iva kyaṣā 'pi yoge ḍāj bhavati ity etad eva vacanam jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:10047: acveḥ ity anuvṛtter abhūta-tadbhāve kyaṣ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10060: kaṣṭa-śabdāc caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe 'rthe 'nārjave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10064: kanvacikīrṣā pāpacikīrṣā, tasyāmetebhyaḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10070: kaṇvacikīrṣāyām iti kim ? ajaḥ kaṣṭam krāmati //
GS24jvkasipu:10075: romantha-śabdāt tapaḥ-śabdāc ca karmaṇo yathākramaṃ varticaror arthayoḥ kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10078: iha mā bhūt, kīṭo romanthaṃ vartayati /
GS24jvkasipu:10085: bāṣpa-śabdād ūṣma-śabdāc ca karmana udvamane 'rthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10093: śabda vaira kalaha abhra kanva megha ity etebhayaḥ karaṇe karoty arthe kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10118: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ vedanāyām arthe 'nubhave kyaṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:10122: kartṛ-grahaṇaṃ kim ? sukhaṃ vedayate prasādhako devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:10139: namas varivas citraṅ ity etebhyo vā kyac pratyayo bhavati, karaṇaviśeṣe pūjādau /
GS24jvkasipu:10148: puccha bhāṇḍa cīvara ity etebhyo ṇiṅ pratyayo bhavati karaṇaviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:10162: muṇḍa miśra ślakṣṇa lavaṇa vrata vastra hala kala kṛta tūsta ity etebhyaḥ karaṇe ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10167: vratāt bhojane tannivṛttau ca - payo vratayati /
GS24jvkasipu:10179: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ || PS_3,1.22 ||
GS24jvkasipu:10181: eka-aj yo dhātur halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate tasmād yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10187: dhātoḥ iti kim ? sopasargād utpattir mā bhūt, bhṛśaṃ prāṭati /
GS24jvkasipu:10198: bhṛśaṃ śobhate, bhṛśaṃ rocate ity atra neṣyate, anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:10202: gativacanād dhatoḥ kauṭilye gamyamāne nityaṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10212: lupa sada cara japa jabha daha daśa gṝ ityetebhyo bhāva-garhāyāṃ dhātvartha-garhāyāṃ yaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10223: bhāva-grahaṇam kim ? sādhanagarhāyāṃ mā bhūt, mantraṃ japati vṛṣalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10225: etebhyo nityaṃ bhāvagarhāyām eva bhavati, na tu kriyāsamabhihāre /
GS24jvkasipu:10230: satya-ādibhyaś cūrṇaparyantebhyaḥ, curādibhyaś ca ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10257: tasminn abhidheye dhātoḥ ṇic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10260: tat karoti ity upasaṅkhyānaṃ sūtrayati ity ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:10262: ākhyānāt kṛtas tad ācaṣṭa iti ṇic kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivac ca kārakam /
GS24jvkasipu:10263: ākhyānāt kṛdanttaṇ ṇic vaktavyaḥ tad ācaṣṭe ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:10274: ujjayinyāḥ prasthito māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryodgamanaṃ sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:10281: kaṇḍūñ ity evam ādibhyo yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10283: tatra dhātvadhikārād dhatubhyaḥ eva pratyayo vidhīyate, na tu prātipadikebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10286: āha ca ayam imaṃ dīrghaṃ manye dhatur vibhāṣitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10330: pana ca ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āya-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10336: stuty-arthena paninā sāhacaryāt tadarthaḥ paṇiḥ pratyayam utpādayati na vyavahāra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10339: anubandhaś ca kevale carita-arthaḥ, tena āya-pratyaya-antānn ātmanepadaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:10344: ṛtiḥ sautro dhatuḥ dhṛṇāyāṃ vartate, tataḥ īyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10347: īyaṅ-vacanaṃ jñāpana-arthaṃ, dhātu-vihitānāṃ pratyayānām āyanādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:10358: ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye ārdhadhātuka-vivakṣāyām āyādayaḥ pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:10362: nityaṃ pratyayaprasaṅge tad utpattir ārdhadhātuka-viṣaye vikalpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:10372: pratyaya-grahaṇa-paribhāṣā+eva pada-sañjñāyām antavacanena liṅgena pratiṣiddhā satī punar iha antavacanena pratiprasūyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10380: tasmin luṭi ca parato dhātor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ syatāsī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10390: dhātoḥ sip pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ leti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10401: tataḥ pratyayāntebhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ ām pratyayo bhavati liṭi parato 'mantra-viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:10415: ij-ādir yo dhātur gurumān ṛcchati-varjitaḥ, tasmāc ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10424: anṛcchaḥ iti kim ? ānarccha, ānarcchatuḥ, ānarcchauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10427: atha vā -- vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅ-prasiddhiḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:10432: daya dānagati-rakṣaṇeṣu, aya gatau, āsa upaveṣane, etebhyaś ca liṭi parata ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10439: uṣa dāhe, vida jñāne, jagṛ nidrākṣaye, etebhyo liṭi parato 'nyatarasyām ām pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10451: etebhyo liṭi parataḥ ām pratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām,
GS24jvkasipu:10453: kiṃ punas tat ? dvitvam ittvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10461: ām-pratyayasya paścāt kṛñ anuprayujyate liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10462: kṛñ iti pratyāhāreṇa kṛbhvastayo gṛhyante, tat sāmarthyād aster bhūbhāvaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10472: vider loṭi ām pratyayaḥ, guṇābhāvaḥ, loṭo luk, kṛñaś ca loṭparasya anuprayogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10476: kiṃ tarhi sarvāṇy eva loḍ-vacanāny anuprayujyante,
GS24jvkasipu:10485: abhyutsādayām ity evam ādayaḥ chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:10486: sadijaniramīṇāṃ ṇyantānāṃ luḍi ām pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10487: cinoter api tatra+eva+aampratyayo dvirvacanaṃ kutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10488: akar iti caturbhir api pratyekam anuprayogaḥ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10489: pāvayām kriyāt iti pavateḥ punāter vā ṇyantasya liṅi ām nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:10492: vidām-akran iti vider luṅi ām nipātyate, gunabhāvaś ca, akran iti ca asya anuprayogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10508: dhātoḥ cliḥ pratyayo bhavati luḍi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10519: āgamān udāttatvaṃ hi pratyaya-svaram iva citsvaram api badheta iti sthāninyādeśe ca dviś cakāro 'nubadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10530: śalanto yo dhātur ig-upadhas tasmāt parasya cleḥ aniṭaḥ kṣa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10541: śliṣeḥ dhātoḥ āliṅgana-kriyāvacanāt parasya cleḥ kṣaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10550: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ kṣa-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10551: asmin pratiṣiddhe irito vā (*3,1.45) iti aṅsicau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10558: śri dru sru ity etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ caṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartavācini luṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10559: ṅakāro guṇa-vṛddhi-pratiṣedha-arthaḥ, cakāraḥ caṅi (*6,1.11) iti viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10565: kartari iti kim ? akārayiṣātāṃ kaṭau devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:10567: āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā (*3,1.31) iti yadā ṇiṅ na asti tadaa+etat upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:10576: dheṭ pāne, ṭuośvi gati-vṛddhyoḥ, etābhyām uttarasya cler vibhāṣā caṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10586: kartari ity eva, adhiṣātāṃ gavau vatsena //
GS24jvkasipu:10591: gupeḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā caṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10592: yatra āya-pratyayo nāsti tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10595: bhāśāyāṃ tu caṅantaṃ varjayitvā śiṣṭaṃ rūpatrayaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:10603: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ṇyantebhyaḥ pūrveṇa cleścaṅi prāpte chandasi viṣaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10618: ebhyaḥ parasya cler aṅ-ādeśo bhavati kartṛ-vācini lugi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10619: asyateḥ puṣādipāṭhādevāṅi siddhe punar grahaṇam ātmanepada-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:10623: kartari iti kim ? paryāsiṣātāṃ gāvau vatsena //
GS24jvkasipu:10627: lipa upadehe ṣica kṣarane, hveñ spardhāyām, etebhyaś ca parasya cleḥ aṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10636: lipi-sici-hva ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:10645: dyutādibhyaś ca dhātubhyaḥ parasya cleḥ parasmaipadeṣu parataḥ aṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10657: sṛ gatau, śāsu anuśiṣṭau ṛ gatau ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10663: cakāraḥ parasmaipadeṣu ity anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ taccottaratropayogaṃ yāsyati //
GS24jvkasipu:10667: irito dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ aṅ-ādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10685: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ parasya cler vā aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10694: glucu-glujcvor anyataropādāne 'pi rūpatrayaṃ sidhyati, arthabhidāt tu dvayor upādānaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:10695: kecit tu varnayanti dvayor upādāna-sāmarthyād gluñcer anunāsikalopo na bhavati, agluñcat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:10699: kṛ mṛ dṛ ity etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10713: pada gatau, asmād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeso bhavati taśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10729: etebhyaḥ parasya cleḥ taśabde parato 'nyatarasyāṃ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10739: ajantād dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ta-śabde parataḥ ciṇādeṣo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10741: akāri kaṭaḥ svayam eva, akṛta kaṭaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10742: alāvi kedāraḥ svayam eva, alaviṣṭa kedāraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10743: acaḥ iti kim ? abhedi kāṣṭhaṃ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10744: karmakartari iti kim ? akāri kaṭo devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:10748: duha prapūraṇe, asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:10749: adohi gauḥ svayam eva, agugdha gauḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:10754: rudhir āvaraṇe, asmāt parasya cleḥ karmakrtari ciṇ-ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10756: karmakartari ity eva, anvavārodhi gauḥ gopālakena //
GS24jvkasipu:10761: tapa santāpe, asmāt parasya cleḥ ciṇādeśo na bhavati karmakartari anutāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10763: tasya grahaṇam karmakartrarthaṃ, tatra hi bhāvakarmaṇor api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10770: dhātoḥ parasya cleḥ ciṇ-ādeśo bhavati bhāve karmaṇi ta-śabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10772: karmaṇi khalv api -- akāri kaṭo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:10778: bhāvakarma-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhatoḥ yak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10791: kartṛ-vācini sārvadhātuke parato dhātoḥ śap pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10799: div ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śyan partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10832: tasmān nityaṃ śyani prāpte 'nupasargād vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10842: sampūrvāc ca yaseḥ vā śyan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10847: ṣūñ abhiṣave, ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnupratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10854: śruvaḥ śnu-pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena śruvaḥ śṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10866: takṣū tvakṣū tanū-karaṇe, asmāt tanūkaraṇe vartamānāt anatarasyāṃ śnu-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10873: tuda vyathane ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10881: rudhir āvaraṇe ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ śnam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10891: tanu vistāre ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kṛñaś ca u-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10897: tanādi-pāṭhād eva u-pratyaye siddhe karoter upādānaṃ niyama-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:10900: iti vibhāṣā sico lug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10913: ato lopasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:10917: ḍukrīñ dravyavinimaye ity evam ādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10925: ādyāś catvāro dhātavaḥ sautrāḥ, skuñ āpravaṇe, etebhyaḥ śnā pratyayo bhavati, śnuḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10931: udittva-pratijñānāt sautrāṇām api dhātūnāṃ sarvārthatvaṃ vijñāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:10936: hala uttarasya śnā-pratyayasya śanaj-ādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:10942: itarathā hi pratyaya-antaram eva sarvaviṣayaṃ vijñāyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:10947: chandasi viṣaye śnaḥ śāyac ādeśo bhavati, śānaj api /
GS24jvkasipu:10949: śānacaḥ khalv api - badhāna deva savitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:10953: yathāyathaṃ vikaraṇāḥ śabādayo vihitāḥ, teṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ vyatyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10955: viṣayāntare vidhānam, kvacid dvivikaraṇatā, kvacit trivikaraṇatā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:10966: vyatyayamicchati śāstrakṛdeṣāṃ so 'pi ca sidhyati bahulakena //
GS24jvkasipu:10970: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ tasmin parataḥ chandasi viṣaye aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10987: karmaṇi kriyā karma, karmasthayā kriyayā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10988: yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte 'pi tadvat kriyā lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi, sa kartā karmavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10990: kartari śap (*3,1.68) iti kartṛ-grahaṇam iha anuvṛttaṃ prathamayā vipariṇamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:10995: vatkaraṇaṃ svāśrayam api yathā syāt, bhidyate kusūlena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:10998: tatra lānuvṛtter lāntasya kartā karmavad bhavati iti kusūlād dvitīyā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:10999: karmaṇā iti kim ? karaṇa-adhikaraṇa-abhyāṃ tulyakriyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:11003: iha na bhavati, pacaty odanaṃ devadattaḥ, rādhyanty odanaṃ svayam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11006: karmasthaḥ pacater bhāvaḥ karmasthā ca bhideḥ kriyā /
GS24jvkasipu:11007: māsāsibhāvaḥ kartṛsthaḥ kartṛsthā ca gameḥ kriyā //
GS24jvkasipu:11011: tapa santāpe, asya kartā karmavadbhāvati, sa ca tapaḥ-karmakasya+eva na anyakarmakasya /
GS24jvkasipu:11020: tapaḥkarmakasya+eva iti kim ? uttapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11024: duha sanu nam it yeteṣaṃ karmakartari yak-ciṇau karmavadbhāva-apadiṣṭau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11026: ciṇ tu duhaś ca (*3,1.63) iti pūrvam eva vibhāṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11055: āvadhiṣṭa mānavakaḥ svayam eva, āhata iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:11059: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca || PS_3,1.90 ||
GS24jvkasipu:11063: anayor dhātvoḥ karmakartari prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena śyan pratyayo bhavati, parasmaipadaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11071: tena liṭ-liṅoḥ syādi-viṣaye ca na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11084: ātṛtīyādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo dhātoḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11089: kṛdupapada-sajña-arthaṃ tarhi, asmin dhātv-adhikāre te yathā syātāṃ, pūrvatra mā bhūtām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11091: dhātoḥ ity evaṃ vihitasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11092: iha mā bhūt, lūbhyām, lūbhiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11096: tatra+etasmin dhātv-adhikāre tṛtīye yat saptamī-nirdiṣṭaṃ tad upapada-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11100: itarathā hi saptamī śrūyate yatra tatra+eva syāt, stamberamaḥ, karṇejapaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11101: yatra vā saptamī-śrutir asti saptamyāṃ janer ḍaḥ (*3,2.97) iti, upasarajaḥ, mandurajaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11104: paṣya kumbhaṃ, karoti kaṭam iti pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11105: upapada-pradeśāḥ - upapadam atiṅ (*2,2.19) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11110: asmin dhātv-adhikāre tiṅ-varjitaḥ pratyayaḥ kṛt-sajñako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11115: kṛtpradeśāḥ -- kṛt-taddhita-samāsaś ca (*1,2.46) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11119: asmin dhātv-adhikāre 'smānarūpaḥ pratyayo 'pavādo vā bādhako bhavati stryadhikāra-vihita-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:11122: ity apavādaḥ, tad-viṣaye ṇvul-tṛcau (*3,1.133) api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11132: ity apavadaḥ, sa bādhaka eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11138: prāg etasmāṇ ṇvulsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ, kṛtya-sañjakaste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11141: , kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā (*2,3.71) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11146: dhātoḥ tavyat, tavya, anīyar ity ete prayayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11167: aj-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā halantāṇ ṇyataṃ vakṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:11168: ajantabhūta-pūrvād api yathā syāt, ditsyam, dhitsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11179: pavarga-antād dhātoḥ akāropadhāt yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11192: śakḷ śaktau, ṣaha marṣaṇe, anayordhātvoḥ yat prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11202: etebhyaś ca anupasargebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11217: avadya paṇya varyā ity ete śabdā nipātyante garhya paṇitavya anirodha ity eteṣv artheṣu yathā-saṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11218: avadhyam iti nipātyate garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11222: paṇyam iti nipātyate, paṇitavyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11226: varyā iti striyāṃ nipātyate, anirodhaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11235: vaher dhātoḥ karaṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11241: ṛ gatau, asmāṇ ṇyati prāpte svāmi-vaiśyayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ yat pratyayo nipatyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11244: yato 'nāvaḥ (*6,1.213) ity ādy-udāttatve prāpte - svāminyantodāttatvaṃ ca vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11249: upasaryā iti nipātyate kālyā cet prajane bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11256: kālyā prajane iti kim ? upasāryā śaradi madhurā //
GS24jvkasipu:11260: ajaryam iti nipātyate, saṅgataṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11261: jīryateḥ nañpūrvāt saṅgate saṅgamane kartari yat prayayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11271: vader dhātoḥ subantoḥ upapade anupasarge kyap pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11280: bhavater dhātoḥ subante upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11290: supy anupasarge iti vartate, bhāve iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11291: hanter dhātoḥ subanta upapade 'nupasarge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati, takāraś cāntādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11295: ṇyat tu bhāve na bhavty anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11302: eti stu śās vṛ dṛ juṣ ity etebhyaḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11309: kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyab-grahaṇaṃ bādhaka-bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11310: or āvaśyake (*3,1.125) iti ṇyataṃ bādhitvā kyab eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11312: vṛ-grahaṇe vṛño grahaṇam iṣyate, na vṛṅaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11319: katham upeyam ? eḥ etad rūpaṃ, na iṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11324: ṛkāra-upadhāc ca dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati kḷpi-cṛtī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:11326: vṛdhu - vṛdhyam akḷpi-cṛteḥ iti kim ? kalpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:11337: khaner dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati, īkāraś ca antādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11340: tatra dvitīya ikāro ye vibhāṣā (*6,4.43) iti āttvabādhanārthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11344: bhṛño dhatoḥ asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye kyap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11347: asañjñāyām iti kim ? bhāryo nāma kṣatriyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11350: sañjñāyāṃ puṃsi dṛṣṭatvān na te bhāryā prasidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:11355: mṛjer dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11362: rājasuya surya mṛṣodya rucya kupya kṛṣṭapacya avyathya ity ete śabdāḥ kyapi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:11363: rājñā sotavyaḥ, rājā vā iha sūyate rājasūyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11364: sūsartibhyāṃ kyap, sarter utvaṃ, subater vā ruḍāgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11366: mṛṣāpūrvasya vadateḥ pakṣe yati prāpte nityaṃ kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11379: bhider ujjheś ca kyap nipātyate nade 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:11388: puṣeḥ sidheś ca adhikaraṇe kyap nipātyate nakṣatre abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:11396: nipūya vinīya jitya ity ete śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ muñja kalka hali ity eteṣu artheṣu vodhyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:11397: vipūrvāt pavater nayateś ca tathā jayater yati prāpte karmaṇi kyab nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11407: prati api ity evaṃ pūrvād graheḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:11416: pade asvairiṇi bāhyāyāṃ pakṣye carthe graher dhātoḥ kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11417: pade tāvat -- pragṛhyaṃ padam, yasya pragṛhya-sañjñā vihitā /
GS24jvkasipu:11433: kṛño vṛṣaś ca vibhāṣā kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11434: karoter ṇyati prāpte varṣateḥ ṛdupadhatvāt nitye kyapi prāpte vibhāṣārbhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11440: yugyam iti nipātyate patraṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11451: tasminn upapade vaser dhātoḥ kāle 'dhikaraṇe ṇyat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:11453: saha vasato 'smin kāle sūryācandramasau iti amāvāsya, amāvasyā /
GS24jvkasipu:11455: ity atra amāvasyā-śabdasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11457: tathaikavṛttitā tayoḥ svaraś ca me prasidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:11462: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:11463: niṣṭarkyaḥ iti kṛtī chedane ity asmān nispūrvāt kyapi prāpte ṇyat,
GS24jvkasipu:11467: devaśabde upapade hvayater juhoter vā kyap, dīrghastugabhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11475: mṛṅ prāṇatyāge, stṛñ ācchandane, dhvṛ hūrcchane, etebhyo yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11493: bhavateḥ stauteś ca ṇyat, āvadeśaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11501: niṣṭarkye vyatyayaṃ vidyān nisaḥ ṣatvaṃ nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11503: ṇyadekasmāc caturghyaḥ kyap caturbhyaś ca yato vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11504: ṇyadekasmād ya-śabdaś ca dvau kyapau ṇyadvidhiś catuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11509: ṛvarṇa-antād dhātor halantāc ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11518: uvarṇa-antād dhātoḥ ṇyat prayayo bhavati āvaśyake dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:11523: āvaśyake dyotye iti vet, svarasamāsa-anupapattiḥ, avaśyalāvyam, avaśyapāvyam iti ? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11530: āṅ-pūrvāt sunoteḥ yu vapi rapi lapi trapi cama ity etebhyaś ca ṇyat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11549: yaśca gārhapatyād ānīyate dakṣiṇāgnir āhavanīyena saha ekayoniḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:11552: tasya hi yonir vikalpyate vaiśyakulād vittavato bhrāṣṭrādvā gārhapatyād vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11553: ānāyyo 'nitya iti ced dakṣiṇāgnau kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:11554: ekayonau tu taṃ vidyād āneyo hy anyathā bhavet //
GS24jvkasipu:11564: jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma brūyāt praṇāyyāntevāsine,
GS24jvkasipu:11567: tad abhāvena niṣkāmatayā asammatir antevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11568: tasmai niṣkāmāya mokṣa-arthaṃ yatamānāyāntevāsine praṇāyyāya brahma brūyāt iti yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:11572: pāyyādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante yathā-saṅkhyaṃ māne haviṣi nivāse sāmidhenyāṃ ca abhidheyāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:11573: pāyya iti māṅo ṇyat-pratyayaḥ, ādeḥ patvaṃ ca nipātyate māne /
GS24jvkasipu:11583: tatra ca dhāyyā iti na sarvā sāmidhenī ucyate, kiṃ tarhi, kācid eva /
GS24jvkasipu:11585: tathā ca asāmidhenyām api dṛśyate, dhāyyāḥ śaṃsatyagnirnetā taṃ somakratubhiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11590: kuṇḍapāyya sañcāyya ity etau śabdau nipātyete kratāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:11591: kuṇḍa-śabde tṛtīyānta upapade pibater dhātor adhikaraṇe yat pratyayo nipātyate yuk ca /
GS24jvkasipu:11592: kuṇḍena pīyate 'smin somaḥ iti kuṇḍapāyyaḥ kratuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:11601: paricāyya upacāyya samūhya ity ete śabdā nipātyante agnāv abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:11602: paripūrvat upapūrvāc ca cinoter ṇya dāyādeśau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:11605: sampūrvād vaheḥ samprasāraṇaṃ dīrghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:11629: cakāraḥ sāmānya-grahaṇā-vidhāta-arthaḥ, tuś chandasi (*5,3.59), tur iṣṭha-īmeyassu (*6,4.154) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:11634: tribhyo gaṇebhyaḥ trayaḥ pratyayāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:11636: nandi-graha-pacādayaś ca na dhātu-pāṭhataḥ sanniviṣṭā gṛhyante,
GS24jvkasipu:11638: nandana ramaṇa ity evam ādiṣu prātipadika-gaṇeṣu apoddhṛtya prakṛtayo nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:11751: ig-upadhebhyaḥ jānāteḥ prīṇāteḥ kirateś ca kapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11763: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarga upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11772: pādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ upasarge upapade śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11811: dāño dhāñaś ca vibhāṣā śa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11820: jvala dīptau ity evam ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ kasa gatau ity evam antebhyo vibhāṣā ṇa-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11831: anupasargāt iti, vibhāṣā iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:11834: vyadha āsrau saṃsrau atīṇ avasā avahṛ liha śliṣa śvasa ity etebhyaś ca ṇa pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11835: ākāra-antatvād eva śyāyateḥ pratyatye siddhe punar vacanaṃ bādhakabādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:11853: dunoter nayateś ca anupasarge ṇa-pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:11872: graher dhātoḥ ka-pratyayo bhavati gehe kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11880: dhātoḥ ṣvun pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11893: gāyateḥ thakan pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11899: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11906: gāyateḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati śilpiti kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:11912: pru sṛ lū ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ samabhihāre vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11917: sādhukāriṇi vun vidhānāt sakṛd api yaḥ suṣṭhu karoti tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11918: bahuśo yo duṣṭaṃ karoti tatra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:11922: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ dhātum ātrāt vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11927: amuṣyāḥ kriyāyaḥ kartā bhavet ity evam āśāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:11928: iti śrījyādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:11935: trividhaṃ karma, nirvartyaṃ, vikāryaṃ, prāpyaṃ ca+iti /
GS24jvkasipu:11936: sarvatra karmaṇi upapade dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11943: grāmaṃ gacchati, ādityaṃ paśyati, himavantaṃ śṛṇoti ity atra na bhavati, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:11957: māṅ māne ity etebhyaś ca karmaṇy-upapade aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:11990: iti uttaraṃ karmaṇi iti ca supi iti ca dvayam apy anuavartate /
GS24jvkasipu:11991: tatra sakarmakeṣu dhātuṣu krmaṇi ity etad upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:11997: tunda-śokayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ parimṛja-apanudoḥ dhātvoḥ kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12015: dadāteḥ jānāteś ca dhātoḥ preṇopasṛṣṭāt karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12024: saṃpūrvāt khyā ity etasmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade kapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12031: gāyateḥ pibateś ca dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade 'nupasarge ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12039: pibateḥ iti kim ? surāṃ pāti iti surāpā /
GS24jvkasipu:12043: yā bāhmaṇī surāpī bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12044: yā brahmaṇī surāpā bhavati naināṃ devāḥ patilokaṃ nayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:12049: harater dhātor anudyamane vartamānāt karmaṇi upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12071: vayasi gamyamāne harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12074: yad udyamanaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ sambhāvyamānaṃ vā vayo gamayati, tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12080: āṅ-pūrvād harateḥ karmaṇy-upapade ac pratyayo bhavati tācchīlye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:12084: puṣpādy-āharane svābhāvikī phalānapekṣā pravṛttir asya ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12085: tācchīoye iti kim ? bhāram āharati iti bhārāhāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12089: arha pūjāyām, asmād dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12098: stamba karṇa ity etayoḥ subantayor upapadayor yathā-saṅkhyaṃ rami-japoḥ dhātvoḥ acpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12100: japeḥ śabda-karmakatvāt karma na sambhavati iti supi ity etad iha abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12110: śamy upapade dhātu-mātrāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye acpratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12114: dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā dhātoḥ iti vartata eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:12115: śami-sañjñāyām iti siddhe dhātu-grahaṇaṃ kṛño hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12123: śeter dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12141: carer dhātor adhikaraṇe subanta upapade ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12151: bhikṣā senā ādāya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu careḥ dhatoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12159: puras agratas agre ity eteṣu upapadeṣu sarteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12166: pūrva-śabde kartṛ-vāciny-upapade sarter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12168: kartari iti kim ? pūrvaṃ deśaṃ sarati iti pūrvasāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12172: karmaṇi upapade karoteḥ dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati hetau tācchīlye ānulomye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:12188: karmaṇi supi iti ca dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:12190: divā-ādiṣu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12192: divā-śabdo adhikaraṇa-vacanaḥ supi ity asya viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12232: karama-śabde upapade karma-vācini karoteḥ ṭapratyayo bhavati bhṛtau gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:12234: karma karoti iti karmakaraḥ bhṛtakaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12239: śabdādiṣu upapadeṣu karoteḥ ṭapratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12254: stamba śakṛt ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12263: dṛti nātha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ harater dhātoḥ paśau kartari in pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12271: phalegrahiḥ ātmambhariḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:12272: phala-śabdasya upapadasya ekārāntatvam inpratyayaś ca graher nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12274: ātma-śabdasya upapadasya mumāgama inpratyayaś ca bhṛño nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12285: etebhyaḥ karmaṇy-upapade chandasi viṣaye inpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12286: brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:12294: ejṛ kampane ity asmāt ṇyantāt karmaṇy-upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12307: nāsikāstanayoḥ karmaṇorupapadayoḥ dhmādheṭordhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12311: nāsikāyāṃ tu dhmaś ca dheṭaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12313: tac ca+etan nāsika-stanayor iti lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnād alpāctarasya apūrvanipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12314: dheṭaḥ ṭitvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12319: nāḍī muṣti ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dhmādheṭoḥ khaśpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12336: rujo bhaṅge, vaha prāpaṇe ity etābhyām utpūrvābhyāṃ kūle karmaṇi upapade khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12342: vaha abhra ity etayoḥ karamṇor upapadayoḥ liher dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12349: parimāṇaṃ prasthādi, tasmin karmaṇy-upapade paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12356: mita nakha ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ paceḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12363: vidhu arus ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tuder dhātoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12369: asūrya lalāṭa ity etayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ dṛśi-tapoḥ dhātvoḥ khaś pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12372: asūrya iti ca asamartha-samāso 'yaṃ, dṛśinā nañaḥ sambandhāt, sūryaṃ na paśyanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12374: evaṃ nāma guptā yad aparihārya-darśanaṃ sūryam api na paśyanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12378: ugrampaśya irammada pāṇindhama ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12381: pāṇayo dhmāyante eṣu iti pāṇindhamāḥ panthānaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12385: priya vaśa ity etayoḥ karamṇoḥ upapadayoḥ vadeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12404: dviṣat-parayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ tāpeḥ chātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12405: tapa dāhe curādiḥ, tapasantāpe bhvādiḥ, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12414: vākśabde karmaṇi upapade yameḥ dhātoḥ khac prayayo bhavati vrate gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:12421: pur sarva ity etayoḥ karamaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dārisahoḥ dhātvoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12429: sarvakūla abhra karīra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12438: megha ṛti bhaya ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu kaṛñaḥ khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12447: kṣema priya madra ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt khac ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12451: vā iti vaktavye punar aṇ-grahanaṃ hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedha-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:12456: āśita-śabde subante upapade bhavater dhātoḥ karaṇe bhāve ca-arthe khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12462: karmaṇi iti supi iti ca prakṛtaṃ sajñāvaśād yathāsambhavaṃ sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12463: bhṛ tṝ vṛ ji dhāri sahi tapi dama ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12472: sajñāyām iti kim ? kuṭumbaṃ bibharti iti kuṭumbabhāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12476: gameḥ dhātoḥ supi upapade sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye khac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12483: anta atyanta adhvan dura pāra sarva ananta ity eteṣu karmasu upapadeṣu gameḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12491: ḍakaraḥ ṭilopārthaḥ, ḍityabhasya apy anubandhakaraṇa-sāmarthyāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12503: apra āha - ḍaprakaraṇe 'nyeṣv api dṛśyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12511: āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ hanter dhātoḥ karmaṇy-upapade ḍaprayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12516: dārāv upapade āṅpūrvād hanteḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12517: antasya ca ṭa kārādeśo bhavati, sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:12520: āṅpūrvāt hanteś cārāv upapade aṇ, antasya vā ṭakārādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12523: karmaṇy-upapade sampūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati, antasya ca vā ṭakāradeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12530: apapūrvāt hanteḥ dhātoḥ kleśa-tamasoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ ḍapratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12538: kumāra śīrṣa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12545: hanteḥ jāyāpatyoḥ karmaṇoḥ uapapadayoḥ lakṣaṇavati kartari ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12547: atha vā lakṣaṇe dyotye ṭak pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12551: amanuṣyakartṛke vartamānād hanteḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12557: iha karmān na bhavati, cauraghāto hastī ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113)
GS24jvkasipu:12562: śaktau gamyamānāyāṃ hasti kapāṭayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ hanteḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12566: śaktau iti kim ? viṣeṇa hastinaṃ hanti hastighātaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12570: pāṇigha tāḍagha ity etau śabdau nipātyete śilpini kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:12571: pāṇi tāḍa ity etayoḥ karmaṇoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhatoḥ ṭak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12573: tasmiṃśca parato hanteḥ ṭilopo ghatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12581: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun || PS_3,2.56 ||
GS24jvkasipu:12583: āḍhyādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu cvy-artheṣu acvyanteṣu karoteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake khyun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12584: cver vikalpena vidhānād dvividhāḥ cvyarthāḥ, cvyantā acvyantā śca /
GS24jvkasipu:12593: cvyartheṣu iti kim ? āḍhyaṃ tailena kurvanti abhyañjayanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12596: nanu ca khyunā mukte lyuṭā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:12597: na ca lyuṭaḥ khyunaś ca viśeṣo 'sti,
GS24jvkasipu:12599: evaṃ tarhi pratiṣedha-sāmarthyāt khyuni asati lyuḍ api na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12605: āḍhyādisu subanteṣu upapadeṣu cvyartheṣu acvyanteṣu bhavater dhātoḥ kartari kārake khiṣṇuc,
GS24jvkasipu:12614: kartari iti kim ? karaṇe mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:12622: spṛśe rdhātor anudake subanta upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12623: nanu sakarmakatvāt spṛśeḥ karmaivopapadaṃ prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12624: kartari iti pūrvasūtrād anuvartate, tat kartṛpracaya-arthaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12625: subantamātre ca+upapade kartṛpacayo labhyate ghṛtaṃ spṛśati ghṛtaspṛk /
GS24jvkasipu:12634: ṛtvigādayaḥ pañca-śabdāḥ kvin-pratyayāntāḥ nipātyante, apare trayo dhātvo nirdiṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:12635: ṛtu-śabda upapade yajer dhatoḥ kvin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12636: ṛtau yajati, ṛtuṃ vā yajati, ṛtuprayukto vā yajati ṛtvik /
GS24jvkasipu:12638: dhṛṣeḥ kvin pratyayaḥ, dvirvacanam, antodāttatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12640: sṛjeḥ karmaṇi kvin, amāgamaḥ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12644: utpūrvāt sniheḥ kvin, upasargānta-lopaḥ, ṣatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12646: añcu yuji kruñca ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12647: nipātanaiḥ saha nirdeśāt atra api kiṃcid alākṣaṇikaṃ kāryam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:12648: añcateḥ subnata-mātra upapade kvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12654: sopapadāt tu satsūdviṣa (*3,2.61) ity ādinā kvip bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12661: tyadādiṣu upapadeṣu dṛśer dhātor anālocane 'rthe vartamānāt kañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt kvin ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12665: kaño ñakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, ṭhak ṭhañ kañ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12666: anālocane iti kim ? taṃ paśyati taddarśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12667: tādṛgādayo hi rūḍhiśabda-prakārāḥ, na+eva atra darśanakriyā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12681: karma-grahaṇaṃ tu spṛśo 'nudake kvin (*3,2.58) ity ataḥ prabhṛti na vyāpriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12682: sadādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subante upapade upasarge 'pi anupasarge 'pi kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12684: anyatra sub-grahaṇe upasarga-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:12686: sū iti dviṣā sāhacaryāt sūteḥ ādādikasya grahaṇaṃ, na suvateḥ taudādikasya /
GS24jvkasipu:12687: yujir yoge, yuja samādhau, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12688: vida jñāne, vida sattāyām, vida vicāraṇe, trayāṇām api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12717: katham atra ṇatvam ? sa eṣāṃ grāmaṇīḥ (*5,2.78)
GS24jvkasipu:12718: iti nipātanāt, nayateḥ pūrvapadāt sajñāyām agaḥ (*8,4.3) iti ṇatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:12722: mo rāji samaḥ kvau (*8,2.35) iti matvam /
GS24jvkasipu:12725: iti sāmānyena vakṣyati, tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12730: bhajer dhātoḥ subanta upapade upasarge 'pi - prabhāk //
GS24jvkasipu:12735: chandasi viṣaye saher dhātoḥ subante upapade ṇvi-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12737: saheḥ sāḍaḥ saḥ (*8,3.56) iti ṣatvam, anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.137) iti dīrghatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:12742: vaher dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye subanta upapade ṇvipratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12749: kavya purīṣa purīṣya ity eteṣu upapadeṣu chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ṇyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12756: havya-śabde upapade chandasi viṣaye vaher dhātoḥ ñyuṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:12758: agniś ca havya-vāhanaḥ anantaḥpādam iti kim ? havyavāḍagnirajaraḥ pitā naḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12763: jana janane, janī pradurbhāve, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12764: tathā ṣaṇu dāne, vana ṣane saṃbhaktau, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:12765: janādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ subanta upapade chandasi viṣaye viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12767: iti, viṣeṣaṇa-arthaś ca viḍvanor anunāsikasyāt (*6,4.41) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12778: ader dhātor ananne supy upapade viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12785: kravya-śabda upapade ader dhātoḥ viṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12789: kathaṃ tarhi kravyādaḥ ? kṛttavikṛtta-śabde upapade aṇ, tasya ca pṛṣodarādipāṭhāt kravyabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12790: kṛttavikṛttapakvamāṃsabhakṣaḥ kravyāda ucyate, āmamāṃsabhakṣaḥ kravyāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12795: duher dhātoḥ supy upapade kap pratyayo bhavati, ghakāraś cāntādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12802: śvetavaha ukthaśas puroḍāś ity etebhyo ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:12805: śveta-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade vaher dhātoḥ karaṇi kārake ṇvin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12807: uktha-śabde karmaṇi karaṇe vā upapade śaṃsater dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati, nalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12808: ukthāni śaṃsati, ukthair vā śaṃsati, ukthaśā yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12809: dāśṛ dāne ity etasya puraḥpūrvasya ḍatvam, karmaṇi ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12819: ave upapade yajeḥ dhātoḥ ṇvin pratyayo bhavati mantre viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:12825: upe upapade yajeḥ chandasi viṣaye vic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12829: vicaḥ citkaraṇaṃ sāmānya-grahaṇa-avighāta-artham ver apṛktasya (*6,1.67) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12830: kim artham idam ucyate, yāvata anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75)
GS24jvkasipu:12831: iti yajer api vic siddha eva ? yajer niyama-artham etat, upayajeḥ chandasya+iva, na bhāṣāyām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:12836: chandsi iti vartate, supi upasarge 'pi iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12837: ākārāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ supi upapde chandsi viṣaye manin kvanip vanip ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:12852: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyo 'nākārāntebhyo manin kyanip vanip ity ete pratyayā dṛśyante, vic ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12867: sarvadhātubhyaḥ sopapadebhyo nirupapadebhyaś ca chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12876: sthā ity etasmād dhātoḥ supi upapade kapratyayo bhavati, kvip ca /
GS24jvkasipu:12877: kimartham idam ucyate, yavatā supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:12878: iti kaḥ siddha eva, anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyate (*3,2.178)
GS24jvkasipu:12880: śami dhātoḥ sañjñāyām (*3,2.14) acaṃ bādhate - śaṃsthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12886: ajāti-vācini subanta upapade tācchīlye gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12890: tāchhīlye iti kim ? uṣṇaṃ bhuṅkte kadācit /
GS24jvkasipu:12891: supi iti vartamāne punaḥ sub-grahaṇam upasarganivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:12903: kartṛ-vācini upamāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇini-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12908: kartari iti kim ? apūpān iva bhakṣayati māṣān /
GS24jvkasipu:12913: vrata iti śāstrato niyama ucyate vrate gamyamāne subanta upapade dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12919: sati śayane sthaṇḍila eva śete na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:12920: sati bhojane 'śrāddham eva bhuṅkte na śrāddham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12921: vrate iti kim ? sthāṇḍile śete devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12927: ābhīkṣṇye gamyamāne dhātoḥ bahulaṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12933: bahula-grahaṇat kulmāṣakhādaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:12938: manyateḥ subante upapade ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12942: uttarasūtre hi khaś-pratyaye vikaraṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:12947: ātmamāne vartamānān manyateḥ supy upapade khaś-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:12949: yadā pratyaya-arthaḥ kartā ātmānam eva darśanīyatvādinā dharmeṇa yuktaṃ manyate, tadā 'yaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:12952: ātmamāne iti kim ? darśanīyamanī devadattasya yajñadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:12956: bhūte ity adhikāro vartamane laṭ (*3,2.123) iti yavat /
GS24jvkasipu:12957: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ bhūte ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:12958: dhātv-adhikārāc ca dhātv-arthe bhūte iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12959: vakṣyati - karaṇe yajaḥ (*3,2.85), agniṣṭomena iṣṭavān agniṣṭomayājī /
GS24jvkasipu:12965: yajater dhātoḥ karaṇe upapade ṇinipratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:12972: karaṇi upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati bhūte kale /
GS24jvkasipu:12981: brahmādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu hanter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:12985: kimartham idam ucyate yāvatā sarvadhātubhyaḥ kvip vihita eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:12988: brahmādiṣv eva hanteḥ, na anyasminnaupapade, puruṣaṃ hatavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12989: brahmādiṣu hanter eva, na anyasmāt syāt, brahma adhītavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:12990: brahmādiṣu hanter bhūtakāle kvip eva na anyaḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:12997: pūrveṇa niyamād aprāptaḥ kvip pratyayaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:12998: chandasi viṣaye upapadantareṣv api hanter bahulaṃ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13008: tad-asambhavāt su-śabdam varjayitvā pariśiṣṭānāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13009: svādiṣu karmasu upapadeṣu karoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13018: dhator aniyatatvād anyasminn upapade api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13025: some karmaṇi upapade sunoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13028: caturvidhaś ca atra niyamaḥ iṣyate, dhātukāla-upapada-pratyaya-viṣayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13034: agnau karmaṇy upapade cinoter dhātoḥ kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13036: atra api pūrvavac caturvidho niyama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13041: karmaṇi upapade cinoteḥ karmaṇy eva kārake kvip pratyayo bhavati agny-ākhyāyāṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:13046: agny-artho hi iṣṭakācaya ucyate śyenacit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13050: karmaṇi upapade vi-pūrvat krīṇāter dhātoḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13051: karmaṇi iti vartamāṇe punaḥ karma-grahaṇaṃ kartuḥ kutsānimitte karmaṇi yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:13060: dṛśeḥ dhātoḥ karmaṇi upapade kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13063: anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75) iti kvanipi siddhe punarvacanaṃ pratyayāntara-nivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:13068: rājan-śabde karmaṇi upapade yudhyateḥ karoteś ca kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13069: nanu ca yudhir akarmakaḥ ? antarbhāvitaṇy-arthaḥ sakarmako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13076: saha-śabde ca+upapade yudhikṛñoḥ dhātvoḥ kvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13083: saptamyanta upapade janer dhatoḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13090: pañcamyanta upapade jātivarjite janer ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13101: upasarge ca upapade janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:13107: anupūrvāt janeḥ karmaṇi upapade ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13115: anyeṣv api upapadeṣu kārakeṣu janeḥ ḍaḥ pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13116: saptamyām ity ukatama saptamyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13119: pañcamyām ajātau (*3,2.98) ity uktaṃ, jātav api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13122: upasarge ca sañjñāyām (*3,2.99) ity uktam, asañjñāyām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13124: anu karmaṇi (*3,2.100) ity uktam, akarmaṇy api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13133: ktaktavatū niṣṭhā (*1,1.26) ity uktaṃ, sa niṣṭha-sañjñakaḥ pratyayo bhūte bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13139: sañjñāyāṃ ktaktavatū bhāvyete, satoścānayoḥ sañjñāyā bhāvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:13142: sa bhūte bhavati, yasyotpannasya niṣṭhā ity eṣā sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13151: sunoter yajateś ca ṅvanip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13165: chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13169: iti sāmānyena liṭ vihita eva ? dhātu-sambandhe sa vidhiḥ, ayaṃ tv aviṣeṣeṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:13180: liḍ-grahaṇaṃ kim, na pūrvasya+eva prakṛtasya ādeśāvidhāne vibhakti-vipariṇāmo bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:13181: liṇmātrasya yathā syāt, yo 'pi parokṣe vihitas tasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:13194: sada vasa śru ity etebhyaḥ parasya liṭo bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vā kvasur ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13214: upeyivān anāśvān anūcāna ity ete śabdā nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13218: ity anekāctvādiṇ na prāpnoti, sa nipātyate, abhyāsasya śravaṇaṃ dhāturūpasya yaṇādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13221: iti pratiṣiddhaḥ, sa punar iṭ pratiprasūyate, tena ajādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13224: na ca atra+upasargās tantram, anyopasarga-pūrvān nirupasargāc ca bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:13231: aśnāter nañpūrvāt kvasur nipatyate, iḍabhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13245: būte 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13256: avidyamānādyatane bhūte 'rthe vartamānād dhātor laṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13259: bahuvrīhi-nirdeśaḥ kim arthaḥ ? adya hyo vā abhukṣmahi iti vyāmiśre mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:13260: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktur darśana-viṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13267: tadvacane upapade bhūtānadyatane lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13269: vacana-grahaṇaṃ paryāya-artham, abhijānāsi, smarasi, budyase, cetayase iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13274: yac-chabda-sahite abhijñā-vacana upapade lṛṭ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13277: vāsamātraṃ smaryate, na tu aparaṃ kiṃcil lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13284: abhijñā-vacane upapade yac-chabda-sahite kevale ca vibhāṣā lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:13287: abhijānasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmas tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:13288: abhijānāsi devadatta magadheṣu vatsyāmaḥ, tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:13289: yadi khalv api - abhijānāsi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, yat tatra udanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:13290: abhijānasi devadatta yat kaśmīreṣv avasāma, yat tatra udanam abhuñjmahi /
GS24jvkasipu:13297: ghūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamanād dhātḥ liṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13298: nanu dhātv-arthaḥ sarvaḥ parokṣa eva ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:13299: asti tu loke dhātv-arthena api kārakeṣu pratyakṣābhimanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13300: sa yatra na asti tat parokṣam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13311: bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe liṭi prāpte hāśvatoḥ upapadayoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl liṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13312: iti ha akarot, iti ha cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:13321: āsanakāle pṛcchyamane bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ laṅ-liṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13329: āsanakāle iti kim ? bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi, jaghāna kaṃsaṃ kila vāsudevaḥ ? //
GS24jvkasipu:13334: sma-śabde upapade bhūtānadyatana-parokṣe laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13341: aparokṣe ca bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ sme upapade laṭ pratyayao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13349: nanu-śabde upapade praśna-pūrvake prativacane bhūte 'rthe laṭ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13351: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? nanu karomi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13352: avocas tatra kiṃcid devadatta ? nanu bravīmi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13353: pṛṣṭa-prativacane iti kim ? nanu akārṣīt māṇavakaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13358: na-śabde nu-śabde ca upapade pṛṣṭa-prativacane vibhaṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati bhūte /
GS24jvkasipu:13359: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? na kromi bhoḥ, nākārṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:13360: ahaṃ nu karomi, ahaṃ nu akārṣam //
GS24jvkasipu:13365: purā-śabde upapade sma-śabda-varjite bhūtānadyatane 'rthe vibhāṣā luṅ pratyayo bhavati, laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13366: tābhyāṃ mukte pakṣe yathā-viṣayamanye 'pi pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:13367: vasanti iha purā chātrāḥ, avātsur iha purā chātrāḥ, avasanniha purā chātrāḥ, ūṣur iha purā chātrāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13368: asme iti kim ? naḍena sam purā adhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:13374: tasmin vartamāne 'rthe vartamanād dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13380: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, aprathamāntena cet tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13386: laṭ iti vartamane punar laṅ-grahaṇam adhikavidhāna-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:13399: kecid vibhāṣā-grahaṇam anuvartayanti na-nvor vibhāṣā (*3,2.121) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13406: sambhodhane ca viṣaye laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13415: l akṣaṇe hetau ca arthe vartamanāda dhātoḥ parasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:13422: kriyāyāḥ iti kim ? dravya-guṇayor mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:13443: pūṅo yajeś ca dhātoḥ śānan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13450: kva saṃniviṣṭānāṃ pratyāhāraḥ ? laṭaḥ śatṛ-śānacāv aprathamā-samānādhikaraṇe (*3,2.124)
GS24jvkasipu:13451: ity ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛno nakārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13470: iṅo dhāreś ca dhātvoḥ śatṛpratyayo bhavati akṛcchriṇi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:13471: akṛcchraḥ sukhasādyo yasay kartur dhātv-arthaḥ so 'kṛcchrī /
GS24jvkasipu:13480: amitre kartari dviṣer dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13482: amitre iti kim ? dveṣṭi bhāryā patim //
GS24jvkasipu:13488: yajñasaṃyukte 'bhiṣave vartamānāt sunoter dhātoḥ śatṛ-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13501: praśaṃsāyām iti kim ? arhati cauro vadham //
GS24jvkasipu:13506: ā etasmāt kvip saṃ-śabdād yānita ūrdhvam-anukramiṣyāmas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13510: tacchīlo yaḥ svabhāvataḥ phala-nirapekṣas tatra pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:13511: taddharmā tadācāraḥ, yaḥ svadharme mamāyamiti pravartate vināpi śīlena /
GS24jvkasipu:13536: tviṣer devatāyām akāraś ca+upadhāyā aniṭtvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:13547: alaṅ-kṛñ-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13564: ṇyantād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13570: bhavater dhatoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu iṣṇuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13579: glā ji sthā ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ, cakārāt bhuvaś ca tacchīlādiṣu kṣnuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13586: kṅiti ca (*1,1.5) ity atra gakāro 'pi cartvabhūto nirdiśyate, tena guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13587: śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) ity atra api gakaro nirdiśyate, tena bhuva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13596: tras-ādibhyo dhatubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu knuḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13605: śamādibhyo dhātubhyo 'ṣṭābhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13606: śama upaśame ity ataḥ prabhṛti madī harṣe ity evam antaḥ śamādir divādyantargaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13624: pṛcī samparke iti rudhādir gṛhyate natvadādir lug-vikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13627: yuja samādhau divādiḥ, yujir yoge rudhādiḥ dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13628: rañja rāge ity asya nipātanād anunāsika-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13663: etebhyo dhātubhyo vi-śabde upapade ghinuṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13672: laṣa kāntau, asmād dhātoḥ apa upapade, cakārād vau ca ghinuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13685: vasaḥ iti vasa nivāse ity asya grahaṇaṃ nācchādana-arthasya, lugvikaraṇatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:13689: ninda-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu vuñ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13704: tācchīlikeṣu vā 'sarūpanyāyena tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:13708: devayateḥ kruśeś ca upasarge upapade vuñ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13718: calana-arthebhyaḥ śabda-arthebhyaś ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13727: anudātted yo dhatuḥ halādir akarmakaḥ, tataś ca yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13739: ju-praghṛtibhyo dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13751: calanārthānāṃ padeś ca grahaṇaṃ sakarmaka-artham iha /
GS24jvkasipu:13752: jñāpana-arthaṃ ca padi-grahaṇam anye varṇayanti, tācchīlikeṣu mitho vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13753: tena alaṅkṛñaḥ tṛn na bhavati alaṅkartā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:13754: tathā hi paderukañā viśeṣa-vihitena sāmānya-vihitasya yuco 'sarūpatvāt samāveśo bhavedeva,
GS24jvkasipu:13758: kvacit samāveśa iṣyata eva, gantā kheṭaṃ vikatthanaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:13762: krudhakope, maḍi bhūṣāyām ity etad arthebhyaḥ ca dhatubhyo yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13770: yakārāntāt dhatoḥ yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13777: sūda dīpa dīkṣa ity etebhyaś ca yuc pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13782: nanu ca dīper viśeṣa-vihito ra-pratyayaḥ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:13784: iti, sa eva vādhako bhaviṣyati, kiṃ pratiṣedhena ? vā 'sarūpeṇa yuj api prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:13785: tācchīlikeṣu ca vā+asarūpa-vidhir na asti iti prāyikam etad ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:13786: tathā ca samāveśo dṛśyate, kamrā yuvatiḥ, kamanā yuvatiḥ, iti yoga-vibhāgād vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13793: laṣa-ādibhyo dhātubhaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13807: jalpa-ādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ṣākan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13818: pra-pūrvāj javateḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13825: kṣi kṣaye, kṣi nivāsagatyoḥ iti dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13826: prasū iti ṣū preraṇe ity asay grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13827: jiprabhṛtibhyo dhātubhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13841: spṛha īpsāyām, graha grahane, pata gatau, curādau adantāḥ paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:13843: drā kutsāyāṃ gatau, nipūrvas tatpūrvaś ca, tado nakārāntatā ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:13845: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āluc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13859: dā dheṭ si śada sada ity etebhyaḥ ruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13869: sṛ ghasi ada ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kmarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13876: bhañja bhāsa mida ity etebhyo ghurac pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham /
GS24jvkasipu:13884: jñāna-arthasya videḥ grahaṇaṃ na lābhādy-arthasya, svabhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:13885: vidādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kurac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13895: iṇ naś ji sarti ity etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvarap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13916: jāgarteḥ ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13921: yajādīnāṃ yaṅantānām ūkaḥ pratyayo bhavati tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13928: namyādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13935: ajasram iti jasu mokṣaṇe nañpūrvo rapratyayāntaḥ krayāsātatye vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:13939: san iti sanpratyayānto gṛhyate na sanirdhātuḥ, anabhidhānāt vyāptinyāyād vā /
GS24jvkasipu:13940: sannantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ āśaṃser bhikṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu uḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13945: āṅaḥ śasi icchāyām ity asya grahaṇaṃ, na śaṃṣeḥ stuty-arthasya //
GS24jvkasipu:13949: vider num-āgamaḥ, iṣeḥ chatvam ukāraś ca pratyayo nipātyate tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:13956: kya-pratyayāntād dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu ukāra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:13958: na chandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35) iti pratiṣedhād na dhīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13965: ā-kārāntebhyaḥ ṛ-varṇāntebhyaḥ gama hana jana ity etebhyaś ca chandasi viṣaye tacchīlādiṣu ki-kinau pratayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:13969: mā bhūttād api paraḥ taparaḥ iti ṛkāre tatkāla-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:13976: atha kimarthaṃ kittvam, yāvatā asaṃyogāl liṭ kit (*1,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:13978: iti liṭi guṇaḥ pratiṣedha-viṣaya ārabhyate, tasya api bādhana-arthaṃ kittvam /
GS24jvkasipu:13998: svapeḥ tṛṣeś ca tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu nijiṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14008: etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu āruḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14015: ñibhī bhaye, asmād dhātoḥ tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kru-klukanau pratyayu bhavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14027: etebhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14036: yā prāpane, asmād yaṅantāt tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu varac pratyayo havati /
GS24jvkasipu:14041: bhrājādibhyaḥ dhātubhyas tacchīlādiṣu kartṛṣu kvip pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14051: kimartham idam ucyate, yāvatā anyebhyo 'pi dṛśyante (*3,2.75)
GS24jvkasipu:14053: iti kvip siddha eva ? tācchīlikair bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14060: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ tācchīlikeṣu kvip pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14065: kvacid dīrghaḥ, kvacid dvirvacanam, kvacit samprasāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14066: tathā ca āha -- kvibvacipracchāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇāṃ dīrgho 'saṃprasāraṇaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14073: jugrahanena atra na arthaḥ, bhrājādi sūtra eva gṛhītatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14080: dṝ bhye ity asya hrasvaś ca dve ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14087: bhavater dhātoḥ sañjñāyām antare ca gamyamāne kvip pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:14090: dhanikādhamarṇayor antare yas tiṣṭhati sa pratibhūr ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:14095: vi pra sam ity evaṃ pūrvād bhavater dhātoḥ ḍu-pratayo bhavati, na cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14106: dhayater dadhāteś ca karmaṇi kārake ṣṭran pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14108: dhayanti tāṃ dadhati vā bhaiṣajyārtham iti dhātrī /
GS24jvkasipu:14126: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14141: kṅito 'nyasminn api pratyaye nalopaḥ kvacid bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14150: asmād dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ṣṭran pratyayo bhavati, taccet karaṇaṃ hala,sūkarayor avayavo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14165: etebhyo dhātubhyaḥ karaṇe kārake itraḥ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14177: pavater dhatoḥ karaṇe kārake itra-pratyayo bhavati, samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14184: puvaḥ karane kartari ca itra-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14188: devatāyām - agniḥ pavitraṃ sa mā punātu /
GS24jvkasipu:14189: vāyuḥ somaḥ sūrya indraḥ pavitraṃ te mā punantu //
GS24jvkasipu:14195: bhūte niṣṭhā vihitā, vartamane na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14206: etad arthebhyaś ca dhātubhyo vartamāna-arthe kta-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14214: śīlito rakṣitaḥ kṣānta ākruṣṭo juṣṭa ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:14217: kaṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati ity āhur amṛtaḥ pūrvavat samṛtaḥ //2//
GS24jvkasipu:14221: tathā suptaḥ, śayitaḥ, āśitaḥ, liptaḥ, tṛptaḥ ity evam ādayo 'pi vartamāne dṛaṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14222: itiśrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14229: vartamāna ity eva, sañjñāyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14230: uṇādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vartamāne 'rthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahulaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14242: bāhulakaṃ prakṛtes tanudṛṣṭeḥ prāya-samuccayanād api teṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:14243: kāryasaśeṣavidheś ca taduktaṃ naigamarūḍhibhavaṃ hi susādhu //1//
GS24jvkasipu:14244: nāma ca dhātujamāha nirukte vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam /
GS24jvkasipu:14245: yan na padārtha-viśeṣa-samutthaṃ pratyayataḥ prakṛteś ca tad ūhyam //2//
GS24jvkasipu:14246: sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāś ca tataḥ pare /
GS24jvkasipu:14247: kāryād vidyād anubandham etac chāstram uṇādiṣu //3//
GS24jvkasipu:14260: bhaviṣyati kāle gamyādayaḥ śabdāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14278: yāvat-purā-śabdayor nipātayor upapadayoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātor laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14281: nipātayoḥ iti kim ? yāvad dāsyati tāvad bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14287: kadā karhi ity etayoḥ upapadayor vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14288: kadā bhuṅkte, kadā bhokṣyate, kadā bhoktā /
GS24jvkasipu:14289: karhi bhuṅkte, karhi bhokṣyate, karhi bhokṭā //
GS24jvkasipu:14297: kiṃvṛtte upapade lipsāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14299: kaṃ bhavanto bhojayanti, kaṃ bhavanto bhojayitāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14300: labdhukāmaḥ pṛcchati kataro bhikṣāṃ dāsyati, dadāti, dātā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:14301: katamo bhikṣāṃ dāsyati, dadāti, dātā vā /
GS24jvkasipu:14302: lipsāyām iti kim ? kaḥ pāṭaliputraṃ gamiṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:14308: lipsyamāna-siddhau gamyamānāyāṃ bhaviṣyati kāle dhātoḥ vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14310: yo bhaktaṃ dadāti sa svargaṃ gacchati,
GS24jvkasipu:14311: yo bhaktaṃ dāsyati sa svargaṃ gamiṣyati,
GS24jvkasipu:14312: yo bhaktaṃ dāta sa svargaṃ gantā /
GS24jvkasipu:14317: loḍ-arthaḥ praiṣādir lakṣyate yena sa loḍ-arthalakṣaṇo dhātv-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14318: tatra vartamānād dhātoḥ bhaviṣyati kāle vibhāṣā laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14328: bhaviṣyati, vibhāṣā, loḍ-arthalakṣaṇe iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:14329: ūrdhva-mauhūrtike bhaviṣyati kāle loḍ-arthalakṣaṇa-arthe vartamānāt dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ-pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14333: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt upari muhūrtasya upādhyāyaś ced āgacchet,
GS24jvkasipu:14344: kriya-arthāyāṃ kriyāyām upapade dhātor bhavisyati kale tumun-ṇvulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14348: kriyāyām iti kim ? bhikṣiṣya ity asya jaṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14349: kriya-arthāyām iti kim ? dhāvataste patiṣyati daṇḍaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14350: atha kimarthaṃ ṇvul vidhīyate yāvatā ṇvul-tṛcau (*3,1.133)
GS24jvkasipu:14351: iti sāmānyena vihita eva so 'sminn api viṣaye bhavisyati ? lṛṭā kriyārtha-upapadena bādhyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:14353: evaṃ tarhi etad jñāpyate, kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ vā 'sarūpeṇa tṛjādayo na bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14354: tena kartā vrajati, vikṣipo vrajati ity evam ādi nivartyate //
GS24jvkasipu:14360: iti prakṛtya ye ghañ-ādayo vihitās te ca bhāva-vacanāḥ bhavisyati kāle kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyāṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:14361: kimartham idaṃ yāvatā vihitā eva te ? kriyartha-upapade vihitena asmin viṣaye tumunā bādhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:14362: vā 'sarūpa-vidhiś ca atra na asti ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:14363: atha vacana-grahaṇaṃ kimartham ? vācakā yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14365: yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyo yena viśeṣaṇena vihitā yadi tābhyas tathā+eva bhavanti, nāsāmañjasyena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14374: dhātoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhaviṣyati kāle karmaṇy upapade kriyāyāṃ ca kriyārthāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:14376: iti sāmānyena vihito vā 'sarūpa-vidher abhāvād ṇvulā bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:14388: śeṣe śuddhe bhaviṣyati kāle, cakārāt kriyāyāṃ ca upapade kriyārthāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14397: lṛṭaḥ sthāne satsañjñau śatṛśānacau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14399: tena yathā laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau tathā asya api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14414: bhaviṣyadanadyatane 'rthe vartamānād dhatoḥ luṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14422: iyaṃ nu kadā gantā, yā evaṃ pādau nidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:14423: ayaṃ nu kadā 'dhyetā, ya evam anabhiyuktaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14428: ita uttaraṃ triṣv api kāleṣu pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14441: sarteḥ dhātoḥ sthire kartari ghañ pratayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14443: sa ciraṃ tiṣṭhan kālantaraṃ sarati iti dhātv-arthasya kartā yujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14456: bhāve vācye dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14461: tena artha-nirdeśaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ sarvadhātu-viṣayaḥ kṛto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14463: yastasya siddhatā nāma dharmaḥ tatra ghañ-ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14464: puṃliṅga-ekavacanaṃ ca atra na tantraṃ, liṅgāntare vacanāntare 'pi ca atra pratyayā bhavanty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:14469: kartṛ-varjite kārake sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14481: tat kriyate prasajya-pratiṣedhe 'pi samāso 'sti iti jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:14483: ita uttaraṃ bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti dvayam anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:14487: parimāṇa-ākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ sarvebhyo dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14493: purastād apavāda-nyāyena hy acam eva bādheta, na apam /
GS24jvkasipu:14496: tena saṅkhyā 'pi gṛhyate, na prasthādy eva /
GS24jvkasipu:14497: ghañ-anukramaṇam ajapor viṣaye, strī-pratyayās tu na bādhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:14511: apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānaṃ tadantāc ca vā ṅīṣ /
GS24jvkasipu:14521: upasarge upapade rauter dhātor ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14529: sami upapade yu dru du ity etebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14537: śri ṇī bhū ity etebhyo dhātubhyo 'nupasargebhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14545: kathaṃ prabhāvo rājñāḥ ? prakṛṣṭo bhāvaḥ iti prādisamāso bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:14546: kathaṃ ca nayo rājñaḥ ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti ac bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:14550: vāv-upapade kṣu śru ity etābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14559: ava ut ity etayor upapadayoḥ nayater dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14562: katham unnayaḥ padārthānām ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti ac bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:14567: pra-śabde upapade dru stu sru ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14580: nirabhipūrvayoḥ pū-lvor dhātvoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14588: gṝ śabde, gṝ nigaraṇe, dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:14589: unnyor upapadayoḥ gṝ ity etasmād dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14597: kṝ ity etasmād dhātor unnyoḥ upapadayoḥ ghañ pratayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14599: vikṣepa-arthasya kirater grahaṇaṃ, na hiṃsa-arthasya, anabhidhānāt utkāro dhānyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:14606: yajña-viṣaye prayoge sampūrvāt stauter ghañ partyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14608: sametya stuvanti yasmin deśe chandogāḥ sa deśaḥ saṃstāvaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14614: asmād dhātoḥ pra-śabde upapade ghañ pratyayo bhavati na ced yajña-viṣayaḥ prayogo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14622: asmād dhātoḥ vi-śabde upapade ghañ patyayo bhavati prathane gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:14623: tac cet prathanaṃ śabda-viṣayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14632: vipūrvāt stṛnāteḥ chandonāmni ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14633: vṛttam atra chando gṛhyate yasya gāyatryādayo viśeṣāḥ, na mantrabrahmaṇam , nāma-grahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14642: udi upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14647: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:14652: sami upapade graher dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati, muṣṭiviṣayaś ced dhātvartho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14661: pari-śabde ni-śabde ca upapade yathāsaṅkhyaṃ niyaḥ iṇaś ca dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14663: dyūtābhreṣayoḥ, atra api yathāsaṅkhyam eva sambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14664: dyūta-viṣayaḥ cen nayater arthaḥ, abhreṣa-viṣayaś ced iṇ-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14675: pari-śabde upapade iṇo dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, anupatyaye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14684: vi upa ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ śeter dhātoḥ ghañ bhavati paryāye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14688: tava rājānam upaśayituṃ paryāyaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14694: hastādāne gamyamāne cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, na cet steyaṃ cauryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14698: hastādane iti kim ? vṛkṣaśikhare phalapracayaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:14709: eteṣv artheṣu cinoteḥ ghañ pratyayaḥ bhavati, dhātor ādeś ca kakāra ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14715: iha kasmān na bhavati mahān kāṣṭhanicayaḥ ? bahutvam atra vivakṣitaṃ na+upasamādhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:14724: saṅghe vācye cinoter dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ādeś ca kaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14738: karma-vyatihāre gamyamāne dhātoḥ ṇac patyayo bhavati strīliṅge vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:14740: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14749: tad etad vaicitryaṃ kathaṃ labhyate ? kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:14754: abhividhau gamyamāne dhātoḥ bhave inuṇ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14761: bhāve iti vartamane punar bhāva-grahaṇaṃ vāsarūpanirāsa-artham, tena ghañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14768: dṛṣṭa-anuvṛtti-sāmarthyād ghañ anuvartate, na anantara inuṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:14769: ava ni ity etayoḥ uapadayoḥ graher dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:14779: pra-śabde upapade graher dhāto ghañ pratyayo bhavati lipsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:14786: pari-śabde upapade graheḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati, yajñaviṣayaś cet pratyayānta-abhidheyaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:14795: ni-śabde upapade vṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ dhānya-viśeṣe 'bhidheye ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14802: uc-chabde upapade śrayaty-ādibhyo ghañ pratayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14813: āṅi upapade rauteḥ plavateś ca vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14820: ave upapade graheḥ dhātoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati vibhāṣā varṣapratibandhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:14821: praptakālasya varṣasya kutaścin nimittād abhāvo varṣapratibandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14829: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14831: vaṇik-sambandhena ca tulāsūtraṃ lakṣyate, na tu vaṇijas tantram /
GS24jvkasipu:14832: tulā pragṛhyate yena sūtreṇa sa śabda-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:14833: tulāpragrāheṇa carati, tulāpragraheṇa carati vaṇiganyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:14839: pra-śabde upapade graher dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14841: rathādiyuktānām aśvādīnāṃ saṃyamana-arthā rajjū raśmir iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:14848: praśabde upapade vṛṇoteḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:14856: pariśabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ vibhāṣā ghañ pratyayo bhavati avajñāne gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14859: avajñāne iti kim ? sarvataḥ bhavanaṃ paribhavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:14863: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti prakṛtam anuvartate yāvat kṛtya-lyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:14864: i-varṇāntād dhātoḥ bhāve, akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14881: ṝ-kārāntebhyaḥ u-varṇāntebhyaḥ ca ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14918: upasarge upapade ader dhātoḥ ap prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14925: ni-śabde upapade adeḥ dhātoḥ ṇa-pratyayo bhavati, cakārād ap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:14930: vyadha japa ity etayoḥ anupasargayoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14941: svana-hasoḥ anupasargayor vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14950: sam upa ni vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu anupasarge 'pi yamer vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14961: ni-śabde upapade gada nada paṭha svana ity etebhyaḥ dhatubhyaḥ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14971: kvaṇateḥ dhātoḥ nipūrvād anupasargāc ca vīṇāyāṃ vā ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:14981: paṇa vyavahāre stutau ca, asmād dhātor nityam ap pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:14985: saṃvyavahārāya mūlakādīnāṃ yaḥ parimito muṣṭir badhyate, tasya+idam abhidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:14990: madeḥ dhātoḥ anupasargāt ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15001: pramada sammada ity etau śabdau nipātyete harṣe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15011: samudor upapadayoḥ ajaer dhātoḥ paśu-viṣaye dhātv-arthe ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15014: sa sampūrvaḥ samudāye vartate, utpūrvaś ca preraṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:15024: glahaḥ iti nipātyate, akṣa-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15025: graher ap siddha eva, latva-arthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:15034: sarteḥ dhātoḥ prajane viṣaye ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15039: strīgavīṣu puṃgavānām garbhādhānāya prathamam upasaraṇam ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15043: ni abhi upa vi ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hvayateḥ dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaḥ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15053: āṅi upapade hvayater dhātoḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati yuddhe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15062: vṛddhiś ca nipātyate nipānaṃ ced abhidheyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15063: nipibanty asminn iti nipānam udakādhāra ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15065: kūpopasareṣu ya udakādhāras tatra hi pānāya paśava āhūyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15070: anupargasya hvayateḥ samprasāraṇam ap pratyayaś ca bhavati bhāve abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15074: bhāva-grahaṇam akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām (*3,3.19) ity asya nirāsa-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:15079: hanter dhātoḥ anupasarge bhāve ap pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca bhadhādeśaḥ, sa cāntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15087: ap ca, yaś ca aparaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:15095: mūrtau abhidheyāyāṃ hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati, ghanaś cādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15098: kathaṃ ghanaṃ dadhi iti ? dharma-śabdena dharmī bhaṇyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15102: antaḥ pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayo bhavati, ghanādeśaś ca bhavati deśe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15105: anye ṇakāraṃ paṭhanti antarghaṇo deśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15112: pra-pūrvasya hanteḥ praghaṇaḥ praghāṇaḥ ity etau śabdau nipātyete agāraikadeśe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:15119: ut-pūrvāt hanteḥ udghanaḥ iti nipātyate 'tyādhānaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15121: yasmin kāṣṭhe sthāpayitvā anyāni kāṣṭhāni takṣyante tad abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15126: apa-pūrvasya hanteḥ apaghanaḥ iti nipātyate, aṅgaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15129: kiṃ tarhi ? pāṇiḥ pādaś ca abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15135: ayas vi dru ity eteṣu upapadeṣu hanteḥ dhātoḥ karaṇe kārake ap pratyayo bhavati, ghanādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:15146: stamba-śabde upapade karaṇe kārake hanteḥ kaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15155: pari-śabde upapade anter dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bahvati karaṇe kārake, gha-śabdaś cādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15161: upa-pūrvāt hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ upadhā-lopaś ca nipātyate āśraye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:15165: āśraye iti kim ? parvatopaghāta eva anyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:15170: samudoḥ upapadayoḥ hanteḥ dhātoḥ ap pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15180: nighaḥ iti ni-pūrvād hanteḥ ap pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:15191: ḍu it yasya tasmād ḍvito dhātoḥ ktriḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15192: trermam nityam (*4,4.20) iti vacanāt kevalo na prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15199: ṭu it yasya, tasmāt ṭvito dhātoḥ athuc pratyayo bhavati bhāvādau /
GS24jvkasipu:15206: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15215: praccheḥ asamprasāraṇaṃ jñāpakāt praśne ca āsanna-kāle (*3,2.117) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15226: bhāve akartari ca kārake iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15227: upasarge upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15236: karmaṇy upapade ghu-sañjñakebhyo dhātubhyaḥ kiḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikaraṇe kārake /
GS24jvkasipu:15244: bhāve akartari ca kārake ti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15245: strīliṅge bhāvādau dhātoḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15267: ṝkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:15286: sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ strīliṅge bhāve ktin pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15292: iti jñāpakāt nātyantāya bādhā bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:15297: mantre viṣaye vṛṣādibhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ktin pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15308: sarvatra sarvadhātubhyaḥ sāmānyena vihita eva ktin /
GS24jvkasipu:15310: iṣestu icchā (*3,3.101) iti nipātanaṃ vakṣyati, tataḥ ktinn api vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15318: avateḥ jvara-tvara-srivy-avi-mavām upadhāyāś ca (*6,4.20) iti ūṭḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15324: syateḥ itvābhāvo nipātyate, sanoter vā jana-sana-khanāṃ sañjñāloḥ (*6,4.42)
GS24jvkasipu:15332: vraja-yajoḥ dhātvoḥ strī-liṅge bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15342: samajādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ striyāṃ kyap pratyayo bhavati udāttaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:15353: kathaṃ taduktam striyāṃ bhāvādhikāro 'sti tena bhāryā prasidhyati iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:15354: bhāvādhikāro bhāvavyāpāraḥ vācyatvena vivakṣitaḥ, na tu śāstrīyo 'dhikāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:15358: karoter dhātoḥ striyāṃ śaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15360: yogavibhāgo 'tra kartavyaḥ, ktinn api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15365: iṣeḥ dhātoḥ śaḥ pratyayo yagabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15377: pratyayāntebhyo dhātubhyaḥ stiryām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15388: halanto yo dhātuḥ gurumān, tataḥ striyām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15399: ṣidbhyaḥ bhidādibhyaś ca striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15442: ebhyo dhātubhyaḥ yuci prāpte striyām aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15453: ākārāntebhyaḥ upasarge upapade striyam aṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15464: ṇyantebhyo dhātubhyaḥ, āsa śrantha ity etābhyām ca striyām yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15473: na curādiḥ śrantha grantha sandarbhe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:15479: ghaṭṭeḥ bhauvādikasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭṭa calane iti, na cuarādikasya, tasya ṇeḥ ity eva siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15489: rogākhyāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bahulaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15491: ākhyā-grahaṇaṃ rogasya cet pratyayāntena sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15525: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dhātoḥ ṇvul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15538: paripraśne ākhyāne ca gamyamāne dhatoḥ iñ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṇvul api /
GS24jvkasipu:15539: vibhāṣa-grahaṇāt paro 'pi yaḥ prāpnoti, so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15540: kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ, kāṃ kārikām akārṣīḥ, kāṃ kriyāmakārṣīḥ, kāṃ kṛtyāmakārṣīḥ, kā kṛtimakārṣīḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:15546: kāṃ gaṇimajīgaṇaḥ, kāṃ gaṇikāmajīgaṇaḥ, kāṃ gaṇanāmajīgaṇaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:15547: sarvāṃ gaṇimajīgaṇam, sarvāṃ gaṇikām, sarvāṃ gaṇanām /
GS24jvkasipu:15567: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ ṇvuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15585: ākrośe gamyamāne nañi upapade dhātoḥ aniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15589: nañi iti kim ? mṛtiste vṛṣala bhūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:15593: bhāve, akartari ca kārake iti nivṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:15594: kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ lyuṭ ca bhaulam artheṣu bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15607: bahula-grahaṇād anye 'pi kṛtaḥ yathāprāptam abhidheyaṃ vyabhicaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:15614: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhatoḥ ktaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15621: napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15629: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham || PS_3,3.116 ||
GS24jvkasipu:15631: yena karmaṇā saṃspṛśyamānasya kartuḥ śarīra-sukham utpadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:15632: tasmin karmaṇi upapade dhatoḥ napuṃsaka-liṅge bhāve lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15637: karmaṇi iti kim ? tūlikāyā utthānaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:15638: saṃsparśāt iti kim ? agnikuṇḍasya upāsanaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:15639: kartuḥ iti kim ? guroḥ snāpanaṃ sukham /
GS24jvkasipu:15640: snāpayateḥ na guruḥ kartā, kiṃ tarhi, karma /
GS24jvkasipu:15643: sukham iti kim ? kaṇṭkānāṃ mardanaṃ duḥkham /
GS24jvkasipu:15648: karaṇe 'dhikaraṇe ca kārake dhātoḥ lyuṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15657: puṃliṅgayoḥ karaṇa-adhikaranayor abhidheyayoḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15661: adhikaraṇe khalv api - etya tasmin kurvanti iti ākaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15670: gocarādayaḥ śabdāḥ gha-prayayāntā nipātyante pūrvasminn eva arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:15672: iti ghañaṃ vakṣyati, tasya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15678: nipātanāt ajer vyaghañapoḥ (*2,4.56) iti vībhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15687: ave upapade tarateḥ stṛṇāteś ca dhātoḥ karana-adhikaraṇayoḥ sañjñāyām ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15693: katham avatāro nadyāḥ, na hīyaṃ sajñā ? prāya-anuvṛtteḥ asañjñāyām api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:15697: puṃsi saññāyām, karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoś ca iti sarvam anuvartate /
