GS24jvkasipu:15698: halantād dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15711: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghe prāpte ghañ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15725: udaṅka iti nipātyate anudaka-viṣayaś ced dhātv-artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15728: iti siddha eva ghañ ? udake pratiṣedha-artham idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:15736: ānāyaḥ iti nipātyate jālaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15743: khanateḥ dhātoḥ karaṇa-adhikaraṇayoḥ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15758: īṣat dus su ity eteṣu upapadeṣu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu dhatoḥ khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15767: īṣadādiṣu iti kim ? kṛcchreṇa kāryaḥ kaṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15775: bhavateḥ karoteś ca dhātoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kartari karmaṇi ca+upapade,
GS24jvkasipu:15776: cakārād īṣadādiṣu ca khal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15788: kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu īṣadādiṣu upapadeṣu ākārāntebhyo dhatubhyaḥ yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15799: īṣadādisu kṛcchrākṛcchra-artheṣu upapadeṣu gaty-arthebhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15806: anyebhyo 'pi dhātubhyaḥ gaty-arthebhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye yuc pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15820: vartamāna-samīpe bhūte bhaviṣyati ca vartamānād dhātoḥ vartamānavat pratyayā vā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15823: iti vartāmāne pratyayā uktāḥ, te bhūta-bhaviṣyator vidhīyante /
GS24jvkasipu:15834: yena viśeṣaṇena vartamāne pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ prakṛtyopapadopādhinā tathā+eva atra bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:15838: sāmīpya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? viprakarṣa-vivakṣāyāṃ mā bhūt, parudagacchat pāṭaliputram /
GS24jvkasipu:15840: yo manyate gacchāmi iti padaṃ vartamāne kāle eva vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:15842: na ca vākyagamyaḥ kālaḥ padasaṃskāravelāyām upayujyate iti tādṛśaṃ vākyārtha-pratipattāraṃ prati prakaraṇam idaṃ nārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15843: tathā ca śvaḥ kariṣyati, varṣeṇa gamiṣyati iti sarvam upapadyate //
GS24jvkasipu:15849: āśaṃsanam āśaṃsā, aprāptasya priyārthasya prāptum icchā /
GS24jvkasipu:15851: tatra bhaviṣyati kāle āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ vā bhūtavat pratyayā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:15866: kṣipravacane upapade āśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15867: bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15868: upādhyāyaś cet kṣipram āgamiṣyati, kṣipraṃ vyākaraṇam adhyeṣyāmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:15871: na iti vaktavye lṛḍ-grahaṇaṃ luṭo 'pi viṣaye yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:15877: tasminn upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati bhūtavac ca ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15885: bhūtānadyatane bhaviṣyadanadyatane ca laṅ-luṭau vihitau, tayor ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15886: anadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati kriyāprabandhe sāmīpye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:15893: sāmīpye khalv api - yeyaṃ paurṇamāsyatikrāntā, etasyāmupādhyāyo 'gnīnādhita, somenāyaṣṭa, gāmadita /
GS24jvkasipu:15894: yeyamamāvāsyā āgāminī, etasyāmupādhyāyo 'gnīnādhāsyate, somena yakṣyate, sa gāṃ dāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15901: bhaviṣyati kāle maryādā-vacane satyavarasmin pravibhāge 'nadyatanavat pratyaya-vidhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:15915: tatra dvirodanaṃ bhoktāsmahe, saktūn pātā smaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:15921: iha sūtre deśakṛtā maryādā, uttaratra kālakṛtā /
GS24jvkasipu:15927: kālamaryādāvibhāge satyavarsmin pravibhāge bhaviṣyati kāle 'nadyatanavat pratyayavidhirna bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15962: bhaviṣyati maryādā-vacane kālavibhāge ca anahorātrāṇām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:15963: kālamaryādāvibhāge sati bhavisyati kāle parasmin pravibhāge vibhāṣā anadyatanavat pratyayavidhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:15966: avarasmin pūrveṇa pratiṣedha uktaḥ, samprati parasminn aprāpta eva vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:15968: tasya yat paramāgrahāyaṇyāḥ tatra yuktā adhyeṣyāmahe,
GS24jvkasipu:15997: hetu-hetumator liṅ (*3,3.156) ity evam ādikaṃ liṅo nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:15998: tatra liṅ-nimitte bhaviṣyati kāle lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati kriyātipattau satyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16000: dakṣiṇena ced āyāsyan na śakaṭaṃ paryabhavisyat /
GS24jvkasipu:16004: bhavisyad aparyābhavanaṃ ca hetumat, tatra hetubhūtaṃ ca kamalakāhvānam /
GS24jvkasipu:16005: liṅgiliṅge buddhavā tadatipattiṃ ca pramāṇāntarād avagamya vaktā vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:16007: hetuhetumator āhvānāparyābhavanayoḥ bhaviṣyat kāla-viṣayayoḥ atipattiḥ ito vākyād avagamyate //
GS24jvkasipu:16011: liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16012: pūrvena bhaviṣyati vihitaḥ samprati bhūte vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16013: bhūte ca kāle liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau satyāṃ lṛṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16014: uta-apyoḥ samarthayor liṅ (*3,3.152) ity ārabhya liṅ-nimitteṣu vidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:16018: yadi sa tena dṛṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat, tadā abhikṣyata /
GS24jvkasipu:16019: na tu bhuktavān, anyena pathā sa gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16024: bhūte liṅ-nimitte lṛṅ kriya-atipattau iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16029: tatra bhūte liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau lṛṅ vā bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:16030: vakṣyati, vibhāṣā kathami liṅ ca (*3,3.143) - kathaṃ nāma tatra bhavān vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat /
GS24jvkasipu:16036: garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām api-jātvoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ laṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16037: vartamane laṭ uktaḥ kāla-sāmānye na prāpnoti iti vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16038: kālaviśeṣa-vihitāṃś ca api pratyayān ayaṃ paratvād asmin viṣaye vādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:16039: api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, gargāmahe, aho anyāyyam etad /
GS24jvkasipu:16040: liṅ-nimittābhāvād iha kriya-atipattau lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16045: kathami upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl laṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16047: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati /
GS24jvkasipu:16052: kathaṃ nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yāyajāṃ cakāra /
GS24jvkasipu:16053: atra liṅ-nimittam asti iti bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:16054: bhaviṣyad vivakṣāyāṃ sarvatra nityena+eva lṛṅā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:16058: garhāyām ity eva vibhāṣā na svaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:16059: kiṃvṛtte upapade garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16062: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet, yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16063: kataro nāma, katamo nāma yāṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16066: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:16074: kiṃvṛtte 'kiṃvṛtte ca+upapade anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ-lṛṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16080: na śraddadhe tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalaṃ yājayet,
GS24jvkasipu:16082: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, ko nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16083: amarṣe - na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16084: ko nāma vṛṣalo yaṃ tatrabhavān yājayet, yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16085: bhūta-vivakṣāyāṃ tu kriya-atipattau vā lṛṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16087: na avakalpayāmi tatrabhavān nāma vṛṣalam ayājayiṣyat //
GS24jvkasipu:16094: kiṃkila-asty-artheṣu upapadeṣu anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16096: kiṃ - kila nāma tatrabhavan vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16101: liṅ-nimittam iha na asti tena lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16106: jātu yadā ity etayoḥ upapadayoḥ anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16108: jātu tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yan nāma tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, na śraddadhe, na marṣayāmi /
GS24jvkasipu:16119: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor anavaklṛpty-amarṣayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16132: yac ca yatra ity etayoḥ upapadayor dhatoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:16135: yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayed ṛddho vṛddhaḥ san brāhmaṇaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16144: yaccayatrayoḥ upapadayoḥ citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16146: yac ca tatrahbavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, yatra tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, āścaryam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:16152: śeṣe uapapade citrīkaraṇe gamyamāne dhātoḥ lṛṭ pratyayo bhavati, yadi-śabdaś cen na prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16154: āścaryam, citram adbhutam, andho nāma parvatamārokṣyati, badhiro nāma vyākaranamadhyeṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16155: ayadau iti kim ? āścaryaṃ yadi sa bhuñjīta, yadi so 'dhīyīta /
GS24jvkasipu:16156: liṅ - nimitābhāvāt iha lṛṅ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16160: uta api ity etayoḥ samarthayoḥ dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16162: bāḍham ity asminn arthe samānārthatvam anayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16168: samarthayoḥ iti kim? uta daṇḍaḥ patiṣyati ? api dvāraṃ dhāsyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16171: itaḥ prabhṛṭi bhūte 'pi liṅ-nimitte kriya-atipattau nityaṃ lṛṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:16179: tasmin gamyamāne akacciti upapade dhātor liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16183: akacciti iti kim ? kaccij jīvati te mātā kaccij jīvati te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:16184: mārāvida tvāṃ pṛcchāmi kaccij jīvati pārvatī //
GS24jvkasipu:16195: kva ca asau siddhaḥ ? yatra gamyate ca-artho na ca asau prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16196: tadīdṛśe sambhāvanopādhike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16200: alam iti kim ? videśasthāyī devadattaḥ prāyena gamiṣyati grāmam /
GS24jvkasipu:16201: siddhāprayoge iti kim ? alaṃ devadatto hastinaṃ haniṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16202: kriyātipattau bhūte bhaviṣyati ca nityaṃ lṛṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16206: sambhāvane 'lam iti cet siddha-aprayoge iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16208: sambhāvana-vacane dhātāv upapade yac chabda-varjite dhātor vibhāṣā liṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16210: sambhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, sambhāvayāmi bhokṣyate bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:16213: ayadi iti kim ? sambhāvayāmi yad bhuñjīta bhavān //
GS24jvkasipu:16219: hetubhūte hetumati cārthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16223: dakṣiṇena ced yāsyati na śakaṭaṃ paryābhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:16224: tatra vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṃ tāvad anantaram eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16225: liṅ iti vartamāne punar liṅ-grahaṇaṃ kālav-iśeṣa-pratipatty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:16226: tena+iha na bhavati, hanti iti palāyate, varṣati iti dhāvati /
GS24jvkasipu:16231: icchārtheṣu dhatuṣu upapadeṣu dhatoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16243: icchārtheṣu dhātuṣu samāna-kartṛkeṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16249: samāna-kartṛkeṣu iti kim ? devadattam bhuñjānam icchati yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16250: iha kasmān na bhavati, icchan karoti ? anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:16254: icchārtheṣu samānakartṛkeṣu dhātuṣu upapadeṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16262: ichārthebhyo dhatubhyo vartamāne kāle vibhāṣā liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16276: vidhyādiṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16287: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākaranam adhīyīya /
GS24jvkasipu:16288: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaranam adhīyīya //
GS24jvkasipu:16292: loṭ pratyayo bhavati dhātoḥ vidhyādiṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:16294: vidhau tāvat - kaṭaṃ tāvat bhavān karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:16299: adhīṣṭe - adhīcchāmo bhavantaṃ māṇavakaṃ bhavān adhyāpayatu, māṇāvakaṃ bhavān upanayatām /
GS24jvkasipu:16300: sampraśne - kiṃ nu khalu bho vyākranam adhyayai /
GS24jvkasipu:16301: prārthane - bhavati me prārthanā vyākaraṇam adhyayai, chando 'dhyayai //
GS24jvkasipu:16309: eteṣv artheṣu dhātoḥ kṛtya-sañjñakāḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti, cakārāl loṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16310: bhavatā kaṭaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, kartavyaḥ, kṛtyaḥ, kāryaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16311: loṭ khalv api - karotu kaṭaṃ bhavān iha preṣitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16314: kimarthaṃ praiṣādiṣu kṛtyā vidhīyante na sāmānyena,
GS24jvkasipu:16315: bhāva-karmaṇor vihitā eva te praiṣādiṣv anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:16318: evaṃ tarhi jñāpayati, stry-adhikārāt pareṇa vāsarūpa-vidhir nāvaṣyaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16319: vidhipraiṣayoḥ ko viśeṣa ? kecid āhuḥ, ajñātajñāpanaṃ vidhiḥ, preṣaṇaṃ praiṣaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16324: praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16326: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtāt, upari muhūrtasya bhavatā khalu kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ, karaṇīyaḥ, kāryaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16327: bhavān khalu kaṭaṃ kuryāt, bhavān khalu karotu /
GS24jvkasipu:16335: sam-śabde upapade praiṣādiṣu gamyamāneṣu ūrdhva-mauhūrtike 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16337: ūrdhvaṃ muhūrtād bhavān kaṭaṃ kaortu sma, grāmaṃ gacchatu sma, māṇāvakamadhyāpayatu sma //
GS24jvkasipu:16343: sma-śabde upapade 'dhīṣṭe gamyamāne dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16350: kālādiṣu upapadesu dhātoḥ tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16353: iha kasmān na bhavati, kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni iti ? praiṣādi-grahaṇam iha abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16356: kālo bhojanasya ? vāsarūpena lyuḍ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16357: uktam idam, stry-adhikārāt paratra vāsarūpa-vidhir anityaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16362: yacchabde upapade kālādiṣu dhātoḥ liṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16371: arhe kartari vācye gamyamāne vā dhātoḥ kṛtya-tṛcaḥ pratyayā bhavanti, cakārāl liṅ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16372: bhavatā khalu kanyā voḍhavyā, vāhyā, vahanīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:16376: atha kasmād arhe kṛtyatṛco vidhīyante, yāvatā sāmānena vihitatvād arhe 'pi bhavisyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:16377: yo 'yam iha liṅ vidhīyate, tena bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16384: avaśyaṃ bhāvaviśiṣṭe ādhamarṇyaviśiṣṭe ca kartari vācye dhātoḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16387: ādhamarṇye khalv api - śatam dāyī sahasraṃ dāyī /
GS24jvkasipu:16393: kṛtya-sañjākāś ca pratyayā āvaśyaka-ādhamarṇyayor upādhibhūtayoḥ dhātor bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16394: bhavatā khalu avaśyaṃ kaṭaḥ kartavyaḥ, avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaḥ, avaśyaṃ kāryaḥ, avaśyaṃ kṛtyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16397: kimartham idam, yāvatā sāmāgyena vihitā asminn api viṣaye bhavisyanti ?
GS24jvkasipu:16399: kartari ṇiniḥ, bhāva-karmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ, tatra kuto bādhaprasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:16400: tatra kecid āhuḥ, bhavyageyādayaḥ kartṛ-vācinaḥ kṛtyāḥ, ta iha+udāharaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16406: śaknoty-arthopādhike dhātv-arthe liṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt kṛtyāś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16407: bhavatā khalu bhāro voḍhavyaḥ, vahanīyaḥ, vāhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16410: sāmānya-vihitānāṃ punar vacanam liṅā bādhā mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16414: āśaṃsanam āśīḥ, apraptasya+iṣṭasya arthasya prāptum icchā /
GS24jvkasipu:16416: aśīrviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ liṅ-loṭau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16419: āśiṣi iti kim ? ciraṃ jīvati devadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16424: āśiṣi viṣaye dhātoḥ ktic-ktau pratyayau bhavataḥ, samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16429: ktaḥ khalv api - devā enaṃ deyāsuḥ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16430: sāmānyena vihitaḥ ktaḥ punar ucyate, kticā bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16431: cakāro viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, na ktici dīrghaś ca (*6,4.39) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16435: māṅi upapade dhātoḥ luṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16439: katham mā bhavatu tasya pāpam, mā bhaviṣyati iti ? asādhur eva ayam /
GS24jvkasipu:16440: kecid āhuḥ, aṅidaparo mā-śabdo vidyate, tasya ayaṃ prayogaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16444: sma-śabda-uttare māṅi upapade dhātoḥ laṅ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāl lug ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16446: mā sma kārṣīt / mā sma harat / mā sma hārṣīt //
GS24jvkasipu:16447: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:16454_0: dhātv-arthe dhātu-śabdaḥ / dhātv-arthānāṃ sambandho dhātu-sambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya-bhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16454_1: tasmin sati ayathākāloktā api pratyayāḥ sādhavo bhavanti / agniṣṭomayājyasaya putro
GS24jvkasipu:16454_2: janitā / kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ śvo bhavitā / bhāvi kṛtyam āsīt / agniṣṭomayājī iti bhūtakālaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16455: janitā iti bhaviṣyatkālaḥ / tatra bhūtaḥ kālaḥ bhaviṣyatkālena abhisambadhyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati / viśeṣaṇaṃ guṇatvād viśeṣyakālam anurudhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:16456: tena viparyayo na bhavati / pratyayādhikāre punaḥ pratyaya-grahaṇam adhātv-adhikāra-vihitā api pratyayāḥ taddhitā dhātu-sambandhe sati kālabhede sādhavo yathā syuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16460: āsīt bhavitā iti sambandhādtīte bhaviṣyati ca sādhur bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16462: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ || PS_3,4.2 ||
GS24jvkasipu:16467: samabhihāra-viśiṣṭa-kriyāvacanād dhātoḥ loṭ pratyayo bhavati sarveṣu kāleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:16468: sarvalakārāṇām apavādaḥ tasya ca loṭo hi sva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16471: kriyā-samabhihāre loḍ bhavati, tato loṭo hisvau /
GS24jvkasipu:16472: loṭ ity eva, loḍ-dharmāṇau hisvau bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16473: tena ātmanepada-parasmaipadatvaṃ bhedena avatiṣṭhate, tiṅtvaṃ ca dvayor api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16474: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti, imau lunītaḥ, ime lunanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16475: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva tvaṃ lunāsi, yuvāṃ lunīthaḥ, yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:16476: atha vā, lunīta lunīta+ity eva yūyaṃ lunītha /
GS24jvkasipu:16477: lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ahaṃ lunāmi, āvāṃ lunīvaḥ, vayaṃ lunīmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16478: bhūte - lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayam alāvīt, alāviṣṭām, alāviṣuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16480: bhaviṣyati - lunīhi lunihi ity eva ayaṃ laviṣyati, laviṣyataḥ, laviṣyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16482: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva ayam adhīte, imāvadhīyate, ime 'dhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16483: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva tvam adhīṣe, yuvām adhīyāthe, yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:16484: atha vā, adhīdhvam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:16485: adhīṣvādhīṣvety eva aham adhīye, āvām adhīvahe, vayam adhīmahe /
GS24jvkasipu:16487: kriyā-samabhihārābhivyaktau dvirvacanam ayaṃ loḍ apekṣate, kriyā-samabhihāre dve bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16488: yaṅ-pratyayaḥ punar asminn eva arthe vidhīyamānaḥ svayam eva śaktatvān na apekṣate dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:16494: samuccīyamāna-kriyāvacanād dhātor anyatarasyāṃ loṭ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16500: sthālyapidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:16507: atha vā, bhrāṣṭram aṭata, maṭham aṭata, khadūram aṭata, sthālyupidhānam aṭata ity eva yūyam aṭatha /
GS24jvkasipu:16511: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:16517: sthālyupidhānam aṭati ity eva ayam aṭati,
GS24jvkasipu:16528: sthālyupidhānam aṭāmi ity eva aham aṭāmi,
GS24jvkasipu:16532: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva ayam adhīte,
GS24jvkasipu:16534: chando 'dhīṣva, vyākaraṇam adhīdhvam ity eva yūyam adhīdhve /
GS24jvkasipu:16537: niruktam adhīṣva ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:16547: niruktam adhīṣe ity eva tvam adhīṣe,
GS24jvkasipu:16551: niruktam adhīye ity eva aham adhīye,
GS24jvkasipu:16557: yasmād dhātoḥ loḍ vihitaḥ sa eva dhātur anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16558: dhātu-sambhandhe pratyaya-vidhānād anuprayogaḥ siddha eva, yathāvidhy-arthaṃ tu vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:16559: tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunīti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16566: dvitīye loḍvidhāne samuccaye sāmānya-vacanasya dhātor anuprayogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16567: odanaṃ bhuṅkṣva, saktūn piba, dhānāḥ khāda ity eva ayam abhyavaharati /
GS24jvkasipu:16569: lāghavaṃ ca laukike śabda-vyavahāre na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16573: sthālyupidhānam aṭa ity eva ayam aṭati ity atra api kāraka-bhedāt kriyābhede sati sāmānya-vacanatā sambhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:16578: chandasi viṣaye dhātu-sambandhe sarveṣu luṅ-laṅ-liṭaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16583: laṅ - agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16591: liṅ-arthe, yatra liṅ vidhīyate vidhyādiḥ, hetuhetumator liṅ (*3,3.156)
GS24jvkasipu:16592: ity evam ādiḥ, tatra chandasi viṣaye 'nyatarasyāṃ leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16604: yadi me bhavān idaṃ kuryād aham api bhavate idaṃ dāsyāmi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16606: upasaṃvāde āśaṅkāyāṃ ca gamyamānāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye leṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16608: madagrā eva vo grahā gṛhyāntai iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16612: liṅ-artha eva ayam, nitya-arthaṃ tu vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:16619: tatra chandasi viṣaye dhātoḥ sayādayaḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16621: kathaṃ jñāyate ? vacanasāmarthyāt tāvad ayam kartur apakṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16622: na ca ayam anyasminn arthe tumun ādiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16645: prayai rohiṣyai avyathiṣyai ity ete śabdā nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:16657: dṛśe vikhye ity etau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:16666: śaknotau dhātāv upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe ṇamul kamul ity etau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16678: īśvara-śabda upapade chandasi viṣaye tumarthe dhatoḥ tosun-kasun-pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16690: tasmin kṛtya-arthe chandasi viṣaye tavai ken kenya tvan ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:16705: tumarthe chandasi iti sayādi-sūtre 'pi tavai vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:16721: bhāvo lakṣyate yena tasminn arthe vartamānebhyaḥ sthādibhyo dhātubhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye tumarthe tosun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16735: sṛpi-tṛdor dhātvoḥ bhāva-lakṣaṇe 'rthe vartamānayoḥ chandasi viṣaye tum-arthe kasun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16742: alam khalu ity etayoḥ pratiṣedha-vācinor upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:16755: māṅo dhātoḥ vyatīhāre vartamānād udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16762: meṅaḥ kṛtātvasya ayaṃ nirdeśaḥ kṛto jñāpana-arthaḥ, nānubaṅghakṛtamanejantatvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16763: tena dā-dhā ghv-adāp (*1,1.20) iti daipo 'pi pratiṣedho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:16769: pareṇa pūrvasya yoge gamyamāne avareṇa ca parasya dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16770: pareṇa tāvat - aprāpya nadīṃ parvataḥ sthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16772: avarayoge - atikramya tu parvataṃ nadī sthitā /
GS24jvkasipu:16777: samānaḥ kartā yayoḥ dhātv-arthayos tatra pūrvakāle dhātv-arthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ktvā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16783: samāna-kartuṛkayoḥ iti kim ? bhuktavati brāhmaṇe gacchati devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16784: pūrvakāle iti kim ? vrajati ca jalpati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16785: āsyaṃ vyādāya svapiti cakṣuḥ saṃmīlya hasti ity upasaṃkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:16792: ābhīkṣṇya-viśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ktva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:16793: dvirvacana-sahitau ktvāṇamulāv ābhīkṣṇyaṃ dyotayataḥ, na kevalau /
GS24jvkasipu:16794: ābhīkṣṇye dve bhavataḥ ity upasaṅkhyānād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:16795: bhojaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, bhuktvā bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:16796: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ vrajati, pītvā pītvā vrajati //
GS24jvkasipu:16800: yacchabde upapade dhātoḥ ktvā-ṇamulau pratyayau na bhavato 'nākāṅkṣe vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:16801: yatra pūrvottare kriye staḥ, tacced vākyaṃ na paraṃ kiñcid ākāṅkṣate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:16805: anākāṅkṣe iti kim ? yad ayaṃ bhuktvā vrajati adhīte eva tataḥ param //
GS24jvkasipu:16812: agre prathama pūrva ity eteṣu upapadeṣu samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu vibhāṣā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16813: agre bhojaṃ vrajati, agre bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:16814: prathamaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, prathamaṃ bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:16815: pūrvaṃ bhojaṃ vrajati, pūrvaṃ bhuktvā vrajati /
GS24jvkasipu:16816: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam etābhyāṃ mukte laḍādayo 'pi yathā syuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16819: ktvāṇamulau yatra saha vidhīyete tatra vāsarūpavidhir na asti ity etad anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:16823: amaiva yat tulya-vidhānam upapadaṃ tat samasyate, na anyat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16827: karmaṇy-upapade kṛjo dhātoḥ khamuñ pratyayo bhavati ākrośe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:16830: corakaraṇam ākrośasam pādanārtham eva, na tv asau coraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:16834: samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle kṛñaḥ iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:16836: svādvartheṣu upapadeṣu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16842: asvādvīṃ svādvīṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte svāduṅ-kāraṃ bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:16843: vāsarūpeṇa ktvā api bhavati, svāduṃ kṛtvā bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:16844: tumartha-adhikārāc ca sarva ete bhāve pratyayāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16846: svāduṅkāraṃ bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti ṇamulā kartur anabhihitatvāt kartari kasmāt tṛtīyā na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:16848: na ca asmin prakaraṇe śaktiśaktimatorbhedo vivakṣyte,
GS24jvkasipu:16855: anyathādiṣu upapadesu kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati, siddhāprayogaścet karoter bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16856: kathaṃ punar asau siddhāprayogaḥ ? nirarthakatvān na prayogam arhati iti evam eva prayujyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16857: anyathā bhuṅkte iti yavānarthastāvān eva anyathākāraṃ bhugkte iti gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16862: sidhāprayogaḥ iti kim ? anyathā kṛtvā śiro bhuṅkte //
GS24jvkasipu:16868: yathātatha-śabdayor upapadayoḥ kṛño ṇamul pratyayo bhavati asūyāprativacane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:16873: yathā kṛtvā 'haṃ bhokṣye, tathā tvaṃ drakṣyasi /
GS24jvkasipu:16874: siddhāprayoge ity eva, yathā kṛtvā 'haṃ śiro bhokṣye, kiṃ tavānena //
GS24jvkasipu:16878: karmaṇy-upapade sākalya-viśiṣte 'rthe dṛśividoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16880: yāḥ yāḥ kanyāḥ paśyati tāstāḥ varyati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16882: yaṃ yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jānāti labhate vicārayati vā tān sarvān bhojayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16883: sākalye iti kim ? brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhojayati //
GS24jvkasipu:16887: yāvac-chabda upapade vindater jīvateś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16896: carmodarayoḥ karmaṇor upapadayoḥ pūryateḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16900: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām || PS_3,4.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:16904: ūlopaś ca asya pūrayter anyatarasyāṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16905: samudāyena ced varṣasya pramāṇam iyattā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:16906: goṣpadapūraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ, goṣpadapraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16907: sītāpūraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ, sītāpraṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:16916: asmāṇṇyantād dhātoḥ cel-artheṣu karmasu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:16926: nimūla-samūla-śabdayoḥ karmavācinor upapadayoḥ kaṣeḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16930: itaḥ prabhṛti kaṣādīn yān vakṣyati tatra kaṣādiṣu yathā-vidhy-anuprayogaḥ (*3,4.46) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:16935: śuṣkādiṣu karmavāciṣu upapadeṣu piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16946: samūla akṛta jīva ity eteṣu śabdeṣu karmasu upapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ han kṛñ graha ity etebhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16954: karaṇe upapade hanter dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16969: snehana-vācini karaṇe upapade piṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16980: hasta-vācini karaṇe upapade vartayateḥ gṛhṇāteś ca ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:16984: graheḥ khalv api - hastena gṛhṇāti, hastagrāhaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GS24jvkasipu:16992: sva-vācini karaṇe upapade puṣer dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17004: adhikaraṇa-vācini upapade badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17013: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye badhnāteḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17022: jīva-puruṣayoḥ kartṛ-vācinor upapadayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ naśi-vahoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17026: puruṣaḥ preṣyo bhūtvā vahati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17033: ūrdhva-śabde kartṛ-vācini upapade śuṣiṣuroḥ dhātvoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17043: upmāne karmaṇi upapade, cakārāt kartari, dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17057: yasmād dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati sa eva anuprayoktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17058: nanu dhātu-sambandhe pratyaya-vidhānād anuprayogaḥ siddha eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:17059: yathāvidhi iti niyama-arthaṃ vacanam, tathā ca+eva+udāhṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:17063: daṃśa daśane, asmād dhator upapūrvāt tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17069: sarvasminn eva atra ṇamul-prakaraṇe kriyābhede sati vāsarūpa-vidhinā ktvāpi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17076: tadarthānāṃ dhātūnām anuprayoga-dhātunā samāna-karmakāṇāṃ tṛtīyānte upapade ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17079: samānakarmakāṇām iti kim ? coraṃ daṇḍenopahatya gopālako gāḥ kālayati //
GS24jvkasipu:17087: pārśvopapīḍaṃ śete, pārśvayor upapīḍam, pārśvābhyām upapīḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:17088: vrajoparodhaṃ gāḥ sthāpyati, vraje uparodham, vrajenoparodham /
GS24jvkasipu:17097: samāsattau gamyamānāyāṃ tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17098: keśagrāhaṃ yudhyante, keśeṣu grāham, keśair grāham /
GS24jvkasipu:17106: pramāṇe gamyamane tṛtīyā-saptamyoḥ upapadayoḥ dhātor ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17107: dvyaṅgulotkarṣaṃ khaṇḍikāṃ chinatti, dvyaṅgule utkarṣam, dvyaṅgulenotkarṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:17113: parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām apādāne upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17115: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadavaśyaṃkartavyam api na apekṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:17119: parīpsāyām iti kim ? āsanād utthāya gacchati //
GS24jvkasipu:17124: dvitīyānta upapade parīpsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17127: evaṃ nāma tvarate yadāyudha-grahaṇam api na adriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17128: loṣtādikaṃ yat kiṃcid āsannaṃ tad gṛhṇāti //
GS24jvkasipu:17133: agruve svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānta upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17136: aghruve iti kim ? utkṣipya śiraḥ kathayati /
GS24jvkasipu:17137: yasmin aṅge chinne 'pi prāṇī na mriyate tadaghruvam /
GS24jvkasipu:17144: parikliśyamāne svāṅga-vācini dvitīyānte upapade dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17154: dvitīyānte upapade viśyādibhyo dhātubhyo ṇamul pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:17156: viśyādibhiḥ kriyābhir anavayavena padārthānāṃ sambandho vyāptiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17160: samāsena vyāptyāsevayor uktatvāt nitya-vīpsayoḥ (*8,1.4) iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17161: asamāsapakṣe tu vyāpyamānatāyāṃ dravya-vacanasya dvirvacanam, āsevyamānatāyāṃ tu kriyā-vacanasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17162: tathā ca vakṣyati - supsu vīpsa, tiṅkṣu nityatā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17165: pati - geha-anuprapātam āste gehaṃ geham anuprapātam āste, geham anuprapātam anuprapātam āste /
GS24jvkasipu:17166: padi - geha-anuprapādam āste, gehaṃ geham anuprapādam, geham anuprapādam anuprapādam /
GS24jvkasipu:17167: skandi - geha-avaskandam āste, gehaṃ geham avaskandam, geham avaskandam avaskandam /
GS24jvkasipu:17168: vyāpyam ānāsevyamānayoḥ iti kim ? geham anupraviśya bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:17169: nanu ābhīkṣṇye ṇamul vihita eva, āsevā ābhīkṣṇyam eva, kim arthaṃ punar āsevāyāṃ ṇamul ucyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:17170: ktvānivṛtty-artham iti cet, na, iṣṭatvāt tasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17171: dvitīyopapada-arthaṃ tarhi vacanam, upapadasamāsaḥ pakṣe yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17178: kriyāntare dhātvarthe vartamānābhyām asyati-tṛṣibhyāṃ dvitīyānteṣu kāla-vāciṣu upapadeṣu ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17179: dvyahātyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, dvyahamatyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:17180: tryahātyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, tryahamatyāsaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:17181: dvyahatarṣaṃ gāḥ pāyayati, dvyahaṃtarṣaṃ gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:17182: atyasanena tarṣaṇena ca gavāṃ pānakriyā vyavadhīyate vicchidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17183: adya pāyayitvā dvyahamatikramya punaḥ pāyayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17185: kriyāntare iti kim ? aharatyasya iṣūn gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17188: kāleṣu iti kim ? yojanam atyasya gāḥ pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:17194: nāma-śabde dvitīyānte upapade ādiśer graheś ca dhātoḥ ṇamul pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17200: avyaye upapade ayathabhipreta-ākhyāne gamyamāne karoteḥ ktvā-ṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17202: kiṃ tarhi vṛṣala, nīcaiḥ kṛṭyācakṣe, nīcaiḥ kṛtvā, nīcaiḥ kāram /
GS24jvkasipu:17205: kiṃ tarhi vṛṣala, uccaiḥ kṛtyācakṣe, uccaiḥ kṛtvā, uccaiḥ kāram /
GS24jvkasipu:17207: ayathābhipreta-ākhyāne iti kim ? uccaiḥ kṛtvācaṣṭe putraste jātaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17208: ktvā-grahaṇaṃ kim, yāvatā sarvasminn eva atra prakaraṇe vāsarūpeṇa ktvā bhavati ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:17210: tathā ca ktvā ca (*2,2.22) ity asmin sūtre tṛtīyā-prabhṛtīny-anyatarasyām (*2,2.21) iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17216: tiryak-śabde upapade kṛñaḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ, apavarge gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:17218: tiryak-kṛtya gataḥ, tiryak-kṛtvā gataḥ, tiryak-kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17220: apavarge iti kim ? tiryak-kṛtvā kāṣṭhaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17230: tas-pratyayo yataḥ sva-aṅgāt tad evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17231: tas-pratyaye svāṅga-vācini upapade karoteḥ bhavateś ca dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17233: mukhataḥ-kṛtya gataḥ, mukhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ, mukhataḥ-kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17234: mukhatobhūya tiṣṭhati, mukhato bhūtvā tiṣṭhati, mukhatobhāvaṃ tiṣṭhati /
GS24jvkasipu:17235: pṛṣṭhataḥkṛtya gataḥ, pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ, pṛṣṭhataḥ kāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17237: svāṅge iti kim ? sarvataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17240: pratyaya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? mukhe tasyati iti mukhataḥ, mukhataḥ kṛtvā gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17244: nā-artho dhā-arthaś ca pratyayo yasmāt sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17245: nādhārthapratyaye śabde cvy-arthe upapade kṛbhvoḥ dhātvoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17246: anānā nānā kṛtvā gataḥ nānākṛtya gataḥ, nānā kṛtvā gataḥ, nānākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17247: vinākṛtya gataḥ, vinā kṛtvā gataḥ, vinākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17248: nānābhūya gataḥ, nānā bhūtvā gataḥ, nānābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17249: vinābhūya gataḥ, vinā bhūtvā gataḥ, dvinābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17250: dvidhākṛtya gataḥ, dvidhā kṛtvā gataḥ, dvidhākāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17251: dvidhābhūya gataḥ, dvidhā bhūtvā gataḥ, dvidhābhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17252: dvaidhaṃkṛtya gataḥ, dvaidhaṃ kṛtvā gataḥ, dvaidhaṃkāraṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17253: dvaidhaṃbhūya gataḥ, dvaidhaṃ bhūtvā gataḥ, dvaidhaṃbhāvaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17256: cvy-arthe iti kim ? nānā kṛtvā kāṣṭhāni gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17257: dhārtham artha-grahaṇam, nā punar eka eva, vinañbhyāṃ nānāñau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17261: tūṣṇīṃ-śabde upapade bhavateḥ dhātoḥ ktvāṇamulau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17267: anvak-śabde upapade bhavater dhātoḥ ānulomye ktvāṇamulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17269: anvagbhūya āste, anvag bhūtvā āste, anvagbhāvam āste /
GS24jvkasipu:17270: ānulomye iti kim ? anvag bhūtvā tiṣṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:17275: śaka-ādiṣu upapadeṣu asty-artheṣu vā dhātumātrāt tumun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17293: paryāpti-vacaneṣu alamartheṣu upapadeṣu dhātostumun pratyao bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17299: pūrvasūtre śakigrahaṇam analamartham, śakyam evaṃ kartum iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17305: tatra yeṣu artha-nirdeśo nāsti tatra+idam upatiṣṭhate, arthākāṅkṣatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17306: na khyunnādi-vākyeṣu, sākṣād artha-nirdeśe sati teṣām nirākāṅkṣatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17317: iti bhāva-karmaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ kartā ca vācyaḥ pakṣe ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17318: bhavaty asau bhavyaḥ, bhavyam anena iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:17319: geyo māṇavakaḥ sāmnām, geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:17320: pravacanīyo guruḥ svādhyāyasya, pravacanīyo guruṇā svādhyāya iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:17321: upasthānīyo 'ntevāsī guroḥ, upasthānīyaḥ śiṣyeṇa vā guruḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17324: āpatati asāvāpātyaḥ, āpātyam anena iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:17326: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ || PS_3,4.69 ||
GS24jvkasipu:17328: laḥ ity utsṛṣṭānaubandhaṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhyate, prathamābahuvacanāntaṃ caa+eat /
GS24jvkasipu:17330: cakārāt kartari ca akarmakebhyo dhātubhyo bhāve bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:17341: tayor eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtya-sañjñākāḥ kta-khal-arthāś ca pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17356: bhāvo cākramakebhyaḥ ity anuvṛtteḥ sakarmakebhyo bhāve na bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:17360: ādikarmaṇi yaḥ kto vihitaḥ sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17363: tasminn ādikarmaṇi bhūtatvena vivakṣite yaḥ kto vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:17365: prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ, prakṛtaḥ kto devadattena, prakṛtam devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:17366: prabhukta odanaṃ devadattaḥ, prabhukta odano devadattena, prabhuktaṃ devadattena //
GS24jvkasipu:17370: gaty-arthabhyo dhātubhyo 'karmakebhya śliṣādibhyaś ca yaḥ ktaḥ, sa kartari bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17372: gato devadatto grāmam, gato devadattena grāman, gato devadattena grāmaḥ, gataṃ devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:17375: śliṣa - upaśliṣṭo guruṃ bhavān, upaśliṣṭo gururbhavatā, upaśliṣṭaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17376: śīṅ - upaśayito guruṃ bhavān, upaśayito gururbhavatā, upaśayitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17377: sthā - upasthito guruṃ bhavān, upasthito gururbhavatā, upasthitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17378: āsa - upāsito guruṃ bhavān, upāsito gururbhavatā, upāsitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17379: vasa - anūṣito guruṃ bhavān, anūṣito gururbhavatā, anūṣitaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17380: jana - anujāto māṇavako māṇa - vikām, anujātā māṇavakena māṇavikā, anujātaṃ māṇavakena /
GS24jvkasipu:17381: ruha - ārūḍho vṛkṣaṃ bhavān, ārūḍho vṛkṣo bhavatā, ārūḍhaṃ bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17382: jīryati - anujīrṇo vṛṣalīṃ devadattaḥ, anujīrṇā vṛpalī devadattena, anujīrṇaṃ devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:17383: śliṣādayaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakā bhavanti, tadartham eṣām upādānam //
GS24jvkasipu:17389: sa kṛtsañjñakatvāt kartari prāptaḥ, sampradāne nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17391: āgatāya tasmai dātuṃ gāṃ hanti iti goghnaḥ, arghārho 'tithiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17393: nipātana-sāmarthyād eva goghnaḥ ṛtvig-ādir ucyate, na tu caṇḍālādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17394: asaty api ca gohanane tasya yogyatayā goghnaḥ ity abhidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:17400: uṇādi-pratyayāntā ete, iṣiyudhīndhidasiśyādhūsūbhyo mak, bhiyaṣṣuk grasvaś ca ity evam ādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17401: tābhyām anyatra-uṇādayaḥ (*3,4.75) iti paryadāse prāpte nipātanam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17418: uṇādayaḥ śabdāḥ tābhyām apādāna-sampradānābhyām anyatra kārake bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17419: kṛttvāt kartary eva prāptāḥ karmādiṣu kathyante /
GS24jvkasipu:17420: tābhyām iti sampradāna-arthaḥ pratyavamarśaḥ, anyathā hy apādānam eva paryudasyeta, anantaratvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17428: drauvya-arthāḥ akarmakāḥ, pratyavasāna-arthāḥ abhyavahāra-arthāḥ iti svanikāya-prasiddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17429: dhrauvyā-gati-pratyavasāna-arthebhyaḥ yaḥ kto vihitaḥ so 'dhikaraṇe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17434: bhrauvya-arthebhyaḥ tāvat - āsito devadattaḥ, āsitaṃ tena, idam eṣām āsitam /
GS24jvkasipu:17438: pratyavasāna-arthebhyaḥ - bhuktaḥ odano devadattena, devadattena bhuktam, idam eṣāṃ bhuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:17439: kathaṃ bhuktā brāhmaṇāḥ, pītā gāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17440: akāro matvarthīyaḥ, bhuktam eṣām asti, pītam eṣām asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17447: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ lasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17448: kiṃ ca+idaṃ lasya iti ? daśa lakārā anubandha-viśiṣṭā vihitā artha-viśeṣe kāla-viśeṣe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17449: teṣāṃ viśeṣakarān anubandhān utsṛjya yat sāmānyaṃ tad gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17463: atha lakāramātrasya grahaṇam kasmān na bhavati, lunāti, cūḍālaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:17472: iti viśeṣaṇa-arthaḥ, tib-ādibhir ādeśais tulyatvān na deśa-vidhyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17484: ṭito lakārasya sthāne yāny ātmanepadāni teṣām ṭeḥ ekāra-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17486: iha kasmān na bhavati pacamānaḥ, yajamānaḥ ? prakṛtais tibādibhiḥ ātmanepadāni viśeṣyante //
GS24jvkasipu:17491: ṭito lakārasya yaḥ thās tasya seśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17499: liḍ-ādeśayoḥ ta-jhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam eś irec ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17508: liḍ-ādeśānāṃ parasmaipada-sañjñākānāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tibādīnāṃ ṇalādayo nava ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17519: asmād dhātoḥ pareṣāṃ laḍādeśānāṃ parasmaipadānāṃ ṇalādayo nava vikalpena ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17529: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ || PS_3,4.84 ||
GS24jvkasipu:17531: parasmaipadānām ity eva, laṭo vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17532: bruvaḥ parasya laṭaḥ parasmaipadānāṃ pañcānāma adibhūtānāṃ pañcaiva ṇalādaya ādeśā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:17533: tatsanniyogena ca bruva āhaśabda ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17541: āditaḥ iti kim ? pareṣāṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:17542: bruvaḥ iti punar vacanaṃ sthāny-artham, prasmaipadānām eva hi syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:17554: aḍāṭau kasmān na bhavataḥ, tathā jher jus-ādeśaḥ laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya+eva (*3,4.111)
GS24jvkasipu:17555: iti vāntu, yāntu ? vido laṭo vā (*3,4.83)
GS24jvkasipu:17556: ity ato vā-grahaṇam anuvartate, sā ca vyavasthita-vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:17566: atha vā vā iti vartate, sā ca vyavashita-vibhāṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:17571: loḍ-ādeśasya seḥ hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, apic ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17581: la-ādeśaḥ chandasi viṣaye hi-śabdo vā apid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17598: loṭ sambadhinaḥ ekārasya am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17604: sakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya loṭ-sambandhina ekārasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ca am ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17612: loṭ-sambandhinaḥ uttamapuruṣasya āḍāgamo bhavati, sa ca+uttamapuruṣaḥ pid bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17622: iha kasmān na bhavati, pacāvedam, yajāvedam ? bahiraṅga-lakṣaṇatvād guṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:17649: āta ai (*3,4.95) ity etad viṣayaṃ varjayitvā eta ai bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17655: yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
GS24jvkasipu:17669: prajāpatir udadhiṃ cyāvayāti parasmaipada-grahaṇam, iḍvahimahiḍāṃ mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:17673: leṭaḥ iti vā iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:17674: leṭ-sambhandhina uttamapuruṣasya sakārasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17683: ṅito lakārasya ya uttamaḥ, tasya nityaṃ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17698: ṅillakāra-sambandhināṃ caturṇām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tām-ādayaḥ adeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17716: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca || PS_3,4.103 ||
GS24jvkasipu:17719: parasamaipada-viṣayasay liṅo yāsuḍ-āgamo bhavati, sa ca+udātto bhavati ṅic ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17721: āgama-anudāttatve prāpte, ṅittvaṃ tu liṅa eva vidhīyate, tatra tatkāryāṇāṃ sambhavād, na āgamasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17723: sthanivadbhāvād eva liṅādeśasya ṅittve siddhe yāsuṭo ṅid-vacanaṃ jñāpana-artham,
GS24jvkasipu:17731: āśiṣi yo liṅ, tasya yāsuḍāgamo bhavati, sa ca+udāttaḥ kidvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17734: guṇavṛddhi-pratiṣedhaḥ tulyaḥ, samprasāraṇam, jāgarter guṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17743: jhasya liṅ-ādeśasya ran ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17751: liṅādeśasya iaḥ ata ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17756: takārasya itsañjñā-pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti, na vibhaktau tusmāḥ (*1,3.4)
GS24jvkasipu:17757: iti ? na+eva ayam ādeśa-avayavas takāraḥ, kiṃ tarhi, mukhasukha-artha uccāryate /
GS24jvkasipu:17758: āgamasya+iṭo grahaṇaṃ na bhavati, arthavad-grahaṇe nānārthakasya grahaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:17766: tena bhinna-viṣayatvāt suṭā bādhanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17784: sicaḥ parasya, abhyasta-sañjñakebhyo, vetteś ca+uttarasya jher jus, ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17798: sica ākārāntāc ca parasya jheḥ jus-ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17799: katham ābhyāmānantaryam ? sico luki kṛte pratyayalakṣaṇena sico 'nantaraḥ, śrutyā cākārāntād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17804: pūrveṇa+eva sidhddhe niyama-arthaṃ vacanam, āta eva sijlugantāt, na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17806: pratyayalakṣanena jus prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate, tulyajātīyāpekṣatvān niyamasya /
GS24jvkasipu:17807: śrūyamāne hi sici bhavaty eva, akārṣuḥ, ahārṣuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17812: ākārāntād uttarasya laṅādeśasya jheḥ jus ādeśo bhavati śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:17817: atra laṅ eva akārāntād anantaro ṅit sambhavati na anyaḥ, tat kiṃ laṅ-grahaṇena ?
GS24jvkasipu:17818: evaṃ tarthi laṅ eva yo laṅ vihitaḥ tasya yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:17823: sija-bhyasta-vidibhyaś ca (*3,4.109) ity ayam api jher jus loṭo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17833: dviṣaḥ parasya laṅ-ādeśasya jher jusādeśo bhavati, śākaṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:17839: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca prayayāḥ sārvadhātuka-sañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:17846: sārvadhātuka-pradeśāḥ - sārvadhātuke yak (*3,1.67) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17850: tiṅaḥ śitaś ca varjayitvā anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣo dhātu-saṃśabdanena vihitaḥ ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17870: nanu ca ekasañjña-adhikārād anyatra samāveśo bhavati ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:17871: iha tu evakāro 'nuvartate, sa niyamaṃ karisyati //
GS24jvkasipu:17875: āśiṣi viṣaye yo liṅ sa ārdhadhātuka-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17885: chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, sārvadhātukam ārdhadhātukaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:17886: kiṃ liṅ eva anantaraḥ sambadhyate ? na+etad asti, sarvam eva prakaraṇam apekṣyaitad ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:17892: ktinaḥ sārvadhātukatvād aster bhūbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:17898: vyatyayo bahulam (*3,1.85) ity asya+eva ayaṃ prapñcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17899: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:17907: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ āapañvamādhyāya-parisamāpteḥ ṅy-āp-prātipadikād ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17914: yady api ca pratyaya-paratvena pāriśeṣyād iyam eva prakṛtir labhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17918: na prātipadika-grahaṇe liṅga-viśiṣṭasya api grahaṇaṃ bhavati ity eva siddham ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:17919: svarūpavidhi-viṣaye paribhāṣeyaṃ prātipadika-svarūpa-grahaṇe sati liṅga-viśiṣta-grahaṇaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17920: tathā ca yuvā khalati-palita-valina-jaratībhiḥ (*2,1.67) iti jñāpakamasyāstādṛśam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:17934: saṅkhyākarmādayaś ca svādīnām arthāḥ śāstrāntareṇa vihitās tena saha asya+ekavākyatā /
GS24jvkasipu:17971: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ striyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:17973: iti sarvādhikāre 'pi prātipadika-mātram atra prakaraṇe sambadhyate, ṇy-āpor anena+eva vidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:17975: keyaṃ strī nāma ? sāmānya-viśeṣāḥ strītvādayo gotvādaya iva bahuprakārā vyaktayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17976: kvacid āśraya-viśeṣābhāvāt upadeśa-vyaṅgayā eva bhavanti, yathā brāhmaṇatvādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:17978: prakṛtyartha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca ity ubhayathā api prayujyate,
GS24jvkasipu:17979: striyām abhidheyāyāṃ striyāṃ vā yat prātipadikaṃ vartate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:17989: ajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ akārāntāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18001: hal-ṅy-ābbhyo dīrghāt su-ti-sy-apṛktaṃ hal (*6,1.68) iti su-lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18002: ajādi-grahaṇaṃ tu kvacij jāti-lakṣaṇe ṅīṣi prāpte,
GS24jvkasipu:18007: halantānāṃ tavaprāpta eva kasmiṃścid āb vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18008: śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā jātiḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18010: śūdra-śabdaṣ ṭāpam utpādayati jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18016: mahāśūdra-śabdo hy ābhīrajātivacanaḥ, tatra tadanta-vidhinā ṭāp prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18017: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadanta-vidhir na iti kathaṃ tadanta-vidhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:18018: etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati asmin prakaraṇe tadanta-vidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18019: tena atidhīvarī, atipīvarī, atibhavatī, atimahatī iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18021: ajā, eḍakā, caṭakā, aśvā, mūsikā iti jātiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18022: bālā, hoḍhā, pākā, vatsā, mandā, vilātā iti vayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18050: ṛ-kārāntebhyo na-kārāntebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati ṅa-kāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18058: ug iti yatra sambhavati yathākathaṃcit tadugic-chābda-rūpaṃ, tadantāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18073: vannantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati, rephaś cāntādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18078: ṛn-nebhyo ṅīp (*4,1.5) ity eva ṅīpi siddhe tat-sanniyogena repha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:18087: pādantāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18097: ṛci vācyāyāṃ pādantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṭāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18106: ṣaṭ-sañjñākebhyaḥ svasrādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ strī-pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18107: yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa sarvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18119: ṣaṭsañjñānāmante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmān na syat /
GS24jvkasipu:18120: pratyāhārāc cāpā siddhaṃ doṣastvittve tasmān na+ubhau //
GS24jvkasipu:18124: mannantāt prātipadikāt ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18125: ṛn-nemyo ṅīp (*4,1.5) iti ṅīp prāpto manaḥ iti sūtreṇa pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18128: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:18134: annantād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18139: bahuvrīheḥ iti kim ? atikrāntā rājānam atirājī //
GS24jvkasipu:18144: ḍāp pratyayo bhavati ubhābhyāṃ mannantāt prātipadikāt anantāc ca bahuvrīher anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:18155: anyatarasyāṃ-grahaṇaṃ kimartham ? bahuvrīhau, vano ra ca (*4,1.7) ity asya api vikaopo yathā yāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18163: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'nupasarjanāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:18167: anupasarjanāt iti kim ? bahukurucarā, bahumadracarā madhurā /
GS24jvkasipu:18171: anupasarjanāt iti kim ? bahukukkuṭā, bahuśūkarā madhurā /
GS24jvkasipu:18172: kathaṃ punar upasarjanāt pratyayaprasṅgaḥ ? tad antavidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:18173: jñāpitaṃ ca+etad asty atra prakaraṇe tadantavidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18177: na ca aṇ iti kṛd-grahaṇaṃ, taddhito 'py aṇ asti //
GS24jvkasipu:18183: ṭid-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18187: iha kasmān na bhavati, pacamānā, yajamānā ? dvy-anubandhakatvāl laṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18190: paṭhitā vidyā iti ? āgamaṭittvam animittaṃ, ṭyuṭyulau tuṭ ca iti liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18193: niranubandhako ḍha-śabdaḥ striyāṃ na asti iti niranubandhaka-paribhāṣā na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18199: dāṇḍā, mauṣṭā ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18202: śārṅgarava-ādy-año ṅīn (*4,1.73) iti punar año grahaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ṅīṣaṃ bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:18233: yañantāc ca prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18237: iha mā bhūt, dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) dvaipyā /
GS24jvkasipu:18243: prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yañantāt striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati, sa ca taddhita-sañjñaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18252: āvaṭyāt cāpaṃ vakṣyati, tam api bādhitvā prācāṃ ṣpha eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18259: sarvatra lohitādibhyaḥ kataparyantebhyaḥ yañantebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18260: kataśabdaḥ svatantraṃ yat prātipadikaṃ tadavadhitvena parigṛhyate kapi-śabdāt paraḥ kapi kata iti ,
GS24jvkasipu:18264: kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ katād uttara iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18266: prātipadikeṣv anyathā pāṭhaḥ, sa evaṃ vyavasthāpayitavyaḥ iti manyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18267: katantebhyaḥ iti bahuvrīhi-tatpuruṣayor ekaśeṣaḥ, tathā kaṇvādibhyo gotre (*4,2.111) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18268: tatra tatpuruṣa-vṛttyā saṃgṛhīto madhyapātī śakala-śabdo yañantaḥ pratyayadvayam api pratipadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18275: kauravya māṇḍūka ity etābhyāṃ striyāṃ ṣphaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18276: kurvādibhyo ṇye kṛte, ḍhak ca mṇḍūkāt (*4,1.119) ity aṇi ca /
GS24jvkasipu:18280: kathaṃ kauravī senā ? tasya+idaṃ vivakṣāyām aṇi kṛte bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:18283: śaiṣikeṣv artheṣu iñś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇi prāpte chapratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18289: prathame vayasi yat prātipadikaṃ śrutyā vartate tataḥ striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18301: kathaṃ kanyā ? kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca (*4,1.116) iti jñāpakāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18306: dvigu-sañjñakāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18314: aparimāṇa-antāt dvigoḥ bista-ācitakambaly-āntāc ca taddhitaluki sati ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18317: aparimāṇa-antāt tāvat - pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītā pañcāśvā /
GS24jvkasipu:18337: kāṇḍa-śabda-antāt dvigos taddhitaluki sati kṣetre vācye ṅīp pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18338: dve kaṇḍe pramāṇam asyāḥ kṣetra-bhakteḥ, pramaṇe dvayasaj-daghnañ-mātracaḥ (*5,2.37)
GS24jvkasipu:18339: iti vihitasya taddhitasya pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam iti luki kṛte, dvikāṇḍā kṣetra-bhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18341: kāṇḍa-śabdasya aparimāṇavācitvāt pūrveṇa+eva pratiṣedhe siddhe kṣetre niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:18342: iha mā bhūt, dvikāṇḍī rajjuḥ, trikāṇḍī rajjuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18348: pramāṇe yaḥ puruṣa-śabdaḥ, tadantād dvigoḥ taddhitaluki sati anyatarasyāṃ na ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18349: dvau puruṣau pramāṇam asyāḥ parikhāyāḥ dvipuruṣā, dvipuruṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:18351: aparimāṇāntatvān nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:18352: pramāṇe iti kim ? dvābhyāṃ puruṣābhyāṃ krītā dvipuruṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:18360: ūdhas-śabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18366: bahuvrīheḥ iti kim ? prāptā ūdhaḥ prāptodhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18367: ana upadhālopino 'nyatarasyām (*4,1.28) ity asya api ṅīpo 'yam uttaratra anuvṛtter bādhaka iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18369: iha na bhavati, mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:18374: saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca bahuvrīher ūdhas-śabdāntād ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18379: ādi-grahaṇaṃ kim ? dvividhodhnī, trividhodhnī ity atra api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:18385: saṅkhyādeḥ bahuvrīheḥ dāma-śabdāntāt hāyana-śabdāntāt ca striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18397: ṇatvam api tricaturbhyām hāyanasya iti vayasya+iva smaryate //
GS24jvkasipu:18403: ann-anto yo bahuvrīhiḥ upadhālopī, tasmād anyatarasyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18405: kimarthaṃ tarhi idam ucyate, nanu siddhā eva ḍāp-pratiṣedhaṅīpaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:18410: upadhālopinaḥ iti kim ? suparvā, suparve, suparvāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18416: annantād bahuvrīher upadhā-lopinaḥ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye chandasi ca nityaṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18428: kevala-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ sañjñāyāṃ, chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18450: jasviṣayādanyatra sañjñāyāṃ chandasi ca rātri-śabdāt ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18456: kathaṃ timirapaṭalairavaguṇṭhitāś ca ratryaḥ ? ṅīṣayaṃ bahvādi-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18457: tatra hi paṭhyate kṛdikārādaktinaḥ, sarvato 'ktinn-arthāt ity eke iti //
GS24jvkasipu:18463: antarvat-pativator nuk bhavati ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ, sa tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18466: iha na bhavati, antarasyāṃ śālāyāṃ vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18468: antarvat iti matub nipātyate, vatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:18469: pativat iti vatvaṃ nipātyate, matup siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18473: garbhiṇyāṃ jīvapatyāṃ ca vā chandasi tu nug-vidhiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:18482: ṅīp pratyayas tu nakārāntatvād eva siddhaḥ yajñasaṃyoge /
GS24jvkasipu:18486: yajñasaṃyoge iti kim ? grāmasya patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī kathaṃ vṛṣalasya patnī ? upamānād bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:18491: pati-śabda-antasya prātipadikasya sapūrvasya anupasarjanasya striyāṃ vibhāṣā nakāra-ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18496: sapūrvasya iti kim ? patiriyaṃ brāhmaṇī grāmasya //
GS24jvkasipu:18500: saptnyādiṣu nityaṃ patyurnakārādeśo bhavati, ṅīp tu labhyate eva /
GS24jvkasipu:18505: samānādiṣv iti vaktavye samānasya sabhāva-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:18517: pūtakratu-śabdasya striyām aikāraścāntādeśo bhavati, ṅīp pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18520: yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:18524: vṛṣākapy-ādīnām udātta aikārādeśo bhavati striyām, ṅīp ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18536: manu-śabdāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati, aukāraścāntādeśaḥ, aikāraśca udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18547: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt anudāttāntāt takāropadhād vā ṅīp pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:18552: sarve ete ādyudāttāḥ, varṇānāṃ taṇatinitāntānām iti vacanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:18558: topadhāt iti kim ? anyato ṅīṣaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:18575: varṇād anudāttāt iti vartate, topadhāpekṣam anyatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:18576: varṇa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād anudāttāntāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18588: ṣidbhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gaurādibhyaś ca striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18712: iti ṣittvād eva siddhe jñāpana-arthaṃ vacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:18718: jānapada-ādibhya ekādaśabhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ekādaśasu vṛttyādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18736: nāgaśabdo guṇavacanaḥ sthaulye ṅīṣamutpādayati, anyatra guṇa eva ṭāpam /
GS24jvkasipu:18760: śoṇa-śabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18766: guṇavacanāt prātipadikād ukārāntāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18777: ādheyaś ca akriyājaś ca so 'sattvaprakṛtir guṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:18781: bahu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18821: bahv-ādibhyaḥ chandasi viṣaye nityaṃ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18828: chandasi viṣaye striyāṃ bhuvo nityaṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18832: iha kasmān na bhavati, svayambhūḥ ? utaḥ iti taparakaraṇam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:18839: puṃyogād dhetor yat prātipadikaṃ striyāṃ vartate puṃsa ākhyābhūtaṃ tasmād ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18844: puṃsi śabdapravṛtti-nimittasya sambhavāt puṃśabdā ete, tadyogāt striyāṃ vartante /
GS24jvkasipu:18849: puṃyogād ete śabdāḥ striyāṃ vartante, na tu pumāṃsamācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:18858: indrādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ striyām ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati, ānuk ca āgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18859: yeṣām atra puṃyoga eva iṣyate, teṣām ānugāgamamātraṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:18884: vinā puṃyogena svārtha eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18893: karaṇaṃ pūrvam asminn iti karaṇapūrvaṃ pratipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:18894: krīta-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt karaṇa-pūrvāt striyāṃ ṅīp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18899: iha kasmān na bhavati, sā hī tasya dhanakrītī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī iti ? ṭābantena samasaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:18901: gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prāk subutpatteḥ iti bahulaṃ taducyate,
GS24jvkasipu:18907: karaṇapūrvāt prātipadikāt ktāntād alpākhyāyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:18918: bahuvrīhir yo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18931: yasya astu kathañcit pāṇir gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18946: asvāṅgapūrvapadād antodāttāt ktāntād bahuvrīheḥ striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18957: pravṛddhā ca asau vilūnā ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:18962: bahuvrīheḥ ktāntād antodāttāt iti sarvaṃ nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:18964: svāṅgaṃ yad upasarjanam asaṃyogopadhaṃ tad antāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:18977: atatsthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭaṃ cet tena cettattathāyutam //
GS24jvkasipu:18982: bahvaj-lakṣaṇe saṃyogopadha-lakṣaṇe ca pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:18984: nāsikā-ādyantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ vā ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19006: kroḍādyantāt bahvajantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19024: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt iti, nāsika-udara-oṣṭha-jaṅghā-danta-karṇa. śṛggāc ca (*4,1.55)
GS24jvkasipu:19026: saha nañ vidyamāna evaṃ pūrvāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19037: nakha-mukhāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyām viṣaye striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19055: svāṅgāc ca+upasarjanāt ity evam ādividhi-pratiṣedha-viṣayaḥ sarvo 'py apekṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19056: yatra ṅīṣ vihitas tatra tad apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19061: iha na bhavati, prāggulphā, prākkroḍā, prāgjaghanā iti //
GS24jvkasipu:19068: bahantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19074: sakhī aśiśvī ity etau śabdau ṅīṣantau bhāṣāyāṃ nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:19076: na asyāḥ śiśur asti iti aśiśvī /
GS24jvkasipu:19077: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? sakhā saptapadī bhava /
GS24jvkasipu:19082: jātivāci yat prātipadikaṃ na ca striyām eva niyatam astrīviṣayam ayakāropadhaṃ ca tasmāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19083: ākṛti-grahaṇā jātir liṅgānāṃ ca na sarvabhāk /
GS24jvkasipu:19106: pāka-ādy-uttarapadāt jātivācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19107: strī-viṣayatvād eteṣāṃ pūrveṇa aprāptaḥ pratyayo bidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19115: puṣpa-phala-mūla-uttarapadāt tu yato neṣyate tadajādiṣu paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19121: ikārāntāt prātipadikāt manuṣyajāti-vācinaḥ striyāṃ ṅīṣ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19129: jāteḥ iti vartamāne punar jāti-grahaṇaṃ yopadhād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19139: ukārāntāt manusyajāti-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19156: bāhu-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19159: sañjñāyām iti kim ? vṛttau bāhū asyāḥ vṛttabāhuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19171: ūru-uttarapadāt prātipadikāt aupamye gamyamāne striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19179: saṃhita śapha lakṣaṇa vāma ity evam ādeḥ prātipadikād ūru-uttarapadāt striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19191: kadru-śabdāt kamaṇḍalu-śabdāc ca chandasi ciṣaye striyāṃ ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19204: kadru-kamaṇḍalu-śabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye striyām ūṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19214: śārṅgaravādibhyo 'ñantebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ striyāṃ ṅīn pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19220: tena jāti-lakṣaṇo ṅīṣ anena bādhyate, na puṃyoga-lakṣaṇaḥ, baidasya strī baidī /
GS24jvkasipu:19248: atra yathāyogaṃ ṅībādiṣu prāpteṣu ṅīn vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:19252: yaṅantāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19261: ṣāt paro yo yañ tadantāc cāp vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19269: avaṭa-śabdo gargādiḥ, tasmād yañi kṛte ṅīpi prāpte vacanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:19270: āvaṭyāc ca striyāṃ cāp pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19271: āvaṭyā prācāṃ ṣpha eva, sarvatra grahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19277: āpañcamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yānita ūrdhvam anukramisyāmaḥ taddhitasañjñāste veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19280: pṛthivyā ñāñau (*4,1.85), agrādipaścāḍ ḍimac (*4,3.23) ity evam ādi labdhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19281: taddhita-pradeśāḥ - kṛt-taddhita-samāsāś ca (*1,2.46) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19286: yuvan-śabdāt prātipadikāt striyāṃ tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19291: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre || PS_4,1.78 ||
GS24jvkasipu:19293: gotre yāv aṇiñau vihitāv anārṣau tadantayoḥ prātipadikayor gurūpottamayoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19294: nirdiṣyamānasya ādeśā bhavanti ity aṇiñor eva vijñāyate, na tu samudāyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19299: guru upottamaṃ yasya tad gurūpottamaṃ prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:19312: aṇiñoḥ iti kim ? ṛtabhāgasyāpatyaṃ, badāditvādañ, ārtabhāgī /
GS24jvkasipu:19313: gurūpottamādikaṃ sarvam asti iti na staṇiñau /
GS24jvkasipu:19319: gotre iti kim ? tatra jātāḥ (*4,3.25) - āhicchatrī /
GS24jvkasipu:19326: tato gotre vihitayor aṇiñoḥ striyāṃ ṣyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19331: yeṣāṃ svanantarāpatye 'pi iṣyate daivadattyā, yājñādattyā iti , te krauḍyādiṣu draṣṭavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19335: krauḍi ity evam ādibhyaś ca striyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19363: daivayajñi śaucivṛkṣi sātyamugri kāṇṭheviddhi ity eteṣām anyatarasyāṃ ṣyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19364: iñantā ete, gotra-grahaṇaṃ ca na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19366: gotre pūrveṇa ṣyaṅādeśaḥ prāpto vikalpyate, agotre tvanantare 'patye pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19367: tena mukte ito manusyajāte (*4,1.65) iti ṅīṣ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19375: trayam apy adhikriyate samarthānām iti ca, prathamād iti ca, vā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:19376: svārthika-pratyayāvadhiścāyam adhikāraḥ, prāgdiśo vibhaktiḥ (*5,3.1) iti vāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:19377: svārthikeṣu hy asya+upayogo na asti, vikalpo 'pi tatra anavasthitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19383: teṣu sāmarthye sati prathama-nirdiṣṭād eva vikalpena pratyayo bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19389: samarthānām iti kim ? kambala upagoḥ, apatyaṃ devadattasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19390: prathamāt iti kim ? ṣaṣṭhyāntād yathā syāt, prathamāntān mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:19391: vā iti kim ? vākyam api yathā syāt upagor apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19392: yady evaṃ samāsa-vṛttiḥ taddhita-vṛttyā bādhyeta upagvapatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19401: prāg - dīvyatsaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyamaḥ, aṇ pratyayas tatra bhavati iti veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19402: adhikāraḥ, paribhāṣā, cidhirvā iti triṣv api darśaneṣv apavādaviṣayaṃ parigṛtya aṇ pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19408: aśvapatyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19431: patyuttarapadāt ca prātipadikāt prāgdīvyatīyeṣv artheṣu ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19467: ajādi-pratyaya-prasaṅge iti kim ? gobhyo hetubhya āgataṃ gorūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19474: sarvato 'ktinn-arthād ity eke iti ṅīṣaṃ kṛtvā strībhyo ḍhak kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19481: utsādibhyaḥ prāgdīvyatīyeṣu artheṣu añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19515: sacchabdo matubanta āgatanuṅko gṛhyate sattvantu iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19526: chandaś ca+iha vṛttaṃ gṛhyate, na vedaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:19530: dhānyānāṃ bhavane kṣetre khañ (*5,2.1) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:19532: prāgbhavanasaṃśabdanād ye 'rthās teṣu strī-śabdāt puṃs-śabdāc ca yathākramaṃ nañsnañau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19541: striyāḥ puṃvat iti jñāpakād vatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19542: yoga-apekṣaṃ ca jñāpakam iti strīvad ity api siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:19546: prāgdīvyataḥ iti vartate, na bhavanāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19548: dvigor yaḥ sambandhī nimittatvena taddhitaḥ prāgdīvyatīyo 'patya-pratyayaṃ varjayitvā tasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19556: dvigu-nimittavijñānād iha na bhavati, pañcakapālasya+idaṃ pāñcakapālam /
GS24jvkasipu:19557: atha vā dvigor eva ayaṃ lug vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19559: nanu ca pratyayādarśanasya+eṣā sañjñā ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:19560: upacāreṇa tu lakṣaṇayā dvigu-nimitta-bhūtaḥ pratyaya eva dviguḥ, tasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19561: dvigu-nimittako 'pi tarhi guṇakalpanayā kasmān na dvigur ucyate pājcakapālam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:19563: itaras tu dvigutvasya+eva nimittam ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19564: yady evam iha kathaṃ pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti ? na+eva atra taddhita utpadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19567: traiśabdyaṃ hi sādhyaṃ, pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ, pañcakapālyāṃ saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19568: tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayor ekena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19572: pañcagargam ayam iti vā ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:19579: ity ādinā yeṣāṃ gotrapratyayānāṃ lug uktaḥ, teṣāmajādau prāgdīvyatīye viśayabhūte pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19586: aci iti kim ? gargebhya āgatam gargarūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19588: prāgdīvyataḥ ity eva, gargebhyo hi tam gārgīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:19589: gotrasya bahuṣu lopino bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayor aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:19590: bidānām apatyaṃ yuvā, yuvānau baidaḥ, baidau /
GS24jvkasipu:19591: vaida-śabdāt ataḥ iñ kṛte tasya ca iñaḥ ṇya-kṣatriya-ārṣa-ñito yūni lug-aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,
GS24jvkasipu:19594: baidasya baidayor vā apatyaṃ bahavo māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19599: prāg dīvyataḥ iti vartate, aci ca /
GS24jvkasipu:19600: prāgdīvyatīye ajādau pratyaye vivakṣite buddhisthe 'nutpanna eva yuva-pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19601: tasman nivṛtte sati yo yataḥ prāpnoti sa tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19603: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, phāṇṭāhṛti-mimatābhyāṃ ṇa-phiñau (*4,1.150), phāṇṭāgṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19604: tasya chāatrāḥ iti vivakṣite 'rthe buddhisthe yuva-pratyaysya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19606: tasmāt iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ bhavati, phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19608: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, vṛddhāṭ ṭhak sauvīreṣu bahulam (*4,1.148) iti ṭhak, bhāgavittikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19609: tasya chātrāḥ, pūrvavad yuvapratyaye nivṛtte, iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ, bhāgavittāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19611: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, pheś cha ca (*4,1.149) iti chaḥ, taikāyanīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19612: tasya chātraḥ, yuva-pratyaye nivṛtte vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114), taikāyanīyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19614: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, kurvādibhyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151), kāpiñjalādyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19615: tasya chātrāḥ, ṇye nivṛtte iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ity aṇ, kāpiñjalādāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19616: glucukasya apatyaṃ, prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam (*4,1.160) iti glucukāyaniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19618: tasya chātrāḥ, yuva-pratyaye nivṛtte sa eva aṇ, glaucukāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19621: prāgdīvyataḥ ity eva, bhāgavittikāya hitaṃ bhāgavittikīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:19627: pūrvasūtreṇa nitye luki prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19628: phakphiñor yuva-pratyayayoḥ prāgdīvyatīye 'jādau pratyaye vivakṣite 'nyatarasyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19629: gargādibhyo yañi kṛte yañiñoś ca (*4,1.101) iti phak, gārgyāyaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19632: phiñaḥ khalv api yaskasya apatyaṃ, śivādibhyo 'ṇ (*4,1.112), yāskaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19633: tasya apatyaṃ yuvā, aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156) iti phiñ, yāskāyaniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19638: artha-nirdeśo 'yaṃ, pūrvair uttaraiś ca pratyayair abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19639: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19649: utsargaḥ śeṣa eva asau vṛddhāny asya prayojanam //
GS24jvkasipu:19656: tasman vivakṣite bhedena pratyapatyaṃ pratyayotpatti-prasṅge niyamaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:19660: yo 'pi vyavahitena janitaḥ, so 'pi prathamaprakṛter apatyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:19663: tatputro 'pi vyavahitena janitaḥ, so 'pi prathamaprakṛter apatyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:19667: sarvasmin vyavahitajanite 'pi gotrāpatye garga-śabdād yañ eva bhavati iti pratyayo niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19668: athavā gotrāpatye vivakṣite eka eva śabdaḥ prathamā prakṛtiḥ pratyayam utpādayati iti prakṛtir niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19675: yūny apatye vivakṣite gotrād eva pratyayo bhavati, na paramaprakṛtyanantarayuvabhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19684: kiṃ punar atra pratiṣidhyate ? yadi niyamaḥ, striyām aniyamaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:19686: striyā gotraprayayena abhidhānaṃ na prāpnoti gora-sañjñāyāḥ yuva-sañjñayā bādhitatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:19690: yūni yad uktaṃ tat striyāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19691: yuvasañjñā+eva pratiṣidhyate, tena strī gotrapratyayena abhidhāsyate //
GS24jvkasipu:19700: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? śubhaṃyāḥ, kīlālapāḥ ity ato mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:19701: kathaṃ pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithili ? śeṣavivakṣayā bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:19705: bāhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19756: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣāṃ darśanaṃ gotrabhāve laukike tato 'nyatra teṣāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19769: sudhātṛ-śabdād apatye iñ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca tasya akaṅ adeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19782: gotrasañjñake 'patye vācye kuñjādibhyaḥ cphañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19788: gotre iti kim ? kuñjasya apatyam anantaraṃ kauñjiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:19790: bahuvacane tu kauñjāyanāḥ iti, param api ñitsvaraṃ tyaktvā citsvara eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19809: naḍ ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19813: śalaṅku śalaṅkaṃ ca ity atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19818: tat katham ? gotra-viśeṣe kauśike phakaṃ smaranti, iñ eva anyatra śālaṅkiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19819: athavā pailādipāṭha eva jñāpakaḥ iño bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:19896: na ca gotrādaparo gotrapratyayo bhavati eko gotre (*4,1.93) iti vacanāt ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:19898: iha tu gotrādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19903: yañantāt iñantāc ca prātipadikād apatye phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19908: dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10), sutaṅ-gamādibhya iñ (*4,2.80) ity ato na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19910: tadantāt tu yūny eva ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, gotrād yūni pratyayo bhavati iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:19915: śaradvat śunaka darbha ity etebhyo gotrāpatye phak pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhṛguvatsāgrāyaṇeṣu artheṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:19928: droṇādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo gotrāpatye 'nyatarasyāṃ phak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19933: katham anantaraḥ aśvatthāmā drauṇāyanaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:19945: ye punar atra anṛṣi-śabdāḥ putrādayastebhyo 'nantarāpatye eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:19948: anṛṣyānantaryasya ayam arthaḥ, anṛṣibhyo 'nantare bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:19949: yady ayam arthaḥ, ṛṣyapatye nairantarya-pratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:19950: tatra+idaṃ na sidhyati, indrabhūḥ saptamaḥ kāśyapānām /
GS24jvkasipu:19953: ṛṣyapatye nairantaryaviṣaye pratiṣedhe vijñāyamāne kauśiko viśvāmitraḥ iti duṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:19955: nanu ca ṛṣyaṇā bhavitavyam ? bāhvādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ, tena iñ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20008: tatra katham mānavī prajā ? gotre ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20010: katham anantaro rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ, vyāsaḥ pārāśaryaḥ iti ? gotrarūpādhyāropeṇa bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:20011: anantarāpatyavivakṣāyāṃ tu ṛṣyaṇaiva bhavitavyaṃ jāmadagnaḥ, pārāśaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20104: madhu-śabdād babhru-śabdāc ca gotrāpatye yañ pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyam brāhmaṇe kauśike vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:20109: babhru-śabdo gargādiṣu paṭhyate, tataḥ siddhe yañi kauśike niyama-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:20115: kapi-bodha-śabdābhyām āṅgirase 'patya-viśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20121: tasya niyamarthaṃ vacanam, āṅgirase yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20128: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirase 'patyaviśeṣe gotre yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20131: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā gargādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate ? śivādiṣu api ayaṃ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20133: anāṅgirase tu ubhayatra pāṭhasāmarthyāt pratyayadvayam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20140: vataṇḍa-śabdād āṅgirasyāṃ striyāṃ yapratyayasya luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20152: ye tv atra pratyayāntāḥ paṭhyante tebhyaḥ sāmārthyād yūni pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20226: bharga-śabdād apatye viśeṣe traigarte gotre phañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20241: gaṅgā-śabdaḥ paṭhyate tikādiphiñā śumrādiḍhakā ca samāveśa-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:20320: vṛddhir yasya acām ādis tad vṛddham (*1,1.73) /
GS24jvkasipu:20325: avṛddhāni yāni nadīnāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ ca nāmadheyāni, tebhyo 'patye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20331: mānuṣībhyaḥ khalv api - śikṣitāyāḥ apatyaṃ śaikṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20333: avṛddhābhyaḥ iti kim ? candrabhāgāyāḥ apatyaṃ cāndrabhāgeyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20345: atryādibhyas tu paratvāḍ ḍhagādibhir eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20354: kathaṃ punar nityānāṃ śabdānāmandhakādivaṃśasamāśrayeṇa anvākhyānaṃ yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:20355: kecid āhuḥ katham api kākatālīyanyāyena kurvādivaṃśeṣvasaṃkareṇa+eva nakulasahadevādayaḥ śabdāḥ subahavaḥ saṅkalitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:20363: matṛ-śabdāt saṅkhyā-pūrvāt saṃ-pūrvāt bhadra-pūrvāc ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20369: ukāra-adeśa-arthaṃ vacanaṃ, pratyayaḥ punar utsargeṇa+eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20370: strīliṅga-nirdeśo 'rtha-apekṣaḥ, tena dhānyamātur grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20384: vikarṇ-aśuṅga-chaṅgala-śabdebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vatsabharadvājātriṣu apatya-viśeṣeṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20391: śuṅgā-śabdaṃ strīliṅga-manye paṭhanti, tato ḍhakaṃ pratyudāharanti śauṅgeyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20392: dvayam api ca+etat pramāṇam, ubhayathā sūtra-praṇayanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:20396: tannāmikāṇo bādhake dvyaca iti ḍhaki prāpte aṇ pratyayaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20397: pīlāyāḥ apatye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20427: dvyacaḥ strī-pratyayāntād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20437: ikārāntāt prātipadikād aniñ-antād apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20444: dvyacaḥ ity eva, marīcer aptyaṃ mārīcaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:20449: śubhra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20455: pāṇḍaveyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20518: vikarṇa-śabdāt kuṣītaka-śabdāc ca kāṣyape 'patya-viśeṣe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20526: bhrūśabdādaptye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati, tatsanniyogena ca vugāgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20531: kalyāṇī ity evam ādīnāṃ śabdānām apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca inaṅ-ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20555: kulaṭāyāḥ apatye ḍhak pratyayo bhavati, tatsanniyogena ca vā inaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20556: ādeśa-arthaṃ vacanaṃ, pratyayaś ca pūrveṇa+eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20558: yā tu kulānyaṭantī śīlaṃ bhinatti, tataḥ kṣudrābhyo vā (*4,1.131) iti paratvāḍ ḍhrakā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20577: śubhrādiṣv ayaṃ paṭhyate, tena gaudheyaḥ api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:20581: godhāyāḥ apatye udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ārak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20583: ācārya-grahaṇaṃ pūja-arthaṃ, vacanasāmrthyād eva pūrveṇa samāveśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20584: ārag-vacanam anarthakaṃ, rakā siddhatvāt ? jñāpakaṃ tvayam anyebhyo 'pi bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20593: kṣudrābhyo vā apatye dṛak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20605: pitṛṣVasuḥ apatya-pratyaye ḍhaki parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20607: kathaṃ punar iha ḍhak pratyayaḥ ? etad eva jñāpakaṃ ḍhako bhāvasya //
GS24jvkasipu:20613: pitṛṣvasur yad uktaṃ tan mātṛṣvasur api bhavati, chanṇ-pratyayo ḍhaki lopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20661: uttara-sūtre pūrva-pratiṣedhād iha tadantaḥ kevalaś ca dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20662: kula-śabda-antāt prātipadikāt kevalāc ca apatye khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20672: apūrvapadāt kula-śabdāt anyatarasyāṃ yat ḍhakañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20675: pada-grahaṇaṃ kim ? bahucpūrvād api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20711: bhrātṛ-śabdād vyan pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ca+idam itraḥ sapatna ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20718: revatī ity evam ādibhyo 'patye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20735: gotraṃ yā strī tadabhidhāyinaḥ śabdād apatye ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20751: vṛddhāt sauvīragotrād apatye bahulaṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati kutsane gamyamane /
GS24jvkasipu:20760: tṛtīyas tvākaśāpeyo gotrāṭ ṭhag bahulaṃ tataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:20765: gotrastriyāḥ ity ārabhya catvāro yogās teṣu prathamaḥ kutsana eva,
GS24jvkasipu:20772: kutsane ity eva, sauvīreṣu iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:20773: pheḥ iti phiño grahaṇaṃ na phinaḥ, vṛddha-adhikārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20774: phiñantāt prātipadikāt sauvīragotrād apatye chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhak, kutsane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:20778: phiñantād autsargikasya aṇa āgatasya ṇya-kṣatriya-arṣa-ñito yūni lug aṇ-iñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:20780: yamundaś ca suyāmā ca vārṣyāyaṇiḥ phiñaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20781: sauvīreṣu ca kutsāyāṃ dvau yogau śabdavit samaret //
GS24jvkasipu:20787: phāṇṭāhṛtimimataśabdābhyāṃ sauvīra-viṣayābhyām apatye ṇa-phiñau pratyayu bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20789: alpāctarasya apūrvanipāto lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāra-cihnaṃ, tena yathāsaṅkhyam iha na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20800: kuru ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20806: tasya bahuṣu lukā bhavitavyam, ayaṃ tu śrūyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:20808: kauravyaśabdasya kṣatriya-vacanasya tikādiṣu pāṭhāt phiñ api bhavati, phauravyāyaṇiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20811: kāriṇas tu rathakāra-śabdād uttarasūtreṇa+eva ṇyaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20816: katham bhāṣāyāṃ vainyo rājā iti ? chandasa eva ayaṃ pramādāt kavibhiḥ prayuktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20817: vāmaratha-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya kaṇvādivat kāryam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20825: svaras tu ṇyapratyayasya+eva bhavati, na atideśikamādyudāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:20869: senāntāt prātipadikāt lakṣaṇa-śabdāt kāri-vacanebhyaś ca apatye ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20881: senānta-lakṣaṇa-kāribhyo 'patye iñ pratyayo bhavati udīcāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:20887: vacanasāmarthyād eva pratyaya-samāveśe labdhe ācārya-grahaṇaṃ vaicitry-ārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:20888: takṣan-śabdaḥ śivādiḥ, tena aṇā ayam iñ bādhyate, na tu ṇyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:20893: tika ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20896: vṛṣa-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, tasya pratyaya-sanniyogena yakārantatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:20898: kauravya-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, sa ca kṣatraya-vacanaḥ, aurasa-śabdena kṣtriya-pratyayāntena sāhacaryāt /
GS24jvkasipu:20899: yas tu kurv-ādihyo ṇyaḥ (*4,1.151) , tadantād iñaiva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20901: ity atra udāhṛtaṃ kauravyaḥ pita, kauravyaḥ putraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20949: paramaprakṛter eva ayaṃ pratayayaḥ iṣyate, kauśalasya apatyaṃ, karmārasya patyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20951: yathā ca smṛtyantaram, dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣāṇāṃ yuṭ vādiṣṭasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:20960: aṇantād dvyacaḥ prātipadikād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:20974: vṛddhaṃ yacchabda-rūpam agotraṃ, tasmād apatye phiñ pratyayo bhavati udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:20977: kāriśabdād api vṛddhād agotrāt paratvād anena+eva bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:20985: vākina ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'patye phiñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:20987: yadiha vṛddham agotraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tasya āgama-artham eva grahaṇam, anyeṣām ubhaya-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:20991: udīcām ity adhikārāt pakṣe te 'pi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:21004: putrāntam agotram iti pūrveṇa+eva pratyayḥ siddhaḥ, tasminn anena kug-āgamo 'nyatarasyāṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21014: avṛddhāc chabdarūpād apatye phin pratyayo bhavati bahulaṃ prācāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:21019: udīcāṃ prācām anyatarasyāṃ bahulam iti sarva ete vikalpa-arthas teṣām ekena+eva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21025: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca || PS_4,1.161 ||
GS24jvkasipu:21027: manu-śabdād añ yat ity etau pratyau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21033: tathā ca mānuṣāḥ iti bahuṣu na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21036: apatye kutsite mūḍhe manor autsargikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21037: nakārasya ca mūrdhanyas tena sidhyati māṇavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21041: pautraprabhṛti yad apatyaṃ tad gotra-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21042: sambandhi-śabdatvād apatya-śabdasya yad apatyaṃ tad apekṣayā pautra-prabhṛter gotra-sañjñā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21046: pautra-prabhṛti iti kim ? anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:21049: gotra-pradeśāḥ - eko gotre (*4,1.93) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21055: tasmin jīvati sati pautraprabhṛty-apatyaṃ yuva-sañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21056: pautraprabhṛti iti ca na sāmānāadhikaraṇyena apatyaṃ viśeṣayati,
GS24jvkasipu:21058: ṣaṣṭhyā vipariṇamyate pautra-prabhṛter yad apatyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21067: bhratari jyayasi jīvati kanīyān bhrātā yuva-sañjño bhavati pautra-prabhṛter apatyam /
