GS24jvkasipu:21069: tayoḥ kanīyān mṛte pitrādau vaṃśye bhrātari jyāyasi jīvati yuva-sañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21074: gārgye jīvati, gārgyāyaṇo asya kanīyān bhrātā /
GS24jvkasipu:21080: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati || PS_4,1.165 ||
GS24jvkasipu:21083: yeṣām ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyannaṃ na bhujyate ity evam ādikāyāṃ kriyāyām anadhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21084: bhrātur anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jīvati pautraprabhṛter apatyaṃ jīvadeva yuvasañjñam vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21085: prakṛtaṃ jīvati-grahaṇaṃ sapiṇḍasya viśeṣaṇam, idaṃ tu sañjñinaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21087: sthānena vayasā ca+utkṛṣṭe yathā syāt pitṛvye pitāmahe bhrātari vayasādhike jivati /
GS24jvkasipu:21091: sthaviratare iti kim ? sthānavayonayūne gārgya eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21092: jīvati iti kim ? mṛte mṛto vā gārgya eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:21096: apatyam antarhitaṃ vṛddham iti śāstrāntare paribhāṣaṇād gotraṃ vṛddham ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21097: vṛddhasya yuvasañjñā vā bhavati pūjāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:21099: vṛddhasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-nirdeśo vicitrā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21108: kutsāyāṃ gamyamanāyāṃ yūno vā yuvasañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21110: yuvasañjñāyāṃ pratiṣiddhāyāṃ pakṣe gotrasañjñā+eva bhavati, pratipakṣābhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:21119: janapadaśabdo yaḥ kṣatriya-vācī, tasmād apatye añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21122: janapadaśabdāt iti kim ? druhyor apatyaṃ drauhyavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21124: kṣatriyāt iti kim ? brāhmaṇasya pañcālasya apatyaṃ pāñcāliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21134: janapadaśabdāv etau kṣatriyābhidhāyinau tābhyām añapavāde vṛddhād iti ñyaṅi prāte punar añ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21137: tasya rājani ity eva, sālveyo rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:21144: magadha kaliṅga sūramasa iti etebhyaś ca apatye aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21152: tasya rājani ity eva, āṅgo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:21157: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt ikārāntāt ca, kosala-ajāda-śabdābhyāṃ ca aptya ñyaṅ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21166: taparakaranam kim ? kumārī nāma janapadasamānaśabdaḥ kṣatriyaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ kaumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21170: tasya rājani ity eva, āmbaṣṭhyo rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:21179: kuruśabdāt nādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyo ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21184: tasya rājani ity eva, kauravyo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:21189: salvā nāma akṣatriyā tannāmikā, tasyā apatyaṃ, dvyacaḥ (*4,2.121) iti ḍhak, sālveyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21192: tad avyavā udumbarādayaḥ, tebhyaḥ kṣatriya-vṛttibhya idaṃ pratyaya-vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:21193: sālvāvayavebhyaḥ pratyagratha-kalakūṭa-aśmaka-śabdebhyaś cāpatye iñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21204: tasya rājani ity eva, audumbarī rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:21212: ity evam ādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sarvanāmnā pratyavamṛśyante,
GS24jvkasipu:21217: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva astriyām (*2,4.62) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21221: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyāt ity anena vihitasya año lug ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21229: tasya rājani ity eva, kambojo rājā //
GS24jvkasipu:21233: avanti-kunti-kuru-śabdebhya utpannasya tadrājasya stiryām abhidheyāyāṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21245: akāra-pratyayasya tadrājasya striyām abhidheyāyām lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21250: avantyādibhyo lugvacanāt tadantavidhiratra nāsti, teneha na bhavati, āmbaṣṭhyā /
GS24jvkasipu:21255: prācyebhyaḥ bhargādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca utpannasya lugna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21256: ataś ca (*4,1.177) ity anena striyāṃ luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21268: kasya punar akārasya pratyayasya yaudheyādibhyo luk prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:21270: kathaṃ punas tasya bhinnaprakaraṇasthasya anena luk prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:21271: etad eva vijñāpayati pāścamikasya api tadrājasya ataś ca ity anena lug bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21272: kim etasya jñāpanena prayojanam ? parśvādyāṇaḥ striyāṃ luk siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21276: tathā ca+uktaṃ yaudheyādi-pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ parśvādyaṇo luk iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21297: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyām kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21306: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād rāgaviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād raktam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitam pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21310: rāgāt iti kim ? devadattena raktaṃ vastram /
GS24jvkasipu:21311: kathaṃ kāṣāyau gardabhasya karṇau, hāridrau kukkuṭasya padau iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:21312: upamānād bhaviṣyati, kāṣāyau iva kāṣāyau, hāridrāv iva hāridrau /
GS24jvkasipu:21313: dvaipa-vaiyāghrād añ (*4,2.12) iti yāvat tṛtīyāsamartha-vibhaktir anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:21317: lākṣādibhyo rāgavacanebhyas tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo raktam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21337: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād nakṣatraviśeṣa-vācinaḥ śabdād yuktaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21340: kathaṃ punar nakṣatreṇa puṣyādinā kālo yujyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:21341: puṣyādi-samīpasthe candramasi vartamānāḥ puṣyādi-śabdāḥ pratyayamutpādayanti puṣyeṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21347: nakṣatreṇa iti kim ? candramasā yuktā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21348: kālaḥ iti kim ? puṣyeṇa yuktaś candramāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21353: pūrveṇa vihitasya pratyayasya lub bhavati aviśeṣe /
GS24jvkasipu:21355: yāvan kāle nakṣatreṇa yujyate ahorātraḥ, tasya aviśeṣe lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21363: aviśeṣe lup vihitaḥ pūrveṇa, viśeṣa-artho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21364: śravana-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca+utpannasya pratyayasya lub bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21369: sañjñāyām iti kim ? śrāvaṇī, āśvatthī rātriḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21373: nakṣatradvandvāt tṛtīyāsamarthād yukte kāle chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, viśeṣe ca aviśeṣe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21382: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21383: yad dṛṣṭaṃ sāma cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21390: kali-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21395: evam agnau bhavam, agner āgatam, agneḥ svam iti sarvatra ḍhag eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21398: dṛṣṭe sāmani aṇ vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21400: jāte ca arthe yo 'nyena bādhitaḥ punar aṇ vidhīyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21402: prāgdīvyato 'ṇ prāptaḥ kālaṭhañā bādhitaḥ saṃdhivelādy-ṛtu-nakṣatrebhyaḥ iti punar vidhiyate sa vā ḍid bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21417: dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca dviraṇ ḍidvā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21422: vāmadeva-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt dṛṣṭaṃ sāma ity etasminn arthe ḍyat ḍya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21426: ḍitkaraṇaṃ kim artham ? ya-yatoś ca atadarthe (*6,2.156)
GS24jvkasipu:21427: iti naña uttarasya antodāttatve vidhīyamāne 'nyor grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:21428: ananubandhakagrahaṇa-paribhāṣayā ekānubandhakagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā ca anayor nivṛttiḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21430: siddhe yasya+iti lopena kimarthaṃ yayatau ḍitau /
GS24jvkasipu:21435: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛtaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21436: yo 'sau parivṛtaḥ rathaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21440: rathaḥ iti kim ? vastreṇa parivṛtaḥ kāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21442: yasya kaścid avayavo vastrādibhir aveṣṭitaḥ, tatra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21448: pāṇḍukambala-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21457: tābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ parivṛto rathaḥ ity etasminn arthe añ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21468: apūrvapatiṃ kumārīṃ patir upapannaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21470: apūrvapatiḥ kumārī patim upapannā kaumārī bhāryā /
GS24jvkasipu:21473: apūrvatvaṃ yadā tasyāḥ kumāryāṃ bhavati iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:21474: kumāryāṃ bhavaḥ kaumāraḥ patiḥ, tasya strī kaumārī bhāryā iti siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:21478: tatra iti saptamīsamarthād amatra-vācinaḥ śabdād uddhṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21479: bhuktocchiṣṭam uddhṛtam ucyate, yasya+uddharaṇam iti prasiddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21485: tatra iti saptamī samarthavibhaktiḥ kṣīrāḍ ḍhañ (*4,2.20) iti yāvad anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:21489: sthaṇḍila-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaryabhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21494: vrate iti kim ? sthāṇḍile śete brahmadattaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21499: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21500: yat saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ cet te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:21506: bhakṣāḥ iti kim ? puṣpapuṭe saṃskṛto mālāguṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21510: śūla-śabdād ukhā-śabdāc ca saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21517: dadhi-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21519: nanu ca saṃskṛta-arthe prāgvahateḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati, tena+eva siddham ? na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21520: dadhnā hi tat saṃskṛtaṃ yasya dadhikṛtam eva+utkarṣādhānam,
GS24jvkasipu:21526: udaśvic-chabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ it yetasminn arthe anyatarasyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21532: kṣīra-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt saṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣāḥ ity etasminn arthe ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21538: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21539: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ paurṇamāsī ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21541: sañjñāyām iti samudāyopādhiḥ, pratyayāntena cet sañjñā gamyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21547: iha na bhavati, pauṣī paurṇamāsī asmin daśarātre iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21549: itikaraṇasya sañjñāśabdasya ca tulyam eva phalaṃ prayoga-anusaraṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:21551: sañjñāśabdena tulyatām iti karaṇasya jñāpayituṃ, na hy ayaṃ loke tathā prasiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21552: sañjñārthatve tu samprati jñāpite yat tatra tatra+ucyate itikaraṇas tataś ced vivakṣā iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21555: athavā pūrṇo māḥ pūrṇamāḥ, pūrṇamāsa iyaṃ paurṇamāsī /
GS24jvkasipu:21560: sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:21561: āgrahāyaṇī-śabdād aśvattha-śabdāc ca prathamasamarthāt paurṇamāsy-upādhikād asminn iti saptamyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21568: phalguny-ādayaḥ paurṇamāsī-śabdāḥ tebhyo vibhāṣā ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21571: nityam aṇi prāpte pakṣe ṭhag vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:21579: sā iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21580: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ devatā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21581: yāgasaṃpradānaṃ devatā, deyasya puroḍāśādeḥ svāminī, tasminn abhidheye pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21586: devatā iti kim ? kanyā devatā asya /
GS24jvkasipu:21587: katham aindro mantraḥ ? mantrastutyam api devatā ity upacaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:21588: katham āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatā iti ? upamānād bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:21589: mahārājaproṣṭhapadāṭ ṭhañ (*4,2.35) iti yāvat sā 'sya devatā ity adhikāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21590: sā iti prakṛte punaḥ samartha-vibhakti nirdeśaḥ sañjñā-nivṛtty-arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21603: śukra-śabdāt sā 'sya devatā ity asinnn arthe ghan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21611: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21614: aponapād apāṃnapād iti devatāyā nāmadheye ete /
GS24jvkasipu:21615: tayos tu patyayasanniyogena rūpam idaṃ nipatyate //
GS24jvkasipu:21619: aponaptṛ apāṃnaptṛ ity etābhyāṃ cha-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati sā asya devatā iti yasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21631: mahendra-śabdāt ghāṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ, cakārāc chaś ca, sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21632: mahendro devatā asya mahendriyam haviḥ, māhendram, mahendrīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:21636: soma-śabdāt ṭyaṇ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21646: vāyv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavat sā 'sya devatā ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21656: dyāvāpṛthivy-ādibbhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye, cakārād yac ca /
GS24jvkasipu:21658: dyauś ca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau devate asya dyāvāpṛthivīyam, dyāvāpṛthivyam, /
GS24jvkasipu:21659: śunaś ca sīraś ca tau devate asya iti śunāsīrīyam, śaunāsīryam /
GS24jvkasipu:21669: agni-śabdād ḍhak pratyayo bhavati sā+asya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21676: kālaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo bhavavat pratyayā bhavanti sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21678: iti prakaraṇe bhave pratyayā vidhāsyante te sā 'sya devatā ity asmin arthe tathā+eva+iṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:21694: mahārāja-śabdāt proṣṭhapada-śabdāc ca ṭhañ prayayo bhavati sā 'sya devatā ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21698: ṭhañ-prakaraṇe tadasmin vartata iti navayajñādibhya upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:21707: samarthavibhaktiḥ, pratyayaḥ, pratyayārtho 'nubandhaḥ iti sarvaṃ nipātanād vijñeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21708: pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ bhrātaryabhidheye vyat ḍulac ity etau pratyayu nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:21712: tābhyām eva pitari ḍāmahac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21727: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt samūhaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21728: kim iha+udāharaṇam ? cittavadadyudāttamagotraṃ yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:21730: , gotrād vuñ, pratipadaṃ ca kedārād yañca (*4,2.40)
GS24jvkasipu:21731: ity evam ādi, tatparihāreṇa atra+udāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:21748: bhikṣā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21752: tasya grahaṇa-sāmarthyād pumbadbhāvo na bhavati bhasyāḍhe taddhite (*6,3.35) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21771: gotrādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21772: apatya-adhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotraṃ gṛhyate 'patyamātraṃ, na tu pautraprabhṛtyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:21784: prakṛtyā 'ke rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ iti yalopo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21791: kedāra-śabdād yañ pratyayo bhavati, ca-kārād vuñ ca, tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21799: kavacin śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21807: brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21826: grāmādibhyaḥ tal pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21836: anudāttādeḥ śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21844: khaṇdikā ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ñ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21849: kṣudrakāś ca mālavāś ca iti kṣatriya-dvandvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21850: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva añi siddhe vacanaṃ gotravuñ bādhana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:21851: nanu ca paratvādañā vuñ bādhiṣyate, na ca gotrasamudāyo gotraṃ, na ca tadantavidhir atra asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:21852: evaṃ tarhi etaj jñāpayati vuñi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ, samūhikeṣu ca tadantavidhir asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21853: pratyojanam aupagavakaṃ kāpaṭavakam iti vuñ bhavati, vānahastikaṃ gaudhenukam iti ca tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21854: kṣudrakamālavāt ity etāvatā yogavibhāgena pūrvaviprateṣedhas tadantavidhiś ca jñāpitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:21855: punar asyaa+eva niyamārtham ucyate senāsañjñāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21860: gotrād vuñ na ca tadgotraṃ tadantān na ca sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:21861: jñāpakaṃ syāt tadantatve tathā ca api śalier vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:21862: senāyāṃ niyama-arthaṃ ca yathā badhyeta cāñ vuñā //
GS24jvkasipu:21877: caraṇa-śabdāḥ kaṭhakalāpādayaḥ, tebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ samūhe dharmavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:21878: gotracaraṇād vuñ ity ārabhya pratyayā vakṣyante,
GS24jvkasipu:21879: tatra ced amucyate caraṇād dharmāmnāyayoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:21895: acitta-arthebhyo hasti-dhenu-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21907: keśa aśva ity etyābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ cha ity etau pratyayau bhavato 'nyatarasyāṃ tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21913: pāśadibhyaḥ yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21932: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyaḥ yaḥ pratyaya bhavat tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21940: khala-go-ratha-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyam ini tra kaṭyac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti tasya samūhaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:21974: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād viṣayaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:21975: yo 'sau viṣayaḥ deśaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:21977: kvacid grāmasamudāye vartate, viṣayo labdhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21978: kvacid indriyagrāhye, cakṣur viṣayo rūpam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21979: kvacid atyantaśīlite jñeye, devadattasya viṣayo 'nuvākaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21980: kvācid anyatra abhāve, matsyānām viṣayo jalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:21988: rājanyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati viṣayo deśe ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:22014: bhairikyādibhyaḥ aiṣukāryādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhal bhaktal ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ viṣayo deśe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22062: sa iti prathamāsamarthād asya ti ṣaṣṭyārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22063: yat prathamāsamarthaṃ chandaś cet tadādir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22064: yat tadasya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ pragāthāś cet te bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:22070: ādiḥ iti kim ? anuṣṭubḥ madhyam asya pragāthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:22071: chandasaḥ iti kim ? udutya-śabda ādir asya pragāthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:22072: pragātheṣu iti kim ? paṅktir ādir asya anuvākasya /
GS24jvkasipu:22073: pragātha-śabdaḥ kriyānimittakaḥ kvacid eva mantraviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22074: yatra dve ṛcau pragrathanena tisraḥ kriyante,
GS24jvkasipu:22075: sa pragrathanāt prakarṣagānād vā pragāthaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22082: so 'sya iti samarthavibhaktiḥ, pratyayārthaś ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22085: prayojanavācibhyaḥ yoddhṛvācibhyaś ca śabdebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe saṅgrāme 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22086: bhadrā prayojanam asya saṅgrāmasya bhadraḥ saṅgrāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22092: saṅgrāme iti kim ? subhadrā prayojanam asya dānasya /
GS24jvkasipu:22093: prayojana-yoddhṛbhyaḥ iti kim ? subhadrā prekṣikā 'sya saṅgrāmasya //
GS24jvkasipu:22095: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ || PS_4,2.57 ||
GS24jvkasipu:22097: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamy-arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22098: yat tat iti nirdiṣṭaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22099: yad asyām iti nirdiṣṭaṃ krīḍā tad cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22103: praharaṇam iti kim ? mālā bhūṣaṇam asyāṃ krīḍāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:22104: krīḍāyām iti kim ? khaṅgaḥ praharaṇam asyāṃ senāyām //
GS24jvkasipu:22113: ghañantāt kiyāvācinaḥ prathamāsamarthād asyām iti saptamyarthe strīliṅge ñaḥ prayayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22114: ghañaḥ iti kṛd-grahaṇam, tatra gatikāraka-pūrvam api gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22116: tailaṃpātā ghañaḥ iti kim ? śyenapatanam asyāṃ vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22118: atha samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca kasmāt punar upādiyate, yāvatā dvayam api prakṛtam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:22119: krīḍāyām ity anena tatsambaddham, atastadanuvṛttau krīḍānuvṛttir api sambhāvyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:22126: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt adhīte veda ity etayoḥ arthayoḥ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22138: kratuviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ukthādibhyaś ca sūtrāntāc ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22151: na ca tāny adhīyāne pratyaya iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:22153: sāmalakṣaṇe aukthikye vartamānaḥ uktha-śabdaḥ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:22156: aukthikya-śabdāc ca pratyayo na bhavaty eva, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:22234: krama ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22247: anubrāhmaṇa-śabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22252: mattvarthena ata ini-ṭhanau (*5,2.115) iti ininā siddham ? tatra+etasmāṭ ṭhann api prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:22253: anabhidhānān na bhaviṣyati ? aṇo nivṛtty-arthaṃ tarhi vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:22257: vasanta ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tadadhīte tadveda ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:22285: sūtra-vācinaḥ ka-kāra+upadhād upannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22292: iha mā bhūt, mahāvārttikaṃ sūtram adhīte māhāvārttikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22294: kopadhāt iti kim ? catuṣṭayam adhīte cātuṣṭayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22299: chandāṃsi brāhmaṇāni ca proktapratyayāntāni tadviṣayāṇy eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:22302: tena svātantryam upādhyāntarayogo vakyaṃ ca nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:22313: brāhmaṇa-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ, yāvatā chanda eva tad ? brāhmaṇaviśeṣa-pratipatty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:22314: iha tadviṣayatā mā bhūt, yājñavalkyena proktāni brāhmanṇāni yājñavalkyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:22326: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni || PS_4,2.67 ||
GS24jvkasipu:22333: tat iti rathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22334: yat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati yad asmin iti nirdiṣṭaṃ deśaś cet sa tannāmā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:22344: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt nirvṛttam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:22345: deśe tannamni iti caturṣv api yogeṣu sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:22348: hetau kartari ca yathāyogaṃ tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:22352: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthān nivāsaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati deśanāmadheye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:22361: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt adūrabhavaḥ ityetasminnarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22364: cakāraḥ pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇām arthānām iha sannidhāna-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22372: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt yathavihitaṃ samarthavibhakti-yuktāt añ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn asti ity evam ādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:22383: bahvac aṅgaṃ yasya asau bahvajaṅgao matup, tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22389: aṅga-grahaṇaṃ bahvaj iti tad viśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyate, matvanta-viśeṣaṇaṃ mā vijñāyi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22394: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ kūpeṣv abhidheyesu /
GS24jvkasipu:22402: vipāśaḥ uttare kūle ye kūpāsteṣv abhidheyeṣu añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22407: udak iti kim ? dakṣiṇato vipāśaḥ kūpeṣu aṇ eva dāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22415: saṅkala ity evam ādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22461: deśe tannamni ity asya viśeṣanaṃ sauvīrādayaḥ, strītvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22464: sauvīre strīliṅge deśe vācye sālve prāci /
GS24jvkasipu:22465: sauvīre tāvat - dattamitreṇa nirvṛttā nagarī dāttāmitrī /
GS24jvkasipu:22467: prāci khalv api - kakandena nirvṛttā kākandī /
GS24jvkasipu:22474: subāstu ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22502: roṇī iti ko 'yaṃ nirdeśo, yāvatā pratyayavidhau pañcamī yuktā ?
GS24jvkasipu:22504: roṇī-śabdaḥ sarvavastho 'ṇ-pratyayam utpādayati, kevalas tadantaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:22512: ka-kāra-upadhāt ca prātipadikāt an pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22522: vuñādayaḥ spatadaśa pratyayāḥ, arīhaṇādayo 'pi saptadaśa+eva prātipadikagaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22524: tatra yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saptadaśabhyaḥ prātipadikagaṇebhyaḥ saptadaśa pratyayāḥ bhavanti cāturarthikāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22829: tasya ca varaṇādiṣu darśanāl lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22830: tathā ca+uktam, śirīṣāṇāmadūrabhavo grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ, tasya vanaṃ śirīṣavanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:22834: deśe tannāmni yaś cāturarthikaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati, tasya deśaviśeṣe anapade 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22844: iha kasmān na bhavati, udumbarāḥ asmin santi audumbaro janapadaḥ, vaidiśo janapadaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:22846: na ca atra lubantaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:22850: varaṇa ity evam ādibhyaḥ utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22879: śarkarā-śabdād utpannasya cāturarthikasya pratyayasya vā lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:22881: yāvatā śarkarā-śabdaḥ kumudādiṣu varāhādiṣu ca paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:22882: tatra pāṭhasamarthyāt pratyayasya pakṣe śravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:22883: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati, śarkarā-śabdād autsargiko bhavati, tasya ayaṃ vikalpito lup iti /
GS24jvkasipu:22886: gaṇapāṭhāc ca śravaṇam uttarasūtre vihitau ca dvau pratyayau, tad evaṃ ṣaḍ rūpāṇi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:22887: śarkarā, śārkaram, śarkarikam, śārkarakam , śārkarikam, śarkarīyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:22891: śarkarā-śabdāt ṭhak cha ity etau pratyayau bhavataś cāturarthikau /
GS24jvkasipu:22898: nadyām abhidheyāyāṃ matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22906: iha kasmān na bhavati, bhāgīrathī, bhaimarathī ? matubantasya atannāmadheyatvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:22910: madhu ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo matup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22945: kumuda naḍa vetasa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍmatup pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:22965: matup-prakaraṇe 'pi śikhāyā valacaṃ vakṣyati, tadadeśārthaṃ vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:22969: utkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23020: naḍa ity evam ādīnāṃ kugāgamo bhavati, chaś ca pratyayaś cāturarthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23040: yānita ūrdhvaṃ pratyayān anukramiṣyāmaḥ, śeṣe 'rthe te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23044: tasya idaṃ viśeṣā hy apatyasamūhādayaḥ, teṣu ghādayo mā bhūvan iti śeṣādhikāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23045: kiṃ ca sarveṣu jātādiṣu ghādayo yathā syuḥ anantareṇa+ev ārthādeśena sambandhitvena kṛtārthatā mā jñāyi iti sākalyārthaṃ śeṣa-vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:23053: śeṣe iti lakṣaṇaṃ ca adhikāraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23064: rāṣṭra avārapāra ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khau ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23073: teṣāṃ tu jātādayo 'rthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaś ca purastād vakṣyante //
GS24jvkasipu:23075: grāma-śabdāt ya khañ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23080: katri ity evam ādibhyo ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23101: kula-kukṣi-grīvā-śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śvan asi alaṅkāra ity eteṣu jatādiṣv artheṣu ḍhakañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23112: nadī ity evam ādibhyo ḍhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23141: dakṣiṇā paścāt puras ity etebhyaḥ tyak prayayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23159: raṅku-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṣphak ca śaiṣiko 'manusye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:23162: nanu ca raṅku-śabdaḥ kacchādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra ca manuṣya-tasthayor vuñ (*4,2.134)
GS24jvkasipu:23170: tena rāṅkavaḥ kambalaḥ iti ṣphak na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23171: viśeṣavihitena ca ṣphakā aṇo bādhā mā bhūt ity aṇ-grahaṇam api kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:23175: div prāc apāc udac pratyac ity etebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23181: avyayāt tu kālavācinaḥ paratvāt ṭyuṭyulau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23193: varṇau yā kanthā tasyā vuk pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23203: ninirbhyāṃ ghruvagatyoś ca praveśo niyame tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:23219: āvis śabdāc chandasi tyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23231: aiṣamas hyas śvas ity etebhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ tyap patyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23235: śvasastuṭ ca (*4,3.15) iti ṭhañ api tṛtīyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23240: tīra-uttarapadāt rūpya-uttarapadāc ca prātipadikād yathāsaṅkhyam añ ña ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:23246: tīrarūpyāntāt iti noktaṃ bahuc-pratyaya-pūrvād mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23253: dik-pūrvapadāt prātipadikāt asañjñā-viṣayāt ñaḥ patyayo hbavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23267: dik-pūrvapadāt madra-śabdād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23275: udīcyagrāmavācinaḥ prātipadikād bahvaco 'ntodāttād añ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23288: prasthottarapadāta paladyādibhyaḥ kakāropadhāt ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23296: paladyādiṣu yo vāhīkagrāmaḥ, tataḥ ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23298: gomatī-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tato ropadhetoḥ prācām (*4,2.123) iti vuño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23299: vāhīka-śabdaḥ kopadho 'pi punaḥ paṭhyate paraṃ chaṃ (*4,2.114) bādhitum /
GS24jvkasipu:23324: gotram iha na pratyaya-artho na ca prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:23327: tadantebhya eva aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23335: gotre ya iñ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipdikāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23340: gore ity eva, sautaṅgamer idaṃ sautaṅgamīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:23344: dvy-acaḥ prātipadikāt prācya-bharata-gotrād iñantād aṇ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23354: kāśīyāḥ iti katham udāhṛtaṃ, yāvatā kāśyādibhyaṣ ṭhañ - ñiṭhābhyāṃ bhavitavyam ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:23355: deśavācinaḥ kāśiśabdasya tatra grahaṇaṃ caidi-śabdena sāhacaryāt /
GS24jvkasipu:23357: jñāpakād anyatra prācya-grahaṇena bharata-grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti sva-śabdena bharatānām upādānaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:23364: vṛddhāt prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23375: bhavac-chabdād vṛddhāt ṭhak-chasau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:23385: kāśi ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṭhañ ñiṭha ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:23394: ye tu avṛddhāḥ paṭhyante, vacanaprāmāṇyāt tebhyaḥ pratyaya-vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23395: devadatta-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya eṅ prācāṃ deśe (*1,1.75) iti vṛddhasañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:23399: kathaṃ bhāṣye udāhṛtaṃ vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā veditavyā devadattīyāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:23439: vāhīkagrāma-vācibhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:23447: vṛddhāt iti vartate, vāhīkagrāmebhyaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23449: tadvācibhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vibhāṣā ṭhaññiṭhau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23456: u-varṇāntāt deśavācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23460: ṭhaññiṭhayoḥ prakaraṇe ṭhañaḥ kevalasya anuvṛttiḥ na labhyate iti ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:23470: pūrveṇa+eva ṭhañi siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam, vṛddhād eva prācām avṛddhān na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23475: vṛddhāt iti vartate, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23476: dhanva-vācino ya-kāra-upadhāc ca deśa-abhidhāyino vṛddhāt prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23485: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23487: prasthapura vaha ity evam antāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikād vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23494: purānto ropadhastataḥ uttarasūtraiṇaiva siddham aprāgartham iha grahaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:23498: vṛddhat ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23500: ra-upadhāt īkārāntāc ca pragdeśa-vācino vṛddhād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23513: vṛddhāt ity eva, deśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23515: vṛddhāj janapada-vācinaḥ tadavadhi-vācinaś ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23521: tadavadher api janapā eva gṛhyate na grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23523: gartottarapadāc chaṃ bādhitvā vuñ eva janapada-avadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23529: avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca janapadāt tadavadhi-vācinaś ca bahuvanaca-viṣayāt prātipadikād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23553: apigrahaṇaṃ kim yāvatā vṛddhāta pūrveṇa+eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:23554: takrakauṇḍinyanyāyena bādhā mā vijñāyi iti samuccīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:23558: deśe ity eva uttarapada-śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23560: prātipadikāc ca avṛddhād vṛddhāc ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23573: dhūmādibhyo deśavacibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23577: pātheya-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya yopadhātvād eva vuñi siddhe sāmarthyād adeśārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:23578: tathā videha-anartaśabdayoḥ janapada-lakṣaṇe vuñi siddhe 'deśārthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23581: samudra-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya nāvi manuṣye ca vuñ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23584: anyatra na bhavati, sāmudraṃ jalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23630: nagara-śabdāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ kutsane prāvīṇye ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:23631: pratyayārtha-viśeṣaṇaṃ ca+etat, kutsane prāvīṇye ca jātādau pratyayārtha iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23634: kena ayaṃ muṣitaḥ panthā gātre pakṣamālidhūsaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23635: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:23638: iha nagare manuṣyeṇa sambhāvyata etan nāgarakeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:23641: katryādiṣu tu sañjñāśabdena sāhacaryāt sañjñānāgaraṃ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:23646: araṇya-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaisiko manusye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:23662: kuru yugandhara ity etābhyāṃ vibhāṣā vuñ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23665: janapada-śabdāv etau, tābhyām avṛddhād api iti nitye vuñi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23666: kuru-śabdaḥ kacchādiṣv api paṭhyate, tatra vacanād aṇ api bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:23668: manuṣyatatsthayoḥ tu kuru-śabdān nitya eva vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:23683: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23685: anyatra janapadaṃ muktvā pūrveṇa+eva kopadhād aṇi siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:23688: aṇ-grahaṇam u-varṇāntād api yathā syāt, ikṣvākuṣu jātaḥ aikṣvākaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23693: kaccha ity evam ādibhyo deśavācibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23698: kaccha-śabdo na bahuvacana-viṣayaḥ, tasya manusya-tatsthayor vuñarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23699: vijāpaka-śabdaḥ paṭhyate, tasya kopadhatvād eva aṇi siddhe grahanam uttarārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:23722: manuṣye manuṣyasthe ca jātādau pratyayārthe kacchādibhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23736: tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva manusya-tatsthayoḥ vuñi siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:23737: apadātāv eva manusye manaṣyasthe ca sālva-śabdād vuñ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23744: gavi yavāgvām ca jātādau pratyayārthe sālva-śabdād buñ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23754: garta-uttarapadāt deśa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23765: gaha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23770: madhyamadhyamaṃ cāṇ caraṇe iti paṭhyate, tasyāyamarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23773: caraṇe tu pratyayarthe aṇ bhavati, mādhyamāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23844: prāgdeśa-vācinaḥ kaṭādeḥ prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23853: rājñaḥ kakāraś ca antādeśo bhavti chaś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23855: ādeśamātram iha vidheyaṃ, pratyaystu vṛddhāc chaḥ (*4,2.114) ity eva siddhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23861: vṛddhād deśa-vācinaḥ aka ika ity evam antāt khakāropadhāc ca prātipadikāt chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaisikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23863: vāhīkagrāma-lakṣaṇasya ca pratyayasya, ropadhetoḥ prācām (*4,2.123) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23877: deśe ity eva, vṛddhāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:23878: kanthādy-uttarapadād deśa-vācino vṛddhāt prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23900: parvataśabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati vā amanuṣye vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:23911: kṛkaṇaparṇa-śabdābhyāṃ bhāradvājadeśa-vācibhyāṃ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23916: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:23927: tad ete trayaḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti, tatra vaiṣamyād yathāsaṅkhyaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23928: tyadāditvād vṛddha-sañjñakayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ che prāpte pratyekaṃ pratyayatrayaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:23938: tasmin iti sākṣād vihitaḥ khañ nirdiṣyate, na cakāra-anukṛṣṭaḥ chaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23939: tasmin khañi aṇi ca yuṣmad-asmador yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yuṣmāka asmāka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23940: nimittayor ādeśau prati yathāsaṅkhaṃ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:23941: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate, tasmin khañi yuṣmad-asmadoḥ yuṣmāka-asmākau bhavataḥ, tato 'ṇi ca iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23946: tasmin aṇi ca iti kim ? yuṣmadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23951: ekavacana-parayor yuṣmad-asmadoḥ tavaka mamaka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ tasmin khañi aṇi ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23952: nimittayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pūrvavad eva na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:23954: iti pratyayalakṣaṇa-pratiṣedhād ekavacana-paratā yuṣmad-asmador na sambhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:23956: atha vā na+eva+idaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ, kiṃ tarhy anvartha-grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:23957: ekavacane yuṣmad-asamādī ekasya arthasya vācake tavaka-mamakāv ādeśau pratipadyete iti sūtra-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23962: tasminn aṇi ca ity eva, tvadīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23977: para avara adhama uttama ity evaṃ pūrvāc ca ardhāt yat pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:23983: para-avara-adhama-uttamebhyaḥ ity eva+ucyate, ardhāt iti vartate, tasya tatpūrvatā vijñāsyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:23984: para-avara-śabdāv adig-grahaṇāv api staḥ paraṃ sukham, avaram sukham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:23985: tatra kṛta-arthatvād dik-śabdapakṣe pareṇa ṭhañyatau syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:23986: asmāt pūrva-grahaṇād yat pratyayo bhavati parārdhyam, avarārdhyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:23990: dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24000: grāma-ekadeśa-vācino janapada-ekadeśavācinaś ca prātipadikād dik-pūrvapadād ardhāntād añ-ṭhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ śaiṣikau /
GS24jvkasipu:24002: ime khalv asmākaṃ grāmasya janapadasya vā paurvārdhaḥ, paurvārdhikāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24018: a-kāraḥ pratyayo bhavati madhya-śabdāt sāmpratike jātādau pratyaya-arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24028: samudra-samīpe yo dvīpaḥ, tasmād yañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24037: kāla-viśeṣa-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24043: yathākathañcid guṇa-vṛttyā api kāle vartamānāt pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24050: śarac-chabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śrāddhe 'bhidheye śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24052: śrāddhe iti ca karma gṛhyate, na śraddhāvān puruṣaḥ, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:24059: roge ātape ca abhidheye śarac-chabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo vā bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24069: niśā-pradoṣa-śabdābhyāṃ ca vibhāṣā ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24070: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti nitye ṭhañi prāpte vikalpa ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24077: śvaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣa ṭhañ pratyayo hbavati, tasya ca tuḍ-āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24078: tyap-pratyayo 'py ato vihitaḥ, aiṣamohyaḥ śvaso 'nyatrasyām (*4,2.105) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24086: sandhivela-ādibhyaḥ ṛtubhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca kāla-vṛttibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24114: varṣa-śabdāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ ṛtvaṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24120: varṣa-śabdāt chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24128: vasanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24135: hemanta-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati śaiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24140: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca || PS_4,3.22 ||
GS24jvkasipu:24142: hemanta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca asya takāra-lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24147: nanu ca chandasi iti na anuvartiṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:24148: saivān anuvṛttiḥ śabdena akhyāyate pratyatnādhikyena pūrvasūtre 'pi sambandha-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:24150: haimantikam iti bhāṣāyām api ṭhañaṃ smaranti /
GS24jvkasipu:24151: atha aṇ ca iti cakāraḥ kim arthaḥ ? aṇ, yathāprāptaṃ ca ṛtvaṇ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24152: kaḥ punar anayor viśeṣaḥ ? ṛtvaṇi hi takāralopo na asti haimanti paṅktī paṅktiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24153: tad evaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti, haimantikam, haimantam, haimanam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24158: sāyaṃ ciraṃ prāhṇe prage ity etebhyaḥ avyayebhyaś ca kālavācibhyaḥ ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24166: sāyam iti makārāntaṃ padam avyayam, tato 'vyayād eva siddhaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24167: yastu syaterantakarmaṇo ghañi sāya-śabdas tasya+idaṃ makārāntatvaṃ pratyaya-sanniyogena nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24185: pūrvāhṇa-aparāhṇā-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṭyu-ṭyulau pratyayau bhavataḥ, tuṭ ca tayor āgamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24186: kālāṭ ṭhañ (*4,3.11) iti ṭhañi prāpte vacanaṃ, pakṣe so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24192: yadā tu na saptamī samartha-vibhaktiḥ pūrvāhṇaḥ soḍhaḥ asya iti tadā pūrvāhṇatanaḥ iti bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:24198: teṣām ataḥ prabhṛti arthāḥ samartha-vibhaktayaḥ ca nirdiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:24199: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24215: prāvṛṭ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24222: śarac-chabdāt saptamī-samarthāj jātaḥ ity etasminn arthe vuñ pratyayo bhavati ṛtvaṇaḥ apavādaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:24228: sañjñādhikāraṃ kecit kṛtalabdhakrītakuśalāḥ (*4,3.38) iti yāvad anuvartayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:24232: pūrvāhṇa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:24244: asañjñāyāṃ tu yathāprāptaṃ ṭhañādayaḥ eva bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:24248: pathi-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati, tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'ṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24249: pratyaya. saṃniyogena ca pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24255: amāvāsyā-śabdād vun pratyayo bhavati vā tatra jātaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24263: amāvāsyā-śabdāt akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24264: pūrveṇa vunnaṇoḥ prāptayoḥ ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24270: sindhu-śabdād apakara-śabdāc ca kan pratyayo bhavati tatra jāta (*4,3.25) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24271: sindhu-śabdaḥ kacchādiḥ, tato 'ṇi manuṣyavuñi ca prāpte vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:24278: sindhv-apakara-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25)
GS24jvkasipu:24286: śraviṣṭhā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ nakṣatrebhyaḥ āgatasya jātārthe lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24287: tasmin strīpratyayasya api luk taddhitaluki (*1,2.49) iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24313: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt gośāla-śabdāt kharaśāla-śabdāt ca jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24321: vatsaśālādibhyaḥ parasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya lug vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24330: nakṣatrebhyaḥ uttarasya jāta-arthe pratyayasya bahulaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24337: saptamī-samārthāt kṛtādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24338: srudhne kṛto vā labdho vā krīto vā kuśalo vā sraughanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24341: nanu ca yad yatra kṛtaṃ jātam api tatra bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24342: yac ca yatra krītaṃ labdham api tatra+eva bhavati kimarthaṃ bhedena+upādānaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:24344: vastumātreṇa krītaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati, śabda-arthas tu bhidyate eva //
GS24jvkasipu:24349: saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt prāyabhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathā-vihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24355: anityabhavaḥ prāyabhavaḥ iti ced, mukta-saṃśayena tulyam //
GS24jvkasipu:24360: upajānv-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyaḥ prāyabhava ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24369: saptamī-samarthād ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt sambhūte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24370: avaklṛptiḥ pramāṇānatirekaś ca sambhavaty arthaḥ iha gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:24379: kośa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sambhūte ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24382: rūḍhir eṣā, tena krimau na bhavati, khaṅgakośāc ca //
GS24jvkasipu:24386: tatra ity eva kāla-viśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ saptamī-samārthebhyaḥ sādhv-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24396: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24397: saptamī-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt upte 'rthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24413: grīṣma-vasanta-śabdābhyām anyatarasyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati upte 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24420: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24421: saptamī-samārthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt deyam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24422: yad deyam ṛṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24426: ṛṇe iti kim ? māse deyā bhikṣā //
GS24jvkasipu:24431: kalāpin aśvattha yavabusa ity etebhyaḥ kālavācibhyaḥ saptamī-samarthebhyo deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24433: yasmin kāle mayūśaḥ kalāpino bhavanti sa kalāpī /
GS24jvkasipu:24442: grīṣma avarasama-śabdābhyāṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati deyam ṛṇam ity etasminnarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24452: cakārād vuñ ca deyam ṛṇam ity etasminn arthe saṃvatsare deyam ṛṇaṃ sāṃvatsarikam, sāṃvatsarakam /
GS24jvkasipu:24454: vā iti vaktavye ṭhañ-grahaṇaṃ sandhivelādiṣu saṃvatsarāt phalaparvaṇoḥ iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:24455: tatra phale ṛṇatvena vivakṣite 'ṇaṃ bādhitvā ṭhañ eva yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:24460: tatra ity eva, kālāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24461: kālavācinaḥ saptamī-samarthāt prātipadikāt vyāharati mṛgaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24464: mṛgaḥ iti kim ? niśāyāṃ vyāharati ulūkaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24469: tad iti prathamā-samarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamā-samarthaṃ soḍhaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24471: niśāsahacaritam adhyayanaṃ niśā, tat soḍham asya chātrasya naiśaḥ, vaiśikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24477: tatra iti saptamī-samarthāt ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24478: sattā bhavatyartho gṛhyate, na janma, tatra jātaḥ (*4,3.25) iti gatārthatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:24482: punas tatra-grahaṇaṃ tad asya iti nivṛtty-artham //
GS24jvkasipu:24486: diś ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24490: mukha-jaghana-śabdayor aśarīra-avayava-arthaḥ pāṭhaḥ, senāmukhyam, senājaghanyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24523: śarīraṃ prāṇikāyaḥ śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikād yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24532: dṛtyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24543: grīvā-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāḍ ḍhañ ca, tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24546: grīvā-śabdo dhamanīvacanas tāsāṃ bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:24550: gambhīra-śabdād ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24560: avyayībhāva-sañjñākāt prātipadikāc ca ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24562: na ca sarvasmādavyayībhāvād bhavati, kiṃ tarhi, parimukhādeḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24563: parimukhādīnāṃ ca gaṇapāṭhasya etad eva prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:24590: atapūrvapadāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24634: īyaḥ kāryo 'tha madhyasya maṇmīyau pratyayau tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:24635: madhyo madhyaṃ dinaṇ ca asmāt sthāmno lugajināt tathā //
GS24jvkasipu:24640: grāma-śabdāntād avyayībhāvāt pari anu ity evaṃ pūrvāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24647: jihvāmūla-śabdād aṅguli-śabdāt ca chanḥ pratayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24654: varga-śabdāntāt ca prātipadikāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24662: śabdād anyasmin pratyaya-arthe vargāntāt prātipadikād anyatarasyāṃ yatkhau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24671: karṇalalāṭa-śabdābhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye 'laṅkāre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:24678: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ || PS_4,3.66 ||
GS24jvkasipu:24680: vyākhyāyate 'nena iti vyākhyānaṃ, vyākhyātavyasya nāma vyākhyātavyanāma /
GS24jvkasipu:24681: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt vyākhayātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād vyākhyāne 'bhidheye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhave ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24682: vākyārthasamīpe cakāraḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ pūrvavākhya-artham eva samuccinoti tatra bhava (*4,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24700: bahvaco vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ prātipadikād antodāttād bhavavyākhyānayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24705: bahvacaḥ iti kim ? dvyacaḥ ṭhakaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:24715: kratubhyo yajñebhyaś ca vyākhyātavyanamabhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24717: kratubhyas tāvat - agniṣṭomasya vyākhyānaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ āgniṣṭomikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24723: kratubhyaḥ ity eva siddhe yajña-grahaṇam asomayāgebhyo 'pi yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:24731: tebhyaḥ ṛṣi-śabdebhyo bhavavyākhyānayoḥ arthayoḥ ṭhañ pratayo bhavati aṇo 'pavādaḥ adhyāyeṣveva pratyayārthe viśeṣaṇeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:24732: vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ ityanuvartate, tatsāhacaryād ṛṣiśabdair grantha ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24733: vasiṣṭhasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā vāsiṣṭhiko 'dhyāyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24739: paurāḍāśa-śabdāt puroḍāśa-śabdāc ca bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24742: tasya vyākhyānaḥ tatra bhavo vā pauroḍāśikaḥ, pauroḍāśikī /
GS24jvkasipu:24743: puroḍāśasahacarito granthaḥ puroḍāśaḥ, tasya vyākhyānas tatra bhavo vā puroḍāśikaḥ, puroḍāśikī /
GS24jvkasipu:24749: chandaḥ-śabdād bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ yad aṇau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24755: dvyajādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vyākhyātavyanāmabhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24773: ṛgayana-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo bhavavyākhyānayor arthayoḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24802: tataḥ iti pañcamī-samarthād āgataḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24806: tataḥ iti mukhyam apādānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yat tad iha gṛhyate, na nāntarīyakam /
GS24jvkasipu:24811: āya iti svāmigrāhyo bhāga ucyate, sa yasminn utpadyate tadāyasthānam /
GS24jvkasipu:24812: āyasthanavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24822: śuṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24842: tadvācibhyaḥ śabdebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24855: ṛ-kārāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidyāyonisambandha-vācibhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24867: pitṛ-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati, ca-kārāṭ ṭhañ ca tat āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24872: apatyādhikārād anyatra laukikaṃ gotram apatyamātraṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24873: gotra-pratyayāntāt prātipadikād aṅkavat pratyaya-vidhirb havati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24875: tasmād vuñ atidiṣyate, na aṇ, saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ-yañ-iñām aṇ (*4,3.127) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:24888: hetubhyo manusyebhyaś ca anyatarasyāṃ rupyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tata āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24901: hetubhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ ca mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ āgataḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24913: pañcamī-samarthāt ṅyāp-prātipadikāt prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24914: prabhavati prakāśate, prathamata upalabhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24920: vidūra-śabdāt ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tataḥ prabhavati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:24923: nanu ca vālavāyād asau prabhavati, na vidūrāt, tatra tu saṃskriyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:24924: evaṃ tarhi - vālavāyo vidūraṃ ca prakṛtyanataram eva vā /
GS24jvkasipu:24925: na vai tatra iti ced brūyāj jitvarīvad upācaret //
GS24jvkasipu:24929: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād gacchati ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24930: yo 'sau gacchati panthāś cet sa bhavati dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:24931: srughnaṃ gacchati sraughnaḥ panthā dūto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:24933: tatstheṣu gacchatsu panthā gacchati ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:24935: pathidūtayoḥ iti kim ? srughnaṃ gacchati sārthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24941: tad iti dvitīyā-samarthād abhiniṣkrāmati ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat abhiniṣkrāmati dvāraṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24949: dvāram iti kim ? srughnam abhiniṣkrāmati puruṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:24956: taditi dvitīyāsamarthād adhikṛtya kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat tat kṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24960: granthe iti kim ? subhdrām adhikṛtya kṛtaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24970: tad ity eva, adhikṛtya kṛte granthe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:24971: śiśukranda-ādibhyo dvitiyā-samarthebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati adhikṛtya kṛte granthe /
GS24jvkasipu:24973: śiśūnāṃ krandanaṃ śiśukrandaḥ, tam adhikṛtya kṛto granthaḥ śiśukrandīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:24984: evaṃ sati devāsurādi-pratiṣedho 'pi na vaktavyaḥ, tataś cha-pratyayasya adarśanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:24989: saḥ iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:24990: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ nivāsaḥ cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:24999: sa iti prathamā-samarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25000: yat prathamā-samartham abhijanaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25002: tatsambandhād deśo 'pi abhijanaḥ iti ucyate, yasmin pūrvabāndha-vairuṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:25003: tasmād iha deśavācinaḥ pratyayaḥ, na bandhubhyo, nivāsapratyāsatteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25007: nivāsābhijanayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? yatra saṃpratyuṣyate sa nivāsaḥ, yatra pūrvairuṣitaṃ so 'bhijanaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25013: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ iti tādarthye caturthī, parvate iti prakṛti-viśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:25014: parvatavācinaḥ prathamā-samarthād abhijanād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25015: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ āyudhajīvyartham āyudhajīvino 'bhidhātuṃ pratyayo bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25019: āyudhajīvibhyaḥ iti kim ? ṛkṣodaḥ parvato 'bhijanaḥ eśāṃ brahmaṇānām ārkṣodā brāhmaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25024: śaṇḍika ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25041: sindhv-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ takṣaśilādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25057: tebhyas tata eva aṇi siddhe manuṣyavuño bādhanārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:25076: tūdyādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ śabdebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ catvāra eva ḍhak chaṇ ḍhañ yak ity ete pratyayā bhavanti so 'sya abhijanaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25087: sa iti prathamā-samarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhy-arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25088: yat prathamā-samarthaṃ bhaktiś ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25096: deśa-kāla-vyatiriktād acittavācinaḥ prātipadikāṭ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktir ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25108: mahārāja-śabdāt ṭhaj pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25116: vāsudeva-arjuna-śabdābhyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25120: nanu ca vāsudeva-śabdād gotra-kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaḥ iti vuñ asty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:25121: na ca atra vun-vuñor viśeṣo vidyate,
GS24jvkasipu:25126: iti ca arjuna-śabdasya pūrva-nipātam akurvan jñāpayati abhyarhitaṃ pūrvam nipatati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:25130: gotra-ākhyebhyaḥ kṣatriya-ākhyebhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ bahulaṃ vuñ pratyayo bhavati so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25145: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane || PS_4,3.100 ||
GS24jvkasipu:25147: janapadino ye bahuvacane janapadena samānaśabdās teṣāṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25148: pratyayaḥ prakṛtiś ca so 'sya bhaktiḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25149: janapadatadavadhyoś ca ity atra prakaraṇe ye pratyayā vihitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:25156: tadvat aṅgāḥ kṣatriyā bhaktir asya āṅgakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25160: janapadinām iti kim ? pañcālāḥ brāhmaṇā bhaktir asya pājcālaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25163: vṛddhi-nimitteṣu ca vuñādiṣu viśeṣo na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25167: sa bhaktir asya iti prakṛtinirhrāse kṛte, madrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25169: janapadena samānaśabdānām iti kim ? anuṣṇḍo janapadaḥ pauravo rājā, sa bhaktir asya, pauravīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25171: anyathā hi yatra+eva samānaśabdatā tatra+eva atideśaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:25173: vāṅgo vaṅgau vā bhaktir asya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25175: bahuvacane samānaśabdānām ekavacana-dvivacanayoḥ saty api śabdabhede 'tideśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25176: vāṅgaḥ vāṅgau vā bhaktir asya vāṅgaka //
GS24jvkasipu:25181: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt proktam ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25182: prakarṣeṇa+uktam proktam ity ucyate, na tu kṛtam, kṛte granthe (*4,3.116) ity anena gatārthatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:25183: anyena kṛtā māthureṇa proktā māthurī vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25190: tittiryādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ chaṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25197: tittiriṇā proktaḥ ślokaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25199: ity atra asya anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tadviṣayatā iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:25203: kāśyapa-kauśikābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25209: ity atra anuvṛtteḥ chando 'dhikāra-vihitānāṃ ca tatra tadviṣayatā iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25212: ṛṣibhyām iti kim ? idānīṃtanena gotrakāśyapena proktaṃ kāśyapīyam //
GS24jvkasipu:25216: kalāpyantevāsināṃ vaiśampāyanāntevāsināṃ ca ye vācakāḥ śabdās tebhyo ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25219: tatra kalāpyantevāsinaścatvāraḥ - haridruḥ, chagalī, tumburuḥ, ulapaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25228: pratyakṣa-kāriṇo gṛhyante na tu vyavahitāḥ śaiṣyaśiṣyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25233: tathā vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kaṭhas tadantevāsī khāṇḍāyanaḥ, tasya kiṃ śaunakādisu pāṭhena ?
GS24jvkasipu:25235: kalāpyanatevāsibhyaḥ tāvat - haridruṇā proktam adhīyate hāridraviṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25253: carakaḥ iti vaiśampāyanasyākhyā, tatsambandhena sarve tadantevāsinaścarakāḥ ity ucyante //
GS24jvkasipu:25258: tṛtīyā-samarthāt prokte ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati yat proktaṃ purāṇa-proktāś ced brāhmaṇa-kalpās te bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:25266: āśmarathaḥ kalpaḥ yājñavalkyādayo 'cirakālā ity ākhyāneṣu vārtā /
GS24jvkasipu:25269: pratipadaṃ brāhmaṇesu yaḥ pratyayas tasya tadviṣayatā vidhīyate ṇineḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25271: na vā 'yaṃ yogaś chando 'dhikāram anuvartayati, tena kalpeṣv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25273: na vā+atyantabādhaiva, tena purātanam ity api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:25277: śaunaka ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye chandasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:25282: kaṭhaśāṭha ity atra paṭhyate tatsaṃhatārthaṃ, kevalād dhi lukaṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:25307: kaṭha-śabdād vaiśampāyana-anttevāsibhyaḥ iti ṇineḥ, caraka-śabdād apy aṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25316: kalāpi-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25323: athāṇ-grahaṇaṃ kim, yathāprāptam ity eva siddham ?
GS24jvkasipu:25324: adhikavidhānārthaṃ, tena māthurī vṛttiḥ, saulabhāni brāhmaṇāni ity evam ādi siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:25328: chaṅgalin-śabdāt ḍhinuk pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25335: pārāśaryaśilālibhyāṃ ṇiniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25349: karmanda-kṛśāśva-śabdābhyām iniḥ pratyayo bhavati tena proktam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhikṣu-naṭasūtrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25360: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād ekadik ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25366: tena iti prakṛte punaḥ samarthavibhakti-grahaṇaṃ chando 'dhikāranivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:25371: tasiś ca pratyayo bhavati tena+ekadik ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25372: pūrveṇ ghādisu aṇādiṣu ca prāpteṣu ayam aparaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25380: uras-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt tasiś ca, tena ekadik ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25387: tṛtīyā-samarthāt upajñāte ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25388: vinā upadeśena jñātamaupajñātaṃ, svayam abhisambaddham ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25396: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25397: yat tatkṛtaṃ granthaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25403: utpāditaṃ kṛtaṃ, vidyāmānām eva jñātam aupajñātam ity ayam anayor viśeṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25407: tṛtīyā-samarthāt kṛte ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena cet sañjñā jñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25417: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti ca+etat sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:25418: kulālādibhyaḥ vuñ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:25443: tena, kṛte, sañjñāyām iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:25444: kṣudrādibhyaḥ añ pratyayo bhavati tena kṛte ity etasmin viṣaye sañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:25454: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād idam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25463: anantarādiṣv anabhidhānān na bhavati, devadattasya anantaram iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25475: ratha-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmn viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25477: rathasya idam rathyaṃ, cakraṃ vā yugaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:25486: patanti tena iti patram aśvādikaṃ vāhanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25487: tatpūrvād ratha-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25496: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhvaryu-pariṣac-chabdābhyāṃ ca añ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25507: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25514: dvandva-sañjñākāt vun pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:25530: gotra-vācibhyaḥ caraṇa-vācibhyaḥ ca prātipadikebhyo vuñ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye aṇo 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25545: iñantāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25562: lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyabhūtasya+eva cihnabhūtaṃ svaṃ yathā vidyā bidānām,
GS24jvkasipu:25563: aṅkastu gavādistho 'pi gavādīnāṃ svaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25569: śākala-śabdāt saṅghādiṣu pratyayārtha-viśeṣaneṣu vā aṇ-pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25580: chandoga-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25582: caraṇād dharmāmnāyayoḥ, tatsāhacaryān naṭaśabdādapi dharmāmnāyayoreva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25583: chandogānāṃ dharmo vā āmnāyo vā chandogyam /
GS24jvkasipu:25593: teṣv abhidheyeṣu vuñ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25594: gotra-grahaṇam iha anuvartate, tena vuñ-pratiṣedho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25601: daivatika-ādibhyaḥ chaḥ pratayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25602: gotra-pratyayāntā ete, tataḥ pūrveṇa vuñi prāpte cha-vidhāna-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:25616: kaupiñjala-hāstipada-śabdābhyam aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25624: ātharvaṇika-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃnihogena ca ika-lopaḥ, tasya+idam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25631: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhī-samarthād vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25633: kim iha+udāharaṇam ? aprāṇyādy-udāttam avṛddhaṃ, yasya ca na anyat pratipadaṃ vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:25640: tasya prakaraṇe tasya iti punar vacanaṃ śaiṣika-nivṛtty-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:25647: prāṇ-yoṣadhi-vṛkṣa-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhī-samarthebhyaḥ avayave yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:25657: ita uttare pratyayāḥ prāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:25659: kathaṃ dvayam apy adhikriyate tasya vikāraḥ, avayave ca prāṇy-oṣadhi-vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:25666: bilva ity evam ādibhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25669: gavedhukā-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, tataḥ kopadhāt eva siddhe mayaḍbādhanārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:25688: ka-kāra-upadhāt prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo bhavati yathāyogaṃ vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25698: trapu-jatu-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikare, tatsanniyogena tayoḥ ṣugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25706: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25714: anudāttādeḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25722: palāśa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vā añ pratyayo bhavati vikāra-avayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25740: śamī-śabdāṭ ṭlañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25746: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ || PS_4,3.143 ||
GS24jvkasipu:25748: prakṛtimātrād vā mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati bhakṣyācchādanavarjitayoḥ vikārāvayavayor arthayor bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yathāyathaṃ pratyayeṣu prāpteṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:25751: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? bailvaḥ khādiro vā yūpaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:25754: etayoḥ ity anena kiṃ yāvatā vikāra-avayavau prakṛtāv eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:25756: ity evam ādayas tadviṣaye 'pi yathā syāt, kapotamayam, kāpotam, lohamayam, lauham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:25761: vṛddhebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ śarādibhyaś ca abhakṣyācchādanayoḥ vikārāvayavayoḥ bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25768: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kiṃ yāvatā ārambha-sāmarthyād eva nityaṃ bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:25769: eka-aco nityaṃ mayaṭamicchanti, tad anena kriyate, tvaṅmayam, sraṅmayam , vāṅmayam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:25784: purīṣaṃ na vikāro na ca avayavaḥ, tasya+idaṃ viṣaye vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:25789: piṣṭa-śabdān nityaṃ mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25795: piṣṭa-śabdāt kan pratyayo bhavati vikāre sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25801: vrīhi-śabdān mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati puroḍaśe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:25809: tila-yava-śabdābhyām asañjñāviṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25818: dvyacaḥ prātipadikāt chandasi viṣaye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25826: utvataḥ prātipadikād vardhra-bilva-śabdābhyāṃ ca mayaṭ pratyayao na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25838: tāla-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25857: jātarūpa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati parimāṇe vikāre /
GS24jvkasipu:25868: prāṇi-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo rajatadibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25870: anudāttādeḥ añ vihita eva pariśiṣṭam iha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:25877: rajatādiṣu ye 'nudāttādayaḥ paṭyante rajatakaṇḍakaraprabhṛtayastebhyo 'ñi siddhe punarvacanaṃ mayaḍvādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:25895: ñid yo vikārāvayavapratyayas tadantāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati vikāravayavayoḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:25919: ity ata ārabhya krītārthe ye pratyayāḥ parimāṇād vihitāḥ, te vikāre 'tidiśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:25920: parimāṇāt krīta iva pratyayā bhavanti tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:25922: saṅkhyā api parimāṇa-grahaṇena gṛhyate, na rūḍhiparimāṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:25929: adhyardhapūrvād dvigor lug asañjñāyām (*5,1.28) ity evam ādikam apy atidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:25942: umā-śabdād ūrṇā-śadac ca vā vuñ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25948: eṇī-śabdād ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25956: gopayas-śabdābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25959: sarvatra gorajādi-prasaṅge yad asty eva, mayḍviṣaye tu vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:25963: dru-śabdād yat pratyayo bhavati vikārāvayavayor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:25969: dra-śabdān māne vikāra-viśeṣe vayaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25975: vikārāvayavayor utpannasya phale tadviṣaye vivakṣite lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:25979: phalitasya vṛkṣāsya phalam avayavo bhavati vikāraś ca, pallavitasya+iva pallavaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:25984: plakṣa-ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ phale vikārāvayavatvena vivakṣite aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26002: jambū-śabdāt phale 'bhidheye vā aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26004: atra aṇo vidhāna - samārthyāl lug na bhavati, añas tu bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:26010: jambvāḥ phale 'bhidheye pratyayasya vā lup bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26012: jambvāḥ phalam jambūḥ phalam, jambu phalam, jāmbavam iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:26028: bahulavacanāt kvacid anyad api bhavati, kadambaṃ puṣpam, aśokam, karavīram, bailvāni phalāni iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26032: harītakī ity evam ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ phale pratyayasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26033: luki prāpte lupo vidhāne yuktavadbhāve strī-pratyayaśravaṇe ca viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26037: atra ca vyaktir yuktavadbhāvena+iṣyate, vacanaṃ tv abhidheyavad eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26062: kaṃsīya-paraśavya-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yañ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasya vikāraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:26068: paraśavya-śabdād anudātta-āditvād eva añi siddhe lug-arthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:26071: iti ya-lopo bhaviṣyati ? naa+ead asti, īti iti tatra vartate //
GS24jvkasipu:26072: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:26080: prāgetasmād vahatisaṃśabdanād yānarthān anukramamiṣyāmaḥ, ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26081: vakṣyati - tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam (*4,4.2) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26099: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam || PS_4,4.2 ||
GS24jvkasipu:26101: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthād dīvyati khanati jayati jitam ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26110: devadattena jitam iti pratyayo na bhavati, anabhidhānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:26118: tena iti tṛtīyā-samarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26127: kulattha-śabdāt ka-kāropadhāt śabdāc ca prātipadikād aṇ pratyayo hbavati saṃskṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26135: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tarati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo hbavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26142: gopuccha-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tarati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26149: nau-śabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāṭ ṭhan pratyayo hbavati tarati ity etasmin arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26159: vidhivākyāpekṣaṃ ca ṣaṭtvaṃ, pratyayās tu sapta //
GS24jvkasipu:26163: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26172: ākarṣa-śabdād ṣthal pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26182: parpa ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26204: śvagaṇa-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṣṭhan, carati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26211: it yatra vakṣyati, ikārādi-grahaṇaṃ ca kartavyam śvāgaṇikādy-artham (*7,3.8) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26216: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vetanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ jīvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26243: vasna-krayavikraya-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ ṭhan pratyayo bhavati jīvati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26254: āyudha-śabdāt cha pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhaṃś ca, jīvati ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26260: utsaṅgādibhyas tṛtiyāsamarthebhyo harati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26272: bhastrā ity evam ādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamrthebhyaḥ harati tiyetasminnarthe ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26289: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdābhyām tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ vibhāṣā ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26297: vivadha-vīvadha-śabdau samānārthau pathi paryāhāre ca vartete //
GS24jvkasipu:26302: kuṭilikā-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād aṇ pratyayo hbavati harati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26303: kuṭilikāyā harati mṛgo vyādhaṃ kauṭiliko mṛgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26305: kuṭilikā vakragatiḥ, karmārāṇāmāyudhakarṣaṇī lohamayī yaṣṭiś ca+ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26311: akṣadyūtādibhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26327: ḍvitaḥ ktriḥ (*3,3.88) ity ayaṃ triśabdo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26328: tryantān nityaṃ map pratyayo bhavati tena virvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26333: tena tryantaṃ nityaṃ map-pratyayāntam eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26344: apamitya-yācita-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kak kan ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ nirvṛtte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26351: tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26368: saṃsṛṣte (*4,3.22) ity anena+utpannasya ṭhako lavaṇa-śabdāl luk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26372: dravya-vācī lavaṇa-śabdo lukaṃ prayojayati, na guṇavācī //
GS24jvkasipu:26376: mudga-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati saṃsṛṣṭe ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26384: vyañjana-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyaḥ upasikte ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26392: ojas sahas ambhas ity etebhyaḥ tṛtīyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26400: prati anu ity evaṃ pūrvebhyaḥ īpa-loma-kūla-śabdebhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyo vartate ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26401: nanu ca vṛtir akarmakaḥ, tasya kathaṃ karmaṇā sambandhaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:26412: parimukha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vartate ity easminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26420: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prayacchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26421: yat tad dvitīyāsamarthaṃ garhyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26428: garhyam iti kim ? dviguṇaṃ prayacchaty adhamarṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26435: kusīda-daśa-ekādaśaśabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṣṭhan ṣṭhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ prayacchati garhyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26444: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād ucchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26452: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād rakṣati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26458: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ śabda-dardura-śabdābhyāṃ karoti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26465: pakṣyādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo hanti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26466: svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam iha+isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26483: paripantha-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt tiṣṭhati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26493: mātha-śabda-uttarapadāt prātipaikāt padavī anupada ity etābhyāṃ ca dhāvati ity etasminnarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26503: atha vā ākrandyate ity ākrandaḥ ārtāyanam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26505: ākranda-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dhāvati ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhak ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26512: padaśabdaḥ uttarapadaṃ yasya tasmāt padottarapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26515: padānatāt iti na+uktaṃ, bahucpūrvān mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26519: pratikaṇṭha-artha-lalāma-śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gṛhṇāti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26526: dharma-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāc carati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26535: pratipatha-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād eti ity asminn arthe ṭhan pratyayo bhavati, cakārāṭ ṭhak ca /
GS24jvkasipu:26540: samavāyā-vācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ samavaiti ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26543: samavaiti āgatya tadekadeśī bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26551: pariṣadaḥ ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26557: senā-śabdād vā ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati samavāyān samavaiti ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26564: lalāṭa-kukkuṭī-śabdābhyāṃ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ paśyati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26569: tad anena lalāṭa-darśanena sevakasya svāminaṃ prati anupaśleṣaḥ kāryeṣu anupasthāyitvaṃ lakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:26573: deśasya alpatayā hi bhikṣuravikṣiptadṛṣṭiḥ pādavikṣepadeśe cakṣuḥ saṃyamya gacchati sa ucyate kaukkuṭikaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26578: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād dharmyam ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26588: mahiṣī ity evam ādibhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26606: ṛkārāntāt prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tasya dharmyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26620: ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt avakraya ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26626: nanu avakrayo 'pi dharmyam eva ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:26632: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattatprathamāsamarthaṃ paṇyaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26636: paṇyam iti viśeṣanaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhūtam ataḥ paṇya-śabdo na prayujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26640: lavaṇa-śabdāṭ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26647: kiśara ity evam ādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan pratyayo tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26667: śalālu-śabdād anyatarasyāṃ ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asya paṇyam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26678: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śilpaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26689: maḍḍuka-jharjhara-śabdābhyām anyatarasyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śilpam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26697: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26698: yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ praharaṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26705: paraśvadha-śabdāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:26711: śakti-yaṣṭi-śabdābhyām īkak pratyayo bhavati tad asya praharaṇam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26719: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ asti nāsti diṣṭa ity etebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ matiś cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26723: na ca matisattāmātre pratyaya iṣyate, kiṃ tarhi, paraloko 'sti iti yasya matiḥ sa āstikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26727: asti-nāsti-śabdau nipātau, vacanasāmarthyād vā ākhyātād vākyāc ca pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26732: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yattat prathamāsamarthaṃ śīlaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26737: bhakṣaṇakriyā tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca śīlaṃ taddhitavṛttāv antarbhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:26742: chatra ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya śīlam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26747: sthā-śabdo 'tra paṭhyate, sa upasarga-pūrvo 'tra gṛhyate āsthā saṃsthā avasthā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26767: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26768: yat tatprathamāsmarthaṃ karma cet tad vṛttam adhyayanaviṣayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26772: ekamanyat iti vigṛhya taddhitārtha iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26774: adhyayane karma vṛttam ity etat sarvaṃ taddhitavṛttāvantarbhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26775: yasya adhyayanaprayuktasya parīkṣākāle paṭhataḥ skhalitam apapāṭharūpam ekaṃ jātaṃ sa ucyate aikānyikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26780: bahvac pūrvapadaṃ yasya tasmād bahvacpūrvapadāt prātipadikāt ṭhac pratyayo bhavati tad asya karmādhyayane vṛttam ity etasminn arthe ṭhako 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26785: udātte kartavye yo 'nudāttaṃ karoti sa ucyate anyat tvaṃ karoṣi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26790: tad iti prathamāsamarthādasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ hitaṃ cet tad bhavati, tac ca bhakṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26791: nanu ca hitayoge caturthyā bhavitavyaṃ, tatra kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhyarthe pratyayo vidhīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:26801: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmā iti caturthyartha ṭhak pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ tac ced dīyate niyuktam /
GS24jvkasipu:26804: agre bhojanam asmai niyuktaṃ dīyate āgrabhojanikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26812: śrāṇā-māṃsa-odana-śabdābhyāṃ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmai dīyate niyuktam ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26820: atha ṭhañ eva kasmān na+uktaḥ, na hy atra ṭhañaṣ ṭiṭhano vā viśeṣo 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:26821: māṃsaudana-grahaṇaṃ saṅghātavigṛhīta-arthaṃ kecid icchanti, tatra vṛddhyabhāvo viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26827: bhakta-śabdād aṇ pratyayo bhavati anyatrasyām tad asami dīyate niyuktam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26830: bhaktam asmai dīyate niyuktam bhāktaḥ, bhaktikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:26834: tatra iti saptamīsamarthān niyukta ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26844: agāra-śabdāntāt prātipadikāt ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tatra niyuktaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:26854: saptamīsamarthād adeśa-vācinaḥ paratipadikād akāla-vācinaḥ ca adhyāyinyabhidheye ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26855: adhyayanasya yau deśakālau śāstraṇa pratiṣiddhau tāvadeśakāla-śabdena+ucyete,
GS24jvkasipu:26867: kaṭhina-śabdāntāt saptamīsamarthāt prastāra-saṃsthāna-śabdābhyāṃ ca ṭhak pratyayo bhavati vyavaharati ity etasmnn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:26876: nikaṭa-śābdāt saptamīsmarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26877: yasya śāstrato nikaṭavāsas tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26878: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā grāmāt krośe vastavyam iti śāstram /
GS24jvkasipu:26884: āvasatha-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt vasati ity etasminn arthe ṣṭhal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26889: ṭhakaḥ pūrṇo 'vadhiḥ, ataḥ paramanyaḥ pratyayo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26894: prāg etasmād dhitasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo yat pratyayasteṣvadhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26903: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyo rathayugaprāsaṅgebhyo vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26907: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad anatavidhy-upasaṅkhyānāt paramarathyaḥ ity api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:26913: dhur ity etasmād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat ḍhak ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26919: sarvadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26921: strīliṅge nyāyye sarvadhurāt iti prātipadikamātra-apekṣo nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:26929: ekadhurā-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26937: śakaṭa-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26943: hala-sīra-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsmarthābhyāṃ vahati ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26950: janī-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād vahati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26959: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād vidhyati ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26963: adhanuṣā iti kim ? pādau vidhyati dhanuṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:26964: nanu asamarthatvād anabhidhānāc ca pratyayo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:26965: na hi dhanuṣā padya iti vivakṣito 'rthaḥ pratīyate ?
