GS24jvkasipu:26966: evaṃ tarhi dhanuṣpratiṣedhena vyadhanakriyā viśeṣyate, yasyāṃ dhanuṣkaraṇam na sambhāvyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:26967: tena iha na bhavati, cauraṃ vidhyati, śatruṃ vidhyati devadattaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:26972: dhanagaṇa-śabdābhyāṃ dvitīyāsamarthābhyām labdhā ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26975: labdhā iti tṛnnantaṃ, tena dvitīyā samarthā vibhaktir yujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:26979: anna-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt labdhā ity etasmin arthe ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26984: vaśa-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād gataḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26991: padaśabdāt prathamāsamarthād dṛśyārthopādhikād asminniti saptamyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:26995: śakyate yasmin padaṃ mūlyāḥ, suṣṭhu draṣṭuṃ pratimudrotpādanena sa padyaḥ kardamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27000: mula-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād āvarhi ity evam upādhikādasya+iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27004: yeṣāṃ mūlam āvṛhyate utpāṭyate te mūlyāḥ, suṣṭhu niṣpannāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27005: mūlotpāṭanena vinā saṅgrahītuṃ na śakyante ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27012: dhenoḥ sugāgamo yaś ca pratyayaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27014: yā dhenur uttamarṇāya ṛṇapradānād dohanārthaṃ dīyate sā dhenuṣyā /
GS24jvkasipu:27021: gṛhapati-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃyukte ity etasminn arthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27023: anyasya api gṛhapatinā saṃyogo 'sti, tatra sañjñādhikārād atiprasaṅga-nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27027: nāvādhibhyo 'ṣṭabhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'ṣṭasv eva tāryādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27034: tena vayasā tulye śatrau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27036: nanu ca dharmādanapete iti vakṣyamāṇena+eva siddham ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:27037: dharmaṃ yad anuvartate tad dharmād anapetam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27038: phalaṃ tu dharmād apety eva, kāryavirodhitvād dharmasya /
GS24jvkasipu:27043: paṭādīnām utpattikāraṇaṃ mūlaṃ tena tadabhibhūyate śeṣīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27045: poradupadhāt (*3,1.98) iti yati prāpte ānāmyam iti nipātanāt ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:27050: rathasītāhalebhyo yad vidhau iti tad antavidhir api iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27057: yathā tulā paricchinatti param evaṃ tad api iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27062: dharmādibhyaḥ pañcamīsamarthebhyo 'napetaḥ ity arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27073: chandaḥ-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27081: uraḥśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthān nirmite ity etasminn arthe 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt yat ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27082: urasā nirmitaḥ aurasaḥ putraḥ, urasyaḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27088: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt priyaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27092: iha na bhavati, hṛdayasya priyaḥ putraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27100: hṛdaya-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bandhane ṛṣāvabhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27103: parahṛdayaṃ yena badhyate vaśīkriyate sa vaśīkaraṇamantro hṛdyaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27107: matādibhyaḥ tribhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ triṣv eva karaṇādiṣv artheṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27119: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27124: sādhuḥ iha pravīṇo yogyo vā gṛhyate, na+upakārakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27125: tatra hi paratvāt tasmai hitam (*5,1.5) ity anena vidhinā bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:27130: pratijanādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ khañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27149: yatra hitārtha eva sādhvarthastatra vacanāt prākkrītīyā bādhyante //
GS24jvkasipu:27153: bhakta-śabdāt ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27160: pariṣac-chabdād ṇyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27165: pariṣadaḥ ṇo bhavati, pariṣadi sādhuḥ pāriṣadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27171: kathādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhak pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27190: guḍa-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27210: pathy-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27220: sabhā-śabdād yaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27227: sabhā-śabdāḍ ḍhaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra sādhuḥ ity etasmin viṣaye chandasi /
GS24jvkasipu:27235: samāanatīrtha-śabdāt tatra iti saptamīsamarthād vāsi ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27242: samānodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27249: sodara-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt śayitaḥ ity etsminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27251: iti sūtreṇa yakārādau pratyaye vivakṣite prāg eva samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27259: sptamīsamarthāt bhava ity etasminn arthe chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27261: sati darśane te 'pi bhavanti, sarvavidhīnām chandasi vyabhicārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:27262: namo medhyāya ca vidyutyāya ca namaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27264: bhavādhikāraś ca samudra-abhrād dhaḥ (*4,4.118) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:27269: pāthaḥ-śabdān nadī-śabdāc ca ḍyaṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27272: ca no dadhīta nādyo giro me /
GS24jvkasipu:27277: veśanta-śabdād dhimavaccha-śabdāc ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27283: srotaḥ-śabdād vibhāṣā ḍyat dya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27292: sagarbha-sayūtha-sanuta-śabdebhyo yan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27302: tugra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27309: agra-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27311: kim artham idaṃ yāvatā sāmānyena yad vihita eva ? ghacchau ca (*4,4.117)
GS24jvkasipu:27312: iti vakṣyati tābhyāṃ bādhā mā bhūt iti punar vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27316: agra-śabdāt yat gha-cchau ca pratyayā bhavanti tatra bhavaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27318: cakāraḥ tugrād ghan (*4,4.115) ity asya anukarṣaṇa-arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27325: samudra-śabdāt abhra-śabdāc ca ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati tatra bhavaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27335: barhiḥ-śabdāt saptamīsamarthāt dattam ity etasmin arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27341: dūta-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāge karmaṇi ca abhidheye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27350: rakṣaḥ-śabdād yātu-śabdāc ca ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād hananī ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27352: yā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇau rakṣasyā tanū yātavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:27360: revaty-ādibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ praśasye vācye yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27361: praśaṃsanaṃ praśasyam, bhāve kyap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27365: haviṣe hitā haviṣyāḥ, tāsāṃ praśaṃsnaṃ haviṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:27366: yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148) iti lope kṛte halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ (*8,4.64) iti lopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27370: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt svam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27372: asuryaṃ vā etat pātraṃ yat kulālakṛtaṃ cakravṛttam //
GS24jvkasipu:27377: asura-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt māyāyāṃ svaviśeṣe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27381: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ || PS_4,4.125 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27384: matub-antāt prātipadikāt prathamāsamarthād āsām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yat pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27385: yat prathamāsamartham upadhāno mantraś cet sa bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27386: yat tad āsām iti nirdiṣṭam iṣṭakāś cet tā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:27393: varcasvānupadhānamantraḥ āsām iṣṭakānām iti vigṛhya yati vihite mator luki kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:27398: tadvān iti kim ? mantrasamudāyād eva mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:27399: upadhānaḥ iti kim ? varcasvān upasthānamantraḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:27400: mantraḥ iti kim ? aṅgulimānupadhāno hastaḥ āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:27401: iṣṭakāsu iti kim ? aṅgulimānupadhāno hasta āsām ity atra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:27403: anekapadasambhave 'pi kenacid eva padena tadvān mantro gṛhyate, na sarveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:27410: aśvimānupadhāno mantraḥ āsāmi ṣṭakānām iti vigṛhyāṇ vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:27417: vayasvānupadhāno mantro yāsāṃ tā vayasyāḥ, tāsv abhidheyāsu mūrdhno matup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27419: yasmin mantre vayaḥ-śabdo mūrdhan-śabdaś ca vidyate sa vayasvān api bhavati mūrdhanvān api,
GS24jvkasipu:27420: yathā mūrdhā vayaḥ prajāpatiś chandaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27421: tatra vayasvacchabdād iva mūrdhavacchabdād api yati prāpte matup vidhāsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27424: vayasyāsu iti kim ? yatra mūrdhan-śabda eva kevalo na vayaḥ-śabdasn tatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:27425: mūrdhanvataḥ iti vaktavye mūrdhnaḥ ity uktaṃ, matupo lukaṃ bhāvinaṃ citte kṛtvā //
GS24jvkasipu:27431: tasminś chandasi viṣaye yat pratyayo bhavati māsatanvoḥ pratyayārtha-viśeṣaṇayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27432: prathamāsamarthād asty upādhikāt ṣaṣṭhyārthe saptamyarthe ca yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27434: nabhāṃsi vidyante asmin māse abhasyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27439: tanvā khalv api - ojo 'syāṃ vidyate ojasyā tanūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27441: māsatanvoḥ iti kim ? madhumatā pātreṇa carati māsatanvor anantarārthe vā /
GS24jvkasipu:27442: madhv asminn asti madhv asminn anantaram iti vā madhvyo māsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27455: madhu-śabdān matvarthe ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27458: tanvāṃ khalv api mādhavā, madhavyā, madhuḥ tanūḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27469: matvarthe ity eva veśoyaśasī ādau yasya prātipadikasya tasmād veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe yal pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27470: lakāraḥ svarārthaḥ veśobhago vidyate yasya sa veśobhagyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27474: veśaś ca asau bhagaś ca śrīprabhṛtir veśobhagaḥ, so 'sya asti iti veśobhagyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27479: veśoyaśāader bhagāntāt prātipadikāt matvarthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27489: pūrvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtam ity etasminn arthe ina ya ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27494: pūrvaiḥ iti bahuvacanān tena pūrvapuruṣāḥ ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:27495: tatkṛtāḥ panthānaḥ praśastā iti pathāṃ praśaṃsā //
GS24jvkasipu:27500: ap-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt saṃskṛtam ity etasminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27507: sahasra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt sammita ity etasminn arthe ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27512: tatra api samityā sammitaḥ eva lakṣayitavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27517: matvarthe ca sahasra-śabdāt ghaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27519: tapaḥ-sahasrābhyāṃ vini-inī (*5,2.102), aṇ ca (*5,2.103) ity asya apavādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27524: soma-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthāt arhati ity etasminn arthe yaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27554: vasu-śabdāt samūhe vācye yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārānmayaḍarthe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:27564: eśa vai saptadaśākṣaraś chandasyaḥ prajāpatiraṃryajño mantre vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27566: chandaḥśabdād akṣarasamūhe vartamānāt svārthe yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27581: sarvadeva-śabdābhyāṃ tātil pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye svārthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27590: śivādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ kare ity etasminn arthe tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27597: bhāve cārthe chandasi viṣaye śivādibhyaḥ tātil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27603: iti śrijayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27611: prāg etasmāt krīta-saṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ cha-pratyayasteṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27618: tena prāk ṭhañaḥ chanḥ iti noktam //
GS24jvkasipu:27623: u-varṇāntāt prātipadikāt gava-ādibhyaś ca yat pratyayo bhavati prāk-krītiyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:27631: tataḥ paratvāt carmaṇo 'ñ (*5,1.15) ity eṣa vidhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:27634: tato vibhāṣā havir-apūpa-ādibhyaś ca (*5,1.3) ity eṣa vidhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:27639: gavādiṣu nābhi nabha ca iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27641: nābhi-śabdo yat-pratyayam utpādayati nabhaṃ cādeśam āpadyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27644: yas tu śarīra-avayavād yat (*5,1.6) iti yati kṛte, nābhaye hitaṃ nābhyaṃ tailam iti bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:27645: gava-ādiṣu yatā sanniyukto nabhabhāvo 'tra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27655: śunaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ vā ca dīrghatvaṃ tatsaniyogena cāntodāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:27657: cakārasya anukta-samuccaya-arthatvāt nas taddhite iti lopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:27669: kambalāt prākkrītīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27676: havir-viśeṣa-vācibhyo 'pūpa-ādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ prakkrītīyeṣv artheṣu vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27679: haviśśabdāt tu gavādiṣu paṭhān nityam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27704: tasmai iti caturthī-samarthād htam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27716: śarīra-avayava-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27726: khala-ādibhyo yat pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27734: vṛṣṇe hitam, brāhmaṇebhyo hitam iti vākyam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27742: aja avi ity etābhyāṃ thyan pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27751: ātman viśvajana ity etābhyāṃ bhogottarapadāc ca prātipadikāt khaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27753: ātmann iti nalopo na kṛtaḥ prakṛti-parimāṇa-jñāpana-artham /
GS24jvkasipu:27754: tena+uttarapada-grahaṇam bhoga-śabdena+eva sambadhyate, na tu pratyekam /
GS24jvkasipu:27759: ṣaṣṭhī-samāsād bahuvrīheś ca cha eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27782: bhogottarapadābhyam eva khaḥ pratyayaḥ iṣyate, na kevalābhyām /
GS24jvkasipu:27786: kevalābhyāṃ vākyam eva bhavati, rājñe hitam, ācāryāya hitam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:27791: sarva-puruṣābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇaḍañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27798: pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ, pauruṣeyo vikāraḥ, pauruṣeyaḥ samūho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:27803: māṇavacaraka-śabdābhyāṃ khañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai hitam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:27810: prakṛtiḥ upādānakāraṇaṃ, tasya+eva uttaram avasthāntaraṃ vikṛtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27811: vikṛti-vācinaḥ prātipādikāt prakṛtāv abhidheyāyāṃ yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27816: na prakṛtivikāra-sambhavam ātre pratyayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi, prakṛter ananyārthatve vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:27817: pratyayārthasya ca tadarthatve sati sāmarthyāl labhyā caturthī samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27818: kecit tu tasmai hitam (*5,1.5) ity anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:27819: aṅgārebhyo hitāni etāni kāṣṭhāni aṅgārīyāṇi kāṣṭhāni /
GS24jvkasipu:27825: prakṛtyantar anivṛttir atra vivakṣitā na tādarthyam dhānānāṃ saktavaḥ, na lājānām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27827: vikṛti-grahaṇe 'kriyamāṇe yā kācit prakrtir gṛhyate, na+upādānakāraṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:27828: bhavati ca kūpa udakasya prakṛtiḥ, tatra+utpādanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:27829: na tu udakaṃ tasyaḥ vikṛtiḥ, atyantabhedāt prakṛtau iti kim ? asyarthā kośī /
GS24jvkasipu:27830: asirayaso vikṛtir bhavati, na tu kośī tasya prakṛtir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27831: dvayor api prakṛti-vikṛtyor grahaṇe vivakṣitaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo labhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:27836: chadir-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:27843: upadhīyate iti upadhiḥ rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api tad eva dāru //
GS24jvkasipu:27847: ṛṣabha upānaḥ ity rathāṅgaṃ aupadheyam api etābhyāṃ ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛṭeḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:27852: carmaṇy api prakṛtitvena vivakṣite pūrvavipratiṣedhād ayam eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27858: carmaṇo yā vikṛtiḥ tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt añ pratyayo bhavati tadarthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau (*5,1.12)
GS24jvkasipu:27864: tad asya tad asmin syād iti || PS_5,1.16 ||
GS24jvkasipu:27866: tad iti prathamā samarthavibhaktiḥ, asya iti pratyayārthaḥ, syāt iti prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:27869: saptamy-arthe tu pratyaya ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27870: prathamāsamarthāt ṣaṣṭhyarthe saptamyarthe ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:27871: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ syāc cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27875: saptamyarthe khalv api - prākāro 'smin deśe syāt prākārīyo deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27877: syād iti sambhāvanāyāṃ liṅ, sambhāvane 'lam iti ced ity ādinā /
GS24jvkasipu:27878: iṣṭakānāṃ vahutvena tat sambhāvyate prākāra āsāmiṣṭakānāṃ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27879: deśasya ca guṇena sambhāvyate prāsādo 'smin deśe syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27884: anekasmin pratyayārthe pratyekaṃ samarthavibhaktiḥ sambandhanīyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27885: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati, prāsādo devadattasya syāt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:27892: parikhāś-abdāt ḍhañ pratyayo bhavati tad asya tad asmin syāt (*5,1.16) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:27900: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ (*5,1.115) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:27901: prāg etasmād vatisaṃ-śabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhañ pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto viditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27910: ā etasmād arhasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ṭhak pratyayas teṣv adhikṛto veditavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:27912: abhividhāv ayam ākāraḥ, tena arhaty artho 'pi ṭhak bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:27917: agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt iti kim ? gopucchena krītaṃ gaupucchikam /
GS24jvkasipu:27922: saṅkhyāparimāṇayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ? bhedagaṇanaṃ saṅkhyā ekatvādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27926: ūrdhvamānaṃ kilonmānaṃ parimāṇaṃ tu sarvataḥ āyāmastu pramāṇaṃ syāt saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27931: viṣkādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo 'samāse ṭhak pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:27939: ṭhaj eva bhavati, arimāṇāntasya ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:27940: atha kimartham asamāse ity ucyate yāvatā grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:27946: śarīra-avayavād yat (*5,2.6) - dantyam, rājadantyam ity evamādi sidhdaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27947: ita uttaraṃ ca saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadantavidhir iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27952: dviśūrpeṇa krītam iti tadantavidhi-pratiṣedhāt śūrpād añ anyatrasyām (*5,1.26) iti añ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:27956: tathā ca+uktam, prāgvateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadant-agrahaṇam aluki iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27969: śata-śabdāt ṭhanyatau pratyayau bhavataḥ aśate 'dhidheye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:27972: aśate iti kim ? śataṃ parimāṇam asya śatakaṃ nidānam /
GS24jvkasipu:27974: śatam eva vastutaḥ prakṛtyarthān na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27975: iha tu na bhavati, śatena krītaṃ śatyaṃ śāṭakaśatam, śatikaṃ śāṭakaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:27976: vākyena hy atra pratyaya-arthasya tattvaṃ gamyate, na śrutyā /
GS24jvkasipu:27979: dvau ca śataṃ ca dviśataṃ, dviśatena krītaṃ dviśatakam /
GS24jvkasipu:27981: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyā-pūrvapadānāṃ tadantagrahaṇam aluki ity anayā iṣṭyā samāsād api prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:27986: saṅkhyāyā aty-antāyā aśad-antāyāś ca kan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:27993: arthavatastiśabdasya grahaṇāḍ ḍateḥ paryudāso na bhavati, katikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:27997: vatvantasya saṅkhyātvāt kan siddha eva, tasya tvanena vā iḍ-āgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:27998: vatoḥ parasya ano vā iḍ-āgamo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28005: viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ ḍvun pratyayo bhavati asañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28011: kathaṃ punar atra kan, yāvatā atiśadantāyāḥ iti paryudāsena bhavitavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:28012: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate, viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ kan pratyayo bhavati, tato ḍvun asañjñāyāṃ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:28016: kaṃsāṭ ṭiṭhan pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28029: pratiśabdaś ca asya ādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28035: śūrpa-śabdād anyatarasyām añ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28042: śatamānādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ aṇ pratyayo bhavati ārhīyeṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28053: adhyardha-śabdaḥ pūrvo yasmin tasmād adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikad dvigoś ca parasya ārhīyasya lug bhavati asañjñāyāṃ iti kim ? pāñcalohitikam /
GS24jvkasipu:28056: pratyayāntasya viśeṣaṇam asañjñā-grahaṇaṃ na cet pratyayāntaṃ sañjñā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28064: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca kārṣāpaṇa-sahasrāntāt uttarasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28075: alukpakṣe saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsara-saṅkhyasya ca ity uttarapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28086: dvitripūrvād dvigor niṣkāntāt ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28096: dvi-tri-pūrvād bistāntād dvigoḥ parasya ārhīya-pratyayasya vibhāṣā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28104: adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca viṃśatika-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28112: adhyardhapūrvad dvigoḥ ity eva adhyardhapūrvāt prātipadikād dvigoś ca khārī-śabdānatāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu īkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28127: adhyardhapūrvād dvigoś ca paṇ-apāda-māṣa-śata-śabdāntāt ārhīyeṣv artheṣu yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28134: padbhāvo na bhavati pad yaty-atadarthe (*6,3.53) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28147: śāṇa-śabdād adhyardhapūrvād dvigor ārhīyeṣv artheṣu vā yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28149: pakṣe so 'pi bhavati, tasya ca luk /
GS24jvkasipu:28162: dvi-tri-pūrvāc chāṇāntāt prātipadikād ārhīyeṣv artheṣu aṇ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yac ca vā /
GS24jvkasipu:28166: parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ (*7,3.17) iti paryudāsādivṛddhir eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28171: teṣām itaḥ prabhṛti samartha-vibhaktayaḥ pratyayārthāś ca nirdiśyante tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt krītam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28182: tena iti mūlyāt karaṇe tṛtīyā samartha-vibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28183: anyatrān abhidhānān na bhavati, devadattena krītam, pāṇinā krītam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28187: yatra tu prakṛtyarthasya saṅkhyābhedāvagame pramāṇam asti tatra dvivacana-bahuvacana-antād api pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28193: na hy ekena mudgena krayaḥ sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28197: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt nimittam ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28198: yat tan nimittaṃ saṃyogaś cet sa bhavati utpāto vā saṃyogaḥ sambandhaḥ prāṇināṃ śubhāśubhasūcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28199: mahābhūta-pariṇāmaḥ utpātaḥ śatasya nimitta dhanapatinā saṃyogaḥ śatyaḥ, śatikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28201: utpataḥ khalv api - śatasya nimittaṃ utpātaḥ dakṣiṇākṣispandanam śatyam, śatikam /
GS24jvkasipu:28212: gośabdād dvyacaś ca prātipadikāt saṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvādivivarjitāt yat pratyayo bhavati tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:28215: goḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā gavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28221: asaṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśvāder iti kim ? pañcānāṃ nimittam pañcakam /
GS24jvkasipu:28241: putra-śabdāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga+utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:28243: dvyacaḥ iti nitye yati prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:28244: putrasya nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā putrīyam, putryam //
GS24jvkasipu:28248: sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇañau pratyayu bhavataḥ tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau (*5,1.38)
GS24jvkasipu:28251: sarvabhūmer nimittaṃ saṃyoga utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28257: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ īśvaraḥ ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28261: anyathā saṃyogotpātāv iva īśvaro 'pi pratyayārthasya nimittasya viśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:28265: tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ sarvabhūmi-pṛthivī-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam aṇ-añau pratyayau bhavataḥ viditaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28272: loka-sarvaloka-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyām viditaḥ ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28280: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād vāpaḥ ity etasminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28288: pātra-śabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati tasya vāpaḥ (*5,1.45) ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28298: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asminn iti saptamyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28299: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ vṛddhyādi cet tad dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28300: dīyate ity ekavacanāntaṃ vṛddhyādibhiḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28301: tatra yad adhamarṇena uttamarṇāya mūladhanātiriktaṃ deyaṃ tad vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28306: pañca asmin vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā śulko vā upadā vā dīyate pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28311: pañca asmai vṛddhir vā āyo vā lābho vā upadā vā dīyate pajcako devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28317: pūraṇa-vācinaḥ śabdāt ardha-śabdāc ca ṭhan pratyayo bhavati tad asmin vṛddhy-āya. lābhaśulka-upadā dīyate (*5,1.47)
GS24jvkasipu:28335: vṛddhyādir asmin dīyate bhāgyaṃ, bhāgikaṃ śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:28340: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.50 ||
GS24jvkasipu:28342: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthād dharaty-ādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28344: vaṃśādibhyaḥ paro yo bhāra-śabdaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28345: vaṃśabhāraṃ harati vahati āvahati vā vāṃśabhārikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28350: aparā vṛttiḥ - bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ iti, bhārabhūtebhyo vaṃśādibhyaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28356: vaṃśādibhyāḥ iti kim ? bhārabhūtān vrīhīn vahati /
GS24jvkasipu:28357: sūtrārthadvayam api ca+etad ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28376: vasna-dravya-śabdābhyām dvitīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṭhan kan ity aitau pratyayau bhavato haratyādiṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:28383: tad iti dvitiyāsamarthāt sambhavatyādiṣv artheṣu yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28387: prasthaṃ sambhavati avaharati pacati vā prāsthikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28390: nanu ca pāke ca sambhavo 'sti ? na asty atra niyogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28398: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-śadebhyo dvitīyāsamarthabhyo 'nyatarasyāṃ saṃbhavādiṣv artheṣu khaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28401: āḍhakaṃ saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā āḍhakīnā, āḍhakikī /
GS24jvkasipu:28408: āḍhaka-ācita-pātra-antād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu ṣṭhan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28410: vidhānasāmarthyād eva anayor luk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28411: ṭhañas tu pakṣe 'nujñātasya adhyardha-pūrva-dvigoḥ iti lug bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:28422: kulija-śabdānatād dvigoḥ saṃbhavatyādiṣv artheṣu lukkhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28427: dve kulije saṃbhavati avaharati pacati vā dvikulijiki, dvikulijīnā, dvikulijī, dvaikulijiki /
GS24jvkasipu:28429: ity atra kulija-grahaṇam apīṣyate, tena+uttarapada-vṛddhir api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28433: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamartham aṃśavasnabhṛtayaś cet tā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28437: pañca aṃśo vasno vā bhṛtirvāsya pañcakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28443: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati yat prathamāsamarthaṃ parimāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28454: samarthavibhaktiḥ pratyayārthaś ca pūrvasūtrād eva anuvartiṣyate, kim arthaṃ punar anayor upādānam ?
GS24jvkasipu:28458: punar vidhāna-sāmarthyād adhyardha-pūrvadvigor luk na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28464: saṅkhyā-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt parimāṇopādhikāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28469: saṅgha - pañca parimāṇam asya pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28471: sūtra - aṣṭau adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam asya sūtrasya aṣṭakaṃ pāṇinīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28474: nanu ca adhyāyasamūhaḥ sūtrasaṅgha eva bhavati ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:28481: tasya saṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ pañcāvṛttayaḥ pañcavārāḥ pañca rūpāṇi asya adhyayanasya pañcakam adhyayanam /
GS24jvkasipu:28483: pañcadaśa mantrāḥ parimāṇam asya pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28495: yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:28498: dvayor daśatoḥ vinbhāvaḥ śatiś ca pratyayaḥ dvau daśatau praimāṇam asya saṅghasya viṃśatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28499: trayāṇāṃ daśatāṃ trinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28501: caturṇāṃ daśatāṃ catvārinbhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28503: pañcānāṃ daśatāṃ pañcābhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28505: ṣaṇṇāṃ daśatāṃ ṣaḍbhāvaḥ, tiḥ pratyayo 'padatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28507: saptānāṃ daśatāṃ saptabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28510: aṣṭānāṃ daśatām aśībhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28513: navānāṃ daśatāṃ navabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28515: daśanāṃ daśatāṃ śabhāvaḥ taś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28516: daśa daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saṅghasya śatam /
GS24jvkasipu:28517: viṃśatyādayo guṇa-śabdāḥ, te yathā kathaṃcid vyutpādyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28519: tathā hi - paṅktiḥ iti kramasamniveśe 'pi vartate, brāhmaṇapaṅktiḥ, papīlikāpaṅktiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28520: na ca atra avayavārthaḥ kaścid asti /
GS24jvkasipu:28521: yā ca+eṣāṃ viṣayabhedena guṇa-mātre guṇini ca vṛttiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:28524: sahasrādayo 'py evaṃ jātiyakāḥ tadvad eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28530: pañcat daśat ity etau nipātyete tad asya aprimāṇam ity asmin viṣaye varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28540: varge ity eva, tad asya parimānam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28541: saptan śabdāc chandasi viṣaye 'ñ pratyayo bhavati varge 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28548: triṃśac-catvariṃśac-chabdābhyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ḍaṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya parimāṇam ity etasmin viṣaye brāhmaṇe 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28551: triṃśad-adhyāyāḥ parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhamaṇānāṃ traiśāni brāhmaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:28557: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthād arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28567: cheda-ādibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyo nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28586: śīrṣaccheda-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthān nityam arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28594: daṇḍādibhyo dvitiyāsamarthebhyaḥ arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28615: prātipadikamātrāc chandasi viṣaye tad arhati ity asminn arthe yat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28623: pātra-śabdād ghan pratyayo bhavati cakārād yat ca, tad arhati ity asminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28631: kaḍaṅkaradakṣiṇā-śabdābhyāṃ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād yat ca, tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28634: dakṣiṇām arhati dakṣiṇīyo bhikṣuḥ, dakṣiṇyo brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28635: dakṣiṇaśabdasya alpāctarasya apūrvanipātena lakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnena yathāsaṅkhyābhāvaṃ sūcayati //
GS24jvkasipu:28640: chayatau anuvarttete sthālībila-śabdāc chayatau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:28647: yajña-śabdād ṛtvik-śabdāc ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ gha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ tad arhati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28655: ataḥ paraṃ prāgvatīyaḥ ṭhañ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:28661: pārāyaṇa-adibhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ vartayati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28668: saṃśaya-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthāt āpannaḥ ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28673: yojana-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28678: tato 'bhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayor upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:28685: pathin-śabdād dvitīyāsamarthād gacchati ity asminn arthe ṣkan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28694: pathaḥ pantha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ṇaś ca pratyayo nityaṃ gacchati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:28695: panthānaṃ nityaṃ gacchati pāntho bhikṣāṃ yācate /
GS24jvkasipu:28701: uttarapatha-śabdād tṛtīyāsamarthāt āhṛtam ity etasmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28702: cakāraḥ pratyayārthasam uccaye, gacchati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28716: ajapathena āhṛtam ājapathikam, gacchati vā ājapathikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28725: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kālāt ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:28732: kālāt ity adhikāraḥ vyuṣṭa-ādibhyo 'ṇ (*5,1.97) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:28735: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kāla-vācinaḥ prātipadikāt virvṛttam ity asminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28740: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī || PS_5,1.80 ||
GS24jvkasipu:28742: tam iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā ity asminn arthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28752: nanu cādhyeṣaṇaṃ bharaṇaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ kriyate tena kathaṃ māso vyāpyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:28754: tatra phalabhūtayā kriyayā māso vyāpyamānas tābhyām eva vyāptaḥ ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:28758: māsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye yatkhañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28760: adhīṣṭādīnāṃ caturṇām adhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād bhūta eva atra abhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28767: māsāntād dvigor yap pratyayo bhavati vayasy abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:28774: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṇyat pratyayo bhavati, yap ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28782: ṣaṇmāsa-śabdād vayasy abhidheye ṭhaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28790: samā-śabdād dvitīyāsmārthād adhīṣṭādiṣu artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28791: ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ samāmadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā samīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28792: kecit tu tena nirvṛttam (*5,1.79) iti sarvatra anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:28798: samā-śabdāntād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādisu artheṣu pañcasu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28800: prāgvateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānāṃ tadanta-grahaṇam aluki (*7,3.17) iti prāptir asty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:28801: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28807: rātri ahaḥ saṃvatsara ity evam antād dvigoḥ nirvṛttādiṣu artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28808: khena mukte pakṣe ṭhañ api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28820: varṣāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu vā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28831: cittavati pratyaya-arthe 'bhidheye varṣa-śabdāntād dvigor nirvṛttādiṣv artheṣu utpannasya pratyayasya nityaṃ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28840: ṣaṣṭirātra-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kan pratyayo nipātyate pacyante ity etasminn arthe,
GS24jvkasipu:28849: vatsarāntāt prātipadikāt nivṛttādiṣv artheṣu chandasi viṣaye chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28857: nirvṛttādiṣv arthesu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārāc chaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:28863: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikāt parijayya,
GS24jvkasipu:28866: sukara ity eteṣv artheṣu ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28867: māsena parijayyaḥ, śakyate jetuṃ, māsiko vyādhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28879: kālasya vyāpakaṃ, pratyayārthasya ca svam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28880: tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28885: aparā vṛttiḥ - tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:28886: yat tad asya iti nirdiṣṭaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28890: pūrvatra brahamacārī pratyayārthaḥ, uttaratra brahamacaryam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:28898: mahānāmnya ṛcaḥ, tat sahacaritaṃ vrataṃ tacchabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28902: bhasyāḍhe iti puṃbadbhāvena ṅīpi nivṛtte nas taddhite (*6,4.144) iti ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28906: aṣṭācatvāriṃśato ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28907: aṣṭācatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi vrataṃ carati aṣṭācatvāriṃśakaḥ, aṣṭācatvariṃśī /
GS24jvkasipu:28908: cāturmāsyānāṃ yalopaś ca ḍvuṃś ca ḍiniś ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28920: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo yajñākhyebhyo dakṣiṇā ity etasminn arthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28924: ākhyā-grahaṇam akālād api yajñavācino yathā sayāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28925: itarathā hi kālādhikārād ekāhadvādaśāhaprabhṛtaya eva yajñā gṛhyeran /
GS24jvkasipu:28930: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat || PS_5,1.96 ||
GS24jvkasipu:28932: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt kālavācinaḥ prātipadikād dīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:28933: kāryam ity etayor arthayor bhavavat pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28944: yogavibhāgaś ca atra kartavyaḥ, tatra ca dīyate, yajñākhyebhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:28953: tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ dīyate, kāryam ity etayor aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:28979: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yathākathāca-hasta-śabdābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ṇa-yatau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28980: dīyate, kāryam ity etayor arthayoḥ pratyekam abhisambadhaḥ, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ na+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:28982: tṛtīyārthamātraṃ ca atra saṃbhavati, na tu tṛtīyā samarthavibhaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:28999: karma-veṣa-śabdābhyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyāṃ yat pratyayo bhavati sampādini ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29006: tasmai iti caturthīsamarthebhyaḥ santāpādibhyaḥ prabhavati ity asmin viṣaye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29030: yoga-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt ṭhañ, tasmai prabhavati ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29035: karman-śabdā ukañ pratyayo bhavati tasmai prabhavati ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29042: samaya-śabdāt tat iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29043: yat tatprathamāsamarthaṃ prāptaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29051: ṛtu-śabdāt tad iti prathamāsamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29060: ṛtu-śabdāc chandasi viṣaye ghas pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29066: kāla-śabdāt yat pratyayo bhavati tad asya prāptam ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29072: kālāt ity eva, tad asya iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29075: prakarṣe vartamānāt kālāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29083: tad iti prathamasamarthāt asya iti ṣaṣthyarthe ṭhañ prayayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29084: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ prayojanaṃ ced tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29090: viśākhā-ṣaḍhā-śabdābhyām aṇ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye yathāsaṅkhyam mantha-daṇḍayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29099: anupravacanādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity asmin viṣaye ṭhaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29136: samāpana-śabdāt sapūrvapadāt vidyamānapūrvapadāc chaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asya prayojanam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29147: kim artham idaṃ nipātyate, yāvatā prayojanam ity eva siddhaṣṭhañ ? caure niyamārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29148: iha mā bhūt, ekāgāraṃ prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29149: ṭhakāraḥ kāryāvadhāraṇa-arthaḥ, ṅīb eva bhavati na ñitsvaraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29150: apare punar ikaṭ pratyayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca nipātayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:29167: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ || PS_5,1.115 ||
GS24jvkasipu:29169: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt tulyam ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29170: yat tulyaṃ kriyā cet sā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29180: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāc ca iva-arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29183: ṣaṣthīsamarthāt - devadattasya iva devadattavat yajñādattasya gāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29188: tat iti dvitīyāsamarthāt arham ity etasminn arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29195: upasargāt sasādhane dhātvarthe vartamānāt svārthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29201: tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthād bhāvaḥ ity etasmninn arthe tavatalau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29210: ā etasmāt tvasaṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29216: karmaṇi ca vidhānārthaṃ guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca (*5,1.124) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29223: ita uttare ye bhāva. pratyayāḥ, te nañ-pūrvāt tatpuruṣāt na bhavanti caturādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:29230: tatpuruṣāt iti kim ? na asya paṭavaḥ santi iti apaṭuḥ, tasya bhāvaḥ āpaṭavam /
GS24jvkasipu:29244: pṛthu ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ imanic pratyayo bhavati vā tasya bhāvaḥ ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:29249: ra ṛto halader laghoḥ (*6,4.161) iti rephādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29288: varṇaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo dṛḍha-ādibhyaś ca ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29291: śuklasya bhāvaḥ śauklyam, śuklimā, śuklatvam, śuklatā /
GS24jvkasipu:29320: guṇavacanedhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaś ca tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthebhyaḥ karmaṇyabhidheye ṣyañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29396: stona-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yat pratyayo bhavati, na-śabdasya lopaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29406: sakhiśabdāt yaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29415: kapi-jñāti-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak prayayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29418: yathāsaṅkhyam arthayoḥ sarvatra+eva atra prakaraṇe na+iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:29422: patyantāt prātipadikāt purohitādibhyaś ca yak pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29461: prāṇabhṛjjātivācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vayovacanebhya udgātrādibhyaś ca añ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakramaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29483: hāyanāntebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ yuvādibhaś ca aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29519: igantāc ca laghupūrvāt aṇ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29524: laghuḥ pūrvo yasmād ikaḥ tadantān prātipadikād ity ayam artho vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29527: laghupūrva-grahanena sa eva viśeṣyate, paścāt tena prātipadikasya tadantavidhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29539: kathaṃ kāvyam iti ? brāhmaṇādiṣu kaviśabdo draṣtavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29545: yakāropadhāt gurūpottamād vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29556: dvandva-sañjñakebhyaḥ manojña-ādibhyaś ca vuñ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29587: gotravācinaḥ caranavācinaḥ ca prātipadikāt vuñ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29596: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca vikatthate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29599: gārgyatvena kaṭhatvena ca parānadhikṣipati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29602: gārgyatvaṃ kaṭhatvaṃ ca prāptaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29623: brahman-śabdād hotrāvācinaḥ tvaḥ pratyayo bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29626: na iti vaktavye tvavacanaṃ talo bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:29627: yas tu jāti-śabdo brāhmaṇaparyāyo brahman-śabdaḥ, tataḥ tvatalau bhavata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:29630: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ ______________________________________________________
GS24jvkasipu:29637: dhānyaviśeṣa-vācibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyo bhavane 'bhidheye khañ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29639: bhavanam iti bhavanti jāyante 'sminn iti bhavanam /
GS24jvkasipu:29643: dhānyānām iti kim ? tṛṇānāṃ bhavanaṃ kṣetram ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29644: kṣetram iti kim ? mudgānāṃ bhavanaṃ kusūlam /
GS24jvkasipu:29649: vrīhi-śāli-śabdābhyāṃ ḍhak pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre abhidheye khaño 'pavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29655: yavādibhyaḥ śabdebhyo yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29663: tila māṣa umā bhaṅgā aṇu ity etebhyaḥ vibhāṣā yat pratyayo bhavati bhavane kṣetre 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29664: khañi prāpte vacanaṃ, pakṣe so 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29674: sarvacarman śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt kṛtaḥ ity asminn arthe kha-khañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29675: sarvaśabdaś ca atra pratyayārthena kṛtena sambadhyate, na carmaṇā /
GS24jvkasipu:29677: sarvaś carmaṇā kṛtaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe vṛttiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29683: yathāmukha-śabdāt sammukha-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthād darśanaḥ ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29684: dṛśyate 'smin iti darśanaḥ ādarśādiḥ pratibimbāśraya ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29694: sarva-ādeḥ prātipadikāt pathin aṅga karman patra pātra ity evam antād dvitīyāsamarthād vyāpnoti ity asminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29706: āprapada-śabdāt tad iti dvitīyāsamarthāt prāpnoti ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29708: śarīreṇa asambaddhasya api paṭasya pramāṇam ākhyāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:29712: anupada-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ baddhā bhakṣayati neya ity eteṣv artheṣu khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29718: pradakṣiṇaprasavyagāmināṃ śārāṇāṃ yasmin paraśāraiḥ padānāmasamāveśaḥ so 'yānayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29724: parovara parampara putrapautra ity etebhyaḥ tad iti dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ anubhavati ity asmin arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29730: paramparaśabdo vināpi pratyayena dṛśyate, mantriparamparā mantraṃ bhinatti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29736: avārapāra atyanta anukāma ity etebhyo dvitīyāsamarthebhyaḥ gāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29737: gamiṣyati iti gāmī, bhaviṣyati gamyādayaḥ (*3,3.3) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29755: garbhadhāraṇena sakalā 'pi samā vyāpyate iti atyantasaṃyoge dvitīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:29759: kecit tu samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vigṛhṇanti, garbhamocane tu vijanir vartate ity āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29760: teṣāṃ pūrvapade yalopamātraṃ nipātyate, pariśiṣṭasya alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29761: anutpattāv uttarapadasya ca vā yalopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29762: samāṃsamāṃvijāyate, samāyāṃ samāyāṃ vijāyate iti vā //
GS24jvkasipu:29767: adyaśvīna iti nipātyate avaṣṭabdhe vijane, āsanne prasave /
GS24jvkasipu:29768: āvidūrye hi mūrdhanyo vidhīyate avāc ca ālambana-āvidūryayoḥ (*8,3.68) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29769: adya vā śvo vā vijāyate 'dyaśvīnā gauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29771: kecit tu vijāyate iti na anuvartayanti, avaṣṭabdhamātre nipātanam ity āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29778: goḥ āṅpūrvād ā tasya goḥ pratipādanāt karmakāriṇi khaḥ pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29780: yo gavā bhṛtaḥ karma karoti ā tasya goḥ pratyarpaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:29785: anugu-śabdād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29792: adhvan-śabdāt dvitīyāsamarthād alaṅgāmī ity etasminn arthe yat-khau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29794: ye ca abhavakarmaṇoḥ (*6,4.168), ātma-adhvānau khe (*6,4.169) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:29798: abhyamitra-śadāt dvitīyāsamarthāt alaṅgāmī ity asminn arthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29808: goṣṭha-śabdād bhūtapūrvopādhikāt svārthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29815: aśva-śabdād ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt ekāhagamaḥ ity etasminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29823: śālīna-kaupīna-śabdau nipātyete yathāsaṅkhyam adhṛṣṭe akārye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:29827: śālāpraveśanam arhati, kūpāvatāram arhati iti khañ pratyayaḥ uttarapadalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29834: vrāta-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt jīvati ity asminn arthe khañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29836: utsedhaḥ śarīraṃ, tadāyāsya ye jīvanti te utsedhajīvinaḥ, teṣā karma vrātam /
GS24jvkasipu:29846: kathaṃ sāptapadīnaḥ sakhā, sāptapadīnaṃ mitram iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:29847: yadā guṇapradhānaḥ sāptapadīna-śabdaḥ sakhibhāve tatkarmaṇi ca vartate tadā sakhya-śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:29848: yadā tu lakṣaṇayā vartate tadā puruṣeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:29853: hyogodohasya hiyaṅgavādeśaḥ, tasya vikāre khañ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:29856: tena+iha na bhavati, hyogodohasya vikāra udaśvit //
GS24jvkasipu:29860: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthebhyaḥ pīlvādibhyaḥ karṇādibhyaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pāka-mūlayor arthayoḥ kuṇap jāhac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29892: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt pakṣa-śabdāt mūle 'bhidheye tiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29899: tena iti tṛtīyāsamarthāt vittaḥ ity etasminn arthe cuñcup caṇap ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29905: vi nañ ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nā nāñ ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29907: asahārthe pṛthagbhāve vartamānābhyāṃ vinañbhyāṃ savārthe nā-nāñau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29913: viśadāt śālac śaṅkaṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29916: tadyogād gaur api viśālaḥ, viśaṅkaṭaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:29917: paramārthatas tu guṇa-śabdā ete yathākathañcid vyutpādyante /
GS24jvkasipu:29922: sam pra ud ity etebhyaḥ kaṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:29965: nāsikāyāḥ sambandhini nate abhidheye ṭiṭac nāṭac bhraṭac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:29967: tadyogān nāsikā 'pi tathā+ucyate, avaṭīṭaḥ, avanāṭaḥ, avabhraṭaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:29971: nate nāsikāyāḥ ity anuvartate, sañjñāyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29972: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye biḍac birīsac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29976: kathaṃ nibiḍāḥ keśāḥ, nibiḍaṃ vastram ? upamānād bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:29979: inac piṭac cika ci ca || PS_5,2.33 ||
GS24jvkasipu:29981: neḥ ity eva, nate nāsikāyāḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:29982: ni-śabdān nāsikāyā nate 'bhidheye inac piṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:29983: tatsaṃniyogena ca ni-śabdasya yathāsaṅkhyaṃ cika ci ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:29987: tathā ca+uktam - inac-piṭac-kāścikacicikādeśāś ca vaktavyāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:29989: klinnasya cil pil ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ laś ca pratyayo 'sya cakṣuṣī ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30000: upa adhi ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam āsannārūḍhayor vartamānābhhyāṃ svārthe tyakan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30004: pratyayasthāt kātpūrvasya iti itvam atra na bhavati, sañjñādhikārād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:30009: karma-śabdāt saptamīsamarthād ghaṭaḥ ity etasminn arthe aṭhac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30013: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac || PS_5,2.36 ||
GS24jvkasipu:30015: tad iti prathamāsamarthebhyas tārakā-ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe itac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30017: tārakāḥ sañjātā asya nabhasaḥ tārakitaṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30052: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe dvayasac daghnac mātrac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ pramāṇaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30053: ūruḥ pramāṇam asya ūrudvayasam, ūrudaghnam, ūrumātram /
GS24jvkasipu:30057: prathamaś ca dvitiyaś ca ūrdhvamāne matau mama /
GS24jvkasipu:30060: mātrac punar aviśeṣeṇa, prasthamātram ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30062: pramāṇa-śabdā iti ye prasiddhāḥ, tebhya utpannasya pratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30070: nitya-grahaṇaṃ kim ? saṃśaye śrāviṇaṃ vakṣyati, tatra api dvigor lug eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:30071: dve diṣṭī syātāṃ vā na vā dvidiṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30080: pramāṇaparimāṇābhyāṃ saṅkhyāyāś ca api saṃśaye mātrac vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30095: tad asya ity eva, pramāṇe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30096: puruṣahastibhyāṃ prathamāsamarthābhyāṃ pramāṇopādhikābhyām asya iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30098: puruṣaḥ pramāṇam asya pauruṣam, puruṣadvayasam, puruṣadadhnam, puruṣamātram /
GS24jvkasipu:30113: yat-tad-etebhyaḥ prathamāsamarthebhyaḥ parimāṇopādhikebhyaḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatup pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30121: na tvā vāṃ anyo divyo na pīrthivo a jāto na janisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30127: kim-idam-bhyām uttarasya vatupo vakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30130: etad eva cādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakaṃ kimidambhyāṃ vatup-pratyayo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30131: atha vā yogavibhāgena vatupaṃ vidhāya paścād vo gho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30136: saṅkhyāparimāṇe vartamānāt kimaḥ prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe ḍatiḥ pratyayo bhavati, cakārād vatup /
GS24jvkasipu:30138: pṛcchyamānatvāt paricchedopādhikāyāṃ saṅkhyāyāṃ vartamānāt kimaḥ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30140: kā saṅkhyā parimāṇam eṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām kati brāhmaṇāḥ, kiyanto brāhmaṇāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30141: atha vā saṅkhyā+eva parimāṇātmikā paricchedasvabhāvā gṛhyate, kā saṅkhyā parimāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30142: nanu ca saṅkhyā evamātmikaiva paricchedasvabhāvā, sā kimarthaṃ parimāṇena viśeṣyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:30143: yatra aparicchedakatvena vivakṣyate tatra mā bhūd iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30144: kṣepe hi paricchedo na asti, keyam eṣāṃ saṅkhyā daśānām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30149: saṅkhyāyā avayave vartamānāyāḥ asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe tayap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30150: avayavāvayavinaḥ sambandhinaḥ iti sāmarthyāt avayavī pratyayārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30158: pūrveṇa vihitasya tayasya dvitribhyāṃ parasya vā ayajādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30164: trayī gatiḥ iti tayanibandhana īkāro na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:30173: ubha-śabdāt parasya tayapo nityam ayajādeśo bhavati, sa codāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30175: ubhaśabdo yati laukikī saṅkhyā tataḥ pūrveṇa+eva vihitasya tayapa ādeśavidhānārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:30176: atha na saṅkhyā, tato yogavibhāgena tayapaṃ vidhāya tasya nityam ayajādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30180: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ || PS_5,2.45 ||
GS24jvkasipu:30182: tat iti prathamāsamarthāt asmin iti saptamyarthe daśāntāt prātipadikāt ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati yat tatprathamāsamartham adhikaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30188: daśāntāt iti kim ? pañca adhikā asmin śate /
GS24jvkasipu:30191: pratyayārthena ca samānajātīye prakṛtyarthe sati pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30192: ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate ekādaśaṃ kārṣāpanaśatam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30193: iha tu na bhavati, ekādaśa māṣā adhikā asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30195: iha na bhavati, ekādaśādhikā asyāṃ triṃśati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30196: itikaraṇo vivakṣārtha ity uktaṃ, tata idaṃ sarvaṃ labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30198: śatānāṃ sahasraṃ, sahasrāṇām vā śatam iti śatasahasram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30201: yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyo mato mama //
GS24jvkasipu:30205: tad asminn adhikam ity anuvartate, ḍaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30206: śadantāt prātipadikāt viṃśateś ca ḍaḥ pratyayo bhavati tad asminn adhikam ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30208: śad-grahane 'nta-grahanaṃ pratyaya-grahaṇe yasmāt sa tadāder adhikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:30212: iha mā bhūt, gotriṃśadadhikā asmin gośate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30218: iha mā bhūt, goviṃśatir adhikā 'smin gośate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30222: tad asya ity anuvartate tad asya sañjātam ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30223: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ guṇasya cen nimāne vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:30225: guṇo yena nimīyate mūlyabhūtena so 'pi sāmarthyād bhāga eva vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30226: yavānāṃ dvau bhāgau nimānam asya udaśvidbhāgasya dvimayamudaśvid yavānām /
GS24jvkasipu:30229: bhāge 'pi tu vidhīyāmānaḥ pratyayaḥ prādhānyena bhāgavantamācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:30231: guṇasya iti caikatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, tena+iha na bhavati, dvau bhāgau yavānāṃ traya udaśvitaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30233: bhūyasaś ca vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ pratyaya iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30234: iha na bhavati, eko bhāgo nimānamasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30235: bhūyasaḥ iti ca pratyayārthāt prakṛtyarthasya adhikyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GS24jvkasipu:30238: tena+iha na bhavati, dvau bhāgau yavānām adhyardha udaśvitaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30240: nimeye vartamānāyāḥ saṅkhyāyā nimāne pratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30241: udaśvito dvau bhāgau nimeyamasya yavabhāgasya dvimayā yavā udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30244: guṇasya iti kim ? dvau vrīhiyavau nimānamasya+udaśvitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30246: dvau guṇau kṣīrasya ekastailasya, dviguṇaṃ pacyate tailaṃ kṣīreṇa ity atra mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:30250: tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt pūraṇe ity asminn arthe ḍaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30252: yena saṅkhyā saṅkhyānaṃ pūryate sampadyate, sa tasyāḥ pūraṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30255: yasminn upasañjāte 'nyā saṅkhyā sampadyate sa pratyayārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30256: iha na bhavati, pañcānāṃ muṣṭikānāṃ pūraṇo ghaṭaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30261: nakārāntāt saṅkhyāvācinaḥ prātipadikāt asaṃkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo maḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30262: nāntāt iti pañcamī iṭa āgamasambandhe ṣaṣṭhīṃ prakalpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:30265: nāntāt iti kim ? viṃśateḥ pūraṇaḥ viṃśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30266: asaṅkhyādeḥ iti kim ? ekādaśānāṃ pūraṇaḥ ekādaśaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30270: nāntād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ chandasi viṣaye thaḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30283: ṣaṭ kati katipaya catur ity eṣāṃ ḍaṭi puratasthugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30285: tasya asmād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30297: bahu pūga gana saṅgha ity eteṣāṃ ḍaṭi parataḥ tithugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30298: pūgasaṅghaśabdayor asaṅkhyātvādidam eva jñāpakaṃ ḍaṭo bhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:30308: vatvantasya saṃkhyātvāt pūrveṇa ḍaḍ vihitaḥ, tasminn ayam āgamaḥ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30315: dviśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayo bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity asmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30321: triśabdāt tīyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati tasya pūraṇe ity etad viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30325: halaḥ (*6,4.2.) iti saṃprasāraṇasya dīrghatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30326: aṇaḥ iti tatra anuvartate ḍhralope ity ataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30332: viṃśaty-ādibhyaḥ parasya ḍaṭaḥ tamaḍāgamo bhavaty anyatarasayām /
GS24jvkasipu:30339: viṃśatyādayo laukikāḥ saṅkhyāśabdā gṛhyante, na paṅktyādi-sūtra-saṃniviṣṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30342: evaṃ ca sati ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58) iti paryudāsoyujyata eva //
GS24jvkasipu:30347: śatādibhyaḥ māsārdhamāsasaṃvatsaraśadebhyaś ca parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30348: māsādayaḥ saṃkhyāśabdā na bhavanti, tebhyo 'smād eva jñāpakāt ḍaṭ pratyayo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30355: ṣaṣṭyādeś ca asaṅkhyādeḥ (*5,2.58) iti vakṣyamāṇena siddhe śatādigrahaṇaṃ saṅkhyādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:30361: ṣaṣṭyādeḥ saṅkhyāśabdād asaṅkhyādeḥ parasya ḍaṭo nityaṃ tamaḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30371: prātipadikān matvarthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sūkte sāmani ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:30372: matvartha-grahaṇena samarthavibhaktiḥ, prakṛtiviśeṣanaṃ, pratyayārthaḥ iti sarvam ākṣipyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30386: matvarthe utpannasya chasya luk bhavati adhyāyānuvākayoḥ abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30387: kena punar adhyāyānuvākayoḥ pratyayaḥ ? idam eva lug-vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ tadvidhānasya /
GS24jvkasipu:30389: gardabhāṇḍaśabdo 'sminn iti gardabhāṇḍo 'dhyāyaḥ, anuvāko vā gardabhānḍīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30395: matau ity eva, adhyāyānuvākayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30396: vimuktādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'ṇ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30428: matau ity eva, adhyāyānuvākayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30429: goṣadādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ vun pratyayo bhavati matvarthe 'dhyāyānuvākayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30450: tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt pathinśabdāt kuśalaḥ ity asminn arthe vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30455: tatra ity eva, kuśalaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30456: ākarśādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30483: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30485: dhana-hiraṇya-śabdābhyāṃ tatra iti saptamīsamarthābhyāṃ kāme ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30493: tatra ity eva, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30494: svāṅgavācibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ tatra iti saptamīsamarthebhyaḥ prasite ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30504: tatra ity eva, prasite iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:30505: udaraśabdāt saptamīsamarthāt prasite ity etasminn arthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30508: yo bubhukṣayā 'tyantaṃ pīḍyate sa evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30514: kan pratyayaḥ ity eva svaryate, na ṭhak /
GS24jvkasipu:30516: sasya-śabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthāt parijātaḥ ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30519: yo guṇaiḥ sambaddho jāyate, yasya kiñcid api vaiguṇyaṃ na asti, tasya+idam abhidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:30527: aṃśaśabdān nirdeśād eva dvitiyāsamarthād hārī ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30531: tatra ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhāt karmaṇi dvitīyā eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:30536: tantraśabdān nirdeśād eva pañcamīsamarthāt acirāpahṛte ity etasminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30544: brāhmaṇaka uṣṇika ity etau śabdau nipātyete kan pratyayāntau sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30547: yatra ayudhajīvino brāhmaṇāḥ santi tatra brāhmaṇakaḥ iti sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:30569: anuka abhika abhīka ity ete śabdāḥ kanpratyayāntā nipātyante kamitā ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30577: pārśvaśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthād anvicchati ity asminn arthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30578: anṛjurupāyaḥ pārśvam, tena arthān anvicchati pārśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30584: ayaḥśūla-daṇḍa-ajināhbyāṃ tṛtīyāsamarthābhyām anvicchati ity etasminn arthe ṭhakṭ-hañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30586: tena anvicchati āyaḥśūlikaḥ sāhasikaḥ ity arthaḥ dambho daṇḍājinam, tena anvicchati dāṇḍājinikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30590: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā || PS_5,2.77 ||
GS24jvkasipu:30595: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt grahaṇopādhikāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30597: dvitīyena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti dvikaṃ grahaṇam, dvitīyakam /
GS24jvkasipu:30600: tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti kan vaktavyaḥ, pūraṇapratyayasya ca nityaṃ luk /
GS24jvkasipu:30601: ṣaṣṭhena rūpeṇa granthaṃ gṛhṇāti ṣaṭko devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30605: tena granthaviṣayam eva grahaṇam vijñāyate, na anyaviṣayam //
GS24jvkasipu:30609: sa iti prathamāsamarthāt eṣām iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30610: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ grāmaṇīś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30614: grāmaṇīḥ iti kim ? devadattaḥ śatrur eṣām //
GS24jvkasipu:30618: śṛṅkhala-śabdāt prathamāsamarthād asya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30619: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ bandhanaṃ ced tad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30620: yat tad asya iti nirdeṣṭaṃ karabhaś cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30623: teṣāṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ pāśakaṃ pāde vyātiṣajyate, tad ucyate śṛṅkhalam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30624: yadyapi rajjvādikam api tatra asti tathāpi śṛṅkhalam asya asvatantrīkaraṇe bhavati sādhanam iti bandhanam ity ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:30628: utkaḥ iti nipātyate, unmanāś ced sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30630: uc-chabdāt sasādhanakriyāvacanāt tadvati kan pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30638: kālāt prayojanāc ca yathāyogaṃ samarthavibhaktiyuktāt roge 'bhidheye kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30651: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām || PS_5,2.82 ||
GS24jvkasipu:30653: tat iti prathamāsamarthād asmin iti saptamyarthe kan pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30654: yat tat prathamāsamarthaṃ annaṃ cet prāyaviṣayaṃ tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30657: guḍāpūpāḥ prāyeṇa annam asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ guḍāpūpikā /
GS24jvkasipu:30664: kulmāṣa-śabdāt añ pratyayo bhavati, tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām (*5,2.82) ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30670: śrotriyan iti nipātyate chando 'dhīte ity etasminn arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30677: bāgrahaṇam anuvartate tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā (*5,2.77) ity ataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30684: śrāddhaśabdād bhuktopādhikād anena ity asminn arthe iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30685: śrāddha-śabdaḥ karmanāmadheyam tat sādhanadravye vartitvā pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:30687: iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam, adya bhukte śrāddhe śvaḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:30692: na ca kriyām antareṇa kartā sambhavati iti yāṃ kāñcit kriyāmadhyāhṛtya pratyayo vidheyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30693: pūrvāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30694: pūrvaṃ gatam anena pītam bhuktaṃ vā pūrvī, pūrviṇau, pūrviṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:30699: vidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ yasmād iti sapūrvaṃ prātipadikam, tasya pūrvaśabdena tad antavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30700: sapūrvāt pratipadikāt pūrvaśabdāntāt anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30703: sup supā iti samāsaṃ kṛtvā taddhita utpādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30708: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhir na asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:30712: anena ity eva iṣṭādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ anena ity asminn arthe iniḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30759: paripanthin pariparin ity etau śabdau chandasi viṣaye nipātyete, paryavasthātari vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:30761: mā tvā paripanthino vidan mā tvā paripariṇo vidan //
GS24jvkasipu:30765: anupadī iti nipātyate anveṣṭā cet sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30778: sañjñāgrahaṇād upadraṣṭā eva ucyate, na dātā grahītā vā //
GS24jvkasipu:30783: kṣetriyac iti nipātyate parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ ity etasmin vākyārthe padavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:30784: parakṣetrād tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt cikitsyaḥ ity etasminn arthe ghac pratyayaḥ paraśabdalopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30790: atha vā kṣetriyaṃ viṣam yat parakṣetre paraśarīre saṃkramayya cikitsate /
GS24jvkasipu:30791: atha vā kṣetriyāṇi tṛṇāni yāni sasyārthe kṣetre jātāni cikitsyāni nāśayitavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:30801: indra-śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt liṅgam ity etasminn arthe ghac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30803: indra ātmā, sa cakṣurādinā karaṇena anumīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30812: indreṇa dattam, ātmanā viṣayebhyo dattaṃ yathāyathaṃ grahaṇāya /
GS24jvkasipu:30814: sati sambhave vyutpattir anyathā 'pi kartavyā, rūḍheraniyamāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30815: vāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyamāno vikalpānāṃ svātantryam darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:30817: tad asya asty asminn iti matup || PS_5,2.94 ||
GS24jvkasipu:30823: tad iti prathamāsamarthād asya+iti ṣaṣṭhyārthe 'sminn iti saptamyarthe vā matup pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:30824: yat tat prathamāsamartham asti cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30825: astyarthopādhikaṃ ced tad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30851: rasādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ matup pratyayo bhavati tad asya asty asmin ity etasmin viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:30854: kimartham idam ucyate, na pūrvasūtreṇa+eva matup siddhaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:30855: rasādibhyaḥ punar vacanam anyanivṛttyartham, anye matvarthīyā mā bhūvann iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30856: kathaṃ rūpiṇī kanyā, rūpiko dārakaḥ ? prāyikam etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:30858: atha vā guṇāt iti atra paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30859: tena ye rasanendriyādigrāhyā guṇāḥ, teṣām atra pāṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30860: iha mā bhūt, rūpiṇī, rūpikaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30875: prāṇisthavācinaḥ śabdāt ākārāntāt lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30882: iha mā bhūt, cikīrṣā 'sya asti cikīrṣāvān, jihīrṣā 'sya asti jihīrṣāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:30884: cakāraś cūḍālo 'sti ity atra svarito vānudatte padādau (*8,2.6)
GS24jvkasipu:30890: sidhmādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo lac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30893: anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇena matup samuccīyate, na tu pratyayo vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30894: tasmāt akārāntebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30952: vatsāṃsaśabdābhyām lac pratyayo bhavati yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāmavati balavati ca arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:30955: vṛttiviṣaye vatsāṃsaśabdau svabhāvāt kāmabalayor vartamānau tadvati pratyayam utpādayataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:30956: na hy atra vatsārthaḥ aṃsārtho vā vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:30957: vatsalaḥ iti snehavānucyate, vatsalaḥ svāmī, vatsalaḥ pitā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:30959: na ca ayam artho matupi sambhavati iti nityaṃ lajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:30966: anyatarasyām grahaṇam matup samuccayārthaṃ sarvatra+eva anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:30971: lomādibhyaḥ pāmādibhyaḥ picchādibhyaś ca tribhyo gaṇebhyo yathāsaṅkhyaṃ śa na ilac ity ete pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe, matup ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31012: prajñā śraddhā arcā vṛtti ity etebhyaḥ ṇaḥ pratyayo bhavati matubarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31022: tapaḥ-sahasra-śabdābhyāṃ vini ini ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31023: pratyayārthayos tu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sarvatra+eva asmin prakaraṇe nisyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31026: asantatvād adantatvāc ca siddhe pratyaye punar vacanam aṇā vakṣyamāṇena bādhā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31055: kasya punar ayaṃ lup ? matubādīnām anyatamasya, viśeṣābhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:31056: sikatā asmin vidyate sikatā deśaḥ, sikatilaḥ, saikataḥ, sikatāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:31057: evaṃ śarkarā deśaḥ, śarkarilaḥ, śārkaraḥ, śarkarāvān /
GS24jvkasipu:31064: dantaśabdād unatopādhikād urac pratyayo bhavati mavarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31065: dantā unnatā asya santi danturaḥ unnata iti kim ? dantavān //
GS24jvkasipu:31069: ūṣa suṣi maṣka madhu ity etebhyo raḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31076: iha na bhavati, ūṣo 'smin ghaṭe vidyate, madhu asmin ghaṭe vidyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31079: mukham asya asti iti sarvasmin vaktavye mukharaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31099: keśaśabdād vaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:31100: nanu ca prakṛtam anyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam anuvartata eva ? matup samucāyārthaṃ tad ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:31102: tataś cātūrūpyaṃ bhavati, keśavaḥ, keśī, keśikaḥ, keśavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31127: gāṇdī ajaga ity etābhyāṃ vaḥ pratyayo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31130: hrasvād api bhavati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31136: kāṇḍa aṇḍa ity etābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam īrannīracau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31142: rajaḥ-prabhṛtibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ valac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31149: tena+iha na bhavati, rajo 'smin grāme vidyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31157: danta-śikhā-śabdābhyāṃ balac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31165: jyotsnādayaḥ śabdāḥ nipātyante matvarthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31166: jyotiṣa upadhālopo naś ca pratyayo nipātyate - jyotsnā candraprabhā /
GS24jvkasipu:31167: tamasa upadhāyā ikāro raś ca - tamisrā rātriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31168: strītvamatantram anyatra api dṛśyate - tamisraṃ nabhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31170: ūrjo 'sugāgamo nipātyate vinivalacau pratyayau - ūrjasvī, ūrjasvalaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31172: malaśabdād inajīmasacau pratyayau nipātyete - malinaḥ, malīmasaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31179: anyatarasyām ity adhikārān matub api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31183: ekākṣarāt kṛto jāteḥ saptamyāṃ ca na tau smṛtau /
GS24jvkasipu:31189: saptamyām - danḍā asyāṃ santi daṇḍavatī śālā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31191: itikaraṇo viṣayaniyamārthaḥ sarvatra sambadhyate ity uktam,
GS24jvkasipu:31199: vrīhyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniṭhanau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31203: na ca vrīhyādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pratyayadvayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31204: kiṃ tarhi ? śikhādibhya inirvācya ikan yavakhadādiṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:31206: śikhā mekhalā sañjñā balākā mālā vīṇā vaḍavā aṣṭakā patākā karman carman haṃsā ity etebhya inir eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31207: yavakhada kumārī nau ity etebhya ikann eva+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31209: vrīhigrahaṇaṃ kimartham, yāvatā tundādiṣu vrīhiśabdaḥ paṭhyate, tatra iniṭhanau cakāreṇa vidhīyete ?
GS24jvkasipu:31210: evaṃ tarhi tundādisu vrīhigrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31211: śālayo 'sya santi śālinaḥ, śālī, śālikaḥ, śālimān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31220: tundādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya ilac pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31235: ekapūrvād gopūrvāc ca prātipadikān nityaṃ ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31240: ata ity eva ekaviṃśatir asya asti iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31242: kathaṃ gauśakaṭikaḥ ? śakaṭīśabdena samānārthaḥ śakaṭaśabdo 'sti, tato bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:31243: avaśyaṃ ca ataḥ ity anuvartyam, dvandvopatāpagarhyāt ity evam ādyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:31250: śatāntāt sahasrāntāt ca prātipadikāt ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe tau cet śatasahasraśabdau niṣkāt parau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31253: suvarṇaniṣkaśatam asya asti iti anabhidhānān na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:31259: āhatapraśaṃsāviśiṣṭārthe vartamānād rūpaśabdāt yap pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31263: praśastaṃ rūpam asya asti rūpyaḥ purusaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31264: nighātikātāḍanādinā dīnārādiṣu rūpaṃ yad utpadyate tad āhatamn ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31272: asantāt prātipadikāt, māyā medhā sraj ity etebhyaś ca viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31278: māyāśabdād vrīhyādiṣu pāṭhāt iniṭhanau api bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31283: chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ viniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31319: vātānāṃ samūhaḥ, vātaṃ na sahate iti vā vātūlaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31342: vācśabdāt prathamāsamarthād ālac āṭac ity etau pratyayau bhavato matvarthe bahubhāṣiṇi abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:31347: yo hi samyag bahu bhāṣate vāgmīty eva sa bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:31353: svaśadād aiśvaryavācino matvarthe āmin pratyayo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31354: svam asya asti iti aiśvaryam asya asti iti svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:31361: arśas ity evam adibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo 'c pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31365: yatra abhinnarūpeṇa śabdena tadvato 'bhidhānaṃ tat sarvam iha draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31386: tadviṣayebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ prāṇisthārthavācibhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31401: vāta-atisāraśabdābhyāṃ iniḥ pratyayo bhavati, tatsaṃniyogena ca tayoḥ kugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31402: vātātisārayor upatāpatvāt pūrveṇa+eva siddhe pratyaye kugartham eva+idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31413: pūraṇapratyayāntāt prātipadikāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe vayasi dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:31414: pañcamo 'sya asti māsaḥ saṃvatsaro vā pañcamī uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31417: siddhe sati niyamārthaṃ vacanam, inir eva bhavati, ṭhan na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31423: sukha ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31426: mālākṣepe iti paṭhyate, vrīhyādiṣu ca mālāśabdo 'sti, tad iha kṣepe matubbādhanārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:31446: brahmaṇānāṃ dharmo brāhmaṇadharmaḥ, so 'sya asti iti brāhmaṇadharmī /
GS24jvkasipu:31452: hastaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo niyamyate matvarthe, samudāyena cej jātir abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31459: varṇaśabdāt iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe samudāyena ced brahmacārī bhaṇyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31461: sa hi vidyāgrahaṇārtham upanīto brahama carati, niyamam āsevate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31468: puṣkara ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya iniḥ pratyayo bhavati samudāyena ced deśo 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31531: mannantāt prātipadikān maśabdāntāc ca iniḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe,
GS24jvkasipu:31542: kam śam iti makārāntau udkasukhayor vācakau,
GS24jvkasipu:31543: tābhyāṃ ba bha yus ti tu ta yas ity ete sapta pratyayā bhavanti matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31544: kambaḥ, kambhaḥ, kaṃyuḥ, kantiḥ, kantuḥ, kantaḥ, kaṃyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31545: śambaḥ, śambhaḥ, śaṃyuḥ, śantiḥ, śantuḥ, śantaḥ, śaṃyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31546: sakāraḥ padasañjñārthaḥ, tena anusvāraparasavarṇau siddhau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31547: sañjñāyāṃ hi asatyāṃ kamyaḥ, śamyaḥ iti syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:31551: tundi bali vaṭi ity etebhyo bhaḥ pratyayo bhavati matvarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31552: tundiḥ iti vṛddhā nābhirucyate, sā asya asti iti tundibhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31555: valiśabdaḥ āmādiṣu paṭhyate, tena balinaḥ ity api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:31568: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31575: dik-śabdebhyaḥ saptamī-pañcamī-prathamābhyo dig-deśa-kāleṣv astātiḥ (*5,3.27) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:31576: prāg etasmād dikṣaṃ śabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo vibhaktisañjñās te veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31581: tasilādīnāṃ vibhaktitve prayojanaṃ tyadādividhayaḥ idamo vibhaktisvaraś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31585: teṣu samarthādhikāraḥ prathamagrahaṇaṃ ca pratiyogyapekṣatvān na+upayujyate iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:31587: tena vikalpena tasilādayo bhavanti, kutaḥ , kasmāt, kutra, kasmin iti //
GS24jvkasipu:31592: kimaḥ sarvanāmno bahuśabdāc ca prāgdiśaḥ pratyayāḥ veditavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31603: sarvanāmatvād eva siddhe kimo grahaṇam dvyādiparyudāsāt /
GS24jvkasipu:31605: iha na bhavati, bahoḥ sūpāt, bahau sūpe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:31610: idam iś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīyeṣu pratyayeśu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31616: rephathakārādau prāg-diśīye pratyaye parataḥ idamaḥ eta-itau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31626: etadaḥ prāg-diśīye parataḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31631: etado rathoḥ parata eta it ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31633: ittham rephādeḥ anadyatane rhil anyatarasyām (*5,3.21) iti vidyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:31638: sarvasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati prāg-diśīye dakārādau pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:31641: prāg-diśīye ity eva, sarvaṃ dadāti iti sarvadā brāhmaṇī //
GS24jvkasipu:31653: pratiyoge pañcamyās tasiḥ (*5,4.44) , apādāne ca ahīya-ruhoḥ (*5,4.45) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:31654: tasya taseḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ parasya tasilādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31663: pari abhi ity etābhyāṃ tasil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31696: kimaḥ saptamyanatād vā haḥ pratyayo bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31700: kutracidasya sā dūre kva brāhmaṇasya cāvakāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:31706: dṛśigrahaṇam prāyikavidhyarthaṃ, tena bhavadādibhir yoga eva+etad vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:31707: ke punar bhavadādayaḥ ? bhavān dīrghāyurāyuṣmān devānāṃ priyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31708: sa bhavān, tato bhavān, tatra bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:31709: taṃ bhavantaṃ, tatra bhavantam, tato bhavantam /
GS24jvkasipu:31710: tena bhavatā, tatra bhavatā, tato bhavatā /
GS24jvkasipu:31711: tasmai bhavate, tatra bhavate, tato bhavate /
GS24jvkasipu:31712: tasmād bhavataḥ, tatra bhavataḥ , tato bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31713: tasmin bhavati, tatra bhavati, tato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31718: saptamyāḥ iti vartate, na tu itarābhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:31731: saptamyāḥ ity eva, kāle iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31732: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānāt rhil pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31747: idamaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dānīṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31752: tadaḥ saptamyantāt kāle vartamānād dā pratyayo bhavati, cakārād dānīṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:31759: tayor idamaḥ tadaś ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dā-rhilau pratyayau bhavataś chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31770: kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ saptamyantebhyaḥ anadyatane kālaviśeṣe vartamānebhyaḥ rhil pratyayo bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:31777: sptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:31779: prakṛtiḥ, pratyayaḥ, ādeśaḥ, kālaviśeṣaḥ iti sarvam etan nipātanāl labhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31780: samānasya sabhāvo nipātyate dyaś ca pratyayaḥ ahany abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:31782: pūrvapūrvatarayoḥ parabhāvo nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:31785: idama iśbhāvaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ nipātyate saṃvatsare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:31807: saptamyāḥ iti kāle iti ca nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:31810: prakāravṛttibhyaḥ kiṃ-sarvanāma-bahubhyaḥ svārthe thāl pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31815: sa tu svabhāvāt prakāravati vartate, thāl punaḥ prakāramātre //
GS24jvkasipu:31831: kiṃśabdād dhetau vartamānāt thā pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt prakāravacane chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:31832: hetau tāvat - kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi /
GS24jvkasipu:31833: kena hetunā na pṛcchasi ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31840: tebhyo dikśabdebhyo dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānebhyaḥ saptamī. pañcamī-prathamāntebhyaḥ astātiḥ pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31848: dikśabdebhyaḥ iti kim ? aindryāṃ diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31849: saptamī-pañcamī-prathamābhyaḥ iti kim ? pūrvaṃ grāmaṃ gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31850: dig-deśa-kālesu iti kim ? pūrvasmin gurau vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31855: dikṣiṇa-uttarābhyāṃ dig-deśa-kāleṣu vartamānabhyāṃ saptamī-pañcamī-prathamāntābhyāṃ svārthe 'tasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31857: dakṣiṇā-śabdaḥ kāle na sambhavati iti digdeśavṛttiḥ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:31869: para-avara-śabdābhyāṃ vibhāṣā atasuc pratyayo bhavati astāter arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31885: añcatyantebhyo dikśabdebhya uttarasya astātipratyayasya lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31897: upari upariṣṭat ity etau śabdau nipātyete astāterarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:31898: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ rilriṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:31910: aparasyāṃ diśi vasati paścād diśi vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31913: dikpūrvapadasya aparasya paścabhāvo vaktavya ātiś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:31947: uttara-adhara-dakṣiṇa-śabdebhyaḥ enap pratyayo bhavatyanatarasyām astāterarthe adūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31950: uttareṇa vasati, uttarād vasati, uttarato vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31951: uttareṇa ramaṇīyam, uttarād ramaṇīyam, uttarato ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31952: adhreṇa vasati adharād vasati, aghastād vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31953: adhareṇa ramaṇīyam, adharād ramaṇīyam, adhastād ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31954: dakṣiṇena vasati, dakṣiṇād vasati, dakṣiṇāto vasati /
GS24jvkasipu:31955: dakṣiṇena ramaṇīyam, dakṣiṇād ramaṇīyam, dakṣiṇato ramaṇīyam /
GS24jvkasipu:31978: dakṣiṇa-śabdād āhiḥ pratyayo bhavati astāterarthe, cakārād āc, dūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31986: uttara-śabdād ājāhī pratyayau bhavataḥ astāterarthe dūre ced avadhimānavadher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:31998: tat saṃniogena ca+eṣām yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pur adḥ av ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32013: astāti-pratyaye parataḥ purvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ purādaya ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32014: idam eva ādeśavidhānaṃ jñāpakam , astātir ebhyo bhavati, asi-pratyayena na ādhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32025: avarasya astātau parato vibhāṣā av ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32035: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyo vidhārthe vartamāṇebhyo dhā pratyayo bhavati svārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:32036: vidhā prakāraḥ, sa ca sarvakriyāviṣaya eva gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32049: adhikaraṇavicāle gamyamāne saṅkhyāyāḥ svārthe dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32056: ekaśabdāt parasya dhā-pratyayasya dhyamuñ ādeśaḥ bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32059: prakaraṇād eva labdhe punar dhā-grahaṇam vidhārthe vihitasya api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32066: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-prayayasya vidhārthe adhikaraṇavicāle ca vihitasya dhamuñ-ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32076: dvi-tryoḥ sambandhino dhā-pratyayasya edhāc ādeśo bhavaty anyatrasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32084: yāpye vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe pāśap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32087: yo vyākarana-śāstre pravīṇo duḥśīlaḥ, tatra kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:32088: yasya guṇasya sadbhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ, tasya kutsāyāṃ pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32092: pūraṇa-pratyayo yastīyaḥ, tadantāt prātipadikād bhāge vartamānāt svārthe an pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32104: prāg ekādaśabhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ pūraṇapratyayāntebhyaḥ bhāge vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe 'n pratyayo bhavati acchandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32117: bhāge ity eva, acchandasi iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32118: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamabhyāṃ bhāge abhidheye acchandasi viṣaye ñaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32126: ṣaṣṭha-aṣṭamābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kan-lukau ca bhavato mānapaśvaṅgayor bhāgayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32127: ṣaṣṭhako bhāgo mānaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32128: aṣṭamo bhāgaḥ paśvaṅga cet tad bhavati /
