GS24jvkasipu:32139: eka-śadād sahāya-vācinaḥ svārthe ākinic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32145: tadupādāne hi dvibahvor na syāt, ekākinau, ekākinaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32149: pūrva bhūtaḥ iti vigṛhya supsupeti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32152: bhūtapūrvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe caraṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32162: ṣaṣṭhyantāt pratyayavidhānāt saṃprati bhūtapūrvagrahaṇaṃ pratyayārthasya viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:32172: atiśāyanaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe tamabiṣṭhanau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32174: sarva ime āḍhyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena āḍhyaḥ āḍhyatamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32180: yadā ca prakarṣavatāṃ punaḥ prakarṣo vivakṣyate tadātiśāyikāntād aparaḥ pratyayo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:32181: devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe /
GS24jvkasipu:32186: tiṅantāt ca atiśāyane dyotye tamap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32187: ṅy-āp-prātipadikāt (*4,1.1) ity adhikārāt tiṅo na prāpnoti iti idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:32188: sarve ime pacanti iti, ayam eṣām atiśayena pacati pacatitamām /
GS24jvkasipu:32194: dvayor arthayor vacanaṃ dvivacanam vibhaktavyo vibhajyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32196: dvyarthe vibhajye ca+upapade prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca atiśāyane tarabīyasunau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32199: dvāvimāvāḍhyau, ayam anayor atiśayena āḍhyaḥ āḍhyataraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32203: īyasun khalv api - dvāvimau paṭū, ayam anayor atiśayena paṭuḥ paṭīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32213: guṇavacanād eva bhavatastau na anyasmād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32218: iha na bhavataḥ, pācakataraḥ, pācakatamaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32219: eva kāraḥ iṣṭato 'vadhāraṇārthaḥ, pratyayaniyamo 'yaṃ na prakṛtiniyamaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32227: trantāc chandasi viṣaye ajadī pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32228: pūrveṇa guṇavacanād eva niyame kṛte chandasi prakṛtyantarāṇy abhyanujñāyante,
GS24jvkasipu:32232: bhasyāḍhe taddhite iti puṃvadbhāve kṛte turiṣṭhemeyaḥsu (*3,4.154) iti tṛco nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32236: praśasya śabdasya śra ity ayam ādeśe bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32238: nanu ca praśasya śabdasya aguṇavacanatvād ajādī na sambhavataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:32239: evaṃ tarhi ādeśavidhānasāmarthyāt tadviṣayo niyamo na pravartate, ajādī guṇavacanād eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32241: sarve ime praśasyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena praśasyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32242: ubhāvimau praśasyau, ayam anayor atiśayena praśasyaḥ śreyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32244: prakṛtyau kāc iti prakṛtibhāvat śraśabdasya ṭilopayasyetilopau na bhavataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32248: praśasya śabdasya jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32249: sarve ime praśasyāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena praśasyaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32250: ubhāvimau praśasyau, ayam anayor atiśayena praśasyaḥ jyāyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32256: vṛddha-śabdasya ca jya ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32257: tayoś ca sattvaṃ niyamābhāvena pūrvavaj jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32258: sarve ime vṛddhāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena vṛddhaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32259: ubhāvimau vṛddhau, ayam anayor atiśayena vṛddhaḥ jyāyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32261: priyasthira ity ādinā vṛddhaśabdasya varṣādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32269: antika-bāḍhayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ neda sādha ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32271: nimittabhūtayor yathāsaṅkhyam atra eṣyate sarvāṇīmānyantikāni, idameṣāmatiśayena antikam nediṣṭham /
GS24jvkasipu:32272: ubhe ime antike, idam anayor atiśayena antikaṃ nedīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32274: sarve ime bāḍhamadhīyate, ayam eṣām atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sadhiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32275: ubhāvimau bāḍham adhīyāte, ayam anayor atiśayena bāḍham adhīte sādhīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32280: yuva-alpa-śabdayoḥ kan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām ajadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32282: sarve ime yuvānaḥ, ayam eṣam atiśayena yuva kaniṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32283: dvāvimau yuvānau, ayam anayor atiśayena yuvā kanīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32286: sarve ime 'lpāḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena alpaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32287: ubhāvimāv alpau, aym anayor atiśayena alpaḥ kanīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32293: vino matupaś ca lug bhavati ajādyoḥ pratyayayoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32294: idam eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam ajādis adbhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32295: sarve ime sragviṇaḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena sragvī srajiṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32296: ubhāvimau sragviṇau, ayam anayor atiśayena sragvī srajiyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32298: sarve ime tvagvantaḥ, ayam eṣām atiśayena tvagvān tvaciṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32299: ubhāvimau tvagvantau, ayam anayor atiśayena tvagvān tvacīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:32306: praśaṃsāviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe rūpap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32307: svārthikāś ca pratyayāḥ prakṛtyarthaviśeṣasya dyotakā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32312: corarūpaḥ, dasyurūpaḥ, yo 'kṣṇor apy añjanaṃ haret /
GS24jvkasipu:32319: ekā ca kriyā iti rupappratyayāntād dvivacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32327: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt kalpap deśya deśīyar ity ete pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:32333: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu || PS_5,3.68 ||
GS24jvkasipu:32335: īṣadasamāptiviśeṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt subantāt vibhaṣā bahuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32336: sa tu purastād eva bhavati, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32346: sāmānyasya bhedako viśeṣaḥ prakāraḥ, tasya vacane /
GS24jvkasipu:32348: subantāt prakāraviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe jātīyar pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32358: prāk etasmād iva saṃśabdanād yānita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ kapratyayas teṣu adhikṛto veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32363: tiṅaś ca (*5,3.56) ity anuvṛttam uttarasūtreṇa+eva sambandhanīm //
GS24jvkasipu:32369: avyayānām sarvanāmnāṃ ca prāgivīyeṣv artheṣu akac pratyayo bhavati, sa ca prāk ṭeḥ, na parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32377: prātipadikāt, supaḥ iti dvayam api iha anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32379: kvacit prātipadikasya prāk ṭeḥ pratyayo bhavati, kvacit subantasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32380: yuṣmakābhiḥ , asmakābhiḥ, yuṣmakāsu, asmakāsu, yuvakayoḥ, āvakayoḥ, ity atra prātipadikasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32381: tvayakā, mayakā, tvayaki, mayaki ity atra subantasya /
GS24jvkasipu:32383: sa ca mittvād antyāt acaḥ paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32405: ajñātatvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt tiṅantāc ca svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32406: svena rūpeṇa jñāte padārthe viśeṣarūpeṇa ajñāte pratyayavidhānam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:32407: kasya ayam aśvaḥ iti svasvāmisambandhena ajñāte aśve pratyayaḥ, aśvakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32410: evam anyatra api yathāyogam ajñātatā vijñeyā /
GS24jvkasipu:32423: kutsitasvopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt svārthe yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32447: tasyā gamyamānāyāṃ subantāt tiṅantāc ca yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32458: nītau ca gamyamānāyāṃ tadyuktād anukampāyuktād yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32464: pūrveṇa pratyāsannānukampāsambandhāt anukampyamānād eva pratyayo vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32465: saṃprati vyavahitād api yathā syād iti vacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:32469: anukampāyām (*5,3.76), nītau ca tadyuktāt (*5,3.77) iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32470: bahvacaḥ prātipadikāt manuṣyanāmadheyād vā ṭhac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:32484: bahvaco manusyanāmno ghan ilac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32492: upaśabda ādiryasya tasmād upādeḥ prātipadikād bahvaco manusyanāmnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32494: cakārād ghanilacau pratyayau bhavataḥ ṭhac ca vā /
GS24jvkasipu:32495: upaḍaḥ, upakaḥ, upiyaḥ, upilaḥ, upikaḥ, upendradattakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32503: jātiśabdo yo manusyanāmadheyo vyāghra siṃha ity evam ādiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32504: tasmād anukampāyāṃ nītau ca kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32515: kan ity anuvartate, manusyanāmnaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32518: vyāghrājino nām akaścin manusyaḥ, so 'nukampitaḥ vyāghrakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32524: asmin prakaraṇe yaḥ ṭhaḥ ajādiś ca pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32525: tasmin parataḥ prakṛter dvitīyād aca ūrdhvaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32540: lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca ṭhājādāvanajādau ca vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32542: vinā 'pi pratyayena pūrvottarapadayoḥ vibhāṣā lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32548: apratyaye tathā+eva+iṣṭa uvarṇāl la ilasya ca //
GS24jvkasipu:32549: dvitīyād aco lope sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadāder lopavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:32556: kathaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulidattaḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti ? ṣaṣaṣṭhājādivacanāt siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:32560: śevalādīnāṃ manuṣyanāmnāṃ ṭhājādau pratyaye parataḥ tṛtīyād acaḥ ūrdhvasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32567: śevalādīnāṃ tṛtīyādaco lopaḥ sa cākṛtasandhīnām iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:32568: śevalendradattaḥ, suparyāśīrdattaḥ śevalikaḥ, suparikaḥ iti yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32576: alpatvaviśiṣṭe arthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ patyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32588: hrasvatvaviśiṣṭe 'rthe vartamānāt prātipadikāt yathāvihitaṃ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32597: hrasvatvahetukā yā sañjñā tasyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ kan-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32608: kuṭī-śamī-śuṇḍābhyo hrasvārthe dyotye raḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32627: kāsū-goṇī-śabdābhyāṃ hrasvasve dyotye ṣṭarac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32638: vatsa ukṣan aśva ṛṣabha ity etebhyaḥ tanutve dyotye ṣṭarac-pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32639: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tasya tanutve pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32646: aśvena aśvāyām utpanno 'svaḥ, tasya tanutvam anyapitṛkatā /
GS24jvkasipu:32647: anuḍvān ṛṣabhaḥ, tasya tanutvaṃ bhāravahane mandaśaktitā //
GS24jvkasipu:32649: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac || PS_5,3.92 ||
GS24jvkasipu:32651: kim yat tat ity etebhyaḥ prātipadikebhya dvayor ekasya nirdhāraṇe ḍataracpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32653: jātyā, kriyayā, gunena, sañjñayā vā samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthakkaraṇaṃ nirdhāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:32669: kiṃyattadaḥ iti vartate nirdhārane, ekasya iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32671: bahunāṃ madhye ekasya nirdhārane gamyamāne jātiparipraśnaviṣayebhyaḥ kimādibhyaḥ vā ḍatamac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32679: jātiparipraśne iti kim ? ko bhavatām devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32680: paripraśnagrahaṇaṃ ca kima eva viśeṣaṇaṃ, na yattadoḥ, asambhavāt /
GS24jvkasipu:32682: kimo 'smin viṣaye ḍataram api icchanti kecit, kataro bhavatāṃ kālāpaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32683: tatra katarakatamau jātiaparipraśne (*2,1.63) iti vacanāt siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:32687: ekaśabdāt prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ḍatarac ḍatamac ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ svasmin viṣyae /
GS24jvkasipu:32689: dvayor nirdhārane ḍatarac, bahūnāṃ nirdhārane ḍatamac /
GS24jvkasipu:32704: yat punaḥ svayam eva kutsitaṃ tatra kutsite (*5,3.74)
GS24jvkasipu:32705: ity anena kanpratyayo bhavati, devadattakaḥ, yajñadattakaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:32711: ivārthe yat prātipadikaṃ vartate tasmāt kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32717: pratikṛtau iti kim ? gaur iva gavayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32721: iva ity anuvartate, kan iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32722: ivārthe gamyamāne kanpratyayo bhavati, samudāyena cet sañjñā gamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32731: sañjñāyāṃ vihitasya kano manusye 'bhidheye lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32738: devapathāder ākṛtigaṇatvāt tasya+eva ayaṃ prapañco veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:32742: jīvikārthaṃ yad apaṇyam tasminn abhidheye kano lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32759: vihitasya kano devapathādibhya uttarasya lub bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32793: itaḥ prabhṛti pratyayāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti, pratikṛtau capratikṛtau ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32794: vastiśabdād ivārthe dyotye ṭhañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32802: kecid atra ḍhañam api icchanti, tadarthaṃ yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32810: śākhā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ patpratyayo bhavati ivārthe śākheva śakhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32830: dravyam, bhavyaḥ, ātmavān adhipretānām arthanāṃ pātrabhūta ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32843: tad ity anena prakṛta ivārtho nirdeśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:32844: ivārthaviṣayāt samāsād aparasminn ivārthe eva chanḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32849: tat katham ? kākasyāgamanaṃ yādṛcchikam, tālasya patanaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:32851: evam eva devadattasya tatrāgamanaṃ, dasyūnāṃ ca upanipātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32853: tatra yo devadattasya dasyūnāṃ ca samāgamaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:32858: samāsaś ca ayam asmād eva jñāpakāt, na hy asya aparaṃ sakṣaṇam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:32864: śarkarā ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ivārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32915: pratna pūrva viśva ima ity etebhyaḥ ivārthe thālpratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:32922: pūgavācinaḥ prātipadikāt agrāmaṇīpūrvāt svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32926: agrāmaṇīpūrvāt iti kim ? devadatto grāmaṇīreṣāṃ ta ime devadattakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32932: vrātavācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ca svārthe ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavaty astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:32935: cphañaḥ khalv api - kauñjāyanyaḥ, kauñjāyanayau, kauñjāyanāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32947: tadvācinaḥ prātipadikāt brāhmaṇarājanyavarjitāt svārthe ñyaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32950: ṭakāro ṅībarthaḥ, tena astriyām iti na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:32969: vṛkaśadāt āyudhajīvinaḥ svārthe ṭeṇyaṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32978: dāmanyādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ trigartaṣaṣṭhebhyaḥ ca āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:32979: yeṣām āyudhajīvināṃ saṅghānāṃ ṣaḍantavargās teṣām ca trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:32980: trigartaḥ ṣaṣṭho yeṣāṃ te trigartaṣaṣṭhāḥ ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:32986: trigartaṣaṣṭhebhyaḥ khalv api - koṇḍoparathīyaḥ, kauṇḍoparathīyau, kauṇḍoparathāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33008: parśvādibhyaḥ yaudheyādibhyaś ca prātipadikebhyaḥ āyudhajīvisaṅghavācibhyaḥ svārthe 'ṇañau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33043: abhijidādibhyo 'ṇantebhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe yañ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33054: abhijito muhurtaḥ, ābhijitaḥsthālīpākaḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33058: pūgāñ ñyo 'grāmaṇīpūrvāt (*5,3.112) ity ataḥ prabhṛti ye pratyayāḥ, te tadrājasañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33060: tadrājapradeśāḥ - tadrājasya bahusu ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33061: iti śrījayādityaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:33066: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca || PS_5,4.1 ||
GS24jvkasipu:33068: pādaśatāntasya saṅkhyādeḥ prātipadikasya vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ vun pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33070: yasya+iti lopena+eva siddhe punar vacanam anaimittikārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:33072: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt pādaḥ pat (*6,4.130) iti padbhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33074: dvau dvau pādau dadāti dvipadikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33075: dve dve śate dadāti dviśatikāṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33078: svabhāvāc ca vunpratyayāntaṃ striyām eva vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33079: pādaśatasya iti kim ? dvau dvau māṣau dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33080: saṅkhyādeḥ iti kim ? pādaṃ pādaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33081: vīpsāyām iti kim ? dvau pādau dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33091: daṇḍavyavasargayoḥ gamyamānayoḥ pādaśatāntasya prātipadikasya saṅkhyādeḥ vunpratyayo bhavati, antalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33112: teṣāṃ cañcakaḥ, bṛhakaḥ iti udāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:33142: sāmivacane upapade ktāntāt kanpratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33149: evaṃ tarhi na+eva ayam anatyantagatau vihitasya kanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi, svārthikasya /
GS24jvkasipu:33150: kena punaḥ svarthikaḥ kan vihitaḥ ? etad eva jñāpakaṃ bhavati svārthe kan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33153: etair hi bahutarakaṃ vyāpyate ity evam ādi,
GS24jvkasipu:33159: bṛhatīśabdād ācchādane vartamānāt svārthe kan pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33165: aṣaḍakṣa āśitaṅgu alagkarma alampuruṣa ity etebhyaḥ adhyuttarapadāt ca svārthe khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33167: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ iti ṣac, tataḥ khapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33169: yo dvābhyam eva kriyate na bahubhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33172: akaṅkarman, alampuruṣaḥ iti paryādayo glānadyarthe caturthyā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33178: nityaś ca ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, uttaratra vibhāṣāgrahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33188: añcatyantāt prātipadikāt adikṣtriyāṃ vartamānāt svārthe vibhāṣā khaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33200: jātyantāt prātipadikāt bandhuni vartamānāt svārthe chaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33201: badhyate 'smiñ jātiḥ iti bandhuśabdena dravyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33203: brāhmaṇamātīyaḥ, kṣatriyajātīyaḥ, vaiśyajātīyaḥ iti brāhmaṇādir eva+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33208: sthānāntāt prātipadikāt vibhāṣā chaḥ pratyayo bhavati sasthānena cet sthānāntamarthavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33209: sasthānaḥ iti tulya ucyate, samānaṃ sthānam asya iti kṛtvā /
GS24jvkasipu:33216: tena bahuvrīhiḥ sasthānaśabdārtham upasthāpayati, na tatpuruṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33218: dvyor vibhāṣayor nityā vidhayaḥ iti pūrvatra nityavidhayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33222: kima ekārāntāt tiṅantād avyayebhyaś ca yo vihito ghaḥ sa kimettiṅavyayaghaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33224: yady api dravyasya svataḥ prakarṣo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:33225: tathā api kriyāguṇasthaḥ prakarṣo yadā dravye upacaryate tadā 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33241: kimettiṅavyayaghād adravyaprakarṣe amu pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33245: svarādiṣu am ām iti paṭhyate, tasmāt tadantasya avyayatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:33256: iti ṇac vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe añ pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33259: strīgrahaṇaṃ kimartham, yāvatā ṇac striyām eva vihitaḥ, tataḥ svārthikas tatra+eva bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:33260: evaṃ tarhy etaj jñāpayati - svārthikāḥ pratyayā prakṛtito liṅgavacanānyativartante 'pi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33261: tena guḍakalpā drākṣā, tailakalpā prasannā, deva eva devatā ity evam ādi upapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33265: abhividhau bhāva inuṇ (*3,3.44) vihitaḥ, tadantāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33272: visārinśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati matsye 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:33278: saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ svārthe kṛtvasuc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33280: ekakakārtṛṇāṃ tulyajātīyānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ janmasaṅkhyānaṃ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇanaṃ, tatra pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33283: saṅkhyāyāḥ iti kim ? mūrīn vārān bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:33284: kriyāgrahaṇam kimartham, yāvatā abhyavṛttiḥ kriyāyā eva sambhavati, na dravyaguṇayoḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:33286: ekasya sakṛc ca (*5,4.19) ity atra kriya+eva gaṇyate, na abhyāvṛttiḥ, asambhavāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33292: akriyamāṇe gaṇanagrahaṇe kriyābhyāvṛttau vartamānebhyaḥ saṅkhyeyavacanebhya eva pratyayaḥ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:33294: iha na syāt, śataṃ vārāṇāṃ bhuṅkte iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:33295: na hy atra abhyāvṛttau śataśabdaḥ, saṅkhyānamātravṛttitvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:33300: dvi tri catur ity etebhyaḥ saṅkhyāśabdebhyaḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane vartamānebhyaḥ suc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33309: ekaśabdasya sakṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati suc ca pratyayaḥ kriyāgaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:33314: ekaḥ pākaḥ ity atra na bhavati, anabhidhānāt //
GS24jvkasipu:33318: bahuśabdāt kriyābhyāvṛtigaṇane vartamānāt vibhāṣā dhā pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33322: kriyāṇāmutpattayaś ced āsannakālāḥ bhavanti, na viprakṛṣṭakālāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33323: bahudhā divasasya bhuṅkte, bahukṛtvo divasasya bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:33324: aviprakṛṣṭakāle iti kim ? bahukṛtvo māsasya bhuṅkte //
GS24jvkasipu:33330: prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtopādhike 'rthe vartamānāt svārthe mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33336: tad iti prathamāsamarthāt prakṛtavacane 'bhidheye mayaṭ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33345: bahusu prakṛteṣu ucyamānesu samūhavat pratyayā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33347: modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ prācuryeṇa prastutāḥ maudakikam, modakamayam /
GS24jvkasipu:33351: dvitīye sūtrārthe - modakāḥ prakṛtāḥ asmin yajñe maudakiko yajñaḥ, modakamayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33366: devatāśabdāntāt prātipadikāt caturthīsamarthāt tādarthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33377: pādārghaśabdābhyāṃ caturthīsamarthābhyāṃ tādarthye abhidheye yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33397: yaviṣṭha ity etebhyaḥ chandasi svārthe yatpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33445: atithiśabdāt caturthisamarthāt tādarthye abhidheye ñyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33462: yāva ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33487: lohitaśabdāt maṇau vartamānāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33493: anitye varṇe vartamānāt lohitaśabdāt svārthe kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33504: lākṣādinā rakte yo lohitaśabdaḥ, tasmāt kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33507: liṅgabādhanaṃ vā ity eva, lohitikā, kohinikā śāṭī //
GS24jvkasipu:33511: varne ca anitye (*5,4.31), rakte (*5,4.32) iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33512: kālaśabdāt anitye vartamānāt rakte ca kanpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33520: vinaya ity evam ādibhyaḥ svārthe ṭhak pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33544: vyāhṛtaḥ prakāśito 'rtho yasyāstasyāṃ vāci vartamānād vācśabdāt svārthe ṭhakpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33548: vyāhṛtārthāyām iti kim ? madhurā vāk devadattasya //
GS24jvkasipu:33552: vyāhṛtārthayā vācā yat karma yuktaṃ, tadabhidhāyinaḥ karmaśabdāt svārthe aṇ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33554: vācikaṃ śrutvā tathaiva yat karma kriyate tat kārmaṇam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33583: ajātau iti kim ? oṣadhayaḥ kṣetre rūḍhā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:33589: prajña ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ svārthe aṇpratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33592: yasya astu prajñā vidyate sā prājñā prajñā-śraddhā-arcā-vṛttibhyo ṇaḥ (*5,2.101) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33594: videḥ śatrantasya grahaṇaṃ, videḥ śaturvasuḥ (*7,2.36) ity ata eva jñāpakāt pākṣiko vasvādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33595: anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇaṃ vā tatra anuvartate, tu-hyos tātaṅ āśiṣy-anyatarasyām (*7,1.35) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33641: praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānān mṛcchabdāt sa sna ity etau pratyayau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33644: nityaś ca ayaṃ pratyayaḥ, uttarasūtre 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇāt //
GS24jvkasipu:33649: vṛka-jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ praśaṃsopādhike 'rthe vartamānābhyāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam til-tātilau pratyayau bhavataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:33656: bahvarthāt alpārthāc ca kārakābhidhāyinaḥ śabdāt śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33673: yatra maṅgalaṃ gamyate tatra ayaṃ pratyaya isyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33679: saṅkhyāvācibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ekavacanāc ca vīpsāyāṃ dyotyāyāṃ śaspratyayo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:33682: ekavacanāt khalv api - kārṣāpaṇaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti karṣāpaṇaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33686: kārṣāpaṇādayaś ca parimāṇaśabdāḥ vṛttāvekārthā eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:33687: saṅkhyaikavacanāt iti kim ? ghaṭaṃ ghaṭaṃ dadāti /
GS24jvkasipu:33690: kārakāt ity eva, dvayor dvayoḥ svāmī /
GS24jvkasipu:33695: pratinā karmapravacanīyena yoge yā pañcamī vihitā tadantāt tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33709: apādāne yā pañcamī tasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:33710: tac ced apādānaṃ hīyaruhoḥ sambandhi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33719: kathaṃ mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:33722: svareṇa varṇena vā hīnaḥ ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33730: atigrahādiviṣaye yā tṛtīyā tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati, sā cet kartari na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33733: suṣṭhuvṛttavān anyān atikramya vṛttena gṛhyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33734: avyathane - vṛttena na vyathate vṛttato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:33735: cāritreṇa na vyathate cāritrato na vyathate /
GS24jvkasipu:33745: hīyamānena pāpena ca yogo yasya tad vācinaḥ śabdāt parā yā tṛtīyā vibhaktir akartari tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33750: kṣepasya ca avivakṣāyāṃ tat tv ākhyāyām idam udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:33757: vyāśraye gamyamāne ṣaṣṭhyantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33761: arjunasya pakṣe, karṇasya pakṣe ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33767: tad vācinaḥ śabdād yā ṣaṣthī vibhaktiḥ, tadantād vā tasiḥ pratyayo bhavati apanayane gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:33774: apanayane iti kim ? pravāhikāyāḥ prakopanaṃ kuru //
GS24jvkasipu:33779: kāraṇasya vikārarūpeṇa abhūtasya tadātmanā bhāvaḥ abhūtatadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33781: sampadyakartari vartamānāt prātipadikāt abhūtatadbhāve gamyamāne kṛbhvastibhir dhātubhir yoge cviḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33782: aśuklaḥ śuklaḥ sampadyate, taṃ karoti śuklīkaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:33791: kṛbhvastiyoge iti kim ? aśuklaḥ śuklo jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33792: sampadyakrtari iti kim, yāvatā abhūtatadbhāvasāmarthyāl labdham eva sampadyakartṛtvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:33793: kārakāntarasampattau mā bhūt, adevagṛhe devagṛhe sampadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33794: devagṛhasyādheyaviśeṣasambandhena abhūtatadbhāvaḥ sattvādhikaraṇasya, na kartuḥ iti ? //
GS24jvkasipu:33798: aruḥprabhrtīnām antasya lopo bhavati cviś ca pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33799: atra sarvaviśeṣaṇasambandhāt pūrveṇa+eva pratyayaḥ siddhaḥ, lopamātrārtha ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33821: abhūtatadbhāve kṛbhvastiyoge sampadyakartari iti sarvam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:33822: asmin viṣaye vibhāṣa sātiḥ prayayo bhavati kārtsnye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:33823: yadi prakrtiḥ kṛtsnāṃ vikārātmatāmāpadyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33826: kārtsnye iti kim ? ekadeśena paṭaḥ śuklībhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33833: abhividhau gamyamāne cviviṣaye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati sampadā yoge, cakārāt kṛbhvastibhiś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33835: sa tu kṛbhvastibhir eva yoge bhavati, na sampadā /
GS24jvkasipu:33842: yatra+ekadeśena api sarvā prakṛtir vikāram āpadyate so 'bhividhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:33843: yathā+asyāṃ senāyām utpātena sarvaṃ śastram agnisātsampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:33845: kārtsnyaṃ tu sarvātmanā dravyasya vikārarūpāpattau bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:33853: svāmiviśeṣavācinaḥ prātipadikāt īśitavye 'bhidheye sātiḥ pratyayo bhavati kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:33868: tadadhīne deye trā pratyayo bhavati, cakārāt sātiś ca kṛbhvastibhiḥ sampadā ca yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:33870: tad yadā teṣā samarpaṇena tadadhīnaṃ kriyate tadātrā pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33876: deye iti kim ? rājasād bhavati rāṣṭram //
GS24jvkasipu:33881: devādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ dvitīyāsaptamyantebhyaḥ trā pratyayo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:33892: bahulavacanād anyatra api bhavati, bahutrā jīvato manaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:33896: yatra dhvanāvakārādayo varṇā viśeṣarūpeṇa na vyajyante so 'vhyaktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33900: yasya apakarṣe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu nyūnamardhaṃ dvyackaṃ sampadyate,
GS24jvkasipu:33901: tasmād avyaktānukaraṇād anitiparāḍ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33904: yasya ca dvirvacane kṛte dvyajavarārdhaṃ tataḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33905: ḍāci bahulaṃ dve bhavataḥ iti viṣayasaptamī /
GS24jvkasipu:33906: ḍāci vivakṣite dvirvacanam eva pūrvaṃ kriyate, paścāt pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33919: paṭapaṭāsi, atra svarito vā 'nudātte padādau (*8,2.6) iti svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33920: kecid dvyajavarārdhyād iti yakāraṃ paṭhanti, sa svarthiko vijñeyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:33924: dvitīya-tṛtīyādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:33927: dvitīyaṃ karṣaṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33930: anulomakṛṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ kṛṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33932: saha bījena vilehanaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33933: kṛṣau iti kim ? kvitīyaṃ karoti padam //
GS24jvkasipu:33937: kṛñaḥ iti anuvartate, kṛṣau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:33938: saṅkhyāvācinaḥ śabdasya gunaśabdo 'nte samīpe yatra sambhavati sā saṅkhyā guṇāntā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33939: tādṛśāt prātipadikāt kṛṣāvabhidheyāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:33940: dviguṇaṃ vilekhanaṃ karoti kṣetrasya dviguṇākaroti kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:33942: kṛṣau iti kim ? kviguṇāṃ karoti rajjum //
GS24jvkasipu:33949: samayaśabdād yāpanāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:33951: samayaṃ yāpayati, kālakṣepaṃ karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33958: sapatra-niṣpatra-śabdābhyām ativyathane ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge sati /
GS24jvkasipu:33961: sapatraṃ śaramasya śarīre praveśayati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33964: ativyathane iti kim ? saptraṃ vṛkṣaṃ karoti jalasecakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:33970: niṣkulaśabdāt niṣkoṣane vartamānāt kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33974: niṣkoṣaṇe iti kim ? niṣkulān karoti śatrūn //
GS24jvkasipu:33978: sukha-priya-śabdābhyām ānulomye vartamānābhyāṃ kṛño yoge ḍāc pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:33983: sukhaṃ priyaṃ vā kurvann apy ānulomye 'vasthita evam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:33984: ānulomye iti kim ? sukhaṃ karoti, priyaṃ karoti auṣadhapānam //
GS24jvkasipu:33989: duḥkhaśabdāt prātipadikāt prātilomye gamyamāne ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:33993: prātilomye iti kim ? duḥkhaṃ karoti kadannam //
GS24jvkasipu:33998: śūlaśabdāt pākaviṣaye ḍāc pratyayo bhavti kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:34000: pāke iti kim ? śūlaṃ karoti kṛdannam //
GS24jvkasipu:34006: satyaśabdāt aśapathe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:34008: kvacit tu śapathe ca vartate, satyena śāpayed dvijam iti, tasya ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34011: aśapathe iti kim ? satyaṃ karoti brāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34016: madraśabdāt parivāpaṇe ḍāc pratyayo bhavati kṛño yoge /
GS24jvkasipu:34027: āpādaparisamāpteḥ ye pratyayāḥ vihitās te samāsāntāvayavā ekadeśāḥ bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:34032: na avyayībhāvāt ity eṣa vidhir bhavati, anaś ca (*5,4.108) iti ṭac /
GS24jvkasipu:34042: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34045: bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1) ity etad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34049: yān śabdān upādāya samāsāntā vidhīyante rāja-ahaḥ-sakhibhyaṣ ṭac (*5,4.91)
GS24jvkasipu:34050: ity evam ādīn, yadā te pūjanāt pūjanavacanāt pare bhavanti tadā samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34056: iha mā bhūt, paramarājaḥ, paramagavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34058: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ ity evam ādau pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34067: kṣepe yaḥ kiṃśabdaḥ tataḥ parasya samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34072: kṣepe iti kim ? kasya rājā kiṃrājaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34078: nañaḥ pare vakṣyamāṇā ye rājādayas tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34086: nañaḥ paro yaḥ pathinśabdaḥ, tadantāt tatpuruṣāt samāsānto vibhāṣā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34092: saṅkhyeye yo bahuvrīhir vartate tasmād abahu-gaṇa-antāt ḍac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34093: saṅkhyayāvyayāsanna iti yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:34117: ṛk pur ap dhur pathin ity evam antānāṃ samāsānām akāraḥ pratyayo bhavati samāsānto 'kṣe na /
GS24jvkasipu:34118: sāmarthyād dhura etad viśeṣaṇam, ṛgādīnāṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34119: akṣesambandhinī yā dhūḥ tadantasya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34132: anṛco anakṣe iti kim ? akṣasya dhūḥ akṣadhūḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34137: anṛkkaṃ sāma, bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:34142: prati anu ava ity evaṃ pūrvāt sāmāntāt lomāntāt ca samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34150: godāvaryāś ca nadyāś ca saṅkhyāyā uttare yadi //
GS24jvkasipu:34157: bhūmer api saṅkhyāpūrvāyāḥ ac pratyaya iṣyate - dvibhūmaḥ prāsādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34159: daśabhūmakaṃ sutram anyatra api ca dṛśyate - padmanābhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34164: tad etat sarvam iha yogavibhāgaṃ kṛtvā sādhayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:34169: darśanād anyatra yo 'kṣiśabdaḥ tadantāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34183: samāse vyavasthā api nipātanād eva pratipattavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:34185: adṛśyāni avidyamānāni vā catvāri yasya so 'caturaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34190: iha na bhavati, striyāḥ pumān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34206: nanu ca paryāyāvetau, katham anayor dvandvaḥ ? vīpsāyāṃ dvandvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34209: bahuvrīhau na bhavati, saha rajasā sarajaḥ paṅkajam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34211: niḥśreyaskaḥ puruṣaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34213: dvandve na bhavati, puruṣaśca āyuśca puruṣāyuṣī /
GS24jvkasipu:34214: tato dvigū - dve āyuṣī samāhṛte dvyāyuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:34216: iha na bhavati, dvyor āyuḥ dvyāyuḥ tryāyuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34217: tato dvandvaḥ - ṛk ca yajuś ca ṛgyajuṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:34218: iha na bhavati, ṛgyajurasya unmugdhasya ṛgyajurunmugdhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34233: brahmahastibhyāṃ paro yo varcaḥśabdas tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34242: ava sam andha ity etebhyo yaḥ paraḥ tamasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34249: śvasaḥ parau yau vasīyas-śreyas-śabdau tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34253: svabhāvāc ca+iha śvaḥśabdaḥ uttarapadārthasya praśaṃsāmāśīr viṣayām ācaśṭe, śvaḥśreyasaṃ te bhūyat /
GS24jvkasipu:34254: śobhanaṃ śreyas te bhūyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34260: anu ava tapta ity etebhyaḥ paro yo rahasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsād ac pratyayaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34267: prateḥ paro ya urasśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34273: saptamīsthāt iti kim ? pratigatam uraḥ pratyuraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34284: dvistāvā tristāvā iti vediś ced abhidheyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34286: yāvatī prakṛtau vediḥ tato dviguṇā vā triguṇā vā kasyāṃcid vikṛtau tatra+idaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:34289: vediḥ iti kim ? dvistāvatī, tristāvatī rajjuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34293: upasargāt paro yo 'dhvanśabdaḥ tadantāt samāsāt ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34303: aṅguliśabdāntasya tatpuruṣasya saṅkhyādeḥ avyayādeś ca ac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34307: pramāṇe lo dvigor nityam (*6,2.12) iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34317: aharādibhyaḥ paro yo rātriśabdaḥ tadantasya tatpuruṣasya ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34328: saṅkhyāvyāyadeḥ khalv api - dve rātrī samāhṛte dvirātraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34336: iti vakṣyati, tasmin parabhūte ahan ity etasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati etebhya uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:34353: saṅkhyādes tatpuruṣasya samāhāre vartamānasya ahaḥśabdasya ahnādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34357: samāhāre iti kim ? dvayor ahnoḥ bhavaḥ dvyahnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34359: taddhitārtha iti samāse kṛte aṇaḥ āgatasya dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88) iti luk //
GS24jvkasipu:34363: uttamaikābhyāṃ ca parasya ahnaḥ ity ayam ādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34365: puṇyagrahaṇam eva na kṛtam vaicitryārtham puṇyāhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34367: kecit tu upottamasya api pratipattyarthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34368: tena saṅkhyātaśabdād api parasya na bhavati, saṅkhyātāhaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34373: rājan ahan sakhi ity evam antāt prātipadikāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34380: iha kasmān na bhavati, madrāṇām rājñī madrarājñī ?
GS24jvkasipu:34382: laghvakṣarasya pūrvanipāte prāpte rājaśabdasya savarṇadīrghārthaṃ prathamaṃ prayogaṃ kurvann etad jñāpayati yasya akāreṇa savarṇadīrghatvaṃ sambhavati tasya+idaṃ grahaṇam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:34386: gośabdāntāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati, sa cet tapuruṣas taddhita-lug-viṣayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34391: ataddhitaluki iti kim ? pañcabhir gobhiḥ krītaḥ paṇcaguḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34393: tena krītam (*5,1.37) ity āgatasya ārhīyasya ṭhako 'dhyardhapūrvād dvigoḥ iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:34394: taddhitagrahaṇaṃ kim ? subluki pratiṣedho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:34396: luggrahaṇaṃ kim ? taddhita eva mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:34402: urasśabdāntāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati, sa ced urasśabdaḥ agrākhyāyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34404: yathā śarīrāvayavānām ucyate uraḥ pradhānam, evam anyo 'pi pradhānabhūta urasśabdena+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34408: agrākhyāyām iti kim ? devadattasya uraḥ devadattoraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34412: anas aśman ayas saras ity evam antāt tatpurusāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati jātau sañjñāyān ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34428: grāmakauṭābhyāṃ paro yaḥ takṣanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34431: kuṭyāṃ bhavaḥ kauṭaḥ, tasya takṣā kauṭatakṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34432: svatantraḥ karmajīvī, na kasya cit pratibaddhaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34438: atiśabdāt paraḥ yaḥ śvanśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34448: upamānavācī yaḥ śvanśabdo 'prāṇiṣu vartate tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34452: upamānāt iti kim ? na śvā aśvā loṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34453: aprāṇiṣu iti kim ? vānaraḥ śveva vānaraśvā //
GS24jvkasipu:34457: uttara mṛga pūrva ity etebhyaḥ paro yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:34459: tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34463: upamānāt khalv api - phalakam iva sakthi phalakasaktham //
GS24jvkasipu:34467: nauśabdāntāt dvigoḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34475: ataddhitaluki ity eva, pañcabhir naubhiḥ krītaḥ pañcanauḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34480: ardhaśabdāt paro yo nauśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34487: dvigoḥ, ardhac ca iti dvayam apy anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:34488: khārīśabdāntāt dvigor ardhāc ca paro yaḥ khārīśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:34496: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo 'ñjaliśabdaḥ tadantāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34499: dvigoḥ ity eva, dvyor añjaliḥ dvyañjaliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34500: ataddhitaluki ity eva, dvābhyām añjalibhyāṃ krītaḥ dvyañjaliḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34506: annantāt asantāt ca napuṃsakaliṅgāt tatpuruṣāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34512: napuṃsakāt iti kim ? sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmanehasam /
GS24jvkasipu:34519: brahmanśabdānatāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsena ced brahmaṇo jānapadatvam ākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34521: yasya tatpruṣasya janapadaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ tasmād etat pratyayavidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:34529: kumahadbhyāṃ paro yo brahmā tadantāt tatpuruṣāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:34541: sa ced dvandvaḥ samāhāre vartate, na+itaretarayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:34552: dvandvāt iti kim ? tatpuruṣān mā bhūt, pañca vācaḥ samāhṛtāḥ pañcavāk /
GS24jvkasipu:34559: śarat ity evam ādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhyaḥ ṭac pratyayo bhavati avyayībhāve /
GS24jvkasipu:34564: ye 'tra jñayantaḥ paṭhyante teṣāṃ nityārthaṃ grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:34594: annantād avyayībhāvāt ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34604: annantaṃ yad napuṃsakaṃ tadantād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34611: nadī paurṇamāsī āgrahāyaṇī ity evam antād avyayībhāvāt anyatarasyāṃ ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34619: jñayantād avyayībhāvād anyatarasyām ṭac pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34625: giriśabdāntāt avyayībhāvāṭ ṭac pratyayo bhavati senakasya ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:34634: svāṅgavācī yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ akṣiśabdaś ca tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34645: svāṅgāt iti kim ? dīrghaskthi śakaṭam sthulākṣiḥ ikṣuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34649: sakthaṃ cākrāntāt (*6,2.198) iti vibhāṣayottarapadasya antodāttatā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34650: tatra yasmin pakṣe na asty udāttatvaṃ tatra ṅīpi sati udāttanivṛttisvarasya abhāvād anudāttaḥ śrūyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:34656: aṅguliśabdāntād bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ dāruṇi samāsārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:34661: yasya tu dve aṅgulī pramāṇam dāruṇaḥ tatra taddhitārtha iti samāse iṛte tatpruṣasya aṅguleḥ ity acā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34666: dvitribhyāṃ paro yo mūrdhanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ṣapratyayaḥ bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34675: pūraṇyanatāt pramāṇyantāt ca bhuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34676: kalyāṇī pañcamī āsāṃ rātrīṇāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34681: yatra anyapadārthe pūraṇī anupraviśati na kevalaṃ vartipadārtha eva, tatra pūraṇyāḥ prādhānyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34683: iha na bhavati, kalyāṇī pañcamī asmin pakṣe kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34686: mṛgo netā āsāṃ rātrīṇām mṛganetrā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34699: antar bahis ity etābhyāṃ paro yo lomanśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ ap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34703: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt || PS_5,4.118 ||
GS24jvkasipu:34705: nāsikāntāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati, nāsikāśabdaś ca na samādeśam āpadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34706: asthūlāt iti nāsikāviśeṣaṇaṃ, na cet sthūlaśabdāt parā nāsikā bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34720: śitināḥ, ahināḥ, arcanāḥ iti nigama iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:34724: upasargāt paro yo nāsikāśabdaḥ tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ac pratyayo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:34737: anyad api ca ṭilopādikaṃ nipātanād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:34749: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau hali-sakthi-śabdau tadantad bahuvrīher anyatarasyām ac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34758: virūpā śaktiḥ asya duḥśaktaḥ, duḥśaktaḥ, duḥśaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34764: nañ dus su ity etebhyaḥ parau yau prajā-medhā-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ nityam asic pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34771: nityagrahaṇaṃ kim, yāvatā pūrvasūtre 'nyatarasyām grahaṇaṃ na+eva svaryate ?
GS24jvkasipu:34772: evaṃ tarhi nityagrahaṇād anyatra api bhavati iti sūcyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34784: kevalād yo dharmaśabdaḥ tadantād bahuvrīheḥ anic pratyayo bhavati samāsantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34787: kevalāt iti im ? paramaḥ svo dharmaḥ asya paramasvadharmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34788: yady evaṃ tripade bahuvrīhau prāpnoti, paramaḥ svo dharmaḥ asya iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:34789: evaṃ tarhi kevalāt iti pūrvapadaṃ nirdiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:34790: kevalāt padād yo dharmaśabdo na padasamudāyāt,
GS24jvkasipu:34796: bahuvrīhau samāse svādibhyaḥ paraṃ jambhā iti kṛtasamāsāntam uttarapadaṃ nipātyate jambhaśabdaḥ abhyavahāryavacī dantaviśeṣavācī ca /
GS24jvkasipu:34802: dantavacane - tṛṇam iva jambhaḥ asya, soma iva jambhaḥ asya iti vigrahītavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:34807: dakṣiṇermā iti kṛtasmāsāntaḥ nipātyate bahuvrīhau samāse lubdhayoge /
GS24jvkasipu:34810: dakṣiṇam aṅgaṃ vraṇitam asya vyādhena ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34815: karmavyatihāre yo bahuvrīhiḥ tasmād ic pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34816: tatra tena+idam iti sarūpe (*2,2.27) ity ayaṃ bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:34817: keśesu keśesu gṛhītvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ keśākeśi /
GS24jvkasipu:34819: mṛsalaiś ca musalaiś ca prahṛtya idaṃ yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ musalāmusali /
GS24jvkasipu:34825: dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ śabdāḥ ic pratyayāntāḥ sādhavo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:34826: dvidaṇḍyādibhyaḥ iti tādarthye eṣā caturthī, na pañcamī /
GS24jvkasipu:34827: dvidaṇḍyādyartham ic pratyayo bhavati tathā bhavati yathā dvidaṇḍyādayaḥ siddyanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34831: iha na bhavati, dvidaṇḍā śālā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:34834: prohya pādau hastinaṃ vāhayati prodyapādi hastinaṃ vāhayati /
GS24jvkasipu:34862: pra sam ity etābhyām uttarasya jānuśabdasya jñurādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:34868: ūrdhvaśabdād uttarasya jānuśabdasya vibhāṣā jñuḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:34873: ūdhasśabdāntasya bahuvrīheḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34874: kuṇḍam iva ūdhaḥ asyāḥ sā kuṇdodhnī /
GS24jvkasipu:34890: dhanuḥśabdāntād bahuvrīher anḍādeśo vā bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:34904: ut pūti su surabhi ity etebhyaḥ parasya gandhaśabdasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:34912: tena śobhanaḥ gandhaḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:34916: alpākhyāyāṃ yogandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:34924: upamānāt paro yo gandhaśabdaḥ tasya ikārādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:34932: upamānāt ihastyādivarjitāt parasya pādaśabdasya lopo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:34951: pādasya lopo bhavati kumbhapadyādiviṣaye yathā kumbhapadyādayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34953: samudāyapāṭhasya ca prayojanaṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ - striyām eva, tatra ṅīppratyaye eva, na anyadā /
GS24jvkasipu:34956: yac ca iha upamānapūrvaṃ saṅkhyāpūrvaṃ ca paṭhyate, tasya siddhe lope nityaṅībarthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:34986: saṅkhyāpūrvasya supūrvasya ca bahuvrīheḥ pādaśabdāntasya lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:34994: tasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ vayasi gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:34999: śobhanā dantāḥ asya samastāḥ jātāḥ sudan kumāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35005: chandasi ca dantaśadasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsāntaḥ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:35011: striyām anyapadārthe sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35019: śyāva aroka ity etābhyāṃ parasya dantaśabdasya datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā samāsānto bahuvrīhau /
GS24jvkasipu:35030: agrāntāt śabdāt śuddha śubhra vṛṣa varāha ity etebhyaś ca parasya dantaśabdasya vibhāṣā datṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati samāsānto bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:35044: kakudaśabdāntasya bahuvrīher lopo bhavati samāsāntaḥ avasthāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:35045: kālādikṛtā vastudharmā vayaḥprabhṛtayaḥ avasthā ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35060: trikakudi bahuvrīhau kakudaśabdasya lopaḥ samāsānto nipātyate parvate 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:35062: kakudākāraṃ parvatasya śṛṅgaṃ kakudam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35069: ut vi ity etābhyāṃ parasya kākudaśabdasya lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:35076: pūrṇāt parasya kākudaśabdasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:35082: suhṛt durhṛt iti nipātyate yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mitra-amitrayor abhidheyayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35083: suśabdāt parasya hṛdayaśabdasya hṛdbhāvo nipātyate bahuvrīhau, tathā duḥśabdāt parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:35095: pumān anaḍvān payaḥ nauḥ lakṣmīḥ iti vibhaktyantāḥ paṭhyante, na prātipadikāni /
GS24jvkasipu:35096: tatra+idaṃ prayojanam - ekavacanāntānām eva grahaṇam iha vijñāyeta,
GS24jvkasipu:35098: tatra śeṣad vibhāṣā (*5,4.154) iti vikalpa eva bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35116: innantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo bhavati striyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35117: bahavo daṇdinaḥ asyāṃ śālāyāṃ bahudaṇdikā śālā /
GS24jvkasipu:35121: striyām iti kim ? bahudaṇḍī rājā, bahudaṇḍikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35126: nadyantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṛkārāntāt ca kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35127: bahvyaḥ kumārya asmin deśe bahukumārīkaḥ deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35134: yasmād bahuvrīheḥ samāsānto na vihitaḥ sa śeṣaḥ tasmād vibhāṣā kap pratyayo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35144: katham anṛkkaṃ sāma, bahvṛkkaṃ sūktam iti, yāvatā vihito 'tra sāmānyena samāsāntaḥ ṛṣpūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35146: viśeṣe sa iṣyate, anṛco māṇadako jñeyo bahvṛcaś caraṇākhyāyām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35153: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35160: īyasantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35166: hrasvatvam api na bhavati, īyaso bahuvrīhau puṃvat iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:35170: vandite 'rthe yo bhrātṛśabdo vartate tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35178: ṛvarnāntād bahuvrīheḥ chandasi viṣaye kap pratyayo na bhavti /
GS24jvkasipu:35186: svāṅge yau nāḍīt-antrī-śabdau tadantād bahuvrīheḥ kap pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35195: niṣpravāṇiḥ iti nadīlakṣaṇasya kapaḥ pratiṣedho nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35203: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ padaḥ
GS24jvkasipu:35211: ekācaḥ iti ca, dve iti ca, prathamasya iti ca tritayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35212: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ prāk saṃprasāraṇavidhānāt tatra ekācaḥ prathamasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35214: tatra dhātor avayavayasya anabhyāsasya prathamasya+ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35220: eko 'c yasya so 'yam ekāc ity avayavena vigrahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35222: abhyantaraś ca samudāye 'vayavo bhavati iti sāckasya+eva dvirvacanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35223: evaṃ ca pac ity atra yena+eva acā samudāyaḥ ekāc, tenaa+eva tadavayavo 'cchabdaḥ paśabdaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35224: tatra pṛthag avayavaikāc na dvir ucyate, kiṃ tarhi, samudāyaikāj eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35227: iyāya, āra ity atra ekāctvam api vyapadeśibhāvād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35230: tena sa eva śabdo dvir ucāryate, na ca śabdāntaraṃ tasya sthāne vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:35236: ac ādir yasya dhātoḥ tadavayavasya dvitīyasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35240: arteḥ smi-pūṅ-r-añjv-aśāṃ sani (*7,2.74) iti iṭ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35241: tasmin kṛte guṇe ca raparatve ca dvirvacane 'ci (*1,2.59) iti sthānivadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:35246: tathā hi - kṅinimittayor guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedho vidhīyamānaḥ śayitā ity atra na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35247: na hi kāryiṇaḥ śīṅo guṇaṃ prati nimittabhāvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35248: atra kecid ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt pañcamīm icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35249: ac ca asau ādiś ca ity ajādiḥ, tasmāt ajāder uttarasya ekāco dve bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35255: dvitīyasya ekāco 'vayavabhūtānāṃ ndrāṇāṃ tadantarbhāvāt prāptaṃ dvirvacanaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35256: nakāradakārarephā dvitīyaikāco 'vayavabhūtāḥ saṃyogādayo na dvir udyante /
GS24jvkasipu:35265: kecid ajādeḥ ity api pañcamyantaṃ karmadhārayam anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35267: ajāder anantaratvābhāvād dakāro dvir ucyata eva, nakāro na dvir ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35272: yadā bakaropadha ubjir upadiśyate tadā ayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35275: yakāraparasya rephasya pratiṣedho na bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35278: tatra yaṅi ca (*7,4.30) iti guṇaḥ, tato dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:35279: īrṣyates tṛtīyasya dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35280: kasya tṛtīyasya ? kecid āhur vyañjanasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35282: apare punaḥ tṛtīyasya ekācaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:35284: kaṇḍvādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya+eakāco dve bhavata iti vaktvyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35287: vā nāmadhātūnāṃ tṛtīyasya+ekāc dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35290: apara āha - yathā+iṣṭaṃ nāmadhātuṣv iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35300: dve iti prathamantaṃ yad anuvartate tad arthād iha ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35301: tatra pratyāsatter asmin prakaraṇe ye dve vihite tayor yaḥ pūrvo 'vayavaḥ so 'bhyāsasañjño bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35307: abhyāsapradeśās tu atra lopo 'bhyāsasya (*7,4.58) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35312: ye eve vihite te ubhe api samudite abhyastasañjñe bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35317: nenijati ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ iti samudāye udāttatvaṃ yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:35318: pratyekaṃ paryāyeṇa vā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35319: abhyastapradeśāḥ - abhyastānām ādiḥ (*6,1.189) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35324: jakṣa ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ ity ādayaś ca anye ṣaṭ dhātavaḥ abhyastasañjñā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:35326: jakṣa bhakṣahasanyoḥ ity ataḥ prabhṛti vevīṅ vetinā tulye iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:35332: dīdhyate, vevyate ity atra abhyastānām ādiḥ ity eṣa svaraḥ prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:35333: dīdhyat iti ca śatari vyatyayena sampādite na abhyastāc chatuḥ (*7,1.78) iti numaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35338: kaś ca prakāraḥ ? tujer dīrgho 'bhyāsasya na vihitaḥ, dṛśyate ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35339: ye tathābhūtāḥ te tujādayaḥ, teṣām abhyāsasya dīrghaḥ sādhur bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35345: sa tūtāva dīrghaś ca+eṣāṃ chandasi pratyayaviśeṣe eva dṛśyate, tato 'nyatra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35350: liṭi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35354: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ iti vacanād ūrṇoteḥ ijādeḥ iti ām na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35358: sasṛvāṃso viśṛṇvire ima indrāya sunvire anabhyāsasya iti kim ?
GS24jvkasipu:35371: sanantasya yaṅantasya ca anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35386: ślau parataḥ anabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya+ekāco dvitiyasya vā yathāyogaṃ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35393: caṅi parato 'nabhyāsasya dhātor avayavasya prathamasya ekāco dvitīyasya vā yathāyogam dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35402: tathā ca sanvallaghuni caṅpare iti sanvadbhāvo vidhīyamāno hrasvasya sthānivadbhāvān na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35403: yo hy anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhiṃ prati sthānivadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35404: na ca asmin kāryāṇāṃ krameṇāniṣṭād acaḥ pūrvo 'bhyāso bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35405: āṭiṭat iti dvirvacane 'ci (*1,1.59) iti sthānivadbhāvāt dvitīyasya+ekācaḥ dvirvacanaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35409: dāśvān sāhvān mīḍvān ity ete śadāḥ chandasi bhāṣāyām ca aviśeṣeṇa nipāyane /
GS24jvkasipu:35410: dāśvān iti dāśṛ dāne ity etasya dhātoḥ kvasau advirvacanam aniṭtvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35413: sāhvān iti ṣaha marṣaṇe ity etasya parasmaipadam,
GS24jvkasipu:35417: mīḍvān iti miha secane ity etasya advirvacanam, aniṭtvam, upadhādīrghatvaṃ ḍhatvaṃ ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35420: kṛñādīnāṃ ke dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35423: kṛñaḥ klideś ca ghañarthe kavidhānam iti kaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35425: carādīnāṃ dhātūnām api pratyaye parataḥ dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35428: halādiśeṣe hi sayāgamasya ādeśasya ca viśeṣo na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:35434: tena caraḥ puruṣaḥ, calo rathaḥ , pataṃ yānam, vado manuṣyaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35436: hanter aci pratyaye parato dve bhavataḥ, abhyāsasya ca hakārasya ca ghatvam, āk cāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35437: parasya abhyāsāc ca (*7,3.55) iti kutvam ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaścarṣaṇīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:35438: pāṭer ṇiluk cok ca dīrghaś ca abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:35439: pāṭer aci parato dve bhavato ṇiluk ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35440: abhyāsasya ca ūgāgamo dīrghaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35445: putra pati ity etasyor uttarapadayos tatpuruṣe samāse ṣyaṅaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35446: yaṇaḥ sthāne ig bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35451: karīṣasya+iva gandho 'sya, kumudasya+iva gandho 'sya iti bahuvrīhiḥ, tatra upamānāc ca (*5,4.137)
GS24jvkasipu:35454: tadantāt striyām aṇ-iñor annarṣayor gurūpattamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre (*4,1.78)
GS24jvkasipu:35455: iti ṣyaṅ, tataś ca api vihite ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ, samprasāraṇasya (*6,3.139) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:35460: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? kārīṣagandhyā patir asya grāmasya kārīṣagandhyāpatiḥ ayaṃ grāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35462: ṣyaṅaḥ iti strīpratyayagrahaṇaṃ na strīpratyaye cānupasarjane iti pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity eṣa niyamo na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:35467: atikrāntā kārīṣagandhyām atikārīṣagandhyā, tasya putraḥ atikārīṣagandhyāputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35473: ṣyaṅante ca yady apy anye yaṇaḥ santi,
GS24jvkasipu:35476: samprasāraṇam iti cādhikriyate vibhāṣā pareḥ (*6,1.44) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:35482: bandhuśabde uttarapade bahuvrīhau samāse ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35485: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? kārīṣagandhyāyāḥ bandhuḥ kārīṣagandhyābandhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35491: bandhuni iti napuṃsakāliṅganirdeśaḥ śabdarūpāpekṣayā, puṃliṅgābhidheyas tu ayaṃ bandhuśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35493: ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati vibhāṣayā bahuvrīhāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:35494: kārīṣagandhyā mātā asya ity evaṃ bahuvrīhau kṛte etasmād eva upasaṅkhyānāt pakṣe matṛśabdasya mātajādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35496: mātṛmātṛkaśabdayoś ca bhedena+upādānāt nadyṛtaś ca (*5,4.153) iti kabapi vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35508: vaci - vaca paribhāṣaṇe, bruvo vaciḥ (*2,4.53) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35510: yajādayaḥ - yaja devapūjāsaṃgatikaranadānesu ity ataḥ prabhṛti āgaṇāntāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35511: teṣāṃ vacisv api yajādīnāṃ kiti pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35535: tena+iha na bhavati, vācyate, vācikaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:35539: graha upādāne, jyā vayohānau, veño vayiḥ (*2,4.41)
GS24jvkasipu:35546: bhrasja pāke ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ṅīti pratyaye parataḥ cakārāt kati ca saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35555: halaḥ (*6,4.2) iti samprasāraṇadīrghe kṛte pvādīnāṃ iti hrasvaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35556: vayi - liṭi parataḥ veño vayiḥ ādeśaḥ, tasya ṅidabhāvāt kidevodāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35559: yady evaṃ vayigrahaṇam anarthakam, yajādiṣu veñ paṭhyate ? na+evaṃ śakyam /
GS24jvkasipu:35562: tatra yathā+eva sthānivadbhāvād vyervidhiḥ evaṃ pratiṣedho 'pi prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35564: iti yakārasya saṃprasāraṇapratiṣedhād vayervidhau grahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhe cāgrahaṇamanumāsyate ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:35565: eṣa eva arthaḥ sākṣān nirdeśena vyeḥ spaṣṭīkriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35579: tena sarvatra añṇiti pratyaye samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:35584: atha katham atra kutvaṃ, vraścabhrasja iti hi ṣatvena bhavitavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:35587: tatra ṣtvaṃ prati natvasya siddhatvād jñalādir niṣṭhā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35588: kutve tu kartavye tad asiddham eva iti pravartate kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:35596: naṅi tu praśne ca āsannakāle (*3,2.117) iti nipātanād asaṃprasāraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:35602: iti jaśtvena dakāraḥ, stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ (*8,4.40)
GS24jvkasipu:35607: ubhayeṣāṃ vacyādīnāṃ grahyādīnāṃ ca liṭi parato 'bhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35629: vṛścateḥ satyasati vā yoge na asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35630: yogārambhe tu sati yadi samprasāraṇam akṛtvā halādiśeṣeṇa repho nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35632: atha rephasya samprasāraṇaṃ kṛtvā uradatvaṃ raparatvaṃ ca kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35633: tadānī - muradatvasya sthānivadbhāvāt na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam (*6,1.37)
GS24jvkasipu:35634: iti pratiṣedho bhavati ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35639: kiti hi paratvād dhātoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād dvirvacanam, ūcatuḥ, ūcuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35640: adhikārād eva+ubhayeṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe punar ubhayeṣām iti vacanaṃ halādiḥ śeṣam api bādhitvā samprasāraṇam eva yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35657: ṅiti iti kevalam iha anuvartate ity etad durvijñānam //
GS24jvkasipu:35666: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ yaṅi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35675: vaśerdhātor yaṅi parataḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35683: cāyṛ pūjāniśāmanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ yagi parataḥ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35690: sphāyī opyāyī vṛddhau ity asay dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ sphī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35694: sphātībhavati ity etad api ktinnantasya+eva rūpaṃ, na niṣthāntasya /
GS24jvkasipu:35695: niṣṭhāyām ity etad adhīkrīyate liṅyaṅoś ca (*6,1.29) iti prāgetasmāt sūtrāt //
GS24jvkasipu:35699: niṣṭhāyām iti vartate, saṃprasāraṇam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35702: dvayor apy etayoḥ dhātvoḥ styārūpamāpannayoḥ sāmānyena grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:35703: styā ity asya prapūrvasya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35708: prastyo 'nyatarasyām (*8,2.54) iti tu pakṣe makāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35712: prastyaḥ ity eva siddhe pūrvagrahaṇam iha api ythā syāt, prasaṃstītaḥ, prasṃstītavān /
GS24jvkasipu:35713: tat kathaṃ prapūrvasya iti ṣaṣṭhyarthe bahuvrīhiḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:35714: praḥ pūrvo yasya dhātūpasargasamudāyasya sa prapūrvaḥ tadavayavasya styaḥ iti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau /
GS24jvkasipu:35715: tatra prasaṃstītaḥ ity atra api prapūrvasamudāyāvayavaḥ styāśabdo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35721: sparśe vartamānasya śyaiṅ gatau ity asya dhātor niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35730: guṇamātre tadvati ca asya śītaśabdasya vṛttir draṣṭavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:35736: prater uttarasya śyāyater niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ samprasaraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35739: dravamūrtisparśābhyām anyatra api yathā syāt iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:35744: abhi ava ity evaṃ pūrvasya śyāyater niṣthāyāṃ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35755: samavaśyānam ity atra mā bhūt iti kecid vyacakṣate ,
GS24jvkasipu:35756: nakilāyam abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyaḥ iti yo 'tra abhyavapūrvaḥ samudāyastadāśrayo viklapaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:35758: yadi tu na+iṣyate tato yatnānataramāstheyam asmād vihbāṣāvijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35765: śrā pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ ṇyantasya aṇyantasya ca pāke 'bhidheye ktapratyaye parataḥ śṛbhāvo nipātyate vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:35770: anyatra na bhavati śrāṇā yavāgūḥ śrapitā yavāgūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35771: yadā api bāhye prayojake dvitīyo ṇic utpadyate tadā api niṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35773: śrātir ayam akarmakaḥ karmakartṛviṣayasya pacer arthe vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:35775: tad atra dvayor api śṛtam iti iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35784: opyāyī vṛddhau ity asya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ vibhāṣā pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35789: tena anupasargasya nityaṃ bhavati, sopasargasya tu na+esva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35791: āṅpūrvasyāndhūdhasoḥ bhavaty eva, āpīno 'ndhuḥ, āpīnamūdhaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:35796: pyāyaḥ pī (*6,1.28) ity etat caśabdena anukṛṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35797: liṭi yaṅi ca parataḥ pyāyaḥ pī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35799: paratvāt pībhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt dvirvacanam, eranekācaḥ iti yaṇādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35804: liḍyṅoḥ iti vartate, samprasaraṇam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35805: liṭi yaṅi ca śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35809: tad atra yaṅi samprasāraṇam aprāptaṃ vibhāṣa vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35810: liṭi tu kiti yajāditvāt nityaṃ prāptaṃ, tatra sarvatravikalpo bhavati ity eṣā ubhayatravibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:35811: yadā ca dhātor na bhavati tadā liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17) ity abhyāsasya api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:35816: sanpare caṅpare ca ṇau parataḥ śvayater dhātoḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35819: samprasāraṇaṃ samprasāraṇāśrayaṃ ca balīyo bhavati iti vacanād antaraṅgam api vṛddhyādikaṃ samprasāraṇena bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35820: kṛte tu saṃprasāraṇe vṛddhir āvādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35822: ity etad vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau kṛtasthānivadbhāvasya, iti sthānivadbhāvāt śuśabdo dvirucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:35827: sanpare caṅpare ca nau parato hvaḥ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35830: saṃprasāraṇasya balīyastvāt śācchāsāhvāvyāvepāṃ yuk (*7,3.37) iti prāgeva yuk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35831: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāraṇam ity uktaṃ vibhāṣā ity asya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:35832: hvaḥ samprasāraṇam abhyastasya ity ekayogena siddhe pṛthagyogakaranam anabhyastanimittapratyayavyavadhāne samprasāraṇābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:35839: hvaḥ iti vartate, tad abhyastasya ity anena vyadhikaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:35842: tena abhyastakāraṇasya hvayatiḥ prāg eva dvirvacanāt samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35850: chandasi viṣaye hvayater dhātor bahulaṃ saṃprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35853: hveño laṭi ātmanepadottamaikavacane bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luki kṛte samprasāraṇamuvaṅādeśaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:35861: cāyater dhātoḥ chandasi viṣaye bahulaṃ kī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35870: apaspṛdhethām iti spardha saṅgharṣe ity asya laṅi āthāmi dvivarcanaṃ rephasya saṃprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35873: apara āha - spardheḥ apapūrvasya liṅi āthāmi samprasaraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35877: arca pūjāyām, arha pūjāyam ity anayor dhātvoliṭyusi samprasāraṇam akāralopaś ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35878: tato dvirvacanam, uradatvam, ata ādeḥ (*7,4.70) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:35885: cyuṅ gatau ity asya dhātoḥ liti seśabde abhyāsaya samprasāraṇam aniṭ ca nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35889: tyaja hānau ity asay dhātoḥ liṭi abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35893: śrīñ pāke ity etasya dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyāṃ śrābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35901: somād anyatra kvacid ekasminn api śrābhāvo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:35903: tasya śrātāḥ iti bahuvacanasya avivakṣitatvād upasaṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:35905: tasya+eva śrīṇāter āṅpūrvasya kvipi niṣṭhāyāṃ ca śīrādeśaḥ, niṣṭhāyāś ca natvābhāvo nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:35912: samprasārane parataḥ pūrvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35916: ekayogalakṣanam api samprasāraṇam ata eva vacanāt prathamaṃ parasya yaṇaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:35918: samprasāraṇam iti vartamāne punaḥ samprasāranagrahaṇaṃ videśasthasya api samprasāraṇasya pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:35921: samprasāraṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt eva pūrvasya pratiṣedhe vaktavye svarṇadīrghatvam ekādeśo na sthānivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35924: ṛci parataḥ treḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati uttarapadād ilopaś ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:35925: tisra ṛcaḥ yasmin tat tṛcaṃ sūktam /
GS24jvkasipu:35930: rayiśabdasya chandasi viṣaye matau parato bahulaṃ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35939: liṭi parato vayo yakārasya samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35943: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti || PS_6,1.39 ||
GS24jvkasipu:35945: asya vayo yakārasya kiti liṭi parato vakārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:35954: veñ tantusantāne ity asya dhātoḥ liti parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35956: kiti yajāditvāt dhātoḥ prāptam akityapi liṭy abhyāsasya+ubhayeṣām (*6,1.17)
GS24jvkasipu:35962: lyapi ca parto veñaḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35970: jyā vayohānau ity asya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35977: vyeñ saṃvaraṇe ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35984: lyapi ca vyaś ca iti anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:35985: parer uttarasya vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ lyapi parataḥ vibhāṣā samprasāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:35987: samprasāraṇe kṛte parapūrvatve ca hrasvasya iti tuka prāpnoti, sa halaḥ (*6,4.2)
GS24jvkasipu:35994: ejanto yo dhātur upadeśe tasya akārādeśo bhavati, śiti tu pratyaye na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36007: kathaṃ jagle, mamle ? na+evaṃ vijñāyate, śakāra id yasya so 'yaṃ śit iti, kiṃ tarhi, śa eva it śit /
GS24jvkasipu:36008: tatra yasmin vidhistadādāvalgrahaṇe iti śidādau pratyaye pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36011: tena etad āttvam anaimittikaṃ prāg eva pratyayotpatter bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:36014: iti kapratyayaḥ, suglānaḥ, sumlānaḥ iti āto yuc (*3,3.128)
GS24jvkasipu:36015: ity evam ādi siddham bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36020: vyeñ ity etasya dhātoḥ liṭi parata ākārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36029: sphura sphula calane ity etayor dhātvoḥ ecaḥ sthāne ghañi parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36033: viṣphālaḥ sphuratisphulatyor nir-ni-vibhyaḥ (*8,3.76) iti vā ṣatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:36038: iṅ adhyayane ji jaye ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36047: ṣidhu hiṃsāsamrādhyoḥ ity asya dhātoḥ apāralaukike 'rthe vartamānasya ecaḥ sthāne ṇau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36052: atra hi sidhyatiḥ pāralaukike jñānaviśeṣe vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:36053: tāpasaḥ sidhyati jñānaviśeṣamāsādayati, taṃ tapaḥ prayuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:36054: sa ca jñānaviśeṣaḥ utpannaḥ paraloke janmāntare phalam abhyudayalakṣaṇam upasaṃharan paralokaprayojano bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36055: iha kasmān na bhavati, annaṃ sādhayati brāhmanebhyo dāsyāmi iti ? sidhyate - ratrārtho niṣpattiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36057: tasya yad dānaṃ tat pāralaukikam, na punaḥ siddhir eva iti na ātvaṃ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36058: sakṣāt paralokaprayojane ca sidhyarthe kṛtavakāśaṃ vacanam evaṃ viṣayaṃ na avagāhate /
GS24jvkasipu:36059: sidhyateḥ iti śyanā nirdeśaḥ, ṣidha gatyām ity asya bhauvādikasya nivṛttyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36066: dīṅ kṣaye ity eteṣaṃ dhātūnāṃ lyapi viṣaye,
GS24jvkasipu:36067: cakārād ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva prāk pratyayotpatteḥ alo 'nyasya sthāne ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36080: upadeśe eva ātvavidhānād ivarṇāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36086: lyapi iti vartate, ādeca upadeśe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36089: tayoḥ ubhayoḥ api yakā nirdeśaḥ smaryate /
GS24jvkasipu:36090: līyater dhatoḥ lyapi ca ecaśca viṣaye upadeśe eva alo 'ntyasya sthāne vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36107: evaṃ ca pralambhanaśālīnīkaranayoś ca ṇau nityamāttvaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36115: khida dainye ity asya dhātoḥ ecaḥ sthāne chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36122: gurī udyamane ity asya dhātoḥ apapūrasya ṇamuli parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36126: asyapagāram yudhyante, asyapagoram yudhyante ity atra dvitīyāyāṃ ca (*3,4.56) iti ṇamul //
GS24jvkasipu:36130: ciñ sphura ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ ṇau parataḥ ecaḥ sthāne vibhāṣa ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36137: vī gatiprajanakāntyasanakhādaneṣu ity asya dhātoḥ prajane vartamānasya ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36138: purovāto gaḥ pravāpayati, purovāto gāḥ pravāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:36144: ṇau iti vartate, vibhāṣā iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36149: tatra vartamānasya ñibhī bhaye ity asya dhātoḥ ṇau parataḥ vibhāṣā ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36155: libhiyoḥ īkārapraśleṣanirdeśād īkārāntasya bhiyaḥ ṣuk vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36157: atra hi kuñcikāto bhayaṃ karaṇāt, na hetor devadattāt //
GS24jvkasipu:36161: ṇau iti vartate, hetubhaye iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36163: ṣmiṅ īṣaddhasane ity asya dhātoḥ hetubhaye 'rthe ṇau parato nityamakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36166: bhaye iti kim ? kuñcikayā enaṃ vismāpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:36168: na hi mukhye bhaye smayater vṛttir asti //
GS24jvkasipu:36173: sṛja visarge, dṛśir prekṣaṇe ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parataḥ am āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36183: sici vṛddhiḥ ami kṛte bhavati, pūrvaṃ tu bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36188: dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatprataye kāryavijñānād iha na bhavati, rajjusṛḍbhyām, devadṛgbhyām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:36192: upadeśe iti vartate, jñalyam akiti iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36193: upadeśe 'nudāttasya dhātoḥ ṛkāropadhasya jñalādāvakiti pratyaye parato 'nyatarasyām amāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36202: anudāttasya iti kim ? varḍhā, varḍhum, varḍhavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36203: vṛhū udyamane ity ayam udāttopadeśaḥ ūditvāccāsyeḍ vikalopyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36213: śīrṣan iti śabdāntaraṃ śiraḥśabdena samānārthaṃ chandasi viṣaye nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36216: śīrṣṇā hi tatra somaṃ krītaṃ haranti /
GS24jvkasipu:36224: sa katham ? taddhite iti hi paraṃ nimittam upādīyate, sa tadanurūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ śiraḥśabdam ākṣipati /
GS24jvkasipu:36225: yakārādau taddhite parataḥ śiraḥśabdasya śīrṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36231: taddhite iti kim ? śiraḥ icchati śirasyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36239: śjādau taddhite śirasaḥ śīrṣaśabdaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36243: śīrṣanbhāve hi an (*6,4.167) iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36244: hāstiśīrṣiśabdāt striyām iño 'ṇ-iñor anārṣayoḥ ṣyaṅādeśe kṛte śīrṣasya śiraḥśabdagrahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣannādeśaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:36245: tatra prakṛtibhāve sati hāstiśīrṣaṇyā ity aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36253_0: pāda danta nāsikā māsa hṛdaya niśā asṛj yūṣa doṣa yakṛt śakṛt udaka āsana ity eteṣāṃ
GS24jvkasipu:36253_1: śabdānāṃ sthāne śasprabhṛtipratyayeṣu parataḥ pad dat nas mās hṛd niś asan yūṣan
GS24jvkasipu:36253_2: doṣan yakan śakan udan āsan ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36257: dat - yā dato dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan /
GS24jvkasipu:36269: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti kim ? pādau te pratipīḍyau /
GS24jvkasipu:36273: tathā hi bhāṣāyām api padādayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36279: śasprabhṛtiṣu iti prakārārthe prabhṛtiśabda iti śalā doṣaṇī ity atra api doṣannādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36281: māṃsa pṛtanā sānu ity eteṣāṃ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam māṃs pṛt snu ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36286: na te divo na pṛthivyā adhisnuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:36290: nāsikāyā nasbhāvo vaktavyaḥ yat tas kṣudra ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36300: dhātor ādeḥ ṣakārasya sthāne sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36310: ādeśa pratyayayoḥ (*8,3.59) ity atra ṣatvavyavasthārtham ṣādayo dhātavaḥ kecid upadiṣṭāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36311: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36321: tena teṣṭhīvyate, ṭeṣṭhīvyate iti ca abhyāsarūpaṃ dvidhā bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:36326: dhātor āder ṇakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36331: subdhātor ayam api neṣyate, ṇakāram icchati ṇakārīyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36333: ity atra ṇatvavidher vyavasthārthaṃ ṇādayo dhātvaḥ kecid upadiṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36334: ke punas te ? ye tathā paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36335: athavā lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate, sarve ṇādayo ṇopadeśāḥ, nṛtīnandinardinakkanāṭināthṛnādhṛvarjam //
GS24jvkasipu:36339: dhatoḥ iti prakṛtaṃ yat tad dhātvādeḥ iti punar dhātugrahaṇān nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:36340: tena dhātor adhātośca vakārayakārayoḥ vali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36350: uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti bahulavacanāc ccḥ-voḥ ś-ūḍ-anunāsike ca (*6,4.19) iti ūṭḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36353: ūrvaṃ lopagrahaṇaṃ kim ? verapṛktalopāt pūrvaṃ vali lopo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36356: vraścādīnām upadeśasāmarthyāt vali lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36358: vavṛśca ity atra api hi samprasāraṇahalādiḥśeṣayor bahiraṅgatvāt prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:36364: veḥ iti kvibādayo viśeṣān anubandhān utsṛjya sāmānyena gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:36376: apṛktasya iti kim ? vṛdṛbhyāṃ kvin darviḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36383: tad iha laukikena arthavat karmasādhanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36385: halantād, ṅyantād ābantāc ca dīrghāt paraṃ su ti si ity etad apṛktaṃ hal lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36398: bhṛño laṅi tipi ślau bhṛñāmit ity abhyāsasya ittvam /
GS24jvkasipu:36407: tipā sahacaritasya siśabdasya grahaṇāt sico grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:36412: atha kimarthaṃ halantāt sutisināṃ lopo vidhīyate, saṃyogāntalopena+eva siddham ? na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36413: rājā, takṣā ity atra saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36414: ukhāsrat, parṇadhvat ity atra apadantatvād dattvaṃ ca na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36415: abhino 'tra ity atra ato roraplutādaplute (*6,1.113) ity uttvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36416: abibhar bhavān ity atra tu rāt sasya (*8,3.24) iti niyamāl lopa eva na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36417: saṃyogāntasya lope hi nalopādir na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36418: rāttu te na+eva lopaḥ syād dhalas tasmād vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36422: lopaḥ iti vartate, hal iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36423: apṛktam iti na adhikriyate, tathā ca pūrvasūtre punar apṛktagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:36424: eṅantāt prātipadikāt hrasvantāc ca paro hal lupyate sa cet sambuddher bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36432: ami pūrvaḥ (*6,1.107) iti pūrvatve krte lahmātrasya makārasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36433: he katarat ity atra ḍidayam adḍādeśaḥ, tatra ṭilope sati hrasvābhāvān na asti sambuddhilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36439: śi ity etasya bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36447: piti kṛti parato hrasvāntasya dhātoḥ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36459: grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam ity atra hrasvasya bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvāt tug na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:36463: adhikāro 'yam anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:36464: prāg etasmat sūtrād ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36473: chakāre parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hrasvasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36476: hrasva eva atra āgamī, na tu tadantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36478: cicchiduḥ ity atra tuk abhyāsasya grahaṇena na gṛhyate iti haladiḥśeṣeṇa na nivartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36483: tuk iti anuvartate, che iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36485: māṅaś ca pratiṣedhavacanasya chakāre paratastugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36486: padāntād vā (*6,1.76) iti vikalpe prāpte nityaṃ tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36499: dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36508: padāntād dīrghāt paro yaḥ chakāraḥ tasmin pūrvasya tasya+eva dīrghasya pūrveṇa nityaṃ prāpto vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36511: viśvajanādīnāṃ chadasi vā tugāgamo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36526: aci iti ca ayam adhikāraḥ saṃprasāraṇāc ca (*6,1.108) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:36530: ecaḥ sthāne aci parataḥ ay av āy āv ity ete ādeśāḥ yathāsaṅkhyam bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:36541: yo 'yam ecaḥ syāne vantādeśaḥ okārasya av, aukārasya āv, sa yakārādau pratyaye parato bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36547: vāntaḥ iti kim ? rāyam icchati raiyati /
GS24jvkasipu:36554: gośabdasya yūtau parataḥ chandasi visaye vāntādeśo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36563: ecaḥ iti vartate, vānto yi pratyaye iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36565: tasya yakārādau pratyaye parato vāntādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36570: dhātoḥ iti kim ? prātipadikasya niyamo ma bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:36571: tatra ko doṣaḥ ? bābhravyaḥ ity atraa+eva syāt, iha na syāt gavyam, nāvyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36572: tannimittasya iti kim ? atannimittasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:36580: tannimittāvadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti tānimittasya hi dhātoś ca adhātoś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36587: kṣi ji ity etayor dhātvoḥ yati ratyaye parataḥ śakyārthe gamyamāne ekārasya ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36595: krīṇāteḥ dhātoḥ tadarthe krayārtheṃ yat tasminn abhidheye yati pratyaye parataḥ ayādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36599: tadarthe iti kim ? kreyaṃ no dhānyaṃ, na ca asti krayyam //
GS24jvkasipu:36603: bibheter dhātoḥ rapurvasya ca vī ity etasy yati pratyaye parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ayādeśaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36606: bhayyeti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam (*3,3.113) ity apadāne yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36613: hrade bhavā, bhave chandasi (*4,4.110) iti yat pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:36620: iti prāg etasmāt sūtrāt iti uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvasya parasya dvayor api sthāne ekādeśo bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36622: tatra aci pūrvasya avarṇāt ca parasya sthāne eko guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36626: nobhe saptamīpañcamyau yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36627: ekagrahaṇam pṛthagādeśanivṛttyarthaṃ, sthānibhedād dhi bhinnādiṣu natvavad dvāvādeśau syātām //
GS24jvkasipu:36631: ekaḥ iti vartate, pūrvaparayoḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36633: iti yo 'yam ekādeśo vidhīyate sa pūrvasya antavad bhavati, parasyādivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36634: yathā tasyāntaḥ ādir vā tadantarbhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36636: brahmabandhūḥ ity atra brahmabandhu iti prātipadikam,
GS24jvkasipu:36638: tayoḥ prātipadikāprātipadikayor yaḥ ekādeśaḥ sa prātipadikasya antavad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36642: tayoḥ subasupor ekādeśaḥ supaḥ ādivad bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36643: yathā śakyate vaktuṃ subantaṃ padam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36645: tathā hi khaṭvābhiḥ ity atra antavadbhāvābhāvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,1.9) iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36646: hvayateḥ juhāva iti samprasāraṇapūrvatvasya ādivadbhāvāhāvāt āta au ṇalaḥ (*7,
GS24jvkasipu:36648: asyai aśvaḥ, asyā aśvaḥ iti vṛddhir eci (*6,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:36650: ity atra vidhau ādivan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36651: pūrvaparasamudāya ekādeśasya sthānī, sa hi tena nivartayate /
GS24jvkasipu:36652: tatra avayavayor ānumānikaṃ sthānitvam iti tadāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ sthānivadbhāvād aprāptam ity antādivadbhāvo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36656: ṣatve tuki ca kartavye ekadeśo 'siddho bhavati, siddhakāryaṃ na karoti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36659: iti ekādeśasya paraṃ pratyādivadbhāvāt apadāder iṇa uttarasya ādeśasya sakārasya ṣatvaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:36661: ko 'sya, yo 'sya, ko 'smai, yo 'smai ity ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt iṇaḥ iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36663: preta ity atra+ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,
GS24jvkasipu:36671: ādguṇasya asiddhatvād hrasvalakṣaṇo nityo 'tra tuk prāpnoti, dīrghāt, padāntād vā (*6,1.76)
GS24jvkasipu:36677: avarnāt paro yo 'c ca pūrvo yo 'varṇaḥ tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne eko guṇa ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36689: lṛkārasya sthāne yo 'ne yo 'ṇ tasya lapratvam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36696: tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ avarṇaicoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36709: vṛddhir eci iti vartate, āt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36710: tad etat ejgrahaṇam eter eva viśeṣaṇaṃ , na punar edhateḥ, avyabhicārāt, ūṭhaś ca sambhavāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36711: iṇ gatau ity etasmin dhātau eci,
GS24jvkasipu:36712: edha vṛddhau ity etasmin ūṭhi ca pūrvaṃ yad avarṇaṃ tataś ca paro yo 'c,
GS24jvkasipu:36713: tayoḥ pūrvaparyoḥ avarṇācoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36725: ity etat tu pararūpaṃ na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:36726: yena na aprāpte yo vidhir ārabhyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati iti,
GS24jvkasipu:36727: purastād apavādā anantarān vidhīn badhante iti vā /
GS24jvkasipu:36728: tena+iha na bhavati, upa ā itaḥ upetaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36744: ṛtaḥ iti kim ? sukhena itaḥ sukhetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36760: āṭaḥ paro yo ac, aci ca pūrvo ya āṭ, tayoḥ pūrvaparayoḥ āḍacoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36767: cakāro 'dhikavidhānārthaḥ, usi om-āṅoś ca (*6,1.95) iti pararūpabādhanārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36775: avarṇāntād upasargāt ṛkārādau dhātau parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36782: pragatā ṛ cchakā asmād deśāt prarcchako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36783: yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñakāḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36784: ṛti iti kim ? upa itaḥ upetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36787: upasargagrahaṇād eva dhātugrahaṇe siddhe dhātugrahaṇaṃ śākalanivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:36788: ṛtyakaḥ (*6,1.128) iti hi śākalyasya prakrtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:36792: āt ity eva, upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36793: subantāvayave dhātau ṛkārādau parataḥ avarṇāntāt upasargāt pūrvaparayoḥ āpiśaler ācāryasya matena vā vṛddhir ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36796: ṛkāralṛkārayoḥ sāvarṇyavidhiḥ iti ṛti iti lṛkāro 'pi gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:36797: āpiśaligrahaṇaṃ pūjartham, vā iti hy ucyate eva //
GS24jvkasipu:36802: otaḥ ami śasi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36809: tena nāprāptāyāṃ vṛddhau ayam ākāro vidhīyamānastāṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:36810: am iti dvitīyaikavacanaṃ gṛhyate, śasā sāhacaryāt, supi iti cādhikārāt /
GS24jvkasipu:36811: tena acinavam, asunavam ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:36815: āt ity eva, upasargād dhātau iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:36816: avarṇāntāt upasargāt eṅādau dhātau pūrvaparayoḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36822: kecit vā supyāpiśaleḥ (*6,1.92) ity anuvartyanti, tac ca vākyabhedena subdhātau vikalpaṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:36834: aniyoge iti kim ? ihaia bhava, mā anyatra gāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36838: samāse iti kim ? tiṣṭha devadattauṣṭhaṃ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:36847: avarṇāntāt omi āṅi ca parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36848: kā om ity avocat, kom ity avocat /
