GS24jvkasipu:36850: āgi khalv api - ā ūḍhā oḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:36855: iha tu ā ṛśyāt arśyāt, adya arśyāt adyarśyāt iti akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:36860: avarṇāt apadāntāt usi pūrvaparayoḥ ādguṇāpavādaḥ pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36865: apadāntāt iti kim ? kā usrā kosrā /
GS24jvkasipu:36873: akārāt apadantāt guṇe parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthane pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36877: pace, yaje ity atra vṛddhir eci iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:36888: tadanukaraṇaṃ parisphuṭavarṇam eva kenacit sādṛśyena tadavyaktam anukaroti,
GS24jvkasipu:36889: tasya yo atśabdaḥ tasmāt itau pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pararūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36894: avyaktānukaraṇasya iti kim ? jagat iti jagaditi /
GS24jvkasipu:36895: ataḥ iti kim ? maraṭ iti maraḍiti /
GS24jvkasipu:36896: itau iti kim ? paṭat atra paṭadatra /
GS24jvkasipu:36898: iha mā bhūt, śrat iti śraditi /
GS24jvkasipu:36899: katham ghaṭaditi gambhīramambudairnaditam iti ? dakārāntam etad anukaraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:36902: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā || PS_6,1.99 ||
GS24jvkasipu:36904: avyaktānukaraṇasya āmreḍitasya yo atśabdaḥ itau tasya pararūpaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:36908: yadā tu samudāyānukaraṇaṃ tadā bhavaty eva pūrveṇa pararūpam, paṭatpaṭeti karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:36912: avyaktānukaraṇasya, ataḥ, antyasya iti ca anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:36913: ḍācparaṃ yad amreditaṃ tasmin pūrvasya avyaktānukaranasya acchabdasya yo 'ntyaḥ takāraḥ tasya pūrvasya parasya cādyasya varṇasya nityaṃ pararūpam ekadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36916: paṭad ity asmāt avyaktānukaraṇāt iti ḍāci vihite ḍāci bahulam iti dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:36921: akaḥ savarṇe aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne dīrgha ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36930: ity atra yat ac iti pratyāhāragrahaṇaṃ tatra grahaṇakaśāstrasya anabhinirvṛttatvāt savarṇā na gṛhyanta iti savarnatvamīkāraśakārayor apratiṣiddham /
GS24jvkasipu:36932: ṛti savarṇe parabhūte tatra ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36934: yadā na ṛ tadā dīrgha eva hotṝkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:36936: lṭti savarṇe parato lṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:36940: dīrghapakṣe tu samudāyāntaratamasya lṛvarṇasya dīrghasya abhāvāt ṛkāraḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:36945: prathamāśabdo vibhaktiviśeṣe rūḍhaḥ, tatsāhacaryād dvitīyā 'pi prathamā iti uktā /
GS24jvkasipu:36946: tasyāṃ prathamāyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ ca vibhaktau aci akaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36954: iti yadakāre pararūpaṃ tat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvam eva bādhate,
GS24jvkasipu:36956: purastād apavāda anantarān vidhīn bādhante na+uttarāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36960: pūrvasavarnagrahaṇaṃ kim ? agnī ity atra pakṣe parasavarṇo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:36966: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt uttarasya śaso 'vayavasya sakārasya puṃsi nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:36978: iha tu cañceva cañcā, lummanuṣye iti kano lupi kṛte lupi yuktavad vyaktivacane (*1,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:36979: iti puṃso 'pi strīliṅgata, tena natvaṃ na bhavati, cañcāḥ paśya, vadhrikāḥ paśya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:36980: tasmāt iti kim ? etāṃścarato gāḥ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:36999: dīrghāt jasi ici ca parataḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37007: dīrghāt chandasi viṣaye jasi ca ici ca parato vā pūrvasavarnadīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37018: ami paratoṭakaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarupam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37024: pūrva eva yathā syāt, pūrvasavarṇo 'ntaratamo mā bhūt iti, kumārīm ity atra hi trimātraḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37025: vā chandasi (*6,1.106) ity eva, śamīṃ ca, śamyaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37032: samprasāraṇāt aci parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37036: samprasaraṇavidhānasāmarthyāt vigṛhītasya śravaṇe prāpte pūrvatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37037: vā chandasi (*6,1.106) ity eva, mitro no atra varuṇo yajyamānaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37038: parapūrvatvavidhāne satyarthavat samprasāraṇavidhānam iti iṣṭa ity evam ādiṣu pūrvatvabhāve yaṇādeśo bhavatyeva /
GS24jvkasipu:37039: antaraṅge ca aci iṛtārthaṃ vacanam iti bāhye paścāt sannipatite pūrvatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37045: eṅ yaḥ padāntaḥ tasmād ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37063: eṅaḥ iti vartate, ati iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37064: eṅaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ sthāne pūrvarūpam ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37074: ṛkārāntād uttarayoḥ ṅsiṅasoḥ ati parataḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ukāra ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37077: dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ sthāne yaḥ sa labhate 'nyataravyapadeśaṃ iti uraṇ raparaḥ (*1,1.51)
GS24jvkasipu:37078: iti raparatvam atra kṛtvā rāt sasya (*8,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:37083: ṅasiṅasoḥ iti vartate, ut iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37084: khyatyāt iti khiśabdakhīśabdayoḥ tiśabdatīśabdayoś ca kṛtayaṇādeśayor idaṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GS24jvkasipu:37085: tābhyāṃ parasya ṅasiṅasoḥ ata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37090: khīśabdasya+udāharaṇam - saha khena vartate iti sakhaḥ, tam icchati iti kyac sakhīyati /
GS24jvkasipu:37091: sakha yateḥ kvip sakhīḥ, tasya ṅasiṅasoḥ sakhyuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37093: tīśabdasya api - lūnam icchati lūnīyati, lūnīyateḥ kvipi lupte, lūnyur āgcchati /
GS24jvkasipu:37096: vikṛtanirdeśād eva iha na bhavati, atisakher āgacchati, senāpater āgacchati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37097: sakhiśabdasya kevalasya ghisañjñā pratiṣidhyate, na tadantasya //
GS24jvkasipu:37102: akārād aplutād uttarasya ro rephasya ukārānubandhaviśiṣṭasya akāre 'plute parata ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37105: bho-bhago-agho-apūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) ity asmin prāpte utvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37106: rutvam api āśrayāt pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1) iti asiddhaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37112: tasya api taparatvād atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37115: aplute iti kim ? tiṣṭhatu paya a3cśvin /
GS24jvkasipu:37116: atra plutasya asiddhatvāt utvaṃ prāpnoti iti aplutād aplute iti ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:37120: haśi ca parataḥ ata uttarasya rorukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37128: eṅaḥ iti yat pañcamyantam anuvartate, tadarthād iha prathamāntaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37130: antar iti avyayam adhikaranabhūtaṃ madhyam ācaṣṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:37131: pādaśabdena ca ṛkpādasya+eva grahaṇam iṣyate, na tu ślokapadasya /
GS24jvkasipu:37132: avakārayakārapare ati parataḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37133: svabhāvena avatiṣṭhate kāraṇātmanā vā bhavati, na vikāram āpadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37146: kecid idaṃ sūtraṃ na antaḥpādam avyapare iti paṭhanti,
GS24jvkasipu:37147: te saṃhitāyām iha yad ucyate tasya sarvasya pratiṣedhaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:37152: avyāt avadyāt avakramuḥ avrata ayam avantu avasyu ity eteṣu vakāra-yakārapare 'py ati parataḥ antaḥpādam eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37163: uraḥśabdaḥ eṅantaḥ yajuṣi viṣaye ati rakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37167: te idam udāharanti uro antarikṣaṃ sajūḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37173: āpo juṣāṇo vṛṣṇo varṣiṣṭhe ity ete śabdāḥ ambe ambāle ity etau ca yāvambike śabdāt pūrvau yajuṣi paṭhitau te ati parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37179: asmād eva nipātanāt ambārthanadyor hrasvaḥ (*7,6.107) iti hrasvatvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37183: aṅgaśabde ya eṅ tadādau cākāre yaḥ pūrvaḥ sa yajusi viṣaye ati prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37191: anudātte ca ati kavargadhakārapare parato yajusi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37196: kudhapare iti kim ? so 'yam agniḥ sahasriyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37203: avapathāḥśabde 'nudātte akārādau parato yajuṣi viṣaye eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37205: vaper laṅi thāsi tiṅṅ-atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighātena anudāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:37211: sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca ati parato goḥ eṅ prakṛtyā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:37213: chandasi - apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvān //
GS24jvkasipu:37218: aci ity etat tv anuvartata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37219: aci parataḥ goḥ sphoṭāyanasya ācāryasya matena avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37224: ādyudāttaś ca ayam ādeśo nipātyate, sa nipātanasvaro bahuvrīhau prakṛtisvaravidhāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37227: sphoṭāyanagrahaṇaṃ pūjārthaṃ, vibhāṣā ity eva hi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37228: vyavasthitavibhāṣā iyaṃ, tena gavākṣaḥ ity atra nityam avaṅ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37232: indraśabdasthe aci parato gornityam avaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37238: plutāś ca pragṛhyāś ca aci prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37246: aci ity anuvartamāne punar ajgrahaṇam ādeśanimittasya aciḥ parigrahārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:37247: tena+iha na bhavati, jānu u asya rujati jānvasya rujati /
GS24jvkasipu:37248: pragṛhyād ukārāt parasya akārasya savarṇadīrghatvaṃ pratyanimittatvād atra prakṛtibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37250: plutapragṛhyāṇāṃ nityam ayam eva prakṛtibhāvo yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:37257: āṅo 'ci parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ chandasi viṣaye 'nunāsikādeśo bhavati, sa ca prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37260: kecid āṅo 'nunāsikaś chandasi bahulam ity adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37266: iko 'savarne aci parataḥ śākalyasya ācāryasya matena prakṛtyā bhavanti,
GS24jvkasipu:37267: hrasvaś ca tasya ikaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37276: ārambhasāmarthyād eva hi yaṇādeśena saha vikalpaḥ siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37288: śākalyasya hrasvaś ca ity etad anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37289: ṛkāre parataḥ śāklyasya ācāryasya matena akaḥ prakṛtyā bhavanti hrasvaś ca tasyakaḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37301: upasthitaṃ nāma anārṣaḥ atikaraṇaḥ, samudāyād avacchidya padaṃ yena svarūpe 'vasthāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37306: vatkaraṇaṃ kim ? apluta iti ucyamāne pluta eva pratiṣidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37307: tatra ko doṣaḥ ? pragṛhyāśraye prakṛtibhāve plutasya śravaṇaṃ na syāt, agnī3 iti, vāyū3 iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37312: ī3kāraḥ pluto 'ci parataḥ cākravarmaṇasya ācāryasya matena plutavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37313: astu hītyabrūtām, astu hī3 ity abrūtām /
GS24jvkasipu:37317: tadupasthite nivṛttyartham anupasthite prāptyartham ity ubhayatravibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37318: īkārād anyatra apy ayam aplutavadbhāva iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37323: eṅaḥ padāntād ati (*6,1.109) ity ataḥ padagrahaṇam anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:37324: divaḥ iti prātipadikaṃ gṛhyate, na dhātuḥ, sānubandhakatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37331: niranubandhakagrahaṇād iha na bhavati, akṣadyūbhyām, akṣadyūbhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37332: taparakaranam ūṭho nivṛttyartham, dyubhyām, dyubhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37339: etattadau yāvakakārau nañsamāse na vartate tayor yaḥ suśabdaḥ, kaś ca tayoḥ suśabdaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:37340: yaḥ tadarthena sambaddhaḥ, tasya saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye hali parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37350: tanmadhyapatitastadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti rūpabhede 'pi sākackāvetattadāv eva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37353: uttarapadārthapradhānatvānnañsamāsasya etattador eva atra sambaddhaḥ suśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37358: sya ity etasya chandasi hali parataḥ bahulaṃ sorlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37359: uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyāṃ baddho api kakṣa āsani /
GS24jvkasipu:37360: eṣa sya te pavata indra somaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37361: na ca bhavati, yatra syo nipatet //
GS24jvkasipu:37366: saḥ ity etasya aci parataḥ sulopo bhavati, lope sati cet pādaḥ pūryate /
GS24jvkasipu:37369: lope cet pādapūraṇam iti kim ? sa iva vyāghro bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:37371: pādagrahaṇena atra ślokapādasya api grahaṇaṃ kecid icchanti, tena+idaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37372: saiṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ saiṣa rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37373: saiṣa karṇo mahātyāgī saiṣā bhīmo mahābalaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:37377: adhikāro 'yam pāraskaraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca sañjñāyām (*6,1.175) iti yāvat /
GS24jvkasipu:37378: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmastatra suṭ iti , kāt pūrvaḥ iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37384: tathā hi saṃskṛṣīṣṭa, saṃskriyate iti saṃyogādilakṣaṇau iḍguṇau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37386: iti nighāto 'pi tarhi na prāpnoti, suṭā vyavahitatvāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:37387: svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti vacanān na asti vyavadhānam saṃcaskaratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37390: saṃyogopadhagrahaṇaṃ ca ṛtaśca saṃyogāder guṇaḥ (*7,4.10) ity atra kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37395: aḍvyavāye, abhyāsavyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37401: pūrvam dhātur upasargeṇa yujyate iti tatra dhātūpasargayoḥ karyam antaraṅgam iti pūrvaṃ suṭ kriyate paścād aṅabhyāsau ?
GS24jvkasipu:37402: abhaktaś ca suṭ ity uktam, tataḥ sakārād uttarāvaḍabhyāsau aniṣṭe deśe syātām /
GS24jvkasipu:37403: etasmiṃs tu satyata eva vacanāt kṛtayor aḍabhyāsayoḥ tadvyavāye api suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ kriyate iti siddham iṣṭaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37407: sam pari upa ity etebhyaḥ bhuṣaṇārthe karotau parataḥ suṭ kāt pūrvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37411: atra saṃpuṃkānāṃ satvam iti samo makārasya sakāraḥ, pūrvasya cākārasya anunāsikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37420: sampūrvasya kvacid abhūṣaṇe 'pi suḍiṣyate, saṃskṛtamannam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37425: samavāyaḥ samudāyaḥ, tasmiṃś cārthe karotau samparyupebhyaḥ kāt pūrvaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37433: sato guṇāntarādhānamādhikyāya vṛddhasya vā tādavasthyāya samīhā pratiyatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37437: eteṣv artheṣu gamyamānesu karotau dhātau parataḥ upāt suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37449: upād uttarasmin kiratau dhātau lavanaviṣaye sut kat pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37459: upāt prateś ca uttarasmin kiratau suṭ kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati hiṃsayāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37462: tathā te vṛṣala vikṣepo bhūyāt yathā hiṃsāmanubadhnāti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37469: apāt uttarasmin kiratau catuṣpācchakuniṣu yadālekhanaṃ tasmin visaye sut kāt pūrvaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37477: iha mā bhūt, apakirati śvā odanapiṇḍamāśitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37482: kustumburūṇi iti suṭ nipātyate jātiś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37485: jātiḥ iti kim ? kutsitāni tumburūṇi kutumburūṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:37486: tumburuśabdena tindukīphalāny ucyante, samāsena teṣāṃ kutsā //
GS24jvkasipu:37490: aparāsparā iti suṭ nipātyate kriyāsātatye gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:37493: kriyāsātatye iti kim ? aparaparāḥ sārthāḥ gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37494: apare ca pare ca sakṛdeva gacchanti ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37496: kim idaṃ sātatyam iti ? satatasya bhāvaḥ sātatyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37497: kathaṃ satatam ? samastate vikalpena makāralopo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37503: goṣpadam iti suṭ nipātyate, tasya ca ṣatvaṃ sevite asevite pramāne ca viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37505: gāvaḥ padyante yasmin deśe sa gobhiḥ sevito deśo goṣpadaḥ ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37507: asevite goṣpadaśabdo na sambhavati ity agoṣpadaśabdārthaṃ nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:37508: yady evaṃ na artha etena, goṣpadapratiṣedhād agoṣpadaṃ bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:37510: yatra tu sevitaprasaṅgo 'sti tatra+eva syād agoṣpadam iti,
GS24jvkasipu:37511: yatra tvatyantāsambhava eva tatra na syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:37514: yāni hi mahāntyaraṇāni yeṣu gavām atyantāsambhavas tāny evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37520: sevitāsevitapramāṇesu iti kim ? goḥ padam gopadam //
GS24jvkasipu:37525: ātmayāpanāya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā, tasyām āspadam iti suṭ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37527: pratiṣthāyām iti kim ? ā padāt āpadam //
GS24jvkasipu:37531: anityatayā viṣayabhūtayā adbhutatvam iha upalakṣyate, tasminn ācaryaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37532: carerāṅi cāgurau iti yatpratyaye kṛte nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:37536: anitye iti kim ? ācaryaṃ karma śobhanam //
GS24jvkasipu:37540: kutsitaṃ varcaḥ varcaskam annamalam, tasminn abhidheye 'vaskaraḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37541: avapūrvasya kirateḥ karmaṇi ṛdorap (*3,3.57) ityap, nipātanāp suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:37542: avakīryate ity avaskaro 'nnamalam, tatsambandhāt deśo 'pi tathā+ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37547: apaskaraḥ iti nipātyate rathāṅgaṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37548: apapūrvāt kirateḥ ṛdorap (*6,6.57) ityap, nipātanāt suṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:37554: viṣkiraḥ iti kirateḥ vipūrvasya ig-upadha-jñā-prī-kiraḥ kaḥ (*3,1.135)
GS24jvkasipu:37555: iti kapratyaye vihite suṭ nipātyate śukuniś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37558: viṣkiro vā śakunau iti va grahaṇād eva suḍvikalpe siddhe vikiragrahaṇam iha tasya api śakuner anyatra prayogo ma bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:37562: candraśabde uttarapade hrasvāt paraḥ suḍāgamo bhavati mantravisaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37566: uttarapadaṃ samāsa eva bhavati iti prasiddham, tata iha na bhavati, śukramasi, candramasi //
GS24jvkasipu:37571: kaśa gatiśāsanayoḥ ity etasya dhātoḥ pratipūrvasya pacādyaci kṛte suṭ nipātyate, tasya+eva ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:37572: grāmamadya pravekṣyāmi bhava me tvaṃ pratiṣkaśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37573: vārtāpuruṣaḥ, sahāyaḥ, puroyāyī vā pratiṣkaśaḥ ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37576: atra yady api kaśer eva kaśāśabdaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37577: tathā api kaśer iti dhātor upādānaṃ tadupasargasya prateḥ pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:37582: praskaṇva hariścandra iti suṭ nipātyate ṛṣī ced abhidheyau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37591: maskara maskarin ity etau yathāsaṅkhyaṃ veṇau parivrājake ca nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:37599: kecit punar atra māṅi upapade karoteḥ karaṇe 'cpratyayam api nipātayantik māṅś ca hrasvatvam suṭ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37600: mā kriyate yena pratiṣidhyate sa maskaro veṇuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37601: veṇugrahaṇaṃ ca pradarśanārtham anyatra api bhavati, maskaro daṇḍaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37602: parivrājake api māṅi upapade karotestācchīlye inirnipātyate, māṅo hrasvatvaṃ suṭ ca tathā+eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37604: sa hy evam āha - mā kuruta karmāṇi śāntirvaḥ śreyasī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37608: kāstīra ajastunda ity etau śabdau nipātyete nagare 'bhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:37609: īṣattīramasya, ajasyeva tundamasya iti vyutpattireva kriyate, nagaraṃ tu vācyam etayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37617: kāraskara iti suṭ nipātyate vrkṣaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37618: kāraṃ karoti iti divāvibhāniśāprabhābhāskarānta iti ṭapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37621: kecid idaṃ nādhīyate, pāraskaraprabhṛtiṣveva kāraskaro vṛkṣaḥ iti paṭhanti //
GS24jvkasipu:37626: pāraskaraprabhṛtīni ca śabdarūpāṇi nipātyante sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37637: sañjñāgrahaṇād upādhiparigrahe siddhe gaṇe coradevatāgrahaṇaṃ prapañcārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:37639: tumpatau dhātau praśabdāt paraḥ suṭ bhavati gavi kartari /
GS24jvkasipu:37646: yad uktaṃ prāyasya citicittayoḥ suḍaskāro vā iti tat saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37651: yatra anyaḥ svaraḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā vidhīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:37652: tatra anudāttaṃ padam ekaṃ varjayitvā bhavati ity etad upasthitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37654: kaḥ punar eko varjyate ? yasya asau svaro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37658: dhātor antyam acaṃ varjayitvā pariśiṣṭam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37674: vikārasya - asthani, dadhani ity anaṅsvaraḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:37682: yo hi yasmin sati śiṣyate sa tasya bādhako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37683: tathā hi - gopāyati ity atra dhātusvarāpavādaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37684: tena+eva dhātusvareṇa pratyayāntasya dhātoḥ satiśiṣṭatvād bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37685: kārṣṇottarāsaṅgaputraḥ ity atra ca samāsasvarāpavādo bahuvrihisvaraḥ satiśiṣṭena samāsāntodāttatvena vādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37686: vikaraṇasvaras tu satiśiṣṭo 'pi sārvadhātukasvaraṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:37687: lunītaḥ iti tasa eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37689: atisraḥ ity atra tisṛbhyo jasaḥ (*6,1.166) iti satiśiṣṭo 'pi vibhaktisvaro nañsvareṇa bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37691: vibhaktinimittasvarāc ca nañsvaro balīyān iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:37693: yasya vibhaktir nimittamāmaḥ, tasya yad udāttatvaṃ tanaprasvareṇa bādyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37694: padagrahanaṃ kim ? devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti vākye hi pratipadaṃ svaraḥpṛthag bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37695: parimāṇārthaṃ ca+idaṃ padagrahaṇam padādhikārasya nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:37696: tena prāg eva padavyapadeśāt svaravidhisamakālem eva śiṣṭasya anudāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37697: tathā ca kuvalyā vikāraḥ kauvalam ity atra anudāttādilakṣaṇo 'ñ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37698: tathā garbhiṇīśabdaś ca anudāttādilakṣaṇasya año bādhanarthaṃ bhikṣādiṣu paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37703: karṣater dhātor ākāravataś ca ghañantasyānta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37712: taudādikasya ghañantasya karṣaḥ ity ādyudāttaḥ eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:37716: uccha ity evam ādīnām anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37717: uñchaḥ, mlecchaḥ, jañjaḥ, jalpaḥ ete ghañantāḥ iti ñitsvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37718: japaḥ, vyadhaḥ ity abantau, tayor dhātusvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37721: yujer ghañantasya nipātanād aguṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣaye ca nipātanam idam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37722: kālaviśeṣe rathādyupakaraṇe ca yugaśabdasya prayogaḥ anyatra hi yogaḥ eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37728: halaś ca (*3,3.121) iti ghañantā ete karaṇo 'ntodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37743: kecit tu bhāvagarhāyām ity atra api anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:37745: bhakṣirṇyanto 'pi ghañanta eva, erac (*3,3.56) aṇyantānām iti vacanāt //
GS24jvkasipu:37751: yasminn anudātte parataḥ udātto lupyate tasya anudāttasyādirudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37753: kumāraśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasya ṅīpy anudāte udātto lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37766: anudāttasya iti kim ? prāsaṅgaṃ vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37768: tasya yati titsvaritam iti svarite udātto lupyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:37769: na+etad asti, svarite hi vidhīyamāne pariśiṣṭam anudāttam, tat kuta udāttalopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37771: antaḥ iti hi prakṛtatvād antasya syāt, mā hi dhukṣātām, mā hi dhukṣāthām /
GS24jvkasipu:37772: yatra iti kim ? bhargavaḥ, bhārgavau, bhṛgavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37794: citi pratyaye prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya anta udātta iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37804: kim artham idam ? param api ñitsvaraṃ bādhitvā 'ntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37820: udātta-svaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37823: iti vidhānāt jas eva labhyate iti jasgrahaṇam upasamastārtham eke icchanti atitistrau ity atra svaro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37829: catasrādeśe ādyudāttanipātanād yaṇādeśasya ca pūrvavidhau sthānivattvād ayaṃ svaro na bhavati catasraḥ paśya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37834: tatra sau ya ekāc tasmat parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37851: saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇād iha na bhavati tvayā, tvayi iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37855: ekācaḥ iti vartate, tṛtīyādir vibhaktir iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:37856: nityaśabdaḥ svaryate, tena nityādhikāravihitaḥ samāsaḥ paryudasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37857: nityasamāsād anyatrānityasamāse yad uttarapadam antodāttam ekācca tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir anyatarasyām udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37862: yadā vibhaktir udāttā na bhavati, tadā samāsāntodāttatvam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:37867: tatra tatpuruṣe tulyārtha-tṛtīyā-saptamy-upamāna. avyayaya (*6,-2.2.) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37868: uttarapadagrahaṇam ekāctvena+uttarapadaṃ viśeṣayitum, anyathā hi samāsaviśeṣaṇam etat syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37869: tatra śunaḥ ūrka, śvorjā ity atra+eva ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:37872: somasutā upapadam atiṅ (*2,2.19) ity ayaṃ nityādhikāre samāso vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37873: tatra gatikāraka-upapadāt kṛt (*6,2.139) ity uttarapadaprakṛtisvarena citśabdaḥ udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:37874: yas tu vigrahābhāvena nityasamāsas tatra bhavaty eva vikalpaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37882: añceḥ parā asarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:37885: tṛtīyādiḥ iti vartamānen śaso 'pi parigrahārtham asarvanāmasthānagrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:37886: iha api yathā syāt, pratīco bāhūn pratibhaṅgdhyeṣām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:37890: ūṭḥ idam padādi ap pum rai div ity etebhyo 'sarvanāmasthānavibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37898: antodāttāt ity adhikārād anvādeśe na bhavati, atho ābhyāṃ nipuṇamadhītam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:37899: padādayaḥ paddannomāsa (*6,1.63) ity evam ādayo niśparyantā iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:37927: ity asya apavādo vibhaktir eva+udāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:37928: dīrghāt iti kim ? aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta /
GS24jvkasipu:37929: idam eva dīrghagrahaṇam aṣṭana āttvavikalpaṃ jñāpayati, kṛtātvasya ca ṣaṭsañjñāṃ jñāpayati /
GS24jvkasipu:37931: svaraḥ paratvādanātvapakṣe ṣaṭsvareṇa bādhiṣyate iti kim dīrghagrahaṇena //
GS24jvkasipu:37937: anum yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantāt parā nadī ajādir vibhaktir asarvanāmasthānam udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37948: atra apy upadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukād anudāttatve ekādeśaḥ, tasya ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:37949: ity udāttatvam , tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvam na+iṣyate iti śatrantam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37964: udāttasthāne yo yaṇ halapūrvas tasmāt parā nadī ajādir yā asarvanāmavidbhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37985: ūṅo dhātoś ca ya udāttayaṇ halapūrvaḥ, tasmāt parā tṛtīyādir vibhaktir na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:37991: tena saha ya ekādeśaḥ so 'py udāttaḥ iti udāttayaṇvakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:37992: tasmād udāttatve pratiṣiddhe udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:37997: kvibandtasya kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttasya oḥ supi (*6,4.83) yaṇādeśaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38002: hrasvāntād antodāttān nuṭaś ca paro matub udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38010: vasuśabda ādyudāttaḥ, tasmān matub anudātta eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38011: atra ca svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat ity eṣā paribhāṣā na aśrīyate nuḍgrahaṇāt,
GS24jvkasipu:38012: tena marutvān ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38023: matupi yo hrasvaḥ, tadantād antodāttād anyatarasyāṃ nām udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38027: matupā hrasvaviśeṣanaṃ kim ? bhūtapūrve 'pi hrasve yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38028: anyathā hi sāmpratika eva syāt, tisṛṇām, catasṛṇām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38038: ṅyantāt chandasi viṣaye nāmudātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:38047: ṣaṭsañjjākebhyaḥ, tri catur ity etābhyāṃ ca parā halādir vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38062: ṣaṭtricaturbhyo yā jñālādir vibhaktiḥ tadante pade upottamaṃ udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38063: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam, tatsamīpe ca yat tadupottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:38076: ṣaṭ-tri-caturbhyo yā jhalādir vibhaktis tadante pade upottamam udāttaṃ bhavati vibhāṣā bhaṣāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38086: rāḍ aṅ kruṅ kṛd ity etebhyo yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38088: sāv ekācas tṛtīyādir vibhaktiḥ (*6,1.168) iti prāptiḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38094: sāvavarṇaḥ - sau prathamaikavacane yad avarṇāntaṃ tasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:38103: yatra asya nalopo na asti tatra pratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38108: nalopaviṣaye tu bhavaty eva vibhakter udāttatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:38120: divaḥ parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38130: nṛ ity etasmāt parā jhalādir vibhaktiḥ anyatarasyāṃ na+udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38149: tāser anudātteto ṅito 'kārāntopadeśāc ca śabdāt paraṃ lasārvadhātukam anudāttaṃ ca bhavati hnuṅ iṅ ity etābhyāṃ paraṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:38163: yady atra muk akāramātrasya syāt tadā lasārvadhātukam adupadeśād anantaram iti siddho nighātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38165: tathā api lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kartavye bahiraṅgatvāt asiddhaḥ iti siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:38169: ṅidayaṃ śnuḥ pūrvasya kāryaṃ prati na tu parasya /
GS24jvkasipu:38170: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca yathā syāt, pacāvaḥ, pacāmaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38171: iha ca mā bhūt, hato, hathaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38173: sārvadhātukam iti kim ? śiśye, śiśyāte, śiśiyare /
GS24jvkasipu:38181: mā hi kārṣṭām, mā hi kārṣṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:38183: mā hi lāviṣṭām, mā hi lāviṣṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:38186: sica ādyudāttatve 'niṭaḥ pitaḥ pakṣe udāttatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:38187: mā hi karṣam, mā hi kārṣam /
GS24jvkasipu:38188: aniṭaḥ iti kim ? mā hi lāvisam /
GS24jvkasipu:38193: lasārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ yad anuvartate tad aci aniṭi iti sambandhād iha saptamyantam upajāyate svapādir āvṛtkaraṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:38194: svapādīnāṃ hiṃseś ca ajādavaniṭi lasārvadhātuke parato 'nyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38209: abhyastānām ajādāvaniti lasārvadhātuke parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38220: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ nityārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:38224: avidyamānodātte ca lasārvadhātuke parato 'bhyastānām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38241: pratyayalakṣaṇe 'py ayaṃ svara iṣyate sarvastomaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38248: bhī hrī bhṛ hu mada jana dhana daridrā jāgṛ ity eteṣāṃ abhyastānāṃ lasārvadhātuke piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38254: madeḥ bahulaṃ chandasi iti vikaraṇasya śluḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38256: jana janane ity asya pañcame lakāre rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:38257: dhana dhānye ity asya pañcame lakāre dadhanat /
GS24jvkasipu:38278: āmreḍitānudāttatve kṛte pūrvo lolūyaṃśabda ekatrādyudāttaḥ, aparatra litsvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38283: ajantā ye upadeśe dhātavaḥ teṣāṃ kartṛyaki anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38284: lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva, lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38285: stīryate kedāraḥ svayam eva, stīryate kedaraḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38286: yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā lasarvadhātukanighāte kṛte yaka eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38292: acaḥ iti kim ? bhidyate svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38297: seṭi thali iṭ vā udātto bhavati anto vā ādir vā anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:38299: yadā na+ete trayaḥ svarāḥ , tadā liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38302: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam ity ayam eva svaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38306: ñiti niti ca nityam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38315: cañcāḥ ity atra yañi kani ca lupte na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:38323: lumatā 'pi lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam atra+iṣyate, sarpirāgaccha, saptāgaccha iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38329: tayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38336: pathipriyaḥ ity atra pūrvapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttaḥ pathiśabdaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38340: tavaipratyayāntasya antaḥ, caśabdād ādiśca yugapadudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38345: ekavarjam iti vacanād yaugapadyaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:38351: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prayeṇa (*3,3.118) iti ghapratyayāntasya pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38353: nivāse iti kim ? kṣayo vartate dasyūnām /
GS24jvkasipu:38360: puṃsi sañjñāyāṃ ghaḥ prāyeṇa (*3,3.118) iti ghaḥ, tasya pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38362: karaṇam iti kim ? jayo vartate brāhmaṇānām /
GS24jvkasipu:38363: atra api erac (*3,3.56) ity ayam ajantaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38367: vṛṣaḥ ity evam ādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38375: gayaḥ ity atra gāyater nipātanād etvam /
GS24jvkasipu:38407: tatra kvacit pratyayasvaraḥ prāptaḥ, kvacit karṣātvato ghaño 'nta udāttaḥ (*6,1.159) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38420: tatra ive pratikṛtau (*5,3.96) iti yaḥ kan, tasya lummanuṣye (*5,3.98) iti lup /
GS24jvkasipu:38421: yady evaṃ kim artham idam ucyate pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham ādyudāttatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:38422: etad eva jñāpayati kvacid iha svaravidhau pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38429: niṣṭhāntaṃ dvyac sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttaṃ bhavati sa ced ādirākāro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38446: śuṣka dhṛṣṭa ity etāv ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38456: tatra thā 'thaghañ (*6,2.144) iti prāptaḥ svaro bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38465: sañjñāyām, niṣṭhā ca dvyaj anāt (*6,1.205) ity anena pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityam ādyudāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38469: juṣṭa arpita iti śabdarūpe chandasi viṣaye vibhāṣā ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38472: chandasi iti kim ? bhāṣāyāṃ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttav etau //
GS24jvkasipu:38477: juṣṭa arpita ity ete śabdarūpe mantraviṣaye nityam ādyudātte bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38481: kecid atra juṣṭa ity etad eva anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:38483: antodātto 'pi hy ayaṃ mantre paṭhayate, tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:38487: yuṣmadasmadī madikpratyayānte 'ntodātte, tayor ṅasi parataḥ ādiḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38493: yuṣmadasmadoḥ iti vartate, ādir udāttaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38494: ṅe ity etasmiṃś ca parato yuṣmadasmadoḥ ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38503: yat pratyayāntasya dvyaca ādir udātto bhavati na cen nauśabdāt paro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38515: īḍa vanda vṛ śaṃsa duha ity eteṣāṃ yo ṇyat tadantasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38521: dvyanubandhakatvāt ṇyato yad grahaṇena grahaṇaṃ na asti iti tit svaritam (*6,
GS24jvkasipu:38523: vāryam iti vṛṅ sambhaktau ity asya ayaṃ ṇyat /
GS24jvkasipu:38524: kyabvidhau hi vṛña eva grahaṇam iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:38528: veṇu indhāna ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38531: veṇuśabdo 'yam ajivṛrībhyo nicca iti ṇupratyayānto nitvān nityam ādyudāttaḥ prāptaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38533: atha śānajantas tadā lasārvadhatuka-anudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa madhyodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38534: tad evam indhāne sarvathā aprāptam udāttatvaṃ pakṣe vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38535: veṇur iva veṇuḥ ity upamānaṃ yadā sañjñā bhavati, tadā sañjñāyām upamānam (*6,1.204)
GS24jvkasipu:38541: tyāga rāga hāsa kuha śvaṭha kratha ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣā ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38545: ete ghañantāḥ, teṣāṃ pakṣe karṣātvato ghaño 'nta udāttaḥ (*6,1.159) ity udāttatvam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38554: triprabhṛtīnām antyam uttamam tasya samīpe yat tad upottamam /
GS24jvkasipu:38564: mā hi cīkaratām, mā hi cīkaratām /
GS24jvkasipu:38567: iti nighāte 'dupadeśāt iti lasārvadhātukānudāttatve iṛte caṅa eva svare prāpte pakṣe dhātvakāra udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38568: upottamagrahaṇād dvyaco na bhavati, mā hi dadhat //
GS24jvkasipu:38572: matoḥ pūrvaḥ ākāra udātto bhavati tac cen matvantaṃ strīliṅge sañjñā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38593: avatyāḥ iti kim ucyate, na vatyā ity evam ucyeta ? na+evaṃ śakyam iha api syāt, rājavatī /
GS24jvkasipu:38594: svaravidhau nalopasya asiddhatvān na ayam avatīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38599: īvatīśabdāntasya anta udāto bhavati striyāṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:38608: tasmin parataḥ pūrvasya anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38631: svaravidhau vyañjanamavidyamānavat iti halanteṣv apy antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38633: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya prathamāḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38640: pūrvapadagrahaṇaṃ atra pūrvapadasthe svare udātte svarite vā vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:38641: bahuvrīhau samāse pūrvapadasya yaḥ svaraḥ sa prakṛtyā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:38644: samāsāntodāttatve hi sati anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:38645: iti so 'nudāttaḥ syāt iti samāsāntodāttatvāpavādo 'yam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38647: kṛṣṇo mṛgaḥ tasya vikāraḥ kārṣṇaḥ, prāṇi-rajata-ādibhyo 'ñ (*4,3.154)
GS24jvkasipu:38650: yūpaśabdaḥ uṇādiṣu kusuyubhyaś ca iti papratyayāntaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38651: tatra ca dīrghaḥ iti niditi ca vartate tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38663: tena sarvānudātte pūrvapade vidhir eva na asti iti samāsāntodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38668: tatpuruṣe samāse tulyārthaṃ tṛtīyāntaṃ saptamyantam upamānavāci avyayaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ kṛtyāntaṃ ca yat pūrvapadaṃ tat prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38676: sadṛkśabdaḥ samānānyayoś ca iti kvinpratyayāntaḥ, kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38681: śaṅkupūrvāl lāteḥ ghañarthe kavidhānam iti vā kapratyayāntaḥ śaṅkulāśabdo 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38682: kiriśabdo 'pi kirateḥ kṝgṝśṝpṝkuṭi bhidicchidibhyaś ca iti ikārapratyayaḥ kidauṇādikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38699: kumudaśabdo 'pi kau modate iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayāntaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38702: nyagrohati iti nyagrodhaḥ, pacāditvād acpratyayāntaḥ tasya nyagrodhasya ca kevalasya (*7,3.5)
GS24jvkasipu:38703: iti nipātanād hakārasya dhakāro madhyodāttatvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38731: pāṇīyaharaṇīyaśabdayoḥ upottamaṃ riti (*6,1.217) iti īkāra udāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:38735: prakṛtyā pūrvapadam, tatpuruṣe iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:38736: varṇaṃ varṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ varnavāciṣv eva+uttarapadeṣū etaśabdavarjiteṣu paratas tatpuruṣe samase prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38742: lohitaśabdo 'pi ruheraśca lo vā iti itanprayayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38751: pramāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse gādha lavaṇa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38760: tatra śamerban iti banpratyayāntatvāc chambaśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38763: aśvaśabdo aśūpruṣilaṭikaṇikhativiśibhyaḥ kvan iti kvanpratyayāntaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38764: pramāṇam iyattāparicchedamātram iha draṣṭavyaṃ na punarāyāma eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38771: tatpuruṣe samāse dāyādaśabde uttarapade dāyādyavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38775: udāttaḥ iti ca tatra vartate, tena ayam antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38776: kṝpṝvṛjimandinidhāñbhyaḥ kyuḥ iti bahulavacanāt kevalād api dhāñaḥ kyuḥ pratyayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:38778: atha vidyādāyādaḥ iti kena ṣaṣṭhī ? svāmīrīśvarādhipatidāyāda iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38779: yady evaṃ pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti samāsapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:38781: tasyas tu saptamī vidhīyamānā bādhikā mā vijñāyi iti punar abhyanujñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38787: tatpuruṣe samāse cirakṛcchrayor uttarapadayoḥ pratibandhivāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38793: gamanaṃ ca yacciraṃ ca iti viśeṣaṇasamāso 'yam, mayūravyaṃsakādir vā eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38794: gamanaṃ hi kāraṇavikalatayā virakālabhāvi kṛcchrayogi vā pratibandhi jāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:38799: apadeśo vyājaḥ, tadvācini tatpuruṣe samāse padaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38802: mūtraśabdaḥ sivimucyoṣṭerū ca iti ṣṭranpratyayāntaḥ, mūtrayater vā ghañantaḥ ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38805: apadeśe iti kim ? viṣṇoḥ padam viṣṇupadam //
GS24jvkasipu:38810: nivātaśabde uttarapade vātatrāṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38815: niruddho vāto 'smin iti vā nivātam iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38816: tatra kuḍyādihetuke nivāte kuḍyādayo vartamānāḥ samānādhikaraṇena nivātaśabdena saha samasyante /
GS24jvkasipu:38818: kuḍyaśabdo 'pi kavater yat ḍakkicca iti yatpratyayānta ādyudātta ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:38827: anārtavavācini śāradaśabde uttarapade uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38832: rajjuśadaḥ sṛjerasum ca iti upratyayāntaḥ ādilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:38833: dhānye nit iti ca tatra vartate, tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38834: dṛṣatśabdaḥ dṛṇāteḥ ṣuk hrasvaś ca iti adipratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38837: śaradi ṛtuviśeṣe bhavaṃ yat tad iha śāradam //
GS24jvkasipu:38841: adhvaryu kaṣāya ity etayoḥ jātivācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38848: tataḥ kaṭhena proktam iti vaiśampāyana-antevāsibhyaś ca (*4,3.104)
GS24jvkasipu:38849: iti ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭha-carakāl luk (*4,3.107) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:38852: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte nāntasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpikalāpikauthumitaitilijājalila. aṅgaliśilāliśikhaṇḍisūkarasadmasuparvaṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38859: dauvārikaśabdo 'pi dvāri niyuktaḥ iti ṭhaki satyantodāttaḥ eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38865: sadṛśa pratirūpa ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ sādṛśyavācini tatpruṣe samāse pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38869: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthaṃ ca sadṛśagrahaṇam iha tadaluki ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayojayati,
GS24jvkasipu:38873: atra dāsīvṛṣalīśabdayor antodāttatvād udāttayaṇo hal pūrvat (*6,1.174) iti vibhaktir antodāttā /
GS24jvkasipu:38882: dvigāv uttarapade pramaṇavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38885: saptaśamāḥ pramāṇam asya iti mātracaḥ utpannasya pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:38886: prācyaś ca asau saptaśamaś ca prācyasaptaśamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38889: dvigau iti kim ? vrīhiprasthaḥ pramāṇe iti kim ? paramasaptaśamam //
GS24jvkasipu:38893: vāṇijaśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse gantavyavāci paṇyavāci ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38901: gāndhāriśabdaḥ kardamādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra kardamādīnāṃ ca iti pakṣe ādyudātto bhavati, dvitīyo vā /
GS24jvkasipu:38911: mātrā upajñā upakrama chāyā eteṣu uttarapadeṣu napuṃsakavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38915: tatra bhikṣāyās tulyapramāṇam iti asvapadavigrahaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38916: tatra bhikṣāśabdaḥ guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103) ity apratyayānto 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38917: samudraśabdo 'pi phiṣi pāṭalāpālaṅkāmbāsāgarārthānām ity antodātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38922: tatra paṇino 'ptyam ity aṇantaḥ pāṇinaśabdaḥ pratyayasvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38939: upajñopakramāntasya tatpuruṣasya napuṃsakaliṅgatā upajñopakramaṃ tadādyācikhyāsāyām (*2,3.21) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:38943: iṣuśabdaḥ īṣeḥ kicca ity upratyayāntaḥ, tatra ca dhānye nit iti vartate, tena ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38944: dhanuḥ śabdo 'pi nabviṣayasya anisantasya ity ādyudātta eva /
GS24jvkasipu:38951: sukha priya ity etayor uttarapadyor hitavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38960: tad dhi hitaṃ yad āyatyaṃ prītiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:38967: prītau gamayamānāyāṃ sukha priya ity etayoḥ uttapadayoḥ tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38979: svāmiśabde uttarapade tatpuruṣe samāse svavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38988: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:38993: gehe kaḥ (*3,1.144) iti prakṛtisvareṇa antodātto gṛhaśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38994: saha inena vartate iti bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam (*6,2.1) iti senāśabda ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:38995: nṝ naye etasmād ṛdorap (*3,3.57) iti appratyayānta ādyudātto naraśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39003: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣe samāse bhū vāk cit didhiṣū ity etāni pūrvapadāni prakṛtisvarāṇi na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39013: patiśabde uttarapade aiśvaryavācini tatpuruṣa samāse bhuvanaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ vā prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39016: rañjeḥ kyun iti vartamāne bhusūdhūbhrāsjibhyaś chandasi iti kyunpratyayānto bhuvanaśabdaḥ ādyudātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39023: āśaṅka ābādha nediyas ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu sambhāvanavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39041: pūrvaśade uttarapade bhūtapūrvavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39050: atra pramaścāsau pūrvaś ca iti samāso, na tu paramo bhūtapūrvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39051: tathā hi sati udāharaṇam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39055: savidha sanīḍa samaryāda saveśa sadeśa ity eteṣu sāmīpyavācini tatpuruṣe samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39072: savidhādīnāṃ saha vidhayā ity evam ādikā vyutpattir eva kevalam /
GS24jvkasipu:39075: samīpye iti kim ? saha maryādayā vartate samaryādaṃ kṣetram /
GS24jvkasipu:39082: vispaṣṭādini pūrvapadāni gunavāneṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvarāṇi bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39089: vispaṣṭaṃ kaṭukam iti vigṛhya supsupā iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39091: kaṭukādibhiś ca śabdair gunavad dravyam abhidhīyate ity asāmānādhikaranyam ato na asti karmadhārayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39096: vyaktaśabdaḥ udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity ādisvaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39097: ye ca atra apare paṭhyante tatra sampannaśabdasthāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39100: capalaśabdaścitsvareṇa antodāttaḥ, cuperaccopadhāyāḥ ity atra hi ciditi vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:39118: śra jya avama kan ity eteṣu pāpaśabdavati ca+uttarapade karmadhārye samāse bhāvavāci pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39130: śrajyakanām ādeśānāṃ grahaṇam iti sāmarthyāttadvaduttarapadaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39132: bhāve iti kim ? gamyate 'nena iti gamanaṃ tat śreyaḥ, gamanaśreyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39133: karmadhāraye iti kim ? gamanaṃ śreyaḥ gamanaśreyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39137: kumāraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ karmadhāraye samāse prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39142: atra kecit lakṣaṇapratipadokayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva grahaṇam it paribhāṣayā kumāraḥ śramaṇādibhiḥ (*2,1.70)
GS24jvkasipu:39143: ity atra+eva samāse svaram etam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39149: pratigata enasā, pratigatameno vā yasya sa pratyenāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39150: tasminn uttarapade karmadhāraye kumārasya ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39152: uadāttaḥ ity etad atra sāmarthyād veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39153: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvara eva hy ayam āder upadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39158: pūgā gaṇāḥ, tadvācini uttarapade karmadhāraye samāse kumārasya anyatarasyām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39164: iti ñyaḥ pratyayaḥ, tasya tadrājasya bahuṣu tena+eva striyām (*2,4.62) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39165: atra yadā ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā kumāraś ca (*6,2.26)
GS24jvkasipu:39167: ye tu tatra pratipadoktasya grahaṇam icchanti teṣāṃ samāsāntodāttatvam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39173: kapāla bhagāla śarāva ity eteṣu ca dvigau samāse pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39178: pramāṇe laḥ dvigor nityam iti mātraco lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39182: pañca māsān bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā iti taddhitārthe dvigor yap (*5,1.82) /
GS24jvkasipu:39185: varṣāl luk ca (*5,1.88) iti ṭhaño luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39196: iti taddhitārthe ete samāsāḥ dvigor lug anapatye (*4,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:39198: igantādiṣu iti kim ? pañcabhir aśvaiḥ krītaḥ pañcāśvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39202: pañcāratnyo daśāratnyaḥ iti ca yaṇguṇayoḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇayor asiddhatvāt sthānivadbhāvād vā dvigusvara igantalakṣaṇaḥ pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:39206: bahuśabdaḥ pūrvapadam igantādiṣu uttarapadeṣu dvigau samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39214: tasya prakṛtisvare kṛte yatra yaṇādeśaḥ tatra udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4)
GS24jvkasipu:39219: diṣṭi vitasti ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ dvigau samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39222: diṣṭivitastī pramāṇe, tena atra mātraco luk //
GS24jvkasipu:39227: saptamyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ siddha śuṣka pakva bandha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu rakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati sā cet saptamī kālān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39231: phiṣi tu sāṃkāśyakāmpilyanasikyadārvāghāṭānām antaḥ pūrvaṃ vā iti paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39248: saptamīsvaraḥ kṛtsvareṇa bādhitaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39252: pari prati upa apa ity ete pūrvapadabhūtā varjyamānavācini aharavayavavācini rātryavayavavācini ca+uttarapade prakṛtisvarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39267: nipātā ādyudāttā upasargāś ca abhivarjam iti ādyudāttāni pūrvapadāni /
GS24jvkasipu:39268: tatpuruṣe bahuvrīhau ca siddhatvāt avyayaībhāvārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39269: tatra apaparīvarjane vartete, iti tayor eva varjyamānam uttarapadaṃ, netarayoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39270: ahorātrāvayavā api varjyamānā eva tayor bhavanti iti na pṛthagudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39271: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti kim ? pratyagni śalabhāḥ patanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39272: parivanam ity atra vanaṃ samāse (*6,2.178) ity etad bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39276: rājanyavācināṃ bahuvacanāntānāṃ yo dvandvo 'ndhakavṛṣṇiṣu vartate tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39280: śvāphalkaśabdaḥ caitrakaśabdaś ca ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurubhyaś ca (*4,1.114) iti aṇantāvantodāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:39281: śiniśabda ādyudāttaḥ, sa tadapatyeṣv abhedena vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:39283: dvīpe bhavāḥ iti dvīpād anusamudraṃ yañ (*4,3.10) /
GS24jvkasipu:39289: dvandve iti kim ? vṛṣṇīnāṃ kumārāḥ vṛṣṇikumārāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39304: ācāryopasarjanāntevāsināṃ yo dvandvaḥ, tatra pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39309: tena proktam āpiśalam, iñaś ca (*4,2.112) ityaṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:39310: tad adhīyate ye 'ntevāsinaḥ te 'py āpiśalāḥ, proktāl luk (*4,2.64)
GS24jvkasipu:39311: iti tasya taddhitasyādhyetari vihitasya luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39312: āpiśaler vā chātrāḥ āpiśalāḥ, ity ubhayathāpyācaryopasarjanaścāntevāsī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39313: ācāryopasarjanagrahaṇaṃ dvandvaviśeṣaṇārtham, sakalo dvandvaḥ ācāryopasarjano yathā vijñāyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:39320: kārtakaujapādayo ye dvandvāḥ teṣu pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39325: kṛtasya apatyaṃ, kujapasya apatyam ity aṇantāvetau /
GS24jvkasipu:39333: pīlāyāḥ apatyaṃ pailaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ yuvā iti aṇo dvyacaḥ (*4,1.156)
GS24jvkasipu:39334: iti vihitasya phiñaḥ pailādibhyaś ca (*2,4.59) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39335: śyāparṇaśabdo bidādiḥ, tasya apatyaṃ strī śyāparṇī, tadapatyaṃ yuvā śyāparṇeyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39336: bahuvacanamatantram, tena pailaśyāparṇeyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39339: iti utpannasya yañaḥ yañañoś ca iti luk, tena atra bahutvam āśrīyata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:39344: tadapatye yūni ya iñ tasya ṇyakṣatriyārṣañito yūni lugaṇiñoḥ (*2,4.58) iti luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39345: pāñcālasya apatyaṃ strī pāñcālī, tadapatyam yuvā pāñcāleyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39346: atra api bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti śaitikākṣapañcāleyau ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39349: , tasya bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66) iti bahuṣu luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39352: śakalasya apatyaṃ śākalyaḥ, tasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39354: śunakasya apataym iti bidādibhyo 'ñ (*4,1.104), tasya bahuṣu luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39356: teṣāṃ śaṇakaśabād utpannasya iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66) iti bahuṣu luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39366: kunteḥ surāṣṭrasya ca apatyeṣu bahuṣu tannivāse vā janapade dvandvo 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:39373: atra api apatyeṣu bahuṣu iñaḥ bahvaca iñaḥ prācyabharateṣu (*2,4.66) iti luk kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39380: kaṭhena proktam adhīyate kaṭhāḥ, vaiśampāyanāntevāsitvāt ṇiniḥ, tasya kaṭhacarakāl luk /
GS24jvkasipu:39384: iti prakṛtibhāve prāpte na antasya ṭilope sabrahmacāripīṭhasarpi ity ādinopasaṅkhyānena ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39386: kuthuminā proktamadhīyate iti prāgdīvyato 'ṇ (*4,1.83), tasya pūrvavat ṭilopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39389: lokākṣasya vā apatyaṃ laukākṣiḥ, tasya chātrāḥ laukākṣāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39396: maudapaippalādāḥ iti dviḥ paṭhyate, tasya prayojanaṃ pakṣe samāsāntodāttatvam eva yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39412: prakṛtyā pūrvapadam iti vartate, dvandve iti nivṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:39413: mahān ity etat pūrvapadaṃ vrīhi aparāhṇa gṛṣṭi iṣvāsa jābāla bhāra bhārata hailihila laurava pravṛddha ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39424: mahacchabdo 'ntodāttaḥ, tasya ratipadokto yaḥ samāsaḥ sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ pūjyamānaiḥ (*2,1.61)
GS24jvkasipu:39426: tena+eṣāṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāso 'ntodātta eva bhavati, mahato vrīhiḥ mahadvrīhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39428: ity ayam api śreṇyādisamāse vidhiḥ iti pravṛddhaśabdaḥ iha paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39432: kṣullaka ity etat pūrvapadaṃ mahāṃś ca vaiśvadeve uttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39439: uṣṭraśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sādivāmyor uttarapadayoḥ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39447: gośabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sāda sādi sārathi ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39456: kurugārhapata riktaguru asūtajaratī aślīladṛḍharūpā-pārevaḍavā taitilakadrū paṇyakambala ity ete samāsāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:39457: teṣāṃ dāsībhārādīnāṃ ca pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39464: rikte vibhāṣā (*6,1.208) iti pūrvapadam ādyudāttam antodattaṃ vā /
GS24jvkasipu:39471: aślīladṛḍharūpā iti hi saṃsthānamātreṇa śobhanā niḥśrīkā lāvaṇyavirahitā ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39476: titilino 'patyaṃ chātro vā taitilaḥ ity aṇantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39481: pratipadokte hi kṛtyānāṃ samāse dvitīyā dṛtyā ity eṣa vihitaḥ svaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39490: śṝsvṛsnihitrapyasivasi ity atra dhānye nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:39492: oṣo dhīyate 'syām iti karmaṇyadhikaraṇe ca (*3,3.93) iti kipratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39503: caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ tadarthe uttarapade tadabhidheyārthaṃ yat tadvācinyuttarapade prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39508: kusuyubhyaś ca ity atra nit iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:39522: arthaśabde uttarapade caturthyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39531: na tvarthaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyaṃ ity atadarthārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39533: etad anena jñāpyate, pūrvo vidhiḥ prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ samāse bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39534: aśvaghāsaḥ, śvaśrūsuram ity atra saty api tādarthye na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39552: karmadhārye samāse ktānte uttarapade 'niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39560: karmadhāraye iti kim ? śreṇyā kṛtaṃ śreṇikṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:39565: ahīnavācini samāse ktānte uttarapade dvitīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39570: trīṇi śakalāni asya triśakalaḥ, bahuvrīhisvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39584: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade tṛtīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39590: āṅi śrihanibhyāṃ hrasvaś ca iti ahirantodātto vyutpāditaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39594: nāsya khamastīti bahuvrīhau nakulanakheti nakhaśabdo nipātitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39597: karmaṇi iti kim ? rathena yātaḥ rathayātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39603: karmavācini ktānte uttarapade gatiranantaraḥ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39609: vyavahitasya gater ayaṃ svaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39611: kārakapūrvasya tu sati śiṣṭatvāt thāthādisvara eva bhavati dūrādāgataḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39612: anantaragrahaṇasāmarthyād eva kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39613: karmaṇi ity eva, prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39618: takārādau ca tuśabdavarjite niti kṛti parato gatir anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39632: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat || PS_6,2.51 ||
GS24jvkasipu:39634: tavaipratyayasya anta udātto bhavati gatiś ca anantaraḥ prakṛtisvaraḥ iti etad ubhayaṃ yugapad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39644: aniganto gatiḥ prakṛtisvaro bhavati añcatau vapratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39647: svarito vā+anudātte padādau (*8,2.6) ity ayam ekādeśaḥ udāttaḥ svarito vā /
GS24jvkasipu:39650: anigantaḥ iti kim ? pratyaṅ, pratyañcau, pratyañcaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39653: coraniganto 'ñcatau vapratyayaḥ ity eva svaro bhavati vapratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:39659: ni adhi ity etau cāñcatau vapratyaye parataḥ prakṛtisvarau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39661: udāttasvaritayor yanaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity añcater akāraḥ svaritaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39668: īṣat ity etat pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39672: īṣadbhedaḥ ity evam ādau kṛtsvara eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39676: hiraṇyaparimāṇavāci pūrvapadaṃ dhanaśabde uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39678: dvau suvarṇau parimāṇam asya dvisuvarṇam, tad eva dhanam iti karmadhārayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39679: bahuvrīhāv api paratvād vikalpa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39687: prathamaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam aciropasampattau gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39690: abhinavavaiyākaraṇaḥ, samprati vyākaraṇam adhyetuṃ pravṛttaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39693: vaiyākaraṇānāmādyo mukhyo vā yaḥ sa nityo 'ntodāttaḥ eva //
GS24jvkasipu:39698: kataraśabdaḥ katamaśadaś ca pūrvapadam karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39701: karmadhārayagrahaṇam uttarārtham iha tu pratipadoktatvād eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:39705: āryaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ brahmaṇakumārayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39712: karmadhāraye ity eva, āryasya brāhmaṇaḥ āryabrāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39716: rājā ca pūrvapadaṃ brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ karmadhāraye samāse anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39719: karmadhāraye ity eva, rājño brāhmaṇaḥ rājabrahamaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39725: rājā iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:39726: ṣaṣṭhyanto rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam pratyenasi uttarapade 'nyatarasyāṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39728: ṣaṣṭhī iti kim ? rājā cāsau pratyenāś ca rājapratyenāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39732: ktānte uttarapade nityārthe samāse pūrvapadam anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39737: satata iti yadā bhāve ktaḥ tadā thāthādisvareṇa antodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39752: rājaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ śilivācini uttarapade praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyām anyatarasyāṃ prakrtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39764: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ tatra pūrvapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39772: udāttaḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.137) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:39776: saptamyantaṃ hārivāci ca pūrvapadaṃ dharmyevācini haraṇaśabdād anyasminn uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39777: hāri iti deyaṃ yaḥ svīkaroti so 'bhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39779: dharmo hi anuvṛtta ācāraḥ, tasmād anapetaṃ tena vā prāpyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39785: sañjñāyām iti saptamīsamāsaḥ, kāranāmni ca iti vibhakter aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:39790: kvacid ayam ācāro vyavasthitaḥ, stūpādiṣu śāṇādi dātavyam, yājñikādīnām aśvādi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:39795: tasya bījaniṣekād uttarakālaṃ śarīrapūṣṭyarthaṃ yad dīyate haraṇam iti tad ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39796: paro 'pi kṛtsvaro hārisvareṇa bādhyate vipratiṣedhena ity etad aharaṇe ity anena jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:39797: tena vāḍavahāryam iti hārisvaraḥ siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:39801: yuktavācini ca samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39808: yuktaḥ iti samāhitaḥ, kartavye tatparo yaḥ sa ucyate //
GS24jvkasipu:39812: adhyakṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39819: pāpaśadaḥ śilpivācini utarapade vibhāṣā ādyudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39823: iti pāpaśabdasya pratipadoktaḥ samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamase na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:39828: gotravācini antevāsivācini ca+uttarapade mānavabrāhmanayoś ca kṣepavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39830: yo jaṅghādānaṃ dadānyaham iti vātsyaḥ sampadyate sa jaṅghāvātsyaḥ iti kṣipyate /
GS24jvkasipu:39840: kumāryādilābhakāmā ye dākṣādibhiḥ proktāni śāstrāṇy adhīyate tacchiṣyatāṃ vā pratipadyante ta evaṃ kṣipyante /
GS24jvkasipu:39849: atra yasya anyat samāsalakṣaṇaṃ na asti, supsupā ity eva tatra samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39855: maireyaśabde uttarapade tadaṅgavācini pūrvapadāny ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39858: madyaviśeṣo maireyastasya guḍavikārasya gudo 'ṅgaṃ bhavati, madhuvikārasya tasya madhu aṅgam /
GS24jvkasipu:39865: bhaktamannam, tadākhyās tadvācinaḥ śabdāḥ, tadartheṣu uttarapadeṣu ādyudāttā bavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39871: samaśanaṃ samāśaḥ iti kriyāmātram ucyate, na dravyam /
GS24jvkasipu:39877: gavādiṣu upamānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39885: dhānyaṃ gaur iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:39892: akapratyayānte uttarapade jīvikārthavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39897: dantalekhanādibhir yeṣāṃ jīvikā ta evam ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:39901: jīvikārthe iti kim ? ikṣubhakṣikāṃ me dhārayasi //
GS24jvkasipu:39905: prāgdeśavartināṃ yā krīḍā tadvācini samāse akapratyayānte uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39919: aṇante uttarapade niyuktavācini samāse pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39924: niyukto 'dhikṛtaḥ, sa ca kasmiṃścit kartavye tatparo na bhavati iti niyuktaḥ ity anena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:39930: śilpivācini samāse aṇante uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati, sa cedaṇ kṛño na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39942: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye aṇante uttarapade akṛñaḥ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39945: akṛñaḥ ity eva, rathakāro nāma brāhmaṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:39949: go tanti yava ity etāni pūrvapadāni pālaśabde adyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:39966: upamānavāci pūrvapadaṃ śabdārthaṃprakṛtau eva ṇinante uttarapade ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39971: upamānagrahanam asya pūrvasa ca yogasya viṣayavibhāgārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:39975: prakṛtir eva yatra+upasarganirapekṣā śabdārthā bhavati tatra+eva yathā syād,
GS24jvkasipu:39980: śabdārthaprakṛtau tv anupamānamupamānaṃ ca ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:39994: ity asya+eva+udāharanārthaṃ pathyante purvottarapadaniyamārthā iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:39995: iha mā bhūt, vṛkṣārohi, yuktādhyāyī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40008: ekaḥ śitiḥ pādo 'sya iti tripado bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40010: tasya nimittisvarabalīyastvād antodāttatvaṃ prāptam ity ādyudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40012: evam api na artha etena, iganta dvigau (*6,2.29) iti siddhatvāt ? evaṃ tarhi jñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:40013: etaj jñāpayati śityantasya+uttarapade dvigusvaro na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40014: tena dviśitipād ity atra tiśabda udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40015: nimittisvarabalīyastvasya apy ekaśitipātsvaravacanam eva jñāpakaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40016: pātresamitādayaś ca yuktārohyādayas tatas te 'py ādyudāttā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:40020: dīrghāntaṃ pūrvapadam, kāśa tuṣa bhrāṣṭra vaṭa ity etāni ca je uttarapade ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40030: je uttarapade bahvacaḥ pūrvapadasya antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40039: grāmaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati na ced nivasadvāci bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40047: dākṣyādayo nivasanti yasmin grāme sa teṣām iti vyapadiśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40069: yāny atra nivāsanām adheyāni teṣu nivasadvācīni api pūrvapadāni ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40086: yadā śālāntas tatpuruṣo napuṃsakaliṅgo bhavati tadā api tatpuruṣe śālāyāṃ napuṃsake (*6,2.123)
GS24jvkasipu:40087: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40094: prasthaśabde uttarapade karkyādivarjitam avṛddhaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40117: prasthe uttarapade mālādīnam ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40131: ekāśoṇāśabdayoḥ eṅ prācāṃ deśe (*1,1.75) iti vṛddhasajñā //
GS24jvkasipu:40135: nagaraśabde uttarapade mahannavaśabdavarjitaṃ pūrvapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:40144: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac || PS_6,2.90 ||
GS24jvkasipu:40146: armaśabde uttarapade dvyac tryac pūrvapadam avarṇāntam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40158: bhūta adhika sañjīva madra aśman kajjala ity etāni pūrvapadāni armaśabde uttarapade nādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40175: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmas tatra pūrvapadasya antaḥ udātto bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40181: prāk uttarapadādiḥ (*6,2.111) ity etasmād ayam adhikāro veditavyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:40183: sarvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadam guṇakārtsnye vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40189: āśrayavyāptyā paramatvaṃ śvetatvasya iti guṇakārtsnye vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:40192: kārtsnye iti kim ? sarveṣāṃ śvetatatraḥ sarvaśvetaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40193: guṇāttareṇa samāsastaralopaś ca vaktavyaḥ ity evam atra samāsastaralopaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:40197: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye giri nikāya ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40208: kumāryām uttarapade vayasi gamyamāne pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40211: kumārīśabdaḥ puṃsā sahāsaṃprayogamātraṃ pravṛttinimittam upādāya prayukto vṛddhādibhir vayo viśeṣavacanaiḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40212: tac ca vayaḥ iha gṛhyate, na kumāratvam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40218: tadvācini samāse udakaśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40221: svare kṛte ekādeśaḥ svarito vānudātte padādau (*8,2.6) iti pakṣe svarito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40228: dvigau uttarapade kratuvācini samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40240: sabhāśabde uttarapade napuṃsakaliṅge samāse pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40248: sabhāyāṃ pratipadoktaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ gṛhyate iti samaṇīyasabham,
GS24jvkasipu:40253: puraśabde uttarapade prācām deśe pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40263: ariṣta gauḍa ity evaṃ pūrve samāse puraśabde uttarapade pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40266: pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40272: hāstina phalaka mārdeya ity etāni pūrvapadāni puraśabde uttarapade na antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40282: kusūla kūpa kumbha śālā ity etāni pūrvapadāni bilaśabde uttarapade antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40292: dikśabdāḥ pūrvapadāni antodāttani bhavanti grāmajanapadākhyānavāciṣu uttarapadeṣu, cānarāṭaśabde ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40321: ity adhikṛtya yā vihitā vṛddhiḥ, tadvaty uttarapade sarvaśabdo dikśabdāś ca antodāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40325: susarvārdhadikśabdebhyo janapadasya+iti tadantavidhinā janapadalakṣaṇo vuñ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40327: adhikāralakṣaṇād iha na bhavati, sarvamāsaḥ, sarvakārakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:40331: bahuvrīhau samāse viśvaśabdaḥ pūrvapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40336: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? viśve ca te devāḥ viśvadevāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40337: sañjñāyām iti kim ? viśve devā asya viśvadevaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40338: viśvāmitraḥ, viśvājinaḥ ityatra sañjñāyāṃ mitrājinayoḥ (*6,2.165) ity etad bhavati paratvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:40343: udara aśva iṣu ity eteṣu uttarapadesu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃviṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40354: kṣepe gamyamāne udarādiṣu uttarapadeṣu bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40361: anudaraḥ, sūdaraḥ ity atra nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena //
GS24jvkasipu:40365: bahuvrīhau samāse bandhuny uttarapade nadyantaṃ pūrvapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40374: bahuvrīhau samāse niṣṭhāntam upasargapūrvaṃ pūrvapadam anatarasyām anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40377: yadi mukhaśabdaḥ svāṅgavācī tadā pakṣe mukhaṃ svāṅgam (*6,2.167)
GS24jvkasipu:40378: ity etad bhavati, na cet pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40385: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāma uttarapadasya ādir udātto bhavati ity evaṃ tadveditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40392: ādiḥ iti prakṛtyā bhagālam (*6,2.127) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:40394: bahuvrīhau samāse varṇavācino lakṣaṇavācinaś ca karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40400: paśūnāṃ vibhāgajñāpanārthaṃ dātraśaṅkupratirūpakaṃ karṇādiṣu cihnaṃ yat kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:40401: tena sthūlakarṇaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40408: sañjñāyām aupamye ca yo bahuvrīhir vartate tatra karṇaśabda uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40417: kaṇṭha pṛṣṭha grīvā jaṅghā ity etāni uttarapadāni bahuvrīhau samāse sañjñaupamyayor ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40439: śṛṅgaśabdaḥ uttārapadam avasthāyāṃ sañjñau pamyayoś ca bahuvrīhau ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40449: naña uttare jaramaramitramṛtā bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40455: jarādayaḥ iti kim ? aśatruḥ, nañsubhyam (*6,2.172) iti uttarapadāntodāttatvam eva atra bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40459: soḥ uttaraṃ manantam asantaṃ ca bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati lomoṣasī varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:40474: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti ity anarthakayor api manasor iha grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:40476: kapi tu paratvāt kapi pūrvam ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40482: kratvādayaḥ soruttare bahuvrīhau samāse ādyudāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40496: yad ādyudāttaṃ dvyac uttarapadaṃ babuvrīhau samāse soruttaraṃ tad ādyudāttam eva bhavati chandasi visaya /
GS24jvkasipu:40499: ādyudāttam iti kim ? yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40507: vīra vīrya ity etau ca śabdau śoruttarau bahuvrīhau samāse chandasi viṣaye ādyudāttau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40511: iti ādyudāttatvaṃ na bhavati ity etad eva vīryagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:40512: tatra hi sati pūrveṇa+eva siddhaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:40516: kūla tīra tūla mūla śālā akṣa sama ity etāni uttarapadāni avayībhāvasamāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40543: kaṃsa mantha śūrpa pāyya kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni dvigau samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40558: śālāśabdānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40563: śālāyām iti kim ? brāhmaṇasenam napuṃsake iti kim ? brāhmaṇaśālā //
GS24jvkasipu:40568: tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge kanthāśabdaḥ uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40578: kanthānte tatpuruṣe samāse napuṃsakaliṅge cihaṇādīnām ādir udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40593: ādiḥ iti vartamāne punar ādigrahaṇaṃ pūrvapadādyudāttārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:40597: cela kheṭa katuka kāṇḍa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruse samāse garhāyāṃ gamyamānāyām ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40607: tatra putraḥ celam iva iti vigṛhya vyāghrāder ākṛtigaṇatvād upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40613: cīramuttarapadam upamānavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40621: palala sūpa śāka ity etāny uttarapadāni miśravācini tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttani bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40635: kūla sūda sthala karṣa ity etāni uttarapadāni tatpuruṣe samāse sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40650: karmadhārayavarjite tatpuruṣe samāse rājyam ity etad uttarapadam ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40660: vagya ity evam ādīni uttarapadāni akarmadhāraye tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudattāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40667: digādiṣu tu varga pūga gaṇa pakṣa ity evam ādayo ye paṭhitāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:40668: te eva yatpratyayāntā vargyādayaḥ iha pratipattavyā //
GS24jvkasipu:40672: putraśabdaḥ puṃśabdebhya uttaras tatpuruṣe ādyudatto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40687: ācāryādyākhyebhyaḥ paraḥ putraśabdo nadyudātto bhavati ākhyāgrahaṇāt svarūpasya paryāyāṇāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ ca grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40709: uttarapadādiḥ iti vartate, tatpuruṣe iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40710: cūrṇādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇivācinaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantāt parāṇi tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40729: tatra+upagrahaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyantam eva pūrvācāryopacāreṇa gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:40733: ṣaṭ purvoktāni kāṇḍādīni uttarapadāni aprāṇiṣaṣṭhyā ādyudāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40734: kāṇḍaṃ gahāryām ity uktam, agarhāyām api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40737: cīram upamānam (*6,2.127) ity uktam, anupamānam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40740: palalasūpaśākaṃ miśre (*6,2.128) ity uktam, anupamānam api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40743: palala-sūpa-śākaṃ miśre (*6,2.128) ity uktam, amiśre 'pi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40747: kūlaṃ sañjñāyām (*6,2.129) ity uktam, asañjñāyām api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40755: kuṇḍam ity etat uttarapadaṃ vanavāci tatpuruṣe samāse ādyudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40767: prakṛtyā ity etad adhikṛtam antaḥ (*6,2.143) iti yāvad veditavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:40771: śiteḥ uttarapadaṃ nityaṃ yad abahvaj bhasacchabdavarjitaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse tat prakṛtisvaram bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40778: nityagrahaṇam kim ? śitikakut kakudasya vasthāyāṃ lopo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40779: tatra avasthāyā anyatra śitikakuda iti bahvajuttarapadaṃ bhavati iti tena na nityābahvac /
GS24jvkasipu:40781: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? śiteḥ pādaḥ śitipādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40789: tatpuruṣe iti vartate, na bahuvrīhau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40790: gateḥ kārakāt upapadāt ca kṛdantam uttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse prakṛtisvaraṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40802: gatikāra - kopapadāt iti kim ? devadattasya kārakaḥ devadattakārakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40805: prapacatitarām, prapacatitamām ity atra tarabādyantena samāse kṛte paścādām /
GS24jvkasipu:40806: tatra sati śiṣṭatvād āma eva svaro bhavati ity eke /
GS24jvkasipu:40812: vanaspatyādiṣu samāseṣu ubhe pūrvottarapade yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40817: tadbṛhatoḥ karapatyoś coradevatayoḥ suṭ talopaś ca iti suṭ takāralopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40822: kecit tu śārṅgaravādisu paṭhanti teṣām ādyudāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40825: na pāti na pālayati vā napāt kvibantaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40829: narā asmin āsīnāḥ śaṃsanti, narā evaṃ śaṃsanti iti vā narāśaṃsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40835: śuna itva śepaḥ asya iti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40836: tatra śepapucchalāṅgūleṣu śunaḥ sañjñāyām (*6,3.21) iti ṣaṣṭhyā aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:40840: tayor dvandve anyeṣām api dṛśyate (*6,3.167) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:40848: viśvavayaḥśabdo 'pi bahuvrīhau viśvaṃ sañjñāyām (*6,2.106) iti viśvaśado 'ntodāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40857: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra yugapadubhe pūrvottarapade prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40864: tena ādyudāttaḥ bṛhaspatiśabde vanaspatyāditvāt dvāv udāttau,
GS24jvkasipu:40865: tena indrābṛhaspatī ity atra traya udāttā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:40871: uttarapade 'nudāttādau pṛthivī rudra pūṣamanthivarjite devatādvandve na+ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40875: uttarapadagrahaṇam anudāttādau ity uttarapadaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt, dvandvaviśeṣaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:40884: manthin - śukrāmanthinau mantho 'sya asti iti manthī /
GS24jvkasipu:40886: pṛthivyādiṣu tu ubhe yugapat prakṛtisvare bhavata eva //
GS24jvkasipu:40891: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmas tatra samāsasya+uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:40899: tha atha ghañ kta ac ap itra ka ity evam antānām uttarapadānāṃ gatikārakopapadāt pareṣām antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40902: hanikuṣinīramikāśibhyaḥ kthan iti ave bhṛñaḥ iti ca kthanpratyayāntāv etau /
GS24jvkasipu:40905: upasarge vaseḥ iti athanpratyayaḥ ghañ - prabhedaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40913: kṣayo nivāse (*6,1.201) jayaḥ karaṇam (*6,1.202) iti ca ādyudāttau kṣayajayaśabdau prayojayataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40920: gāṃ varṣati, kharīṃ varṣati iti mūlavibhujāditvāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40930: su ity etasmād upamānāc ca paraṃ ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40938: iti prāpte upamānā dapi tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48)
GS24jvkasipu:40944: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye gatikārakopapadād ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati ācitādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:40948: sambhūtaḥ iti pratyarthāt bhavateḥ karmaṇi ktaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40949: gatir anantaraḥ (*6,2.49) ity atra hi karmaṇi ity anuvartate, tadbādhanārthaṃ cedam /
GS24jvkasipu:40953: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) iti prāptir iha bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:40964: saṃhitāśabdo yadā goranyasya sañjñā tadā antodatto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40965: yadā tu goḥ sañjñā tadā antodātta eva //
GS24jvkasipu:40969: pravṛddhādīnāṃ ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40976: yānadīnām atra gaṇe pāṭhaḥ prāyovṛttipradarśanārthaḥ, na viṣayaniyamārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:40977: yānādibhyo 'nyatra api teṣām antodāttatvam bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:40981: tena punarutsyūtaṃ vāso deyam, punarniṣkṛto rathaḥ ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:40986: sañjñāyām iti vartate, ktaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:40987: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye āśiṣi gamyamānāyāṃ kārakād uttarayoḥ dattaśrutayor eva ktāntayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40990: kārakāt iti kim ? kārakān niyamo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:40993: etasmān niyamād atra sañjñāyām anācitādīnām (*6,2.146) ity antodāttatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40994: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity eva atra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40995: evakārakaraṇaṃ kim ? kārakāvadhāraṇaṃ yathā syat, dattaśrutāvadhāraṇaṃ mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:40996: akārakād api dattaśrutayor anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:40999: āśiṣi iti kim ? anāaśiṣi niyamo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:41001: kārakād dattaśrutayor āśisyeva ity evam atra niyama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41002: tena āhato nadati devadattaḥ ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41004: tatra tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41009: itthaṃbhūtena kṛtam ity etasminn arthe yaḥ samaso vartate tatra ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41014: kṛtam iti kriyāsāmānye karotirvartate, nābhūtaprādurbhāva eva /
GS24jvkasipu:41016: tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity asya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41017: bhāve tu yadā pralapitādayas tadā thāthādisvareṇa+eva siddham antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41021: anapratyayāntam uttarapadaṃ bhāvavacanaṃ karmavacanaṃ ca kārakāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41027: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīrasukham (*3,3.116) ity ayaṃ yogaḥ ubhayathā varṇyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41028: karmaṇyupapade bhāve lyuḍ bhavati, karmaṇyabhidheye lyuḍ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41029: tatra pūrvasmin sūtrārthe bhāvavacanodāharaṇāni, uttaratra karmavacanodāharaṇāni /
GS24jvkasipu:41041: mannantaṃ ktinnantaṃ vyākhyāna śayana sthāna ity etāni yājakādayaḥ krītaśabdaś ca+uttarapadam anatodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41058: yājakādayo ye yājakadibhiś ca (*2,2.9) iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārthāḥ paṭhyante ta eva+iha gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:41062: krītaśabde tu tṛtīyā karmaṇi (*6,2.48) ity asya apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41069: saptamyantāt paraṃ puṇyam ity etad uttarapadam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41073: tatpuruṣe tulyārtha iti pūrvapadakṛtisvaratvaṃ prāptam ity antodāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41074: uṇādīnāṃ tu vyutpattipakṣe kṛtsvareṇa ādyudāttaḥ puṇyaśabdaḥ syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41075: saptamyāḥ iti kim ? vedena puṇyam vedapunyam //
GS24jvkasipu:41079: ūnārthāny uttarapadāni kalahaśabdaś ca tṛtīyāntāt parāṇyanatodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41087: atra kecid arthe iti svarūpagrahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41089: ūnaśabdena+eva tvarthanirdeśarthena tadarthānāṃ grahaṇam iti pratipadoktatvād eva tṛtīyāsamāsaparigrahe siddhe tṛtīyāgrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:41094: miśra ity etad uttarapadam anupasargaṃ tṛtīyāntāt param antodāttaṃ bhavati asandhau gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:41100: iha anupasargagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam anyatra miśragahaṇe sopasargagrahaṇasya /
GS24jvkasipu:41101: tena miśraślakṣṇaiḥ iti sopasargeṇa api miśraśabdena tṛtīyāsamāso bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41104: sandhiḥ iti hi paṇabandhena aikārthyam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41105: kecit punar āhuḥ gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣā pratyāsattiḥ sandhiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41106: atra rājño brāhmaṇaiḥ saha deśapratyāsattāv api satyāṃ mūrtivibhāgo gṛhyate iti brāhmaṇamiśro rajā iti pratyudāhriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41112: sampādi arha hita alam ity evam arthā ye taddhitāḥ tadantāni uttarapadāni naño guṇapratiṣedhe vartamānāt parāṇi antodāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41113: sampādi-karṇaveṣṭakābhyāṃ sampādi mukhaṃ kārṇaveṣṭakikam, na kārṇaveṣṭakikam akārṇaveṣṭakikam /
GS24jvkasipu:41114: arhaṃ - chedamarhati chaidikaḥ, na chaidikaḥ acchaidikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41115: hita - vatsebhyo hitaḥ vatsīyaḥ, na varsīyaḥ avarsīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41116: alamartha - santāpāya prabhavati sāntāpikaḥ, na sāntāpikaḥ asāntāpikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41117: nañaḥ iti kim ? gardabharatham arhati, gārdabharathikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41121: tatpratiṣedho yatra+ucyate samāse tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ karnaveṣṭakābhyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:41123: sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ iti kim ? pāṇinīyam adhīte pāṇinīyaḥ, na pāṇinīyaḥ apāṇinīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41124: taddhitāḥ iti kim ? anyāṃ voḍhumarhati kanyāvoḍhā, na voḍhā avoḍhā /
GS24jvkasipu:41129: ya yat ity etau yau taddhitāv atadarthe vartate tadantasya+uttarapadasya naño guṇapratiṣedhaviṣayādanta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41130: pāśānāṃ samūhaḥ pāśyā, na pāśyā apāśyā /
GS24jvkasipu:41132: yat - danteṣu bhavaṃ dantyam, na dantyam adantyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41134: atadarthe iti kim ? pādārthamudakaṃ pādyam, na pādyam apādyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41137: niranubandhakaikānubandhakayor yayator grahaṇād iha na bhavati, vāmadevāḍḍyaḍḍyau (*4,2.5)
GS24jvkasipu:41142: ac ka ity evam antam aśaktau gamyamānāyām uttarapadaṃ nañaḥ paramantodattaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41152: ākrośe ca gamyamāne nañaḥ uttaramackāntam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41161: akrośe gamyamāne nañaḥ param uttarapadaṃ sañjñāyāṃ vartamānam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41168: kṛtya uka iṣṇuc ity evam antāś cārvādayaś ca nañaḥ uttare 'ntodāttāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41176: ity asya dvyanubandhakasya api grahaṇam ikārāder vidhānasāmarthyād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41208: tṛnnanta anna tīkṣṇa śuci ity eteṣu naña uttareṣu vibhāṣā antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41217: bahuvrīhau samāse idam etad tad ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya prathamaśabdasya pūraṇapratyayāntasya ca kriyāgaṇane vartamānasya anataḥ udāttaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41218: idaṃ prathamaṃ gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ vā yasya sa idaṃprathamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41231: prathamapūraṇayoḥ iti kim ? tāni bahūnyasya tadbahuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41232: kriyāgaṇane iti kim ? ayaṃ prathama eṣāṃ te idaṃprathamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41234: gaṇane iti kim ? ayaṃ prathama eṣām te idaṃprathamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41236: uttarapadasya kāryitvāt kapi pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41238: bahuvrīhau ity etat vanaṃ samāse (*6,2.178) iti prāgetasmād adhikṛtam veditavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:41243: saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41252: chandasi viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse saṅkhyāyāḥ paraḥ stanaśabdo vibhāsā 'ntodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41253: dvistanāṃ karoti dyāvāpṛthivyordohāya catuḥstanāṃ karoti paśūnāṃ dohāyāṣṭastanāṃ karoti chandasāṃ dohāya //
GS24jvkasipu:41257: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye bahuvrīhau samāse mitra ajina ityetayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ antaḥ udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41270: vyavāyī vyavadhātā, tadvācinaḥ pramanataraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41281: mukham uttarapadaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41290: avyaya dikśabda go mahat sthūla muṣṭi pṛthu vatsa ity etebhyaḥ paraṃ mukhaṃ svāṅgavāci bahuvrīhau samāse na antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41306: niṣṭhāntāt upamānavācinaś ca mukhaṃ svāṅgam uttarapadam anyatarasyām bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41308: yadā+etad uttarapadāntodāttatvaṃ na bhavati tadā niṣṭhopasargapūrvam anyatarasyām (*6,2.110)
GS24jvkasipu:41310: tadabhāvapakṣe 'pi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena gatisvaraḥ iti trīṇyudāharaṇāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41316: jātivācinaḥ ācchādanavarjitāt kālavācinaḥ sukhādibhyaś ca paraṃ ktāntaṃ kṛtamitapratipannān varjayitvā bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41334: etesu bahuvrīhiṣu niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipāto na bhavaty eva asmād eva jñāpakāt /
