GS24jvkasipu:41340: jātaśabde uttarapade vā anta udātto bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41351: nañsubhyāṃ param uttarapadaṃ bahuvrīhau samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41359: samāsāntāś ca avayavā bhavanti iti anṛcaḥ, bahvṛcaḥ ity atra kṛte samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41363: nañsubhyā kapi parataḥ pūrvam antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41373: hrasvo 'nto yasya tad idaṃ hrasvāntam uttarapadaṃ samāso vā,
GS24jvkasipu:41374: tatra antyāt pūrvam udāttaṃ bhavati kapi parato nañsuhyāṃ paraṃ bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:41380: pūrvam iti vartamane punaḥ pūrvagrahaṇaṃ pravṛttibhedena niyamapratipattyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:41383: tena ajñakaḥ, sujñakaḥ ity atra kabantasya+eva antodāttatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41387: utarapadārthabahutve yo bahuśabdo vartate tasmāt naña iva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41388: nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41391: kapi pūrvam (*6,2.173) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41395: hrasvānte 'nto 'ntyāt pūrvam (*6,2.174) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41399: naño jaramaramitramṛtāḥ (*6,2.116) ity uktam, bahor api tathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41404: uttarapadabhūmni iti kim ? bahuṣu manaḥ asya bahumanāḥ ayam //
GS24jvkasipu:41408: buṇādayo 'vayavavācino bahor uttare bahuvrīhau nāntodāttāḥ bhavanti bahuguṇā rajjuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41420: upasargāt svāṅgaṃ dhruvaṃ parśuvarjitam antodāttaṃ bhavati bahuvrīhau samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:41424: dhruvam ity ekarūpam ucyate, dhruvam asya śītam iti yathā /
GS24jvkasipu:41425: satataṃ yasya pragataṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bahvati sa prapṛṣṭhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41434: samāsamātre vanam ity etad uttarapadam upasargāt paramantodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41438: samāsagrahaṇaṃ samāsamātraparigrahārtham, bahuvrīhāv eva hi syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:41448: antaḥśabdaś ca uttarapadam upasargād antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41455: ni vi ity etābhyām uttaro 'ntaḥśabdo na anatodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41459: tatra udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) iti svarito bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41463: parer uttaram abhitobhavivacanaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41472: yac ca+evaṃ svabhāvaṃ kūlādi tad abhitobhāvigrahaṇena gṛhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41496: niṣkrāntaḥ kālakāt iti kanpratyayāntena kālaśabdena prādisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41522: upasargāt svāṅgam (*6,2.177) iti siddhe vacanam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:41531: tatra api hi pari-praty-upa-apā varjyamāna. ahorātra-avyaveṣu (*6,2.33) ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:41536: sphiga pūta vīṇā añjas adhvan kukṣi ity etāny uttarapadāni sīranāmāni ca nāmaśabdaś ca apād uttarāṇy antodāttani bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:41542: upasargādadhvanaḥ (*5,4.85) iti yadā samāsānto na asti tadā anena antodāttatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41544: tasmin hi saty acpratyayasya cittvād eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:41545: anityaś ca samāsāntaḥ ity etad eva jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:41552: sphigapūtakukṣīṇāṃ grahaṇam abahuvrīhyartham adhruvārtham asvāṅgārthaṃ ca //
GS24jvkasipu:41561: adhyārūḍho vā dantaḥ iti samānādhikaraṇa uttarapadalopī samassaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41562: dantasya+upari yo 'nyoḥ danto jāyate sa ucyate adhidantaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41567: anor uttaram apradhānavāci kanīyaḥ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41574: apradhānakanīyasī iti kim ? anugato jyeṣṭhaḥ anujyeṣṭhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41581: anvādiṣṭaḥ iti kim ? anugataḥ puruṣaḥ anupuruṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41585: ateḥ paramakṛdantaṃ padaśabdaś ca antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41592: iha ca yathā syāt, atikrāntaḥ kārakāt atikārakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:41615: rājaśabdaḥ samāsāntasya anityatvād yadā ṭaj na asti tadā prayojayati /
GS24jvkasipu:41616: tasmin hi sati cittvād eva antodāttatvaṃ siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:41617: tatpuruṣe iti kim ? pratigatāḥ aṃśavaḥ asya pratyaṃśuḥ ayam uṣṭraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41632: upād uttaraṃ dvyac ajinaṃ ca antodāttaṃ bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse gaurādīn varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:41641: tatpuruṣe ity eva, upagataḥ somo 'sya upasomaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41658: suśabdāt paramuttarapadaṃ tatpuruṣe samāse 'ntodāttaṃ bhavati avakṣepaṇe gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:41660: iha khalu idānīṃ susthaṇḍile susphigābhyāṃ supratyavasitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41664: avakṣepaṇe iti kim ? śobhaneṣu tṛṇeṣu sutṛṇeṣu //
GS24jvkasipu:41668: utpucchaśabde tatpuruṣe vibhāṣā anta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41672: tadā thāthādisūtreṇa nityam antodāttatve prāpte vikalpo 'yam iti seyam ubhayatra vibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41673: tatpuruṣe ity eva udastaṃ puccham asya utpucchaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41677: dvi tri ity etābhyām uttaresu pād dat mūrdhan ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yo bahuvrīhiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:41687: mūrdhan iti tvakṛtasamāsanto nānta eva mūrdhanśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41688: tasya etat prayojanam asatyapi samāsānte 'ntodāttatvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41689: etad eva jñāpakam, anityaḥ samāsānto bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41690: yadā 'pi samāsāntaḥ kriyate tadā api bahuvrīheḥ kāryitvāt tadekadeśatvāc ca samāsāntasya antodāttatvaṃ pakṣe bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:41695: bahuvrīhau iti kim ? dvayor mūrdhā dvimūrdhā //
GS24jvkasipu:41702: saḥ akrāntāt paro vibhāṣā antodātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41711: chandasi visaye parādiḥ udātto bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:41718: parādiś ca prāntaś ca pūrvāntaś ca api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41719: pūrvādayaś ca dṛśyante vyatyayo bahulaṃ smṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41721: parāntaś ca -- antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnāṃ chandasy upasaṅkhyānam /
GS24jvkasipu:41726: divodāsāya samagāya te ity evam ādi sarvaṃ saṅgṛhītaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:41727: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41734: aluk iti ca, uttarapade iti ca etad adhikṛtam veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41735: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo 'luk uttarapade ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41742: uttarapade iti kim ? niṣkrāntaḥ stokāt nistokaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41743: anyārtham idam uttarapadagrahaṇam iha apy aluko nivṛtiṃ karoti ity evam arthaṃ lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na aśrayitavyā /
GS24jvkasipu:41747: stokāntikadūrārthakṛcchrāṇi stokādīni, tebhyaḥ parasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ uttarapade aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41754: samāse kṛte prātipadikatvāt supo luki prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:41755: dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ tu stokādīnām anabhidhānāt samāsa eva na bhavati stokābhyāṃ muktaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:41757: tena atra na kadācid aikapadyam aikasvaryaṃ ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41761: tasya vyutpattir asatā satā vā avayavārthena kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:41765: ojas sahas ambhas tamas ity etebhya uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ aluk bhavati uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:41779: manasaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41788: ājñāyinyuttārapade manasaḥ uttarasya tṛtīyāyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41794: ātmanaḥ uttarasyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ pūraṇapratyayānte utārapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41800: kathaṃ janārdanastvātmacaturtha eva iti ? bahuvrīhir ayam ātmā caturtho 'sya asau ātmacaturthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:41806: yayā sañjñayā vaiyākaraṇā eva vyaharanti tasyām ātmanaḥ uttarasyāś caturthyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41814: parasya ca yā caturthī tasya vaiyākaraṇākhyāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41820: halantād adantāc ca+uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ sañjñāyām alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41823: gaviṣṭhiraḥ ity atra tu gaviyudhibhyāṃ sthiraḥ (*8,3.95) ity ata eva vacanād aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:41831: haladantād iti kim ? nadyāṃ kukkuṭikā nadīkukkuṭikā /
GS24jvkasipu:41835: hṛd div ity etebhyām uttarasya ṅer alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41842: prācāṃ deśe yatkāranāma tatra halādav uttarapade haladantād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41847: kāraviśeṣasyāḥ sañjñā etāḥ, tatra pūrveṇa+eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:41848: ete ca trayo niyamavikalpā atreṣyante, kāranāmny eva, prācām eva, halādāv eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:41849: kāranāmni iti kim ? abhyarhite paśuḥ abhyarhitapaśuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41851: prācām iti kim ? yūthe paśuḥ yūthapaśuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41852: halādau iti kim ? avikaṭe uraṇaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41853: haladantād ity eva, nadyāṃ dohanī nadīdohanī //
GS24jvkasipu:41857: madhyād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ gurāv uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41865: mūrdha-mastaka-varjitāt svāṅgād uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ akāme uttarapade 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41871: akāme iti kim ? mukhe kāmo 'sya mukhakāmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41879: tasminn uttarapade haladanttad uttarasyāḥ saptamyāḥ vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41883: svaṅgād dhi bahuvrihau pūrveṇa nityam aluk prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:41884: tatpuruṣe tu svaṅgād asvāṅgāc ca na-in-siddha-badhnātisu ca (*6,3.19)
GS24jvkasipu:41890: tatpuruṣe samāse kṛdante uttarapade saptamyāḥ bahulam alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41900: prāvṛṭ śarat kāla div ity eteṣāṃ je uttarapade saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41910: varṣa kṣara śara vara ity etebhya uttarasyaḥ saptamyāḥ je uttarapade vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41920: tanapratyaye ca parataḥ kālanāmnaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41928: uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhir na+iṣyate hṛdayasya hṛllekha iti lekhagrahaṇāl liṅgāt /
GS24jvkasipu:41934: śaya vāsa vāsin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣv akālavācinaḥ uttarasyāḥ saptamyā vibhāṣā aluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41944: apsu bhavaḥ iti digāditvād yat pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41949: innante uttarapade siddhaśabde badhnātau ca parataḥ saptamyāḥ alug na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41956: cakrabandhaḥ iti kecid udāharanti, tat pacādyajantam draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:41957: ghañante hi bandhe ca vibhāṣā (*6,3.13) ity uktam //
GS24jvkasipu:41962: sthe ca+uttarapade bhāṣāyām saptamyā aluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41972: ākrośe gamyamāne uttarapade ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:41976: ṣaṣthīprakarane vāgdikpaśyadbhyo yuktidaṇḍahareṣu yathāsaṅkhyam alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41986: devānāmpriya ity atra ca ṣaṣṭhyā alug vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:41997: putraśabde uttarapade ākrośe gamyamāne 'nyatarasyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42005: ṛkārāntebhyo vidyasambandhavacibhyo yonisambandhavācibhyaś ca+uttarasyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā alug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42013: vidyāyonisambandhavācini eva+uttarapade yathā syāt, anyatra mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:42020: svasṛ pati ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ ṛkārāntebhyaḥ vidyāyonisambandhavācibhyaḥ vibhāṣā 'lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42023: yadā luk tadā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ svasā (*8,3.84) iti nityaṃ ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:42024: yadā tu aluk tadā mātuḥ piturbhyam anyatarasyām (*8,3.85) iti vikalpena ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:42030: ṛkārāntānāṃ vidyāyonisambhandhavācināṃ yo dvandvas tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42038: putre ity atra anuvartate, ṛtaḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:42039: tena putraśabde 'py uttarapade ṛkārāntasya anaṅādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42045: devatāvācināṃ yo dvandvaḥ tatra+uttarapade pūrvapadasya ānaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42049: dvandve iti vartamāne punar dvandvagrahaṇaṃ prasiddhasahācaryārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:42050: atyantasahacarite lokavijñāte dvandvam ity etat nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42051: tatra ye loke prasiddhasāhacaryā vede ca ye sahavāpanirdiṣṭās teṣām iha grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42052: tena brahamaprajāpatī, śivavaiśravaṇau ity evam ādau na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42059: soma varuṇa ity etayoḥ devatādvandve agneḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42067: kṛtavṛddhāv uttarapade devatādvandve agneḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42070: agnīvaruṇau devate asya, agnīarutau devate asya iti taddhitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42072: ity ubhayapadavṛddhau kṛtāyām ānaṅ, ītvaṃ ca bādhitum ikāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42080: div ity etasya dyāvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:42086: pṛthivyām uttarapade devatādvandve divo divas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, cakārād dyāvā ca /
GS24jvkasipu:42091: kathaṃ dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete iti ? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42095: uṣasaḥ uṣāsā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati devatādvandve uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:42101: mātarapitarau ity udīcāmācāryāṇāṃ matenāraṅādeśaḥ mātṛśabdasya nipatyate mātarapitarau /
GS24jvkasipu:42109: uttarapade tu supāṃ su-luk pūrvasavarṇa-ā-āc-che-yā-ḍā-ḍyā-yāj-ālaḥ (*7,1.39) iti ākārādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42114: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu || PS_6,3.34 ||
GS24jvkasipu:42116: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yena samānāyāmākṛtāvekasmin pravṛttinimitte sa bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ śabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42118: bhāsitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimite sa bhāṣitapuṃskaśabdena+ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:42119: tasya pratipādako yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'pi bhāsitapuṃskaḥ ūṅo 'bhāvaḥ anūṅ,
GS24jvkasipu:42120: bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ yasmin strīśabde sa bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ strīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42122: tasya bhāsitapuṃskāadanūṅaḥ strīśabdasya puṃśabdasyeva rūpaṃ bhavati samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade strīliṅge pūraṇīpriyādivarjite /
GS24jvkasipu:42126: striyā iti kim ? grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulaṃ dṛṣṭirasya grāmaṇidṛṣṭiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42129: kathaṃ garbhibhāryaḥ, prasūtabhāryaḥ, prajātabhāryaḥ iti ? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42131: samānādhikaraṇe iti kim ? kalyāṇā mātā kalyaṇīmātā /
GS24jvkasipu:42132: striyām iti kim ? kalyāṇī pradhānam eṣā kalyāṇīpradhānā ime /
GS24jvkasipu:42133: apūraṇī iti kim ? kalyāṇī pañcamī yāsāṃ tāḥ kalyāṇīpañcamā rātrayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42136: iha mā bhūt, kalyāṇīpañcamīkaḥ pakṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42137: ap pūraṇīpramāṇyoḥ (*5,4.116) ity atra api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam eva ity appratyayo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42154: dṛḍhabhaktiḥ ity evam ādiṣu strīpūrvapadasya avivakṣitvāt siddham iti samādheyam //
GS24jvkasipu:42159: ity ataḥ prabhṛti saṅkhyāyāḥ kriyābhyāvṛttigaṇane kṛtvasuc (*5,4.17)
GS24jvkasipu:42160: iti prāgetasmād ye pratyayāḥ tesu bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42182: guṇavacanasya iti kim ? kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhitvam kaṭhītā /
GS24jvkasipu:42187: katham āgnāyī devatā asya āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti ? kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42194: kyaṅi parato mānini ca stiryā bhāṣitapuṃskād anūṅ puṃvat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42200: iha tu darśanīyāmātmānaṃ manyate darśanīyamāninī iti pūrveṇa+eva siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:42217: iha mā bhūt, pākabhāryaḥ, bhekabhāryaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42221: sañjñāyāḥ pūraṇyāś ca striyāḥ puṃvadbhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42243: vṛddher nimittaṃ yasmin sa vṛddhinimittaḥ taddhitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42244: sa yadi rakte 'rthe vikāre ca na vihitaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:42258: araktavikāre iti kim ? kaṣāyeṇa raktā kāṣāyī, kāṣāyī bṛhatikā yasya sa kāṣāyavṛhatikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42259: lohasya vikāro lauhīm lauhī īṣā yasya rathasya sa lauheṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42264: svāṅgād uttaro ya īkāraḥ tadantāyāḥ striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42277: jāteś ca striyāḥ na puṃvad bhavati amānini parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42291: karmadharaye samāse jātīya deśīya ity etayoś ca pratyayayoḥ bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ striyāḥ puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42293: na kopadhāyāḥ (*6,3.37) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42297: sañjñāpūraṇyoś ca (*6,3.38) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42304: vṛddhinimittasya ca taddhitasyāraktavikare (*6,3.39) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42307: svāṅgāc ca+ito 'mānini (*6,3.40) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42311: jāteś ca (*6,3.41) ity uktam, tatra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42324: strītvena vinā pūrvapadārtho 'tra jatiḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42338: tatra tadrājapratyayasya striyamataśca iti luki kṛte iḍabiḍvṛndārikā iti vigṛhya samāsaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42345: gha rūpa kopa celaṭ brūva gotra mata hata ity eteṣū parato bhāṣitapuṃskat paro yo ṅīpratyayas tadantasya anekāco hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42356: brauva iti bravīti iti bruvaḥ pacādyuaci, vacyādeśo guṇaś ca nipātanānna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42359: anekacaḥ iti kim ? nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām (*6,3.44) iti vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:42365: nadyāḥ śeṣasya ghādiṣu parato hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:42366: kaś ca śeṣaḥ ? aṅī ca yā nadī ṅyantaṃ ca yad ekac /
GS24jvkasipu:42378: ug-itaś ca parasyāḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu anyatarasyām hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42382: prakarṣayogāt prāk strītvasyā vivakṣitatvād vā siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:42387: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade jātīye ca pratyaye parato mahataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42393: samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti kim ? mahataḥ putraḥ mahatputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42394: lakṣaṇoktatvād eva atra na bhaviṣyati iti ced bahuvrīhāv api na syād mahābāhuḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:42396: amahān mahān sampanno mahadbhūtaścandramāḥ ity atra gauṇatvān mahadarthasya na bhavatyātvam /
GS24jvkasipu:42397: mahadātve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānaṃ puṃvadvacanaṃ ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:42406: yukte iti kim ? aṣṭagavaṃ brāhmaṇasya taparakaraṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:42410: dvi aṣṭan ity etayoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām uttarapade abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42431: tri ity etasya trayas ity ayam ādeśo bhavati saṅkhyāyām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42444: catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau saṃkhyāyām uttarapade 'bahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ sarveṣām dvi aṣṭan tri ity eteṣāṃ yad uktaṃ tadvibhāṣa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42454: hṛdayasya hṛt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati lekha yat aṇ lāsa ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42461: etad eva lekhagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam, uttarapadādhikāre pratyayagrahaṇe tadantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:42465: śoka syañ roga ity eteṣu parataḥ hṛdayasya vā hṛdādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42469: hṛdādeśapakṣe hṛdbhagasindhvante pūrvapadasya ca (*7,3.19) ity ubhayapadavṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42476: pādasya pada ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āji āti ga upahata ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:42479: ajyatibhyāṃ, pāde ca ity auṇādikaḥ iṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42480: tatra ajer vībhavo na bhavati ata eva nipātanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42484: tasya sthāne padādeśaḥ upadeśe eva antodātto nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:42487: padājiḥ, padātiḥ, padaga ity eteṣu kṛtsvareṇa samāsasya+eva antodāttatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:42491: yatpratyaye parataḥ pādasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty atadarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:42494: atadarthe iti kim ? pādārtham udakaṃ pādyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42497: parpādibhyaḥ ṣṭhan (*4,4.10) iti pādaśabdāt ṣṭhan pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42498: śarīrāvayavavacanasya pādaśabdasya grahaṇam iha iṣyat, tena paṇapādamāṣaśatad yat (*5,1.34)
GS24jvkasipu:42506: hima kāṣin hati ity eteṣu pādaśabdasya pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42513: ṛkṣambandhinaḥ pādaśabdasya śe parataḥ pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42515: pādaṃ pādaṃ śaṃsati iti saṅkhyaikavacanāc ca vīpsāyām (*5,4.43) iti śas pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42516: ṛcaḥ iti kim ? pādaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaṃ dadāti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42520: ghoṣa miśra śabda ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadeṣu pādasya vā pad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42529: udakaśabdasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati uttarapade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42533: sañjāyām uttarapadasy9a u)dakaśabdasya+udādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:42540: peṣaṃ vāsa vāhana dhi ity eteṣu ca+uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42553: tasminn ekahalādau pūrayitavyavāciny anyatarasyām udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42562: mantha odana saktu bindu vajra bhāra hāra vīvadha gāha ity eteṣu uttarapadesu udakasya uda ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:42568: bhāra - udakaṃ vibharti iti udabhāraḥ, udakabhāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42569: hāra - udakaṃ harati iti udahāraḥ, udakahāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42571: gāha - udakaṃ gāhate iti udagāhaḥ, udakagāhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42575: igantasya aṅyantasya uttarapade hrasvaḥ bhavati gālavasya ācaryasya matena anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:42609: acā hi gṛhyamāṇam atra viśeṣyate, na punar ac gṛhyamāṇena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42613: ṅyantasya abantasya ca sañjñāchandasoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42638: tvapratyaye parato ṅyāpoḥ bahulaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42645: iṣṭakeṣīkāmālānāṃ cita tūla bhārin ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42659: mumā hrasvo na bādhyate, anyathā hi hrasvaśāsanam anarthakaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42662: anavyayasya ity etad eva jñāpakam iha khidantagrahaṇasya //
GS24jvkasipu:42666: arus dviṣat ity etayor ajanatānāṃ ca khidanta uttarapade mumāgamo bhavati anavyayasya /
GS24jvkasipu:42678: ijantasya ekācaḥ khidante uttarapade amāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:42679: ampratyayavac ca dvitīyaikavacanavac ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42685: ampratyayavac ca ity atideśāt ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:42689: śriyam ātmānaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ manyate ity upakramya śrimanyam iti bhavitavyam iti bhāṣye vyavasthitam ?
GS24jvkasipu:42691: atra viṣaye parityaktasvaliṅgaḥ śrīśabdo brāhmaṇakule vartate,
GS24jvkasipu:42693: tatra svamor napuṃsakāt (*7,1.23) ity amo lug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42704: kāraśabda uttarapade satya agada ity etayor mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42705: satyaṃ karoti, satyasya va kāraḥ satyaṅkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42710: bhakṣaṃ karoti, bhakṣasya vā karaḥ bhakṣaṅkāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42729: sūtograrājabhojamervityetebhya uttarasya duhitṛśabdasya putraḍādeśo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42735: kecit tu śārṅgaravādiṣu putraśabdaṃ paṭhanti, teṣāṃ putrī iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42736: anyatra api hi dṛśyate śailaputrī iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42741: śyena tila ity etayoḥ pātaśabde uttarapade ñapratyaye pare mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42748: rātreḥ kṛdanta uttarapade vibhāṣā mumāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42768: tasmāl luptanakārān nañaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati ajādav uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:42771: tasmāt iti kim ? naña eva hi syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42772: pūrvānte hi ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅmuṇ nityam (*8,3.32) iti prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:42776: nabhrāṭ napāt navedāḥ nāsatyāḥ namuci nakula nakha napuṃsaka nakṣatra nakra nāka ity eteṣu nañ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42783: nāsatyāḥ - satsu sādhavaḥ satyāḥ, na satyāḥ asatyāḥ, na asatyāḥ nāsatyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42787: nakha - na asya kham asti iti nakham /
GS24jvkasipu:42788: napuṃsaka - na strī na pumān napuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:42790: nakṣatra - na kṣarate kṣīyate iti vā najñātram /
GS24jvkasipu:42799: ekādiś ca nañ prakṛtyā bhavati, ekaśabdasya ca āduk āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42803: pūrvānto 'yam āduk kriyate padāntalakṣaṇo 'tra anunāsiko vikalpena yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42812: aprāṇiṣu iti kim ? ago vṛṣalaḥ śītena //
GS24jvkasipu:42816: sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:42823: udāttānudāttavato hi sahaśabdasya antaryataḥ svaritaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:42825: anyatra samāsāntodāttatvena bādhyata eva, seṣṭi, sapaśubandham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:42829: granthānte adhike ca vartamānasya sahaśabdasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42833: kalāntaṃ, mahūrtāntaṃ, saṅgrahāntam iti antavacane ity avyayībhāvaḥ samāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42834: tatra avyayībhāve cākāle iti kālavāciny uttarapade samāso na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42841: dvayoḥ sahayuktayor apradhāno yaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42842: upākhyāyate pratyakṣata upalabhyate yaḥ sa upākhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42844: tasmin dvitīye 'nupākhye sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42848: agnyādayaḥ sākṣād anupalabhyamānāḥ kapotādibhir anumīyamānāḥ anupākhyā bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:42852: avyayībhāve ca samāse akālavācini uttarapade sahasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42861: yasya sarve 'vayavā upasarjanībhūtāḥ sa sarvopasarjano bahuvrīhir gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:42862: tadavayavasya sahaśabdasya vā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42868: priyasahakṛtvā iti iha bahuvrīhau yad uttarapadaṃ tat paraḥ sahaśabdo na bhavati iti sabhāvo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:42872: prakṛtyā sahaśabdo bhavati āśiṣi viṣaye agovatsahaleṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:42874: agovatsahaleṣu iti kim ? svasti bhavate sahagave, sagave /
GS24jvkasipu:42877: vopasarjanasya (*6,3.82) iti pakṣe bhavaty eva sahbāvaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:42882: samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye mūrdhan prabhṛti udakam ity etāni uttarapadāni varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:42886: samāno garbhaḥ sagarbhaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ sagarthyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:42892: tena sapakṣaḥ, sādharmyam, sajātīyaḥ ity evam ādayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti //
GS24jvkasipu:42896: jyotis janapada rātri nābhi nāman gotra rūpa sthāna varṇa vayas vacana bandhu ity eteṣu uttarapadeṣu samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42911: caraṇe gamyamāne brahmacāriṇi uttarapade samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42913: brahma vedaḥ, tadadhyayanārthaṃ yad vrataṃ tad api brahma, tac carati iti brahamacārī /
GS24jvkasipu:42914: samānaḥ tasya+eva brahmaṇeḥ samānatvad ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42919: tīrthaśabda uttarapade yatpratyaye parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42926: udaraśabde uttarapade yatpratyayānte samānasya vibhāṣā sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42928: samānodare śayita o ca+udāttaḥ (*4,4.108) iti yat //
GS24jvkasipu:42932: dṛk dṛśa vatu ity eteṣu parataḥ samānasya sa ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42936: ity atra samānānyayośceti vaktavyam iti kañkvinau pratyayau kriyete /
GS24jvkasipu:42944: idaṃ kim ity etayor īś kī ity etau yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśau bhavato dṛgdṛśavatuṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:42970: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye || PS_6,3.92 ||
GS24jvkasipu:42972: viṣvak deva ity etayoḥ sarvanāmnaś ca ṭeḥ adri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:42977: tatra yaṇādeśe kṛte udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥ svarito 'nudāttasya (*8,2.4) ity eṣa svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42982: tena ayaskṛtam, ayaskāraḥ ity atra ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātra iti satvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42984: viśvāī ca ghṛtācī ca ity atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:42985: kadrīcī ity atra tu bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:42989: sam ity etasya sami ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyayante uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:42994: tiras ity etasya tiri ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcāu vapratyayānte uttarapade 'lope,
GS24jvkasipu:43003: saha ity etasya saghriḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati añcatau vapratyānte uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:43010: chandasi viṣaye māda stha ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ sahasya sadha ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43017: dvi antar ity etābhyāṃ upasargāc ca uttarasya ap ity etasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43033: anor uttarasya apaḥ ūkārādeśo bhavati deśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:43036: dīrghoccāraṇam avagrahārtham, anu ūpaḥ anūpaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43040: aṣaṣthīsthasya atṛtīyāsthasya ca anyaśabdasya dugāgamo bhavati āśis āśā āsthā āsthita utsuka ūti kāraka rāga cha ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43051: aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyāsthasya iti kim ? anyasya āśīḥ anyāśīḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43061: arthaśade uttarapade anyasya vibhāṣā dugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43066: ku ity etasya kta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati tatpuruṣe samāse ajādāv uttarapade /
GS24jvkasipu:43080: ratha vada ity etayoś ca+uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43086: dṛṇaśabde uttarapade jātāv abhidheyāyāṃ koḥ kat ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43088: jātau iti kim ? kutsitāni tṛṇāni kutṛṇāni //
GS24jvkasipu:43092: pathin akṣa ity etayor uttarapadayoḥ koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43098: īṣadarthe vartamānasya koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43101: ajādāv api paratvāt kādeśa eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43107: puruṣaśabde uttarapade vibhāṣā koḥ kā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43110: īṣadarthe tu pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityaṃ kā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43115: uṣṇaśabde uttarapade koḥ kavam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, kā ca vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:43120: pathiśabde uttarapade chandasi viṣaye koḥ kavam kā ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:43127: yeṣu lopāgamavarnavikārāḥ śāstreṇa na vihitāḥ dṛśyante ca,
GS24jvkasipu:43129: yāni yāni yathopadiṣṭāni, śaṣṭair uccāritāni prayuktāni, tāni tathā+eva anugantavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:43134: pūrvaśabdasya baśabda ādeśaḥ, uttarapadādeś ca latvam /
GS24jvkasipu:43138: śavaśabdasya śmādeśaḥ, śayanaśabdasya api śānaśabda ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43140: ūrdhvakhaśabdayoḥ ulū khala ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43150: dikśabdebhya uttarasya tīrasya tārabhāvo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43153: vāco vāde ḍatvaṃ ca labhāvaś ca+uttarapadasya+iñi pratyaye bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43159: dhāsu vā ṣaṣa utvaṃ bhavaty uttarapadādeśca ṣṭutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:43162: iha mā bhūt, ṣaṭ dadhāti dhayati vā ṣaḍdhā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43164: kucchreṇa dāśyate nāśyate dabhyate ca yaḥ sa dūḍāśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43176: varṇāgamo varṇaviparyayaś ca dvau cāparau varṇavikāranāśau /
GS24jvkasipu:43179: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau || PS_6,3.110 ||
GS24jvkasipu:43181: saṅkhyā vi sāya ity evaṃpūrvasya ahnaśabdasya sthāne ahan ity ayam ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyāṃ ṅau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43192: ekadeśisamāsaḥ pūrvādibhyo 'nyasya api bhavati ity etad eva visāyapūrvasya ahnasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:43193: tena madhyamahnaḥ madhyāhnaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43199: ḍhakārarephayoḥ lopaḥ yasmin sa ḍhralopaḥ, tatra pūrvasya aṇaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43215: sahi vahi ity etayoḥ avarṇasya okāra ādeśo bhavati ḍhralope /
GS24jvkasipu:43224: varṇagrahaṇaṃ kim ? kṛtāyām api vṛddhau yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43227: tādapi paraḥ taparaḥ, taparatvād ākārasya grahaṇaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:43231: sādhyai sāḍhvā sāḍhā iti nigame nipātyanate /
GS24jvkasipu:43236: nigame iti kim ? soḍhvā, soḍhā iti bhāṣāyām //
GS24jvkasipu:43242: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43244: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:43245: saṃhitāyām iti kim ? vidma, hi, tvā, gopatiṃ, śūra, gonām //
GS24jvkasipu:43249: karṇaśabde uttarapade lakṣaṇavācino dīrgho bhavati viṣṭa aṣṭan pañcan maṇi bhinna chinna chidra sruva svastika ity etān varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:43255: yat paśūnāṃ svāmiviśeṣasambandhajñāpanārthaṃ dātrākārādi kriyate tad iha lakṣaṇaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43269: nahi vṛti vṛṣi vyadhi ruci sahi tani ity eteṣu kvipratyayānteṣu uttarapadeṣu pūrvapadasya dīrgho bhavati saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:43289: vana giri ity etayor uttarapadayor yathāsaṅkhyaṃ koṭaradīnām kiṃśulukādīnāṃ ca dīrgho bhavati sajñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:43318: rajaḥkṛṣyāsutiparṣado valac (*5,2.112) iti valac pratyayo gṛhyate, na prātipadikam /
GS24jvkasipu:43327: matau parato bahvaco 'jirādivarjitasya dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyām viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:43345: śarādīnāṃ ca matau dīrgho bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:43363: igantasya pūrvapadasya pīluvarjitasya vahe uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43374: upasargasya ghañante uttarapade amanuṣye 'bhidheye bahulaṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43393: igantasya upasargasya kāśaśabde uttarapade dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43403: dā ity etasya yaḥ takārādir ādeśaḥ tasmin parataḥ igantasya+upasargasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43408: ity antasya yady api takāraḥ kriyate tathāpi cartvasyāśrayāt siddhatvam iti takārādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43417: aṣṭan ity etasya uttarapade sañjñāyāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43430: aṣṭau pādau asyāḥ iti bahuvrīhau pādasya lope kṛte pādo 'nyatarasyām (*4,1.8) iti ṅīp /
GS24jvkasipu:43431: gavi ca yukte bhāṣāyāmāṣṭano dīrgho bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43443: viśvaśabdasya vasu rāṭ ity etayoḥ uttarapadayoḥ dirgha ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43446: rāṭ iti vikāranirdeśo yatra asya etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:43452: naraśabda uttarapade sañjñāyām viṣaye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43454: sañjñāyām iti kim ? viśve narā yasya sa viśvanaraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43459: mitre ca+uttarapade ṛṣāvabhidheye viśvasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43465: manraviṣaye soma aśva indriya viśvadevya ity eteṣāṃ matuppratyaye parataḥ dīrtho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43474: oṣadhiśabdasya vibhaktāv aprathamāyāṃ parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43482: ṛci viṣaye tu nu gha makṣu taṅ ku tra uruṣya ity eṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43488: taṅ iti thādeśasya ṅītvapakṣe grahaṇaṃ, tena+iha na bhavati, śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43496: igantaraya suñi parato mantraviṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43499: suñaḥ (*8,3.107) iti ṣatvam, naśca dhātusthoruṣubhyaḥ (*8,4.27) iti ṇatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:43505: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:43507: dvyacaḥ iti kim ? aśvā bhavata vājinaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43508: ataḥ iti kim ? ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
GS24jvkasipu:43514: nipātasya ca ṛgviṣaye dīrgḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43520: anyeṣām api dīrgho dṛśyate, sa śiṣṭaprayogādanugantavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43521: yasya dīrghatvaṃ vihitaṃ, dṛśyate ca prayoge, tad anena kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43555: karīṣasya iva gandho 'sya, kumudasya iva gandho 'sya, alpākhyāyām (*5,4.136)
GS24jvkasipu:43561: iko hrasvo 'ṅyo gālavasya (*6,3.61) ity etan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43563: akṛta eva dīrghatve hrasvabhāvapakṣe kṛtārthena api dīrgheṇa pakṣāntare paratvād hrasvo bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43564: punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānaṃ ca na bhavati, sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tadbādhitam eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43565: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43573: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ aṅgasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43587: aṅgādhikāraḥ kṛto 'nyārtho nāmi dīrghatvādyapi vyavasthāpayati iti tadartham arthavadgrahaṇaparibhāṣā nāśrayitavyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43588: aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye eṣā ṣaṣṭhī yathāyogaṃ viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:43591: tato 'kārāntād aṅgāt bhisa ais ity evam ādy api samyak sampannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43595: aṅgāvayavād dhalo yad uttaraṃ samprasāraṇam tadantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43605: tṛtīyā iti vā nipātanād atra dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43610: nām iti etat ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanam āgatanuṭkaṃ gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43617: āgatanuṭkagrahaṇam uttarārtham, kṛte ca nuṭi dīrghapratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:43619: nāmi dīrgha āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet /
GS24jvkasipu:43625: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ nāmi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43628: idam eva nāmi iti dīrghapratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam aci ra ṛtaḥ (*7,2.100)
GS24jvkasipu:43629: ity etasmāt pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuḍāgamo bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43633: chandasi vaṣaye tisṛ-catasroḥ nāmi parataḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate, dīrghaścādīrghaśca /
GS24jvkasipu:43639: nṛ ity etasya nāmi pare ubhayathā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43641: tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate kecid atra chandasi iti na anuvartayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:43646: nāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ nāmi parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43656: sarvanāmasthāne ca parato 'sambuddhau nopadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43668: ṣapūrvasya acaḥ nopadhāyāḥ nigamaviṣaye sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43673: nigame iti kim ? takṣā, takṣāṇau, takṣāṇaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43678: sakārāntasya saṃyogasya yo nakāraḥ mahataś ca tasya+upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ asambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:43692: svasṛ naptṛ neṣṭṛ tvaṣtṛ kṣattṛ hotṛ potṛ paśāstṛ ity eteṣāṃ cāṅgānām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parato 'sambuddhau /
GS24jvkasipu:43694: bahvāmpi taḍāgāni iti kecid icchanti, tatra samāsānto vidhiranityaḥ iti samāsānto na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43695: nityam api ca numamakṛtva dīrghatvam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43712: vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham, evam bhūtānām anyeṣāṃ sañjñāśabdānāṃ dīrgho mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43720: in han pūṣan aryaman ity evam antānām aṅgānāṃ śau parata upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43727: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, inhanpūṣāryamṇām upadhāyaḥ śāv eva dīrgho bhavati na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:43733: dīrghavidhirya ihenprabhṛtīnāṃ taṃ viniyamya suṭīti suvidvān /
GS24jvkasipu:43734: śau niyamaṃ punar eva vidadhyāt bhrūṇahanīti tathāsya na duṣyet //
GS24jvkasipu:43735: śāsmi nivartya suṭītyaviśeṣe śau niyamaṃ kuru vāpyasamīkṣya /
GS24jvkasipu:43736: dīrghavidherupadhāniyamānme hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:43738: yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi naitattena na tatra bhavedviniyamyam //
GS24jvkasipu:43740: iti dīrghatvaṃ yat tad api niyamena bādhyate vṛtrahaṇi, bhrūṇahani iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43742: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva dīrgho bhavati, na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43745: śau eva sarvanāmasthāne dīrgho bhavati na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43747: yas tu na upadhālakṣaṇaḥ sa bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43750: atha va anuvartamāne 'pi sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe sāmarthyādayam aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43752: na ca tasya anyat sarvanāmasthānam asti ity aviśeṣeṇa niyamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43753: tatra tu napuṃsakasya ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43754: tena anapuṃsakasya api dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43755: sarvanāmasthānasañjñāvidhāne tu napuṃsakasya vyāpāro 'sti iti tatra niyamaḥ kriyamaṇo napuṃsakasya syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:43759: sāv asambuddhau parataḥ inhanpūṣaryamṇām upadhāyā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43770: atu as ity evam antasya adhātor upadhāyāḥ sāvasambuddhau parataḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43776: yadi hi paratvān nityatvāc ca num syat, dīrghasya nimittamatūpadhā vihanyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:43780: adhātoḥ iti kim ? piṇḍaṃ grasate iti piṇḍagraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43783: aninasmaṅgrahaṇānyarthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhiṃ prayojayanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43792: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati kvipratyaye parato jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:43813: ajantānām aṅgānaṃ hanigamyoś ca sani jhalādau pare dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43821: iha mā bhūt sañjigaṃsate vatso mātra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:43822: svargaṃ lokaṃ samajigāṃsat iti chandasi yadaniṅādeśasya api dīrghatvaṃ dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:43825: atha vā iha ajgrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43826: sani dīrgho bhavati ity etāvadeva sūtraṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43827: tatrācā gṛhyamāṇasya viśeṣaṇe sati siddham ajantasya dīrghatvam ?
GS24jvkasipu:43828: tat kriyate pravṛttibhedena gamer api viśeṣaṇārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:43831: tato na vaktavyam idaṃ gameriṅādeśasya iti //
GS24jvkasipu:43835: tanoter aṅgasya sani jhalādau vibhāṣā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43838: sanīvantardha ity atra tanoter upasaṅkhyānād iḍāgamo bhavati vikalpena //
GS24jvkasipu:43842: krama upadhāyā vibhāṣā dirgho bhavati ktvā pratyaye jhalādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43846: upakramya iti bahiraṅgo 'pi lyabādeśo 'ntaraṅgānapi vidhīn bādhate iti pūrvam eva dīrghatvaṃ na pravartate //
GS24jvkasipu:43851: vakārasya ca sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ś ūṭḥ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:43852: anunāsikādau pratyayai parataḥ kvau jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:43855: antaraṅgatvāt che ca (*6,1.73) iti tuki kṛte satukkasya śādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43857: siverauṇādike na pratyaye laghūpadhaguṇāt pūrvamūṭḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43858: tatra kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvād yaṇādeśo nānāśrayatvāt ca na vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43865: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti nājānantarye iti pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43874: kecid atra kṅiti iti na anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:43875: kathaṃ dyubhyām, dyubhiḥ iti ūṭhi kṛte ? diva ut (*6,1.131) iti taparatvān mātrākālo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:43876: chaśāṃ ṣaḥ ity atra chagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43879: vāha ūṭḥ (*6,4.139) ity ayam api ṭhideva //
GS24jvkasipu:43883: jvara tvara srivi ava mava ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ vakārasya upadhāyāś ca sthāne ūṭḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati kvau parato 'nunāsike jhalādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:43902: rephāduttarayoḥ chvorlopo bhavati kvau parato jhalādau kṅiti ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43912: rāllope sutukkasya chasya abhāvāt kevalo gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:43925: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ tad asiddhavat bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:43929: tac ced atra yatra bhavati tadā bhāt śāstrīyaṃ vidhīyate tadāśrayam eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43930: vyāśrayaṃ tu nāsiddhavad bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43932: edhi, śādhi ity atra etvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇaṃ dhitvaṃ na prāpnoti, asiddhatvād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43933: āgahi, jahi ity atra anunāsika lope jabhāve ca ato heḥ (*6,4.105)
GS24jvkasipu:43934: iti luk prāpnoti, asiddhatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43937: ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) iti vṛddhau kartavyāyāṃ nalopo nāsiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43941: vasusaṃprasāraṇam āllope yaṇādeśe uvaṅādeśe ca kartavye nāsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43942: āllopādīni vasau, vasantasya vibhaktau saṃprasāraṇam iti samānāśrayatvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:43943: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge iti ? etad apy atra na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:43945: kiṃ kāraṇam ? eṣā hi paribhāṣā ābhācchāstrīyā /
GS24jvkasipu:43946: tasyāṃ pravartamānāyāṃ vasusaṃprasāraṇādīnāmābhācchāstrīyāṇām eva asiddhatvād antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samupasthāpanaṃ na asti iti paribhāṣa na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:43962: supi ca (*7,3.102) iti paratvāt kṛte 'pi dīrghatve sthānivadbhavāt nalopaḥ syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:43963: viśnānām, praśnānām ity atra lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya+eva ity evaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:43967: aniditām aṅgānāṃ halantānām upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:43982: aniditāṃ nalope laṅgikampyor upatāpaśarīravikārayor upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44002: daṃśa sañja ṣvañja ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ śapi parata upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44009: rañjeś ca śapi parataḥ upadhāyāḥ nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44015: bhāvakaranavācini ghañi parato rañjeḥ upadhāyā nakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44019: bhāvakaraṇayoḥ iti kim ? rajanti tasminn iti raṅgaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44025: ikprakaraṇāt na dhātulopaḥ iti pratiṣedho na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:44033: avoda edha odma praśratha himaśratha ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:44034: avoda iti underavapūrvasya ghañi nalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44035: edha iti indher ghañi nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44036: na dhātulopa ārdhadhātuke (*1,1.4) iti hi pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44037: odma iti underauṇādike manpratyaye nalopo guṇaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44038: praśratha iti prapūrvasya śrantherghañi nalopo vṛddhyabhavaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44039: himaśratha iti himapūrvasya śrantheḥ ghañyeva nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:44043: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe nakārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44054: ktvāprayaye parataḥ skanda syanda ity etayor nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44059: tatra yadā iḍāgamaḥ tadā na ktvā seṭ (*1,2.18) iti kittvapratiṣedhād eva nalopābhāvaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44063: jāntānām aṅgānāṃ naśeś ca ktvāpratyaye parataḥ vibhāṣā nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44071: bhañjeś ca ciṇi parato vibhāṣā nakāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44073: aprāpto 'yaṃ nalopaḥ pakṣe vidhīyate, tato na iti na anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:44077: śāsa upadhāyā ikārādeśo bhavati aṅi parato halādau ca kṅiti /
GS24jvkasipu:44083: ittve kṛte śāsivasighasīnāṃ ca (*8,3.60) iti ṣatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:44087: kvau ca śāsa ittvaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44090: yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ śāsu anuśiṣṭau iti, tasya+eva+idaṃ grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44091: āṅaḥ śāsu icchāyām iti asya na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44094: kvippratyaye tu tasya api bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44096: kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅākāṅkṣam (*8,2.104) iti nipātanād vā siddham //
GS24jvkasipu:44101: śāso hau parataḥ śā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44104: upadhāyāḥ iti nivṛttam, tataḥ śāsaḥ iti sthāneyogā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44106: tena yadā vā chandasi (*3,4.88) iti pittvaṃ hiśabdasya tadā apy ādeśo bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:44107: śādhi ity ādyudāttam api chandasi dṛśyate //
GS24jvkasipu:44111: hanterdhātoḥ jaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati hau parata /
GS24jvkasipu:44116: anudāttopadeśānām aṅgānāṃ vanateḥ tanotyādīnāṃ ca anunāsikalopo bhavati jhalādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44128: ktici tu na ktici dīrghaśca (*6,4.39) iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44159: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha vayathā syāt, gatiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44160: iha ca mā bhūt, śāntaḥ, śāntavān iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44164: lyapi parataḥ anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44165: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca+iyam, tena makārāntānāṃ vikalpo bhavati, anyatra nityam eva lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44177: ktici parato 'nudāttopadeśādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ dīrghaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44200: viṭi vani ca pratyaye parataḥ anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44209: sanoter anaḥ (*8,3.108) iti ṣatvam goṣā indo nṛṣā asi ity atra /
GS24jvkasipu:44213: anunāsikasya iti vartamāne punar anunāsikagrahaṇam anunāsikāmātraparigrahārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:44219: jana sana khana ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sani jhalādau kṅiti jhalādau pratyaye parataḥ ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44230: jhalgrahaṇaṃ sanviśeṣaṇārthaṃ kimartham anuvartyate ? iha mā bhūt, jijaniṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:44235: atra jhalādau kṅiti sanoter vipratiṣedhād ātvam anunāsikalopaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:44237: iti halgrahaṇam jñāpakam asminnasiddhaprakaraṇe vipratiṣedho bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44242: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parato janasanakhanām ākāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:44249: janeḥ śyani jñā-janor jā (*7,3.79) iti nityaṃ jādeśo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44253: tanoteḥ yaki parato vibhāṣā ākāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44257: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām || PS_6,4.45 ||
GS24jvkasipu:44259: sanoter aṅgasya ktici pratyaye parata ākāra ādeśo bhavati, lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:44261: anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam vispaṣṭārtham, yesambaddhaṃ hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇam iti nivṛttam ity āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:44267: iti prāg etasmād yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ ārdhahdātuke ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44274: pratyayalopalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārthaṃ syāt ity etan na jñāpakaṃ śapo lopābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:44302: syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu bhāvakarmaṇor upadeśe 'jjhanagrahadṛśāṃ vā ciṇvadiṭ ca (*6,4.62) /
GS24jvkasipu:44306: hriyeta yagantasya ajantatvāc ciṇvadbhāve sati vṛddhiḥ syāt, tataś ca yuk prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:44307: ato lopo yalopaś ca ṇilopaś ca prayojanam /
GS24jvkasipu:44308: āllopa ītvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhavaś ca sīyuṭi //
GS24jvkasipu:44312: bhrasjo rephasya upadhāyāś ca ram anyatarasyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44313: ropadhayoḥ iti sthānaṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāt upadhā rephaś ca nivartete /
GS24jvkasipu:44319: bhṛṣṭaḥ, bhṛṣṭavān ity atra pūrvavipratiṣedhena samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44344: hala uttarasya yaśabdasya ārdhadhātuke lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44349: tatra alo 'ntyasya (*1,1.52) ity etan na bhavati, ato lopaḥ (*6,4.48) iti yakāro 'nena lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44357: kyasya hala uttarasya vibhāṣā lopo bhavati ārdhadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:44360: samidhamātmanaḥ icchati, samidham iva ātmānam ācarati iti vā kyackyaṅau yathāyogam kartavyau //
GS24jvkasipu:44389: seḍgrahaṇasāmarthyād iha pūrveṇa api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44390: sanīvantardha (*7,2.49) iti jñaperiṭi vikalpite yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15) iti niṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44391: atha punaḥ ekācaḥ iti tatra anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:44392: tadā nityam atra bhavitavyam eva iḍāgamena iti seḍgrahaṇam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:44393: tat kriyate kālāvadhāraṇārtham, iḍāgame kṛte ṇilopo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44394: akṛte hi tatra ṇilope sati kāritam ity atra ekāca upadeśe 'nudāttāt (*7,2.10)
GS24jvkasipu:44399: janitā iti mantraviṣaye iḍādau ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44405: yajñakarmaṇi śamitā iti iḍādau tṛci ṇilopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44408: yajñe iti kim ? śṛtaṃ haviḥ śamayitaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44412: ām anta ālu āyya itnu iṣṇu ity eteṣu parataḥ ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44428: lyapi parato laghupūrvād varṇād uttarasya ṇeḥ ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44429: praṇamayya, pratamayya, pradamayya, praśamayya, sandamyya gataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44432: hrasvayalopāl lopānām asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati asamānāśrayatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:44439: āpa uttarasya ṇerlyapi parato vibhāṣā ayādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44441: iṅādeśasya lākṣaṇikatvān na bhavati, adhyāpya gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44446: yu plu ity etayor lyapi parataḥ chandasi viṣaye dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44454: kṣiyaś ca dīrgho bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44459: ṇyataḥ kṛtyasya artho bhāvakarmaṇī, tābhyām anyatra yā niṣṭhā tasyāṃ kṣiyo dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44464: prakṣīṇam idam devadattasya iti kto 'dhikaraṇe ca dhrauvya-gati. pratyavasānārthebhyaḥ (*3,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:44466: aṇyadarthe iti kim ? akṣitamasi mā mekṣeṣṭhāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44467: kṣitam iti bhāve dīrghābhāvāt kṣiyo dīrghāt (*8,2.46) iti niṣṭhānatvam api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44471: ākrośe gamyamāne dainye ca kṣiyo niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44476: sya-sic-sīyuṭ-tāsiṣu bhāva-karmaṇor upadeśe 'j-jhana-graha-dṛśāṃ vā ciṇvad-iṭ ca || PS_6,4.62 ||
GS24jvkasipu:44478: sva sic sīyuṭ tāsi ity eteṣu bhāvakarmaviṣayeṣu parata upadeśe ajantānām aṅgānāṃ han graḥ dṛś ity eteṣāṃ ca ciṇvat kāryaṃ bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:44484: ciṇvadvṛddhir yuk ca hanteś ca ghatvaṃ dīrghaś ca+ukto yo mitāṃ vā ciṇīti /
GS24jvkasipu:44485: iṭ ca asiddhas tena me lupyate ṇirnityaś ca ayaṃ valnimitto vighātī //
GS24jvkasipu:44497: graho 'liṭi dīrghaḥ (*7,2.37) iti prakṛtasya iṭo dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:44522: upadeśe iti kim ? kāriṣyate iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca na prāpnoti, upadeśagrahaṇād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44524: aṅgādhikāravihitaṃ kāryam iha atidiśyate, tena haniṇiṅāmādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:44536: dīṅo yuḍāgamo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44538: dīṅaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśād ajāder yuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44540: iti yaṇādeśe kartavye tasya siddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44546: iṭy ajādāv ārdhadhātuke kṅiti ca ākārāntasya aṅgasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44561: rāter lāteś ca laṅi iṭi rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:44568: īkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ākārantasya aṅgasya yati parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44577: mā sthā gā pā jahāti sā ity eteṣāṃ halādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44591: pāter iha grahaṇaṃ na asti, lugvikaraṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44595: jahāter iha nirdeśāt jihāter grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44603: etad eva halgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam asmin prakaraṇe vipratiṣedhena asiddhatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44623: ghvādibhyaḥ anyasya saṃyogāder ākārāntasya vā ekārādeśo bhavati liṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44633: lyapi pratyaye parataḥ ghumāsthāgāpājahātisāṃ yaduktaṃ tanna /
GS24jvkasipu:44645: mayater ikārādeśo vā bhavati lyapi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44651: luṅ laṅ lṛṅ ity eteṣu parato 'ṅgasya aḍāgamo bhavati, udāttaś ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44661: āḍāgamo bhavati ajādīnāṃ luṅ-laṅ-lṛṅ-kṣu parataḥ, udāttaś ca sa bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44676: auhyata iti laṅi kṛte lāvasthāyām aḍāgamād antaraṅgatvāl lādeśaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:44677: tatra kṛte vikaraṇo nityatvād aḍāgamaṃ bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:44679: kṛte hi vikaraṇāntasya aṅgasya tena bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:44680: akṛte tu dhātumātrasya śabdāntarasya prāpnuvan vidhiranityo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44682: vikaraṇe kṛte samprasāraṇam aḍāgamān nityatvād eva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44683: samprasāraṇe ca kṛte 'jādyaṅgaṃ jātam iti āḍajādīnām ity āḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:44688: yatra hi vihitaḥ tato 'nyatra api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44689: āṅajādīnām (*6,4.72) ity uktam, anajādīnām api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44693: āvaḥ iti vṛño luṅi mantre ghasahvara iti lerluki kṛte ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44699: māṅyoge luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44711: chandasi viṣaye māṅyoge 'pi bahulam aḍāṭau bhavataḥ, amāṅyoge 'pi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44715: māṅyoge 'pi bhavataḥ - mā vaḥ kṣetre parabījānyavāpsuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44722: ire ity etasya chadasi viṣaye bahulaṃ re ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44725: dhāño rebhāvasya asiddhatvād āto lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44728: atra reśabdasya seṭoṃ dhātūnāmiṭi kṛte punā rebhāvaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:44733: śnupratyayāntasya aṅgasya dhātoḥ ivarṇa-uvarṇāntasya bhru ity etasya iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato 'jādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44759: iyaṅuvaṅprakaraṇe tanvādīnāṃ chandasi bahulam upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:44771: abhyāsasya ivarṇovarṇāntasya avasarṇe 'ci parataḥ iyaṅ uvaṅ ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44784: strī ity etasya ajādau pratyaye parataḥ iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44791: ami śasi parataḥ striyāṃ vā iyaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44803: madhye 'pavadāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti guṇavṛddhibhyāṃ paratvādayaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44809: dhātoḥ iti vartate, tena saṃyogo viśeṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44810: dhātor avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād ivarṇāna bhavati asāvasaṃyogapūrvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:44811: tadantasya aṅgasya anekāco 'ci parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44818: eḥ iti kim ? asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ivarṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ yathā syāt, aṅgaviśeṣaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44819: luluvatuḥ, luluvuḥ ity etat tu oḥ supi (*6,4.83) iti niyamādapi sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:44824: dhātunā saṃyogaviśeṣaṇam kim ? iha api syād unnyau, unnyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44825: gatikārakābhyām anyapūrvasya neṣyate, paramaniyau, paramaniyaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44829: dhātv avayavaḥ saṃyogaḥ pūrvo yasmād uvarṇān na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:44830: tadantasya aṅgasya anekācaḥ ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44848: varṣābhū ity etasya ajādau supi parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44860: bhū sudhī ity etayor yaṇādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44868: chandasi viṣaye bhū sudhi ity etayoḥ ubhayathā dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44877: hu ity etasya aṅgasya śnupratyayāntasya anekācaḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya ajādau sārvadhātuke parato yaṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44886: idam eva huśnugrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ bhāṣāyām api yaṅlugasti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44887: chandasi chandasy ubhayathā (*6,4.86) ity ārdhadhātukatvād eva yaṇādeśasya aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44888: naca yaṅlugantādayat pratyudāharaṇam uvarṇāntam anekāc asaṃyogapūrvaṃ sārvadhātuke vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:44896: bhuvo vugāgamo bhavati luṅi liṭi ca ajādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44902: goho 'ṅgasya upadhāyā ūkārādeśo bhavati ajādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44909: upadhāyāḥ iti kim ? alaḥ antyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:44911: yatra asya+etad rūpaṃ tatra+eva yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44915: nigūhya gataḥ ity ūtvasya asiddhatvād lyapi laghupūrvād iti ṇerayādeśaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44916: vyāśrayatvād eva asiddhatvam atra na asti, ṇāvūtvaṃ, ṇyantasya ca lyapyayādeśa iti /
GS24jvkasipu:44922: doṣaḥ upadhāyā ūkāraḥ ādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44930: cittavikarārthe doṣa upadhāyā vā ūkārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44937: mito dhātavaḥ ghaṭādayo mitaḥ ity evam ādayo ye pratipāditāḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:44938: teṣām upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44947: tena utkrāmayati, saṅkrāmayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:44951: ciṇpare ṇamulpare ca ṇau parataḥ mitām aṅgānām upadhāyāḥ dīrgho bhavati anyatarasyāṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:44956: dīrghagrahaṇaṃ kiṃ, na hrasvavikalpa eva vidhīyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:44957: na+evaṃ śakyam, śamayantaṃ prayuṅkte iti dvitīye ṇici hrasvavikalpo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:44958: ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvād dīrghavidhau tvajādeśo na sthānivat /
GS24jvkasipu:44966: tayor dirghavidhau ādeśo na sthānivad bhavati iti asthānivadbhāvāt dīrghaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44970: ṇau hi ṇiyaṅor lopaḥ, ciṇṇamulpare ṇāvaṅgasya dīrghatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:44974: khacpare ṇau parato hrasvo bhavati aṅgasya upadhāyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44981: hlādo 'ṅgasya upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:44985: hlādaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kriyate, ktinyapi yathā stāt, prahlattiḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:44989: chāder aṅgasya advyupasargasya ghapratyaye parataḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44992: ṇilopasya asiddhatvaṃ sthānivadbhāvo vāvacanasāmarthyād atra na bhavati iti hrasvabhāvinī upadhā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:44996: uttarā hi saṅkhyā pūrvasaṅkhyākṛtaṃ vyapadeśam nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:45002: is man tran kvi ity eteṣu parataḥ chādeḥ upadhāyāḥ hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45011: gama hana jana khā ghasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām upadhāyā lopo bhavaty ajādau pratyaye kṅiti anaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45031: tani pati ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye upadhāyā lopo bhavati ajādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45039: ghasi bhasa ity etayoḥ chandasi upadhāyā lopo bhavati lahādau ajādau ca kgiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45040: sagdhiś ca me sapītiś ca me /
GS24jvkasipu:45042: sagdhiḥ iti adeḥ ktini bahulaṃ chandasi iti ghaslādeśe upadhāyāḥ lope ca kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,
GS24jvkasipu:45045: tataḥ samānā gdhiḥ sagdhiḥ iti samāse kṛte samānasya sabhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45046: babdhām iti bhaser loṭi tāmi ślau dvirvacane kṛte upadhālopasalopadhatvajaśtvāni kartavyāni /
GS24jvkasipu:45047: dvirvacanāt paratvān nityatvāc ca upadhālopaḥ prāpnoti, chāndasatvāt sa tathā na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45053: hu ity etasmād jhalantebhyas ca+uttarasya halādeḥ heḥ sthāne dhirādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45063: bhintāt tvam iti paratvāt tātaṅi kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena yad badhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punaḥ dhibhāvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45064: bhindhaki, chindhaki ity atra paratvād dhibhāve kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānād akac kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45069: śru śṛṇu pṝ kṛ vṛ ity etebhya uttarasya heḥ dhirādeśo havati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:45075: śṛṇudhi ity atra dhibhāvavidhānasāmārthyād utaś ca pratyayāt iti herluk na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45077: ato 'nyatra vyatyayo bahulam iti śap, tasya bahulaṃ chandasi iti luk //
GS24jvkasipu:45087: rārandhi iti ramervyatyayena parasmaipadam , śapaḥ ślu, abhyāsadīrghatvaṃ chāndasatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45099: akāritarām, ahāritamām ity atra talopasya asiddhatvāt taraptamapor na lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45100: ciṇo luk ity etad viṣayabhedād bhidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45104: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya heḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45117: ukāro yo 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayād uttarasya herluk bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45129: utaś ca pratyayādityatra chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45135: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ || PS_6,4.107 ||
GS24jvkasipu:45137: yo 'yam ukāro 'saṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantasya pratyayasya anyatarasyāṃ lopo bhavati vakāram akārādau pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45150: karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya vakāramakārādau pratyaye parataḥ nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45159: yakārādauca pratyaye parataḥ karoteḥ uttarasya ukārapratyayasya nityaṃ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45164: ukārapratyayāntasya karoteḥ akārasya sthāne ukāraḥ ādeśo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45167: sārvadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kim ? bhūtapūrve 'pi sārvadhātuke yathā syāt, kuru /
GS24jvkasipu:45175: śnasya asteś ca akārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45184: śnasoḥ iti ākārasya pararūpatvaṃ śakandhvādisu draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:45188: śnā ity etasya abhyastānāṃ ca aṅgānām ākārasya lopo bhavati sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45208: śnāntānām aṅgānām abhyastānāṃ ca ghuvarjitānām ātaḥ īkārādeśo bhavati halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45230: daridrāteḥ halādau sārvadhātuke kṅiti parataḥ ikarādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45237: siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45239: ākārāntalakṣaṇo ṇapratyayo na bhavati, pacāditvādajeva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45240: na daridrāyake lopo daridrāṇe ca neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45244: daridrasya iti nirdeśe chāndasaṃ hrasvatvam draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:45248: bhī ity etasya aṅgasya anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45259: jahāteś ca ikārādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ halādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45271: jahāter ākāraś ca antādeśo bhavati ikāraś ca anyatarasyāṃ hau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45276: lopo bhavati jahāteḥ yakārādau kṅiti sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45283: ghusañjñākānām aṅgānām asteś ca ekārādeśo bhavati hau parataḥ abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45292: liṭi parata ādeśaḥ ādir yasya aṅgasya na asti tasya ekahalmadhye asahāyayor halor madhye yo 'kāras tasya ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45315: liṭaḥ ādeśaviśeṣaṇaṃ kim ? iha api yathā syāt, nematuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45318: anaimittike natvasatve, tadādir liṭi ādeśādirna bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45319: iha abhyāsajaśtvacartvayor asiddhatvaṃ nāsti, tena tadādir apy ādeśādir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45321: rūpābhede cādeśādir na aśrīyate iti śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:45322: anyathā hi pecatuḥ, pecuḥ, dematuḥ, demuḥ ity evam ādīnām api prakṛtijaścarādīnām etvaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45332: aneśam iti naśeḥ luṅi puṣāditvād aṅ /
GS24jvkasipu:45333: menakā iti maneḥ āśiṣi ca (*3,1.150) iti vun /
GS24jvkasipu:45344: laṅi iṭi chandasyapi dṛśyate (*6,4.73) iti anajāder api iḍāgamaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45348: thali ca seṭi parato 'nādeśādeḥ aṅgasya ekahalmadhyagatasya ataḥ sthāne ekāra ādeśo bhavati, abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45362: tṝ phala bhaja trapa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ata ekārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45363: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:45384: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:45391: ataḥ ity etad iha+upasthitaṃ taparatvakṛtamapāsya kālaviśeṣam asambhavād avarṇamātraṃ pratipādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:45392: atha vā śnābhyas tayor ātaḥ (*6,4.112) ity anuvartate iti vyākhyeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45393: ekahalmadhye vā yaḥ sa sthānī bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:45397: jṝ bhramu trasa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataḥ sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45398: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:45421: phaṇādīnāṃ saptānāṃ dhātūnām avarṇasya sthāne vā ekāra ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45422: abhyāsalopaś ca liṭi kṅiti parataḥ thali ca seṭi /
GS24jvkasipu:45459: śasa dada ity etayoḥ vakārādīnāṃ ca dhātūnāṃ guṇa ity evam abhinirvṛttasya ca yo 'kāraḥ tasya sthāne ekārādeśo na bhavati, abhyāsalopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45472: guṇaśabdābhinirvṛttasya arśabdasya okārasya ca ayam akāraḥ iti etvaṃ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45476: arvan ity etasya aṅgasya tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:45478: sa ca naña uttaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45492: maghavan ity etasya aṅgasya bahulaṃ tṛ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45507: bhasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ ā adhyāyaparisamāapteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45508: yad ita ūrdhvam anukamiṣyāmaḥ bhasya ity evaṃ tadvedivyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45519: tadantasya aṅgasya bhasya pat ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45520: sa ca nirdiśyamānasyādeśā bhavanti iti pācchabdasya+eva bhavati, na tadantasya sarvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:45539: ākāralope kartavye vasusaṃprasāraṇasya vyāśrayatvād asiddhatvam na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45544: vāhaḥ ity evam antasya bhasya ūṭḥ ity etat samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45552: atha kimarthamūṭḥ kriyate, samprasāraṇe eva kṛte guṇe ca vṛddhir eci (*6,1.88)
GS24jvkasipu:45553: iti vṛddhau satyām siddhaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati praṣṭhauhaḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:45555: etaj jñāpayati, bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45556: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ bahiraṅgasya samprasāraṇasya asiddhatvāt antaraṅgo guṇo na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:45560: śvan yuvan maghavan ity eteṣām aṅgānām ataddhite pratyaye parataḥ samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45586: an ity evam antasya bhasya akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45599: ṣakārapūrvo yaḥ an hanaḥ dhṛtarājñaś ca tasya akāralopo bhavati aṇi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45606: an iti prakṛtibhāvena allopaṭilopau ubhāvapi na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45611: ṅau parataḥ śīśabde ca ano vibhāṣā akāralopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45618: vakāra-makārāntāt saṃyogād uttarasya anaḥ akārasya lopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45661: ātaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ, tena ktvo lyap, halaḥ śnaḥ śānac ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45666: mantreṣu āgi parataḥ ātmanaḥ āderlopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45676: bhasya viṃśateḥ tiśabdasy aṅiti pratyaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45685: ṭisañjñakasya ḍiti pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45692: ḍiti abhasya api anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyat ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:45696: nakārāntasya bhasya ṭeḥ lopo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45704: atra ye innantāḥ teṣām in aṇy anapatye (*6,4.164)
GS24jvkasipu:45705: iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ, ye tu anantāḥ teṣām an (*6,4.167) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45711: śaiśikeṣv artheṣu vṛddhatvād atra chaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:45729: yeṣām avyayānām avihitaṣṭilopaḥ, prayoge ca dṛśyate, te sāyaṃprātikaprakārāḥ grahītavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45736: ārātīyaḥ, śāśvatikaḥ, śāśvataḥ ity evam ādiṣu na dṛśyate ṭilopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45740: ahan ity etasya ṭakhor eva parataḥ ṭilopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45742: dve ahanī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyahīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45747: iha mā bhūt, ahnā nirvṛttam āhnikam /
GS24jvkasipu:45749: ahnaḥ eva ṭakhoḥ ity evaṃ niyamo na bhavisyati, ātmādhvānau khe (*6,1.169)
GS24jvkasipu:45754: uvarṇāntasya bhasya guṇo bhavati taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45763: orot iti vaktavye guṇagrahaṇaṃ sañjñāpūrvako vidhir anityo yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:45769: ḍhe parataḥ uvarṇāntasya bhasya akarvāḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45774: akadrvāḥ iti kim ? kādraveyo mantram apaśyat //
GS24jvkasipu:45778: ivarṇāntasya avarṇātasya ca bhasya ikāre pare taddhite ca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45782: savarnadīrghatve hi sati atisakher āgacchati ity atra ekādeśasya antavattvād askhi iti ghisañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45798: auṅaḥ śībhāve kṛte yasya+iti ca iti, sūryatiṣyāgastyamatsyānāṃ ya upadhāyāḥ (*6,4.149)
GS24jvkasipu:45801: vatsān prīṇāti vatsaprīḥ, tasya apatyam vātsapreyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45807: sūrya tisya agastya matsya ity eteṣāṃ yakārasya upadhāyāḥ bhasya lopo bhavati īti paratastaddhite ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45809: aṇi yo yasya+iti lopaḥ tasya asiddhatvaṃ na asti, vyāśrayatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:45810: īkāre tu yastasyā - siddhatvād upadhāyakāro bhasyāṇantasya sūryasya sambandhī iti lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:45813: agastya - agastyasya apatyaṃ strī, ṛṣitvādaṇi kṛte āgastī /
GS24jvkasipu:45821: iha mā bhūt, matsyasya+idaṃ māṃsaṃ mātsyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45827: iha mā bhūt, sauryam caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:45833: antikaśabdasya tasipratyaye parataḥ kakāradeḥ śabdasya lopaḥ, ādyudāttatvam ca /
GS24jvkasipu:45836: tamapratyaye antikaśabdasya takārādeḥ kakārādeś ca lopo vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45840: anyatra api hi vṛśyate, antike sīdati iti antiṣat /
GS24jvkasipu:45848: hala uttarasya taddhitayakārasya upadhāyāḥ īti parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45852: taddhitasya iti kim ? vaidyasya bhāryā vaidhyī //
GS24jvkasipu:45857: āpatyayakārasya halaḥ uttarasya taddhite anākārādau lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45866: halaḥ ity eva, kārikeyasya apatyaṃ kārikeyiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:45870: kya cvi ity etayoś ca parataḥ āpatyayakārasya hala uttarasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45885: naḍādīnāṃ kuk ca (*4,2.91) iti kṛtakugāgamā bilvakādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:45886: tebhyaḥ uttarasya chasya bhasya taddhite parato lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45887: bilvā yasyāṃ santi bilvakīyā, tasyāṃ bhavāḥ bailvakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45897: chagrahaṇam kim ? chamātrasya lug yathā syāt, kuko nivṛttir mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:45898: anyathā hi saṃniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayor api abhāvaḥ iti kugapi nivarteta /
GS24jvkasipu:45899: luggrahaṇaṃ sarvalopo yathā syād, yakāramātrasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:45903: iṣṭhan imanic īyasun ity eteṣu parataḥ tṛśabdasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:45909: antyasya hi ṭeḥ (*6,4.155) ity eva siddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:45910: lug ity etad atra na anuvartate, tathā hi sati na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.63)
GS24jvkasipu:45925: ṇāviṣṭhavat prātipadikasya kāryaṃ bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:45941: etad ubhayam api udāharaṇamātram, na parigaṇanam /
GS24jvkasipu:45944: sthūla-dūra-yuva-hrasva-kṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ || PS_6,4.156 ||
GS24jvkasipu:45946: sthūla dūra yuva hrasva kṣipra kṣudra ity eteṣāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ lupyate iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:45964: paragrahaṇaṃ kim ? yaviṣṭhaḥ, yavīyān, hrasiṣṭhaḥ, hrasīyān ity atra pūrvasya yaṇāderlopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:45969_0: priya sthira sphira uru bahula guru vṛddha tṛpra dīrgha vṛndāraka ity eteṣāṃ pra
GS24jvkasipu:45969_1: stha spha var baṃhi gar varṣi trap drādhi vṛnda ity ete yathāsaṅkhyam ādeśā bhavanti
GS24jvkasipu:45995: priyorugurubahuladīrghāḥ pṛthvādiṣu paṭhyante, tena anyeṣāmimanij na bhavati iti nodāhriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:45998: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ || PS_6,4.158 ||
GS24jvkasipu:46000: bahor uttareṣām iṣthemeyasāṃ lopo bhavati, tasya ca bahoḥ sthāne bhū ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46005: bahor iti punargrahaṇaṃ sthānitvapratipattyartham, anyathā hi pratyayānām eva bhūbhāvaḥ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46010: bahor uttarasya iṣṭhasya yiḍāgamo bhavati, bahoś ca bhūrādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46018: lopasya yiṭā vyavahitatvāt āt ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46019: lope hi sati akṛdyakāra iti dīrghatvena jyāyān iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:46023: raśabda ādeśo bhavati ṛkārasya halāder laghoḥ iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46040: pṛthuṃ mṛduṃ bhṛśaṃ ca+eva kṛśaṃ ca dṛḍham eva ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46041: paripūrvaṃ vṛḍhaṃ ca+eva ṣaḍetān ravidhau smaret //
GS24jvkasipu:46042: tataḥ iha na bhavati, kṛtamācaṣṭe kṛtayati /
GS24jvkasipu:46048: ṛju ity etasya ṛtaḥ sthāne vibhāṣā repha ādeśo bhavati iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46055: ekāc yad bhasañjñākaṃ tad iṣṭhemeyassu parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46056: sragvinn ity etasya vinnantasya srajiṣṭhaḥ, srajīyān, srajayati /
GS24jvkasipu:46057: srugvad ity etasya matvantasya sruciṣthaḥ, srucīyān, srucayati /
GS24jvkasipu:46058: ekāc iti kim ? vasumat ity etasya vasiṣṭhaḥ, vasīyān /
GS24jvkasipu:46060: ake pratyaye parato rājanya manuṣya yuvan ity ete prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46063: āpatyasya ca taddhite 'nāti (*6,4.151) iti yalopaḥ prakṛtibhāvena na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46066: tasya nas taddhite (*6,4.144) iti ṭilopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46074: abhividhau bhāva inuṇ (*3,3.44), aṇinuṇaḥ (*5,4.15) ity aṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:46076: aṇi iti kim ? daṇḍināṃ samūho dāṇḍam /
GS24jvkasipu:46082: gāthin vidathin keśin gaṇin paṇin ity ete ca aṇi prakṛtyā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46092: saṃyogādiś ca in aṇi prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46099: annantamaṇi prakṛtyā bhavati apatye cānapatye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:46108: yakārādau ca taddhite abhāvakarmaṇor arthayoḥ an prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46110: vemanyaḥ abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti kim ? rājño bhāvaḥ karma vā rājyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46111: rājan iti purohitādiṣu paṭhyate, tato 'yaṃ yakpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46115: ātman adhvan ity etau khe parataḥ prakṛtyā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46120: pratyātmam iti avyayībhāve anaś ca (*5,4.108) iti samāsāntaḥ ṭacpratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46121: prādhvam iti upasargād adhvanaḥ (*5,4.85) iti acpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46125: mapūrvaḥ an avarmaṇo 'ṇi parato 'patye 'rthe na prakṛtyā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46129: apatye iti kim ? carmaṇā parivṛto rathaḥ cārmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46137: brāhmaḥ ity etad apatyādhikāre 'pi sāmarthyād apatyād anyatrāṇi ṭilopārthaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46143: apatye ātāvaṇi brahmaṇaṣ ṭilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46152: yady evaṃ kim artham idam, nas taddhite (*6,4.144) ity eva ṭilopaḥ siddhaḥ ? satyam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:46154: etaj jñāpayati tācchīlike ṇe 'ṇkṛtāni bhavanti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46155: tena caurī, tāpasī iti ṇāntād api īkāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46156: tācchīlye iti kim ? karmaṇaḥ idaṃ kārmaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:46161: aukṣam iti anapatye 'ṇi ṭilopo nipātyate aukṣaṃ padam /
GS24jvkasipu:46167: dāṇdināyana hāstināyana ātharvaṇika jaihmāśineya vāsināyani bhrauṇahatya dhaivatya sārava aikṣvāka maitreya hiraṇmaya ity etāni nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:46168: daṇḍin hastin ity etau naḍādiṣu paṭhayete, tayorāyane parataḥ prakṛtibhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46169: keṣāṃcit tu hastin iti naḍādiṣu na paṭhyate, teṣām ata eva nipātanāt phagapi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46173: atharvaṇā prokto grantho 'pi upacārāt atharvan iti ucyate, tamadhīte yaḥ sa ātharvaṇikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46175: jihmāśin iti śubhrādiṣu paṭhyate, tasya ṇye parataḥ prakṛtibhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46181: bhrūṇahan, dhīvan ity etayoḥ ṣyañi parataḥ takārādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46185: iti yat tatvaṃ tad dhātupratyaya eva iti bhrauṇaghnaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46188: sārava iti sarayū ity etasya aṇi parato yūśabdasya va ity ādeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46192: ikṣvākoḥ upatyam, janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyādañ (*4,1.166) iti añ, tatra ukāralopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46197: mitrayuśabdo gṛṣṭyādiṣu paṭhyate, tato ḍhañi kṛte yāderiyādeśāpavādo yuśabdalopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46200: atha kimarthaṃ mitrayuśabdo bidādiṣv eva na paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:46201: tatrāñi kṛte yādeḥ iti iyādeśenaiva siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:46202: evaṃ ca yulopārthaṃ nipātanaṃ kartavyaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46203: yaskādiṣu ca bahuṣu lugarthaḥ pāṭho na kartavyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46205: ity eva hi lukaḥ siddhatvāt ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:46206: mitrayūṇāṃ saṅghaḥ ity atra gotracaraṇād vuñaṃ bādhitvā maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ ity atra saṅgha-aṅka-lakṣaṇeṣv añ. yañ-iñām aṇ (*4,
GS24jvkasipu:46208: hiraṇmayam iti hiraṇyasya mayaṭi yādilopo nipātyate, hiraṇyasya vikāraḥ hiraṇmayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46212: ṛtvya vāstvya vāstva mādhvī hiraṇyaya ity etāni nipātyante chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46213: ṛtu vāstu ity etayoḥ yati yaṇadeśo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46220: hiraṇyaśabdād vihitasya mayaṭo maśabdasya lopo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46222: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46229: yu vu ity etayoḥ utsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇayoḥ anunāsikayaṇoḥ pratyayayor grahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:46230: tayoḥ sthāne yathāsaṅkhyam ana aka ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46240: anunāsikayaṇoḥ iti kim ? ūrṇāyā yus (*5,2.123) - ūrṇāyuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46242: evam ādīnāṃ hi yaṇo 'nunāsikatvaṃ na pratijñāyate, pratijñānunāsikyāḥ pāṇinīyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46243: iha yuvor iti nirdeśād dvandvaikavadbhāvapakṣe anityam āgamaśāsanam iti num na kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46244: napuṃsakaliṅgatā vā liṅgamaśiṣyaṃ lokāśrayatvāl liṅgasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46246: yuvoś ced dvitvanirdeśo dvitve yaṇ tu prasajyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46247: atha ced ekavadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ puṃvad bhavedayam //
GS24jvkasipu:46249: aśiṣyatvād dhi liṅgasya puṃstvaṃ veha samāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:46253: āyan ey īn īy iy ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pha ḍha kha cha gha ity eteṣā pratyayādīnām /
GS24jvkasipu:46260: khasya īnādeśo bhavati kulāt khaḥ (*4,1.139) - āḍhyakulīnaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46275: kṛteṣv eteṣu pratyayādyudāttatvaṃ bhavati, tathā ca ghacchau ca (*4,4.117)
GS24jvkasipu:46277: śaṅkhaḥ, ṣaṇḍhaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ hi uṇādayo bahulam iti bahulavacanād ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46278: ṛter īyaṅ (*3,1.29) iti vāvacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ dhātupratyayānāmādeśābhāvasya /
GS24jvkasipu:46279: ejeḥ khaś (*3,2.28), padarujaviśaspṛśo ghañ (*3,3.16) ity evam ādiṣu tu itsañjñayā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46280: taddhiteṣu hi khakāraghakārayor ādeśavacanam avakāśavaditi itsañjñāṃ bādhituṃ na+utsahate /
GS24jvkasipu:46281: āyannīnoḥ nakārasya itsañjñāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ pratividhātavyam, nitkāryaṃ hi sambhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46287: pratyayāvayavasya jhasya anta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46291: adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai /
GS24jvkasipu:46297: asminn apy antādeśe kṛte pratyayādyudāttvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46298: tathā ca jhacaḥ citkaraṇam arthavac bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46302: abhyastā daṅgād uttarasya jhakārasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46318: ātmanepadeṣu yo jhakāraḥ, tasya anakārāntāt aṅgāt uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46330: nityatvād atra vikaraṇe kṛte jho 'ntādeśena bhavitavyam ity adādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46331: anakārāntena aṅgena jhakāraviśeṣaṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ śayāntai //
GS24jvkasipu:46335: śīṅo 'ṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ataḥ ruḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46340: sa yadi jhakārasya+eva syād adādeśo na syād ity ata eva ayam ādeśasya āgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46346: vetter aṅgād uttarasya jhādeśasya ato vibhāṣā ruḍhāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46350: vetteḥ iti lugvikaraṇasya grahaṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, vinte, vindāte, vindate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46363: ṛduśo 'ḍi guṇaḥ (*7,4.16) ity etad api bahulavacanād eva atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46367: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya bhisaḥ ais ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46371: jarāmatikrāntaiḥ iti vigṛhya samāse kṛte hrasvatve ca bhisa aisādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46373: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣā iyam anityā,
GS24jvkasipu:46380: etvam bhisi paratvāc ced ata ais kva bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:46381: kṛte 'py etve bhautapūrvyādais tu nityas tathā sati //
GS24jvkasipu:46382: ataḥ ityadhikāro jasaḥ śī iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:46387: ataḥ ityuktam, anato 'pi bhavati nadyaiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46388: ato na bhavati , devebhiḥ sarvebhiḥ proktam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46392: idam adas ity etayoḥ akakārayoḥ bhisa ais na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46397: akoḥ ity etad eva pratiṣedhavacanaṃ jñāpakam tanmadhyapatitastadgrahanena gṛhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46398: idamadasoḥ kāt iti noktam, viparīto 'pi niyamaḥ sambhāvyeta idamadasor eva kāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46399: tataś ca+iha na syāt, sarvakaiḥ, viśvakaiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46400: iha ca syād eva, ebhiḥ, amībhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46405: akārāntād aṅgād uttareṣām ṭāṅasiṅasām ina āt sya ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti yathāsaṅkhyam /
GS24jvkasipu:46418: yathā tu bhāṣye tathā na+etad iṣyate iti lakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:46424: akārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṅe ity etasya yaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46429: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti paribhāṣeyam anityā, tena dīrgho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46433: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46441: tatra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśāt pūrvaṃ smaibhāvaḥ kriyate paścād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46445: ṅasi ṅi ity etayor akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46465: pūrvādibhyo navabhyaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ uttarayoḥ ṅasiṅyoḥ smāt smin ity etāv ādeśau vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46489: akārāntāt sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya jasaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46501: ābantād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46506: ṅakāraḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ, auṭo 'pi grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:46508: aukāro 'yaṃ śīvidhau ṅidgṛhīto ṅiccāsmākaṃ na asti ko 'yaṃ prakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46509: sāmānyārthas tasya ca asañjane 'smin ṅitkāryaṃ te śyāṃ prasaktam sa doṣaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:46510: ṅittve vidyād varṇanirdeśamātraṃ varṇe yat syāt tac ca vidyāt tadādau /
GS24jvkasipu:46511: varṇaścāyam tena ṅittve 'py adoṣo nirdeśo 'yaṃ pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46515: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarasya auṅaḥ śī ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46527: napuṃsakād aṅgād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ śi ity ayam ādeśo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46534: jasā sahacaritasya śaso grahaṇād iha na bhavati, kuṇḍaśo dadāti, vanśaḥ praviśanti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46539: tasmād uttarayoḥ jaśśasoḥ auś ity ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46544: etad eva kṛtātvasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpakam aṣṭana ā vibhaktau (*7,2.84) ity ātvavikalpasya /
GS24jvkasipu:46545: ṣaḍbhyo luk (*7,1.22) ity asya ayam apavādaḥ, nāprāpte tasminn idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46547: iti, tasmin prāpte ca aprāpte ca iti sa na bādhyate, aṣṭaputraḥ, aṣṭabhāryaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46551: priyāṣṭanaḥ ity atrātvasya abhāvād auśtvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46564: yatra tu upasarjanaṃ ṣaṭ tato na bhavati, priyaṣaṣaḥ, priyapañcānaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46569: su am ity etayoḥ napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46576: tadbrāhmaṇakulam ity atra lukā tyadādyatvaṃ bādhyate, pūrvavipratiṣedhena nityatvād vā /
GS24jvkasipu:46577: luko hi nimittam ato 'm (*7,1.24) iti lakṣaṇāntareṇa vihanyate, na punastyadādyatvena+eva /
GS24jvkasipu:46578: yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittaṃ vihanyate na tadanityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46582: akārāntān napuṃsakād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46586: makāraḥ kasmān na kriyate ? dhīrghatvaṃ prāpnoti //
GS24jvkasipu:46590: ḍatarādibhyaḥ parayoḥ svamoḥ adḍ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46600: ḍitkaraṇaṃ kim ? katarat tiṣṭhati ity atra pūrvasavarnadīrgho mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:46601: iha tu katarat paśya iti sthanivadbhāvād ami pūrvaṃtvena api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:46602: evaṃ tarhi takārādeśa eva kasmān na vidhīyate ? he katarat iti sambuddher lopo mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:46604: aḍḍittvāḍ ḍatarādīnāṃ na lopo na api dīrghatā //
GS24jvkasipu:46608: itaraśabdād uttarayoḥ svamoḥ chandasi viṣaye adḍādeśo na bhavati /
