GS24jvkasipu:46614: ity asmād anantaram itarāc chandasi iti vaktavyam ?
GS24jvkasipu:46615: netarācchandasi iti vacanaṃ yogavibhagartham ekatarād dhi sarvatra chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46621: yuṣmad asmad ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅasaḥ aś ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46625: anyathā hi ādeśavyapadeśapraklṛptyarthamāder eva syāt, tataś ca yo 'ci (*7,2.89) itetan na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46630: ṅe ity etasya prathamayoś ca vibhaktyoḥ prathādvitīyayoḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarayoḥ am ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46656: yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya bhyasaḥ bhyam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46659: bhyamādeśe kṛte śeṣelope ca bahuvacane jhalyet (*7,3.103)
GS24jvkasipu:46660: iti etvaṃ prāpnoti, tat aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46662: yeṣāṃ tu śeṣelopaḥ ṭilopaḥ, teṣām abhyamādeśa eva /
GS24jvkasipu:46667: pañcamyāḥ bhyasaḥ yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati yuṣmad gacchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46672: pañcamyā ekavacanasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46680: tasya yuṣmadasmadbhyām uttarasya ākam ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46683: atha kimartham āgatasuṭko gṛhyate, na ghādeśavidhānakāle suḍ vidyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:46685: ādeśe kṛte hi śeṣelope yuṣmadasmador akārāntatvāt suṭ prāptnoti, sa sthānyantarbhūtatvāt nivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:46687: akami tu sati hrasvakaraṇe tadvidhānasāmarthyād eva savarṇadīrghatvaṃ na prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:46688: tatsāmarthyam etvaṃ prati bhaviṣyati iti akārakaraṇametvanivṛttyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46693: ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya ṇalaḥ aukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46698: atra autvam, ekādeśaḥ , sthānivadbhāvaḥ, dvirvacanam ity anena krameṇa kāryāṇi kriyante /
GS24jvkasipu:46699: ekādeśād anavakāśatvād autvaṃ dvirvacanād api paratvād ekādeśaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:46703: tu hi ity etayoḥ āśiṣi viṣaye tātaṅ ādeśo bhavaty anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:46709: ṅittvāc cāsya sthānivadbhāvāt yat pittvaṃ prāpnoti tannivartate /
GS24jvkasipu:46711: tena bruva īṭ (*7,3.93) iti brūtād bhavān iti īṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46712: āśiṣi iti kim ? grāmaṃ gacchatu bhavān /
GS24jvkasipu:46714: tātaṅi ṅitvaṃ saṅkramakṛt syādantyavidhiś cet tacca tathā na /
GS24jvkasipu:46715: heradhikāre heradhikāro lopavidhau tu jñāpakam āha //
GS24jvkasipu:46716: tātaṅo ṅittvasāmarthyān na ayam antyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46721: vida jñāne ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya śatuḥ vasurādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46723: sthānivadbhāvādugitkārye siddhe vasoḥ ukārakaraṇaṃ vasoḥ samprasāraṇam (*6,4.131)
GS24jvkasipu:46725: ekānubandhakagrahaṇe na dvyanubandhakasya ity etad api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46733: samāse 'nañpūrve ktvā ity etasya lyap ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46745: anañ iti nañā anyadanañ nañsadṛśam avyayaṃ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:46746: tena nañ anavyayaṃ canañ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46747: snātvākālakādiṣu mayūravyaṃsakādiṣu nipātanāl lyabādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46750: sa ca yena vidhis tadantasya ity anena tadantavidhinā, na tu kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46752: gatikārakapūrvasy eva tu grahaṇe sati nañpūrvasya prasaṅga eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:46753: nañ na gatir na kārakam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:46755: prasthāya ity ādiṣu hiprabhṛtīn antaraṅgan api vidhīn bahiraṅgo lyab bādhate eva iti jñāpitam etat //
GS24jvkasipu:46759: samāse anañpūrve ktvā ity etasya ktvā ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:46772: chandasi viṣaye supāṃ sthāne su luk pūrvasavarṇa ā āt śe yā ḍā ḍyā yāc āl ity ete ādeśāḥ bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46785: yasmin sunvanti tasmin sāmidhenīḥ iti prāpte /
GS24jvkasipu:46798: yuyādeśo vayādeśaś ca chandasatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46816: īkāraḥ - dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
GS24jvkasipu:46834: makārasya api hi makāravacanam anusvāranivṛttyarthaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:46839: ātmanepadeṣu yastakāraḥ tasya chandasi viṣaye lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46847: api ity adhikārān na bhavati, tatra ātmānamanṛtaṃ kurute /
GS24jvkasipu:46848: ātmanepadeṣu iti kim ? vatsaṃ duhanti kalaśaṃ caturbilam //
GS24jvkasipu:46852: chandasi viṣaye dhvamo dhvāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46858: yajadhvam ity etasya enam ity etasmin parato makāralopo nipātyate vakārasya ca yakāraḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46864: taśabdasya loṇmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacanasya sthāne tāt ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46877: chandasi viṣaye tasya sthāne tap tanap tana thana ity ete ādeśā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46894: chandasi viṣaye mas ity ayaṃ śabdaḥ ikārānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46895: masaḥ sakārāntasya ikārāgamo bhavati, sa ca tasyānto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46906: ktvā ity etasya yagāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46909: ktvāpi chandasi (*7,1.38) ity asya antantaram idaṃ kasmān na+ucyate ? samāse iti tatra anuvartate //
GS24jvkasipu:46913: iṣṭvīnam ity ayaṃ śabdo nipātyate chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46922: snātvī ity evam ādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46931: avarṇāntāt aṅgād uttarasya jaseḥ asuk āgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:46934: ye pūrvāso ya uparāsaḥ ity atra paratvād asuki punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt śibhāvaḥ prāptaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:46935: sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:46940: aśva kṣīra vṛṣa lavaṇa ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmaprītiviṣaye kyaci parato 'sugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46961: avarṇāt sarvanāmna uttarasya āmaḥ suḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46971: āmi iti ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanaṃ gṛhyate, na ṅerām nadyāmnībhyaḥ (*8,3.116)
GS24jvkasipu:46972: iti , tasya hi paratvāt āḍyāṭsyāṭo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:46973: yaśca ghāt āmuḥ , āmaśca liṭi, na tau sarvanānmaḥ staḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:46974: sānubandhakau iti vā tau na gṛhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:46976: iha tu sarvanāmnaḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśāt tasmād ity uttarasya (*1,1.67)
GS24jvkasipu:46981: tri ity etasya āmi pare traya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:46988: hrasvāntāt nadyantāt ābantāc ca+uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47015: rephāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā na vihitā, ṣaḍbhyo luk (*7,1.22) iti lug mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:47021: upasarjanībhūtāyās tu saṅkhyāyāḥ na bhavati, priyaṣaṣām, priyapañcām, priyacaturām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47026: śrī grāmaṇī ity etayoḥ chandasi viṣaye āmo nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47029: śrīśabdasya vāmi (*1,4.5) iti vikalpena nadīsañjñā, tatra nityārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:47030: sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti yadā sūtāś ca te grāmaṇyaś ca sūtagrāmaṇyo bhavanti tadartham idaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:47031: yadā tu sūtaś ca grāmaṇīś ca sūtagrāmaṇi,
GS24jvkasipu:47032: sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca sūtagrāmaṇi ca iti sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti,
GS24jvkasipu:47037: go ity etasmāt ṛkpādānte vartamānād uttarasya āmaḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47038: vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām /
GS24jvkasipu:47039: pādānte iti kim ? gavāṃ gotramudasṛjo yadaṅgiraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47040: sarve vidhayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti pādānte 'pi kvacin na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47041: hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
GS24jvkasipu:47056: ayaṃ dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva nugāmamo bhavati kuṇḍā, guṇḍā iti, guroś ca halaḥ (*3,3.103)
GS24jvkasipu:47058: tathā hi dhinvikṛṇvyora ca (*3,1.80) iti pratyayavidhāv eva numanuṣaktayor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:47059: dhātugrahaṇam ca+iha kriyate dhātūpadeśakāla eva numāgamo yathā syāt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:47060: tāsisicoriditkāryaṃ na asti ity uccāraṇārtho niranunāsika ikāraḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47061: amaṃsta ity evam ādau hi hanaḥ sic (*1,2.24) iti kitvavidhānasāmarthyāt nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47062: mantā ity atra api asiddhavad-atra-ā bhāt (*6,4.22) iti ṭilopasya asiddhatvān nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47063: iha kasmān na bhavati, bhettā, dhettā iti ? iritāṃ samudāyasyetsañjñā iti iditvaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:47069: śe pratyaye parato mucādīnam numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47086: tṛpha tṛmpha tṛptau dṛpha ḍrmpha utkleśe,
GS24jvkasipu:47089: śubha śumbha śobhārthe ity atra ye sānuṣaṅgāḥ tṛmphādayaḥ teṣām aniditāṃ hala upadhāyāḥ kṅiti (*6,4.24)
GS24jvkasipu:47090: iti anunāsikalope kṛte num vidhīyate, sa ca vidhānasāmarthyāt na lupyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47096: ye tu niranuṣaṅgāḥ teṣāṃ tṛphati, dṛphati, guphati, ubhati, śubhati ity evaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47100: masji naśi ity etayor aṅgayoḥ jhalādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47109: masjer antyāt pūrva numam icchanti anuṣaṅgādilopārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:47115: radhi jabhi ity etayoḥ ajādau pratyaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47125: parāpi satī vṛddhirnumā bādhyate, nityatvāt aci iti kim ? raddhā /
GS24jvkasipu:47130: iḍādau aliṭi pratyaye pare radher numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47138: numi kṛte saṃyogāntatvāt asaṃyogalliṭ kit (*1,2.5) iti kittvaṃ na asti iti nalopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47139: atha kvasau kathaṃ bhavitavyam ? redhivān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47141: etvabhyāsalopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ kriyate, tato numāgamaḥ, tasya aupadeśikakittvaśrayo lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47142: atha iṭi liṭi ity evaṃ niyamaḥ kasmān na kriyate, liṭy eva iṭi na anyatra iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47143: viparītam apy avadhāraṇaṃ sambhāvyeta, iṭy eva liṭi na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47144: tathā hi sati rarandha ity atra na syāt, radhitā ity atra ca syād eva //
GS24jvkasipu:47148: rabheraṅgasya śabliḍvarjite 'jādau pratyaye parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47161: labheś ca ajādau pratyaye śabliḍvarjite numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47174: āṅaḥ uttarasya labheḥ yakārādiprayayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47177: prāk pratyayotpatteḥ numi kṛte vihitamadupadhatvam iti ṛhalor ṇyat (*3,1.124)
GS24jvkasipu:47178: iti ṇyatpratyayaḥ, tatra kṛduttarapadaprakṛtisvaratvena antasvaritatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47181: katham agniṣṭoma ālabhyaḥ iti ? sarve vidhayaś chandasi vikalpyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47182: atha vā ālabhyaḥ ity atra numi kṛte 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47186: upād uttarasya labheḥ praśaṃsāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ yakārādipratyayaviṣaye numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47190: praśaṃsāyām iti kim ? upalabhyam asmād vṛṣalāt kiñcit /
GS24jvkasipu:47195: upasargād uttarasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47201: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, upasargādeva labheḥ khalghañoḥ parato numāgamo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:47207: su dur ity etābhyāṃ kevalābhyām anyopasargarahitābhyām upasṛṣṭasya labheḥ khalghañoḥ parataḥ numāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47214: sudurbhām iti tṛtīyāṃ matvā kevalagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47216: atisulabham ity atra karmapravacanīyatvād eteḥ kevala eva suśabda upasargaḥ iti bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47217: yadā tu atiśabdo na karmapravacanīyaḥ, tadā num bhavati eva atisulambhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47223: ciṇ ṇamul ity etayoḥ vibhāṣā labher num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47226: vyavasthitavibhāṣā ceyam, tena anupasṛṣṭasya vikalpaḥ, upasṛṣṭasya nityaṃ num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47232: ugitāmaṅgānāṃ dhātuvarjitānām añcateśca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47237: ugidacām iti kim ? dṛṣad, dṛṣadau, dṛṣadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47240: añcatigrahaṇaṃ niyamārtham, añcater eva dhātor anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:47243: adhātoḥ iti kim ? adhātubhūtapūrvasya yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47244: gomantam icchati gomatyati, gomatyater apratyayaḥ gomān /
GS24jvkasipu:47245: atra hi dhātutvād añcatigrahaṇān na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:47249: yujer asamāse sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47251: asamāse iti kim ? aśvayuk, aśvayujau, aśvayujaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47252: yujeḥ iti ikāranirdeśāt yuja samādhau ity asya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47257: napuṃsakasya jhalantasya ca sarvanāmasthāne parato numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47272: ugito jhalantasya napuṃsakasya paratvād anena+eva num bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47285: igantasya napuṃsakasya aṅgasya ajādau vibhaktau numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47296: iha tu karaṇasya etat prayojanam, he trapo ity atra num mā bhūt, iti, na ṅisambuddhyoḥ (*8,2.8)
GS24jvkasipu:47299: iti pratyayalakṣaṇe pratiṣiddhe vibhaktir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47300: etad eva ajgrahaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedho 'tra na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47303: iko 'ci vyañjane mā bhūdastu lopaḥ svaraḥ katham /
GS24jvkasipu:47304: svaro vai śrūyamāṇe 'pi lupte kiṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:47306: nuḍ vācya uttarārthaṃ tu iha kiñcit trapo iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47310: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣv ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskam igantaṃ napuṃsakaṃ gālavasyācāryasya matena puṃvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47311: yathā puṃsi hrasvanumau na bhavataḥ, tadvad atra api na bhavataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47320: grāmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇakulānām, numacira iti pūrvavipratiṣedhena nuṭ, grāmaṇīnāṃ brāhmaṇakulānām /
GS24jvkasipu:47333: iha kasmān na bhavati, pīlurvṛkṣaḥ, pīlu phalam, pīlune phalāya iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47334: samānāyāmākṛtau yad bhāṣītpuṃskaṃ tulye pravṛttinimatte tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47335: iha tu vṛkṣākṛtiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ puṃsi śabdasya, phalākṛtirnapuṃsake /
GS24jvkasipu:47336: tad etad evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati bhāsitapuṃskam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47337: bhāṣitaḥ pumān yasminn arthe pravṛttinimitte sa bhāsitapuṃskaśabdena ucyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47338: uadyogād abhidheyam api yad napuṃsakaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃsakam /
GS24jvkasipu:47339: tasya pratipādakaṃ yac chabdarūpaṃ tad api bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ? ikaḥ ity eva, kīlālapā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47347: asthi dadhi sakthi akṣi ity eteṣā napuṃsakānāṃ tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu parato 'naṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47357: asthyādaya ādyudāttāḥ, teṣām anaṅādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvād anudāttaḥ syāt iti udāttavacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:47358: tatra bhasañjñāyām allope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa vibhaktir udāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47359: etair asthyādibhir napuṃsakair anapuṃsakasya api aṅgasya tadantagrahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47371: aci ity uktam, anajādau ai dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47374: tṛtīyādiṣu ity uktam, atṛtīyādiṣu api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47376: vibhaktau ity ukta, avibhaktāv api dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47382: dvivacane parataḥ chandasi viṣaye asthyādīnām īkārādeśo bhavati, sa ca udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47385: akṣī ity atra num paratvādīkāreṇa badhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47386: tena kṛte sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yad bādhitaṃ tad bādhitam eva iti punar num na kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47390: abhyastād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ num na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47395: śaturanantara īkāro na vihitaḥ iti vyavahitasya api numaḥ pratiṣedho vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47399: abhyastād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatṛpratyayas tadantasya napuṃsakasya vā numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47408: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ vā numāgamo bhavati śīnadyoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47415: atra antaraṅgatvād ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt avarṇāntā daṅgād uttarasya śatuḥ iti na yujyate vaktum,
GS24jvkasipu:47416: ubhayata āśraye nāntadivat ity antādivadbhāvo 'pi nāsti,
GS24jvkasipu:47418: ghnatī ity evam ādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47420: śaturavayave śatṛśabdo vartate avarṇāntād aṅgād uttaro yaḥ śatravayavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47423: avarṇāntād aṅgād uttare ye śīnadyau tayoḥ parataḥ śatrantasya num bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47424: tatra yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti takāreṇa eva vyavadhānam āśrayiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47432: śap śyan ity etayoḥ śatuḥ śīnadyoḥ parato nityaṃ numāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47439: nityagrahaṇam vā ity asya adhikārasya nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:47440: ihārambhasāmarthyān nityam uttaratra vikalpa eva aśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:47447: atra kecit āt ity adhikārād āmamoḥ kṛtayoḥ numaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47448: tena numā āmamau na bādhyete, āamambhyāṃ ca num iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47449: apare tu saty api sāmānyaviśeṣatve āmamoḥ numaś ca samāveśam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:47455: dṛk svavas svatavas ity eteṣāṃ sau parato numāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:47465: div ity etasya sau parataḥ aut ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47468: dhātus tu sānubandhakaḥ, sa iha na gṛhyate, akṣadyūḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47473: pathin mathin ṛbhukṣin ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ sau parataḥ ākāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47478: bhāvyam anena savarṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ na bhavati iti śuddho hy ayam ucvāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:47482: pathyādīnām ikārasya sthāne akārādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47489: āt iti vartāmāne punar advacanaṃ ṣapūrvārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:47490: ṛbhukṣaṇam ity atra vā ṣapūrvasya nigame (*6,4.9) iti dīrghavikalpaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47494: pathimathoḥ thakārasya sthāne nthaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47510: sarvanāmasthāne ity anuvartamānam api virodhād iha na sambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47514: puṃsa ity etasya sarvanāmasthāne parato 'suṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47516: iha paramapumān iti prāg eva vibhaktyutpatteḥ samāsāntodāttatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:47517: utpannāyāṃ vibhaktau asuñ ity aniṣṭaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47530: kathaṃ he citrago, he śabalagava iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47531: aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti sambuddhijasorgune kṛte ṇittvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47532: atha vā gotaḥ iti sambadhalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī, gotaḥ sambandhi yat sarvanāmasthānam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47533: yac ca tadarthasyaikatvādiṣu sarvanāmasthānaṃ tad goḥ sarvanāmasthānam ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47536: kecit oto ṇit iti paṭhanti, dyośabdād api yat sarvanāmasthānaṃ vidyate tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:47538: gotaḥ ity etad eva taparakaraṇanirdeśāt okārāntopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47544: ṇitkāryaṃ tatra vā bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47550: asambuddhau yaḥ sakhiśabdaḥ tasmāt paraṃ sarvanāmasthānaṃ ṇit bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47557: sakhiśabdasya sau parataḥ anaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, sa cet suśabdaḥ sambuddhiḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47563: ṛkārāntānām aṅgānām uśanas purudaṃsas anehas ity eteṣām ca asambuddhau sau parataḥ anaṅ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47578: uśanasaḥ sambuddhau api pakṣe anaṅ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47580: na ṅisambuddhyoḥ (*8,2.8) iti nalopapratiṣedho 'pi pakṣe iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47582: tathā coktam - sambodhane tūśanastrirūpaṃ sāntaṃ tathā nāntamathāpyadantam /
GS24jvkasipu:47583: mādhyandinirvaṣṭi guṇaṃ tvigante napuṃsake vyāghrapadām variṣṭhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47590: kroṣṭuśabdaḥ tunpratyayāntaḥ sañjñāśabdaḥ sarvanāmasthāne 'sambuddhau parataḥ tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47591: tṛjantasya yad rūpaṃ tadasya bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47593: prayāsatteś ca kruśer eva ṛjantasya ya rūpaṃ tadatidiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47594: tac ca kroṣtṛ ity etad antodāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:47607: kroṣṭuśabdaṃ kecid gaurādiṣu paṭhanti, te ṅīṣi pratyaye tṛjvadbhāvaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:47608: teṣāṃ pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ krītaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhī rathaiḥ iti strīśabdasya luki kṛte na sidhyati,
GS24jvkasipu:47614: tatra udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174) ity antodātta eva kroṣṭrīśabdo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:47618: tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu kroṣṭurvibhāṣā tṛjvad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47634: catur anaḍuḥ iy etayoḥ sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ām āgamo bhavati, sa codāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47663: cikīrṣati ity atra api yathā syāt iti dhātugrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:47672: oṣthyaḥ pūrvo yasmād ṝkārāt asau oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ, tadantasya dhātor aṅgasya ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47677: dantyoṣṭhyapūrvo 'py oṣṭhyapūrvo bhavati ity atra api bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:47680: oṣṭhyo hy atra pratyāsatter aṅgāvayava eva gṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47681: tena ṝ gatau ity asya sampūrvasya samīrṇam iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47692: chandasi viṣaye ṝkārāntasya dhātor aṅgasya bahulam ukārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47693: oṣṭhyapūrvasya ity uktam, anoṣthyapūrvasya api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47701: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya prathamḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:47707: parasmaipadapare sici parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47714: antaraṅgam api guṇam eṣāṃ vṛddhirvacanād bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:47715: nyanuvīt, nyadhuvīt ity atra kuṭāditvāt ṅittve sati pratiṣiddhāyāṃ vṛddhau uvaṅādeśaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47721: rephalakārau yāvataḥ antau samīpau tadantasya aṅgasya ata eva sthāne vṛddhiḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47726: ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7) iti vikalpasya ayam apavādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47729: lrāntasya iti kim ? mā bhavān aṭīt /
GS24jvkasipu:47733: atra yau rephalakārau aṅgasya antau na tāvataḥ samīpau //
GS24jvkasipu:47737: vadavrajoḥ halantānāṃ ca aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati sici parasmaipade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47745: atra yogavibhāge sati halantagrahaṇam antareṇa api sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:47747: vadivrajyoḥ ity atra prathamayoge ataḥ iti sthānī anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:47748: tato yat acaḥ iti sūtraṃ tatra aṅgena ajviśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:47749: aṅgasya acaḥ sici parataḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47752: anyathā hi yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena varṇena vyavadhāne syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:47754: udavoḍhām, udavoḍham ity atra vaheḥ sici ḍhatvasalopādīnām pūrvatra asiddham (*8,2.1)
GS24jvkasipu:47755: ity asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ kriyate, paścād ḍhalopanimittamotvam /
GS24jvkasipu:47756: tatra kṛte punar vṛddhir na bhavati, kṛtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47757: yatra tvakṛtā vṛddhiḥ, okārasya eva tatra bhavati, soḍhāmitrasya apatyam sauḍhāmitriḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:47761: iḍhādau sici halanatasya aṅgasya vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47767: nanu ca etad apy antaraṅgatvāt guṇāvādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ halantaṃ bhavati ? na+etad evam /
GS24jvkasipu:47768: antaraṅgam api guṇam vacanārambhasāmarthyāt sici vṛddhir bādhate ity uktam //
GS24jvkasipu:47774: kṣaṇa śvasa jāgṛ ṇi śvi ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:47775: editāṃ ca iḍādau sici parasmaipade parato vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47788: hmyantakṣaṇaśvasām editām ca ato halāder laghoḥ (*7,2.7) iti vikalpe prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47789: jāgṛṇiśvīnāṃ tu sici vṛddhiḥ prāptā, sā ca neṭi (*7,2.4) iti na pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47790: na ca antaraṅgatvād atra pūrvaṃ guṇo bhavati, sici vṛddher anavakāśatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47791: yadi pūrvaṃ guṇaḥ syād iha ṇiśvigrahaṇam anarthakaṃ syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:47792: guṇāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ yakārantatvād eva pratiṣedhasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47793: tasmād idam eva śvigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam na sidyantaraṅgam asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:47795: iti jāgarter guṇo vṛddher apavādo vidhīyate, sa yathā aco ñṇiti (*6,2.115)
GS24jvkasipu:47796: iti vṛddhiṃ bādhate tathā sici vṛddhim api bādhiṣyate ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:47797: kṛte guṇe ato lrāntasya (*7,2.2) iti ya vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47799: yathā jāgarayati ity atra ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,1.113)
GS24jvkasipu:47801: tathā ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedho 'rthavān bhavati iti śakyam iha jāgṛgrahaṇam akartum ?
GS24jvkasipu:47806: ūrṇoter iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato yibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47809: ṅittvapakṣe tu guṇavṛddhyor abhāve uvaṅ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47814: halāder aṅgasya laghor akārasya iḍādau sici parasmaipadapare parato vibhāṣā vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47819: nyakuṭīt, nyapuṭīt, ity atra ataḥ ity asminnasati sthāninirdeśārthamacaḥ ity etad anuvartayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:47820: tatra ajlakṣaṇā vṛddhir iglakṣaṇā na bhavati iti kṅiti ca (*7,2.118) iti pratiṣedho na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:47825: atha+iha kasmān na bhavati acakāsīt iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:47826: yena nāvyavadhānam tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti halā vyavadhānam āśritam,
GS24jvkasipu:47827: na punaracāpi vyavadhānam iti vṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47828: atha punar ekena varṇena vyavadhānam aśrīyate na punar anekena iti kalpane śakyamakartuṃ laghoḥ iti,
GS24jvkasipu:47829: atakṣīt ity atra anekena vyavadhānam iti na bhavisyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:47836: vaśādau kṛti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47851: tena ñamantāḍḍaḥ ity evam ādāv api hi pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47852: atha tatra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti samādhīyate ? sambhavodāharanapradarśanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:47858: ti tu tra ta tha si su sara ka sa ity eteṣu kṛtsu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47891: auṇādikasya+eva taśabdasya grahaṇam iṣyate, na punaḥ ktasya, hasitam ity eva hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47920: grahādayo grahaprakārāḥ, yeṣām iṭ ktini dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47930: upadeśe ya ekāc dhātur anudāttaś ca tasmād iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47933: ye tathā gaṇe paṭhyante, ta eva vispaṣṭārtham aniṭkārikāsu pravibhaktāḥ pradarśyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47935: aniṭsvarānto bhavati iti dṛśyatāmimāṃstu seṭaḥ pravadanti tadvidaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47936: adantamṝdantamṛtāṃ ca vṛṅvṛñau śviḍīṅivarṇeṣv atha śīṅśriñāvapi //
GS24jvkasipu:47937: guṇasthamūdantamutāṃ ca rusnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47938: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitāstato halantān api sannibodhata //
GS24jvkasipu:47939: dvaye eva dhātavaḥ, svarāntāḥ vyañjanāntāś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:47951: utāṃ ca ursnuvau kṣuvaṃ tathorṇotimatho yuṇukṣṇavaḥ - ravitā /
GS24jvkasipu:47955: vācya ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvo yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam ity atideśād ekāctvam ūrṇoter asti iti udātta upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:47959: iti svarāntā nipuṇaṃ samuccitās tato halantān api sannibodhata /
GS24jvkasipu:47960: śakistu kānteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ghasiśca sāntesu vasiḥ prasāraṇī /
GS24jvkasipu:47964: vasa nivāse ity asya yajāditvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ vihitam, na tu vasa ācchādane ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:47965: sabhistu bhānteṣv atha maithune yabhistatastṛtīyo labhireva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:47969: yamiryamanteṣvaniḍeka iṣyate ramisca yaśca śyani paṭhyate maniḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:47970: namiścaturtho hanireva pañcamo gamiśca ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratiṣedhavācinām //
GS24jvkasipu:47974: śyani iti kim ? manuteḥ manitā ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:47979: ime 'niṭo 'ṣṭāviha muktasaṃśayā gaṇeṣu hāntāḥ pravibhajya kīrtitāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:47988: muktasaṃśayāḥ iti kim ? tantrāntare catvāro 'pare paṭhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:47990: tatra sahervikalpastakārādau, muhirapi radhādau paṭhyate, tena tau sasaṃśayau savikalpau /
GS24jvkasipu:47991: itarau tu dhātuṣu na paṭhyete, kaiścidabhyupagamyete iti svarūpeṇa+eva sasaṃśayau /
GS24jvkasipu:47993: diśiṃ dṛśiṃ daṃśimatho mṛśiṃ spṛśiṃ riśiṃ ruśiṃ krośatimaṣṭamaṃ viśim /
GS24jvkasipu:47994: liśaṃ ca śāntānaniṭaḥ purāṇagāḥ paṭhanti pāṭheṣu daśaiva netarān //
GS24jvkasipu:48000: ṛdupadhānām udāttopadeśānāṃ mṛjidṛśī varjayitvā anudāttasya cardupadhasya anyatarasyām (*6,1.59)
GS24jvkasipu:48008: ime tu dhāntā daśa ye 'niṭo matāstataḥ paraṃ sidhyatir eva netare //
GS24jvkasipu:48020: budhyatisidhyatyoḥ śyanā nirdeśāt nyāyyavikaraṇayor buddhisidhyor iḍ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:48023: niṣṭhāyāmāpi pratiṣedhābhāvāt budhitam, sidhitam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48024: śiṣiṃ piṣiṃ śuṣyatipuṣyatī tviṣiṃ viṣiṃ śliṣiṃ tuṣyatiduṣyatī dviṣim /
GS24jvkasipu:48039: kṛṣestaudādikasya bhauvādikasya ca kṛṣikarṣatī iti nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48040: tapiṃ tipiṃ cāpimatho vapiṃ svapiṃ lipiṃ lupiṃ tṛpyatidṛpyatī sṛpim /
GS24jvkasipu:48041: svareṇa vīcena śapiṃ chupiṃ kṣipiṃ pratīhi pāntān paṭhitāṃstrayodaśa //
GS24jvkasipu:48058: adiṃ hadiṃ skandibhidicchidikṣudīn śadiṃ sadiṃ svidyatipad yatī khidim /
GS24jvkasipu:48059: tudiṃ nudiṃ vidyati vinta ity api pratīhi dāntān daśa pañca cāniṭaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:48069: svidyati iti śyanā nirdeśo ñiṣvidā ity asya grahaṇaṃ mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48076: vidyati vinta ity api śyanā śnamā ca nirdeśo 'nyavikaraṇanivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48081: paciṃ vaciṃ viciricirañjipṛcchatīn nijiṃ siciṃ mucibhajibhañjibhṛjjātīn /
GS24jvkasipu:48082: tyajiṃ yajiṃ yujirujisañjimajjatīn bhujiṃ svajiṃ sṛjimṛjī viddhyaniṭsvarān //
GS24jvkasipu:48105: mṛjirayamūdit paṭhyate, tato 'sya vikalpena iṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48106: mārṣṭā, marjitā iti, amāgamo 'py asya na dṛśyate ? tad iha pāṭhasya prayojanaṃ cintyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48107: kecid asya sthāne vijiṃ paṭhanti, sṛjiṃ vijiṃ viddhyaniṭsvarān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48109: tathā ca tantrāntare nijivijiṣvañjivarjam ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:48112: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca yathā syāt, laviṣyati, paciṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48113: iha ca mā bhūt, kartā kaṭān, kartum iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48117: śri ity etasya ugantānāṃ ca kiti pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48137: kecid atra dvikakāranirdeśena gakārapraśleṣaṃ varnayanti, bhūṣṇuḥ ity evaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48138: sautratvāc ca nirdeśasya śryukaḥ kiti ity atra cartvasya asiddhatvamanāśritya rorutvaṃ na kṛtam visarjanīyaś ca kṛtaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48140: ity atra sthā ā ity ākārapraśleṣeṇa sthāsnoḥ siddhatvān na kiṃcid etat /
GS24jvkasipu:48141: upadeśe ity eva, tīrṇa ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48142: itve hi kṛte raparatve cana syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48146: iti niṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣedho bhaviṣyati ? kasya punaḥ sā vibhāṣā ? ṝtaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48147: yady evam itve hi kṛte na ayam ṝkarānto bhaviṣyati ? sthānivadbhāvād bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48148: analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ, alvidhiścāyam ? tasmād anuvartayitavyam upadeśe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48149: tathā ca sati jāgaritaḥ, jāgaritavān ity atra api prāpnoti, tad artham ekācaḥ ity anuvartayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48158: graha guha ity etayoḥ ugantānāṃ ca sani pratyaye parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48164: iti vikalpavidhānāt śrayatir atra na anukṛsyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48170: kṛ sṛ bhṛ vṛ stu dru sru śru ity eteṣāṃ liṭi pratyaye iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48180: siddhe satyārambho niyamarthaḥ , krādaya eva liṭi aniṭaḥ, tato 'nye seṭaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48186: vṛño hi thali vavartha iti nipātanād vyavasthā /
GS24jvkasipu:48187: studrusruśruvāṃ tu ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) ity asmād api niyamāt ya iṭ prāpnoti so 'pi neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48194: ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) ity etad apy asuṭkasya+eva+iṣyate, sañcaskaritha //
GS24jvkasipu:48209: sa hi natvārthaḥ, natvaṃ ca niṣthāto 'nantarasya vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48212: niṣṭhāyām ity adhikāraḥ ārdhadhātukasya+iḍ-valādeḥ (*7,2.35) iti yāvat //
GS24jvkasipu:48217: yasya dhātoḥ vibhāṣā kvacid iḍ uktaḥ tasya niṣṭhāyāṃ parataḥ iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48225: tanipatidaridrāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti pater vibhāṣiteṭkasya api dvitīyāśritātītapatita (*2,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:48230: āditaś ca dhator niṣthāyam iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48241: āditaś ca vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ ity evaṃ paṭhitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:48244: jñāpayati - yad upādher vibhāṣā tad upādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48246: ity atra viderlābhārthasya vibhāṣā iti jñānārthasya pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48252: bhave ādikarmaṇi ca ādito dhātoḥ vibhāṣā niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48255: śakito ghaṭaḥ kartum, śakto ghaṭaḥ kartum /
GS24jvkasipu:48258: ādikarmaṇi ca na bhavaty eva, astaḥ kāṇḍaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:48262: kṣubdha svānta dhvānta lagan mliṣṭa viribdha phāṇṭa bāḍha ity ete nipātyante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ mantha manaḥ tamaḥ sakta avispaṣṭa svaraḥ anāyāsa bhṛśa ity eteṣv artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:48268: kṣubdhā girinadī ity evam ādyupamānāt bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:48281: itvam apy ekārasya nipātanād eva viribdham iti svaraś cet /
GS24jvkasipu:48284: anye tu viribhitam anyat iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48285: rabhiṃ sautraṃ dhātuṃ paṭhanti, te viribhitam iti pratyudāharanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48288: yadaśṛtamapiṣṭaṃ ca kaṣāyamudakasamparkamātrāt vibhaktarasamīṣaduṣṇaṃ tat phāṇṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:48292: bāhṛ prayatne ity asya dhātor etan nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:48298: tatra dhṛṣa śasa ity etayoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48302: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddha eva, śaser api udito vā (*7,2.56)
GS24jvkasipu:48304: iti ? niyamārthaṃ vacanam, dhṛṣiśasyoḥ vaiyātye eva iḍ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48313: dṛḍha iti nipātyate sthūle balavati cārthe /
GS24jvkasipu:48316: kim atra nipātyate ? dṛṃheḥ ktapratyaye iḍabhāvaḥ, hakāranakārayoḥ lopaḥ, parasya ḍhatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:48317: atha dṛhiḥ prakṛtyanataram asti ? tatra apy etad eva sarvaṃ nalopavarjam, nakārasya abhāvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48319: ḍhalope hi sati tasya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt draḍhimā,
GS24jvkasipu:48321: draḍhayati ity atra ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ (*6,2.161)
GS24jvkasipu:48322: iti repho na syāt, iha ca paridraḍhyya gata iti lyapi laghupūrvāt (*6,4.56)
GS24jvkasipu:48324: iha ca paridṛḍhasyāpatyaṃ pāridṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ ca prasajyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:48330: parivṛḍha iti nipātyate prabhuś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48334: vṛhiśca yadi prakṛtiyantaram asti tasya api tad eva sarvam /
GS24jvkasipu:48339: parivṛḍhamācaṣṭe iti vigṛhya vṛḍhaśabdād eva ṇijutypadyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48340: saṃgrāmayater eva sopasargāṇ ṇijutpattir iṣyate na anyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48341: tathā sati parivraḍhayati iti tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,2.28) iti nighātaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48342: parivraḍhayya ity atra pariśabdasya ktvāpratyayāntena samāse sati lyabādeśaḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48349: kṛcchra gahana ity etayor arthayoḥ kaṣer dhātoḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48353: kṛcchraṃ duḥkham, tatkāraṇam apy agnyādikaṃ kṛcchram ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48360: ghuṣer dhātor aviśabdane 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48368: viśabdanapratiṣedhaś ca jñāpakaścurādiṇij viśabdanārthasya anityaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48369: tena ayam api prayogaḥ upapanno bhavati, mahīpālavacaḥ śrutvā jughuṣuḥ puṣpamāṇavāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48374: sam ni vi ity etebhya uttarasya ardeḥ niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48383: abhiśabād uttarasya ardeḥ āvidūrye 'rthe niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48388: vidūram viprakṛṣṭam, tato 'nyadavidūram, tasya bhāvaḥ āvidūryam /
GS24jvkasipu:48389: etasmād eva nipātanāt na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt (*5,1.121)
GS24jvkasipu:48390: ity uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48394: ṇyantasya vṛtter niṣṭhāyām adhyayanārthe vṛttam iti iḍabhāvaḥ ṇiluk ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48398: vṛtirayam akarmakaḥ, sa ṇyarthe vartamānaḥ sakarmako bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48399: tena nirvṛttam iti hi prakṛṭer eva karmaṇi ktapratyayo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48400: tadvad iha api ṇyarthavṛtter eva ca vṛteḥ vṛtto guṇo devadattena iti bhaviṣyati iti nipātanam anarthakam ?
GS24jvkasipu:48401: tat kriyate yadāpi ṇicaiva ṇyartho 'bhidhīyate tadāvartitam ity adhyayane mā bhūt iti kecit /
GS24jvkasipu:48402: apare tu vartito guṇo devadattena ity api icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:48408: dam śam pūrī das spaś chad jñap ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ dhātūnāṃ vā aniṭtvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48417: jñaptes tu bharajñapisanām iti vikalpavidhānāt yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:48418: iti nitye pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpārthaṃ nipātanam //
GS24jvkasipu:48423: ruṣi ama tvara saṅghuṣa āsvana ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48430: āditaś ca (*7,2.16) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:48434: sampūrvasya ghuṣer aviśaddane 'pi paratvād ayam eva vikalpo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48437: āṅpūrvasya svaner mano 'bhidhāne 'pi paratvādayaṃ vikalpaḥ kṣubdhasvānta iti nipātanaṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:48441: lomasu vartamānasya hṛṣer niṣṭhāyāṃ vā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48448: tayor ubhayor iha grahaṇam ity ubhayatra vibhāṣā iyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48449: lomāni mūrdhajāni aṅgajāni ca sāmānyena gṛhyante, yathā lomanakhaṃ spṛṣṭvā śaucaṃ kartavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48450: tadviṣaye ca harṣe vartamāno lomasu vartate ity ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48451: lomasu iti kim ? hṛṣṭo devadatta ity alīkārthasya, hṛṣito devadattaḥ iti tuṣṭyarthasya /
GS24jvkasipu:48462: apapūrvasya cāyteḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭtvaṃ cibhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48470: hvarateḥ dhātor niṣṭhāyaṃ chandasi hru ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48478: hru ity etasya ādeśasya abhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48483: hvaritaḥ iti hvarater niṣṭhāyām iḍāgamo guṇaś ca nipātyate chandasi viṣaye, somaś ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48489_0: grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita catta vikasta viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ tarutṛ tarūtṛ
GS24jvkasipu:48489_1: varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:48490: tatra grasita skabhita stabhita uttabhita iti grasu skambhu stambhu ity eteṣām udittvān niṣṭhāyām iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte iḍāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48499: uttabhita iti utpūrvasya nipātasāmarthyād anyopasargapūrvaḥ stabhitaśabdo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48501: catta, vikasta iti cateḥ kaseś ca vipūrvasya niṣṭhāyām iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48502: cattā varṣeṇa vidyut catitā iti bhāṣāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:48505: nipātanaṃ bahutvāpekṣam, vikastāḥ iti bahuvacanaṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:48507: viśastṛ śaṃstṛ śāstṛ iti śaser vipūrvasya śaṃseḥ śāseś ca tṛci iḍabhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48514: tarutṛ tarūtṛ varutṛ varūtṛ varūtrīḥ iti tarateḥ vṛṅvṛñoś ca tṛci uṭ ūṭ ity etāv āgamau nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:48522: idam api hi bhavati - ahorātrāṇi vai varūtrayaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48525: varūtṛśabdo hi nipātitaḥ, tata eva ṅīpi sati siddho varūtrīśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48526: ujjvaliti kṣariti kṣamiti vamiti amiti iti ca jvalater utpūrvasya kṣara kṣama vama ity eteṣāṃ ca tipi śapaḥ ikārādeśo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:48538: itikaraṇaṃ pradarśanārtham tena kvacit īkāro bhāvati,
GS24jvkasipu:48539: ravimabhyamīti varuṇaḥ ity api hi vede paṭhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:48555: ity etasmin niyamārthe vajñāyamāne pratipattigauravam bhavati iti ārdhadhātukagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48560: iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:48566: snukramoḥ ārdhadhātukasya valādeḥ iḍāgamo bhavati, na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimittaṃ bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48568: yatra ātmanepadaṃ tad āśrayaṃ bhavati, bhāvakarmakarmakartṛkarmavyatihārāḥ kramer vṛttyādayaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:48569: tena ayam saty ātmanepade pratiṣedho bhavati na asati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48584: sarvatra+eva atra snaitiḥ kramiś ca ātmanepadasya nimittam /
GS24jvkasipu:48585: sanantād api pūrvavatsanaḥ (*1,3.62) iti ātmanepadaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48586: nimittagrahaṇaṃ kim ? sīyuḍādes tatparaparasya ca pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:48587: iha tu prasnavitevācarati iti prasnavitrīyate iti kyaṅatam ātmanepadasya nimittam, na snautiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48588: krames tu kartaryātmanepadaviṣayādasatyātmanepade kṛti pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48594: snauteḥ sani kiti ca pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11)
GS24jvkasipu:48603: grahaḥ uttarasya iṭaḥ aliṭi dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48616: tasmād uttarasya ṝkārāntebhyaś ca iṭo vā dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48629: vṛtaḥ uttarasya iṭo liṅi dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48637: parasmaipadapare sici vṝta uttarasya iṭo dīrghaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48653: sani grahaguhoś ca (*7,2.12) iti iṭpratiṣedhe prāpte pakṣe iḍāgamo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48654: iṭaś ca vṝto vā (*7,2.38) iti pakṣe dīrghaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48655: cikīrṣati, jihīrṣati ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt lākṣaṇikatvāc ca iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48659: vṝto liṅi sici ca ātmanepadapare vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48663: sici khalv api - avṛta, avariṣṭa, avarīṣṭa /
GS24jvkasipu:48668: liṅaḥ pratyudāharaṇaṃ na darśitam, asambhavāt yāsuṭo 'valāditvāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48672: ṛdantād dhātoḥ saṃyogādeḥ uttarayoḥ liṅsicorātmanepadeṣu vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48686: saṃskṛṣīṣṭa, samaskṛta ity atra+upadeśādhikārāt, abhāktatvāc ca suṭa iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:48691: svarati sūti sūyati dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:48692: ūdidbhyaśca+uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48697: ūdhidbhyaḥ khalv api - gāhū - vigāḍhā, vigāhitā /
GS24jvkasipu:48699: vā iti vartamane punar vāgrahaṇaṃ liṅsicor nivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:48700: sūtisūyatyor vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ ṣū preraṇe ity asya nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48701: dhūñ iti sānubandhakasya nirdeso dhū vidhūnane ity asay nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48702: savitā, dhuvitā ity eva nityam etayor bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48703: svarater etasmād vikalpāt ṛddhanoḥ sye (*7,2.70) ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:48705: kiti tu pratyaye śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti nityaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:48712: radha hiṃsāsaṃsiddhyoḥ ity evam ādibhyo 'ṣṭābhya uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48718: mogdhā, moḍhā, mohitā, snogdhā, snoḍhā, snohitā /
GS24jvkasipu:48720: krādiniyamāl liṭi radhādibhyaḥ paratvād vikalpaṃ kecid icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48722: pūrvavidheriṇniṣedhavidhānasāmarthyāt balīyastvaṃ pratiṣedhaniyamasya iti nityamiṭā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:48727: nir ity evaṃ pūrvāt kuṣa uttarasya valāder ārdhadhātukasya vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48734: nisaḥ iti vaktavye niraḥ iti nirdeśena rephāntam upasargāntaram asti iti jñāpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48735: tasya hi nilayanam iti upasargasya ayatau (*8,2.19) iti latvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48736: niso hi rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:48744: ārambho hi yasya nibhāṣā (*7,2.15) ity asya bādhakaḥ, anyathā hi nikalpārtha eva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48745: atra+eva nityam iḍāgamaḥ, uttaratra vikalpa eva iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48750: takārādāv ārdhadhātuke iṣu saha lubha ruṣa ity etebhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48752: iṣu icchāyām ity asya ayaṃ vikalpa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48753: yas tu iṣa gatau iti daivādikaḥ, tasya preṣitā, preṣitum, preṣitavyam iti nityaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48754: yo 'pi iṣa ābhīkṣṇye iti kṛyādau paṭhyate, tasya apy evam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:48755: tadartham eva tīṣasaha iti sūtre kecit uditamiṣaṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:48765: ṛdhu bhrasja dambhu śri svṛ yu ūrṇu bhara jñapi san ity eteṣāṃ ca sani vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48775: bhara iti bhṛñ ity etasya bhauvādikasya grahaṇam, śapā nirdeśāt /
GS24jvkasipu:48792: kliśū vibādhane ity asya ktvāyāṃ vikalpaḥ siddha eva niṣṭhāyāṃ tu yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:48794: kliśa upatāpe ity etasya tu ktvāyāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃ ca nityam iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:48799: pūṅaś ca ktvāniṣṭhayor vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48803: śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti pratiṣedhe prāpte vikalpo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:48808: vasateḥ kṣudheś ca ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48816: vastes tu udāttatvād eva bhavitavyam iṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:48821: añceḥ pūjāyām arthe ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48825: iti ktvāpratyaye vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ, niṣṭhāyām yasya vibhāṣā (*7,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:48826: iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāptaḥ, tadartham idaṃ prārabdham /
GS24jvkasipu:48832: lubho vimohane 'rthe vartamānāt ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48847: jṝ vraści ity etayoḥ ktvāpratyaye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48850: jṝ ity etasya śryukaḥ kiti (*7,2.11) iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāptaḥ, vraśceruditvād vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48855: udito dhātoḥ ktvāpratyaye parato vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48863: sakārādāvasici ārdhadhātuke kṛta cṛta chṛda tṛda nṛta ity etebhyo dhātubhyo vā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48899: gamer dhātoḥ sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadesu iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48911: gamer iṅādeśasya ajjhanagamāṃ sani (*6,4.16) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:48912: se ity eva, gantāsmi, gantāsvaḥ, gantāsmaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48913: ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya gameḥ ayam iḍāgamo neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48920: padaśeṣakārasya punar idaṃ darśanam - gamyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ parasmaipadagrahaṇam,
GS24jvkasipu:48921: parasmaipadeṣu yo gamir upalakṣitas tasmāt sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya iḍ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48922: tanmatena saṃjigaṃsitā, adhijigaṃsitā vyākaraṇasya ity eva bhavitavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:48926: vṛtādibhyaś caturbhyaḥ uttarasya sakārāder ārdhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍagamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48940: vṛdgrahaṇaṃ hi tatra dyutādiparisamāptyartham kriyate - kṛpū sāmarthye vṛt iti,
GS24jvkasipu:48941: tad eva yadi vṛtādisamāptyartham api vijñāyate na kiñcidaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:48942: tat kriyate syanderūdillakṣaṇam antaraṅgam api vikalpaṃ pratiṣedho yathā bādheta iti /
GS24jvkasipu:48943: caturgrahaṇe hi sati tātparyeṇa syandiḥ saṃnidhāpito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48948: atra api ātmanepadena samānapadasthebhyo vṛtādibhya iḍāgama iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48950: kṛtyapi hi parasmaipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati, vivṛtsitā, vivṛtsa tvam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48955: kṛpa uttarasya tāseḥ sakārādeś ca ardhadhātukasya parasmaipadeṣu iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48965: kḷper apy ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iḍāgamaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:48967: kṛtyapi hi parsamipadaluki ca pratiṣedho bhavati, cikḷpsitā, cikḷpsa tvam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:48969: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam || PS_7,2.61 ||
GS24jvkasipu:48971: tāsau ye nityāniṭo dhātavaḥ ajantāḥ, tebhyastāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48982: tāsi vibhāṣiteṭ, thali nityam iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48983: tāsvat iti vatinirdeśaḥ kimarthaḥ ? tāsau tatasthali pratiṣedhārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:48984: yo hi tāsāvasan, asattvāc ca nityāniṭ, tasya thali pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:48988: adādeśo hi ghasiḥ, veñādeśaś ca vayistāsau na asti //
GS24jvkasipu:48992: upadeśe yo dhāturakāravān tāsau nityāniṭ tasmāt tāsāviva thali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49001: nityam aniṭaḥ ity eva, aṅktā, añjitā - ānañjitha //
GS24jvkasipu:49005: ṛkārāntād ghātoḥ bhāradvājasya acāryasya matena tāsāviva nityāniṭasthali iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49008: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ṛta eva bhāradvājasya, nānyeṣāṃ dhātūnām /
GS24jvkasipu:49015: tathā hi sati vidhyartham etat syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:49020: babhūtha ātatantha jagṛbhma vavartha ity etāni nipātyante nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:49030: krādisūtrād eva asya pratiṣedho siddhe niyamārthaṃ vacanam, nigame eva, na bhaṣāyām iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49034: sṛji dṛśi ity etayoḥ thali vibhāṣā iḍāgamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49040: atti arti vyayati ity eteṣāṃ thali iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49044: vyeñaḥ na vyo liṭi (*6,1.46) iti ātvapratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49045: attivyayatyoḥ ṛto bhāradvājasya (*7,2.63) iti niyamād vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49049: pratiṣedhavidhāne ca artigrahaṇam iti nityo 'yaṃ vidhiḥ iḍgrahaṇam antareṇa api śakyate vijñātum //
GS24jvkasipu:49053: kṛtadvirvacanānāṃ dhātūnām ekācām, ākārāntānām, ghaseś ca vasau iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49058: dhātvabhyāsayoḥ ekādeśe kṛte etvābhyāsalopayoś ca kṛtayoḥ kṛtadvirvacanā ete ekāco bhavanti āt - yayivān /
GS24jvkasipu:49061: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ekājād ghasām eva vasāviḍāgamo bhavati na anayeṣām /
GS24jvkasipu:49066: krādiniyamāt pratiṣedhābhāvāc ca ya iṭ prasaktaḥ sa niyamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49068: dvirvacane hi kṛte iṭi hi sati āto lopena bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49069: daridrātes tu kāsyanekājgrahaṇaṃ culumpādyartham ityāmā bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49071: athāpyām na kriyate tathāpi ca daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaś ca pratyayavidhau iti prāg eva pratyayotpatter ākāre lupte iḍāgamasya nimittaṃ vihataṃ iti na iḍāgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49073: ghaser api yadi grahaṇam iha na kriyate tadā dvirvacanāt paratvād ghasibhasorhali ca (*6,4.100)
GS24jvkasipu:49074: iti upadhālope kṛte dvirvacanam eva na syāt, anackatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49075: iha tu ghasigrahaṇād upadhālopam api paratvāt iḍāgamo bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:49078: iti dvirvacane kartavye sthānivad bhavati, tena jakṣivān iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:49083: gama hana vida viśa ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ vasau vibhāṣā iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49089: viśinā sāhacaryād iha videstaudādikasya lābhārthasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:49090: jñānārthasya tu nityaṃ vividvān ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49096: sanoteḥ sanater vā dhātoḥ saniṃsasanivāṃsam iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49099: saniṅpūrvāt anyatra senivāṃsam ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49105: ṛkārāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hanteś ca sye iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49109: svarater veṭtvāt ṛddhanoḥ sye ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:49122: stu su dhūñ ity etebhyaḥ sici parasamipade parata iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49133: yama rama nama ity eṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca sagāgamo bhavati parasmaipade sici, iḍāgamaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49138: yamādīnāṃ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāptā sā neṭi pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49145: smiṅ pūṅ ṛ añjū aśū ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ sani iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49153: aśeḥ ūdito grahaṇāt aśnoter nityam iḍāgamo 'sty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:49164: kiratigiratyoḥ - iṭ sani vā (*7,2.41) iti vikalpaḥ prāptaḥ, vṝto vā (*7,2.35) iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49169: rudādibhyaḥ uttarasya valādeḥ sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49181: īśa uttarasya se ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49188: īḍa jana ity etābhyām uttarasya dhve ity etasya, sye ity etasya ca sarvadhātukasya iḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49197: janī prādurbhāve ity asya chāndasatvāt śyano luk upadhālopābhāvaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49198: jana janane ity asya api śluvikaraṇasya grahaṇam atra+iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49199: tasya karmavyatihāre vyatijajñiṣe, vyatijajñiṣva, vyatijajñidhve, vyatijajñidhvam iti ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49200: dhveśabde īśer api iḍāgama iṣyate īśidhve īśidhvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49201: tadarthaṃ kecit īḍijanoḥ sdhve ca iti sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49202: tatra sakārādeḥ seśabdasya sūtra eva+upādānāc caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ īśeranukarṣaṇārtho vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49203: īśīḍijanāṃ sedhvayoḥ ity ekam eva sūtraṃ na paṭhitam ? vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ paṇineḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49204: dhve iti kṛtaṭer etvasya grahaṇāt laṅi dhvami na bhavitavyamiṭā /
GS24jvkasipu:49210: sārvadhātuke yo liṅ tasya anantyasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49211: kaḥ punar anantyo liṅaḥ sakāraḥ ? yo yāsuṭsuṭsīyuṭām /
GS24jvkasipu:49222: akārāntāt aṅgād uttarasya yā ity etasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49231: ity anena atra bhavitavyam, pacet ity atra api hi tarhi ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101)
GS24jvkasipu:49234: sa yathaiva dīrghasya bādhakaḥ evam ato lopasya api bādhakaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:49235: syād etad evaṃ yadi dīrghaḥ sārvadhātuke vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49236: atha tu tiṅi vidhīyate, tadā yena nāprāptinyāyena dīrghasyaiva bādhakaḥ syān na punar ato lopasya /
GS24jvkasipu:49238: yaḥ iti vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe yalopasya asiddhatvamanāśritya ādguṇaḥ kṛtaḥ, sautratvān nirdeśasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49239: kecit atra ato yāsiyaḥ iti sūtraṃ pathanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49245: ākārasya ṅidavayavasya ākārāntād aṅgād uttarasya sārvadhātukasya iy ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49254: ity atra na ṅitīva ṅidvat ity evam aṅgīkriyate, api tu ṅita iva ṅidvat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49255: pūrvasūtra eva uccukuṭiṣati iti prasiddhaye tathāṅgīkaraṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:49256: yadi gāṅkuṭādisūtre ṅita iva ṅidvad bhavati ity evam aṅgīkriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:49275: akāramātrabhakto 'yaṃ muk adupadeśagrahaṇena gṛhyate iti adupadeśād iti lasārvadhātukānudattatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49276: yady evam āto ṅitaḥ (*7,2.81) ity ayam api cidhiḥ prāpnoti ? taparanirdeśān na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:49278: lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam api tarhi na prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49280: tena upadeśād ūrdhaṃ saty api kālabhede bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49281: tathā ca pacavaḥ, pacāmaḥ ity atra api bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49300: vikalpena ayam ākāro bhavati, etaj jñāpitam aṣṭano dīrghāt (*6,1.172)
GS24jvkasipu:49303: tena aṣṭabhiḥ, aṣṭabhyaḥ ity api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49311: rai ity etasya halādau vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49318: mṛjer vṛddhiḥ (*7,2.114) ity ataḥ prāg vibhaktyadhikāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49322: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ anādeśe vibhaktau parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49329: hali ity adhikārād apy atra na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49330: uttaratra tu anādeśagrahaṇena prayojanam yo 'ci (*7,2.89) iti, tad ihaiva kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49334: dvitīyāyāṃ ca parataḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49345: prathamāyāś ca dvivacane parato bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye yuṣmadasmadoḥ ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49354: bhāṣāyām iti kim ? yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe //
GS24jvkasipu:49358: ajādau vibhaktau anādeśe yuṣmadasmadoḥ yakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49368: ity atra yadi hali iti anuvartate, śakyamakartum aci iti etat ? tat kriyate vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:49376: kaśca śeṣaḥ ? yatra ākāro yakāraś ca na vihitaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49377: pañcamyāś ca caturthyāś ca ṣaṣṭhīprathamayor api /
GS24jvkasipu:49378: yāny advivacanāny atra teṣu lopo vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49397: śeṣe lope kṛte striyāṃ ṭāp kasmān na bhavati, tvaṃ brāhmaṇī, ahaṃ brāhmaṇī ?
GS24jvkasipu:49398: snnipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya, aliṅge vā yusmadasmadī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49399: kecit tu śeṣe lopaṃ ṭilopam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49403: tena maparyantād yo 'nyaḥ sa śeṣaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49404: tatra ayaṃ lopaḥ iti ṭilopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49409: yadita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmo maparyantasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49415: maparyantasya iti kim ? yuvakām, āvakām iti sākackasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:49418: maparyantasya iti kim ? sarvasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:49419: tathā ca sati tvamayor akārasya yo 'ci (*7,2.89) iti yakāre kṛte aniṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49420: māntasya ity eva siddhe asmin yat parigrahaṇaṃ kṛtam, avadhidyotanārthaṃ tat /
GS24jvkasipu:49422: kadā ? yadā ṇyantayoḥ kvipi māntatvaṃ vidyate yuṣmadasmadoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49423: sthānivattvaṃ ca ṇeratra kvau lutatvān na vidyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49426: dvivacane ye yuṣmadasmadī dvyarthābhidhānaviṣaye tayoḥ maparyantasya sthāne yuva āva ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49434: samāsārthasya anyasaṅkhatvāt ekavacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49435: tadā api dvyarthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yuvāvau bhavataḥ ,
GS24jvkasipu:49437: ity evam ādinā ādeśāntareṇa na bādhyete /
GS24jvkasipu:49458: tvāhādīnāṃ tu viṣaye paratvāt te eva bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49467: yadā tu yuṣmadasmadī ekatvabahutvayor vartete, samāsārthastu dvitve, tadā yuvāvau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49477: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya jasi parato yūya vaya ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49484: tadantavidhir atra bhavati, aṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49488: yuṣmadasmador maparyantasya sau pare tva aha ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49498: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tubhya mahya ity etāv ādeśua bhavato ṅayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49508: yuṣmadasmadoḥ maparyantasya tava mama ity etāv ādeśau bhavato ṅasi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49519: ekavacane ye yuṣmadasmadī ekārthāmidhānaviṣaye tayor maparyantasya sthāne tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49529: samāsārthasya tv anyasaṅkhyatvāt dvivacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49531: ādeśāntarāṇāṃ tu tvāhau sau (*7,2.94) ity evamādīnāṃ viṣaye pūrvavipratiṣedhena te eveṣyante /
GS24jvkasipu:49548: pratyaye uttarapade ca parata ekavacane vartamānayoḥ yusmadasmador maparyantasya tva ma ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49563: yuṣmākaṃ putraḥ, asmākaṃ putraḥ yuṣmatputraḥ, asmatputraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49564: vibhaktau ity adhikārāt pūrvayogo vibhaktāv eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49565: tato 'nyatra api pratyaye uttarapade ca yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49566: nanu cātrāpyantarvartinī vibhaktir asti, tasyām eva ādeśau bhavisyataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:49568: bahiraṅgo luk, antaraṅgau ādeśau, prathamaṃ tau bhaviṣyataḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:49569: etad eva tarhi ādeśavacanaṃ jñāpakam antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgo 'pi luk bādhate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49570: tena gomān priyo 'sya gomatpriyaḥ ity evam ādau numādi lukā bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49571: evaṃ ca sati tvāhau sau (*7,2.94) ity evam ādayo 'pi pratyayottarpadayor ādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49579: atha kimarthm eṣāṃ tvāhādīnāṃ bādhanārtham etan na vijñāyate ? lakṣyasthityapekṣayā /
GS24jvkasipu:49584: tri catur ity etayoḥ striyāṃ vartamānayoḥ tisṛ catasṛ ity etāv ādeśau bhavato vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49593: striyām iti ca+etat tricaturor eva viśeṣaṇaṃ na aṅgasya /
GS24jvkasipu:49594: tena yadā tricatuḥśabdau striyām, aṅgaṃ tu liṅgāntare, tadā apy ādeśau bhavata eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49595: priyāḥ tisro brāhmaṇyo 'sya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49601: iti samāsānto na bhavati, vibhaktyāśrayatvena tisṛbhāvasya bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49602: yadā tu tricatuḥśabdau liṅgāntare, striyām aṅgam, tadā ādeśau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49603: priyāḥ trayo 'syāḥ, priyāṇi trīṇi vā asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ sā priyatriḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49610: catastraḥ paśya ity atra caturaḥ śasi (*6,1.137) ity eṣa svaro mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:49611: catasṛṇām ity atra tu ṣaṭtricaturbhyo halādiḥ (*6,1.179) ity eva svaro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49616: tisṛ catasṛ ity etayoḥ ṛtaḥ sthāne rephādeśo bhavati ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49632: tisṛcatasroḥ pratipattyartham, anyathā hi tadapavādaḥ tricaturor eva ayam ādeśo vijñāyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:49636: jarā ity etasya jaras ity ayam ādeśo bhavati anyatrasyām ajādau vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49637: jarasā dantāḥ śīryante, jarayā dantāḥ śīryante /
GS24jvkasipu:49638: jarase tvā paridadyuḥ, jarāyai tvā paridadyuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49643: iha atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti lug na bhavati, ānupūrvyā siddhatvat /
GS24jvkasipu:49644: atijara am iti sthite luk, ambhāvaḥ, jarasbhāvaḥ iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:49645: tatra luk tāvadapavādatvād ambhāvena bādhyate, ambhāvo 'pi paratvāj jarasādeśena /
GS24jvkasipu:49648: iti evam eva bhavati atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ paśya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49649: prathamaikavacane tṛtīyābahuvacane ca atijaraṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:49650: atijaraiḥ iti ca bhavitavyam iti gonardīyamatena /
GS24jvkasipu:49651: kiṃ kāraṇam ? sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhiranimittaṃ tadvidghātasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49652: anye tu anityatvāt asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ atijarasaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ tiṣṭhati,
GS24jvkasipu:49653: atijarasaiḥ ity evaṃ bhavitavyam iti manyante //
GS24jvkasipu:49658: tyad ity evam ādīnām akārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49669: sañjñopasarjanībhūtāḥ tyadādayaḥ pāṭhādeva paryudastāḥ iti iha na bhavati, tyad, tyadau, tyadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49671: tyadādipradhāne tu śabde bhavaty eva, paramasaḥ paramatau, parmate //
GS24jvkasipu:49675: kim ity etasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49677: sākackasya apy ayam ādeśo bhavati, tena akāra eva kimo na vidhīyate kimo 't (*5,3.12) iti //
GS24jvkasipu:49681: takārādau hakārādau ca vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya ku ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49689: ati tiy etasyāṃ vibhaktau parataḥ kim ity etasya kva ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49693: kimo ḍvat iti pratyayāntaraṃ na vidhīyate, sākackārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:49697: tyadādīnāṃ takāra-dakārayoḥ anantyayoḥ sakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49707: adasaḥ sau parataḥ sakārasya aukārādeśo bhavati sośca lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49710: autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackād vā vaktavyaḥ sādutvaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:49711: yadā ca autvapratiṣedhaḥ tadā sakārād uttarasya utvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49719: hrasvāl lupyeta sambuddhir na halaḥ prakṛtaṃ hi tat //
GS24jvkasipu:49720: āpa etvaṃ bhavet tasmin na jhalītyanuvartanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49732: idamo dakārasya sthāne makārādeśo bhavati vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49738: idamo makārasya yakārādeśo bhavati sau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49740: uttarasūtre puṃsi iti vacanāt striyāmayaṃ yakāraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49744: idamaḥ idarūpasya puṃsi sau parataḥ ay ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49750: idamaḥ akakārasya idrūpasya sthāne ana ity ayam ādeśo bhavati āpi vibhaktau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49755: āpi iti pratyāhāraḥ tṛtīyaikavacanāt prabhṛti supaḥ pakāreṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:49760: halādau vibhaktau parataḥ idamo 'kakārasya idrūpasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49766: nānarthake 'lontyavidhiḥ iti sarvasya ayam idrūpasya lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49777: mṛjer iti dhātugrahaṇam idam, dhātoś ca kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātupratyaya eva veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49778: tena kiṃsaparimṛḍbhyām, kaṃsaparimṛḍbhiḥ ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:49782: ajantasya aṅgasya ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49792: jayater yauteś ca uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti ṣṭran pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49797: aṅgopadhāyā akārasya sthāne ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49811: taddhite ñiti ṇiti ca pratyaye parato 'ṅgasya acām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49818: tvāṣṭraḥ, jāgataḥ ity atra acāmāder vṛddhir antyopadhālakṣaṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ bādhate //
GS24jvkasipu:49822: kiti ca taddhite parato 'ṅgasyācām ādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49826: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49833: devikā śiṃśapā dityavāṭ dīrghasatra śreyas ity etaṣām aṅgānām acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthane vṛddhiprasaṅge ākāro bhavati ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:49838: pūrvadevikā nāma prācāṃ grāmaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ pūrvadāvikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49839: prācāṃ grāma-nagarāṇām (*7,3.14) iti uttarapadavṛddhiḥ, sāpi ākāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49840: śiṃśapā - śiṃśapāyāḥ vikāraḥ camasaḥ śāṃśapaḥ camasaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49841: palāśādirayam, tena pakṣe aṇ, anudāttādilakṣaṇo vā añ /
GS24jvkasipu:49843: pūrvaśiṃśapā nāma prācāṃ grāmaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ pūrvaśāṃśapaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49848: vṛddhiviṣaye 'cāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vahīnarasya ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49854: kekaya mitrayu pralaya ity eteṣāṃ yakārādeḥ iya ity ayam ādeśo bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:49857: janapadaśabdāt kṣatriyād añ (*4,1.168) iti añ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49861: loke ca ṛṣiśabdo gotram ity abhidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49864: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic || PS_7,3.3 ||
GS24jvkasipu:49866: yakāra-vakārābhyām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49867: tābhyāṃ tu yakāra-vakārābhyāṃ pūrvam aijāgamau bhavataḥ ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:49874: yvābhyām iti kim ? nrarthasya apatyam nrārthiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49875: padāntābhyām iti kim ? yaṣṭiḥ praharaṇam asya yāṣṭīkaḥ yataḥ chātrāḥ yātāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49877: iha mā bhūt, dādhyaśviḥ, mādhvaśviḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:49880: vṛddher abhāvāt pratiṣedho 'pi na asti ity aprasaṅgaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49883: yatra tu uttarapadasambandhī yaṇ na bhavati tatra na+iṣyate pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49884: dve aśītī bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvyāśītikaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:49888: dvāra ity evam ādīnāṃ yvābhyām uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49901: śobhano 'dhyāyaḥ ity etasyāṃ vyutpattau tu pūrveṇa+eva siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:49902: atha api evaṃ vyutpattiḥ kriyate, svo 'dhyāyaḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:49903: evam apy atra+eva svaśabdasya+eva pāṭhāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:49904: tadādāv api hi vṛddhiriyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:49929: nyagrodhaśabdasya kevalasya yakārād uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:49930: tasmāc ca pūrvam aikāra āgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49932: kevalasya iti kim ? nyagrodhamūle bhavāḥ śālayaḥ nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:49933: nyagrodhayati iti nyagrodhaḥ iti vyutpattipakṣe niyamārtham, avyutpattipakṣe vidhyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:49941: karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām (*3,3.43) iti ṇacprayayaḥ, tadantāt ṇacaḥ striyām añ (*5,4.14) //
GS24jvkasipu:49945: svāgata ity evam ādīnāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49952: vyavahāraśabdo 'yaṃ laukike vṛtte vartate, na tu karmavyatihāre /
GS24jvkasipu:49966: śvādeḥ aṅgasya iñi parato yad uktaṃ tana bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49969: śvanśbado dvārādiṣu paṭhyate, tatra ca tadādividhir bhavati iti etad eva vacanaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:49973: tadantasya ca anyatra api taddhite pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:49978: śvādeḥ aṅgasya padaśabdāntasya anyatarasyāṃ yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:49983: uttarapadasya ity ayam adhikāraḥ hanasto 'ciṇṇaloḥ (*7,3.32) iti prāgetasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:49984: mad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ uttarapadasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:49993: yatra pañcamīnirdeśo na asti je proṣṭhapadānām (*7,3.18)
GS24jvkasipu:49995: pañcamīnirdeśeṣv api vispaṣṭārtham, vṛddheś ca vyapadeśārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:49996: uttarapadavṛddhau sarvaṃ ca (*6,2.105) iti uttarapadādhikāre yā vṛddhiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:49998: avayavavācinaḥ uttarasya ṛtuvācinaḥ uttarapadasya ca acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50004: pūrvaṃ varṣāṇām, aparaṃ varṣāṇām iti ekadeśisamāsaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50008: , sarvatra aṇ talopaś ca (*4,3.22) ity aṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50009: tatra ṛtor vṛddhimadvidhau avayavāt iti tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50010: avayavāt iti kim ? pūrvāsu varṣāsu bhavam paurvavarṣikam /
GS24jvkasipu:50016: su sarva ardha ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya janapadavācinaḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50021: janapadatadavadhyoś ca (*4,2.124), avṛddhād api bahuvacanaviṣayāt (*4,2.125) iti vuñ /
GS24jvkasipu:50026: digvācinaḥ uttarasya janapadavācino madravarjitasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50032: diśaḥ iti kim ? pūrvaḥ pañcālānām pūrvapañcālaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ paurvapañcālakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50040: prācāṃ deśe grāmanagarāṇāṃ diśa uttareṣām acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50051: grāmatvād eva nagarāṇām api grahaṇe siddhe bhedena yad ubhayor upādānaṃ tat sambandhabhedapratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:50053: pāṭaliputrādiḥ punar uttarapadam eva nagaram āha /
GS24jvkasipu:50054: tatra grāmavācinām aṅgānām avayavasya dikśabdād uttarasya nagaravācinām uttarapadānām avayavasya ca vṛddhir bhavati ity evam abhisambandhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50055: itaratra tu diśa uttareṣām nagarāṇām ity eva /
GS24jvkasipu:50056: pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity evam ādiṣu kṛtāyām uttarapadavṛddhau ekādeśo bhavati iti jñāpi ta nendrasya parasya (*7,3.22)
GS24jvkasipu:50061: saṅkhyāyā uttarapadasya saṃvatsaraśabdasya saṅkhyāyāś ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50063: dvau saṃvatsarābadhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dvisāṃvatsarikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50064: saṅkhyāyāḥ - dve ṣaṣṭī adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī vā dviṣāṣṭikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50066: dviṣaṣṭhyādiśabdo varṣeṣu saṃkhyeyeṣu vartamānaḥ kālādhikāravihitaṃ pratyayam utpādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:50068: ity eva siddhe saṃvatsaragrahaṇam parimāṇagrahaṇe kālaparimāṇasya agrahaṇārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:50069: tena dvaisamikaḥ, traisamikaḥ iti uttarapadavṛddhir na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50070: dvivarṣā, trivarṣā māṇavikā iti aparimāṇabistācita iti paryudāso na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50074: saṅkhyāyā uttarasya varṣaśabdasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50077: sa cet taddhito bhaviṣyatyarthe na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50078: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto vā dvivārṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50081: yasya traivarṣikaṃ dhānyaṃ nihitaṃ bhṛtyavṛttaye, adhikaṃ vā api vidhyeta, sa somaṃ pātum arhati /
GS24jvkasipu:50083: adhīṣṭabhṛtayor abhaviṣyati iti pratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50084: gamyate hi tatra bhaviṣyattā, na tu taddhitārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50085: dve varṣe adhīṣṭo bhṛto vā karma kariṣyati iti dvivārṣiko manuṣyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50089: parimāṇāntasya aṅgasya saṅkhyāyāḥ paraṃ yad uttarapadaṃ tasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50092: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye śāṇe ca+uttarapade na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50096: ity atra suvarṇaśatamānayor upasaṅkhyānam iti luko vikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50097: dvābhyāṃ niṣkābhyāṃ krītam dvitripūrvān niṣkāt (*5,1.30) dvinaiṣkikam /
GS24jvkasipu:50100: pañca lohityaḥ parimāṇamasya, pañca kalāpāḥ parimāṇamasya iti vihṛhya tad asya pariṃāṇam (*5,1.57)
GS24jvkasipu:50101: iti yogavibhāgāt pratyayaḥ, taddhitāntaścāyaṃ samudāyaḥ sañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:50105: śāṇād vā (*5,1.35), dvitripūrvādaṇ ca (*5,1.36) ityaṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50112: tatra yaḥ taddhito vihitaḥ tasmin ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50114: kiti ca parataḥ proṣthapadānām uttarasya acāmādeḥ acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50115: proṣṭhapadā nāma nakṣatram, tābhiḥ yuktaḥ kālaḥ ity aṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:50117: proṣṭhapadāsu jātaḥ, ṛtunakṣatrebhyo 'ṇ ity aṇ, proṣthapādaḥ māṇavakaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50118: je iti kim ? yadā proṣthapado megho dharaṇīmabhivarṣati, proṣthapadāsu bhavaḥ prauṣṭhapadaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50119: proṣthapadānām iti bahuvacananirdeśāt paryāyo 'pi gṛhyate bhadrapādaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50123: hṛd bhaga sindhu ity evam anto 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50136: saktupradhānāḥ sindhavaḥ saktusindhavaḥ, saktusindhuṣu bhavaḥ sāktusaindhavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50138: sindhuśabdaḥ kacchādiṣu paṭhyate, tena tadantavidhir iṣyate iti aṇpratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50142: anuśatika ity evam ādīnāṃ cāṅgānāṃ pūrvapadasya ca+uttarapadasya ca cāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50148: aṅgāraveṇuḥ nāma kaścit, tasya apatyam āṅgāravaiṇavaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50150: asyahatya iti kecit paṭhanti, tato 'pi vimuktāditvādaṇ /
GS24jvkasipu:50154: ata eva vacanādasya samudāyasya prātipadikatvaṃ vibhakteś ca aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:50155: vadhyoga iti bidādiḥ ayam, tasya apatyam vādhyaugaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50162: janapadasamudāyo janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate iti vuñ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50164: ihaloka, paraloka - tatra bhavaḥ aihalaukikaḥ, pāralaukikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50168: sarvabhūmeḥ nimittaṃ saṃyogaḥ utpāto vā sārvabhaumaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50174: ṣyañi iti kim ? rājapuruṣasya apatyam rājapuruṣāyaṇiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50181: tena idamapi siddhaṃ bhavati, abhigamamarhati ābhigāmikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50211: devatādvandve ca pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50215: yo devatādvandvaḥ sūktahaviḥsambandhī, tatra ayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50216: iha tu na bhavati, skandaviśākhau devate asya skāndaviśākhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50221: indraśabdasya parasya yad uktam tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50224: parasya iti kim ? aindrāgnamekādaśakapālaṃ caruṃ nirvapet /
GS24jvkasipu:50225: indraśabde dvāvacau, tatra taddhite ekasya yasyeti ca (*6,4.148)
GS24jvkasipu:50227: aparasya pūrveṇa saha ekādeśaḥ ity aprāptir eva vṛddheḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50229: bahiraṅgam api pūrvottarapadayoḥ pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati paścād ekādeśaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50230: tena pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ ity ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50234: dirghād uttarasya varuṇasya yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50240: iti pratiṣedho vidhīyate, tena dīrghāt paro na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50244: prācāṃ deśe nagarānte 'ṅge pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50249: prācām iti kim ? madranagaram udakṣu, tatra bhavaḥ mādranagaraḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50253: jaṅgala dhenu valaja ity evam antasya aṅgasya pūrvapadasya acāmāder aco vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50254: vibhāṣitam uttaram uttarapadasya vibhāṣā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50260: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā || PS_7,3.26 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50262: ardhaśabdāt parasya parimāṇavācinaḥ uttarasya acāmāder acaḥ sthāne vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50263: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50267: parimāṇasya iti kim ? ardhakrośaḥ prayojanam asya ārdhakrośikam //
GS24jvkasipu:50271: ardhāt parasya parimāṇākārasya vṛddhir na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50272: pūrvasya tu vā bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50277: taparakaraṇaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, ardhakhāryāṃ bhavā ardhakhārī /
GS24jvkasipu:50279: ardhakhārī bhāryā yasya ardhakhārībhāryaḥ, vṛddhinimittasya ca taddhitasya araktavikāre (*6,3.39)
GS24jvkasipu:50282: sa vṛddhinimittaṃ na bhavati iti puṃvadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:50283: yathā vaiyākaraṇī bhāryā asya vaiyākaraṇabhāryaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50288: pravāhaṇasya ḍhe parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati, pūrvapadasya vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50294: ḍhakprayayāntasya pravāhaṇaśabdasya taddhiteṣu parataḥ uttarapadasya acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati, pūrvasya tu vā /
GS24jvkasipu:50297: bāhyataddhitanimittā vṛddhiḥ ḍhāśrayeṇa vikalpena bādhitum aśakyā iti sūtrārambhaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50301: nañaḥ uttareṣāṃ śuci īśvara kṣetrajña kuśala nipuṇa ity eteṣām acāmāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50309: atra kecid āhuḥ iyaṃ pūrvapadasya vṛddhir aprāptaiva vibhāṣā vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50310: na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt ity uttaro bhāvapratyayaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50311: tatra śucyādibhyaḥ eva pratyaye kṛte paścānnañsamāse sati vṛddhiranaṅgasyāpi vacanāt bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50313: bhāvavacanādanyopi hi taddhito vṛddhinimittamapatyādiṣu artheṣu nañsamāsād eva vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50314: bahuvrīheś ca nañsamāsāt bhāvavacano 'pi asti, tatra aṅgādhikāropamardanaṃ na yujyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50315: akṣetrajñānīśvarau tatpuruṣau eva brāhmaṇādiṣu paṭhyete, tataḥ tābhyāṃ bhāve ṣyañ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50319: yathātatha yathāpura ity etayoḥ nañaḥ uttarayoḥ paryāyeṇa acamāder acaḥ vṛddhir bhavati taddhite ñiti,
GS24jvkasipu:50323: ayathātatha aythāpura iti brāhmaṇādiṣu nañsamāsau etau draṣṭavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:50324: sūtre yathātathāyathāpuraśabdau tu yathā 'sādṛśye (*2,1.7) iti avyayībhāvasamāsau /
GS24jvkasipu:50326: bhāsye tu yathādarśita ayathātathābhāvaḥ iti tathā supsupeti samāso lakṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:50331: taddhiteṣu iti nivṛttam, tatsambaddhaṃ kiti ity api /
GS24jvkasipu:50333: hanaḥ takārodeśo bhavati ñiti, ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ ciṇṇalau varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:50341: dhāto kāryam ucyamānaṃ dhātoḥ pratyaye vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50342: iha na bhavati, vārtraghnam itarat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50346: ākārāntasya aṅgasya ciṇi kṛti ñṇiti yugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50361: udātopadeśasya māntasya aṅgasya ācamivarjitasya ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50362: kiṃ ca uktam ? ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) iti vṛddhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50374: katham udyamoparamau ? aḍa udyame, yama uparame iti nipātanād anugantavyau /
GS24jvkasipu:50375: upadeśagrahaṇam kim ? śamī, damī, tamī ity atra yathā syāt, iha mā bhūt, yāmakaḥ, rāmakaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50383: āmaḥ iti caurādikasya ṇici vṛddhau satyāṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50384: tatra hi mittvaṃ na asti na anye mito 'hetau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50385: sūryaviśrāmā bhūmiḥ ity evam ādikaṃ prayogamanyāyyam eva manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:50391: jani vadhi ity etayoḥ ciṇi kṛti ca ñṇiti yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50398: vadhiḥ prakṛtyantaraṃ vyañjanānto 'sti, tasya ayaṃ pratiṣedho vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50399: bhakṣakaścenna vidyeta vadhako 'pi na vidyate iti hi prayogo dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50401: ciṇkṛtoḥ ity eva, jajāna garbha mahimānamindram //
GS24jvkasipu:50407: arti hrī vlī rī knūyī kṣmāyī ity eteṣām aṅgānām ākārāntānāṃ ca pugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50416: arti iti ṛ gatiprāpaṇayoḥ, ṛ gatau iti dvayor api dhātvor grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:50417: rī ity api rī gatireṣaṇayoḥ, rīṅ śravaṇe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50418: pukaḥ pūrvāntakaraṇam adīdapat ity atra upadhāhrasvo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50422: śā dhā sā hvā vyā ve pā ity eteṣam aṅgānāṃ yugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50430: pāgrahaṇe pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity asya api iha grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50431: pā rakṣaṇe ity asya lugvikaraṇatvān na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50444: etasmin prakaraṇe lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣā na asti ity upadiśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50445: tena adhyāpayati, jāpayati ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50449: vā ity etasya vidhūnane 'rthe vartamānasya jugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50452: kimarthaṃ sūtram, vaja gatau ṇyantasya siddhatvāt ? vāteḥ puk mā bhūt ity evam artham /
GS24jvkasipu:50453: pai ovai śoṣaṇe ity etasya etad rūpm //
GS24jvkasipu:50458: lī lā ity etayor aṅgayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ nuk luk iy etāv āgamau bhavato ṇau parataḥ snehavipātane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:50463: na tu kṛtātvasya vibhāṣā līyateḥ (*6,1.51) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50467: lā iti lāteḥ, kṛtātvasya ca līyateḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50471: bhī ity etasya hetubhaye 'rthe ṣugāgamo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50474: atra api bhī ī iti īkārapraśleṣaḥ kṛtātvasya pugnivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50475: muṇḍo bhāpayate ity evaṃ hi tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50476: hetubhaye iti kim ? kuñcikayā enaṃ bhāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:50477: na atra hetuḥ prayojako bhayakāraṇam, kiṃ tarhi, kuñcikā //
GS24jvkasipu:50481: sphāy ity etasya aṅgasya vakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50486: śadeḥ aṅgasya agatau arthe vartamānasya takārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50488: agatau iti kim ? gāḥ śādayati gopālakaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50492: ruheḥ aṅgasya anyatarasyāṃ pakārādeśo bhavati ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50495: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ || PS_7,3.44 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50497: pratyayasthāt kakārāt pūrvasya akārasya ikārādeśo bhavati āpi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50498: sa ced āp supaḥ paro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50507: kakāramātraṃ pratyayo na asti iti sāmarthyāt pratyayasthasya grahaṇam śakyate vijñātum /
GS24jvkasipu:50510: pūrvasya iti kim ? parasya mā bhūt, paṭukā /
GS24jvkasipu:50518: atha āpi ity anena kim ? viśiṣyate ? kakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50519: yady evam, kārikā ity atra api na prāpnoti, akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:50521: ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhavati iti vyavadhānam eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:50522: vacanād vyavadhānamīdṛśaṃ yat sthānivadbhāvakṛtam ekena varṇena tadāśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50523: rathakaṭyādiṣu tu śrutikṛtam anekena varṇena vyavadhānam iti itvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50524: asupaḥ iti kim ? bahavaḥ parivrājakā asyāṃ mathurāyām bahuparivrājakā mathurā /
GS24jvkasipu:50525: subantād ayaṃ bahuparivrājakaśabdāt paraḥ āp iti pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50527: paryudāse hi sati samudāyād asubantāt parataḥ āp iti itvam atra syād eva /
GS24jvkasipu:50528: avidyamānaḥ sup yasmin so 'yam asup iti ? evam api nāśīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50529: tathā hi sati bahucarmikā ity atra api na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50533: kevalamāmaka iti niyamāt sañjñāchandasoḥ īkāro na asty atra,
GS24jvkasipu:50538: udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakpūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.43) iti vikalpo mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50544: yā sā ity etayoḥ ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50547: yā sā iti nirdeśo 'tantram, yattador upalakṣaṇametat /
GS24jvkasipu:50548: iha api pratiṣedha iṣyate, yakāṃ yakāmadhīmahe takāṃ pacāmahe iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50572: tāntave iti kim ? vaṇikā bhāgurī laukāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50576: śakunau iti kim ? vartikā bhāgurī laukāyatasya /
GS24jvkasipu:50587: udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena yakārapūrvāyāḥ kakārapūrvāyāś ca ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50594: ātaḥ iti kim ? sāṅkāśye bhavā sāṅkāśyikā /
GS24jvkasipu:50596: ātaḥ ity anena hy ataḥ iti sthānī viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50598: yakapūrvāyāḥ iti strīliṅganirdeśaḥ ātaḥ strīpratyayasya pratipattyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:50599: iha na bhavati, śubhaṃ yāti iti śubhaṃyāḥ - śubhaṃyikā /
GS24jvkasipu:50603: dhātvantayoḥ yakārakakārayor asya pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50611: eṣām ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāras tasya itvaṃ na bhavati udīcāmācaryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:50624: tatra hi sati yadi sākackābhyāṃ nañsamāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:50626: ubhayathāpi samāsād ya vibhaktir utpadyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ tyadātyatve sati ṭāpā bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:50627: so 'ntarvartinyā vibhaktyā subantāt paraḥ iti itvasya prāptir eva na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:50628: tena aneṣakā, advake ity eva nityaṃ bhavitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:50630: bhastrā ity ayam abhāṣitapuṃskaḥ, tasya abhāṣitapuṃskāc ca (*7,3.48)
GS24jvkasipu:50631: ity eva siddhe yad iha grahaṇaṃ tadupasarjanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:50634: atra upasarjanahrasvatve kṛte punar bahuvrihau kṛte bhāṣitapuṃskād yaḥ ṭāp utpadyate tasya ke 'ṇaḥ (*7,4.13)
GS24jvkasipu:50635: iti yo hrasvaḥ, na asau abhāsitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50636: nañpūrvāṇām api ity apiśabdād anyapūrvāṇāṃ kevalānāṃ ca vidhir ayam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50637: nirbhastrakā, nirbhastrikā, bahubhastrakā, bahubhastrikā, ity evam anayor api iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50638: atra nañpūrvāṇām iti vacanam anuvāda eva mandabuddhipratipattyarthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:50642: abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya udīcām ācāryāṇāṃ matena ikārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50646: bahuvrīhau yadā kapi hrasvaḥ kriyate tadā bhavitavyam anena vidhinā /
GS24jvkasipu:50647: atra api abhāṣitapuṃskād vihitasya ataḥ sthāne bhavatyakāraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50648: yadā tu avidyamānā khaṭvā asyāḥ akhaṭvā, alpā akhaṭvā akhaṭvikā iti tadā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50649: tathā atikrāntā khaṭvām atikhaṭvā, alpā atikhaṭva atikhaṭvikā //
GS24jvkasipu:50653: abhāṣitapuṃskāt ātaḥ sthāne yo 'kāraḥ tasya ācāryāṇām ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50664: tasya pratyayaṭhasya ikaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50672: saṅghātagrahaṇe tu pratyaye 'tra api saṅghātagrahaṇam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:50673: tatra kaṇeṣṭhaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ ity evam ādīnām uṇādīnām uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50674: mathitaṃ paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ ity atra tu yasya+iti ca (*6,4.148)
