GS24jvkasipu:50677: sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50683: is us ity evam antānām ugantānāṃ tāntānāṃ cāṅgānām uttarasya ṭhasya kaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50694: isusoḥ pratipadoktayor grahaṇād iha na bhavati, āśiṣā carati āśiṣikaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50701: cakārajakārayoḥ kavargādeśo bhavati ghiti ṇyati ca pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50711: nyaṅku ity evam ādīnāṃ kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50713: madguḥ - mimasjibhya uḥ iti masjeḥ upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50714: bhṛguḥ - prathimadibhrasjāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ salopaś ca iti upratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50715: dūrepākaḥ, phalepākaḥ - dūre pacyate svayam eva, phale pacyate svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:50718: tatpuruṣe iṛti bahulam (*6,3.14) iti saptamyā aluk /
GS24jvkasipu:50719: kṣaṇepākaḥ ity api hi kecit paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:50724: takram vakram iti pañcater vañcateś ca sphāyitañcivañci ity ādinā sūtreṇa rak /
GS24jvkasipu:50729: śvapākaḥ, māṃsapākaḥ, kapotapākaḥ, ulūkapākaḥ iti karmopadādaṇ pratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50731: nyagrodhaḥ, vīrud ity atra nyakpūrvasya ruheḥ pacādyaci, vipūrvasya kvipi dhakāro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50737: hanteḥ hakārasya kavargādeśo bhavati ñiti ṇiti pratyaye parataḥ nakāre ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50746: haḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:50749: ñṇitpratyayo hanter viśeṣaṇam, nakāro hakārasya, nakāre 'nantarasya hantihakārasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50752: yady api sarvair eva ñṇinnairhantihakāro viśiṣyate tathāpi yena nāvyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ñṇiti dhātvavayavena vyavahite 'pi sati bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50753: iha tu na bhavati, hananam icchati hananīyati, hananīyater ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50761: abhyāsanimitte pratyaye hanter aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād eva+etat kutvam /
GS24jvkasipu:50762: iha na bhavati, hananīyitum icchati jihananīyiṣati //
GS24jvkasipu:50766: hinoter hakarasya abhyāsād uttarasya kavargādeśo bhavati acaṅi /
GS24jvkasipu:50774: tatra abhyāsanimitte pratyaye heraṅgasya iti vijñāyamane prāptir eva na asti ?
GS24jvkasipu:50776: etat jñāpyate, heracaṅi iti caṅo 'nyatra herṇya dhikasya api kutvaṃ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50781: sani liṭi ca pratyaye jeḥ aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasmād uttarasya kavargāadeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50785: jināteḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte yady api jirbhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50786: tathāpi lākṣaṇikatvāt tasya grahaṇaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:50793: cinoteḥ aṅgasya sanliṭor abhyāsād uttarasya vibhāṣā kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50800: kavargādeḥ dhātoḥ cajoḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50809: aji vraji ity etayoś ca kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50814: ajes tu ajer vy-aghañ-apoḥ (*2,4.56) iti vībhāvasya vidhānāt ṇyati na asti udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:50818: bhuja nyubaj ity etau śabdau nipātyete pāṇau upatāpe ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50823: nyubjitāḥ śerate 'sminn iti nyubjaḥ upatāpaḥ, rogaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50830: prayāja anuyāja ity etau nipātyete yajñāṅge /
GS24jvkasipu:50835: prayājānuyājagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham, anyatra apy evaṃ prakāre kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50838: ṛtuyājaiścaranti ity evam ādi siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:50842: vañceḥ aṅgasya gatau vartamānasya kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50850: ucer dhātoḥ ke pratyaye okaḥ iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:50851: kim punar atra nipātyate ? kutvaṃ guṇaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:50855: adhikaraṇādau tu kārakāntare ghañarthe kavidhānam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50856: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ ghañyeva na vyutpadyate ?
GS24jvkasipu:50857: svarārtham antodātto 'yam iṣyate, ghañi sati ādyudāttaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:50858: divaukasaḥ, jalaukasaḥ ity evam ādāv apy asuni pratyaye uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:50863: ṇye parataḥ āvaśyake 'rthe kavargo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50873: yaja yāca ruca pravaca ṛca ity eteṣāṃ ṇye parataḥ kavargādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50879: ṛdupadhād api ṛcer ata eva nipātanāt ṇyat bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50884: prapūrvasya+eva vacer aśabdasañjñāyāṃ kutvapratiṣedho yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:50887: etat tu viśeṣa eva+iṣyate, daśarātrasya yad daśamamahaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50894: vaco 'śabdasañjñāyāṃ ṇyati parataḥ kutvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50901: prayojya niyojya ity etau śabdau śakyārthe nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:50918: ghusañjñakānāṃ leṭi parato vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50923: āḍāgame sati lope 'pi dadāt iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50926: dadāt ity eva nitye prāpte lopaḥ ārabhya māṇo bādhate eva etad rūpam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:50930: okārāntasya aṅgasya śyani parato lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50944: kakāravataḥ upādānaṃ kim ? iha mā bhūt, utsau /
GS24jvkasipu:50949: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye || PS_7,3.73 ||
GS24jvkasipu:50951: duha diha liha guha ity eteṣām aṅgānām ātmanepade dantyādau parataḥ kṣasya vā lug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:50964: anyatra tu antyasya+eva lope kṛte jhalo jhali (*8,2.26) iti sakāralopena sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:50965: sthānivadbhāvo 'pi akāralopasya na asti, pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:50967: yadi sa na gṛhyeta tataḥ taugrahaṇam eva atra kṛtaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:50972: śamādīnām aṣṭānāṃ dīrgho bhavati śyani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50987: ṣthivu klami ācam ity eteṣāṃ dīrgho bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:50998: kramaḥ parasmaipadapare śiti parato dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51001: iha utkrāma, saṅkrāma iti herluki kṛte na lumatāṅgasya (*1,1.66)
GS24jvkasipu:51002: iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāt dīrgho na prāpnoti ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51003: lumatāśabdena lupte ya daṅgaṃ tasya kārye sa pratiṣedhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51004: na ca hau kramir aṅgam, kiṃ tarhi, śapi //
GS24jvkasipu:51008: iṣu gami yama ity eteṣāṃ śiti parataḥ chakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51013: iha mā bhūt, iṣyati, iṣṇāti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51014: ye tu iṣimuditaṃ na adhīyate te iha ca sūtre aci iti anuvartayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51015: tac ca pradhānam ajgrahaṇam śiti ity anena viśeṣyate iti varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:51017: yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe ity etad api viśeṣṇena+eva isyate,
GS24jvkasipu:51018: tena iṣāṇa ity atra chatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51019: na hy ayam ajeva śit iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51023: pa ghrā dhmā sthā mnā dāṇ dṛśi arti sarti śada sada ity eteṣāṃ piba jighra dhama tiṣtha mana yaccha paśya ṛccha dhau śīya sīda ity ete ādeśā bhavanti śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51035: pibater laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti, saḥ aṅgavṛtte punar vṛttāvavidhirniṣṭhitasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51036: atha vā akārānto 'yam ādeśaḥ ādyudātto nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51039: anyatra sarati, anusarati ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51043: jña jana ity etayoḥ jādeśo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51050: pū ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvo bhavati śiti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51052: pūñ pavan ity ataḥ prabhṛti plī gatau vṛt iti yāvat kecit icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:51053: vṛtkaraṇam etat lvādīnāṃ pvādīnāṃ ca parisamāptyartham iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51054: apare tu lvādīnām eva parisamāptyarthaṃ vṛtkaraṇam etad icchanti, āgaṇāntāḥ pvādayaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51058: yeṣām āgaṇāntāḥ pvādayaḥ teṣāṃ jānāti ity atra hrasvaḥ prāpnoti, jñājanor jā (*7,3.79)
GS24jvkasipu:51060: janer api hi jādeśe sati ato dīrgho yañi (*7,3.101) iti dīrghatvena jāyate iti sidhyati //
GS24jvkasipu:51064: mīnāter aṅgasya śiti pratyaye parato hrasvo bhavati nigamaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51070: mider aṅgasya iko guṇo bhavati śiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51076: jusi ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51080: atha cinuyuḥ, sunuyuḥ ity atra kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:51081: atra hi dve ṅittve, sārvadhātukāśrayam, yāsuḍāśrayaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:51082: tatra na aprāpte sārvadhātukāśrayaṅittvanimitte pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ tam eva bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:51083: yāsuḍāśrayaṅittvanimittaṃ tu na bādhate, tatra hi prāpte ca aprāpte ca ārabhyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51088: sārvadhātuke ārdhadhātuke ca pratyaye parataḥ igantasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51097: yadi hi pratyaye saṅi iti vā ucyeta, iha api syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:51101: jāgu ity etasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati aviciṇṇalṅitsu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51109: vṝddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca yathā syāt iti jāgarter ayaṃ guṇaḥ ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51110: tasmin kṛte yā ata upadhāyāḥ (*7,2.116) vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti sā na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51111: yadi hi syāt anarthaka eva guṇaḥ syāt, ciṇṇaloś ca pratiṣedhavacanam anarthakam /
GS24jvkasipu:51112: aviciṇṇalṅitsu iti kim ? jṝśṝstṛrjāgṛbhyaḥ kvin jāgṛviḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51117: vi iti kecid ikāram uccāraṇārthaṃ varṇayanti, kvasāv api vakārādau guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51119: ajāgaruḥ, ahaṃ jajāgara ity atra pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti ? na, apratiṣedhāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51121: athavā jāgraḥ iti praptirasāvānantaryād viciṇṇalṅitsu pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51124: iti ca prāptiḥ , sā na pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51128: pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayor guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51136: pratyayāder aṅgāvayavasya ca halorānantarye sati lag hūpadhaguṇo na vyāvartyate iti jñāpitam etat knusanoḥ kitkaraṇena,
GS24jvkasipu:51139: saṃyoge gurusañjñāyāṃ guṇo bhettur na sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:51140: vidhyapekṣaṃ laghoś ca asau kathaṃ kuṇḍir na duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:51144: knusanor yatkṛtaṃ kittvaṃ jñāpakaṃ syāl laghor gaṇe //
GS24jvkasipu:51146: upadhā ca atra ig eva gṛhyate, tato bhinatti iti guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51149: pugantaśca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūypadham iti sūtrārthaṃ varṇayanti //
GS24jvkasipu:51151: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke || PS_7,3.87 ||
GS24jvkasipu:51153: abhyastasañjñakasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ajādau piti sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51177: bhū sū ity etayoḥ tiṅi sārvadhātuke guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51187: atha bobhavīti iti yaṅluki guṇapratiṣedhaḥ kasmān na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:51188: jñāpakāt, yad ayaṃ bobhūtu iti guṇābhāvārthe nipātanaṃ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:51193: ukārāntasya aṅgasya vṛddhir bhavati luki sati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:51213: api stuyād rājānam ity atra hi ṅicca pinna bhavati iti pittvapratiṣedhād vṛddher abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51214: na abhyastasya ity etad iha anuvartate, yoyoti, roroti ity evam ādyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:51218: ūrṇoter vibhāṣā vṛddhir bhavati halādau piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:51227: ūrṇoter dhātoḥ apṛkte hali piti sārvadhātuke guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51231: tena+eva jñāpyate bhavaty eṣā paribhāṣā yasmin vidhis tadādāvalgrahaṇe iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51235: tṛṇaha ity etasyāṅgasya imāgamo bhavati hali piti sārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:51243: tṛṇaha iti āgataśnaṃko gṛhyate, śnami kṛte imāgamo yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51247: vrū ity etasmād uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51257: yaṅaḥ uttarasya halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:51260: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa /
GS24jvkasipu:51263: halādeḥ pitaḥ sārvadhātukasya yaṅantād abhāvaḥ iti yaṅlugantasya udāharaṇam //
GS24jvkasipu:51271: ama gatyādiṣu ity etebhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halāder vā īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51277: śamyamoḥ bahulaṃ chandasi (*2,4.73) iti vikaraṇaluki sati halādisārvadhātukam anantaraṃ sambhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51279: tatra sarveṣām eva chandasi viṣaye vidhir ayaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51280: sārvadhātuke iti anuvartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham,
GS24jvkasipu:51282: śamīdhvam ity atra api yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51287: aster aṅgāt sijantāc ca parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51296: āhibhuvorīṭi pratiṣedhaḥ iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha tena+iha na bhavati, āttha, abhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:51300: astisicor apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya īḍagamo bhavati bahulaṃ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:51306: abhaiṣīrmā putraka iti ca bhavati, chāndasatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51307: māṅyoge 'pi aḍāgamo bhavati, akṣaḥ, atsāḥ iti, sica iḍabhāvaś ca //
GS24jvkasipu:51311: rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya halādeḥ apṛktasya īḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51327: rudādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ parasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati gārgyagālavayor matena /
GS24jvkasipu:51342: ada bhakṣaṇe, asmād uttarasya apṛktasya sārvadhātukasya aḍāgamo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:51351: akārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati yañādau sārvadhātuke parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51360: kecid atra tiṅi ity anuvartayanti, teṣāṃ bhavavān iti kvasau sārvadhātukadīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51365: supi ca yañādau parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51376: bahuvacane jhalādau supi parato 'kārāntasya aṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51398: tasminn āṅi parataḥ, cakārād osi ca, āvantāṅgasya ekārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51406: āpaḥ iti pito grahaṇaṃ kim ? kīlālapā brahmaṇena /
GS24jvkasipu:51408: ṅyābgrahaṇe 'dīrghagrahaṇam iti vacanāt iha na bhavati, atikhaṭvena brāhmaṇakulena //
GS24jvkasipu:51413: sambuddhau ca parataḥ ābantasya aṅgasya etvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51422: ambārthanām aṅgānāṃ nadyantānāṃ hrasvo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51438: talo hrasvo bā ṅisambuddhyor iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51443: mātṝṇāṃ mātajādeśo vaktavyaḥ sambuddhau, putrāya putram abhidhātum /
GS24jvkasipu:51445: mātrā vyapadeśam arhati ślāghanīyatvād yaḥ putras tadartham /
GS24jvkasipu:51453: hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51457: he kumāri, he brahmabandhu ity evam ādīnāṃ hrasvavidhānasāmarthyād guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51458: yadi guṇaḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt, ambārthānāṃ hrasvaḥ ity uktvā nadīhrasvayor guṇaḥ ity evaṃ brūyāt //
GS24jvkasipu:51462: jasi parato hrasvāntasya aṅgasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51468: jasādiṣu chandasi vāvacanaṃ prāṅ ṇau caṅyupadhāyā hrasva ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51469: itaḥ prakaraṇāt prabhṛti chandasi vā iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:51470: kiṃ prayojanam ? ambe, darvi, śatakratvaḥ, paśve nṛbhyaḥ, kikidīvyā /
GS24jvkasipu:51481: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya ṅau parataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51495: ghyantasyāṅgasya ṅiti pratyaye parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51510: nadyantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya āḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51518: ābantā daṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya yāḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51525: atikhaṭvāya ity atra akṛte dīrghe ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti vacanād yāḍāgamo na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51530: sarvanāmnaḥ ābantād aṅgād uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyaysya syāṭ āgamo hrasvaś ca bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51548: dvitīyā tṛtiyā ity etābhyām uttarasya ṅitaḥ pratyayasya vibhāṣā syāṭ āgamo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:51555: nadyantāt ābantāt nī ity etasmāc ca+uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51569: ikārokārābhyāṃ nadīsañjñakābhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51576: yan na nadisañjñaṃ na api ghisañjñam ikārāntam , tadiha+udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:51583: ghisañjñakād uttarasya ṅeḥ aukārādeśo bhavati, tasya ca gheḥ akārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51588: at iti taparakaraṇaṃ striyāṃ ṭāpo nivrttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:51589: audacca gheḥ iti yeṣām ekam eva+idaṃ sūtram,
GS24jvkasipu:51595: gheḥ uttarasya āṅaḥ na abhāvo bhavati astriyām /
GS24jvkasipu:51602: iti kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // ______________________________________________________//
GS24jvkasipu:51609: caṅpare ṇau yadaṅgam, tasya upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51614: atra dvirvacanopadhāhrasvatvayoḥ prāptayoḥ paratvād upadhāhrasvatvam, tatra kṛte dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:51615: iha tu mā bhavānaṭiṭat iti nityatvād dvitīyasya dvirvacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:51616: tathā sati hrasvabhāvino 'ṅgasya akārasya upadhātvaṃ vihitam iti hrasvo na syāt ? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51617: oṇeḥ ṛdit - karaṇaṃ jñāpakaṃ nityam api dvirvacanam upadhāhrasvatvena bādhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51619: caṅyupadhāyā hrasvaḥ ity ucyamāne alīlavat ity atra vacanasāmarthyāt antaraṅgām api vṛddhim ādeśaṃ ca bādhitvā hrasvaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51620: adīdapat ity atra hrasvatvena puko bādhaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51621: apīpacat ity evam ādautu naiva syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:51626: tadedadupadhāgrahaṇam uttarārtham avaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ tad iha api hrasvatvaṃ nivartayati ity evam arthaṃ yena na avyavadhānam ity etannāśrayitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51629: yo 'sau ṇau ṇilopastasya sthānivadbhāvena aglopitvāt aṅgasya hrasvo na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:51634: aglopinām aṅgānāṃ śāseḥ ṛditāṃ ca ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51639: ageva yatra kevalo lupyate tatra sthānivadbhāvād api siddham,
GS24jvkasipu:51640: halacor ādeśe tu na sidhyati iti tadartham etad vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:51648: bhrāja bhāsa bhāṣa dīpa jīva mīla pīḍa ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ ṇau caṅi upadhāyā hrasvo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:51664: pibateḥ aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ lopo bhavati, abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51666: upadhālope kṛte oḥ puyaṇ vacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ ṇau sthānivadbhāvasya iti sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:51670: tiṣṭhater aṅgasya ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51675: jighrateḥ aṅgasya nau caṅi upadhāyā ikārādeśo vā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51681: ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne vā ṛkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51687: taprakaraṇaṃ dīrghe 'pi sthānini hrasva eva yathā syāt, acīkṛtat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:51688: na ca ayaṃ bhāvyamānaḥ, kintu ādeśāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ svarūpam eva+etad abhyanujñāyate //
GS24jvkasipu:51692: chandasi viṣaye ṇau caṅi upadhāyā ṛvarṇasya sthāne ṛkarādeśo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:51700: dayater aṅgasya liṭi parato digi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51702: dayateḥ iti dīṅo grahaṇaṃ na tu daya dāne ity asya /
GS24jvkasipu:51708: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ guṇo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51719: pratiṣedhaviṣaye 'pi guṇo yathā syāt ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51727: atra hi pūrvaṃ dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścād upasargeṇa ity atra darśane liti kṛte,
GS24jvkasipu:51733: upaskṛṣīṣṭa ity atra suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt ṛtaś ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iḍāgamo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51737: ṛcchater aṅgasya, ṛ ity etasya, ṝkārāntānāṃ ca liṭi parato guṇo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51742: ṛccher alaghūpadhatvād aprāpto guṇo vidhīyate, ṝtāṃ tu pratiṣiddhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51749: śṝ dṝ pṝ ity eteṣāṃ aṅgānāṃ liṭi parato vā hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51760: prā pūraṇe ity eteṣām anekārthā dhātavaḥ iti śṝdṝprāmarthe vartamānānāṃ viśaśratuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:51766: tathā ca sati kvasau viśaśṛvān ity etad rūpaṃ na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:51776: rākā, dhākā ity atra uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51777: na kapi (*7,4.14) iti pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt kano 'pi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam iha bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51781: kapi pratyaye parato 'ṇo hrasvo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51785: gostriyor upasarjanasya (*1,2.48) ity ayam api hrasvaḥ kapi na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51787: paścāt kabantena saha samāsena bhavitavyam iti strīpratyayāntasamāsaprātipadikaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:51791: ābantasyāṅgasya kapi hrasvaḥ na bhavaty antarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:51797: ṛvarṇāntānāṃ dṛśeś ca aṅi parato guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51807: asyater aṅgasya thugāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51812: śvayateḥ aṅgasya akārādeśo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51817: pater aṅgasya pumāgamo bhavati aṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51823: vaceḥ aṅgasya aṅi parataḥ umāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51828: śīṅaḥ aṅgasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51834: yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ śīṅaḥ aṅgasya ayaṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51844: upasargād uttarasya uhater aṅgasya hrasvo bhavati yakārādau kṅiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:51853: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā ūhyate ohyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51858: eter aṅgasya upasargād uttarasya liṅi yakārādau kṅiti parato hrasvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51862: āśiṣi liṅi akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatve kṛte hrasvo 'nena bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51864: aṇaḥ ity eva, ā īyāt eyat /
GS24jvkasipu:51869: akṛdyakāre asārvadhātukayakāre ca kṅiti parato 'jantasya aṅgasya dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51900: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya akṛdyakāre asārvadhātuke yakāre cvau ca parato rīṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51907: kṅiti ity etan nivṛttam, tena+iha api bhavati, piturāgataṃ pitryam /
GS24jvkasipu:51913: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya śayak ity etayoḥ liṅi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke parato raṅ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51929: guṇo bhavati arteḥ saṃyogādīnām ṛkārāntānāṃ yaki parato ligi ca yakārādau asārvadhātuke /
GS24jvkasipu:51935: saṃskriyāt iti suṭo bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt abhaktatvāt vā saṃyogāditvam aṅgasya na asti iti guṇo na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:51942: yagi ca parataḥ arteḥ saṃyogādeś ca ṛtaḥ guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51948: na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ (*6,1.3) iti dvirvacanapratiṣedhḥ yakārasya neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51955: ghrā dhmā ity etayoḥ yaṅi parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51963: acarṇāntasya aṅgasya cvau parataḥ īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51972: kyaci parataḥ avarṇāntasya aṅgasya īkārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:51982: aśanāya udanya dhanāya ity etāni nipātyante bubhukṣā pipāsā gardha ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:51983: aśanāya ity aśanaśabdasya ātvaṃ kyaci nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:51995: chandasi viṣaye putravarjitasya avarṇāntasya aṅgasya kyaci yad uktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52006: durasyuḥ draviṇasyuḥ vṛṣaṇyati riṣaṇyati ity etāni chandasi nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52023: aśva agha ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ chandasi viṣaye ākārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52026: etad eva ātvavacanaṃ jñāpakaṃ na cchandasy aputrasya (*7,4.35) iti dīrgharatiṣedho bhavati iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52030: deva sumna ity etayoḥ kyaci parataḥ ākārādeśo bhavati kāṭhake yajuṣi /
GS24jvkasipu:52033: yajuṣi iti kim ? devāñ jigāti sumnayuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52038: kavi adhvara pṛtanā ity eteṣām aṅgānāṃ kyaci parato lopo bhavati ṛci viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:52045: dyati syāti mā sthā ity eteṣām aṅgānām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52059: śā chā ity etayoḥ anyatarasyām ikārādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:52068: devatrāto galo grāha iti yoge ca sadvidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52074: dadhāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52081: jahāter aṅgasya hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52089: jahāter aṅgasya vibhāṣā hi ity ayam ādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ktvāpratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52095: sudhita vasudhita nemadhita dhiṣva dhiṣīya ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52096: tatra sudhita vasudhita nemadhita iti suvasunemapūrvasya dadhāteḥ ktapratyaya ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52103: dhiṣva iti loṇmadhyamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya dvirvacanābhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52106: dhiṣiya iti āśīrliṅi ātmanepadottamaikavacane dadhāteḥ ittvam, iḍāgamo vā pratyayasya nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52112: dā ity etasya ghusañjñakasya dad ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti pratyaya parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52119: ghoḥ iti kim ? dāp lavane - dātaṃ barhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52122: evaṃ hy uktam - tānte doṣo dīrghatvaṃ syād dānte doṣo niṣṭhānatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:52124: yadi tu dasti iti takārādau dīrghatvaṃ tadā tānte 'pi adoṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52125: dāntadhāntayor api sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti natvadhatve na bhaviṣyataḥ iti na doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52129: aca upasargāt taḥ (*7,4.47) iti prāpte nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52130: anupasargā vā ete avādayaḥ kriyāntaraviṣayā veditavyāḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52134: ajantād upasargāduttarasya dā ity etasya ghusaṃjñakasya ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati takārādau kiti /
GS24jvkasipu:52144: upasargāt iti paccamīnirdeśād āder alaḥ prāpnoti ? tatra samādhimāhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52147: aparam api ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ sthāninirdeśartham ity ākārasya sthāne takāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52148: dvitakāro vā saṃyogo 'yam ādiśyate, so 'nekāltvāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:52149: apo bhi (*7,4.48) ity atra pañcamyantam acaḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:52151: dyater ittvād acasta ity etad bhavati vipratiṣedhena /
GS24jvkasipu:52157: ap ity etasya aṅgasya bhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ ta ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52161: svavaḥsvatavasormāsa uṣasaś ca takārādeśa iṣyate chandasi bhakārādau /
GS24jvkasipu:52169: sakārāntasya aṅgasya sakārādau ārdhadhātuke parataḥ takārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52183: tāseḥ asteś ca sakārasya sakārādau pratyaye parataḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52188: asteḥ akārāsakārayoḥ luptayoḥ se iti pratyayamātram etat padam, tena sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111)
GS24jvkasipu:52193: rephādau ca pratyaye parataḥ tāsastyoḥ sakārāsya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52201: tāsastyoḥ sakārasya hakārādaśo bhavati eti parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52207: yakārādau ivarṇādau ca parato dīdhīvevyoḥ lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52220: sani pratyaye sakārādau parataḥ mī mā ghu rabha labha śaka pata pada ity eteṣām aṅgānām acaḥ sthāne is ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52221: mī iti mīnātiminotyoḥ dvayor api grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52237: sani rādho hiṃsāyām aca is vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52244: āp jñapi ṛdha ity eteṣām aṅgānām aca īkārādeśo bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52248: jñapeḥ dvāvacau, tatra ṇeḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena lopaḥ, itarasya tu ītvam /
GS24jvkasipu:52252: sanīvantardha iti jñapeḥ ṛdheś ca iṭo vikaopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52256: dambheḥ aca ikārādeśo bhavati, cakārāt īt ca sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52262: muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā bhavati sani sakārādau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52264: mokṣate vatsaḥ svayam eva, mumukṣate vatsaḥ svayam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:52265: akarmakasya iti kim ? mumukṣati vatsaṃ devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52270: yad etat prakrāntaṃ sani mīmā ity ādi muco 'karmakasya iti yāvat, atra abhyāsalopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52272: abhyāsasya ity etac ca achikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52273: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ abhyāsasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52278: ity evam siddhe yad atragrahanam iha akriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52285: sarvasya abhyāsasya ayaṃ lopaḥ iṣyate, tadartham eva kecit atragrahaṇaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:52298: abhyāsasya yad ucyate anaci tad bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52315: tatra abhyāsajāteḥ āśrayaṇāt kvacid api vartamāno halādiḥ anadeḥ sarvatra nivṛttiṃ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:52316: apare tu bruvate, śeṣaśabdo 'yaṃ nivṛttyā viśiṣṭam avasthānam āha /
GS24jvkasipu:52317: tadavasthānam uktito yady api pradhānam, avidheyatvāt tu tadapradhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:52319: tatra ayam artho 'sya jāyate, abhyāsasya anāder halo nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52320: sā kim iti āder avidheyāṃ satīm anivṛttim apekṣiṣyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52324: abhyāsasya śarpūrvāḥ khayaḥ śiṣyante, anye halo lupyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52331: ucicchiṣati ity atra uccheḥ antaraṅgatvāt tuki kṛte dvirvacanam,
GS24jvkasipu:52332: tatra halādiḥ śeṣe sati abhyāse takāraḥ śrūyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:52347: kavateḥ abhyāsasya yaṅi parataḥ cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52350: kavateḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ kauteḥ kuvateś ca nivṛttyarthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52357: kṛṣeḥ chandasi viṣaye yaṅi parataḥ abhyāsasya cuḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52364_0: dādharti dardharti dardharṣi bobhūtu tetikate alarṣi āpanīphaṇat saṃsaniṣyadat karikrat
GS24jvkasipu:52364_1: kanikradat bharibhrat davidhvataḥ davidyutat taritrataḥ sarisṛpatam varīvṛjat marmṛjya
GS24jvkasipu:52364_2: āganīganti ity etāni aṣṭādaśa chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:52366: dhṛṅo vā ślau yaṅluki vā abhyāsasya dīrghatvaṃ ṇilopaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52371: atra ca yallakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /
GS24jvkasipu:52372: bobhūtu iti bhavateḥ yaṅlugantasya loṭi guṇābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52374: iti guṇābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ ? jñāpanārthaṃ tarhi nipātanam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:52375: jñāpayati, anyatra yaṅlugantasya guṇapratiṣedho na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52378: yaṅo ṅittvāt pratyayalakṣaṇena ātmanepadaṃ siddham eva ?
GS24jvkasipu:52379: jñāpanārthaṃ tu ātmanepadanipātanam, anyatra yaṅlugantād ātmanepadaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52380: alarṣi iti - iyarteḥ laṭi sipi abhyāsasya halādiḥ śeṣāpavādo rephasya latvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52381: sipā nirdeśo 'tantram, tipyapi dṛśyate alarti dakṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52382: āpanīphaṇat iti - phaṇater āṅpūrvasya yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya nīk nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52386: na cāsya sampūrvatā tantram, anyatra api hi dṛśyate, āsaniṣyadat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52387: karikrat iti - karoteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari cutvabhyāvaḥ, abhyāsakakārasya rigāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52388: kanikradat iti - krandeḥ luṅi cleḥ aṅādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52394: bharibhrat iti - bibharteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari bhṛñām it (*7,4.76)
GS24jvkasipu:52396: davidhvataḥ iti - dhvarateḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari jasi rūpam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:52397: atra abhyāsasya vigāgamaḥ ṛkāralopaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52400: davidyutat iti - dyuteḥ yaṅlugantasya śatari abhyāsasya amprasāraṇābhāvaḥ attvam,
GS24jvkasipu:52402: taritrataḥ iti - tarateḥ śatari ślau ṣaṣṭhyekavacane abhyāsasya rigāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52403: sarīsṛpatam iti - sṛpeḥ śatari ślau dvitīyaikavacane abhyāsasya rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52404: varīvṛjat iti - vṛjeḥ śatari ślau rīgāgamaḥ nipātyate abhyāsasya /
GS24jvkasipu:52405: marmṛjya iti - mṛjeḥ liṭi ṇali abhyāsasya rugāgamaḥ dhātoś ca yugāgamo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52406: tato mṛjer vṛddhiḥ (*7,2.114) na bhavati, alaghūpadhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52408: āganīganti iti - āṅpūrvasya gamerlati ślau abhyāsasya cutvābhāvaḥ nīgāgamaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52410: itikaraṇam evaṃ prakāraṇām anyeṣām apy upasaṅgrahārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:52420: narīnarti ity evam ādau abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādo na+utsargān vidhīn bādhate iti uḥ adatve kṛte rugādaya āgamāḥ kriyante //
GS24jvkasipu:52424: dyuti svāpi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya samprasāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52431: svāpiḥ ṇyanto gṛhyate, tasya abhyāsanimittena pratyayena ānantarye sati samprasāranam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52442: halādiḥ śeṣeṇa yakārasya nivṛttau prāptāyāṃ samprasāraṇaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52450: iṇo 'ṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya dīrgho bhavati kiti liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52452: iṇo yaṇ (*6,4.81) iti yaṇādeśe kṛte sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:52458: abhyāsasya ādeḥ akārasya dīrgho bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52466: tasmād ato 'bhyāsād dīrghībhūtād uttarasya dvihalo 'ṅgasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52469: dvihalaḥ iti kim ? āṭa, āṭatuḥ, āṭuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52476: aśnoteś ca dīrghībhūtād abhyāsād uttarasya nuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52478: aśnoteḥ iti vikaraṇanirdeśaḥ aśnāter mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52483: bhavater abhyāsasya akārādeśo bhavati liṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52485: bhavateḥ iti kṛtavikarananirdeśād iha na bhavati, anubabhūve kambalo devadattena /
GS24jvkasipu:52492: sūter liṭi parasmaipadaṃ vugāgamaḥ abhyāsasya ca atvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52499: nijādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati ślau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:52503: trigrahaṇam uttarārtham, eṣāṃ hi vṛtkaraṇam samāptyarthaṃ paṭhyate eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52508: bhṛñādīnāṃ trayāṇām abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati śalau sati /
GS24jvkasipu:52517: arti piparti ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya ikārādeśo bhavati ślau /
GS24jvkasipu:52523: chandasi viṣaye abhyāsasya ślau bahulam ikārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52547: sani iti vartate, it iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52548: uvarṇāntābhyāsasya pavarge yaṇi jakāre ca avarṇapare parataḥ ikārādeśo bhavati sani pratyaye parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52559: etad eva puyaṇjyapare iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam, advirvacananimitte 'pi ṇau sthānivad bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52560: oḥ iti kim ? pāpacyateḥ san - pāpaciṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:52568: sravati śṛṇoti dravati pravati plavati cyavati ity eteṣām abhyāsasya oḥ avarnapare yaṇi vā ikārādeśo bhavati sani parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52576: pūrvasūtrena tu anantara eva yaṇi bhavitavyam iti aprāptabibhāṣeyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52582: yaṅi yaṅluki ca igantasya abhyāsasya guṇo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52591: akito 'bhyāsasya dīrgho bhavati yagi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52600: nanu cātra apavādatvān nuki kṛte abhyāsasya anajantatvād eva dīrghatvaṃ na bhaviṣyati ?
GS24jvkasipu:52601: evaṃ tarhi akitaḥ ity anena etaj jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52602: abhyāsavikāreṣv apavādā na+utsargān vidhīn bādhante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52604: ḍoḍhaukyate ity atra dīrgho 'kitaḥ ity anena sandhyakṣarahrasvo na bādhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52607: mānprabhṛtīnāṃ dīrgheṇa sanītvaṃ na bādhyate - mīmāṃsate,
GS24jvkasipu:52613: vañcu sraṃsu dhvaṃsu bhraṃsu kasa pata pada skanda ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nīgāgamo bhavati yaṅi yaṅluki ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52634: anunāsikāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya akārāntasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52645: tena yaṃyamyate ity evam ādau ajhalparatve 'pi anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52647: vā padāntasya (*8,4.59) iti parasavarnavikalpo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52649: taparakaraṇaṃ tu bhūtapūrvasya api dīrghasya nivṛttyartham, bābhamyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52654: japa jabha daha daśa bhañja paśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52661: dandaśīti daśa iti daṃśiḥ ayaṃ nakāralopārtham eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52670: cara phala ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya nugāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52678: caraphaloḥ abhyāsāt parasya ataḥ ukārādeśo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52683: parasya iti kim ? abhyāsasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52684: ataḥ iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:52685: uditi taparakaraṇaṃ cañcūrti, pamphulīti ity atra laghūpadhaguṇanivṛttyartham /
GS24jvkasipu:52686: dīrghasya asiddhatvāt iha labhutvaṃ na nivartate //
GS24jvkasipu:52691: takārādau pratyaye parataḥ caraphaloḥ akārasya ukārādeśo bhavati caraṇaṃ cūrtiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52695: yaṅyaṅlukoḥ, abhyāsasya iti ca anuvartamānam api vacanasāmarthyād iha na abhisambadhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:52699: ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rīgāgamo bhavati yaṅyaṅlukoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52714: yaṅluki ṛdupadhasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsas tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ, cakārād rīk ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52724: ṛkārāntasya aṅgasya yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya rugrikau āgamau bhavataḥ rīk ca yaṅluki /
GS24jvkasipu:52730: kiratiṃ carkarītāntaṃ pacati ity atra yo nayet /
GS24jvkasipu:52731: prāptijñaṃ tamahaṃ manye prārabdhas tena saṅgrahaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52732: tatreyaṃ prāptiḥ taparakaranasāmarthyād aṅgaviśeṣaṇam ṛtaḥ ity etat,
GS24jvkasipu:52737: laghuni dhātvakṣare parato yo 'bhyāsaḥ tasya caṅpare ṇau parataḥ sanīva kāryaṃ bhavati anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:52742: oḥ puyaṇjyapare (*7,4.80) ity uktam, caṅpare 'pi tathā /
GS24jvkasipu:52756: atra kecid gaśabdam labhumāśritya sanbadbhāvam icchanti,
GS24jvkasipu:52757: sarvatraiva laghorānantaryam abhyāsena na asti iti vyavadhāne 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyād bhavitavyam, tad asat /
GS24jvkasipu:52758: yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt ity ekena vyavadhānam āśrīyate, na punar anekena /
GS24jvkasipu:52759: yady evam, katham acikṣaṇat iti ? ācāryapravṛttir jñāpayati bhavaty evaṃ jātīyakānām ittvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52760: yad ayaṃ tad bādhanārthaṃ samratyādīnām atvam vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:52762: paragrahaṇaṃ kim ? caṅi eva kevale mā bhūt, acakamata /
GS24jvkasipu:52765: vāditavantaṃ prayojitavān avīvadat ity atra yo 'sau ṇau ṇerlopo nāsāvaglopa ity āśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52766: kiṃ kāraṇam ? caṅpare iti ṇijāter nimittatvena ākṣepāt, tato 'nyasya ako lopaḥ parigṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52767: mīmādīnām atra grahaṇāt sanvadbhāvena abhyāsalopo na bhavati ity uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:52768: kiṃ ca sanvat iti sanāśrayaṃ kāryamatidiśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:52769: na ca lopaḥ sanam eva apekṣate,
GS24jvkasipu:52771: tadabhāvāt amīmapat ity ādau abhyāsalopo na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:52775: dīrghā bhavati laghoḥ abhyāsasya laghuni ṇau caṅpare anaglope /
GS24jvkasipu:52789: smṛ dṝ tvara pratha mrada stṝ spaśa ity eteṣām abhyāsasya at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52798: taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt ati kṛte dīrgho laghoḥ (*7,4.94) ity etad api na bhavati, adadarat //
GS24jvkasipu:52802: veṣṭi ceṣṭi ity etayoḥ abhyāsasya vibhāṣā at ity ayam ādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52810: gaṇeḥ abhyāsasya īkārādeśo bhavati caṅpare ṇau parataḥ, cakārāt at ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52812: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau saptamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52819: sarvasya iti ca dve iti ca+etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52821: ity ataḥ prāk, sarvasya dve bhavataḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52822: vakṣyati - nityavīpsayoḥ (*8,1.4) iti, tatra sarvasya sthāne dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52823: ke dve bhavataḥ ? ye śabdataś ca arthataś ca ubhayathāntaratame /
GS24jvkasipu:52827: yadā tu dviḥ prayogo dvirvacanam tadā sa eva pacatiśabdo dvirāvartate, tasya dve āvṛttī bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52829: atha padasya ity eva kasmān na+ucyate ? na+evaṃ śakyam, iha hi na syāt prapacati prapacati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52831: droḍhā iti ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ asiddhatvād akṛtayor eva tayor dvivacanaṃ prāpnoti,
GS24jvkasipu:52832: tatra paścād vikalpe satyaniṣtam api syāt drogdhā droḍhā,
GS24jvkasipu:52834: tasmād vaktavyam etat pūrvatra asiddhīyam advirvacane iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52835: sarvasya ity etad eva vā kṛtaṃ sarvakāryapratipattyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:52839: tasya dviruktasya yat paraṃ śabdarūpaṃ tad āmreḍitasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52840: caura caura 3, vṛṣala vṛṣala 3, dasyo dasyo 3 ghātayiṣyāmi tvā, bandhayiṣyāmi tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:52841: āmreḍitapradeśāḥ - āmreḍitaṃ bhartsane (*8,2.95) ity evam ādayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:52845: anudāttaṃ ca tad bhavati yad āmreḍitasañjñam /
GS24jvkasipu:52851: nitye cārthe vipsāyāṃ ca yad vartate tasya dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52852: keṣu nityatā ? tiṅkṣu nityatā avyayakṛtsu ca /
GS24jvkasipu:52856: yāṃ kriyāṃ kartā prādhānyena anuparaman karoti tan nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:52861: lunīhi lunīhi ity evāyaṃ lunāti ktvāṇamulorloṭaś ca dvirvacanāpekṣāyām eva paunaḥpunyaprakāśane śaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52863: yaṅ tu tannirapekṣaḥ prakāśayati, punaḥ punaḥ pacati pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52864: yadā tu tatra dvirvacanam tadā kriyāsamabhihāre paunaḥpunyaṃ draṣṭavyam pāpacyate pāpacyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52866: kā punar vīpsā ? vyāptiviśeṣaviṣayā prayoktur icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:52867: kā punaḥ sā ? nānāvācinām adhikaraṇānāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayokturvyāptum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:52868: nānābhūtārthavācināṃ śabdānāṃ yānyadhikaraṇāni vācyāni teṣāṃ kriyāguṇābhyāṃ yugapat prayoktum icchā vīpsā /
GS24jvkasipu:52872: yat tiḍantaṃ nityatayā prakarṣeṇa ca yuktaṃ tataḥ kṛtadvirvacanāt prakarṣapratyaya iṣyate pacati pacatitarām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:52873: iha tu āḍhyataramāḍhyataramānaya iti prakarṣayuktasya vīpsāyoga iṣyate //
GS24jvkasipu:52877: pari ity etasya varjane 'rthe dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52884: pari pari trigartebhyo vṛṣṭo devaḥ, pari trigartebhyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52885: samāse tu tena+eva+uktatvād varjanasya na+eva bhavati, paritrigartaṃ vṛṣṭo devaḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:52889: pra sam upa ut ity etaṣāṃ pādapūraṇe dve bhavato dvirvacanena cet pādaḥ pūrvate /
GS24jvkasipu:52892: upopa me parā mṛśa kiṃ nodudu harṣase dātavā u /
GS24jvkasipu:52893: pādapūraṇe iti kim ? pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā /
GS24jvkasipu:52899: upari adhi adhas ity eteṣāṃ dve bhavataḥ sāmīpye vivakṣite /
GS24jvkasipu:52906: iha kasmān na bhavati, upari śiraso ghaṭaṃ dhārayati ?
GS24jvkasipu:52907: auttarādharyam eva vivakṣitaṃ na sāmīpyam iti dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52913: vākyāder āmantritasya dve bhavataḥ asūyāsammatikopakutsanabhartsaneṣu yadi tad vākyaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52920: asūyāyām tāvat - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka 3 abhirūpaka, riktaṃ te ābhirūpyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52921: sammātau - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka 3 abhirūpaka, śobhanaḥ khalvasi /
GS24jvkasipu:52922: kope - māṇavaka 3 māṇavaka, avinītaka 3 avinītaka, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:52923: kutsane - śaktike 3 śaktike, yaṣṭike 3 yaṣṭike, riktā te śaktiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52924: bhartsane - caura caura 3, vṛṣala vṛṣala 3, ghātayiṣyami tvāṃ bandhayiṣyāmi tvām /
GS24jvkasipu:52925: asūyādiṣu svaritam āmreḍite 'sūyā-saṃmati-kopa-kutsaneṣu (*8,2.103) iti pūrvapadasya plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52926: bhartsane tu āmreḍitaṃ bhartsane (*8,2.95) ity āmreḍitasya+eva plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:52927: vākyādeḥ iti kim ? antasya madhyamasya ca mā bhūt, śobhanaḥ khalvasi māṇavaka /
GS24jvkasipu:52929: asūyādiṣu iti kim ? devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām //
GS24jvkasipu:52933: ekam ity etac chabdarūpaṃ dviruktaṃ bahuvrīhivad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52940: na bahuvrīhau (*1,1.129) iti pratiṣedho na bhavati, bahuvrīhir eva yo bahuvrīhiḥ iti vijñānāt /
GS24jvkasipu:52941: nana, susu, nañsubhyām (*6,2.172) ity antodāttatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52942: ṛk ṛk, pūḥ pūḥ, ṛk pūḥ iti samāsānto na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:52947: tatra vartamānasya dve bhavataḥ, bahuvrīhivaccāsya kāryaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52954: priyasya ciragamanādinā pīḍyamānaḥ kaścid evam prayuṅkte prayoktā //
GS24jvkasipu:52959: ita uttareṣu dvirvacaneṣu karmadhārayavat kāryaṃ bhavati ity etad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:52967: kopadhāyā api hi karmadhārayavadbhāvāt puṃvatkarmadhārayaḥ iti puṃvadbhāvo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52970: samāsāntodāttatvam anena+eva vidhīyate iti paratvadāmreḍitānudāttatvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52971: adhikāreṇaiva siddhe yat uttareṣu iti vacanaṃ tadvispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:52984: paṭujātīyaḥ, mṛdujātīyaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:52985: tat katham ? vakṣyamāṇam anyatarasyāṃgrahaṇam ubhayoḥ śeṣo vijāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52989: yadyapyatra agniśabdo gośabdaś ca mukhyārthasambandhādavabhṛtabhedaṃ taikṣṇyajāḍyādikamarthāntare gunaviśeṣam eva pratipādayituṃ pravṛttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:52990: tathāpi sarvadā guṇavacano na bhavati iti na dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:52996: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyām māṣaṃ māṣaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:52998: atra hi dvāv eva māṣau dīyete, na sarve kārṣāpaṇasambandhino māṣāḥ, tena vīpsā na vidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53000: asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi, dvau māṣau dehi, trīn vā māṣān dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:53001: anekasmin iti kim ? asmāt kārṣāpaṇād iha bhavadbhyāṃ māṣamekaṃ dehi /
GS24jvkasipu:53010: sa bhavān lunīhi lunīhi ity eva ayaṃ lunāti /
GS24jvkasipu:53015: nitya ity eva siddha iti tatra+uktam /
GS24jvkasipu:53021: tadarthaṃ kecit ḍāci bahulam iti paṭhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53025: ātiśayiko 'pi dṛśyate, pūrvataraṃ puṣpyanti, prathamataraṃ pacyante iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53026: ḍataraḍatamayoḥ samasampradhāraṇayoḥ strīnigade bhave dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53034: tathā strīnigadādbhāvāt anyatra api hi dṛśyate, ubhāvimāvāḍhyau, kataraḥ kataro 'nyorvibhavaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53035: karmavyatihāre sarvanāmno dve bhavata iti vaktavyaṃ samāsavacca bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:53036: yadā na samāsavat prathamaikavacanaṃ tadā pūrvapadasya anyamanyamime brāhmaṇā bhojayanti,
GS24jvkasipu:53053: priya sukha ity etayoḥ anyatarasyāṃ dve bhavataḥ akṛcchre dyotye /
GS24jvkasipu:53065: yo ya ātmā, yad yadātmīyam, tattad, yathāsvam, tasmin yathāyatham iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53069: sarveṣāṃ tu yathāyathaṃ yathātmīyam ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:53075: attvaṃ ca+uttarapadasya nipātyate rahasya maryādāvacana vyutkramaṇa yajñapātraprayoga abhivyakti ity eteṣu artheṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:53080: mātā putreṇa mithunaṃ gacchati, pautreṇa, tatputreṇa api iti maryādārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53083: dvivargasambandhanena pṛthagavasthitā dvanvdvaṃ vyutkrāntā ity ucyante /
GS24jvkasipu:53084: yajñapātraprayoge - dvandvaṃ nyañci yajñapātrāṇi prayunakti dhīraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53088: anyatra api dvandvam ity etad dṛśyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53097: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padasya ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53103: vakṣyamāṇavākyāpekṣayā padasya adhikṛtasya ṣaṣṭhyarthavyavasthā draṣṭavyāḥ kvacit sthānaṣaṣṭhī,
GS24jvkasipu:53109: padāt ity ayam adhikāraḥ prāk kutsane ca supyagotrādau (*8,1.69) ity etasmāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53110: yad iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ padāt ity evaṃ tad deditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53112: āmantritasya padāt parasya anudāttādeśo bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53121: apādādau iti ca etat trayam adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam ā pādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53122: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ anudāttaṃ sarvam apādādau ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53125: apādādau iti kim ? yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53127: grāmo vaḥ svam, janapado naḥ svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53128: apādādau iti kim ? rudro viśveśvaro devo yaṣmākaṃ kuladevatā /
GS24jvkasipu:53131: sarvagrahaṇam sarvam anūdyamānaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ ca anudāttaṃ yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53132: tena yuṣmadasmadādeśānām api vākyabhedena anudāttatvaṃ vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53133: yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca sarvasya subantasya padasya yathā syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53140: āmantritasya padasya padāt parasya apadādau vartamānasya sarvam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53145: iha mā bhūvan, ayaṃ daṇḍo hara anena, odanaṃ paca tava bhaviṣyati, odanaṃ paca mama abhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53150: āmantritāntaṃ tiṅantaṃ yuṣmadasmadādeśāś ca yasmāt parāṇi na teṣāṃ sāmarthyam iti tadāśrayā nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā na syuḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53156: yuṣmad asmad ity etayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vām nau ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ, tau cānudāttau /
GS24jvkasipu:53157: padasya, padāt, anudāttaṃ sarvamapādādau iti sarvam iha sambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53165: ekavacanabahuvacanāntayor ādeśāntar avidhānād dvivacanāntayoḥ etāv ādeśau vijñāyete /
GS24jvkasipu:53166: ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ iti kim ? grāme yuvābhyāṃ kṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:53168: iha mā bhūt, ayaṃ yuṣmatputraḥ ayam asmatputraḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53172: bahuvacanāntayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam vas nas ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53182: yuṣmadasmadoḥ ekavacanāntayoḥ ṣaṣthīcaturthīsthayoḥ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ te me ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53192: dvitīyāyā yad ekavacanaṃ tad antayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ yathāsaṅkhyam tvā mā ity etau ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53198: ca vā ha aha eva ebhir yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayoḥ na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53204: yuṣmākaṃ ca svam, asmākaṃ ca svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53216: yuṣmān vā paśyati, asmān vā paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53221: yuṣmākaṃ vā svam, asmākaṃ vā svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53232: yuṣmān vā paśyati, asmān vā paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53238: yuṣmākaṃ ha svam, asmākaṃ ha svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53249: yuṣmān ha paśyati, asmān ha paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53271: yuṣmākam eva svam asmākam eva svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53286: grāmaś ca te svam, nagaraṃ ca me svam //
GS24jvkasipu:53292: taiḥ paśyārther anālocane vartamānair yukte yuṣmadasmadoḥ vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53306: vidyamānapūrvāt prathamāntāt padāt uttarayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhāṣa vānnāvādayo na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53307: grāme kambalaste svam, grāme kambalastava svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53308: grāme kambalo me svam, grāme kambalo mama svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53309: grāme kambalaste dīyate, grāme kambalastubhyaṃ dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53310: grāme kambalo me dīyate, grāme kambalo mahyaṃ dīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53311: grāme chātrāstvā paśyanti, grāme chātrāstvāṃ paśyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53312: grām chātrā mā paśyanti, grāme chātrā māṃ pśyanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53315: pathamāyāḥ iti kim ? kambalo grāme te svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53319: iha mā bhūt, atho grāme kambalaste svam, atho grāme kambalo me svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53320: apara āha - sarva eva vānnāvādayo 'nanvādeśe vibhāṣā vaktavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53322: kambalo me svam, kambalo mama svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53323: ananvādeśe iti kim ? atho kambalaste svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53325: na tarhi idānīmidaṃ vaktavyam sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā iti ? vaktavyaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:53328: atho grāme kambalaste svam, atho grāme kambalaste svam /
GS24jvkasipu:53329: atho grāme kambalo me svam, atho grāmekambalo me svam, atho grāme kambalo mama svam //
GS24jvkasipu:53333: tiṅantāt padāt parāṇi gotrādīni kutsane ābhīkṣṇye cārthe vartamānāni anudāttāni bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53362: kutsanābhīkṣṇyayoḥ iti kim ? khanati gotraṃ sametya kūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:53364: tena anyatra api gotrādigrahaṇena kutsanābhīkṣṇyayor eva kāryaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53368: tiṅantaṃ padam atiṅantāt padāt param anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53383: tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya anudāttatve sati sarvatāsir eva udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53384: yatra tu ṭilopaḥ, tatra udāttanivṛttisvaro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53389: yat yadi hanta kuvit net cet caṇ kaccit yatra ity etair nipātair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53401: samuccayādiṣu tu yaḥ caśabdaḥ, tena yogena vidhir ayaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53406: nipātaiḥ iti kim ? yat kūjati śakaṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:53409: yuktam iti kim ? yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram //
GS24jvkasipu:53413: naha ity etena yukte pratyārambhe tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53414: coditasya avidhīraṇe upālipsayā pratiṣedhayuktaḥ pratyāraṃhaḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53417: pratyārambhe iti kim ? naha vai tasmiṃś ca loke dakṣiṇām icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:53421: satyam ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ na anudāttaṃ bhavati praśne /
GS24jvkasipu:53424: praśne iti kim ? satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:53428: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ aprātilomye gamyamāne nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53432: aprātilomye iti kim ? aṅga kūja 3 vṛṣala, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:53438: hi ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam aprātilomye nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53442: aprātilomye ity eva, sa hi kūja vṛṣala, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma //
GS24jvkasipu:53447: chandasi viṣaye hiyuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃane kam api nānudāttaṃ bhavati, ekam api /
GS24jvkasipu:53448: kadācid ekaṃ kadācid anekam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53449: tatra anekaṃ tāvat - anṛtaṃ hi matto vadati, pāpmā enaṃ vipunāti /
GS24jvkasipu:53451: ekaṃ khalv api - agnir hi pūrvamudajayat tamindro 'nūdajayat tiṅantadvayam api hiśabdayuktam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:53452: tatra ekam udajayat ity ādyudāttam, aparam anudāttam /
GS24jvkasipu:53453: ajā hy agner ajaniṣṭa garbhāt sā vā apaśyaj janitāram agne /
GS24jvkasipu:53458: yāvat yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53469: yāvad yathā ity etābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ pūjāyaṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53477: anantaram iti kim ? yāvad devadattaḥ pacati śobhanam /
GS24jvkasipu:53483: yāvadyathābhyāṃ yuktaṃ upasargavyapetaṃ ca pūjāyāṃ viṣaye nānudāttaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
GS24jvkasipu:53485: pūrvam anantaraṃ ity uktam, upasargavyavadhānārtho 'yam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53490: anantaram ity eva, āvad devadattaḥ prapacati /
GS24jvkasipu:53496: tu paśya paśyata aha ity etair yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53501: pūjāyām iti kim ? paśya mṛgo dhāvati /
GS24jvkasipu:53502: pūjāyām iti vartamāne punaḥ pūjāyām ity ucyate nighātapratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:53503: tad dhi pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhena sambaddham iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53507: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati pūjāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53514: aho ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ śeṣe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53519: pūjāyām ity asay pūrvatra ca anukṛṣṭatvād anadhikāre siddhe śeṣavacanaṃ vispaṣṭārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:53523: purā ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ parīpsāyām arthe vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53528: paīpsāyām iti kim ? naḍena sma purā adhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53534: nanu ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53539: anujānīṣva māṃ karaṇaṃ prati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53540: anujñaiṣaṇāyām iti kim ? akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? nanu karomi bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53546: kim ity etat kriyāpraśne yadā vartate tadānena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53550: pūrvaṃ kiṃyuktam iti tan na nihanyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53551: uttaraṃ tu na kiṃyuktam iti tannihanyata eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53553: yady apy ekasya ākhyātasya samīpe kiṃśabdaḥ śrūyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53554: tathāpi sarvasya saṃśayaviṣayasya tena yogaḥ iti ubhayatra pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53555: kriyāgrahaṇaṃ kim ? sādhanapraśne mā bhūt, kiṃ devadattaḥ odanaṃ pacati, āhosvicchākam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53556: praśna iti kim ? kim adhīte devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53558: anupasargam iti kim ? kiṃ devadattaḥ prapacati, āhosvit prakaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:53559: apratiṣiddham iti kim ? kiṃ devadatto na paṭhati, āhosvin na karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:53563: kimo lope kriyāpraśne tiṅantam anupasargam apratiṣiddhaṃ vibhāṣā nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53564: kva ca asya lopaḥ ? yatra gamyate cārthaḥ, na ca prayujyate kiṃśabdaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53572: ehi manye ity anena yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati prahāse /
GS24jvkasipu:53574: ehi manye odanaṃ bhokṣyase, na hi bhokṣyase, bhuktaḥ so 'tithibhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53575: ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, na hi yāsyasi, yātastena te pitā /
GS24jvkasipu:53576: prahāse iti kim ? ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53579: gatyarthaloṭā lṛṭ ity eva siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53584: prahāse eva hi manyater uttamo vihitaḥ, tato 'nyatra madhyama eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53585: tatra anena niyamena nivṛttiḥ kriyate, ehi manyase odanaṃ bhokṣye iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53589: jātu ity etad avidyamānapūrvam, tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53592: apūrvam iti kim ? kaṭaṃ jātu kariṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:53598: kiṃvṛttagrahaṇena tadvibhaktyantaṃ pratīyāt, ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau /
GS24jvkasipu:53599: tat kiṃvṛttaṃ ciduttaram avidyamānapūrvaṃ yat tena yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53608: apūrvam ity eva, devadattaḥ kiñcit paṭhati //
GS24jvkasipu:53613: āho utāho ity etābhyām apūrvābhyāṃ yuktam anantaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53618: anantaram iti kim ? śeṣe vibhāṣāṃ vakṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53619: apūrvam ity eva, devadatta āho bhuṅkte /
GS24jvkasipu:53624: āho utāho ity etābhyāṃ yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam śeṣe vibhāṣā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53631: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat || PS_8,1.51 ||
GS24jvkasipu:53635: tena gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ lṛḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati, na cet kārakam sarvānyad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53636: yatra+eva kārake kartari karmaṇi vā loṭ, tatra+eva yadi lṛḍ api bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53637: kartṛkarmaṇī eva atra tiṅantavācye kārakagrahaṇena gṛhyete, na karaṇādi kārakāntaram /
GS24jvkasipu:53642: gatyarthagrahaṇaṃ kim ? paca devadatta odanam, bhokṣyase enam /
GS24jvkasipu:53643: loṭā iti kim ? āgaccheḥ devdatta grāmam, drakṣyasi enam /
GS24jvkasipu:53644: lṛṭ iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam, paśyasi enam /
GS24jvkasipu:53645: na cet kārakam sarvānyat iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta grāmam, pitā te odanaṃ bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53647: uhyantāṃ devadattena śālayaḥ, saktavaḥ tena pāsyante /
GS24jvkasipu:53649: āgaccha devadatta grāmam, tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca drakṣyāvaḥ enam ity atra api nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:53650: lṛḍantavācye hi sarvasmin kārake anyasmin na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:53651: iha tu yat loḍantasya kārakaṃ taccānyacca lṛḍantena ucyate iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53655: loḍantaṃ tiṅantaṃ gatyarthaloṭā yuktaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati, na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53656: loḍantayor ekaṃ kārakaṃ yadi bhavati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53660: gatyarthānām ity eva, paca devadattaudanam, bhuṅkṣva enam /
GS24jvkasipu:53661: loṭā ity eva, āgaccheḥ devadatta grāmam, paśya enam /
GS24jvkasipu:53662: na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat ity eva, āgaccha devadatta grāmam, paśyatu enam yajñadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53663: sarvagrahaṇānuvṛttestu iha bhavaty eva, āgaccha devadatta grāmam tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca paśyāva /
GS24jvkasipu:53670: loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ gatyarthalootā yuktaṃ tiṅantaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53674: sopasargam iti kim ? āgaccha devadatta, grāmaṃ paśya /
GS24jvkasipu:53675: anuttamam iti kim ? āgacchāni devadatta, grāmaṃ praviśāni //
GS24jvkasipu:53680: hanta ity anena yuktaṃ loḍantaṃ sopasargam uttamavarjitaṃ vibhāṣitaṃ nānudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53684: nipātair yadyadihanta iti nityam atra nighātapratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53690: āmaḥ uttaram ekapadāntaram āmantritāntam anantike nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53693: bho ity āmantritāntam api, nāmantrite samānādhikaraṇe sāmānyavacanam iti nāvidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53694: āmaḥ iti kim ? śākaṃ pacasi devadatta 3 /
GS24jvkasipu:53695: ekāntaram iti kim ? ām prapacasi devadatta 3 /
GS24jvkasipu:53696: āmantritam iti kim ? ām pacati devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53699: āma ekāntaram āmantritaṃ yat tasya ekaśruter anudāttasya ca pratiṣedha iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53700: tad ubhayam anena kriyate iti kecid āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53703: anantike ity anena yan na dūraṃ na sannikṛṣṭaṃ tat parigṛhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53704: tena asminnekadśruteḥ prāptir eva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:53711: yatparaṃ, hiparaṃ, tuparaṃ ca tiṅantaṃ chandasi nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53713: hiparam - indavo vāmuśanti hi tuparam - ākhyāsyāmi tu te /
GS24jvkasipu:53716: tupaśyapaśyatāhaiḥ iti ca nighātapratiṣedhe siddhe vacanam idaṃ niyamārtham,
GS24jvkasipu:53717: ebhir eva parairyoge pratiṣedho bhavati, nānyaiḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53718: iha na bhavati, jāye svo rohāvaihi /
GS24jvkasipu:53719: ehi ity anena gatyarthaloṭā yuktasya rohāva ity asya loḍantasya highāto bhavaty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:53723: cana cid iva gotrādi taddhita āmreḍita ity eteṣu parataḥ agateḥ uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53730: iha api gotrādayaḥ kutsanābhikṣṇyayoḥ eva gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:53733: anudāttaḥ taddhita iha udāharaṇam, anyatra taddhitasvareṇa tiṅsvaro bādhyate, pacatideśyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53735: agateḥ iti kim ? devadattaḥ prapacati cana /
GS24jvkasipu:53736: atra agatigrahaṇe, sagatir api tiṅ ity atra ca upasargagrahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53743: cādiṣu ca parataḥ tiṅantamagateḥ paraṃ nānudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53744: cādayaḥ na cavāhāhaivayukte (*8,1.24) ity atra ye nirdiṣṭāḥ, te iha parigṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:53745: caśabde tāvat - devadattaḥ pacati ca khādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:53746: vā - devadattaḥ pacati vā khādati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:53747: ha - devadattaḥ pacati ha khādati ha /
GS24jvkasipu:53750: agater ity eva, devadattaḥ prapacati ca prakhādati ca prakhādati ca /
GS24jvkasipu:53751: prathamasyātra tiṅantasya cavāyoge prathamā iti nighātaḥ pratiṣidyate eva, paraṃ tu nihanyate //
GS24jvkasipu:53756: agateḥ iti pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣṭam ity atra nānuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:53757: ca, vā ity etābhyāṃ yoge prathamā tiṅavibhaktir nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53758: gardarbhāś ca kālayati, vīṇāṃ ca vādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53759: gardabhān vā kālayati, vīṇāṃ vā vādayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53760: yogagrahaṇaṃ pūrvābhyām api yoge nighātapratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53761: prathamāgrahaṇam dvitīyādeḥ tiṅantasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53762: cavāyogo hi dvisamuccaye vikalpe ca sati bhavati, sa ca anekasya dharma iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53766: ha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati kṣiyāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:53768: svayaṃ ha rathena yāti 3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53769: svayaṃ ha odanaṃ bhuṅkte 3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53771: kṣiyāśīḥpraiṣeṣu tiṅākāṅkṣam (*8,2.104) iti ca pluto bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:53775: aha ity anena yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhktir nānudāttā bhavati viniyoge gamyamāne,
GS24jvkasipu:53780: kṣiyāyām - svayamaha rathena yāti 3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53781: svayamaha odanaṃ bhuṅkte 3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:53786: calope ahalope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53787: eva iti etac ced avadhāraṇārthaṃ prayujyate, kva ca asya lopaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:53788: yatra gamyate cārthaḥ, na ca prayujyate, tatra lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53792: calope - devadatta eva grāmaṃ gacchatu, sa devadatta evāraṇyaṃ gacchatu /
GS24jvkasipu:53793: grāmaṃ cāraṇyaṃ ca gacchatu ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53794: ahalope - devadatta eva grāmaṃ gacchatu, yajñadatta evāraṇyam gacchatu /
GS24jvkasipu:53795: grāmaṃ kevalam, araṇyaṃ devalam ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53796: avadhāraṇam iti kim ? devadattaḥ kveva bhokṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53798: na kva cid bhokṣyate ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53803: cādayaḥ, na ca-vā-ha-aha-evayukte (*8,1.24) iti sūtranirdiṣṭā gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:53804: teṣāṃ lope prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ nānudāttā bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:53806: calope - śuklā vrīhayo bhavanti, bhavanti, avetā gā ājyāya duhanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53807: bhavanti ity etad vikalpena na nihanyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53813: vai vāva ity etābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53816: vāva - athaṃ vāva hasta āsīt, netara āsīt //
GS24jvkasipu:53820: eka anya ity etābhyāṃ samarthābhyāṃ yuktā prathamā tiṅvibhaktiḥ vibhāṣā nānudāttā bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:53826: eka iti saṅkhyāpadam etat, anyārthe na vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:53827: ekaśabdasya vyavasthārthaṃ ca samarthagrahaṇam, vyabhicāritvāt tasya //
GS24jvkasipu:53834: yatra pade yacchabdo vartate tatsarvaṃ yadvṛttam /
GS24jvkasipu:53836: ḍataraḍatamau ca pratyayau ity etan na aśrīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:53837: tasmād yad vṛttād uttaraṃ tiṅantaṃ nānudāttam bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:53851: pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ uttarapadaṃ pūjitam anudāttaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53871: dāruṇam adhyāpakaḥ ity evam ādiṣu na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53872: malopaś ca ity anena apy ayam eva viṣaya ākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:53873: yatra vibhakter abhāvāt makāro na śrūyate tatra audāttatvam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53876: pūjanāt ity eva pūjitaparigrahe siddhe pūjitagrahaṇam anantarapūjitapratipattyarthaṃ /
GS24jvkasipu:53877: etad eva jñāpakam iha prakaraṇe pañcamīnirdeśe 'pi nānantaryamāśrīyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53878: tathā ca yadvṛttān nityam (*8,1.66) ity atra udāhṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:53879: anudāttam iti vartamāne punar anudāttagrahaṇam pratiṣedhanivṛttyartham //
GS24jvkasipu:53883: sagatir agatir api pūjanebhyaḥ kāṣṭhādibhyaḥ paraṃ pūjitaṃ tiṅantam anudāttam bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53888: tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighātasya, nipātair yadyadihanta iti pratiṣedhe prāpte punar vidhānam /
GS24jvkasipu:53891: iha na bhavati, yat kāṣṭhaṃ śuklīkaroti /
GS24jvkasipu:53898: kutsane ca subante gotrādivarjite parataḥ sagatir api tiṅ agatir api anudātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53909: kartuḥ kutsane mā bhūt, pacati pūtir devadattaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53914: vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham anudāttam bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:53917: supi kutsane kriyāyā malopa iṣṭo 'tiṅi iti coktārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:53918: pūtiś ca cānubandho vibhāṣitaṃ ca api bahvartham //
GS24jvkasipu:53927: gatau iti kim ? ā mandrairindra haribhiryāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53928: yāhi ity etat prati kriyāyogādāṅityeṣa gatiḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:53929: tasya gatau ity etasmin na sati gatiḥ ity anāśritaparanimittakam anudāttatvaṃ syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:53939: tatrānudātto bhavati iti dhātau eva udāttavati syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:53940: pratyaye na syāt yat prakaroti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53941: yatkriyāprayuktāḥ prādayas teṣām taṃ prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ iti tiṅante dhātum eva prati gatisañjñā /
GS24jvkasipu:53942: āmante tarhi na prāpnoti, prapacatitarām, prapacatitamām iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:53944: teṣām avyayapūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve satyakriyamāṇe 'pi tiṅgrahaṇe paramanudāttavad bhavati iti gatinighāto naiva sidhyati /
GS24jvkasipu:53946: evam api satiśiṣṭatvādāma eva svare sati gateḥ anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158)
GS24jvkasipu:53948: yeṣāṃ gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanam prāk subutpatteḥ ity anena vacanena kṛdantena+eva prāk subutpatteḥ samāso bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:53951: teṣām evaṃvidhe viṣayesamāsena na+eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:53952: pṛthak svarapravṛttau satyāmanena nighātena prayojanam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:53959: āmantritaṃ pūrvam avidyamānavad bhavati, tasmin sati yatkāryaṃ tana bhavati, asati yat tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53962: devadatta, yajñadatta ity atra āmantritasya padāt parasya iti nighāto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53964: devadatta pacasi ity atra tiṅṅantiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighāto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53965: devadatta tava grāmaḥ svam, devadatta mama grāmaḥ svam ity evam ādisu yuṣmadasmadādeśā na bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:53968: yāvad devadatta pacasi ity atra api pūjāyāṃ nānantaram ity eva pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53969: jātvapūrvam (*8,1.47) tiy etat, devadatta jātu pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53971: iti, āho devadatta pacasi, utāho devadatta pacasi ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53972: āma ekāntaramāmantritamanantike (*8,1.55) iti, ām bho pacasi devadatta ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53974: pūrvam iti kim ? devadatta ity etasya āmantritādyudāttatve kartavye na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53975: pūrvatvam ca parāpekṣam bhavati iti parasya+eva kārye svanimitte 'nyanimitte vā tadavidyamānavad bhavati, na tu svakārye /
GS24jvkasipu:53976: devadatta pacasi ity atra api hi āmantritādyudāttatvaṃ bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:53977: iha imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati iti gaṅgeśabdaḥ pūrvamānantritam,
GS24jvkasipu:53978: tataḥ parasya yamuneśabdasya anudāttatve kartavye svayam avidyamānavattvān nimittaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53983: avidyamānavattvasya pratiṣedhaḥ āmantritānte samānādhikarane parataḥ pūrvam āmantritāntaṃ sāmānyavacanam na avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:53989: samānādhikarane iti kim ? devadatta paṇḍita yajñadatta /
GS24jvkasipu:53990: atra yajñadattaviśeṣanam paṇḍitaśabdaḥ, na pūrveṇa samānādhikaranaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:53991: sāmānyavacanam iti kim ? paryāyeṣu mā bhūt, adhnye, devi, sarasvati, īḍe, kāvye, vihavye /
GS24jvkasipu:53993: evaṃ hi uktam, etā te aghnye nāmāni iti //
GS24jvkasipu:53998: viśeṣavacane samānādhikarane āmantritānte parataḥ pūrvam āmantritaṃ bahuvacanāntaṃ vibhāṣitam avidyamānavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54001: sāmānyavacanādhikāradeva viśeṣavacane iti siddhe viśeṣavacanagrahaṇaṃ vispaṣṭārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:54004: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54011: pūrvatra asiddham ity adhikāro 'yam ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54012: yad ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ pūrvatra asiddham ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54013: tatra yeyaṃ sapādasaptādhyāyī anukrāntā, etasyām ayaṃ pādono 'dhyāyo 'siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54014: ita uttaraṃ ca uttara uttaro yogaḥ pūrvatra pūrvatra asiddho bhavati asiddhavad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54016: tad etad asiddhatvavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhārtham, utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54017: asmā uddhara, dvā atra, dvā ānaya, asā ādityaḥ ity atra vyalopasya śasiddhatvāt, ād guṇaḥ (*6,1.87)
GS24jvkasipu:54020: amuṣmai, amuṣmāt, amuṣmin iti utvasya asiddhatvāt smāyādayo bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54024: ity asya asiddhatvād udīcāmātaḥ sthāne yakapūrvāyāḥ (*7,3.46)
GS24jvkasipu:54026: śuṣkajaṅghā iti na kopadhāyāḥ (*6,3.37) iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54028: kṣāmo vā asya asti iti kṣāmī,
GS24jvkasipu:54029: kṣāmiḥ kṣāmī vā yasya asti iti kṣāmimān /
GS24jvkasipu:54030: kṣāyo maḥ ity asya asiddhatvān mādupadhāyāś ca iti vatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54031: aujaḍhat iti vaherniṣṭhāyāmūḍhaḥ, tamākhyat iti ṇic, tadantāl luṅ, caṅi (*6,1.11)
GS24jvkasipu:54032: iti dvirvacane kartavye ḍhatvadhatvaṣṭutvaḍhalopānām asiddhatvāṇ ṇau ca yaḥ ṭilopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54033: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt tha ity etad dvirucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54034: anaglope iti pratiṣedhāt sanvadittvaṃ na asti, tena aujaḍhat iti bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54035: aujiḍhat ity etat tu ktinnantasya uḍhiśabdasya bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54036: guḍaliṇmān iti guḍaliho 'sya santi iti matup, tatra ḍhatvajaśtvayor asiddhatvāt jhayaḥ (*8,2.10)
GS24jvkasipu:54039: ye 'tra ṣaṣthīnirdeśāḥ, saptamīnirdeśāḥ, pañcamīnirdeśāś ca, teṣāṃ ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā (*1,1.49)
GS24jvkasipu:54042: tasmād ity uttarasya iti ca kartavye na asiddhatva bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54043: kāryakālaṃ hi sañjñāparibhāṣam iti pūrvatvamāsāṃ paribhāṣāṇāṃ na asti iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54044: vipratiṣedhe param ity eṣā ca paribhāṣā yena pūrveṇa lakṣaṇena saha spardhate,
GS24jvkasipu:54045: paraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tatprati tasya asiddhatvān na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:54046: tathā ca visphoryam, agoryam iti guṇaḥ pareṇa hali ca (*8,2.77) iti dīrghatvena na bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54047: apavādasya tu parasya api utsarge kartavye vacanaprāmaṇyād asiddhatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54048: tena dogdhā, dogdhum ity atra ghatvasya asiddhatvād ho ḍhaḥ (*8,2.31) iti na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54052: nalopaḥ pūrvatra asiddho bhavati subvidhau, svaravidhau, sajñāvidhau, tugvidhau ca kṛti /
GS24jvkasipu:54053: vidhiśabdo 'yaṃ pratyekam abhisambadhyamānaḥ svarasañjñātukāṃ vidheyatvāt taiḥ karmaṣaṣṭhīyuktaiḥ bhāvasādhano 'bhisambadhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54059: takṣabhiḥ ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt ato bhisa ais (*7,
GS24jvkasipu:54061: rājabhyām, takṣabhyām, rājasu, takṣasu iti supi ca (*7,3.102)
GS24jvkasipu:54064: svaravidhau - rājavatī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt anto 'vatyāḥ (*6,1.220) iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54065: pañcārmam, daśārmam, ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvāt arme cāvarṇaṃ dvyac tryac (*6,2.90)
GS24jvkasipu:54067: pañcadaṇḍī ity atra nalopasya asiddhatvād igante dvigau iti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaro na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54068: sañjñāvidhau - pañca brāhmaṇyaḥ, daśa brāhmaṇyaḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ (*1,1.24)
GS24jvkasipu:54069: iti ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati, tataś ca na ṣaṭsvasrādibhyaḥ (*4,1.10)
GS24jvkasipu:54071: tad etat prayojanaṃ kathaṃ bhavati ? yadi pratikāryaṃ sañjñāpravṛttiḥ ity etad darśanam /
GS24jvkasipu:54073: tayā strīpratyayapratiṣedho na kriyate iti sā punaḥ pravartayitavyā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54074: tugvidhau - vṛtrahabhyām, vṛtrahabhiḥ iti nalopasya asiddhatvāt hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk (*6,1.71)
GS24jvkasipu:54076: atra kecit sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti tukaṃ prati nalopasya animittatvāt,
GS24jvkasipu:54079: tat tu kriyate paribhāṣadvayasya anityatvaṃ jñāpayitum /
GS24jvkasipu:54081: kṛti iti kim ? vṛtrahacchatram, vṛtrahacchāyā, che ca (*6,1.73) iti tug bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54082: atra siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, eteṣv eva nalopo asiddho bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:54083: tena rājīyati, rājāyate, rājāśvaḥ iti ītvam, dīrghatvam, ekadeśaś ca siddho bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54087: mubhāvo nābhāve kartavye na asiddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54090: mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt ghilakṣaṇo nābhāvo na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54091: kṛte tu nābhāve mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt, supi ca (*7,3.102)
GS24jvkasipu:54092: iti dīrghatvaṃ yat prāpnoti, tat sannipātalakṣaṇo vidhir animittaṃ tadvighātasya iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54094: atha vā ne parato yat prāpnoti tasmin kartavye mubhāvo na asiddhaḥ ity eṣa eva atra sūtrārthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54095: ne tu kartavye mubhāvasya yat siddhatvaṃ tadarthāt saṅgṛhītam /
GS24jvkasipu:54096: tena atra mubhāvasya siddhatvāt nābhāvaś ca bhavati, dīrghatvaṃ ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54109: katham idam udāharaṇam yadi udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:54110: ity udāttatve kṛte vibhakteḥ āṭaś ca (*6,1.90)
GS24jvkasipu:54112: atha tu kṛte ekādeśe udāttayaṇo halpūrvāt (*6,1.174)
GS24jvkasipu:54113: iti svaraḥ, tadā na+etad asya prayojanaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54116: ekādeśaḥ svaraḥ gāṅge 'nūpa iti gāṅgeśabde ekāraḥ ekādeśa udāttena+udāttaḥ (*8,2.5) iti udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54117: tasya siddhatvāt ya punaḥ eṅaḥ padāntādati (*6,1.109)
GS24jvkasipu:54119: iti, ata svarito vā 'nudātte padādau (*8,2.6) ity etad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54125: anuma iti pratiṣedho jñāpakaḥ, ekādeśasvaraḥ śatṛsvare siddhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54126: nahi sanuṃkaṃ śatrantaṃ śatrantaṃ kiñcid ekādeśasvaram antareṇa antodāttam asti /
GS24jvkasipu:54129: ekadeśasvarasya siddhatvāt tena anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) iti varjyamānatā bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54132: ekādeśasvarasya siddhatvāt kṛte tasmin tiṅṅatiṅaḥ (*8,1.27) iti nighāto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54133: antaraṅga iti vacanād bahiraṅgasya asiddhatvam eva, pacatīti, prapacatīti /
GS24jvkasipu:54137: harivaḥ iti matubantam etat, tatra chandasīraḥ (*8,2.15)
GS24jvkasipu:54138: iti vattve, saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte, matuvaso ru mambuddhau chandasi (*8,3.1)
GS24jvkasipu:54139: iti rutvam, tasya saṃyogāntasya lopasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca (*6,1.114)
GS24jvkasipu:54144: iṭa īṭi (*8,2.29) iti sijlopasya siddhatvāt savarṇadīrghatva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54148: niṣṭhādeśasya siddhatvāt jhali iti ṣatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54149: kutvaṃ tu prati asiddha eva iti tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54152: yadā kṣīber niṣṭhāyām iṭi kṛte itśabdalopo nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54153: tadā kṣībaḥ iti sañjñāyām itśabdalopasya asiddhatvāt niṣṭhā ca dvyajanāt (*6,1.205)
GS24jvkasipu:54154: ity eṣa svaro na prāpnoti, kṣībena tarati kṣībikaḥ iti dvyajalakṣaṇaṣṭhan na prapnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:54155: yadā tu takāralopo nipātyate, tadā tasya asiddhatvāt iḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:54159: plutavikārasya asiddhatvat che ca (*6,1.73) iti hrasvalakṣaṇo nityas tug na prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:54161: ścyutir kṣaraṇe ity ayaṃ dhātuḥ sakārādiḥ paṭhyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54163: raṭ ścyotati iti ḍaḥ si ḍhuṭ (*8,
GS24jvkasipu:54165: aṭati iti aḍ, raṭati iti raḍ, kvibanto 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:54171: madhuścyayateḥ punaḥ kvipi kṛte saṃyogāditvāt salopaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54176: śakārādau punar etasmin saṃyogāntalopena yakāracakārayoḥ luptayoḥ śakārasya ṣatve sati madhuḍ iti syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54181: chideḥ vicicchitsati, uccheḥ ucicchiṣati iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt che ca (*6,1.73)
GS24jvkasipu:54189: talṃ lṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasyāsiddhatvād yaraḥ iti dvirvacanaṃ na syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54201: latvādīnāṃ vikalpitānām asiddhatvāt kṛte dvirvacane satyupariṣṭad vikalpe siti garo galaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54202: galo garaḥ ity evaṃ rūpam api dviruktaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54203: tad etat sarvaṃ na mu ne iti yogavibhāgena sādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54204: na ity etāvadaniṣṭe viṣaye pūrvatra asiddhasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:54210: udāttayaṇaḥ svaritayaṇaś ca parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54215: tasmāt parasya anudāttasya svaritaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54218: sakṛllūḥ, khalapūḥ iti kṛtsvareṇa antodātau, tayoḥ roḥ supi (*8,3.16)
GS24jvkasipu:54223: tasmāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya āśāśabdākārasya anudāttasya svarito bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54224: nanu ca saptamyekavacanasya yadudāttayaṇaḥ iti svaritatvam,
GS24jvkasipu:54230: ity etasya api āśrayāt siddhatvaṃ prāpnoti, tataś ca dadhyaśā ity atra api svaritaḥ syāt ?
GS24jvkasipu:54231: tasmād ayam eva yaṇsvaro yaṇādeśe siddho vaktavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54232: kecit tu bruvate, udāttāt svaritayaṇo 'pi parasya anudāttasya svaritatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54233: tathā ca taittirīyake śākhāntare paṭhyate - yāste viśvāḥ samidhaḥ santyagne iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54234: agne ity ayam akāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54235: tathā brāhmaṇe 'pi dadhyāśayati ity ākāraḥ svaritaḥ paṭhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54237: tathā udāttāt svaritayaṇaḥ parasya anudāttasya anena svaritatvaṃ na bhavati iti sthitam /
GS24jvkasipu:54238: tathā ca bhāṣye svaritayaṇgrahaṇam idaṃ pratyākhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54239: sakṛllvyāśā ity evam ādau udāttayaṇaḥ ity eva svaritasya siddhatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54240: svaritayaṇvyavadhānam avyavadhānam eva, svarividhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54242: pūrvasmād api vidhau sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam asti,
GS24jvkasipu:54243: svaradīrghayalopeṣu ca lopājādeśasya sthānivadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54244: udāttasvaritayoḥ iti kim ? vaidī āśā vaidyāśā /
GS24jvkasipu:54253: udātena saha anudāttasya ya ekādeśaḥ sa udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54261: lasārvadhātukānudāttatve kṛte dvayor anudāttayoḥ ayam ekādeśaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54266: anudātte padādau udāttena saha ya ekādeśaḥ sa svarito vā bhavati udātto vā /
GS24jvkasipu:54272: tasya prāditvāt samāse sati avyayapūrvaprakṛtisvaratvena ādyudāttaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54273: śeṣam anudāttam iti ca anudātte padādau ekādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54274: vīkṣate, vasuko 'si ity atra api tiṅṅ atiṅaḥ (*8,1.28) iti nighāte kṛte 'nudātte padādāv ekādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54277: udātte hi vikalpite tasminnasatyāntaryata eva svarito bhaviṣyati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54285: prātipadikasya padasya yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54295: prātipadikagrahaṇam asamastam eva supāṃ suluk iti ṣaṣṭhyā lukā nirdiṣṭam /
GS24jvkasipu:54307: ahan iti ruvidhau yad upādīyate prathamaikavacanāntam akṛtanalopaṃ tad āvartyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54308: tatra ekayā āvṛttyā tad evaṃ rūpaṃ nalopābhāvārtham anvākhyāyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54313: ṅau parataḥ sambuddhau ca nakāralopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54319: etasmād eva nalopapratiṣedhavacanāt apratyayaḥ iti pratyayalakṣaṇena prātipadikasañjñā na pratiṣidhyate iti jñāpyate,
GS24jvkasipu:54321: tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ ity atra nalopaś ca bhavati, allopaś ca na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54324: he rājan vṛndāraka ity atra samudāyārthasambodhanam,
GS24jvkasipu:54325: na pūrvapadārthasambodhanaṃ pratīyate iti sambuddhyantaṃ pūrvapadaṃ na+eva samasyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54332: matoḥ iha kāryitvena upādānāt sāmarthyalabdhaṃ prātipadikaṃ tat māt iti makārāvarṇābhyāṃ viśiṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54333: makārāvarṇaviśiṣṭayā ca upadhayā ity ayam artho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54334: makārāntāt makāropadhāt avarṇāntād avarṇopadhāt ca uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54362: dhraji, dhvaji, sañji ity eteṣāṃ chandasīraḥ (*8,2.15) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54363: harit, kakut, garut ity eteṣāṃ jhayaḥ (*8,2.10) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54364: ikṣu, madhu, druma, maṇḍa, dhūma ity eteṣāṃ sañjñāyām (*8,2.11) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54367: yasya sati nimitte matupo vattvaṃ na dṛśyate sa yavādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ iha nṛmataḥ idaṃ nārmatam iti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt avarṇopadhasya matupo vattvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54371: jhayantād uttarasya matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54379: sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye matoḥ vaḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54388: āsandīvat aṣṭhīvat cakrīvat kakṣīvat carmaṇvatī ity etāni sañjñāyāṃ nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54399: āsandīvat ity eta prapañcārtham iha paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54406: cakrīvanti sado havirdhānāni bhavanti ity etat tu chāndasatvād anugantavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54414: tasya etan nipātanaṃ nakāralopābhāvārtham, ṇatvārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54416: carmaṇvatī iti carmaṇo nalopābhāvo ṇatvaṃ ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54423: udanvān iti udakaśabdasya matāvudanbhāvo nipātyate udadhāvarthe, sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54424: udanvān nāma ṛṣiḥ yasya audanvataḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54427: udadhāu iti kim ? udakavān ghaṭaḥ ity atra tu dadhātyartho na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54433: śobhano rājā yasminniti sa rājanvān deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54439: chandasi viṣaye ivarṇāntād rephāntāc ca+uttarasya matorvattvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54448: chandasi sarve vidhayo vikalpyante iti iha na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54460: anantād uttarasya matoḥ nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:54466: nuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt tasya ca vatvaṃ na bhavati, tataḥ parasya ca bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54470: nakārāntāt uttarasya ghasañjñākasya nuḍāgamo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:54478: rathaśabdād eva vā matvarthīyo 'yam īkāraḥ chandasīvanipau iti //
GS24jvkasipu:54484: tena yaḥ kevalo repho, yaś ca ṛkārasthaḥ, tayor dvayor api grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:54486: tato 'yaṃ kevalasya rephasya sthāne lakārādeśo vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54487: ṛkārasya apy ekadeśavikāradvāreṇa lṛkāraḥ, evaṃ ca luṭi ca klṛpaḥ (*1,3.93)
GS24jvkasipu:54495: kṛpā ity etat ṛpeḥ samprasāraṇam ca iti bhidādiṣu pāṭhād bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54496: tasya hi kṛtasamprasāraṇasya lākṣaṇikatvāt iha kṛpaḥ iti grahaṇaṃ na asti /
GS24jvkasipu:54498: uṇādayo bahulam (*3,3.1) iti vā kṛpereva latvābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54500: vālamūlalaghvasurālam aṅgulīnāṃ vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54507: kapilakādīnāṃ sañjñāchandasor vā ro lamāpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54515: kim idam ekatvasmaraṇamiti ? samānaviṣayatvam eva tayoḥ smaryate ity arthaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54519: ayatau parataḥ upasargasya yo rephaḥ tasya lakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54523: tasya sthānivadbhāvād ayateḥ upasargasya ca vibhāge sati,
GS24jvkasipu:54525: tadā yena na avyavadhānaṃ tena vyavahite 'pi vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti ekena varṇena vyavadhāne 'pi latvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54526: tathā ca palyayate ity atra api bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54527: upasargaviśeṣaṇe tu ayatigrahaṇe siddham eva+etat sarvam, prater api tu vyavahite 'pi prāpnoti /
