GS24jvkasipu:54528: tatra keṣāṃcid darśanaṃ bhavitavyam eva platyayate iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54529: prathamapakṣadarśanābhiniṣṭāstu pratyayate ity eva bhavati iti manyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54530: apare tu pratiśabdopasṛṣṭasya ayateḥ prayogam eva na+icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54531: nis dus ity etayos tu rutvasya asiddhatvāl latvena na+eva bhavitabyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54537: gṝ ity etasya dhātoḥ rephasya lakāra ādeśo bhavati yaṅi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54540: kecid graḥ iti girateḥ gṛṇāteś ca sāmānyena grahaṇam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54542: gṛṇāter hi yaṅeva na asti, anabhidhānād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54547: ajādau pratyaye parato gro rephasya vibhāṣā lakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54552: tena galaḥ iti prāṇyaṅge nityaṃ latvaṃ bhavati, garaḥ iti viṣe nityaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54555: nigālyate iti ṇilopasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci vibhāṣā iti latvavikalpaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54556: pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti etad api sāpavādam eva,
GS24jvkasipu:54558: antaraṅgatvād vā kṛte latvavikalpe ṇilopo bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:54559: girau, giraḥ ity atra dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam iti latvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54560: giratir vā latvavidhāv adhikṛtaḥ, gṛṇāter etad rūpam //
GS24jvkasipu:54564: pari ity etasya yo rephaḥ tasya ghaśabde aṅkaśabde ca parato vibhāṣā lakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54567: gha iti svarūpagrahaṇam atreṣyate, na taraptamapau iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54578: iha śreyān, bhūyān iti rutvam param api asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntasay lopaṃ na bādhate /
GS24jvkasipu:54579: jaśtve tu nāprāpte tadārabhyāte iti tasya bādhakaṃ bhavati, yaśaḥ, payaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54582: ity atra tu yaṇādeśasya bihiraṅgalakṣaṇasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogāntalopo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54586: saṃyogāntapadasya yo rephaḥ tasmād uttarasya antasya sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54589: kṣarateḥ tsarateś ca luṅi sicaḥ chāndasatvād īḍabhāvaḥ bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97) iti vacanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54591: mātuḥ, pituḥ iti ṛta ut (*6,1.111) iti uttve kṛte raparatve ca sati rāt sasya iti salopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54592: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, rāt sasya eva lopo bhavati, na anyasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54598: dhakārādau pratyaye parataḥ sakārasya lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54601: yadyatra sakāralopo na syāt, sicaḥ ṣatve jaśtve ca vibhāṣeṭaḥ (*8,3.79)
GS24jvkasipu:54603: itaḥ prabhṛti sicaḥ sakārasya lopa iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54604: iha na bhavati, cakāddhi palitaṃ śiraḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54605: tathā payo dhāvati ity evam ādāv api na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54606: sagdhiḥ, babdhām iti chāndaso varṇa lopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54607: bhāṣyakārastvāha, cakādhi ity eva bhavitavyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54608: tena payo dhāvati ity evam ādau yatnānataramāstheyam /
GS24jvkasipu:54611: āśādhvaṃ tu kathaṃ jaśtvaṃ sakārasya bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:54612: sarvam evaṃ prasiddhaṃ syāc chru tiścāpi na bhidyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54613: luṅaścāpi na murdhanye grahaṇaṃ seṭi duṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:54614: ghasibhasor na sidhyeta tasmāt sijgrahaṇaṃ na tat /
GS24jvkasipu:54620: jhalaḥ uttarasya sakārasya jhali parato lopo bhavati abhitta /
GS24jvkasipu:54624: avāttām, avātta ity atra vā sicaḥ sakāralopasya asiddhatvāt saḥ syārdhadhātuke (*7,4.49)
GS24jvkasipu:54630: ayam api sica eva lopaḥ, tena+iha na bhavati, somasut stotā, dṛṣtsthānam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:54634: hrasvāntād aṅgād uttarasya lopo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54645: ayam api sica eva lopaḥ, tena+iha na bhavati, dviṣṭarām, dviṣṭamām iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54646: sujantād dviśabdāt taraptamapau, adravyaprakarṣe ātiśayikaḥ ām pratyayaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:54650: iṭaḥ uttarasya sakārasya lopo bhavati īṭi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54664: padasya ante yaḥ saṃyogaḥ, jhali parato vā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ, tadādyoḥ sakārakakārayor lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54674: kim idaṃ siṅi iti ? sanaḥ saprabhṛti mahiṅo ṅakāreṇa pratyāhāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54676: thakāre jhali kakārasya saṃyogāder lopaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:54677: tad atra śakeḥ kvibantasya prayoga eva na asti ity āha kāṣṭhaśageva na asti,
GS24jvkasipu:54680: kākvartham ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya asiddhatvāt saṃyogādilopo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54689: cavargasya kavargādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ, padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54698: kruñcā ity atra siṅi iti vacanād ñakārasya cakāre jhali kutvaṃ na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:54700: nakāropadho vā dhāturayaṃ repharahitaśca kruñca kauṭilyālpībhāvayoḥ iti paṭhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54702: yujikruñcāṃ ca iti tasyaiva repho 'dhiko nakārasya lopābhāvaś ca iti nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54703: tatra anusvārasya parasavarṇasya ca asiddhatvāt ñakāra eva na asti iti kutvaṃ na bhaviṣyati //
GS24jvkasipu:54707: hakārasya ḍhakāradeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54720: dakārādeḥ dhātoḥ hakārasya ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54736: dhātor avayavo yo dādiḥ śabdas tad avayavasya hakārasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:54738: kiṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati ? adhok ity atra api ghakāraḥ siddho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54740: atha vā dhātūpadeśe yo dādiḥ ity evaṃ vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54742: dāmalihyateḥ kvip pratyayaḥ dāmaliṭ ity atra api na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:54746: druha muha ṣṇuha ṣṇiha ity eteṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ hakārasya vā ghakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54755: druheḥ dāditvād ghatvaṃnityaṃ prāptam, itareṣām aprāptam eva ghatvaṃ vikalpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:54759: naho hakārasya dhakārādeśo bhavati jhali pare padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54768: āho hakārasya thakārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54772: jhali ity eva, āha, āhatuḥ, āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:54777: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan //
GS24jvkasipu:54781: vraśca bhrasja sṛja mṛja yaja rāja bhrāja ity eteṣām,
GS24jvkasipu:54783: śakārāntānāṃ ca ṣakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54809: kecit tu rāṣṭiḥ, bhrāṣṭiḥ iti kvinnantam icchanti /
GS24jvkasipu:54814: cchvoḥ śūḍanunāsike ca (*6,4.19) ity atra kṅiti ity anuvartate iti chagrahaṇam iha kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:54825: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ || PS_8,2.37 ||
GS24jvkasipu:54827: dhātor avayavo ya ekāc jhaṣantaḥ tadavayavasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati jhali sakāre dhvaśabde ca parataḥ padānte ca /
GS24jvkasipu:54828: atra catvaro baśaḥ sthānino bhaṣādeśāścatvāra eva,
GS24jvkasipu:54829: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśe prāpte ḍakārasya sthānino 'bhāvāt ḍhakārādeśo na bhavati ?
GS24jvkasipu:54840: ajarghāḥ - gudheḥ yaṅlugantasya laṅi sipi labhūpadhaguṇe kṛte sipo halṅyādilope ca dhātoḥ avayavasya ekāco baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣbhāvaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54843: iti pūrvarephasya lopaḥ, ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrgho 'ṇaḥ (*6,3.111) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:54845: ekācaḥ iti kim ? dāmaliham icchati dāmalihyati, dāmalihyater apratyayaḥ, dāmaliṭ /
GS24jvkasipu:54846: asati hy ekājgrahaṇe dhātoḥ ity etad baśo viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:54853: dadha dhāraṇe ity etasya yaṅluki loṭi hujhalbhyo herdhiḥ (*6,4.101)
GS24jvkasipu:54859: tasya jhalantasya baśaḥ sthāne bhaṣ ādeśo bhavati takārathakārayoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:54867: tathoḥ iti kim ? ānantaryāt sdhvor eva vijñāyeta /
GS24jvkasipu:54873: jhalāṃ jaśaḥ ādeśā bhavanti padasyānte vartamānānām /
GS24jvkasipu:54884: jhaṣa uttarayoḥ takārathakārayoḥ sthāne dhakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati, dadhātiṃ varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:54920: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ || PS_8,2.42 ||
GS24jvkasipu:54922: rephadakārābhyām uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati pūrvasya ca dakārasya /
GS24jvkasipu:54934: raḥ ity atra raśrutisām anyaṃ na+upādīyate, kiṃ tarhi, vyañjanamātram /
GS24jvkasipu:54935: rephasāmānyanirdeśe 'pi sati rephāt parā yā 'jbhaktis tadvyavadhānānnatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54940: pūrvasya iti kim ? parasya mā bhūt, bhinnavadbhyām /
GS24jvkasipu:54942: iha kṛtasya apatyaṃ kārtiḥ iti vṛddheḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇāyā asiddhatvānnatve kartavye rephasya asiddhatvam //
GS24jvkasipu:54946: saṃyogādiḥ yo dhātur ākārānto yaṇvān, tasmād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakāradeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:54964: lūñ chedane ity etat prabhṛti vṝñ varaṇe iti yāvat vṛtkaraṇena samāpitā lvādayo gṛhyante /
GS24jvkasipu:54988: grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti kim ? sitā pāśena sūkarī /
GS24jvkasipu:54989: grāso 'pi yadā karmaiva bhavati na karmakartā, tadā na bhavati, sito grāso devadattena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:54993: okāreto dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55022: kṣiyo dhātoḥ dīrghād uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55026: kṣiyaḥ niṣṭhāyām aṇyadarthe (*6,4.60), vā+ākrośādainyayoḥ (*6,4.61) iti dīrghatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55028: akṣitam iti ktapratyayo bhāve, bhāvaś ca ṇyadarthaḥ iti dīrghābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55029: hrasvasya api hi dhātvanukaraṇasya iha iyaṅā nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55030: kṣiyaḥ niṣthāyām aṇyadarthe (*6,4.60) ity atra dīrghagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55032: ity evam ādau tu dhātutvam anukāryagataṃ sadapyavivakṣitatvād jirupasāmānyānukaraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:55036: śyāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya asparśe nakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55042: śītam udakam ity atra guṇabhūto 'pi sparśaḥ natvapratiṣedhasya samprasāraṇasya ca nimittaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55043: guṇe ca sparśe pratiṣedho 'yam, na roge, tena pratiṣīnaḥ ity atra natvaṃ bhavty eva //
GS24jvkasipu:55048: añcateḥ uttarapadasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati na ced apādānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55051: anapādāne iti kim ? udaktam udakaṃ kūpāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55056: divaḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya nakārādeśo bhavati avijigīṣāyam arthe /
GS24jvkasipu:55064: nirvāṇaḥ iti nispūrvād vāter uttarasya niṣthatakārasya nakāro nipātyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55071: nirvāṇaḥ pradīpo vātena ity atra tu pradīpādhikaraṇo vātyarthaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55072: vātastu tasya karaṇam iti bhavaty eva natvam //
GS24jvkasipu:55076: śuṣeḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya kakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55082: paceḥ dhātor uttarasya niṣthātakārasya vakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55095: prapūrvāt styāyateḥ uttarasya niṣthātakārasya anyatarasyāṃ makārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55100: yadā matvaṃ na asti, tadā saṃyogāder āto dhātor yaṇvataḥ (*8,2.43)
GS24jvkasipu:55101: ity asya pūrvatra asiddhatvāt saṃprasāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55102: tatra kṛte nimittavyāghātān natvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55106: phulla kṣība kṛśa ullāgha ity ete nipātyante, na ced upasargād uttarā bhavanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55107: phullaḥ iti ñiphalā viśaraṇe ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya lakāro nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55109: ktavatvantasya apy etal latvam iṣyate, phullaḥ, phullavān iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55110: kṣībakṛśollādhāḥ iti kṣībikṛśibhyām utpūrvāc ca lāgheḥ kta pratyayasya talopaḥ iḍabhāvaś ca nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55123: parikṛśaḥ ity atra yaḥ pariśabdaḥ sa kriyāntarayogāt kṛśiṃ pratyanupasarga eva,
GS24jvkasipu:55128: nuda vida unda trā ghrā hrī ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:55135: hrī ity etasmād aprāptaṃ natvam, itareṣāṃ nityaṃ prāptaṃ vikalpyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55136: vida vicāraṇe ity asya vider iha grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55137: evaṃ hy uktam - vettestu vidito niṣṭhā vidyater vinna iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55138: vinater vinnaś ca vittaśca bhogavittaś ca vindateḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55143: dhyā khyā pṝ mūrcchi mada ity eteṣāṃ niṣṭhātakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55154: radābhyām, saṃyogādeḥ iti ca prāptaḥ pratiṣidhyate //
GS24jvkasipu:55159: vittaḥ iti vider lābhārthāt uttarasya ktasya natvābhāvo nipātyate bhoge pratyaye ca abhidheye /
GS24jvkasipu:55170: bhittam iti nipātyate śakalaṃ cet tad bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55175: bhidikriyāvivakṣāyāṃ hi śakalaviṣaye bhinnam bhittam ity eva bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55179: ṛṇam iti ṛ ity etasmād dhātor uttarasya niṣṭhātakārasya nakāro nipātyate ādhamarṇyaviṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55181: etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyantena uttarapadena samāsaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55183: yady evam, uttamarṇaḥ iti na sidhyati ? na+eṣa doṣaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55185: tena uttamarṇaḥ ity api hi bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55188: ādhamarṇye iti kim ? ṛtaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam //
GS24jvkasipu:55192: nasatta niṣatta anutta pratūrta sūrta gūrta ity etāni chandasi viṣaye nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:55193: nasatta, niṣatta iti sadeḥ naṇpūrvāt nipūrvāc ca natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55201: praturtam iti tvarateḥ turvī ity etasya vā nipātanam /
GS24jvkasipu:55204: sūrtam iti sṛ ity etasya utvaṃ nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55207: gūrtam iti gūrī ity etasya natvābhāvo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55216: kvin pratyayo yasmād dhātoḥ sa kvinpratyayaḥ, tasya padasyālo 'ntyasya kavargādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55221: kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bahuvrīhivijñānārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:55222: kvin pratyayo yasmād vihitas tasmād anyasminn api pratyaye kutvaṃ yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55225: sṛjidṛśibhyāṃ hi kvin vihitaḥ, tayor luṅi kutvam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:55227: īṭ ca na bhavati, bahulaṃ chandasi (*7.3.97) iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55228: tathā dṛgbhyām, dṛgbhiḥ iti kvibantasya api dṛśeḥ kutvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55229: evaṃ ca sati rajjusṛḍbhyām ity atra api kutvaṃ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:55230: atha tu na+iṣyate, pratividhānaṃ kartavyam iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55247: śamitamidamādīnāṃ kvip, anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti (*6,4.15) iti dīrghatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:55258: makāravakārayoś ca parataḥ makārāntasya dhātoḥ nakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55261: gamerlaṅi bahulaṃ chandasi iti śapo luk /
GS24jvkasipu:55263: vibhāṣā gamahanajanavidaviśām (*7,2.68) iti kvasau iḍāgamasya abhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55269: sakārāntasya padasya sajuṣ ity etasya ca ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55278: avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ ity ete nipātyante /
GS24jvkasipu:55280: puras pūrvasya dāśateḥ mantre śvetavahokthaśaspuroḍāśo ṇvin (*3,2.71)
GS24jvkasipu:55282: iti ṇvini kṛte, śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍaspadasya iti ḍaspratyaye nipātanāni etāni /
GS24jvkasipu:55283: kimarthaṃ tarhi nipātanaṃ yāvatā pūrveṇa+eva ruḥ siddhaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55286: atvasantasya cādhātoḥ (*6,4.14) ity atra hi asambuddhau iti vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:55295: ahan ity etasya padasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55298: nalopam akṛtvā nirdeśo jñāpakaḥ nalopābhāvo yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55300: ahan ity atra tu lākṣaṇikatvād ahanśabdasya ruḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55305: ro 'supi (*8,2.69) ity asya apavādo rutvam upasaṅkhyāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55306: apara āha - sāmānyena rephādau rutvaṃ bhavati, ahoramyam, ahoratnāni iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55310: ahan ity etasya rephādaśo bhavati asupi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55315: nanu catra api pratyayalakṣaṇena subasti, ahardadāti, aharbhuṅkte iti ? na+etad asti /
GS24jvkasipu:55316: uktam etat - ahnor avidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55318: yatra tu lopaśabdena lupyate tatra pratyayalakṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eva,
GS24jvkasipu:55321: atra hi halṅyābbhyaḥ iti lopena pratyayasya nivṛttiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55326: amnas ūdhas avas ity eteṣāṃ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, rurvā repho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55330: yadā rutvaṃ tadā bhobhago 'gho 'pūrvasya yo 'śi (*8,3.17) iti yakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55331: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca vibhāṣā pracetaso rājany upasaṅkhyānaṃ kartavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55337: visarjanīyabādhanārtham atra pakṣe rephasya+eva repho vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:55341: bhuvas ity etasya mahāvyāhṛteḥ chandasi viṣaye ubhayathā bhavati, rurvā repho vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55343: mahāvyāhṛteḥ iti kim ? bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55344: bhuvaḥ ity etad avyavyam antarikṣavāci mahāvyāhṛtiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55350: tena sambhavāt vyabhicārāc ca vasur eva viśeṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55354: vasvantasya padasya sakārāntasya sraṃsu, dhvaṃsu, anaḍuḥ ity eteṣāṃ ca dakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55368: rutve nāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti tad bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55369: saṃyogāntalopas tu na+evam iti tena etad eva datvaṃ bādhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55371: numastu vidhānasāmarthyānna bhavati, anaḍvān, he anaḍvan iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55377: tipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya anasteḥ dakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55380: tipi iti kim ? cakāsteḥ kvip, cakāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55381: anasteḥ iti kim ? āpa eva+idaṃ salilaṃ sarvamāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55382: āḥ ity asteḥ laṅi tipi bahulaṃ chandasi (*7,3.97) iti īḍ na kṛtaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55387: sipi parataḥ sakārāntasya padasya dhātoḥ ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55394: dakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya sipi parato ruḥ bhavati, dakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55400: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ padasya upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrgho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55407: ikaḥ iti kim ? atra+eva pratyudāharaṇe bhaśabdākārasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:55415: hali ca parato rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ upadhāyāḥ ikaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55422: dhātoḥ ity eva, divam icchati divyati /
GS24jvkasipu:55431: dhātoḥ upadhābhūtau yau rephavakārau halparau tayoḥ upadhāyāḥ iko dīrgho bhavati hurcchā - hūrcchitā /
GS24jvkasipu:55435: hali ity eva, ciri, jiri - ciriṇoti /
GS24jvkasipu:55437: iha kasmān na bhavati, rī gatau riryatuḥ, riryuḥ, vī gatyādiṣu vivyatuḥ vivyuḥ iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:55438: yaṇādeśasya sthānivattvāt asiddhatvāc ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvena halparau rephavakārau na bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55439: caturyitā ity atra api bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt ato lopasya dhātoḥ upadhābhūto repho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55440: pratidīvnā ity atra tu hali ca (*8,2.77)
GS24jvkasipu:55441: iti dīrghatvam, dīrghavidhau lopājādeśasya sthānivad bhāvapratiṣedhāt /
GS24jvkasipu:55442: asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgamantaraṅge ity etat tu nāśrayitavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55443: uṇādayo 'vyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti jivriḥ, karyoḥ, giryoḥ ity evam ādiṣu dīrgho na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55448: rephavakārāntasya bhasya kur chur ity etayos ca dīrgho na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55457: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ || PS_8,2.80 ||
GS24jvkasipu:55459: adaso 'sakārāntasya varṇasya dāt parasya uvarṇādeśo bhavati, dakārasya ca makāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55462: bhāvyamānena apy ukāreṇa savarṇānāṃ grahaṇam iṣyate iti ekamātrikasya mātrikaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55464: aseḥ iti kim ? adaḥ icchati adasyati /
GS24jvkasipu:55466: okārarephayor api pratiṣedho yathā syāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55472: tena tyadādyatvavidhāne etad anyatra na bhavitavyam eva iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55473: adryādeśe katham ? adaso 'dreḥ pṛthaṅ mutvaṃ kecid icchanti latvavat /
GS24jvkasipu:55476: yaiḥ aseḥ iti sakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55477: anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya iti ca paribhāṣā na aśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55483: ye tu paribhāṣām āśrayanti teṣām antyasadeśasya eva bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:55486: yeṣaṃ tu tyadādyatvaviṣaya eva mutvena bhavitavyam iti darśanam teṣām atra na bhavitavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:55489: dāt iti kim ? alo 'ntyasya mā bhūt, amuyā /
GS24jvkasipu:55494: adaso dakārād uttarasya ekārasya īkārādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55502: bahuvacane ity arthanirdeśo 'yam, pāribhāṣikasya hi bahuvacanasya grahaṇe amī ity atra na syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:55512: yat iti ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udattaḥ ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55519: ṭigrahaṇaṃ vyañjanāntyasya api ṭeracaḥ pluto yathā syāt, agnici3t iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55522: tatra aśūdraviṣaye yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluta udātto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55524: aśūdre iti kim ? abhivādaye tuṣajako 'han, bho ayuṣmān edhi tuṣajaka /
GS24jvkasipu:55526: abhivādaye gārgyaham, bho āyuṣmatī bhava gārgi /
GS24jvkasipu:55527: asūyake 'pi kecit pratiṣedham icchanti, abhivādaye sthālyahaṃ bhoḥ, āyuṣmān edhi sthālin /
GS24jvkasipu:55528: yāvac ca tasya asūyakatvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad eva pratyabhivādavākyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55529: tasmiṃstvasūyakatvena nirjñāte pratyabhivādaḥ eva na asti, kutaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55530: tathā hy uktam - asūyakastvaṃ jālma, na tvaṃ pratyabhivādanam arhasi, bhidyasva vṛṣala sthālin iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55531: abhivādanavākye yat saṅkīrtitaṃ nāma gotraṃ vā,
GS24jvkasipu:55532: tad yatra pratyabhivādavākyānte prayujyate tatra plutiḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55533: iha na bhavati, devadatta kuśalyasi, devadatta āyuṣmān edhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55535: bho abhivādaye devadatto 'ham, āyuṣmānedhi devadatta bhoḥ3, āyuṣmanedhi devadatta bhoḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55536: rājanya - abhivādaye indravarmā ahaṃ bhoḥ, āyuṣmānedhi indravarma3n, āyuṣmānedhi indravarman /
GS24jvkasipu:55537: viś - abhivādaye indrapālito 'ham bhoḥ, āyusmānedhi indrapālita3, āyuṣmānedhi indrapālita //
GS24jvkasipu:55541: dūrād dhūte yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati, sa ca+udāttaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55546: tathāpi hūtāpekṣaṃ yat tadāśrīyate iti yatra prākṛtāt prayatnād yatnaviśeṣe āśrīyamāṇe śabdaḥ śrūyate tad dūram /
GS24jvkasipu:55548: tena yatra apy āhvānaṃ na asti tatra api plutir bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55551: asyāś ca pluter ekaśrutyā samāveśaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55552: dūrāt iti kim ? āgaccha bho māṇavaka devadatta /
GS24jvkasipu:55553: dūrādāhvāne vākyasyānte yatra sambodhanapadaṃ bhavati tatra ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate,
GS24jvkasipu:55560: haiheprayoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tatra haihayoḥ eva pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55565: punar haihayor grahaṇam antyayor api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:55567: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām || PS_8,2.86 ||
GS24jvkasipu:55570: ity evam ādinā yaḥ pluto vihitaḥ, tasya+eva ayaṃ sthāniviśeṣaḥ ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55572: apiśabdād antyasya api ṭeḥ ekaikasya sambodhane vartamānasya pluto bhavati prācām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:55575: guroḥ iti kim ? vakārāt parasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:55581: sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣā kartavyaḥ iti tadupapannaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55585: abhyādānaṃ prārambhaḥ, tatra yaḥ oṃśabdaḥ tasya pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55587: abhyādāne it kim ? om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta //
GS24jvkasipu:55591: ye ity etasya yajñakarmaṇi pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55593: yajñakarmaṇi iti kim ? ye yajāmaha iti pañcākṣaram iti svadhyāyakāle mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:55594: ye yajāmahe ity atra+eva ayaṃ plutaḥ iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55595: iha hi na bhavati, ye devāso divyekādaśa stha iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55602: pādasya vā ardharcasya vā antyam akṣaram upasaṃgṛhya tadādyakṣaraśeṣasya sthāne trimātramokāram oṅkāraṃ vā vidadhati taṃ praṇava ity ācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:55606: okāraḥ sarvādeśo yathā syāt, vyañjanānte antyasya mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55607: yajñakarmaṇi ity eva, āpaṃ retāṃsi jinvati //
GS24jvkasipu:55612: yājyā nāma ye yājyākāṇḍe paṭhyante mantrāḥ, teṣām antyo yaḥ ṭiḥ sa plavate yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:55617: tatra yāvanti vākyāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ṭeḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:55622: brūhi preṣya śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ āvaha ity eteṣām ādeḥ pluto bhavati yajñakarmaṇi /
GS24jvkasipu:55628: āvaha devān yajamānāya ity evam ādāvayaṃ pluto na bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55638: tena iha na bhavati, agnīdagnīn vi hara barhiḥ stṛṇāhi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55639: tadarthaṃ kecid vakṣyamāṇaṃ vibhāṣa ity abhisambadhnanti, sā ca vyavasthitavibhāṣā iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55640: apara āha - sarva eva plutaḥ sāhasamanicchatā vibhāṣa vijñeyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55641: iha tu, uddhara3 uddhara, abhihara3 abhihara iti chāndasaḥ plutavyatyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55647: akārṣīḥ kaṭaṃ devadatta ? akārṣaṃ hi3, akārṣaṃ hi /
GS24jvkasipu:55648: alāvīḥ kedāraṃ devadatta ? alāviṣaṃ hi3, alāviṣaṃ hi /
GS24jvkasipu:55649: pṛṣṭaprativacane iti kim ? kaṭaṃ kariṣyati hi /
GS24jvkasipu:55656: tatra nigṛhyānuyoge yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:55658: tam upālipsuḥ upapatibhir nigṛhya sabhyasūyam anuyuṅkte,
GS24jvkasipu:55662: adya śrāddham ity āttha3, adya śrāddham ity āttha /
GS24jvkasipu:55664: adya amāvāsyā ity evaṃ vādī yuktyā pracyāvya svamatād evam anuyujyate //
GS24jvkasipu:55668: vākyādeḥ āmantritasya iti bhartsane dvirvacanam uktam, tasya āmreḍitaṃ plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:55669: caura caura3, vṛṣala vṛṣala3, dasyo dasyo3, ghātayisyāmi tvā, bandhayisyāmi tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:55676: aṅga ity anena yuktaṃ tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṃ bhartsane plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:55677: aṅga kja3, aṅga vyāhara3, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:55678: tiṅ iti kim ? aṅga devadatta, mithyā vadasi /
GS24jvkasipu:55681: bhartsane ity eva, agādhīṣva, odanaṃ te dāsyami //
GS24jvkasipu:55685: pramāṇena vastuparīkṣaṇaṃ vicāraḥ, tasya viṣaye vicaryamāṇānāṃ vākyānāṃ ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55690: yūpe tiṣṭhet, yūpe anupraharet iti vicāryate //
GS24jvkasipu:55694: bhāṣāyāṃ viṣaye vicāryamāṇānāṃ pūrvam eva plavate /
GS24jvkasipu:55703: śravaṇābhimukhyaṃ ca tatra aviśeṣāt sarvasya grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:55704: pratiśravaṇe yad vākyaṃ vartate tasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55705: māṃ me dehi bhoḥ, ahaṃ te dadāmi3 /
GS24jvkasipu:55713: abhipūjite ca agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u ?
GS24jvkasipu:55714: agnibhūte, paṃṭo ity etayoḥ praśnānte vartamānayoṇ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55715: agamaḥ ity evam ādīnāṃ tu anantyasya api praśnākhyānayoḥ (*8,2.105) iti svaritaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55721: cit ity etasmin nipāte upamārthe prayujyamāne vākyasya ṭeḥ anudāttaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55722: pluto 'py atra vidhīyate, na guṇamātram agnicid bhāyā3t /
GS24jvkasipu:55724: agniriva bhāyāt, rājeva bhāyāt ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55731: uparisvidāsīt ity etasya ṭeḥ anudattaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55734: iti udāttaḥ plutaḥ, upari svidāsīt ity atra tu anena anudāttaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55738: svaritaḥ pluto bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ asūyāyām, sammatau, kope, kutsane ca gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:55740: iti dvirvacanam uktam, tatra ayaṃ plutavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55741: asūyāyāṃ tavat - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka, riktaṃ ta ābhirūpyatm /
GS24jvkasipu:55742: sammatau - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, abhirūpaka3 abhirūpaka, śobhanaḥ khalv asi /
GS24jvkasipu:55743: kope - māṇavaka3 māṇavaka, avinītaka3 avinītaka, idānīṃ jñāsyasi jālma /
GS24jvkasipu:55744: kutsane - śāktīka3 śāktīka, yāṣṭīka3 yāṣṭīka, riktā te śaktiḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55755: eteṣu gamyamāneṣu tiṅantam ākāṅkṣaṇaṃ yat tasya svaritaḥ pluto bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55756: ākāṅkṣati iti ākāṅkṣam, tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55757: kṣiyāyāṃ tāvat - svayaṃ rathena yāti3, upādhyāyaṃ padātiṃ gamayati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55758: svayam odanaṃ ha bhuṅkte3, upādhyāyaṃ saktūn pāyayati /
GS24jvkasipu:55759: pūrvam atra tiṅantam uttarapadam ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55760: āśiṣi - sutāṃś ca lapsīṣṭa3 dhanaṃ ca tāta /
GS24jvkasipu:55762: praiṣe - kaṭaṃ kuru3 grāmaṃ ca gaccha /
GS24jvkasipu:55764: ākāṅkṣam iti kim ? dīrghaṃ te āyurastu /
GS24jvkasipu:55769: padasya iti vartate, svaritam iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55770: anantyasya api antyasyāpi padasya ṭeḥ pluto bhavati praśne ākhyāne ca /
GS24jvkasipu:55772: sarveṣam eva padānām eṣa svaritaḥ plutaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55773: antyasya anudāttaṃ praśnāntābhipūjitayoḥ (*8,2.100) iti anudatto 'pi pakṣe bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55779: tatra aicaḥ plutaprasaṅge tadavayavabhūtau idutau plutau /
GS24jvkasipu:55782: atra yadevarṇovarṇayoḥ avarṇasya ca saṃvibhāgaḥ, tadā idutau dvimātrāvanena plutau kriyete /
GS24jvkasipu:55784: idutau plavete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ ity arthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55785: tāvatī ca sā plutir bhavati yayā tāvecau trimātrau sampadyete /
GS24jvkasipu:55786: yadā tu ardhamātrā avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ, tadā tau ardhatṛtīyamātrau kriyete iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55787: bhaṣye tu uktam, iṣyate eva caturmātraḥ plutaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55788: tat katham ? samapravibhāgapakṣe idutor anena trimātraḥ pluto vidhīyate //
GS24jvkasipu:55790: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau || PS_8,2.107 ||
GS24jvkasipu:55792: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrād dhūte plutaviṣayasya ardhasya akāraḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:55797: praśnānte - agama3ḥ pūrvā3n grāmā3n agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:55798: abhipūjite - bhadraṃ karoṣi māṇavaka3 agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:55799: vicāryamāṇe - hotavyaṃ dīkṣitasya gṛhā3i pratyabhivāde - āyuṣmān edhi agnibhūtā3i, paṭā3u /
GS24jvkasipu:55802: so 'yam ākaraḥ pluto yathāviṣayam udātto 'nudāttaḥ svarito veditavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55804: parigaṇanaṃ kim ? viṣṇubhūte viṣṇubhūte3 ghātayiṣyāmi tvā /
GS24jvkasipu:55806: parigaṇane ca sati adūrād dhūte iti na vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55808: iha mā bhūt, bhadraṃ karoṣi gauḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55809: apragṛhyasya iti kim ? śobhane khalu staḥ khaṭve3 /
GS24jvkasipu:55815: tayoḥ idutoḥ yakāravakārādeśau bhavato 'ci saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55817: ita utaram ādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ yad vakṣyāmaḥ saṃhitāyām ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:55826: idutor asiddhatvāt iko yaṇaci (*6,1.77) iti na prāpnoti ity ayam ārambhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55828: evam api svarṇadīrghatvanivṛttyarthaṃ śākalanivṛttyarthaṃ ca vaktvayam etat /
GS24jvkasipu:55829: athāpi tan nivṛttyarthaṃ yatnāntaram asti, tathāpi yaṇsvaranivṛttyartham idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55832: kiṃ nu yaṇā bhavati iha na siddhaṃ yvāvidutoryadayaṃ vidadhāti /
GS24jvkasipu:55833: tau ca mama svarasandhiṣu sidddhau śākaladīrghavidhī tu nivartyau //
GS24jvkasipu:55834: ik tu yadā bhavati plutapūrvas tasya yaṇaṃ vidadhātyapavādam /
GS24jvkasipu:55835: tena tayoś ca na śākaladīrghau yaṇsvarabadhanam eva tu hetuḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:55836: iti śrīvāmanaviracitāyāṃ kāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55844: matvantasya vasvantasya ca padasya ruḥ ity ayam ādeśo bhavati sambuddhau parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55845: matvantasya tāvat - indra marutva iha pāhi somam /
GS24jvkasipu:55847: maruto 'sya santi, harayo 'sya santi iti matup /
GS24jvkasipu:55848: suptakārayoḥ halṅyādilope saṃyogāntasya lope ca kṛte nakārasya ruḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55849: vasvantasya khalv api - mīḍhvastokāya tanayāya mṛla /
GS24jvkasipu:55853: sambuddhau iti kim ? ya evaṃ vidvān agnim upatiṣṭhate /
GS24jvkasipu:55860: chandasi bhāṣāyāṃ ca bhavat bhagavat aghavat ity eteṣāṃ vibhāṣa ruḥ vaktavyaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55867: atha vā bho ity evam ādayo nipātā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55871: tathā striyām api ca dṛśyante, bho brāhmaṇi ityādi /
GS24jvkasipu:55879: ita uttaraṃ yasya sthāne ruḥ vidhīyate tataḥ pūrvasya tu varṇasya vā anunāsiko bhavati ity etad adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:55886: adhikāraparimāṇāparigrahe hi sati ḍho ḍhe lopa (*8,3.13)
GS24jvkasipu:55887: ity atra api pūrvasya anunāsikaḥ āśaṅkyeta //
GS24jvkasipu:55891: aṭi parato roḥ pūrvasya ākārasya sthāne nityam anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55893: iti tvaṃ vakṣyati, tataḥ pūrvasya āto 'nunāsikavikalpe prāpte nityārthaṃ vacanam /
GS24jvkasipu:55897: kecid anusvāram adhīyate sa cchāndaso vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55898: ātaḥ iti kim ? ye vā vanaspatīṃranu /
GS24jvkasipu:55907: anunāsikādanyo yo varṇaḥ roḥ pūrvaḥ, yasya anunāsikaḥ na kṛtaḥ, tataḥ paro 'nusvāra āgamaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55922: kecit tu paraśabdam eva anyārthaṃ varṇayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:55923: anunāsikāt paraḥ anunāsikāt anyaḥ anusvāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55924: yasmin pakṣe 'nunāsiko na asti tatra anusvārāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55925: sa tu kasya āgamo bhavati ? roḥ pūrvasya+eva+iti vartate, vyākhyānād ādeśo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:55928: samaḥ ity etasya ruḥ bhavati suṭi parataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:55935: atra rorvisarjanīye kṛte vā śari (*8,3.66) iti pakṣe visarjanīya eva prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:55937: tena atra nityaṃ sakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:55938: asminneva sūtre sakārādeśo vā nirdiśyate, samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārako nirdeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55943: ruvidhau hy aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ, saṃsskartā, puṃsskāmā, kāṃsskān iti //
GS24jvkasipu:55945: pum ity etasya ruḥ bhavati ampare khayi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55950: puṃskāmā ity atra visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37) iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:55952: dvisakārakanirdeśapakṣe tu pūrvasmād eva sūtrāt saḥ ity anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:55953: rutvam tu anuvartamānam api nātrābhisambadhyate, sambandhānuvṛttistasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:55962: nakārāntasya padasya praśānvarjitasya ruḥ bhavati ampare chavi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:55975: nakārāntasya padasya chavi parataḥ ampare ubhayathā ṛkṣu bhavati, rurvā nakāro vā /
GS24jvkasipu:55977: ṛkṣu iti kim ? tāṃstvaṃ khāda sukhāditān //
GS24jvkasipu:55982: dīrghād uttarasya padāntasya nakārasya ruḥ bhavati aṭi parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:55984: ṛkṣu iti prakṛtatvād ṛkpādaḥ iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:55986: devāṃ acchā dīdyat mahāṃ indro ya ojasā /
GS24jvkasipu:55995: nṝn ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati paśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56000: ubhayathā ity api kecid anuvartayanti nṝn pāhi ity api yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:56004: svatavān ity etasya nakārasya rurbhavati pāyuśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56009: kān ity etasya nakārsya ruḥ bhavati āmreḍite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56013: tena kupvoḥ ḥkaḥpau ca (*8,3.37) iti na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56014: samaḥ suṭi (*8,3.5) ity ato vā sakāro 'nuvartate, sa eva atra vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56015: pūrveṣu yogeṣu sambandhāvṛttyā gatasya roḥ atra anabhisambandhaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56016: āmreḍite iti kim ? kān kān paśyati /
GS24jvkasipu:56022: saty api padādhikāre tasya asambhavād apadāntasya ḍhakārasya ayaṃ lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56026: śvaliḍ ḍhau kate ity atra tu jaśve kṛte kāryaṃ na asti iti lopābhāvaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56027: na ca ḍhalopo jaśtvāpavādo vijñātuṃ śakyate, tasya hi līḍhādiḥ viṣayaḥ sambhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56029: śāstrakṛtaṃ tu yadā nānantaryaṃ ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvena prāptam,
GS24jvkasipu:56031: śvaliḍ ḍhaukate ity atra tu na śrutikṛtamanantaryam, na śāstrakṛtam iti aviṣayo 'yaṃ ḍhalopasya //
GS24jvkasipu:56043: tena apadāntasya api rephasya lopo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56051: rephāntasya padasya khari parato 'vasāne ca visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56061: nṛpater apatyaṃ nārpatyaḥ iti vṛddher bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt tadāśrayasya rephasya asiddhaṃ bahiraṅgam iti asiddhatvād visarjanīyo na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56065: ru ity asya rephasya supi parato visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56070: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ror eva supi visarjanīyādeśaḥ, na anyasya /
GS24jvkasipu:56075: bhor bhagor aghor ity evaṃ pūrvasya avarṇapūrvasya ca roḥ rephasya yakārādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56092: ity ayaṃ lopaḥ aśi hali yathā syāt,
GS24jvkasipu:56097: atha tatra+eva aśgrahaṇaṃ kasmān na kṛtam ? uttarārtham, mo 'nusvāraḥ (*8,3.23)
GS24jvkasipu:56101: ity etac ca vṛkṣav karoti ity atra mā bhūt ity aśgrahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:56107: vakārayakārayoḥ bhobhagoaghoavarṇapūrvayoḥ padāntayo laghuprayatnatara ādeśo bhavati aśi parataḥ śākaṭāyanasya ācaryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:56124: vakārayakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ avarṇapūrvayoḥ lopo bhavati śākalyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56131: tena yadā 'pi laghuprayatnataro na bhavati ādeśaḥ, tadāpi vyoḥ pakṣe śravaṇaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56135: okārād uttarasya yakārasya lopo bhavati gārgyasya ācāryasya matena aśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56142: yo 'yamalaghuprayatnasya vikalpena lopaḥ kriyate so 'nena nivartyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56147: kecit tu sarvam eva yakāram atra na+icchanti //
GS24jvkasipu:56151: avarṇapūrvayoḥ vyoḥ padāntayor lopo bhavati uñi ca pade parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56154: pade iti kim ? tantra utam, tantrayutam /
GS24jvkasipu:56155: veñaḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte uñiti bhūtapūrveṇa ñakāreṇa śakyate pratipattum iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56156: atha uñ ity evaṃ rūpo nipātaḥ pratipadokto 'sti ?
GS24jvkasipu:56157: tadā lākṣaṇikatvād veñādeśasya grahaṇam iha na asti, uttarārthaṃ padagrahaṇaṃ kriyate //
GS24jvkasipu:56161: hali parataḥ bhobhagoaghoapūrvasya yakārasya padāntasya lopo bhavati sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:56169: sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ śākaṭāyanasya api lopo yathā syāt, laghuprayatnataro mā bhūt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56173: makārasya padāntasya anusvāraḥ ādeśo bhavati hali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56186: nakārāsya makārasya ca apadāntasya anusvārādeśo bhavati jhali parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56199: samo makārasya makāraḥ ādeśo bhavati rājatau kvippratyayānte parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56211: hakāre makārapare parato makārasya vā makāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56215: yavalapare hakāre makārasya yavalā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ vā bhavanti iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56222: nakārapare he parataḥ makārasya vā nakārādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56228: ṅakāraṇakārayoḥ padāntayoḥ kuk ṭuk ity etāv āgamau vā bhavataḥ śari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56233: pūrvantakaraṇaṃ prāṅk chete ity atra chantvartham /
GS24jvkasipu:56234: śaścho 'ṭi (*8,4.63) iti hi padantāj jhayaḥ iti tad vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56235: iha mā bhūt, purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśin /
GS24jvkasipu:56236: prāṅk sāyaḥ ity atra api sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111) iti ṣatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56237: vaṇṭ sāyaḥ ity atra ca na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42) ṣṭutvapratiṣedhārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:56242: ḍakārantāt padāt uttarasya sakārādeḥ padasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56245: parādikaraṇaṃ na padāntāṭ ṭoranām (*8,4.42) iti ṣṭutvapratiṣedhārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:56249: nakārāntāt padāt uttarasya sakārasya vā dhuḍāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56252: dhuṭaḥ cartvasya ca asiddhatvāt naśchavyapraśān (*8,3.7) iti rutvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56256: nakārasya padantasya śakāre parato vā tugāgamo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56259: yady evaṃ kurvajcchete ity atra nakārasya apadāntatvāt ṇatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:56262: ṇatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ stoḥ ścunā ṇakāro na bhavati iti, tataḥ ścuḥ iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56264: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam || PS_8,3.32 ||
GS24jvkasipu:56266: hrasvāt paraḥ yo ṅam tadantāt padāt uttarasya acaḥ ṅamuḍāgamo bhavati nityam /
GS24jvkasipu:56280: paramadaṇdinā iti uttarapadatve cāpadādividhau iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhād uttarapadasya padatvaṃ na asti iti ṅamuṭ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56281: atha vā, uñi ca pade (*8,3.21) ity ataḥ saptamyantaṃ pade ity anuvarvate /
GS24jvkasipu:56286: maya uttarasya uño vā vakārādeśo bhavati aci parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56290: pragṛhyatvāt uñaḥ prakṛtibhāve prāpte vakāro vidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:56291: tasya asiddhatvād hali iti mo 'nusvāraḥ (*8,3.23) na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56297: visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati khari parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56313: śarpare khari parato visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56320: na iti vaktavye visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśavidhānaṃ vikāranivṛttyartham,
GS24jvkasipu:56325: visarjanīyasya visarjanīyādeśo vā bhavati śari pare /
GS24jvkasipu:56335: kavargapavargayoḥ parato visarjanīyasya yathāsaṅkhyam ḥkaḥpa ity etāv ādeśau bhavataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56344: ity etasminnāprāpte idam ārabhyate iti etasya bādhakam, śarpare visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.35)
GS24jvkasipu:56345: ity etat tu na bādhyate, vāsaḥ kṣaumam, adbhiḥ psātam /
GS24jvkasipu:56346: pūrvatrāsiddhe nāsti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya iti śarpare visarjanīyaḥ (*8,3.35)
GS24jvkasipu:56348: kecit tu etad arthaṃ yogavibhāgaṃ kurvanti /
GS24jvkasipu:56349: kupvoḥ śarparayoḥ visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56357: sakāra ādeśaḥ bhavati visarjanīyasya kupvoḥ apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:56368: iha mā bhūt, prātaḥ kalpam, punaḥ kalpam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56370: ror eva kāmye na anyasya iti niyamārthaṃ vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56375: upadhmānīyasya kavarge parataḥ sakārādeśo bhavati iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56376: kiṃ prayojanam ? ubjirupadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate iti darśane abhyudgaḥ, samudagaḥ iti yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:56381: iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya ṣakārādeśo bhavati kupvor apadādyoḥ parataḥ pāśakalpakakāmyeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:56396: ita uttaraṃ saḥ iti, iṇaḥ saḥ iti ca vartate /
GS24jvkasipu:56397: tatra iṇaḥ paro yo visarjanīyaḥ tasya ṣakāro bhavati, anyasya sakāro bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56401: namas puras ity etayoḥ gatisañjñakayoḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56405: gatyoḥ iti kim ? pūḥ, purau, puraḥ karoti //
GS24jvkasipu:56410: ikāropadhasya ukāropadhasya ca apratyayasya visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56428: mātuḥ karoti, pituḥ karoti, atra rāt sasya (*8,2.24)
GS24jvkasipu:56429: iti sakāralope kṛte rephasya yo visarjanīyaḥ, tasya apratyayavisarjanīyatvāt ṣatvaṃ prāpnoti ?
GS24jvkasipu:56430: kaskādiṣu tu mrātuṣputragrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam ekādeśanimittatvāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya /
GS24jvkasipu:56444: tirasaḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56450: tiraḥ kartavyam gater ity eva, tiraḥ kṛtvā kāṇḍaṃ gataḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:56455: dvis tris catur ity eteṣāṃ kṛtvo 'rthe vartamanānāṃ visarjanīyasya ṣakāra ādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56465: idudupadhasya ity etasya anuvṛttau satyāṃ krtvo 'rthaviṣayeṇa ca padena visarjanīye viśeṣyamāṇe dvistriścatur iti śakyamakartum /
GS24jvkasipu:56467: ṣatvaṃ vibhāṣayā bhūnnanu siddhaṃ tatra pūrveṇa //
GS24jvkasipu:56468: siddhe hy ayaṃ vidhatte caturaḥ satvaṃ yadāpi kṛtvo 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:56471: evaṃ sati tvidānīṃ dvistriścatur ity anena kiṃ kāryam /
GS24jvkasipu:56473: anyo hi nedudupadhaḥ kṛtvo 'rthaḥ kaścid apy asti //
GS24jvkasipu:56475: caturo na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyo hi //
GS24jvkasipu:56476: tasmiṃs tu kriyamāṇe yuktaṃ caturo viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56477: prakṛtaṃ padaṃ tadantaṃ tasya api viśeṣaṇaṃ nyāyyam //
GS24jvkasipu:56478: evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe catuḥśabdasya kṛtvo 'rthe 'pi vartamanasya pūrveṇa+eva nityaṃ ṣatvaṃ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:56479: pūrvatra siddhe na asti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya //
GS24jvkasipu:56485: is us ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya anyatarasyāṃ ṣakārādeśo bhavati sāmarthye kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56486: sarpiṣkaroti, sarpiḥ karoti yajuskaroti, yajuḥ karoti /
GS24jvkasipu:56487: sāmarthye iti kim ? tiṣṭhatu sarpiḥ, piva tvamudakam /
GS24jvkasipu:56488: sāmarthyam iha vyapekṣā, na punar ekārthībhāvaḥ, ubhayaṃ vā //
GS24jvkasipu:56493: samāsaviṣaye isusoḥ visarjanīyasua anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ ṣtvaṃ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56501: etad eva anuttarapadasthasya iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam isusoḥ pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt sa vihitaḥ tadādeḥ ity ayaṃ niyamo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56506: vyapekṣā ca tatra sāmarthyamāśritam iti samāse na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56511: akārād uttarasya anavyayavisarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya nityaṃ sakārādeśo bhavati kṛ kami kaṃsa kumbha pātra kuśā karṇī ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56522: prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56530: śunaskarṇaḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56534: bhāskaraḥ ity ayaṃ tu kaskādiṣu draṣtavyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56545: adhas śiras ity etayoḥ visarjanīyasya samāse anuttarapadasthasya sakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati padaśabde parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56556: kaska ity evam ādisu ca visarjanīyasya sakāraḥ vā yathāyogamādeśo bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56564: krīṇāter ayaṃ sampadāditvāt kvip pratyayaḥ, tatra bhavaḥ kratuḥ sādyaskraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56569: yajuṣpātram ity eṣāṃ pāṭhaḥ uttarapadasthasya api ṣatvaṃ yathā syād iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56570: paramasrpiḥphalam ity evam ādi pratyudāharaṇāt iti pārāyaṇikā āhuḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56572: ity atra praramasarpiḥkuṇdikā ity etad eva pratyudāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:56580: chandasi viṣaye visarjanīyasya vā sakārādeśoḥ bhavati kupvoḥ parataḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56588: sa naḥ pāvaka ity evam ādiṣu sarve viṣayaśchandasi vikalpyante iti satvaṃ na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56592: kaḥ karat karati kṛdhi kṛta ity eteṣu parataḥ anaditeḥ visarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56596: anaditeḥ iti kim ? yathā no aditiḥ karat //
GS24jvkasipu:56601: pañcamīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati parau parataḥ adhyarthe /
GS24jvkasipu:56606: pañcamāḥ iti kim ? ahiriva bhogaiḥ paryeti bāhum /
GS24jvkasipu:56607: parau iti kim ? ebhyo vā etal lokebhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ samairayat /
GS24jvkasipu:56608: adhyathe iti kim ? divaspṛthivyāḥ paryeja udbhṛtam /
GS24jvkasipu:56613: pātau ca dhātau parataḥ pañcamīvisarjanīyasya bahulaṃ sakārādeśaḥ bhavati chandasi visaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56621: ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya sakārādeśo bhavati pati putra pṛṣṭha pāra pada payas poṣa ity eteṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56629: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ iti kim ? manuḥ putrebhyo dāyaṃ vyabhajat //
GS24jvkasipu:56634: iḍāyāḥ ṣaṣthīvisarjanīyasya vā sakāra ādeśo bhavati patyādiṣu parataḥ chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:56648: apadāntasya iti, mūrdhanyaḥ iti caitad adhikṛtam veditavyam āpādaparisamāpteḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56656: ṣaḥ ity evaṃ siddhe mūrdhanyagrahaṇaṃ ḍhakārārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:56662: saher dhātoḥ sāḍrūpasya yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56666: saheḥ iti kim ? saha ḍena vartate saḍaḥ, tasya apatyaṃ sādiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56667: sāḍgrahaṇaṃ kim ? yatrāsya etad rūpaṃ tatra yathā syāt, iha mā bhūt jalāsāham /
GS24jvkasipu:56669: saḥ iti kim ? ākārasya mā bhūt //
GS24jvkasipu:56674: ita uttaraṃ yad vakṣyāmaḥ, iṇaḥ kavargāc ca ity evaṃ tad veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56691: nuṃvyavāye 'pi visarjanīyavyavāye 'pi śarvyavāye 'pi uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56702: tena iha na bhavati, niṃsse, niṃssvaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56703: ṇisi cumbane ity etasya etad rūpam /
GS24jvkasipu:56704: atra hi numā, sakāreṇa śarā ca vyavadhānam //
GS24jvkasipu:56709: mūrdhanyaḥ iti vartate, sa iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56711: ādeśo yaḥ sakāraḥ, pratyayasya ca yaḥ sakāraḥ iṇkor uttaraḥ tasya mūrdhanyo bhavati ādeśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56718: indro mā vakṣat, sa devān yakṣat iti vyapadeśivadbhāvāt pratyayasya iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56719: yajater vahateś ca pañcamalakāre parasmaipadaprathamaikavacane ikāralopaḥ, leṭo 'ḍaṭau (*3,4.94)
GS24jvkasipu:56721: iti sip, tataḥ siddhaṃ yakṣat, vakṣat iti //
GS24jvkasipu:56725: śāsi vasi ghasi ity eteṣāṃ ca iṇkoḥ uttarasya yakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56737: ghasir yady apy ādeśaḥ, sakārastvādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56744: stauteḥ ṇyantānāṃ ca ṣabhūte sani parataḥ abhyāsāt iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56749: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi abhyāsād yathā syāt, anyasya mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:56753: stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva iti hi vijñāyamāne tuṣṭāva ity atra na syāt, iha ca syād eva sisikṣati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:56754: ṣaṇi iti kim ? anyatra niyamo mā bhūt, siṣeca /
GS24jvkasipu:56755: ko vinate 'nurodhaḥ ? avinate niyamo mā bhūt, suṣupsati /
GS24jvkasipu:56757: kaḥ sānubandhe 'nurodhaḥ ? ṣaśabdamātre niyamo mā bhūt, suṣupiṣa indram /
GS24jvkasipu:56759: abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyā niyamo yathā syāt, dhātoḥ yā prāptis tasyā niyamo mā bhūt, pratīṣiṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:56765: svidi svadi sahi ity eteṣāṃ ṇyantānāṃ sani ṣabhūte parato 'bhyāsād uttarasya sakārasya sakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56774: prāk sitasaṃśabdanād yān ita ūrdhvam anukramiṣyāmaḥ tatra aḍvyavāye 'pi mūrdhanyo bhavati ity evaṃ tad veditavyam,
GS24jvkasipu:56789: upasargāt sunoti ity atra sthāsenayasedha iti sthādayaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:56790: tesu sthādiṣu prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt abhyāsena vyavāye mūrdhanyo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56791: abhyāsasakārasya ca bhavati ity evaṃ veditavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:56792: abhyāsena vyavāye aṣopadeśārthaṃ ca abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣati, pariṣiṣeṇayiṣati /
GS24jvkasipu:56795: abhyāsasya iti vacanam niyamārtham, sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasakārasy mūrdhanyo bhavati, na anyatra /
GS24jvkasipu:56801: mūrdhanya iti vartate, saḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:56802: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya sunoti suvati syati stauti stobhati sthā senaya sedha sica sañja svañja ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56861: nirgatāḥ secakā usmasad deśāt niḥsecako deśaḥ iti nāyaṃ siceḥ upsargaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:56862: abhisāvakoyati ity atra api na sunotiṃ prati kiryāyogaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? sāvakīyaṃ prati /
GS24jvkasipu:56863: abhiṣāvayati ity atra tu sunotimeva prati kriyāyogaḥ, na sāvaryatiṃ prati iti ṣatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:56867: sadeḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt aprateḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56879: stanbheḥ sakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanya murdhanya ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56886: aprateḥ ity etad iha na anuvartate,
GS24jvkasipu:56893: avaśabdāt upasargāt uttarasya stanbheḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyaḥ ādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:56901: ālambanāvidūryayoḥ iti kim ? avastabdho vṛṣalaḥ śītena /
GS24jvkasipu:56907: veḥ upasargāt avāt ca+uttarasya bhojanārthe svanateḥ sakāsya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56920: pari ni vi ity etebhyāḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttareṣām seva sita saya sivu saha suṭ stu svañja ity eteṣām sakārasya mūrdhanya ādeśaḥ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56971: pūrveṇa+eva siddhe stusvañjigrahaṇam uttarārtham, aḍvyavāye vibhāṣā yathā syāt //
GS24jvkasipu:56976: sivādīnām aḍvyavāye 'pi parinivibhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56981: anu vi pari abhi ni ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya syandateḥ aprāṇiṣu sakārasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:56994: prāṇyaprāṇiviṣayasya api syandateḥ ayam vikalpo bhavati, anuṣyandete matsyodake, anusyandete /
GS24jvkasipu:57000: veḥ upasargād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyo vā bhavati aniṣṭhāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:57008: pariśabdād uttarasya skandeḥ sakārasya vā mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57015: pṛthagyogakaraṇasāmarthyāt aniṣthāyām ity etan na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:57020: pariskandaḥ iti mūrdhanyābhāvo nipātyate prācyabharateṣu prayogaviṣayeṣu /
GS24jvkasipu:57021: pūrvena mūrdhanye prāpte tad abhavo nipātyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57030: sphuratisphulatyoḥ sakārasya nis ni vi ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vā mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57040: veḥ uttarasya skabhnāteḥ sakārasya nityaṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57049: iṇantād aṅgāt uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57061: arthavadgrahaṇād api siddham ? tat tu nāśritam //
GS24jvkasipu:57066: iṇaḥ parasmāt iṭa uttareṣāṃ ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāṃ yo dhakāraḥ tasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:57073: kecidāhuḥ, iṇantād aṅgād uttarasya iṭa ānantaryaṃ yuṭā vyavahitam iti na bhavitavyaṃ ḍhatvena iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57077: tataś ca yakārād eva inaḥ paro 'nantaraḥ iṭ iti pakṣe bhavitavyaṃ mūrdhanyena iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57081: saṅgasakārasya aṅguleḥ uttarasya mūrdhanya ādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:57085: samāse iti kim ? aṅguleḥ saṅgaṃ paśya //
GS24jvkasipu:57091: samāse ity eva, bhīroḥ sthānaṃ paśya //
GS24jvkasipu:57095: agneḥ uttarasya stut stoma soma ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:57100: tena iha na bhavati, agnisomau māṇavakau /
GS24jvkasipu:57101: tathā ca jyotir agniḥ, somaḥ latāviśeṣaḥ, agnisomau tiṣṭhataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57106: jyotis āyus ity etābhyām uttarasy stomasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:57109: samāse ity eva, jotiḥ stomaṃ darśayati //
GS24jvkasipu:57113: mātṛ pitṛ ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛsakārasya samāse mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57120: mātur pitur ity etābhyām uttarasya svasṛśabdasya anyatarasyāṃ mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati samāse /
GS24jvkasipu:57123: mātuḥ pituḥ iti rephāntayor etad grahaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:57124: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvād visarjanīyāntā sakārāntāt ca ṣatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57125: samāse ity eva, vākye mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:57126: mātuḥ svasā ity eva nityaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57130: abhinis ity etasmāt uttarasya stanatisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati anyatarasyāṃ śabdasañjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:57138: upasargasthān nimittāt prādusśabdāc ca+uttarasya yakāraparasya acparasya ca astisakārasya mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57151: atha asatyapi astigrahaṇe sakāram eva prati upasarga āśrīyate,
GS24jvkasipu:57152: prāduḥśabdasya ca kṛbhvastiṣv eva prayogaḥ iti anyatrāprasaṅgaḥ ?
GS24jvkasipu:57153: tathāpi etat pratyudāhartavyam, anusūte anusūḥ, anusvo 'patyaṃ ānuseyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57154: śubhrāditvāḍ ḍhak (*4,1.123), ḍhe lopo 'kadrvāḥ (*6,4.147) iti uvarnalopaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57161: su vi nir dur ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya supi sūti sama ity eteṣāṃ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57176: supeḥ ṣatvaṃ svapermā bhūd visuṣvāpeti kena na /
GS24jvkasipu:57178: sthādīnāṃ niyamo nātra prāk sitāduttaraḥ supiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57180: pūrvatrāsiddhīyamadvirvacane iti kṛte ṣtve tato dvirvacanam //
GS24jvkasipu:57185: ni nadī ity etābhyām uttarasya snātisakārasya mūrdhnyādeśo bhavati kauśale gamyamāne /
GS24jvkasipu:57189: supi sthaḥ (*3,2.4) ity atra supi iti yogavibhāgāt kapratyayaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57195: pratiṣṇātam iti nipātyate sūtraṃ ced bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57203: kapiṣṭhalaḥ nāma yasya saḥ kāpiṣṭhaliḥ putraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57204: gotre iti kim ? kapeḥ sthalam kapisthalam //
GS24jvkasipu:57211: agragāmini iti kim ? prasthe himavataḥ puṇye /
GS24jvkasipu:57216: viṣṭaraḥ iti nipātyate vṛkṣe āsane ca vācye /
GS24jvkasipu:57225: vipūrvāt stṛ ity etasmād dhātoḥ chandonāmni ca (*3,3.34)
GS24jvkasipu:57226: ity evaṃ vihito ghañ iti viṣṭaraḥ ity api prakṛte viṣṭāraḥ iti vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57237: gośabdād ahalantād api etasmād eva nipātanāt saptamyā alug bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57241: vi ku śami pari ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya sthalasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57249: amba āmba go bhūmi savya apa dvi tri ku śeku śaṅku aṅgu mañji puñji parame barhis divi agni ity etebhaḥ uttarasya sthaśabdasakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57276: śobhanaṃ sāma yasya asau suṣāmā brāhmaṇaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57281: suśabdasya karmapravacanīyasañjñākatvān nirdurśabdayoś ca kriyāntaraviṣayatvād anupasargatve sati pāṭho 'yam /
GS24jvkasipu:57290: ṅyāpoḥ sañjñāchandasor bahulam (*6,3.63) iti pūrvapadasya hrasvatvam /
GS24jvkasipu:57297: ekāraparasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśaḥ bhavati iṇkor uttarasya agakārāt parasya sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57302: sañjñāyām iti kim ? pṛthvī senā yasya sa pṛthuseno rājā /
GS24jvkasipu:57307: nakṣatravācinaḥ śabdād uttarasya sakārasya vā eti sañjñāyām agakārāt mūrdhanyo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57315: hrasvād uttarasya sakārasya mūrdhanyādeeśo bhavati tādau taddhite parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57316: tarap tamap taya tva tal tyap, etāni prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57331: pratyayasakārasya sāt padādyoḥ (*8,3.111) iti saty api pratiṣedhe prakṛtisakārasya syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57339: nisaḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati tapatau parato 'nāsevane 'rthe /
GS24jvkasipu:57343: anāsevane iti kim ? nistapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57345: niṣṭaptaṃ rakṣo niṣṭaptā arātayaḥ ity atra sadapyāsevanaṃ na vivakṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57350: yuṣmat tat tatakṣus ity eteṣu takārādiṣu parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati,
GS24jvkasipu:57359: antaḥpādam iti kim ? yanma ātmano mindābhūdagnistatpunarāhārjatavedā vica //
GS24jvkasipu:57363: yajuṣi viṣaye yuṣmattattatakṣuḥṣu parata ekeṣām ācāryāṇāṃ matena sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57373: stuta stoma ity etayoḥ sakārasya chandasi viṣaye mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:57376: pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe prapañcārtham idam //
GS24jvkasipu:57380: chandasi iti vartate, ekeṣām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57381: pūrvapadasthānnimittāt parasya sakārasya murdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye ekeṣāmācāryāṇāṃ matena /
GS24jvkasipu:57387: asamāse 'pi yat pūrvapadaṃ tadapi iha gṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57393: tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittāt uttarasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57402: anaḥ iti kim ? gosaniṃ vācamudeyam pūrvapadāt ity eva siddhe niyamārtham idam /
GS24jvkasipu:57403: atra kecit savanādipāṭhād gosanirniyamasya phalaṃ na bhavati iti sisānayiṣati iti prayudāharanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57409: pṛtanā ṛta ity etābhyām uttarasya sahisakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57413: ṛtīṣaham ity atra api yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57415: avagrahe tu ṛtisaham ity eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57421: rephaparasya sakārasya sṛpi sṛji spṛśi spṛhi savanādīnāṃ ca mūrdhanyo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57424: spṛpi - purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ sṛji - vāco visarjanāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57436: aśvasanigrahaṇam aniṇo 'pi ṣatvam asti iti jñāpanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:57437: tena jalāṣāham, aśvaṣāham ity etat siddhaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57453: sāt ity etasya padādeś ca mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57464: sicaḥ sakārasya yagi parato mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57467: upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ sā padādilakṣaṇam eva pratiṣedhaṃ bādhate, na sico yaṅi iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57473: gatau vartamānasya sedhateḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57481: pratistabdha nistabdha ity etau mūrdhanyapratiṣedhāya nipātyete /
GS24jvkasipu:57497: stambhu sivu saha ity eteṣāṃ caṅi parataḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57498: stanbheḥ (*8,3.77) iti, parinivibhyaḥ iti ca prāptaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57506: upasargādyā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ eva pratiṣedho yathā syāt, abhyāsādyā prāptiḥ tasyā mā bhūt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57511: sunoteḥ sakārasya mūrdhanyadeśo na bhavati sye sani ca parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57517: na+etad asti prayojanam, tatra stautiṇyor eva ṣaṇyabhyāsāt (*8,3.71) iti niyamāt na bhaviṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:57519: etad api na asti, sthādiṣv abhyāsena ca abhyāsasya (*8,3.64) iti niyamāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57520: idaṃ tarhi, abhisusūṣateḥ apratyayaḥ abhisusūḥ ity udāharanam iti ?
GS24jvkasipu:57521: atra hi sanṣabhūto na bhavati ity abhyāsāt prāptir asti /
GS24jvkasipu:57526: sadi ṣvañja ity etayoḥ dhātvoḥ liṭi parataḥ sakārasya parasya mūrdhanyaḥ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57533: svañjeḥ saṃyogāntād api vibhāṣā liṭaḥ kittvam icchanti iti pakṣe 'nuṣaṅgalopaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:57538: ni vi abhi ity etebhyaḥ upasargebhyaḥ uttarasya sakārasya aḍvyavāye chandasi viṣaye mūrdahnyādeśo na bhavati vā /
GS24jvkasipu:57542: sadiṣvañjor iti tad iha na anuvartate /
GS24jvkasipu:57544: vyaṣṭaut, vyastaut, abhyaṣṭaut, abhyastaut ity etad api siddhaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57545: iti vāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57560: ṣagrahaṇam uttarārtham, ṣṭutvena+eva hi siddham etat /
GS24jvkasipu:57569: avarnabhaktyā ca vyavadhāne 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanatṛpnotigrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam /
GS24jvkasipu:57570: athavā ṛvarṇād api ṇatvaṃ bhavati iti etad eva anena jñāpyate //
GS24jvkasipu:57574: aṭ ku pu āṅ num ity etair vyavāye 'pi rephaṣākārabhyām uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57591: aḍvyavāye iti siddhe āṅgrahaṇaṃ padavyavāye ity asya pratiṣedhasya bādhanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:57595: tena tṛṃhaṇam, tṛṃhaṇīyam ity atra anusvāravyavāye numabhāve 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57596: saty api ca numi yatra anusvāro na śrūyate tatra na bhavati, prenvanam, prenvanīyam iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57597: vyavāyopalakṣaṇārthatvād aḍādīnām iha vyastaiḥ samastair vyavāye 'pi ṇatvaṃ bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57601: pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya gakāravarjitād nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57608: kecid etan niyamārthaṃ varṇayanti, pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām eva ṇatvaṃ na anyatra iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57610: samāse 'pi hi samānapade nimittanimittinor bhāvād asti pūrveṇa prāptiḥ iti sa ca niyamaḥ pūrvapadasambadhād uttarapadasthasya+eva ṇatvaṃ nivartayati,
GS24jvkasipu:57615: agaḥ iti yogavibhāgena ṇatvapratiṣedhaḥ, na niyamapratiṣedhaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57616: apare tu pūrvasūtre samānam eva yan nityaṃ padaṃ tat samānapadam ity āśrayanti, samānagrahaṇāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57617: teṣām aprāptam eva ṇatvam anena nidhīyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57618: samāse hi pūrvapadottaravibhāgād asamānapadatvam apy asti iti //
GS24jvkasipu:57623: puragā miśraka sighrakā śārikā koṭarā agre ity etebhyaḥ pūrvapadebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati sañjñāyāṃ viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57631: etebhya eva parasya vananakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati, na anyebhyaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57638: pra nir antar śara ikṣu plakṣa āmra kārṣya khadira pīyūkṣā ity etebhyaḥ uttarasya vananakārasya sañjñāyām asañjñāyām api ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57653: oṣadhivāci yat pūrvapadaṃ vanaspativāci ca tatsthān nimittād uttarasya vananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vibhāṣā /
GS24jvkasipu:57666: satyapi bhede vṛkṣavanaspatyor iha bhedena grahaṇaṃ draṣtavyam //
GS24jvkasipu:57671: adantaṃ yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasya ahno nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57677: ahnaḥ ity akārāntagrahaṇād dīrghāhnī śarad ity atra na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:57681: āhitavāci yat pūrvapadaṃ tatsthān nimittād uttarasy avāhananakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57685: vāhane yad āropitam uhyate tad āhitam ucyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57691: pānanakārasya pūrvapadasthān nimittād uttarasya deśābhidhāne ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57694: kṣīraṃ pānaṃ yeṣāṃ te kṣīrapāṇā uśīnarāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57699: deśe iti kim ? dākṣīṇāṃ pānam dākṣipānam //
GS24jvkasipu:57703: bhāve karaṇe ca yaḥ pānaśabdaḥ tadīyasya nakārasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati vā pūrvapadasthānimittād uttarasya /
GS24jvkasipu:57716: prātipadikānte numi vibhaktau ca yo nakāraḥ tasya pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasy vā ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57722: pūrvapadādhikārād uttarapadasya prātipadikastho yo 'ntyo nakāraḥ tasya+idaṃ ṇatvam iṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:57723: iha hina bhavati, gargāṇāṃ bhaginī gargabhaginī /
GS24jvkasipu:57730: māṣavāpinī ity atra tu gatikārakopapadānāṃ kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavacanaṃ prākṣubutpatteḥ iti kṛdantena+eva samāse sati prātipadikasya uttarapadasya+eva sato nakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57732: sa hi samudāyabhaktatvād uttarapadasya anto na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57742: tasminn ekājuttarapadasamāse prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktisu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāraḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57749: ṇaḥ iti vartamāne punarṇagrahaṇaṃ vikalpādhikāranivṛtteḥ vispaṣṭīkaraṇārtham //
GS24jvkasipu:57753: kavargavati ca+uttarapade prātipadikāntanuṃvibhaktiṣu pūrvapadasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57766: ṇopadeśasya dhātor yo nakāraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati asamāse 'pi samāse 'pi /
GS24jvkasipu:57771: upasargāt iti kim ? pragatā nāyakāḥ asmād deśāt pranāyako deśaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57772: asmāse 'pi kim ? pūrvapadādhikārāt samāsa eva syāt iti tadadhikāraṇivṛttidyotanārtham /
GS24jvkasipu:57778: hinu mīnā ity etayoḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57783: hinumīnāgrahaṇe vikṛtasya api bhavati, ajādeśasya sthānivattvāt //
GS24jvkasipu:57788: āni ity etasya loḍādeśasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakāradeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57797_0: ni ity etasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati gada nada
GS24jvkasipu:57797_1: pata pada ghu mā syāti hanti yāti vāti drāti psāti vapati vahati śāmyati cinoti degdhi ity eteṣu parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:57843: neḥ iti vartate, upasargāt iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:57844: akakārādirakhakārādiraṣakārāntaḥ ca upadeśe yo dhātuḥ sa śeṣaḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:57845: tasmin parataḥ upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya neḥ nakārasya vibhāṣa ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57851: upadeśagrahaṇaṃ kim ? iha ca pratiṣedho yathā syāt, pranicakāra, pranicakhāda, pranipekṣyati iti /
GS24jvkasipu:57857: aniteḥ nakārasya upasargasthānnimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57865: upasargasthānnimittāt uttarasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57870: kecit tu pūrvasūtre eva etad antagrahaṇaṃ sāmīpyārtham abhisambadhnanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57871: nimittasamīpasthaikavarṇavyavahitasya anitinakārasya padānte vartamānasya ṇakārādeśo yathā syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:57873: tair dvitīyam api padāntasya ṇatvārtham antagrahaṇam āśrayitavyam eva /
GS24jvkasipu:57874: yeṣāṃ tu paryaṇiti iti bhavitavyam iti darśanam, teṣāṃ pūrvasūtre na artho 'ntagrahaṇena //
GS24jvkasipu:57878: sābhyāsasya aniteḥ upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ubhayoḥ nakārayoḥ ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57883: pūrvatrāsiddhīyam advirvacane ity etasmin sati pūrveṇa+eva kṛtaṇatvasya dvirvacane kṛte siddham etad antareṇa api vacanam ?
GS24jvkasipu:57884: etat tu nāśrayitavyam iti sūtram idam ārabhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57889: akārapūrvasya hantinakārasya upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya ṇakāra ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57902: vakāramakārāyoḥ parataḥ hantinakārasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57910: antaḥśabdād uttarasya hantinakārasya atpūrvasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:57921: ayananakārasya ca antaḥśabdād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati adeśābhidhāne /
GS24jvkasipu:57929: ṛkārāntād avagrahāt pūrvapadād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57932: atra hi nṛmaṇāḥ, pitṛyāṇam iti ṛkāro 'vagṛhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:57933: avagrahagrahaṇaṃ kimartham ucyate, yāvatā saṃhitādhikāra ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ ity uktam ?
GS24jvkasipu:57935: avagṛhyamāṇād yathā syāt, anavagṛhyamāṇāt mā bhūt /
GS24jvkasipu:57940: nas ity etasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati dhātusthān nimittād uttarasya uruśabdāt ṣuśabdāc ca chandasi viṣaye /
GS24jvkasipu:57950: upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya naso nakārasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati bahulam /
GS24jvkasipu:57956: bahulagrahaṇād bhāṣāyām api bhavati, praṇasaṃ mukham /
GS24jvkasipu:57961: kṛtsthaḥ yo nakāraḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ tasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57962: ana, māna, anīya, ani, niṣṭhādeśa ete ṇatvaṃ prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:57981: bhujo kauṭilye, asya niṣṭhāpratyayaḥ, oditaś ca (*8,2.45)
GS24jvkasipu:57991: ṇyantād yo vihitaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthasya nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:57998: prayapyamāṇam ity atra yakā vyavadhāne 'pi yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:58003: halādiḥ yo dhāturijupadhaḥ tasmāt paro yaḥ kṛtpratyayaḥ tatsthastha nakārasya aca uttarasya upasargasthān nimittād uttarasya vibhāṣā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58016: halaḥ iti vartate, tena iha sāmarthyāt tadantavidhiḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58017: ijādeḥ sanumaḥ halantād dhātoḥ vihito yaḥ kṛt,
GS24jvkasipu:58018: tatsthasay nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya ṇakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58025: siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, ijāder eva sanumaḥ, nānyasmāt iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58028: halaḥ ity adhikārād ṇyante nityaṃ vidhyartham etan na bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58033: niṃsa nikṣa ninada ity eteṣāṃ nakārasya upasargasthān nimittāt uttarasya vā ṇakārādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58041: bhā bhū pū kami gami payāyī vepa ity eteṣām upasargasthāt nimittād uttarasya kṛtsthasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58049: pūṅo hi bhavaty eva ṇatvam, prapavaṇaṃ somasya iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58065: ṣakārāt padantād uttarasya nakārasya ṇakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58073: pade antaḥ padāntaḥ iti saptamīsamāso 'yam, tena iha na bhavati, susarpiṣkeṇa /
GS24jvkasipu:58085: antagrahaṇaṃ ṣāntabhūtapūrvamātrasya api yathā syāt, pranaṅkṣyati /
GS24jvkasipu:58099: padena vyavāye 'pi sati nimittanittinoḥ nakārasya nakārādeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58110: svādau pūrvaṃ padam iti gośabdaḥ pūrvapadam tena vyavāyaḥ //
GS24jvkasipu:58115: kṣubhnā ity evam ādiṣu śabdeṣu nakārasya ṇakāradeśo na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58117: ajādeśasya sthānivadbhāvād iha api pratiṣedho bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58122: nandin, nandana, nagara, etāny uttarapadāni sañjñāyāṃ prayojayanti - harinandī /
GS24jvkasipu:58128: nartana, gahana, nandana, niveśa, nivāsa, agni, anūpa, etāni uttarapadāni prayojayanti /
GS24jvkasipu:58129: parinartanam, parigahanam iti sañjñāyām pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:58130: parinandanam ity atra upasargād asamāse 'pi iti prāpnoti /
GS24jvkasipu:58131: śaraniveśaḥ, śaranivāsaḥ, śarāgniḥ, darbhānūpaḥ ity etāḥ sañjñāḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58136: irikā, timira, samīra, kubera, hari, karmāra ity uttarapadavanaśabdasthasya sañjñāyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58142: sakāratavargayoḥ śakāracavargābhyāṃ sannipāte śakāracavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58143: stoḥ ścunā iti yathāsaṅkhyam atra neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58144: sakārasya śakāreṇa, cavargeṇa, dvābhyām api sannipāte śakāro bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58145: tavargasya api ca śakāreṇa, cavargena ca sannipāte cavargo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58146: ādeśe tu yathāsaṅkhyam isyate, sakārasya śakāraḥ, tavargasya ca cavargaḥ iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58171: stoḥ ścau iti saptamīnirdeśo na kṛtaḥ, pūrveṇa pareṇa ca ścunā sannipāte ścutvaṃ yathā syāt iti //
GS24jvkasipu:58176: sakāratavargayoḥ ṣakāraṭvargābhyāṃ sannipāte ṣakāraṭavargāv ādeśau bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58205: padāntāṭ ṭavargād uttarasya stoḥ ṣṭutvaṃ na bhavati nām ity etad varjayitvā /
GS24jvkasipu:58208: padāntāt iti kim ? īḍa stutau - īṭṭe /
GS24jvkasipu:58221: tavargasya ṣakāre yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58229: śakārād uttarasya tavargasya yaduktaṃ tan na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58236: yaraḥ padāntasya anunāsike parataḥ vā anunāsikaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58251: aca uttarau yau rephahakārau tābhyām uttarasya yaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58261: acaḥ iti vartate, yaraḥ iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58262: anacparasya aca uttarasya yaro dve vā bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58267: yaṇo mayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58268: kecid atra yaṇaḥ iti pañcamī, mayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī iti vyācakṣate /
GS24jvkasipu:58270: apare tu mayaḥ iti pañcamī, yaṇaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī iti /
GS24jvkasipu:58272: śaraḥ khayo dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58273: atra api yadi śaraḥ iti pañcamī, khayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī, tadā stthālī, stthātā iti udāharaṇam /
GS24jvkasipu:58274: athavā khaya uttarasya śaro dve bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58279: avasāne ca yaro dve bhavata iti vaktavyam /
GS24jvkasipu:58287: ādini parataḥ ākrośe gamyamāne putraśabdasya na dva bhavataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58290: ākrośe iti kim ? tattvakathane dvirvacanaṃ bhavaty eva, puatrānatti iti puttrādinī /
GS24jvkasipu:58298: cayo dvitīyā bhavanti śari parataḥ pauṣkarasāder ācāryasya matena /
GS24jvkasipu:58308: aco rahābhyāṃ dve (*8,4.46) iti prāptiḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58317: triprabhṛtiṣu varṇeṣu saṃyukteṣu śākaṭāyanasya matena dvitvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58326: śākalyasya ācaryasya matena sarvatra dvirvacanaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58334: dīrghād uttarasya ācāryāṇāṃ matena na dvitvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58342: jhalāṃ sthāne jaśādeśo bhavati jhaśi parataḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58358: abhyāse vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati, cakārāj jaś ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58380: khari ca parato jhalāṃ carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58381: jaśgrahaṇaṃ na anuvartate, pūrvasūtre ca anukṛṣtatvāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58392: avasāne vartamānānāṃ jhalāṃ vā carādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58400: aṇaḥ apragṛhyasañjñasya avasāne vartamānasya vā anunāsikādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58411: anusvārasya yayi parataḥ prasvarṇaḥ ādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58427: iha kurvanti, vṛṣanti ity atra ṇatvasya asiddhatvāt pūrvaṃ nakārasya anusvāraḥ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58428: tasya api parasavarṇena punar nakāra eva bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58429: tasya api asiddhatvāt punar ṇatvaṃ na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58436: padāntasya anusvārasya yayi parataḥ vā parasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58438: taṃ kathaṃ citrapakṣaṃ ḍayamānaṃ nabhaḥsthaṃ puruṣo 'vadhīt //
GS24jvkasipu:58452: udaḥ uttarayoḥ sthā stambha ity etayoḥ pūrvasavarṇādeśo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58480: jhayaḥ iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58481: jhaya uttarasya śakārasya aṭi parataḥ chakarādeśo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58488: kiṃ prayojanam ? tacchlokena, tacchmaśruṇā ity evam artham //
GS24jvkasipu:58493: hala uttareṣāṃ yamāṃ yami parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58494: śayyyā ity atra dvau yakārau, kramajastṛtīyaḥ, tatra madhyamasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58496: aditer apatyamādityyaḥ ity atra takārāt paraḥ ekaḥ yakāraḥ,
GS24jvkasipu:58498: yaṇo mayaḥ iti kramajo dvitīyaḥ, tatra madhyamasya vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58500: ādityo devatā asya sthālīpākasya iti ādityyaḥ ity atra api dvau yakārau kramajastṛtīyaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58501: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58509: halaḥ iti vartate, anyatarasyām iti ca /
GS24jvkasipu:58510: hala uttarasya jharo jhari savarṇe parato lopo bhavati anyatarasyām /
GS24jvkasipu:58511: pratttam, avatttam ity atra trayastakārāḥ, kramajaścaturthaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58512: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayor vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58513: maruttttaḥ ity atra catvārastakārāḥ kramajaḥ pañcamaḥ /
GS24jvkasipu:58514: tatra madhyamasya madhyamayoḥ madhyamānāṃ vā lopo bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58515: marucchabdasya hi upasaṅkhyānasāmarthyāt aca upasargāttaḥ (*7,4.47) iti tatvaṃ bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58518: allopasya ca pūrvatra asiddhe na sthānivat iti sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhāt cakārasya ñakāre lopaḥ syāt /
GS24jvkasipu:58521: savarṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt iha saṅkhyātānudeśo na bhavati, savarṇamātre lopo vijñāyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58522: tena śiṇḍhi, piṇḍhi iti ḍhakāre ḍakārasya lopo bhavati //
GS24jvkasipu:58531: asya svaritasya asiddhatvāt anudāttaṃ padam ekavarjam (*6,1.158) ity etan na pravartate /
GS24jvkasipu:58536: udattodayasya svaritodayasya ca anudāttasya svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58544: tasminnudātte parato gārgyaśabdaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58547: kvaśabdaḥ svaritaḥ, tasmin parataḥ anudāttaḥ svarito na bhavati /
GS24jvkasipu:58550: teṣāṃ hi matena svarito bhavaty eva /
GS24jvkasipu:58563: tasya tathābhūtasya eva prayogo mā bhūt iti saṃvṛtapratyāpattir iyaṃ kriyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58564: dīrghaplutayoś ca anena vivṛtena akāreṇa grahaṇaṃ neṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58566: saṃvutena ca sarvaguṇasya mātrikasya grahaṇam iṣyate /
GS24jvkasipu:58570: iti śrīvāmanakāśikāyāṃ vṛttau aṣṭamādhyāyasya turīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścāyamadhyāyo granthaśca //
